1b1(mdo sde): rgya gar skad du/Ar+yA la li ta d+hi sbyar nA ma mahA yA na s+yAtra/d+yod skad du/
1b2(mdo sde): 'phags pa rgya cher rol pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo//bem po dang po/sangs
1b3(mdo sde): rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo//'di skad bdag gis thos
1b4(mdo sde): po dus gcig ni/bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na/rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon
2a1(mdo sde): med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na/dge slong khri nyis stong gi dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po la 'di/
2a2(mdo sde): lta ste/tshe dang ldan pa kun shes kauN+Din+d+ra dang /tshe dang ldan pa rta thul dang /tshe dang ldan pa rlangs pa dang /tshe dang ldan
2a3(mdo sde): pa ming chen dang /tshe dang ldan pa bzang po dang /tshe dang ldan pa grags sbyin dang /tshe dang ldan pa dri ma med dang /tshe
2a4(mdo sde): dang ldan pa lag bzung dang /tshe dang ldan pa gang po dang /tshe dang ldan po ba lang bdag dang /tshe dang ldan pa lteng
2a5(mdo sde): rgyas 'di smyung dang /tshe dang ldan pa chu klung 'od srung dang /tshe dang ldan pa ga ya 'od srung dang /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i
2b1(mdo sde): bu dang /tshe dang ldan pa maud+gal gyi bu chen po dang /tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po dang /tshe dang ldan pa k+Shat+yA'i bu chen po dang /tshe dang
2b2(mdo sde): ldan pa ku pi na chen po dang /tshe dang ldan pa gsus po che dang /tshe dang ldan pa skul byed dang /tshe dang ldan pa byams ma'i bu glang po
2b3(mdo sde): dang /tshe dang ldan pa ma 'gags pa dang /tshe dang ldan pa dga' byed dang /tshe dang ljon pa 'ug pa dang /tshe dung ldan pa rab 'byor dang /
2b4(mdo sde): tshe dang ldan pa nam gru dang /tshe dang ldan pa seng ldeng nugs pa dang /tshe dang ldan pa de na yod rgyal po dang /tshe dang ldan pa pha rol tu
2b5(mdo sde): 'gro ba chen po dang /tshe dang ldan pa bkul dang /tshe dang ldan pa dga' bo dang /tshe dang ldan+da pa sgra gcen zin drung /tshe dang ldan pa
2b6(mdo sde): legs 'ongs dang /tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang /de dag la sogs pa dge slong khri nyis steng dang thabs cig tu bzhugs so///
3a1(mdo sde): /byang chub sems dpa' sum khyi nyis stong thams cad kyang skye ba gcig gis thogs pa/byang chub sems
3a2(mdo sde): dpa'i pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad las nges par skyes pa/byang chub sems dpa'i mngon par shes pa tha mos cad kyis rnam
3a3(mdo sde): par dri ba/byang chub sems dpa'i gzungs thams cad thob po/byang chub sems dpa'i spobs pa thams cad thob po/byang
3a4(mdo sde): chub sems dpo'i smon lam thams cad shin tu yongs su rdzogs pa/byang chub sems dpa'i so so yang dag par rig pa thams
3a5(mdo sde): cad rtogs par khong du chud pa/byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin thams cad la dbang thob pa/byang chub sems dpa'i dbang
3a6(mdo sde): thams cad thob pa/byang chub sems dpa'i bzod pa thams cad la zhugs pa/byang chub sems dpa'i sa thams cad rab tu
3b1(mdo sde): rdzogs pra sha stag ste/'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa dang /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzungs kyi
3b2(mdo sde): dbang phyug rgyal po dang /byang chubo sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po seng gi'i tog dang /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po don grub blo gros
3b3(mdo sde): dang /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyod pa rab tu zhi ba'i blo gros dang /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po so so yang dag par rig pa
3b4(mdo sde): thob pa dang /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus rtog par sbyor dang /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po snying rje chen po
3b5(mdo sde): sems dpa' dong /de dag la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' sum khri nyis stong dong yang thobaso cig go//de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod kyi grong khyer
3b6(mdo sde): chen po na/'khor bzhi dang /rgyal po dang /rgyal po'i sras dang /rgyal po'i blon po chen po dang /chags 'og gi rgyal phran dang /rgyal po'i zhabs 'bring
3b7(mdo sde): ba dang /rgyal rigs dang /bram ze dang /tshong dpon dang /khyim bdag dang /blon po dang /'khor gyi mi dang /grong khyer ba dang /yul gyi mi dang /mu stegs
4a1(mdo sde): can dang /dge sbyong dang /bram ze dang /spyod pa pa dang /kun tu rgyu sna tshogs kyis rim gror byas/bla mar byas/bsti snang du byas/mchod pa
4a2(mdo sde): byas so//bcom ldan 'das ni bza' ba dang /bca' ba dang /myang ba bsod cing mang ba dang /na bza' dang /bsod snyoms dang /grwa zums tshe dang /snyun gyi
4a3(mdo sde): gsos sman dang /yo byad rung ba brnyes shing /bcom ldan 'das ni brnyes pa dam pa dang /glags pa dam pa brnyes kyang pad+ma la chus mi gos pa ltar thams cad du
4a4(mdo sde): ma chags ma gos par bro zhugs so//bcom ldan 'das kyi grags pa dang /sgra dang snyan pa ni 'dri skad du/bcom ldan 'das de ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa
4a5(mdo sde): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/bde bar gshegs pa/'jig rten mkhyen pa/skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba bla na med pa/lha dang
4a6(mdo sde): mi rnams kyi ston pa/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das zhes bye bar 'jig rten du mngon par grags par gyur to//de ni spyan lnga dang ldan pa ste/'jig rten 'di dang 'jig
4a7(mdo sde): rten pha rol lha dang bcas pa/bdud dang bcas pa/tshangs pa dang bcas pa/dge sbyong dang bram zer bcas pa'i skye dgu lha dang mir bcas pa dag/rang gis
4b1(mdo sde): mngon par mkhyen pas mngon du mdzad nas nye bar bsgrubs te rab tu ston to//de thog mar dge ba/bar du dge ba/tha mar dge ba/don bzang po/tshig 'bru bdang ngo //ma 'dras
4b2(mdo sde): /yongs su rdzogs pa/yongs su dgra po/yongs su dkar ba'i chos ston te/tshungs pa'i spyod pa yang dag par ston to//de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis nem gyi dri gung thun
4b3(mdo sde): la/sangs rgyas kyi rgyan bkod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs par gyur to//btso mo ldan 'das kyis sangs rgyas kyi rgyan bkod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin de'i snyoms
4b4(mdo sde): phrer zhugs mo thag tu/skad cig de nyid la bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu'i gtsug gi gtsug tir gyi gse bo nis/snron gyi sa sa rgyas rjes su dran par bya ba'o chags pa med pa'i ye
4b5(mdo sde): shes snang ba zhes bya ba'i 'od zer byung ste/des gi nas gtsang ma'i lha'i gnas thams cad snang bar byas na so lha'i bu deda'ang phyug chun sgo la sogs pa lha'i bu tshad med pa dag yang dag
4b6(mdo sde): par bskul to//de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'od zer gyi tshogs de las bskul ba'i tshigs su b+he tsud po 'di dag kyang byung ngo //ye shes 'od ldan mun bcom 'od mdzad pa//'od bzang
4b7(mdo sde): gzi brjid dam pa dri med pa//su lus rab ni thugs dge zhi ba po//shA'i seng ge thub dang bred par gyis//ye shes rgya mtsho ma chen dge pa ste//chos kyi mnga' bdag kun
5a1(mdo sde): mkhyen thub pa'i dang //mI dang lhas mchod lha yi lhar gyur pa//chos la rang byung mnga' dbang mdzad lnga rton//gang zhig gdul ka'i sems la mnga'
5a2(mdo sde): mdzad de//ga zhog du ky-i sti las grol ba'i thugs//de 'dir mthong thos don med ma yin gyis//rnam grol mthar phyin zhi ba'i drung du dang //mtshungs med chos la
5a3(mdo sde): spang bar gyur pa ste//n+ya r-I stsol tshul bzang ston par rab mdzad pa//sangs rgyas spyod zhi mkhyen pa dpag med pa//de yi drung du dad pa mchog gis dang //de ni sman pa'i
5a4(mdo sde): rgyal po bdud rtsi gau //de ni smra ba dpa' bo tshogs ngan 'joms//de ni chos kyi rtsa lag don dam mkhas//do ni 'dren pa bla med lam ston pa'o//gnas gtsang ma'i ris
5a5(mdo sde): kyi lha'i bu de dag sngon gyi sangs rgyasA rje sna su dran par bya ba la tshogs pa med pa'i ye shes sdang ba'i 'od zer des phog cing tshigs su bcad pa rnam pa de lta bu de dag gis kyang
5a6(mdo sde): bskul ma thag tu rab tu zhi ba'i tong nge 'dzin de las ljongs nas sangs rgyas kyi mthus bskal pa grangs med tshad med/bgrang ba las shin tu 'das pa dag las 'das pa'i
5a7(mdo sde): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams rjes su dran zhing /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa gang yin pa dag dang /'khor
5b1(mdo sde): gyi dkyil 'khor gang yin pa dag dang /chos bstan pa gang yin pa de dag thams cad kyang rjes su dran par gyur to//de nas de'i nub mo mi nyal tsam na gnas gtsang ma'i ris
5b2(mdo sde): kyi lha'i bu dbang phyug ces bya ba dang /dbang phyug chen po dang /dga' bo dang /shin tu dga' bo dang /tsan+dan+da dang /mchod byas dang /rwa bzhi dang /dul ba rab zhi dbang phyug
5b3(mdo sde): la sogs pa de dag dang /gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha'i bu gzhan shin tu mang po kha dog 'phags shing shin tu 'phags po dang ldan pa dag gis/lho'i snang bas rgyal bu rgyal
5b4(mdo sde): byed kyi tshal thams cad snang bar byas te/bcom ldan 'das grwa lA ba der dong nas phyin pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'khod
5b5(mdo sde): do//phyogs gcig tu 'khod nas kyang gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha'i bu de dag gis bcom ldan 'das l-I 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das rgya cher rol pa zhes bgyi ba'i
5b6(mdo sde): chos kyi rnam grangs me do sa shin tu rgyas pa chen po bsdus pa/byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba yang dag par bstan pa/dga' ldan gyi pho brang dam pa nas 'bab
5b7(mdo sde): pa dang /ched du dgongs te lhums su 'jug bye'i rnam pa rol po dang /mAngal gyi gnas kyi khyad par kun tu bstan pa/rigs bzang por skye bo'i sa'i mthu kun tu bstan pa/
6a1(mdo sde): byis pa'i spyod pa thams cad las yon+ya tan gyi khyad par gyis shin tu 'da' ba bstan pa 'jig rten pa'i 'azo'i gnas dang /las kyi gnas dang /son
6a2(mdo sde): dang /grangs dang /lag rtsis dang /rnyis dang /ral gri'i thabaso dang /'phong dang /stobs dang /gyad kyi 'dzin stangs rnams sems can thams cad las khyad par du
6a3(mdo sde): 'phags pa kun tu bstan pa/btsun mo'i 'khor dang /yul gyi longs spyod dang /yongs su spyod pa kun tu bstan pa/byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa thams cad
6a4(mdo sde): kI rgyu mthun pas yongs su grub pa'i 'bras bu brnyes pa yongs su brjod pa/byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par rol pa dang /bdud kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad rnam par
6a5(mdo sde): 'jog pa'i ston gyi/de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang /mi 'jigs po bsdus pa/sangs rgyas kyi chos tshad ma mchis pa nges par bstan pa/sngon gyi de bzhin
6a6(mdo sde): gshegs pa rnams kyis sngon nadru gsungs pa marmyis/'di lta ste/bcom ldad 'dus pad+ma'i bla ma dang /chos kyi tog dang /myur ma mdzad dang /yin tan gyi
6a7(mdo sde): ma rgyas san badza/dri sr-i dang /da mi rgyun /rnaM ga nga/ji ma ga sa dang/mas pa
6b1(mdo sde): gyis gnon dang /gser mdog dang /shin tu mthor gshegs dang /byu ru'i rgya mtsho dang /me tog gi tog dang /gzugs bzang dang /spyan bza' dang /drang srong sprod
6b2(mdo sde): dang /dmag tshogs lngas rgyal dang /mtho ba dang /me tog rgyas pa dang /mdzod spu gzi brjid dang /shin tu rgyas dang /'od zer bzang po dang /bkra shes ldan dang /blta
6b3(mdo sde): na bzang dang /seng ge'i gzo brjid chen po drang /blo gros brtan pos byin dang /spos kwa'i spos dri drang /badren pa'i phyogs grags rgya chen dang /'od ldan dang /sker rgyal dang /
6b4(mdo sde): 'jig rten mdzes dang /'od rgya chen dang /rin chen grags dang /drogu shul gzi brjid dang /rin chen gzi brjid dang /tshangs po'i gzi brjid dang /sgra snyan dang /me tog
6b5(mdo sde): bzang po dang /ri rab me tog dang /rab tu yid 'ong dbyangs dang /dge ba tshul bzung dang /rab tu 'dzum pa'i sprin dang /yon tan phung po dang /'brug sgra dang /kha dog
6b6(mdo sde): mdzes dang /tshe'i gzi brjid dang /ngom bag glang po'i 'gros dang /'jig rten mngon par smon dang /dgra las rmyil dang /yang dag mchod dang /rnam par gzigs dang
6b7(mdo sde): gtsug tor can dang /thams cad skyobs dang /'khor ba 'jigs dang /gser thub dang /de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dge bar rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od
7a1(mdo sde): skyong gis kyang sngon chad gsungs pa la gas nA//de bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang skye bo mang po la sman pa dang /skye bo mang po la bde ba dang /'jig rten
7a2(mdo sde): la thugs brtse ba dang /skye bo phal po che'i don dang /lha dang mi rnams kyi don du 'gyur ba dang /sman pa dang bde bar 'gyur ba dang /theg pa chen po 'di'ang brjod pa dang /
7a3(mdo sde): phas kyi rgol ba thams cad tshar bcad pa dang /bdud thams cad zil gyis mnon pa dang /byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la bstan pa dang /byang chub sems
7a4(mdo sde): dpa'i theg pa pa'i gang zug thams cad kyi brtson 'grus brtsam pa bskyed pa dang /dam pa'i chos yongs su gzung ba dang /dkon mchog gsum gyi gdung mi bcad
7a5(mdo sde): pa dang /sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa yongs su rdzogs pa'ang kun tu bston pa'i slad du de bstan du gsol zhes gsol po dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i bu de dag
7a6(mdo sde): dang lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten la thugs brtse ba'i rkyer cang mi gsung bas gnang ngo //de nas lha'i bu de dag kyang /bcom ldan 'das kyis cang mi gsung bas
7a7(mdo sde): gnang bar rig nas tshim zhing mgu la yi rangs shing rab tu dga' ste/dga' ba dang yid bde ba skyes nas/bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal
7b1(mdo sde): te/bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas tsan+dan gyi phye ma dang /a ga ru'i phye ma dang /me tog man+dA ra bdag gis kyang mngon par gtor te/de nyid du mi snang bar
7b2(mdo sde): gyur to//de nas bcom ldan 'das nub mo de'i nam nangs pa dang /smyig ma'i ldu mo bu'i 'khor gyi khyams gau la ba der gshegs te byon nas/bcom ldan 'das byang chub
7b3(mdo sde): sems dpa'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor zhing nyan thos kyi dge 'dun gyis mdun gyis bltas te/gadron bshams pa la bzhugs so//bzhugs nas kyang bcom ldan 'das
7b4(mdo sde): kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/dge slong dag mdang 'dir nga'i drung du gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha'i bu dbang phyug ces bya ba dang /dbang phyug chen po dang dga' bo dang /
7b5(mdo sde): shin tu dga' bo dang /tsan+dan dang /mchod byas dang /rab zhi dang /dul ba rab zhi dbang phyug la sogs pa de dag dang gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha'i bu gzhan shin tu mang po
7b6(mdo sde): zhes bya ba nas/de nyid du mi snang bar gyur ces bya ba'i bar du snga ma bzhin du gsungs so//de nas byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang /nyan thos chen po de dag gis bcom ldan
7b7(mdo sde): 'das ga la ba de logs su thil mo sbyar ba btud de/bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das rgya cher rol pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs legs par bstan du
8a1(mdo sde): gsol/de ni skye bo mang po la sman pa dang /skye bo mang po la bde ba dang /'jig rten la thugs brtse bar mdzad pa dang /skye bo la po che dang /lha dang /
8a2(mdo sde): mi rnams dang /daltar dang ma 'ongs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi don dang /sman pa dang bde bar 'gyur ro zhes gsol pa dang /bcom ldan
8a3(mdo sde): 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dopa' chen po de dag dang nyen thos chen po de dag dang /lce dang mi dang lha ma yin dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten la thugs brtse ba'i
8a4(mdo sde): phyir cang mi gsung ngas gnang ngo //de la 'di skad ces bya ste/dge slong dag kyang ni mdang sum 'dir//gnas pa bzang pos bde bar gnas gyur cing //nyon mongs
8a5(mdo sde): med par rab tu gnas gyur la//rtse gtsug sems su mnyam par bzhag drung du//rdzu 'phrul che zhing kha dog bzang ldan la//dri med dpal 'bar lho yi bu lhags nas/
8a6(mdo sde): dpal gyis rgyal byed tsha li 'di snang byas te//dga' bas nga yi gan du mngon der lhags//dbang phyug dbang phyug chen po tsan+dan dang //dga' bo rab tu sems zhi mchod
8a7(mdo sde): byas dang //shin tu dga' bzhi po lha yi bu//bye ba lha mang de dang de dag rnams/nga yi zhabs li phyag 'chil bskor byas te//nga yi mdun du 'dir ni 'khod par gyur
8b1(mdo sde): sor mo bcu yi thal sbyar gus bcas par//de dag 'dir ni nga la gsol ba btab//'jig rten kun la sman pa'i don slad du//rgyal ba kun gyis sngon chad gang gsungs pa//
8b2(mdo sde): shin tu rgyas mdo gleng gzhi chen po 'di//thub pa 'dod chags bsal bas de ring yang //byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs kun bzung bzhed pas//phas kyi rgol dang bdud rnams//
8b3(mdo sde): 'dul mdzad la//theg pa chen po mchog 'di rab gsung zhing //thub pa de slad legs par bshad du gsol//lha yi tshogs kyis gsol ba de snang phyir//mi gsung gyur
8b4(mdo sde): pas gnang ba mdzad pas na//thams cad tshim zhing rab dga' mgu gyur nas//dga' ba thob pas me tog sil ma gtor//de phyir dge slong shin tu rgyas pa'i mdo//'jig
8b5(mdo sde): rten kun la phan pa'i don gyi phyir//de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyis sngon bshad pa//gleng gzhi chen po khyed kun 'dir nyon cig/gleng gzhi'i le'u ste dang po'o///
8b6(mdo sde): dge slong dag de la chos kyi rnam grangs shin tu rgyas pa chen po'i mdo rgya cher rol pa zhes bya ba de gang zhe na/dge slong dag 'di la byang chub sems dpa' dga' ldan gyi gnas
8b7(mdo sde): mchog na gnas pa/mchod par byaMngs mchod pa/dbang bskur ba thob po/lha brgya stong gis bstod cing bkur te brjod cing bsngags pa/bsam pa thob pa/smon
9a1(mdo sde): sam gyis yang dag par 'phags pa/sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yang dag par thob pa'i blo da ldan pa/ye shes kyi sgog shin tu rgyus nang
9a2(mdo sde): yongs su dag pa dang ldan pa/dran pa dang /blo gros dang //rtogs pa dang /khrel yod pa dang /dga' ba 'bar ba'i blo rlabs po che dang ldan pa sbyin pa dang /tshul khrims
9a3(mdo sde): dang /bzod pa dang /brtson 'grus dang /bsam gtan dang /shes rab dang /thabs la mkhas pa chen po'i dam pa'i pha rol tu son pa/tshangs pa'i lam byangs
9a4(mdo sde): pa chen po dang /snying rje chen po dang /dga' ba chen po dang /btang snyoms chen po la mkhas pa mngon par shes pa dang /rig pa chen pos sgrib pa med cing chog pa
9a5(mdo sde): pa med pa'i ye shes mthong ba mngon du gyur pa/dran pa nye bar bzhag pa dang /yang dag par spong ba dang /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang /dbang po dang /stobs dang /byang chub
9a6(mdo sde): kyi yan lag dang /lam dang /byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos thams cad shin tu yongs su rdzogs pa'i mthar phyin pa/bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs dpag
9a7(mdo sde): tu med pa'i mtshan dang dpe byad brjong pos lus lags par brgyan pa/yun ring por rjes su 'brang ba dang ldan pa/ji skad du smras pa de ltar byed pas log pa med pa
9b1(mdo sde): tshig gi lam yang dag par smra ba/drang zhing ma yo la/gya gyu med pa'i yid thogs pa med pa dang ldan pa/nga rgyal dang /rgyags pa dang /dregs pa dang /'jigs pa dang /zhum
9b2(mdo sde): pa thams cad med pa/sems can thams cad la sems mnyam pa/sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong dpag tu med pa la bsnyen bkur byas pa/byang chub sems dpa' byi
9b3(mdo sde): ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang pos ngor blta zhing blta ba'i bzhin dang ldan pa/brgya byin dang tshangs pa dang /dbang phyug chen po dang /'jig rteno skyong ba dang /lha dang /klu dang //
9b4(mdo sde): gnod sbyin dang /dri za dang /lha ma yin dang /nam mkha' lding dang /srin po rnams kyis mngon par dga' bar bya ba'i grags pa dang ldan pa/tshig thams cad rab tu phye ste
9b5(mdo sde): bstan po la thogs pa med pa'i so so yang dag par rig pa la 'jug pa'i shes pa la mkhas pa/sangs rgyas thams cad kyis gsungs pa bzung ba la dran pa'i snod 'khrul pa
9b6(mdo sde): med pa dang /gzungs mtha' yas mu med pa rab tu thob pa/dran pa nye bar bzhig pa dang /yang dag par spong ba dang /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang /dbang po dang /stobs
9b7(mdo sde): dang /byang chub kyi yan lag dang /lam dang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /babs mkhas pa'i chos rin po che dang /bsod nams kyis yang dag par bsgrubs pa'i
10a1(mdo sde): chos kyi gru chen po'i ded dpon chen po/chu bo bzhi'i pha rol tu 'gro ba'i bsam pa can/bdud dang phyir rgol ba bcom pa/phas kyi rgol ba thams cad shin
10a2(mdo sde): tu tshar bcad pa/g.yul ngo'i thog ma la rab tu 'dug pa/nyon mongs pa'i dgra'i tshogs 'jom pa/ye shes mchog gi rdo rje'i mtshon sra ba dang ldan pa/byang chub kyi
10a3(mdo sde): sems kyi rtsa ba las snying rje chen po'i chu ba lhag pa'i bsam pas skyes pa zab cing brtan pa dang /brtson 'grus kyi chos kyi chus mngon par brlan pa/thebs mkhas pa'i snying
10a4(mdo sde): po dang ldan pa/byang chub kyi yan lag dang /bsam gtan gyi ze ba can/ting nge 'dzin gyi ze'u 'bru dang ldan pa/yon tan gyi tshogs rgya chen po'i mtsho las skyes pa/
10a5(mdo sde): rgyal dang dregs pa'i gdung ba med pa'i zla bas dri ma med pa'i 'dab ma rgyas pa/tshul khrims dang /thos pa dang /dag yod pa'i gsung gi ngad phyogs bcur thogs pa med
10a6(mdo sde): par ldang ba/'jig rten na shes pas thu bor gyur pa/'jig rten gyi chos brgyad kyis ma gos pa/skyes bu chen po'i pad+ma/bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs
10a7(mdo sde): kyi dri zhim po 'byung ba/shes rab dang ye shes kyi nyi ma'i 'od zer gyis mig shin tu rnam par dag pa'i pad+ma 'odab ma brgya pa rgyas pa/rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi mchog tu
10b1(mdo sde): mgyogs pa'i shugs dang ldan pa/'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi'i ster mo dang mche ba shin tu rno ba/tshangs pa'i gnas pa bzhi'i so drang bsnyer ba bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhis
10b2(mdo sde): shin tu bsdus pa'i mgo dang ldan pa/rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba yan lag bcu gnyis pa khong du chud pas rim gyis 'phags pa'i lus dang ldan pa/byang chub kyi phyogs
10b3(mdo sde): kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun yang dag par yongs su rdzogasu pas ral pa can du byas shing rig pa dang /ye shes kyi zab can/rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum gyi kha gu drangs pa/
10b4(mdo sde): zhi gnas dang lhag mthong shin tu rnam par dag pa'i mig dang ldan pa/ngasam gtan dang /rnam ring thar pa dang /ting nge 'dzin dang /snyoms par 'jug pa'i ri sul gyi
10b5(mdo sde): phug na gnas pa/spyod lam bzhi drung /'dul ba'i nags tshal dang /nags 'do nas skyes pa'i lus dang ldan pa/stobs bcu dang /mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /nye ba'i
10b6(mdo sde): stos dang ldan pa/skye ba dang 'jig pa'i 'dzegs pa dang /spya g.yo ba med pa/rtsal la zhub pa me dang /mu stegs can gyi bong bu dang ri dwags mang po'i tshogs rab tu
10b7(mdo sde): 'joms pa/bdag med par smra brjod pa'i seng ge ring re chen po sgrog pa/skyes bus ge dang /rnam par grol ba dang /ngasam gtan gyi dkyil 'khor las shes rab kyi
11a1(mdo sde): 'od dang /'od zer gyis mu stegs byed srin bu me khyer gyi tshogs 'od med par byed pa/ma rig pa'i mun pa mun nag gi ling tog dang rab rib med par byed
11a2(mdo sde): pa/stobs dang brtson 'grus 'bar ba/lha dang mi'i nang du bsod namos kyi gzi brjid kyi gzi dang ldan pa skyes bu chen po nyi ma/nag po'i phyogs med pa/dkar po'i phyogs
11a3(mdo sde): yongs su rdzogs pa/dalta na sdug cing yid du 'ong bas mig gi dbang po la thogs pa med pa/lte brgya stong gi skar ma'i tshogs kyis shin tu brgyan pa/bsam gtan dang /
11a4(mdo sde): rnam par thar pa dang /ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor can/byang chub kyi yan lag gi bde bas zla ba'i 'od zer du gyur pa/mi dang lha mkhas pa'i me tog ku mu da kha 'byed pa
11a5(mdo sde): skyes bu chen po zla ba/'khor gyi gling bzhir song ba/byang chub kyi yan lag bdun gyi rin po che dang ldan pa/sems can thams cad la sems mnyam par sbyor ba/blo la
11a6(mdo sde): thogs pa med pa/dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam gyi dko' thub dang brtul zhugs shin tu phun sum tshogs shing rab tu rdzogs pa'i khyad par du pogs dbyung por bya ba'i bsam
11a7(mdo sde): pa can/chos kyi rgyal po'i chos kyi 'khor lo rin po che mchog dam pa thogs pa med par bskor ba/'khor los sgyur ba'i rigs kyi rgyud du byung ba/chos kyi 'khor
11b1(mdo sde): ltos sgyur ba chen po//rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba zab cing gting dpag dka' ba/chos rin po che thams cad kyis rab tu gang ba/thos pas mi ngoms pas yangs
11b2(mdo sde): shing rgya che la mtha' yas pa'i ye shes dang tshul khrims kyi tshod las mi 'da' bya/blo rgya mtsho dang sa ltar rgya che ba'i mchog tu gyur pa/sa dang chu dang me dang rlung dang mnyam pa'i
11b3(mdo sde): sems su gyur pa/ri rab ltar brtan zhing mi g.yo la bskyod par mi nus pa'i yid dang ljon pa/rjes su tshogs pa dang khong khro ba med pa/nam mkha'i dkyil ltar dri ma med
11b4(mdo sde): cing yangs la 'dra ba med par rgya che ba'i blo dang ldan pa/lhog pa'i bsam pa shin tu yongs su dag pa/sbyin pa lags par byin pa/sngon sbyor ba legs par byas pa/lhag
11b5(mdo sde): pa'i bya ba legs par byas pa/bden pa'i rgyan gyis lags par brgyan pa/dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad yongs su btsal ba/gos par bya ba bsgos pa/dge ba'i rtsa ba
11b6(mdo sde): nges par byas pa bskol pa grangs med pa bdun du dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad yang dag par bsgrubs pa/sbyin pa rnam pa bdun byin pa/bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po lnga shin
11b7(mdo sde): tu bsten po/legs par spyod pa lus kyis rnam gsum/ngag gis rnam bzhi/yid kyis rnam gsum spyad par gyur pa/dge ba bcu'i las kyi lom bsten pa dang ldan pa/
12a1(mdo sde): yang dag pa'i sbyor ba yan lag bzhi bcu dang ldan pa bston par gyur pa/yang dag pa'i smon lam yan lag bzhi bcu dang ldan pa'i smon lam btab pa/lhag
12a2(mdo sde): pa'i bsam pa yan lag bzhi bcu dang ldan pa la zhugs pa/yang dag pa'i rnam par thar pa yin lag bzhi bcu dang ldan pa/yongs su rdzogs par byas pa/yang dag
12a3(mdo sde): pa'i myos pa yan lag bzhi bcu dang ldan pa drang por byas pa/sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag bzhi bcu'i rjes su rab tu byung ba/sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig
12a4(mdo sde): brgya stong lnga bcu rtsa lnga la sbyin pa phul bar gyur pa/rang sangs rgyas bye ba brgya phrag phyed deng bzhi la lhag par bya ba byas pa/sems can tshad med grangs med pa dag mtho
12a5(mdo sde): ris dang tha pa'i lam du btsud par gyur pa/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs po'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pa/tshe gcig gis thogs pa//
12a6(mdo sde): 'di nas shi 'phos nas dga' ldan gyi gnas dam pa na gnas pa lha'i bu dam pa tog dkar po zhes bya ba/lha'i tshogs rnams kyis 'di ni 'di nas shi 'phos nas mi'i
12a7(mdo sde): 'jig rten du skyes te/ring po mi thogs par bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro zhes der shin tu mchod pa/gzhal
12b1(mdo sde): mye khang gnas sum khri nyis stong rab tu gnas pa/stegs bu dang /bag ma dang /rta babs dang /skar khung dang /dAsil khang dang /khang pa brtsegs pa dang /khyams
12b2(mdo sde): kyis legs par brgyan pa/gdugs dang /rgyal mtshan dang /bdan sgreng ba/rin po che'i dril bu g.yer kha'i dra ba'i bla brebres pa/me tog man+da ra ba dang /mthor ba chen
12b3(mdo sde): po chal par bkram pa/lha'i bu mi bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong glu dbyangs len pa/me tog a ti muk+Sh+me dang /tsAm+baka dang /skyo snor dang /sa brtol dang /btang zung dang /btang
12b4(mdo sde): zung chen po dang /mya ngan 'chang dang /n+ya gro d+ha dang /tin+d+ra ka dang /a sa na? dang /drong ka'i me tog dang /shing ka sa ra dang /ta ma la dang /sA lA dang /rin po tshwa'i
12b5(mdo sde): shing ljon pa chen pos brgyan pa/gser gyi dra bas g.yogs pa/gzhi mnyam zhing bkod pas mdzes par byas pa/me tog snang 'od dang /me li ka dang /sna ma'i me
12b6(mdo sde): tog dang /b.rIk+Sha dang /ta rI ni dang /ba liM dang /kot+ta ra ni dang /mchog tu dri zhim dang /da nusgra ri dang /b+h+yo'i snga ma'i me tog dang /ut+pal dang /pad+ma dang /ku mud
12b7(mdo sde): dang /pad+ma dkar po dang /dri rab tu zhim pa'i bla bre chen po phyogs phyogs su bris pa/bya 'dab sbed dang /ne tsi dang /ri skags dang /khro byug dang /ngang pa dang /rma bya
13a1(mdo sde): dang /drur pa dang /kun la dang /ka la pid+ma dang /shang shang te'u la sogs pa bya sna tshogs sgra snyan pa 'byin pa/lha bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gis mig
13a2(mdo sde): mngon du phyogs te blta zhing ltas mor bya ba/chos rgya che ba chen po yang dag par brjod pas 'dod po la dga' ba'i shugs kyi nyon mongs po thams cad gcod pa/nga rgyal
13a3(mdo sde): dang /rgyags pa dang /dregs pa dang /khro ba dang /thab dang /khong khro ba med par gyur pa/dga' ba dang /mgu ba dang /mchog tu dga' ba dang /dran pa rgya che zhing
13a4(mdo sde): gsal po skye ba'i gzhal med khang chen po de ni badre bar gnas shing chos kyi yang dag pa'i gtam byung ba dang /sil snyan dang /glu dbyangs brgyad khri bzhi stong po'i sgra de dag
13a5(mdo sde): las byang chub sems dpa'i sngon gyi las dge ba'i tshogs kyis yang dag par bskul ba'i tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag byung ngo //bsod noms rgya chen tshigs mnga' dran rtogs
13a6(mdo sde): dang //blo gros mtha' yas shes rab 'od mdzad pa//mtshungs med stobs mnga' spyi rtsal rgya che ba//mar me mdzad kyis lung bstan dgongs par mdzod//rgya chen dri ma med pa'i
13a7(mdo sde): thugs mnga' ba//dri ma gsum spangs rgyags dang skyon zhi ba//dge ba dri med rnam par dog pa'i thugs//sngon chad ji ltar sbyin spyad dgongs par mdzod//zhi gnas tshul
13b1(mdo sde): sa la byas pa sa dang / nga na grus sas rgyun shes sa/ blu garnams nga/gas ga dzang
13b2(mdo sde): dgongs par mdzod//sems can rnams la thugs bcoM mdzad gyur cing //sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig khyod kyis mchod//shing sa mdzod drigengs par mdzod cig grag
13b3(mdo sde): mtha' yas//dengos lcags kyis bad snyoms ma mdzad cig/rga shi nyon mongs 'jigs mdzod rdul drol ba//lha dang klu nga gnod sbyin dri zla dang //Sh+Tha min phung ba rgya
13b4(mdo sde): snod lags kyis//'chi 'bo'i rgyul mkhyen 'pho ba bstan par mdzod//bskul pa stod du dka' ba spyad g+hu kyang //rgyu mtsho chu yis ji bzhin mi mas kyis//rims pa khyod
13b5(mdo sde): kyi thubs dam dge ba ste//yun ring so ma nyan sna po tshim par mdzod//skud pa med pa'i grags pa m+b+hing 'i di khyod//chos la dgyes par khyod dgyes 'dod mi dgyes//'on gyi
13b6(mdo sde): dri ma mang pa'i spyan ma byug/lhur bcas 'jig rten dag la thugs pa mdzod//lhurnams bye ba khyod lngam ches thos byas//dmas par 'gyur ba ni lags len gyi
13b7(mdo sde): del dang mi ldan gyur pa'i ngan song du//gnas par gyur pa dag la gzigs su gsol//dri ma mod pa'i spyan mnga' phyogs bcu yi//'jig rten dag gi sangs rgyas gzigs
14a1(mdo sde): gyur cing //de dag rnams la chos gsan chos mchog de//'jig rten dag la rnam par dbye ba mdzod//dpal ldan khyod kyi bsod nams dpal gyis
14a2(mdo sde): ni//dga' ldan pa brang shin tu mdzes mod kyi//'on kyang thugs rje thugs dang ldan pas na//dzam+bu'i rgyal mtshan du ni char pa phob//brtul zhugs grub pa byang chub
14a3(mdo sde): reg ces te//'dod pa'i khams las rab tu 'das pa yi//gzugs kyi khams na lha rnams gang 'khod pa//du ma thams cad mngon par rab tu dga'//mgon po
14a4(mdo sde): khyod kyis bdud kyi las rnams bcom//khyod gzhan mu stegs can rnams pham mdzad de//khyod ni byang chub phyag mthil bzhag dang 'dra//de dus lags kyis btang
14a5(mdo sde): snyoms ma mdzod cig/nyon mongs rab tu 'bor ba'i 'jig rten la//dpa' bo khyod kyis sprin ltor khyab mdzod do//bdud rtsi'i char pa mngon par rab tu phob//lha mi
14a6(mdo sde): rnams kyis nyon mongs zhi bar mdzod//khyod ni sman pa khams la mkhas pa ste//yun ring nad po sman pas bor ba yi//sems can rnam thar gsum gyi sbyar sman
14a7(mdo sde): gyis//mya ngan 'das pa'i bde la myur du khong//seng ge'i nga ro thos par ma gyur pas//wa rnams 'jigs pa med par sgra sgrog gis//sangs rgyas seng ge'i sgra ni rab
14b1(mdo sde): sgrogs te//mu stegs can gzhan lnga rnams skrag par mdzod//sa yi dkyil na stobs dang brtson 'grus kyi//stobs ldan phyag na shes rab sgron me bsnams//phyag mthil
14b2(mdo sde): dam pas sa la brde ba mdzod de//'di rnams khyod kyis rab tu pham par mdzod//gang dag khyod la lhung bzed 'brel ba yi//'jig rten skyong ba bzhi pa sdod cing mchis//
14b3(mdo sde): khyod bltam gang dag len par 'gyur ba yi//brgya byin tshangs pa khrag khrig sdod cing mchis//blogs bzung po rigs chen rigs ldan pa//gang la gnas nas byang chub
14b4(mdo sde): sems dpa' yi//spyod pa ston 'gyur dam pa rigs skyes pa//rigs kyi nang na btsun pa'i rigs la gzigs//snod gyur gang du nor bu rin po che//bzhag no dpal
14b5(mdo sde): dang ldan par 'gyur ba bzhin//nor bu rin chen lta bur dri med thugs//dzam+bu'i rgyal mtshan du ni char pa phob//glu dbyangs sgra las rnam pa 'di lta yi//tshigs su
14b6(mdo sde): bcad pa mang po byung gyur nas//'di ni dus lags bting snyoms mi mdzad ces//snying rje'i yid dang ldan la skul bar byeng //yang dag par spro bar bya ba'i le'u sku gnyis
14b7(mdo sde): pa'o///dge slong dag de ltar byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi dus de lta bus yang dag par bskul ba dang /gzhal med khang chen po de nas byung ste/chas
15a1(mdo sde): kyis mthong zhes bya ba'i dang bzang chen po gang du byang chub sems dpa' 'dug cing dga' ldan gyi lha rnams la chos ston pa der byang chub sems dpa'
15a2(mdo sde): zhugs so//zhugs nas kyang song ge'i khri chos bzang po zhes bya ba la 'dug go/de nas lha'i bu gang dge byang chub sems dpa' dang bskal pa mnyam pa theg pa
15a3(mdo sde): mtshungs pa la zhugs pa de dag kyang khang bzang de nyid du zhugs so//gang yang byang chub sems dpa' phyogs bcu nas 'dus pa/byang chub sems dpa' dang spyod pa
15a4(mdo sde): 'dra ba dag dang /lha'i bu de dag kyang lha'i bu mo'i tshogs rnams bsal cing lha'i bu phal rnams kyang bas l-I nas lha'i bsam pa mthun pa'i 'khar can du byas te/'khor bye
15a5(mdo sde): bu phrag drug cu rtsa brgyad brgyad dang /dang bzang der zhugs nas so so ci rigs par rang rang gi seng ge'i khri la 'khod par gyur to//dge slong dag de ltar byang chubo
15a6(mdo sde): sems dpa' lo bcu gnyis na ma'i mngal du 'jug par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba de'i tshe gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha'i bu dag dzam+bu'i gleng du lhags nas/lha'i kho dog mi
15a7(mdo sde): sdang bar byas te/bram ze'i cha byad du bsgyur nas/dram ze rnams rig byed slob tu 'dzud de/gang zhig rnam pa 'di lta bur mngal du zhugs par gyur na/de ni skyes
15b1(mdo sde): bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang ldan par 'gyur te/de dag dang ldan na rnam pa gnyis su 'gyur gyi/gsum du 'gyur ba med de/de gal te khyim nu gnas na ni 'tshar
15b2(mdo sde): los sgyur ba'i rgyal po mtha' bzhir rnam par rgyal ba chos dang ldan pa/chos kyi rgyal po rin po che sna bdun dang ldan par 'gyur te/de'i rin po che sna bdun ni 'di lta ste/'khor
15b3(mdo sde): lo rin po che dang /glang po rin po che dang /rta rin po che dang /bud med rin po che dang /nor bu ri ni po che dang /khyim bdag rin po che dang /blon po rin po che drang bdun no//
15b4(mdo sde): 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po 'khor lo rin po che rnam pa ji lta bu dang ldan par 'gyur zhe na/'di la rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bo nus dbang bskur ba'i gso sbyong gi nyi ma ches bco
15b5(mdo sde): lnga la mgo khrus byas te/dbu zungs su gnas shing steng gi khyams ne bud med kyi tshogs kyis kun nas bskor cing 'dug pa'i tshe/shar phyogs nas lha'i 'khor lo rin
15b6(mdo sde): po che rtsibs stong yod pa/mu khyud dang ldan pa/lte ba dang bcas pa/thams cad gser las grub pa/mgar bse ma byas pa/'phong du shing ta la bdun tsam nas
15b7(mdo sde): 'byung ste/rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur bas/lha'i 'khor lo rin po che de mthong nas 'di snyam du sems te/bdag gis thos pa rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bo
16a1(mdo sde): nus dbang bskur ba gso sbyong gi nyi ma ches bco lnga la mgo khrus byas te/dbu zungs su gnas shing steng gi khyams na bud med kyi tshogs kyis kun nas/
16a2(mdo sde): bskor cing 'dug pa'i tshe/shar phyogs nas lha'i 'khor lo rin po che byung bar gyur na/de ni 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por 'gyur ro zhes thos te/bdag gi drung du lha'i
16a3(mdo sde): 'khor lo rin po che 'ongs pa las na/bdag kyang 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po yin du nges so snyam ste/de nas rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba de bla gos
16a4(mdo sde): phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/lag pa g.yas pas lha'i 'khor lo rin po che de skor zhing 'di skad du btsun pa lci'i 'khor lo rin
16a5(mdo sde): po che chos kyis bskor cig/chos ma yin pas ni ma yin no zhes bya ba'i tshig smras pa dang /de nas lha'i 'khor lo rin po che de rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bo nus dbang
16a6(mdo sde): bskur bas bskor bas rdzu 'phrul gyis nam mkha' las shar phyogs su legs par 'gro ste/rgyal po 'khor los sgyur ba'ang dpung gi tshogos yan lag bzhi pa dang lhan
16a7(mdo sde): cig rjes su 'gro'o//so'i phyogs gang du lha'i 'khor lo rin po che de gnas par 'gyur ba der rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba de'ang dpung gi tshogs yin
16b1(mdo sde): lag bzhi pa dang lhan cig tu gnas par 'gyur ro//de nas shwar phyogs kyi khams kyi rgyal po grang yin pa de dag dngul gyi snod ni gser phyes bkang ste thogs/gsor gyi snod
16b2(mdo sde): ni dngul sril mas bkang ste thogs nas/'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po su zhing 'di skad du lha 'dir legs par gshegs so//lha tshur gshegs su gsol/lha'i tshab
16b3(mdo sde): srid ni shin tu rgyas shing 'byor la bde ste/lo legs shing nyams dgyes la skye bo mang po dang /mis bltam pa lags te/lha nyid kyi yul du byon na/bzhugs su
16b4(mdo sde): gsol/de skad ces smras pa/rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur pos khams kyi rgyal po de dag la 'di skad du khyed rang rang gi rgyal srid dag chos kyis gyis shig
16b5(mdo sde): chos ma yin pas ni ma yin no//khyed srog tshogs ma gsod cig/mi byin par ma len zhig/'dod pa la log par g.yem pa ma byed cig/brdzun du ma smra zhig/phra
16b6(mdo sde): mam zer cig/ngag rtsub po ma smra zhig/tshig khyal pa ma smra zhig/brna ba sems can du ma 'gyur zhig/gnod sems can du ma 'gyur zhig/log par lci bar ma 'gyur
16b7(mdo sde): zhig/srog gcod pa la byams par ma 'gyur zhig/log par lta ba can gyi bar la sems par ma 'gyur zhig/nga'i yul du chos ma yin pa byung nga re/chos ma yin
17a1(mdo sde): par spyod pa la byams par ma byed cig ces bsgo nas/rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur bas de ltar shar phyogs su rnam par rgyal bar byed do///
17a2(mdo sde): shar phyogs su rnam par rgyal bar byas naso/shwar phyogs kyi rgya mtsho la 'gro'o//shar phyogs kyi rgya mtsho la song nas/shar phyogs kyi rgya mtsho los rgal lo//rgal
17a3(mdo sde): nas kyang lho phyogs su nam mkha' los rdzu 'phrul gyis legs par 'gro ste/'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po'ang dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa dang lhan cig tu 'gro'o///
17a4(mdo sde): snga ma bzhin du lho phyogs su rnam par rgyal bar byed do//lho phyogs su ji lta ba de bzhin du nub phyogs dang /byang phyogs su rnam par rgyal bar byed do//byang phyogs
17a5(mdo sde): su rnam par rgyal bar byas nas byang phyogs kyi rgya mtsho la 'gro'o//byang phyogs kyi rgya mtsho la stong nas/byang phyogs kyi rgya mtsho la rgal lo//rgol nas kyang nam
17a6(mdo sde): mkha' las rdzu 'phrul gyis rgyal po'i pho brang du logs par 'ongs nas btsun mo'i 'khor gyi sgo'i steng du nyams pa med par gnas te/rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang
17a7(mdo sde): bskur ba ni 'khor lo rin po che rnam pa de lta bu dang ldan pa yin no//'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po glang po rin po che rnam pa ji lta bu dang ldan pa yin zhe na/'di la rgyal
17b1(mdo sde): po rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur bas glang po rin po che snga ma bzhin du 'byung ste/thams cad thul kar du gyur pa/yan lag bdun shin tu gnas pa/gtsug gser
17b2(mdo sde): gyis brgyan pa/gser gyi rgyal mtshan dang ldan pa/gser gyi rgyan gyis brgyan pa/gser gyi dra bas g.yogs pa/rdzu 'phrul dang ldan pa nam mkha' las 'gro ba/
17b3(mdo sde): rnam par 'phrul pa'i chos can te/'di ltar glang po'i rgyal po byang chub ces bya ba'o//gang gi tshe rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba glang po rin po che de brtag
17b4(mdo sde): par 'dod par gyur pa'i tshe/nyi ma shar kar glang po rin po che de la zhon te sa chen po 'di rgya mtsho'i mtho' sgor dang bcas po/rgya mtsho'i mur thug pa dang bcas pa kun tu
17b5(mdo sde): bskor te/rgyal po'i pho brang du 'ongs nas khye'u sus kyi dga' ba myong bar byed de/'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po glang po rin po che rnam pa de lta bu dang ldan pa yin no//'khor
17b6(mdo sde): los sgyur ba'i rgyal po rta rin po che rnam pa ji lta bu dang ldan pa yin zhe na/'di la rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba'i rta rin po che snga ma bzhin du 'byung ste/thams
17b7(mdo sde): cad sngon por gyur pa/mgo gnag pa/rdog ma lcang lhor 'dug pa/zhon na gus par byed pa/gser gyi rgyal mtshan dang bcas pa/gser gyi rkyen dang ldan pa//
18a1(mdo sde): gser gyi dra bas g.yogs pa/rdzu 'phrul dang ldan pa/nam mkha' las 'gro ba/rnam par 'phrul pa'i chos can te/'di ltar rta'i rgyal po
18a2(mdo sde): sprin gyi shugs can zhes bya ba'o//gang gi tshe rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba/rta rin po che brtag par 'dod par gyur pa de'i tshe nyi ma sha ra ka ro rta rin
18a3(mdo sde): po che de la zhon nas sa chen po 'di rgya mtsho'i mtha' skor dang bcas pa rgya mtsho'i mur thug po dang bcas pa kun tu bskor te/phyir rgyal po'i pho brang du 'khor nas khye'u smras
18a4(mdo sde): kyi bde ba myong bar byed de/'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po ni rta rin po che rnam pa de lta bu dang ldan pa yin no//'khor los sbyor ba'i rgyal po nor bu rin po che rnamo pa ji lta
18a5(mdo sde): bu dang ldan pa yino zhe na/'di la rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba'i nor bu rin po che snga ma bzhin du 'byung ste/thams cad du sngo ba/bai DUr+ya'i rang bzhin/
18a6(mdo sde): zur brgyad du 'dug pa/shin tu sbyongs pa 'byung ste/nor bu rin po che de'i 'od kyis btsun mo'i 'khor thams cad kyang snang bas khyab par 'gyur ro//gang gri tshe rgyal
18a7(mdo sde): pabargya'i rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba nor bu rin po che brtag par 'dod par gyur pa de'i tshe/mtshan mo nam gyi dgung la mun pa mun gnag gi nang du nor bu rin po che
18b1(mdo sde): nga rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo la btags te/skyed mos tshal gyis bzang po blta ba'i phyir song na/nor bu rin po che de'i 'od kyis thams cad dang ldan pa'i dpung gi tshogs yan lag
18b2(mdo sde): bzhi pa thams cad dpag tshad kho ra khor yug tu snang bas gsal bar 'gyur ro//nor bu rin po che'i 'khor na gnas pa'i mi de dag kyang steng ba des gsal bar gyur pa dang /
18b3(mdo sde): gcig gis gcig mthong /gcig gis gcig shes nas gcig la gcig 'di skad smra ste/bzhin bzang drag longs/las kyi mtha' dag byos shig/tshong 'dus
18b4(mdo sde): dag khrom/nyi ma shar te nyin mor shes so zhes zer te/rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba de nor bu rin po che rnam pa de lta bu dang ldan po yin no//rgyal po
18b5(mdo sde): rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba/bud med rin po che rnam pa ji lta bu dang ldan pa yin zhe na/'di la rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba'i bud med rin po che snga ma
18b6(mdo sde): bzhin du 'byung ste/tshul dang mthun pa rgyal rigs su skyes pa ha tsang yang mi ring ba/ha cang yang mi thung ba/ha cang yong mi sbom pa/he cing yang mi skem pa/ha cang yang
18b7(mdo sde): mi dkar ba/ha cing yang mi gnag pa/gzugs mdzes pa/tshul du shis pa/blta na sdug pa/kha dog bzang po rgyas pa mchog dang ldan pa/de'i spu'i khung thams
19a1(mdo sde): cad nas tsAn+dan gyi dri 'byung ba/kha nas ut+pa la'i ngang ldang bya/ka tsa lin+ti'i gos ltar reg na bde ba/de glang ba'i dus na ni lus la reg na dI ba/dro ba'o//
19a2(mdo sde): dus na lus la rag na bsil ba ste/dri 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po ma gtogs par gzhan la yid kyis kyang 'dod chags su mi byed na/lus kyis lta ci smos te/
19a3(mdo sde): 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po ni bud med rin po che rnam pa de lta bu dang ldan pa yin no//'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po khyim bdag rin po che rnam pa ji lta bu dang ldan pa
19a4(mdo sde): yin zhe na/'di la rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba'i khyim bdag rin po che snga ma bzhin du 'byung ste/mkhas pa/gsal ba/yid gzhungs pa/lha'i
19a5(mdo sde): mig dang ldan pa 'byung ngo //de lha'i mig des dpag tshad kho ra khor yug tu bdag po dang bcas pa'i gter dag kyang mthong /bdag po med pa'i gter dag kyang
19a6(mdo sde): mthong ste/de bdag po med pa'i gter gang yin pa de dag gis 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyalnga po'i nor gyi dgos pa byed de/'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po ni khyim
19a7(mdo sde): bdag rin po che rnam pa de lta bu dang ldan pa yin no//'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po blon po rin po che rnam pa ji lta bu dang ldan pa yin zhe na/'di la 'khor los sgyur
19b1(mdo sde): ba'i rgyal po'i blon po rin po che snga ma bzhin du 'byung ste/mkhas shing gsal la yid gzhungs pa'o//de 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po des bsams pa tsam gyis bsko bar bya
19b2(mdo sde): ba'i dpung rnams sko'o//'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po ni blon po rin po che rnam pa de lta bu dang ldan pa yin te/'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po ni rin po che sna bdun de dag dang ldan
19b3(mdo sde): pa yin no//de la bu stong 'byung ste/dpa' ba/rdul phod pa/yan lag mchog gi gzugs dang ldan pa/pha rol gyi sde rab tu 'joms pa sha stag ste/des rgya mtsho la
19b4(mdo sde): thug pa'i sa chen po ma lus pa gnod par sngo ba med cing 'tshe ba med pa 'di nyid chad pa med cing mtshon gyi bda' ba med la chos kyis legs par phab ste gnas so//gal
19b5(mdo sde): te khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung na sangs rgyas su 'gyur te/'dod pa'i 'dod chags spangs pa/'dren pa gzhan gyi drin mi 'jog pa/lha dang mi rnams kyi ston
19b6(mdo sde): par 'gyur ro//zhes rig byed 'din du 'dzud do//de bzhin du lha'i bu gzhan dag kyang dzam+bu'i gling du lhags shing /rang sangs rgyas dag la skul ma 'debs te/'phags pa
19b7(mdo sde): dag de ste lo bcu gnyis na byang chub sems dpa' yum gyi lhums su 'jug gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di 'or cig ces zer ro//dge slong dag de'i tshe rgyal po'i khab kyi grong
20a1(mdo sde): khyer chen po na mjug ma sbyar ba zhes bya ba'i ri la rang sangs rgyas glang po zhes bya ba 'dug pas sgra de thos nas rdo ba'i steng du 'jim pa la bya ba de bzhin du 'dug s+ho/
20a2(mdo sde): nam mkha' la shing ta la bdun srid du gyen du 'phags so//gyen du 'phags nas kyang me'i khams la snyoms par zhugs te sgron ma bzhin du mya ngon las 'das so//de'i
20a3(mdo sde): mkhris pa dang /bad kan dang /chu rgyus dang /rus pa dang /sha dang /khrag tu gyur pa gang yin pa thams cad ni mes yongs su zad par gyur te/ring bsrel 'ba'
20a4(mdo sde): zhig sa la lhags nas/rkang rjes de dag ni da dung yang drang srong gi rjes zhes grag sti yang ngo do//dge slong dag de'i tshe yul ba ra NA si'i ri dwags kyi nags drang srong lhung ba na
20a5(mdo sde): rang sangs rgyas lnga brgya 'khod pa de dag gis kyang sgra de thos nas/nam mkha' la shing ta la bdun srid du gyen du 'phags nas/me'i khams la snyoms par zhugs
20a6(mdo sde): te/sgron mo bzhin du yongs su mya ngan las 'das so//de dag gi mkhris pa dang /dad kan dang /chu rgyus drang /rus pa dang /sha dang /khrag tu gyur pa gang
20a7(mdo sde): yin pa de thams cad ni mes yongs su zad par gyur te/ring bsrel 'be' zhigs la lhags so//de ltar 'dir drang srong rnams lhung ngo zhes de phyin cheng drang srong
20b1(mdo sde): lhung bA zhes bya ba'ang drang srong lhung ba drang srong lhung ba zhes ming du gyur to//mi 'jigs pa byin pa'i ri dgas dag kyang de na gnas pas de phyin chad ri dgas kyi nags zhes bya
20b2(mdo sde): bya'ang ri dgas kyi nags ri dgas kyi nags zhes ming du gyur to//dge slong dag de ltar byang chub sems dpa' dga' ldan gyi gnas dam pa na 'dug pa ni rnam par blta ba tshon
20b3(mdo sde): po bzhi la rnam par lta ste/bzhi gang zhe na/'di lta ste/dus la rnam par lta ba dang /gling la rnam par lta ba dang /yul la rnam pa rA lta ba dang /rigs la rnam par
20b4(mdo sde): lta ba'o//dge slong dag ci'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dus rnam par blta ba la rnam par lta zhe ni/byang chub sems dpa' ni thog ma'i dus sems can 'du ba'i tshe ma'i/
20b5(mdo sde): mngal du mi 'jug gi/gang gi tshe 'jig rten gsal bar kun nas gnas par gyur te/skye ba srung bar gyur/rga ba snang bar gyur/na ba snang bar gyur/'chi ba snang bar
20b6(mdo sde): gyur pa de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' me'i mngal du 'jug gi/dge slong dag ci'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' gling rnam par blta bu la rnam par lta zhe na/byang chub sems
20b7(mdo sde): dpa' ni mtha' 'khob kyi gling du mi skye/shar gyi lus 'phags par ma skye/nub kyi ba long spyod du mi skye/byang gi sgra mi snyan du mi sku'o//lho'i dzam+bu gling nyid du skye'o//dge
21a1(mdo sde): spyod drug ci'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' yul rnam par blta ba la rnam par ldan na/byang chub sems dpa' ni mtha' 'khob kyi yul gang na rma
21a2(mdo sde): rnams dbang po rtul zhing blun la log ltar lkug pa'i rang bzhin can lags par bstan pa dang /nyes por bstan pa'i don shes par bya ba'i skal ba med pa dag
21a3(mdo sde): yod pa dag tu mi skye'i/byang chub sems dpa' ni yul gyi dbus nyid du skye'o//dge slong dag ci'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' rigs rlom par blta ba la rnam par
21a4(mdo sde): lta zhe na/byang chub sems dpa' ni rigs dma' ba gdol pa'i rigs som/smyig ma mkhan gyi rigs sam+be/shing rta mkhan gyi rigs sam/gru yung rigs
21a5(mdo sde): su mi skye'i/bram ze'i rigs sam/rgyal rigs khro na ste/rigs gnyis su skye'o//de la gang gi tshe bram ze'i rigs btsun par bya ba de'i tshe bram ze'i rigs su
21a6(mdo sde): skye'o//gang gi tshe rgyal rigs btsun par bya ba de'i tshe rgyalA rigs su skye ste/dge slong dag da ltar ni rgyal rigs btsun par bya bso/de'i phyir byang chub sems
21a7(mdo sde): donga' rgyal rigs su skye ste/dge slong dag don gyi dbang de la brten nas/byang chub sems dpa' dga' ldan gyi gnas dom pa na gnas po rnam par blta ba
21b1(mdo sde): chen po bzhi lha rnam par lta ste/de ltar bltas nas cang mi zer bar gyur to///'phags pad+ma cher rol pa zhes bya ba theg pa chun po'i nga //bam po gas
21b2(mdo sde): pa//dge slong dag de ltar lha'i bu de drag dang /byang chub sems dpa' de dag gcig la gcig 'di skad du/byang chub sems dpa' rigs rin po che ni ji lta bu zhig tu
21b3(mdo sde): skye bar 'gyur/yum ni ji lta bu zhig gi ldumaso su 'jug par 'gyur zhes 'dri'o//de la la la na re yu lI ma go d+ha na lus 'phags kyi rigs 'di 'byor cing rgyas la lo
21b4(mdo sde): logs pa dang /byed ba dang ldan pa yin te/drin byang chub sems dpa' yum gyi lhums su 'jug pa'i gnas su rung ngo zhes zer ro//la la no ri de ni tshul dang mthun
21b5(mdo sde): ba ma yin te/de ci'i phyir zhe na/'di ltar de ni mi'i rgyud kyis drag pa'ang ma yin/pi'i rgyud kyis dag pa'ang ma yin la/bsod nams chung ngus byung gi/bsod nams
21b6(mdo sde): rgya chen pos mngon par byung ba ma yin zhing rgod la mi brtan te mi gnas pa yin lnga/yul de'ang nye 'khor gse grams gang ba/skyed mos tshil dang /mtsho dang /mtsho'u
21b7(mdo sde): dog kyang ri mang la ri bre ga ra ltar mtha' 'khob kyi gnas su gyur pa ste/de'i phyir de ni tshul dang mthun pa ma yin no zhes zer ro//la la na re ko sa la'i rigs 'di
22a1(mdo sde): 'khor mang zhing bzhon pa mAng la nor che ba ste/de ni byang chub sems dpa' yum gyi lhums su 'jug pa'i gnas su rung ngo zhes zer ro//la la na ro
22a2(mdo sde): de'ang tshul dang mthun pa ma yin te/de ci'i phyir zhe na/'di ltar ka sau li'i rigs ni gdol pa'i rigs las shi 'phos nas skyes pa yin te/pha dang mas dag pa'ang/
22a3(mdo sde): ma yin la/dma' bral mos pa ste/rigs mtho bar yang mi bya/nor dang rin po che'i gter yang tshad med par phun sum tshogs pa ma yin te/de'i phyir de ni
22a4(mdo sde): tshul dang mthun pa ma yin no zhes zer ro//la la na ra rgyal po bde sa'i rigs 'di 'byor cing rgyas la/lo legs pa dang /bde ba dang ldan pa yin tau/de ni
22a5(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' yum gyi lhums su 'jug pa'i gnas su rung ngo zhes zer ro//la lo na re de'ang de'i tshul dang mthun pa ma yin te/de ci'i phyir zhe na/'di
22a6(mdo sde): lhor rgyal po dad sA'i rigs ni pha li pa ste/gtum la gzi brjid 'bar ba'ang ma yin zhing /skyes pa gzhan las skye ba grub pa/pha ma nyid kyi gzi brjid kyi las
22a7(mdo sde): kyis grub pa ma yin la/de'i rgyal po'ang chad par smra ba ste/de'i phyir de'ang tshul dang mthun pa ma yin no zhes zer ro//la la na re grong khyer chen po yangs pa can
22b1(mdo sde): 'di ni 'byor cing rgyas la lho legs pa dang /bde ba dang ldan pa yin te/nyams dga' la skye bo mang po dang mis kun tu gang bya/sngags bu dang /bgam dang /rta dbas
22b2(mdo sde): dang /skor khung dang /bsil khang dang /khang pa brtsegasde pa dang /khang bzang dag gis legs par brgyan pa ste/me tog gi ra ba dang /nags tshal gyi phreng ba me tog
22b3(mdo sde): kun tu rgyas pa dang ldan pa yin la lha'i pho brang dang 'dra ba yin te/de ni byang chub sems dpa' yum gyi lhums su 'jug pa'i gnas su rung ngo zhes zer ro//la la na re
22b4(mdo sde): de'ang tshul dang mthun pa ma yin te/de ci'i phyir zhe na/'di ltar de dag l-i ni phan tshun du rigs par smra ba med do//chos spyod pa med do//gong ma dang bar ma dang rgan pa
22b5(mdo sde): dang /gtso bo dag la'ang rim gror bya ba med cing /ra re zhing yang 'di snyam du bdag ni rgyal po'o//bdag ni rgyal po'o snyam du sems pas slob mar khas len pa med
22b6(mdo sde): cing chos khas len pa med pa ste/de'i phyir de'ang tshul dang mthun pa ma yin no zhes zer ro//la la na re grong khyer 'phags rgyal na rab snang gi rigs 'di ni dpung che
22b7(mdo sde): zhing bzhon pa mang ba/pha rol gyi g.yul ngor rgyal ba 'thob pa yin te/de ni byang chub sems dpa' yum gyi lhums su 'jug pa'i gnas su rung ngo zhes zer ro//
23a1(mdo sde): la la na rI de'ang tshul dang mthun pa ma yin te/de ci'i phyir zhe na/'di ltar de dag ni khro zhing gtum la brlang zhing gzu lums can rgod pa ste/lus
23a2(mdo sde): yod par blta ba'ang ma yin pas/de'i phyir de'ang byang chub sems dpa' yum gyi lhums su 'jug pa'i gnas kyi 'os ma yin no zhes zer ro//la la na re grong
23a3(mdo sde): khyer bcom brlag 'di 'byor cing rgyas la lo legs po dang badre ba dang ldan pa/skye bo mang po dang mis kun tu gang ba yin pas/rgyal po lag bzang sde dpa' ba'i
23a4(mdo sde): ngo dag po'i rgyal po'i phra brang de ni byang chub sems dpa' yum gyi lhums su 'jug po'i gnas su rung ngo zhes zer ro//la la na re de'ong tshul dang mthun pa ma yin te/
23a5(mdo sde): de ci'i phyir zhe na/'di ltar rgyal po de ni log par lta ba'i rigs kyi rgyud du skyes pa ste/mi rgod dang 'dra ba'i rgyal po yin pas byang chub sems dpa' srid pa tha ma pa
23a6(mdo sde): ni log par lta ba'i rigs su skye bar mi rigs te/de'i phyir de'ang tshul dang mthun pa ma yin no zhes zer ro//la la na rI glong khyer he sti na pu ra 'di'i rgyal po ni skye
23a7(mdo sde): bseng gi bu'i rigs kyi rgyud los skyes pa/dpa' zhing rtul phod pa dang ldan pa/yan lag mchog gi gzugs phun sum tsho gso pa gzhan gyi sde 'joms pa ste/
23b1(mdo sde): rigs de ni byang chub sems dpa' de yum gyi lhums su 'jug pa'i gnas kyi 'os yin no zhes zer ro//la lAn ro de'ang tshul dang mthun pa ma yin te/de ci'i phyir zhe na/'od/
23b2(mdo sde): lhur skya ba sing gi bu'i rigs su skyes pa dag gis ni rigs kyi rgyud rnam par 'khrugs par byas te/g.yul ngor brtan pA la ni chos kyi bu zhes zer/'jigs sde la ni rlung
23b3(mdo sde): gi bu zhes zer/srid sgrub la ni dbang po'i bu zhes zer/rigs med dang lhar bcas la ni tha skur gyi bu zhes zer te/de'i phyir rigs de'ang byang chub sems dpa' de lhums
23b4(mdo sde): su 'jug pa'i gnas kyi 'os ma yin no zhes zer ro//la la na re grong khyer bcom brlag 'di ni shin tu'ang nyams dga'o zhing phan tshun 'byor gyi steng du rgyal po bzing
23b5(mdo sde): po'i bshes gnyen bzhugs pa'i sa'ang yin la/rgyal po de'ang glang po dang /rta dang /shing rta dang /dpung bu chung dang /dpung gi tshogs myong po dang ldan pa/gser
23b6(mdo sde): dang /dngul dang /nor bu dang /mu tig dang /b+he DUr+ya dang /dung dang /man shel dang /byu ru dang /sel sbram dring /nor dang /yo byad shin+da tu mdu bre/rgyal po dang
23b7(mdo sde): blon po thams cad kyis zil gyis mi non pa'i stobs dang /pha rol gnon pa dang ldan pa/mdza' ba dang ldan zhing chos la dga' ba ste/rigs de ni byang chub sems
24a1(mdo sde): dpa' de yum gyi lhums su 'jug pa'i grwanAs sma rud zhes zla ro//la la nA ra de 'ang rdu l+yA dang mthun pam+b+ha yin te/ ci'i byin+da wAn+ta/rgyal du
24a2(mdo sde): bzang po'i bshes gnyen yon tra ni de lta bu dang ldan pa de yod mod kyi/dri ni shin tu rgas pas bu skyed pa'i mthu'ang med la/bu'ang mang bsngo de'i phyir rigs de'ang
24a3(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' de yum gyi lhums su 'jug pa'i granas kyi 'os ma yin no zhesra zer ro//de lhor byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang lha de dag gis dzam+bu'i gling
24a4(mdo sde): gi yul chen po bcu drug pa thams cad na/rgyal po'i rigs mthon po mthon pa'i rigs gang ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad la bltas na thams cad kying
24a5(mdo sde): nyes pa dang bcas par mthong ste/de dag de ltar sems pa'i yid la byed pa'i tshe/lha'i bu ye shes tog gi rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba byang chub las phyir mi ldog pa
24a6(mdo sde): theg pa chen po 'di la nges par gyur pa zhig yod pa des byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor dang /lha'i 'khor chen po yod pa de dag lnga 'di skad ces smos so//grogs
24a7(mdo sde): po dag tshur shog/byang chub sems dpa' de nyid kyi drung du dong ste/rigs rin po che yon tan ji lta bur phun sum tshogs pa zhig tu srid pa tha ma pa'i byang chub
24b1(mdo sde): sems dpa' skye bar 'gyur ba dri'o zhes smras pa dang /legs so zhes te/de dag thams cad kyang thal mo sbar nas byang chub sems dpa'i drung du phyin te dris pa/skyes bu
24b2(mdo sde): dam pa rigs rin po che yon tan+da phun sum tshogs pa ji lta bu zhig tu byang chub sems dpa' srid pa tha ma pa skye bar 'gyur/de nas byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems
24b3(mdo sde): dpa'i tshogs chen po dang /lha'i tshogs chen po de dag la rnam pa rA baultas te 'di skad ces smras so//grogos po dag byang chub semos dpa' srid pa tha ma pa gang du skye bar
24b4(mdo sde): 'gyur ba'i rigs de ni rnam pa drug cu rtsa bzhi phun sum tshogs pa yin te/drug cu rtsa bzhi gang zhe na/'di lta ste/rigs de ni btsun pa yin/rigs de ni kun gyis mngon
24b5(mdo sde): bar shes pa yin/rigs de ni phran tshegs med cing gnod par byed pa med pa yin/rigs de ni rgyud phun sum tshogs pa yin/rigs de ni cho 'brang phun sum tshogs
24b6(mdo sde): pa yin/rigs de ni skyes bu zung phun sum tshogs pa yin/rigs de ni sngon gyi skyes bu zung phun sum tshogs pa yin/rigs de ni btsun pa'i skyes bu zung phun sum
24b7(mdo sde): tshogs pa yin/rigs da ni kun gyis mngon par shes pa'i skyes bu zung phun sum tshogs pa yin/rigs de ni dbang che bar grags pa'i skyes bu zung phun sum tshogs
25a1(mdo sde): pa yin/rigs de ni skyes pa mang ba yin/rigs de ni bud med mang ba yin/rigs dri ni 'jigs pa med pa yin/rigs dri ni dman pa med cing zhum
25a2(mdo sde): pa med pa yin/rigs de ni brkam po med pa yin/rigs de ni tshul khrims dang ldan pa yin/rigs de ni shes rab dang ldan pa yin/rigs de ni blon pos blta
25a3(mdo sde): zhing longs spyod la spyod pa yin/rigs de ni bzo don yod pas bshams shing longs spyod la spyod pa yin/rigs de ni mdza' ba brtan pa yin/rigs de ni dud
25a4(mdo sde): 'gro'i skye gnas su skyes pa'i srog chags kyi srog la lta ba yin/rigs de ni byas pa gzo ba dang ldan pa yin/rigs de ni brtul zhugs shes pa yin/rigs
25a5(mdo sde): de ni 'don pas mi 'gro ba yin/rigs de ni zhe sdang gis mi 'gro ba yin/rigs de ni gti mug gis mi 'gro ba yin/rigs de ni 'jigs pas mi 'gro ba yin/rigs
25a6(mdo sde): de ni kha na ma tho bas 'jigs pa yin/rigs de ni gti mug la mi gnas pa yin/rigs de ni lag sbubs che ba yin/rigs de ni bya ba la mos pa yin/rigs de ni/
25a7(mdo sde): gtod pa la mos pa yin/rigs de ni sbyin pa la mos pa yin/rigs de ni zho sha shes pa yin/rigs de ni rtsal brtan pa yin/rigs de ni mthu rtsal dang ldan
25b1(mdo sde): pa yin/rigs de ni rdul mchog dang ldan pa yin/rigs de ni drang srong mchod pa yin/rigs de ni lha mchod pa yin/rigs de ni mchod rten mchod pa yin/rigs de ni//
25b2(mdo sde): mtshan rjed pa yin/rigs de ni 'don du 'dzin pa med pa yin/rigs de ni phyogs bcur sgra grags pa yin/rigs de ni 'khor chen po dang ldan pa yin/rigs de ni 'khor
25b3(mdo sde): mi phyed pa dang ldan pa yin/rigs de ni bla na med pa'i 'khor dang ldan pa yin/rigs de ni rigs kyi nang na gtso bor bya ba yin/rigs de ni rigs la dbang thob pa yin//
25b4(mdo sde): rigs de ni dbang che bar grags pa yin/rigs de ni phar 'dzin pa yin/rigs de ni mar 'dzin pa yin/rigs de ni dge sbyong du 'dzin pa yin/rigs de ni bram zer 'dzin
25b5(mdo sde): pa yin/rigs de ni nor dang 'bru'i bang mdzod mang ba yin/rigs de ni dbyig dang /gser dang /nor bu dang /mu tig dang /bai DUr+ya dang /dung dang /ma nA shel dang /byA
25b6(mdo sde): ru dang /sa le sbram dang /dngul dang /rdzas dang /yo byad mang ba yin/rigs de ni glang po che dang /rta dang /rnga mo dang /bA lang dang /lug shin tu mang ba yin/rigs de
25b7(mdo sde): ni dran po dang /bran mo dang /las byed pa dang /zho shas 'tsho ba shin tu mang ba yin/rigs de ni thub par dka' ba yin/rigs de ni don thams cad grub pa yin//
26a1(mdo sde): rigs de ni 'khor los sgyur ba'i rigs kyi rgyud du skyes pa yin/rigs de ni sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba'i grogs kyis bskyed pa yin/rigs de ni byang chub sems dpa'i
26a2(mdo sde): rigs su rigs btsun par skyes pa yin/rigs de ni 'jig rten lha dang bcas pa/bdud dang bcas pa/tshangs pa dang bcas pa/dge sbyong dang bram ze'i skye dgu dang bcas
26a3(mdo sde): pa'i nang na rigs las smos po'i skyon gyis kha na ma tho ba thams cad drang bral ba ste/grogs po dag gang du byang chub sems dpa' srid pa tha ma pa 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i rigs de ni
26a4(mdo sde): rnam pa drug cu rtsa bzhi po de dag dang ljon pa yin no//grogs po dag srid pa tha ma pa'i byang chub sems dpa' bud med gang gi mngal du 'jug par 'gyur ba'i bud med de ni yon tan
26a5(mdo sde): gyi rnam pa sum cu rtsa gnyis dang ldan pa yin te/sum cu rtsa gnyis gang zhe na/'di lta ste/byang chub sems dpa' srid pa tha ma pa ni kun gyis mngon par shes pa'i bud med kyi
26a6(mdo sde): mngal du 'jug go//kun gyis mngon par rig pa dang /spyod pa la glags mi thod pa dang /rigs phun sum tshogs pa dang /cho 'brang phun sum tshogs pa dang /gzugs phun sum
26a7(mdo sde): tshogs pa dang /ming phun sum tshogs pa dang /chu zhang phun sum tshogs pa dang /sngan chad ma bces pa dang /tshul khrims phun sum tshogs pa dang /gtod pa phun sum tshogs
26b1(mdo sde): pa dang /bzhin 'dzum pa dang /mthun par 'dzin pa dang /gsal ba dang /dul ba dang /'jigs pa med pa dang /mang du thos pa dang /mkhas pa dang /sgyu med pa dang /g.yo med pa dang /
26b2(mdo sde): mi khro ba dang /phrag dog med pa dang /ser sna med pa dang /mi rgod pa dang /mi g.yeng ba dang /ca co med pa dang /bzod cing nges pa dang ldan pa dang /ngo tsha shes shing khrel yod pa dang /'dod
26b3(mdo sde): chags dang /zhe sdang dang /gti mug gi shes chung ba dang /bud med kyi skyon dang bral ba dang /khyim thab kyi brtul zhugs dang ldan pa dang /yon tan thams cad phun sum tshogs pa'i
26b4(mdo sde): bud med kyi mngal du byang chub sems dpa' srid pa tha ma pa 'jug go//grogs po dag byang chub sems dpa' srid pa tha ma pa bud med gang gi mngal du 'jug pa'i bud med de ni yon tan gyi
26b5(mdo sde): rnam pa sum cu rtsa gnyis po de dag dang ldan pa yin no//grogs po dag byang chub sems dpa' ni zla ba mar gyi ngo la ma'i mngal du mi 'jug gi/byang chub sems dpa' srid pa tha ma pa ni
26b6(mdo sde): zla ba yar gyi ches bco lnga'i zla ba nya ste rgyas pa la skar ma rgyal dang ldan pa'i tshe/ma gso sbyong blangs pa'i mngal du 'jug go/de nas byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang /lha'i bu de dag gis
26b7(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' las rigs yongs su dag pa dang /ma yongs su dag pa'i rnam pa de lta bu de dag thos nas 'di snyam du semos te/skyes bu dam pa 'di rnam pa ji snyed du bstan pa
27a1(mdo sde): de lta bu'i yon tan dang ldan pa'i rigs de gang zhig la yod snyam du sems so//de ltar sems shing yid la byed pa la zhugs pa na de dag 'di snyam ste/shAkya'i grong
27a2(mdo sde): khyer 'di 'byor cing rgyas la bde zhing lo legs pa dang ldan te/nyams dga' zhing skye bo mang po dang mis gang ba yin la/rgyal po za sA gtsang ma'ang mi'i rgyud kyis dag pa/pha'i rgyud kyis
27a3(mdo sde): dag pa/chung ma dag pa dang ldan pa/las kyi mtha' la nyon mongs pa med pa/dpe byad bzang ba/shin tu 'dzangs pa/bsod nams kyi gzi brjid dang ldan pa/grags pa chen po'i rigs
27a4(mdo sde): su skyes pa/'khor los sgyur ba'i rigs kyi rgyud du skyes pa/nor dang /gter dang /rin po che dpag tu med pa dang ldan pa/las yod par lta ba/sdig pa'i lta ba med pa/shAkya'i yul
27a5(mdo sde): kun na'ang rgyal po de gcig pur zad de/tshong dpon dang /khyim bdag dang /blon po dang /'khor gyi mi thams cad kyis rim gror bya zhing mchod pa/mdzes pa/blta na sdug pa//
27a6(mdo sde): ha cang yang mi rgan ha cang yang mi gzhon zhing gzugs mdze sde la yon tan thams cad dang ldan pa/bzo shes pa/dus shes pa/bdag shes pa/cho ga shes pa/sems
27a7(mdo sde): shes pa/'jig rten shes pa/mtshan shes pa/chos kyi rgyal po chos kyis rjes su ston pa'o//ser skya'i gnas kyi grong khyer chen po de ni sems can dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa
27b1(mdo sde): rnams kyi gnas te/gang dag der skyes par gyur pa de dag kyang de dang skal ba 'dra ba dag go//rgyal po zas gtsang ma de la lha mo sgyu 'phrul zhes bya ba shAkya'i bdag po shin tu legs par rtogs
27b2(mdo sde): pa zhes bya ba'i bu mo zhig yod pa'ang phyogs cung gzhon zhing dar la bab pa'i gzugs phun sum tshogs pa sngan chad ma btsas pa/bu dang bu mo med pa/gzugs mdzes pa/bu don la bris pa
27b3(mdo sde): ltar blta na sdug pa/lha'i bu mo ltar rkyen thams cad kyis brgyan pa/bud med kyi skyon rnams dang bral ba/bden par smra ba/mi drag pa/mi brlang ba/mi gcor ba/kha na ma tho ba med pa/gyo
27b4(mdo sde): mo'i sgra lta bu med pa/ca co med pa/'jam zhing snyan la yid du 'ong bar smra ba/mi nges pa dang /khong khro ba dang /nga rgyal dang /dregs pa dang /rgyags pa dang /khro ba med pa/phrag dog med
27b5(mdo sde): pa/dus su smra ba/gtong ba phun sum tshogs pa/tshul khrims dang ldan pa/khyos chog par 'dzin pa/khyim thab kyi brtul zhugs can/skyes pa gzhan la bsam pa'i yid la bya ba dang bral
27b6(mdo sde): ba mgo dang /rna ba dang /sna gnas su phebs pa/bung po'i mchog gi kha dog lta bu'i skra dang ldan pa/dpral po legs pa/smin tshugs legs pa/khro gnyer med pa/bzhin 'dzum pa/gsong por
27b7(mdo sde): smra ba/'jam zhing snyan pa'i tshig dang ldan pa/mthun par 'dzin pa/drang ba/gya gyu med pa/sgyu med pa/g.yo med pa/khral yod cing ngo tsha shes pa/mi rgod pa/mi g.yeng ba/kha
28a1(mdo sde): ngan mi smra ba/'chal ba'i tshig med pa/'dod chags dang /zhe sdang dang /gti mug gri shas chung ba/ngang des shing bzod pa dang ldan pa/rkang lag dang /mig dang /blo shin
28a2(mdo sde): tu bsrungs pa/rkang lag shin tu 'jam pa/ka tsa len+d+ra'i gos ltar reg na bde ba/pad+ma gzhon nu'i 'dab ma ltar mig shin tu rnam par dag pa/sna dbyibs legs shing mdog sdug
28a3(mdo sde): pa/yan lag shin tu brtan pa/'ja'i dbyibs ltar shin tu 'dud pa/yan lag dang /nying lag shin tu 'byes pa/yan lag la slad du med pa/mchu bim pa ltar dmar ba/bany+tsar
28a4(mdo sde): mdzes pa/mgul rim bzhin du 'dug pa/rgyan dam pa dang ldan pa/sna ma'i me tog dang b.rI ka ltar so shin tu rnam par dag pa/phrag pa legs par byin gyis 'tsham pa/rim gyis
28a5(mdo sde): legs par grub pa'i dpung pa dang ldan pa/rked pa gzhu'i 'chang bzung ltar phra ba/gzhog nyams pa med pa/lte ba khung zab pa/sta zur 'jam zhing yangs la zlum zhing brtan
28a6(mdo sde): par grub pa/rdo rje ltar mkhrags shing mtshungs pa med pa'i lus dang ldan pa/glang po'i sna ltar mnyam zhing legs pa'i brla dang ldan pa/byin pa ri dgas e nA ya'i lta bu/lag
28a7(mdo sde): pa dang rkang pa'i mthil rgya skyegs kyi khu ba ltar 'dug pa/'gro ba'i mig tu sdug pa/mig gi dbang po nyams pa med pa/yid du 'ong zhing blta ni sdug pa/bud med rin po che'i gzugs
28b1(mdo sde): las kyang khyad par du 'phags pa mtshungs pa med pa/sgyu 'phrul sprul pa lta bu'i gzugs su 'dug pa/sgyu 'phrul zhes ming gi brdar btags pa/sgyu rtsal la mkhas pa/dga' tshal gyi
28b2(mdo sde): lha'i bu mo lto bu zhig rgyal po zas gtsang ma'i btsun mo'i 'khor gyi nang na 'dug pa de ni byang chub sems dpa'i yum du tshul dang mthun gyis gang byang chub sems dpas rigs dag pa bstan pa de ni
28b3(mdo sde): shAkya'i rigs nyid la snang gi gzhan la ni ma yin no//de la 'di skad ces bya ste//dag pa'i sems can chos mtho khang bzang na//chos bzang seng ge'i khri la rab tu 'dug/byang chub sems
28b4(mdo sde): dpe' grags chen ldan pa dang //skal ba mnyam pa'i lha rnams drang srong 'khor//dra na 'dug cing de ni 'di snyam sems//rigs gang rnam dag rab tu shes dang ldan//byang chub sems
28b5(mdo sde): dpa' skye dang tshul mthun gang //pha ma gang zhig dag pa'i dngos dang ldan//dzam+bu'i gling 'di kun tu rnam bltas ni//rgyal rigs rgyal rgyud che ba gang yin pa//kun kyang skyon dong bcas
28b6(mdo sde): par rjes bsams nas//shAkya'i rigs ni skyon dang bral bar mthong //zas gtsang rgyal po'i rigs nang rigs dang ldan//mi dbang rgyud na rnam dag tshe rigs can//'byor cing
28b7(mdo sde): rgyas la 'jug pa med pa ste//skye bo dam pa chos ldan rim gro can//ser skyar brjod pa'i grong khyer sems can gzhan//kun kyang bsam pa rab dag chos dang ldan//skyed mos kun
29a1(mdo sde): dga' gzhal med khang gis brgyan//skye ba'i sar ni ser skyar brjod pa mdzes//kun kyang chan chen stobs dang ldan pa ste//glang po gnyis sam gsum gyi stobs kyang bdog/'phong rtsal bslab
29a2(mdo sde): pa'i pha rol mthar phyin kyang //srog gi don du gzhan la gnod mi byed//zas gtsang rgyal po'i bud med dben pa ste//bud med dam pa stong gi mchog tu phyin//yid du 'ong ba sgyu 'phrul sprul pa'i
29a3(mdo sde): bzhin 'dzum khro gnyer rab tu spangs//ngo tsha khrel yod chos spyod ldan bre ste//de rgyal med cing mkhengs rgod pa med//breg dog med cing sgra dang g.yo med de//gtong la
29a4(mdo sde): dag 'a zhing rtag tu byams sems ldan//las yod blta zhing log pa'i sbyor ba spangs//bden la gnas shing lus dang yid rab bsdams//sa l-i gang yod bud med smon mang tshogs/
29a5(mdo sde): de dag thams cad de la yod ma yin//mi yi 'jig rten dri za'i 'jig rten nam//lha yi 'jig rten dag na bud med gzhan/lha mo sgyu 'phrul mtshungs med ga la lhag
29b1(mdo sde): drang srong chen po'i mur ni de 'os te//tshe rab lnga brgya kho nar tshang bar yang //de ni byang chub sems dpa'i mar gyur to//de dang der ni yab kyang zas gtsang ste//de phyir yon tan ldan lam yi 'os
29b2(mdo sde): dka' thub can ltar de ni brtul zhugs gnas//brtul zhugs rjes spyod rtag par chos kyang spyod//rgyal pos gnang ste mchog sbyin thob pas na//'dod pa ma spyad zla ba sum cu gnyis//glang gi
29b3(mdo sde): phyogs na de 'dug 'grang ba'am//nyal zhing 'gro bar gyur pa'i gnos dag kyang //de yi los dge gzhol ba'i 'od zer gyis//shin tu snang bar 'od kyis gsal bar gyur//lha drang lha min mi/
29b4(mdo sde): rnams gang yang rung //'dod chags sems kyis blta bar nus pa med//spyod lam rnams su 'phags pa'i yon tan ldan//de la kun kyang ma dang bu mor lta//sgyu 'phrul lha mo'i dge ba'i
29b5(mdo sde): las kyi rgyus//rgyal po'i srid ni rab yangs rnam par 'phel//khams kyi rgyal po'ang 'jug par mi byed cing //rgyal po'i grags dang brjod pa rnam par 'phel//de ltar sgyu 'phrul snod
29b6(mdo sde): du mthun gyur cing //de ltar sems can dam pa mchog mdzes pas//de gnyis yon tan mchog dang ldan pas na//'di ni bur 'gyur de ni ma yi 'os//lha mo yon tan mchog dang ldan
29b7(mdo sde): pa ste//glang po khri yi stobs bdog ma gtogs par//dzam+bu'i rgyal mtshan 'don mi mchog de//'dzin par nus pa'i bud med gang yang med//de skad che ba'i lha yi bu rnams dang //
30a1(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' shes rab tu rkyen dag/shAH'i rigs rnasas dga' bar mdzad pa yi//yum du legs ldan sgra 'phrul 'gyur zhes zed//rigs yongs su dag
30a2(mdo sde): pa'i le'u ste gsum pa'o//dge slong dag de ltar byang chub sems dpas skye ba'i rigs la rnam par bltas nas/dga' ljin gyi gnas kyi gzhal med khang chen po chu dang
30a3(mdo sde): rgyar dpag tshad drug cu rgya bzhi yod pa gang du byang chub sems dpa' 'jug ste/dga' ldan gyi lha rnams la chos ston pa rgyal mtshan mthun pa zhes bya ba yod de/byang chub sems dpal
30a4(mdo sde): dgag med 'ang chen po der song nas byin pa dang /dga' ldan gyings kyi nI'i burnams cad 'i smras pa/khyed rnaMms 'dir 'dra bar gyis shig/shrI 'dra ba'i rnam par byung ba zhes
30a5(mdo sde): bya bya'i chos rjes su dran pa rjes su bstan pa tha mtsha chos mnyan po byang chub sems da shA la nyin cig//de skad kyi tshig thosta nas// ldan gyi rnyis kyi lha'i bu thams cad
30a6(mdo sde): bu ma tshogs dang tsi te/gzhis med khung chen po dang 'dus so//da nga byang chub sems dpas 'khor gyi khyams gling bzhi pa chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi tshad tsam du
30a7(mdo sde): par byin gyis brlabs par gyur nas/de de tsam du bzang zhing de tsam du bston sdug la/de tsam du rgyan gyis rgyas shing de tsam du yid du 'ong bar gyur pa des 'dod pa na spyod pa
30b1(mdo sde): dang /gzugs na spyod pa'i lha'i bu thams cad rang rung gi khyim gyi bkod pa la dur khrod lta bu'i 'du shes skyes par gyur to//de la byang chub sems dang 'a rang gi bsod nams kyi rnam par smin
30b2(mdo sde): pa'i rgyu mthun pa'i yongs su brgyan pa'i seng ge'i khri nor bu rin po che du mas rtsa ba smras pa/lha'i ras bac+doMs bu'i stan du ma bting po/lha'i spos zhim po du mas bsgos pa/bdug spos dam pa
30b3(mdo sde): mchog tu bya ba du mas bdugs pa/lha'i me tog kha dog du ma'i bgram pa bkram pa/nor bu rin po che'i 'od brgya stong du ma 'bar ba'i gzi brjid can/nor bu rin po che du ma'i dra bas g.yogs
30b4(mdo sde): pa/rin po che'i dril bu g.yar ka'i dra ba du ma sgra 'byung bas mngon par dga' ba dang ldan pa/rin po che'i dril bu brgya stong du ma mngon par dkrol ba'i sgra dang ldan pa/rin po che'i dra ba brgya
30b5(mdo sde): stong du mas yongs su gsal bar gyur pa rin po che'i gdugs brgya stong du mas kun nas bkab pa/dar brgya stong du mas rab tu dpyangs pa/dar gyi phreng ba lnga ldi brgya stong du mas shin tu
30b6(mdo sde): brgyan pa/lha'i bu mo brgya stong du mas glu blangs/gar byas/rol mo byas pa/yon tan brgya stong du ma kun tu brjod pa/'jig rten skyong ba brgya stong du mes rjes su bsrungs pa/
30b7(mdo sde): brgya byin brgya stong du mas phyag byas pa/tshangs pa brgya stong du mas rab tu btud pa/byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du mos yongs su bzung ba/phyogs bcu'i sangs
31a1(mdo sde): rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma mtha' yas pas dgongs pa/bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong dpag tu med par pha rol tu phyin pa tshogs su byas pa'i bsod nams kyi
31a2(mdo sde): rnam par smin pa'i rgyu mthun pa las byung ba de lta bu la 'dug go//dge slong dag de ltar byang chub sems dpa' seng ge'i khri chen po yon tan de lta bu dang ldan pa la 'dug nas lha'i 'khor chen
31a3(mdo sde): po de dag la smras pa/grogs po dag byang chub sems dpa'i lus bsod nams brgya'i mtshan gyis legs par brgyan pa la ltos/shar dang /lho dang /nub dang /byang dang /'og
31a4(mdo sde): dang /steng dang /phyogs bcu kun na byang chub sems dpa' dga' ldan gyi gnas dam pa na 'khod cing thams cad kyang srid pa tha ma la mngon du phyogs pa/lha'i tshogs kyis yongs su
31a5(mdo sde): bskor ba 'chi 'pho'i rnam pas lha rnams dga' bar byed pa'i chos snang ba'i sgo yang dag par ston pa/tshad med grangs med bgrang ba las 'das pa dag la ltos/de nas lha'i 'khor de
31a6(mdo sde): thams cad kyis byang chub sems dpa'i byin gyis brlabs kyis byang chub sems dpa' de dag mthong bar gyur te/mthong bar gyur nas kyang byang chub sems dpa' ga la ba de logs
31a7(mdo sde): su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/yan lag ltos phyag 'tshal nas 'od skad du 'di ltar bdag cag gis bltas pa tsam gyis byang chub sems dpa'o 'di skad cig mthong ba ni byang chub sems
31b1(mdo sde): dpa'i byin gyi brlabs bsam gyis mi khyab ste/logs so zhes chod du brjod pa ched du brjod do//de nas byang chub sems dpas yang lha'i 'khor chen po de dag la bos nas 'di skad ces
31b2(mdo sde): smras te/grogs po dag de bas na byang chub sems dpa' de dag lha'i bu de dge la gang ston pa 'chi 'pho'i rnam pas lha rnams dga' bar byed pa'i chos snang ba'i sgo nyon cig/grogs po dag
31b3(mdo sde): chos snang ba'i sgo brgya rtsa brgyad po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpas 'chi 'pho'i dus la bab pa'i tshe/lha'i 'khor la gdon mi za bar yang dag par bstan par bya ba ste/brgya rtsa brgyad gang zhe na/
31b4(mdo sde): 'di lta ste/grogs po dgra dad pa ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste bsam pa mi phyed par 'gyur ro//dang ba ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste sems rnyog pa can dang bar 'gyur ro//mchog tu dga' ba ni chos
31b5(mdo sde): snang ba'i sgo ste/lus shin tu sbyangs par 'gyur ro//dga' ba ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/sems rnam par drag par 'gyur ro//lus kyi sdom pa ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/lus kyi nyes pa
31b6(mdo sde): rnam pa gsum yongs su dag par 'gyur ro//ngag gi sdom pa ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/ngag gi nyes pa bzhi yongs su spong bar 'gyur ro//yid kyi sdom pa ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/yid
31b7(mdo sde): kyi brnab sems dang /gnod sems dang /log par lta ba spong bar 'gyur ro//sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/sangs rgyas mthong ba rnam par dag par 'gyur
32a1(mdo sde): ro//chos rjes su dran pa ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/chos bstan pa rnam par dag par 'gyur ro//dge 'dun rjes su dran pa ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/skyon med par 'jug
32a2(mdo sde): par 'gyur ro//gtong ba rjes su dran pa ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/rdzas thams cad rab tu sbyong bar 'gyur ro//tshul khrims rjes su dran pa ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/smon lam yongs
32a3(mdo sde): su rdzogs par 'gyur ro//lha rjes su dran pa ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/sems rgya chen por 'gyur ro//byams pa ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/rdzas las byung ba'i bsod nams bya ba'i
32a4(mdo sde): dngos po thams cad zil gyis gnon par 'gyur ro//snying rje ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/rnam par 'tshe ba med pa lhur len par 'gyur ro//dga' ba ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/mi dga' ba
32a5(mdo sde): thams cad sel bar 'gyur ro//btang snyoms ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/'dod pa la smod par 'gyur ro//mi rtag par so sor rtog pa ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/'dod pa dang /
32a6(mdo sde): gzugs yod pa dang /gzugs med pa'i 'dod chags las yang dag par 'da' bar 'gyur ro//sdug bsngal du so sor rtog pa ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/smon lam kun tu chad
32a7(mdo sde): bar 'gyur ro//bdag med par so sor rtog pa ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/bdag la mngon par zhen pa med par 'gyur ro//zhi bar so sor rtog pa ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/rjes su
32b1(mdo sde): chags pa 'bar ba med par 'gyur ro//ngo tsha shes pa ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/nang nye bar zhi bar 'gyur ro//khrel yod pa ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/phyi rol nye bar zhi bar 'gyur ro//bden
32b2(mdo sde): pa ni chos snang ba'i sgra ste/lha dang mi rnams la mi smra bar 'gyur ro//yang dag pa ni chos snang ba'i sgra ste/bdag la sru ba med par 'gyur ro//chos spyod pa ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/rgyas
32b3(mdo sde): rton par 'gyur ro//gsum la skyabs su 'gro ba ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/ngan song gsum las yang dag par 'da' bar 'gyur ro//byas pa gzo ba ni rdos snang ba'i sgo ste/dge ba'i rtsa ba byas
32b4(mdo sde): pa rnams chud mi za bar 'gyur ro//byas pa rig pa ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/gzhan la brnyas pa med par 'gyur ro//bdag shes pa ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/bdag la bstod pa med par 'gyur
32b5(mdo sde): ro//sems can shes pa ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/gzhan la smod pa med par 'gyur ro//chos shes pa ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/chos kyi rjes su mthun pa'i chos la nan tan byed par
32b6(mdo sde): 'gyur ro//dus shes pa ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/mthong ba don yod par 'gyur ro//nga rgyal bcom pa ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/ye shes yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro//zhi 'grus pa
32b7(mdo sde): med pa'i sems ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/bdag dang gzhan rjes su srung bar 'gyur ro//'khon du mi 'dzin pa ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/'gyod pa med par 'gyur ro//mos pa ni chos
33a1(mdo sde): snang ba'i sgo ste/the tshom med par lhur len par 'gyur ro//mi sdug par so sor rtog pa ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/'dod pa la rnam par rtog pa spong bar 'gyur ro//gnod
33a2(mdo sde): sems med pa ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/gnod sems kyi rnam par rtog pa spyong bar 'gyur ro//gti mug med pa ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/mi shes pa rnam par sel bar 'gyur ro//chos dran
33a3(mdo sde): du gnyer ba ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/don la rton par 'gyur ro//chos 'dod pa ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/chos snang ba thob par 'gyur ro//thos pa tshol ba ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/tshul bzhin
33a4(mdo sde): du chos la so sor rtog par 'gyur ro//yang dag pa'i sbyor ba ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/yang dag par nan tan byed par 'gyur ro//ming dang gzugs yongs su shes pa ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/
33a5(mdo sde): chags pa thams cad las yang dag par 'da' bar 'gyur ro//rgyur lci ba yang dag par 'joms pa ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/rig pa dang rnam par grol ba thob par 'gyur ro//rjes su chags
33a6(mdo sde): pa dang khong khro ba spong ba ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/mtho bar sems pa med cing dma' bar sems pa med par 'gyur ro//phung po la mkhas pa ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/sdug bsngal yongs su
33a7(mdo sde): shes par 'gyur ro//khams mnyam pa nyid ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/kun 'byung ba spong bar 'gyur ro//skye mched bsal ba ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/lam sgom par 'gyur ro//mi skye ba'i
33b1(mdo sde): bzod pa ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/'gog pa mngon du byed par 'gyur ro//lus la spong ba'i dran pa ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/lus dben par 'gyur ro//tshor ba la song ba'i dran pa ni chos snang
33b2(mdo sde): ba'i sgo ste/tshor ba thams cad rgyun chad par 'gyur ro//sems la spong ba'i dran pa ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/sems la sgyu ma lta bur so sor rtog par 'gyur ro//chos la song ba'i dran pa ni chos snang
33b3(mdo sde): ba'i sgras/rab rib dang dral ba'i ye shrIs su 'gyur ro//rang dag pa'i spong ba bzhin chos snang ba'i na ste/mi dge ba'i chos thams cad spyod pa dang dge ba'i chos thams cad yongs su rdzogs
33b4(mdo sde): par 'gyur ro//rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/lus dang sems yang bar 'gyur ro//dad pa'i dbang po ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog par 'gyur ro//brtson
33b5(mdo sde): 'grus kyi dbang po ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/shin tu rtogs pa'i ye shes dang ldan par 'gyur ro//dran pa'i dbang po ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/las legs par byas par 'gyur ro//ting nge 'dzin
