33b6(mdo sde): gyi dbang po ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/sems rnam par grol bar 'gyur ro//shes rab kyi dbang po ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/mngon sum gyi ye shes su 'gyur ro//dad pa'i stobs ni chos snang ba'i
33b7(mdo sde): sgo ste/bdud kyi stobs las yang dag par 'da' bar 'gyur ro//brtson 'grus kyi stobs ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ro//dran pa'i stongs ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/mi
34a1(mdo sde): 'phrogs par 'gyur ro//ting nge 'dzin gyi stobs ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/rnam par rtog pa thams cad spong bar 'gyur ro//shes rab kyi stobs ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/mi
34a2(mdo sde): thul bar 'gyur ro//dran pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/chos ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes par 'gyur ro//chos rnam par 'byed pa yang dag byang chub kyi
34a3(mdo sde): yan lag ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/chos thams cad yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro//brtson 'grus yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/shin tu rtogs pa'i blo
34a4(mdo sde): dang ldan par 'gyur ro//dga' ba yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/ting nge 'dzin sgrub par 'gyur ro//shin tu sbyangs pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag ni chos
34a5(mdo sde): snang ba'i sgo ste/bya ba byas par 'gyur ro//ting nge 'dzin yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid du khong du chud par 'gyur ro//btang
34a6(mdo sde): snyoms yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/skye ba thams cad la smod par 'gyur ro//yang dag pa'i lta ba ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/skyon med par 'jug par
34a7(mdo sde): 'gyur ro//yang dag pa'i rtog pa ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/rtog pa dang rnam par rtog pa dang yongs su rtog pa thams cad spong bar 'gyur ro//yang dag pa'i ngag ni chos snang ba'i
34b1(mdo sde): sgoste/yi ge dang sgra dang /skad dang tshig gi lam thams cad brag cha dang mnyam pa nyid du rtogs par 'gyur ro//yang dag pa'i las kyi mtha' ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/las med cing rnam
34b2(mdo sde): par smin pa med par 'gyur ro//yang dag pa'i 'tshe ba ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/tshol ba thams cad rgyun chad par 'gyur ro//yang dag pa'i rtsol bya ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/pha rol gyi ngogras
34b3(mdo sde): su phyin par 'gyur ro//yang dag pa'i dran pa ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/dran pa med cing yid la byed pa med par 'gyur ro//yang dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/sems mi
34b4(mdo sde): 'khrugs pa'i ting nge 'dzin thob par 'gyur ro//byang chub kyi sems ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/dkon mchog gsum gyi rigs rgyun mi chad par 'gyur ro//bsam pa ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/theg
34b5(mdo sde): pa dman pa la 'dod pa med par 'gyur ro//lhag pa'i bsam pa ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/sangs rgyas kyi chos rgya chen po la lhag par dmigs par 'gyur ro//sbyor ba ni chos snang ba'i sgo
34b6(mdo sde): ste/dge ba'i chos thams cad yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro//sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po dang sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag
34b7(mdo sde): par 'gyur zhing ser sna can gyi sems can yongs su smin par byed par 'gyur ro//tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/mi khom pa dang ngan 'gro thams cad las
35a1(mdo sde): yang dag par 'da' zhing tshul khrims 'chal pa'i sems can yongs su smin par byed par 'gyur ro//bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/gnod
35a2(mdo sde): sems dang tha ba dang /zhe sdang dang /nga rgyal dang /dregs pa dang /rgyags pa spong bar 'gyur zhing gnod sems can gyi sems can yongs su smin par byed par 'gyur ro//brtson 'grus
35a3(mdo sde): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/dge ba'i chos brtsams pa thams cad nyams su lon par 'gyur zhing /le lo can gyi sems can yongs su smin par byed par 'gyur
35a4(mdo sde): ro//bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/bsam gtan dang mngon par shes pa thams cad bskyed cing sems g.yengs pa can gyi sems can yongs su smin
35a5(mdo sde): par byed par 'gyur ro//shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/ma rig pa dang gti mug gi mun pa muno nag dang /dmigs pa'i lta ba spong zhing shes rab 'chal pa'i
35a6(mdo sde): sems can yongs su sbyin par byed par 'gyur ro//thabs mkhas pa ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/sems can ji ltar mos pa bzhin du spyod lam ston cing sangs rgyas kyi chos thams
35a7(mdo sde): cad bsgrub par 'gyur ro//bsngo ba'i dngos po bzhi ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/sems can thams cad sdud cing byang chub brnyes pa las chos nod par 'gyur ro//sems can yongs
35b1(mdo sde): su smin par bya ba ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/bdag gi bde ba la mi chags shing yongs su skyo ba med par 'gyur ro//dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/sems can thams
35b2(mdo sde): cad kyi kun nos nyon mongs pa spong bar 'gyur ro//bsod nams kyi tshogs ni chos spong ba'i sgo ste/sems can thams cad nye bar 'tsho bar 'gyur ro//ye shes kyi tshogs ni chos snang
35b3(mdo sde): ba'i sgo ste/stobs bcu yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro//zhi gnas kyi tshogs ni rgyas snang ba'i sgo ste/de bzhin gshegs pa'i ting nge 'dzin thob par 'gyur ro//lhag mthong gi tshigs
35b4(mdo sde): ni chos snang de'i sgo ste/shes rab kyi mig thob par 'gyur ro//so so yang dag par rig pa la 'jug pa ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/chos kyi mig thob par 'gyur ro//rton pa la 'jug pa ni chos
35b5(mdo sde): snang ba'i sgo ste/sangs rgyas kyi spyan yongs su dag par 'gyur ro//gzungs thob pa ni chos spang ba'i sgo ste/sangs rgyas kyis gsungs pa thams cad 'dzin par 'gyur ro//spobs pa
35b6(mdo sde): thob pa ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/sems can thams cad legs par bshad pas tshim par byed par 'gyur ro//rjes su mthun pa'i chos kyi bzod pa ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/sangs
35b7(mdo sde): rgyas kyi chos thams cad dang mthun par 'gyur ro//mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa ni chos snang po'i sgo ste/lung bstan pa thob par 'gyur ro//phyir mi ldog pa'i sa ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/
36a1(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro//sa nas sar 'phar ba'i ye shes ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyis dbang
36a2(mdo sde): bskur bar 'gyur ro//dbang bskur ba'i sa ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/mngal du 'jug pa dang /btsas pa dang /mngon par 'byung ba dang /dka' ba spyad pa dang /byang chub kyi snying por 'gro
36a3(mdo sde): ba dang /bdud gdul ba dang /byang chub rnam par 'tshang rgya ba dang /chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dang /yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa chen po ston par 'gyur ro//grogs po dag 'di
36a4(mdo sde): dag ni chos snang ba'i sgo brgya rtsa brgyad ces bya ba ste/byang chub sems dpas 'chi 'pho ba'i dus kyi tshe lha'i 'khor du gdon mi za bar gang bstan par bya ba'o//dge slong dag byang chub
36a5(mdo sde): sems dpas chos snang ba'i sgo'i le'u 'di bstan pa'i tshe/lha'i 'khor de las lha'i bu brgyad khri bzhi stong bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par gyur to///
36a6(mdo sde): lha'i bu sngon yongs su sbyang ba byas pa sum khri nyis stong ni mi skyo bo'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur to//lha'i bu bye ba sum cu rtsa drug ni chos rnams la chos kyi mi rdul med cing dri ma
36a7(mdo sde): dang bral ba rnam par dag go//dga' ldan gyi gnas thams cad kyang lha'i me tog gis pus mo nub tsam du yog par gyur to//dge slong dag de ltar byang chub sems dpas lha'i 'khor
36b1(mdo sde): de dag rgya cher dga' bar bya ba'i phyir/de'i cha tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so//gang gi tshen dga' ldan gnas mchog nas//'dren pa skyes bu seng ge 'chi 'pho'i cha//lha rnams dag
36b2(mdo sde): la tshig tu smra ba ni//bgo med mtha' dag rnam par spongs zhes smra//lha yi dga' ba rnam mang ji snyed pa//yid kyis bsams pas 'byung ba dngango la ldan pa//thams cad las dge'i rgya
36b3(mdo sde): las byung ba ste//de ni dge ba'i las kyi 'bras bu yin//de lta bas na byas pa gzo bar gyis//sngon gyi dge bsags 'di ni zad gyur to//gang du mi bde sdug bsngal myong 'gyur ba//don
36b4(mdo sde): song dag tu song bar gyur ta re//ngal gus par bya ba bskyed nas ni//chos gang thos par gyur pa de dag la//nan tan gyis ni rab tu sgrubs shig dang //badre ba mtha' yas nges par
36b5(mdo sde): thob par 'gyur//'dod pa thams cad ma rtag brtan pa min//ther zug ma yin rmi lam 'dra ba ste//smig sgra dang ni sgyu ma rnams dang 'dra//glog dang dbu ba 'dra zhing 'gyur ba yin//'dod
36b6(mdo sde): pa'i yon tan dag gi dga' bas ni//lon tshwa'i chu 'thungs bzhin du ngoms mi 'gyur//gang dag rdul mo 'jig rten 'das pa yi//shes rab ldan pa de dag ngoms par 'gyur//
36b7(mdo sde): lha mo dag dang 'grogs dang glu dbyangs ni//gar gyi lta mo ba dang mtshungs shing 'dra//dper na 'dus pa dag ni khri las su//phan tshun 'gro bar sbyor bar byed dang mtshungs//dag
37a1(mdo sde): ba'i las byas rjes su 'brang byed cing //phyi bzhin 'gro bar byed pa mA gtogs par//'dus byas dag la grogs yang ma yin te//mdza' bshes nye du med cing 'khor
37a2(mdo sde): kyang med//de lta bas na lhan cig mthun byos la//phan tshun byams sems phan pa'i sems byos te//chos kyi spyad pa dag ni spyad par gyis//spyad pa legs par spyad la gdud pa
37a3(mdo sde): med//thos dang tshul khrims sbyin la dga' gyur cing //bzod dang nges pa phun sum tshogs gyis te//sangs rgyas dad ni chos dang dge 'dun dang //de bzhin bag yod pa dag dran par
37a4(mdo sde): gyis//rtag pa med cing sdug bsngal bdag med la//rgyu dang rkyen rnams dang ni ldan gyur cing //bdag po med lnga bems por gyur pa yi//chos 'di drug la tshul bzhin brtag par
37a5(mdo sde): gyis//nga la rdzu 'phrul dag ni gang yod dang //spobs pa ye shes dbang rnams byung mthong ba//kun kyang las dge'i rgyu las byung ba ste//thos dang tshul khrims bag yod rnams las
37a6(mdo sde): byung //sems can don dang phan dang byams don du//nga yi tshul khrims dang ni thos pa dang //bag yod pa dang sbyin dang dul ba dang //yang dag sdom pa'i rjes su bslab par gyis//
37a7(mdo sde): ngag dang skad dang sgra rnams tsam gyis ni//dge ba'i chos rnams sgrub par mi nus kyis//nan tan snying por bya ba so sgrub byos la//ji ltar smras pa de bzhin bya bar byos//gzhan gyis
37b1(mdo sde): gleng ba'i skabs ni ma dbye bar//bdag ni rtag tu bsgrim pas 'bad par gyis//la las byas shing sbyin pa yod ma yin//ma byas par yang 'grub par 'gyur ba med//sngon chad 'khor bar
37b2(mdo sde): 'khor tshe sdug bsngal dog/myong bar gang gyur de ni dran par gyis//khyed cag log pa nyid du nges pas na//mya ngan 'das dang 'dod chags bral ma thob//de lta bas na dal dang bshes
37b3(mdo sde): gnyen dang //tshul dang mthun pa'i yul du gnas pa dang //chos mnyan dam pa thob par byas nas ni//'dod chags la sogs nyon mongs zhi bar gyis//nga rgyal dang ni rgyags dang
37b4(mdo sde): dregs thong la//rtag tu mnyen zhing drang la g.yo med cing //mya ngan 'das par 'gro la gzhol byos te/lam rtogs bya ba'i phyir ni sbyor bar gyis//gti mug rnyog pa'i mun pa thams
37b5(mdo sde): cad kyang //shes rab sgron mas rnam par bsal bar gyis//bag la nyal bcas skyon gyi dra bo rnams//ye shes rdo rje yis ni rnam par khrol//shin tu mang por smra ba ci dgos te//
37b6(mdo sde): don dang yang dag ldan pa'i chos de la//khyed cag gnas par byas par ma gyur na//de la chos kyis ldan pa ma yin no//gang tshe ngas ni byang chub thob gyur te//'chi med 'gro ba'i chos
37b7(mdo sde): char 'bebs pa'i tshe//rnam par dag pa'i sems dang ldan po khyed//chos kyi dam pa mnyan pa'i phyir shog cig/chos snang ba'i sgo'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o////dge slong
38a1(mdo sde): dag de ltar byang chub sems dpas lha'i 'khor chen po de dag la chos kyi gtam 'di yang dag par bstan/yang dag par 'dzin du bcug/yang dag par gzeng bstod/yang
38a2(mdo sde): dag par dga' bar byas/bzod par byas nas/lha'i 'khor bkra shis dang ldan pa rnams la smras pa/grogs po dag kho bo ni dzam+bu'i gling du 'gro'o//kho ba sngon byang chub sems dpa'i
38a3(mdo sde): spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe/sems can rnams bsdu ba'i dngos po sbyin pa dang /snyan par smra ba dang /don spyad pa dang /don mthun par bya ba bzhi la 'gron du bos la/grogs po dag da kho
38a4(mdo sde): ngo bla ni mod pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang mi rgya bar 'dug pa de ni kho bos byas pa ma shes shing rigs pa mi yin par 'gyur ro//de nas dga'
38a5(mdo sde): ldan gyi ris kyi lha'i bu de dag ngu zhing byang chub sems dpa'i rkang pa gnyis la 'jus te/'di skad ces 'dzir to//skyes bu dam pa khyod mi bzhugs na dga' ldan gyi gnas 'di mdzes par
38a6(mdo sde): mi 'gyur ro//de nas byang chub sems dpas lha'i 'khor chen po de dag la 'di skad du byang chub sems dpa' byamos pa 'di khyod la chos ston par 'gyur ro zhes de skad smras te/de nas
38a7(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' rong gi mgo las thod dang cod pan phog ste/byang chub sems dpa' byams pa'i mgo la bzhag nas 'di skad du/skyes bu dam pa khyod ni nga'i 'og tu bla na
38b1(mdo sde): med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro zhes de skad smras te/de nas byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa' byams pa dga' ldan gyi gnas
38b2(mdo sde): dam par dngang bskur nas/yong lha'i 'khor chen po de dag la smras pa/grogs po dag kho bos ji lta bu'i gzugs kyis ma'i mngal du 'gro bor bya/de la kha cig ni re bram ze'i khye'u'i gzugs su
38b3(mdo sde): gshegs par rigs so zhes zer ro//la la na re brgya byin gyi gzugs su/la la na re tshangs pa'i gzugs su/la la na re rgyal po chen po'i gzugs su/la la na re rnam thos kyi bu'i gzugs
38b4(mdo sde): su/la la na re sgra gcan gyi gzugs su/la la na re dri za'i gzugs su/la la na re mi'am ci'i gzugs su/la la na re lto 'phye chen po'i gzugs su/la la na re dbang phyug chen po'i
38b5(mdo sde): gzugs su/la la na re zla ba'i gzugs su/la la na re nyi ma'i gzugs su/la la na re nam mkha' lding gi dbang po'i gzugs su bzhud pa'i rigs so zhes zer ro//de nas tshangs ris
38b6(mdo sde): kyi lha'i bu gzi brjid dam nga zhes bya ba sngon drang srong las shi 'phos pa bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog pa zhig 'dug pa des 'di skad ces smras so//bram ze
38b7(mdo sde): rnams kyi gsang sngags kyi rig byed kyi bsten bcos las ji skad 'byung ba de lta bu'i gzugs su byang chub sems dpa' yum gyi lhums su bzhud pa'i rigs so//de'ang ci 'dra zhe na/glang
39a1(mdo sde): po dam pa lus chen mchog gyur pa//mche ba drug can gser gyi dra bas g.yogs//mgo bo rab tu dmar zhing shin tu mdzes//'gram nas zag cing gzugs ldan dpal
39a2(mdo sde): ldan pa'o//rig byed bstan bcos yang dag mkhas pa yi//bram zes rnam pa de 'dra de shes nas//sum cu rtsa gnyis mtshan dang ldan 'gyur zhes//yang dag nyid du lung ni ston par
39a3(mdo sde): 'gyur//dge slong dag de ltar byang chub sems dpas skye ba'i dus la bltas nas/dga' ldan gyi gnas dam pa na gnas bzhin du rgyal po zas gtsang ma'i khyim dam pa der snga bltas
39a4(mdo sde): brgyad bstan to//brgyad gang zhe na/'di lta ste/khyim de rtswa dang /sdong dum dang /tsher ma dang /gseg ma dang /gyo mo med cing /dri ma med la chag chag legs par btab pa dang /
39a5(mdo sde): phyag dar legs par byas shing rlung rdul can dang /mun pa dang /rdul dang bral ba dang /sbrang mya dang /sha sbrang dang /sbrang bu dang /phye ma leb dang /sdig sbrul med cing me tog gis
39a6(mdo sde): kun tu gang ba lag mithal ltar mnyam par gnas par gyur te/'di ni snga bltas byung ba dang po'o//ri'i rgyal po gang si ri la bya 'dra ba spod dang /no tse dang /ri sgrogs dang /khu byug dang /
39a7(mdo sde): nga pa dang /rma bya dang /ngur pa dang /kun la dang /ka le bing+ga dang /shang shang te'u la sogs pa sgrog shog sna tshogs mdzes pa yid du 'ong zhing snyan pa'i sgra 'byin pa'i bya'i tshogs
39b1(mdo sde): gang dag gnas pa de dag der 'ongs nas/rgyal po zas glatsang ma'i khyim dam pa de'i stegs bu dang /ba ga ma dang /rta babs dang /skar khrung dang /bsil khang dang /khang pa brtsegs pa dang /khang bzang
39b2(mdo sde): gi steng dag tu gnas shing dga' ba dang /mgu ba dang /yid bde ba skyes nas rang rang gi sgra skad dag 'byin te/'di ni snga bltas byung ba gnyis pa'o//gang yang rgyal po zas gtsang ma de'i kun dga'
39b3(mdo sde): rab nyams dga' ba dang /nags tshal nyams dga' ba dang /skyed mos tshal nyams dga' ba dag na me tog dang 'bras bu'i shing ljon pa sna tshogs dus tha dad par 'byung ba de thams cad kyang kha
39b4(mdo sde): 'bus shing me tog rgyas par gyur te/'di ni snga ltas byung ba gsum pa'o//rgyal po zas gtsang ma'i chu'i longs spyod kyi rkyen rdzing la sogs pa gang dag yod pa de dag thams cad kyang pad+ma 'dab ma
39b5(mdo sde): bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma dang ldan pa tshad shing rta'i 'phang lo tsam dag gis khebs par gyur te/'di ni snga ltas byung ba bzhi pa'o//rgyal po zas gtsang ma'i khyim dam pa de ni mar dang /
39b6(mdo sde): 'bru mar dang /sbrang rtsi dang /bu ram gyi dbu ba dang /sha kha ra la sogs pa bza' ba'i rnam pa gang dag yod pa de dag kyang yongs su spyad pas zad par mi 'gyur zhing /yongs su grang bar
39b7(mdo sde): snang ste/'di ni snga ltas byung ba lnga pa'o//rgyal po zas gtsang ma'i khyim mchog dam pa dang /btsun mo'i 'khor chen po dag na rnga bo che dang /rdza rnga dang /'khar rnga dang /rgyud gcig pa dang /
40a1(mdo sde): pi wang dang /gling bu dang /rgyud gsum pa dang /'khar ba'i sil khrol dang /pheg rdo ba la sogs pa rol mo'i cha byad gang dgra yod pa de dag thams cad kyang ma blangs mu
40a2(mdo sde): dkrol bar yid du 'ong ba'i sgra rang sgrog par gyur te/'di ni snga ltas byung ba drug pa'o//rgyal po zas gtsang ma'i khyim mchog dam po ni/gser dang /dngul dang /nor bu dang /mu tig
40a3(mdo sde): dang /bai DUr+ya dang /dung dang /man shel dang /pU ru la sogs pa rin po che sna tshogs kyi snod gang dag yod pa de dag thams cad kyang kha bye zhing dri ma med la rnam par dag cing rab tu grung
40a4(mdo sde): bar snang ste/'di ni snga ltas byung ba bdun pa'o//nyi zla'i 'od zil gyis rlag par byed cing /lus dang sems dga' bskyed pa'i 'od dog cing dri ma med pas snang bar gyur te/'di ni
40a5(mdo sde): snga ltas byung ba brgyad pa'o///'phags pa rgya cher rol pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo//bam po gsum pa//lha mo sgyu 'phrul yang khrus byas/lus byug
40a6(mdo sde): pas byugs/rgyan sna tshogs kyis lag pa shin tu brgyan te/gos shin tu 'jam pa mchog bgos shing btsun spu dang bcas la/dga' ba dang /mchog tu dga' ba dang /rangs pa thob
40a7(mdo sde): nas/dud med stong phrag bcus bskor cing mdun du bdar te/lhan cig tu rgyal po zas gtsang ma rol mo bya ba'i khang bzang na bde bar gnas pa'i drung du phyin te/g.yas rol na khri bzang po
40b1(mdo sde): rin po che'i dra bas brgyan pa'i sa la 'dug nas/'dzum pa'i bzhin khro gnyer med cing rab tu dang ba'i mdog gis rgyal po zas gtsang ma la tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so//rgyal po sa bdag
40b2(mdo sde): legs par bdag las gsan du gsol//rgyal po khyod la gsol gyis bdag la de gnong zhig/bdag gi bsam pa yid la ci mchis cir dga' ba//de dag bdag la gsan cing thugs
40b3(mdo sde): dgyes rangs par mdzod//lha bdag bsnyen gnas tshul khrims brtul zhugs len par gsol//bdag ni 'gro la byams pas yan lag brgyad len te//srog chags gnod pa spangs shing
40b4(mdo sde): bsam pa rtag dag pas//ji ltar bdag la byams pa de ltar gzhan la bgyi//rku sems rnam par spangs te 'dod dang dregs pa spangs//rgyal po 'dod pa rnams la log par g.yem mi bgyid///
40b5(mdo sde): bden la gnas shing phra ma ma mchis zhe gcod spang //mi dge kyal pa'i tshig kyang yongs su mi spyod do//gnod sems zhe sdang tha ba gti mug rgyags pa dang //brnab sems kun spang rang gi nor
40b6(mdo sde): gyis 'tshal bar bgyi//yang dag sbyor bas kha bsag tshul 'chos phrag dog spang //dge bcu'i los lam 'di dag bdag gis spyad par bgyi//bdag ni tshul khrims brtul zhugs mngon dga'
40b7(mdo sde): rab bsdams kyis//mi yi dbang po bdag la bzhed pas sreng ma mdzad//rgyal po khyod la yun ring mi dger gyur du mchi//bdag gi tshul khrims brtul zhugs nyer gnas dgyes par mdzod//
41a1(mdo sde): rgyal po bdag gi 'tshal ba 'di lags deng myur stsol//khang bzang bsil khang ldan pa dang skya ldan pa'i nang //me tog bkram pa'i mchis mal 'jam zhing dri bda' bar//
41a2(mdo sde): grogs mos rtag tu bskor cing bde dgar gnas snyam bgyid//skyes pa nyung rum rnams dang de bzhi ni khye'u dag dang //bud med pal pa rnams kyang mdun na mchis mi 'tshal//snyan cing yid
41a3(mdo sde): mchi sgra snyan nyan pa ma gtogs par//gzugs dang sgra bsung yod du mi mchi bdag mi 'tshal//bcings dang btson rar stsal ba thams cad dbye bar gsol//nor gyis bral ba'i mi rnams
41a4(mdo sde): nor dang ldan par mdzod//zas skom rad pa shing rta khyogs dang bzhon pa rta//'gro la bde ba'i slad du dgung bdun stsal ba mdzod//pho brang 'di na skyes pa khye'u dang bud med dag/ji snyed
41a5(mdo sde): mchis pa 'thab rtsod khro ba'i tshig bral zhing //phan tshun byams pa'i yid ldan phan dang des sems kyis//dga' tshal gnas pa'i lha ltar mthun zhing bde spyod mdzod//rgyal po'i chad pa
41a6(mdo sde): che phraganyer gyis bda' ba dang //gnod pa bgyid dang rdeg btsog sdig ru mi mdzad par//kun la'ang dang ba'i thugs kyis byams dang phan dgongs te//lha yis skye bo rnams la sras
41a7(mdo sde): gcig bzhin du gzigs//rgyal pos de skad tshig thos rab tu dger gyur nas//smras pa khyod ni ci 'dod de kun de bzhin bya//khyod kyi bsam pa yid kyis gang rnams rjes bsams
41b1(mdo sde): shing /khyod kyis mchog blangs gang yin de ni ngas sbyin no//rgyal po'i dam pas rang gi 'khor la bsgo ba ni//khang bzung dam pa'i steng du phun sum tshogs pa shoms//me tog mdzes pa khros
41b2(mdo sde): la bdug spos mchog gis dadugs//gdugs dang ba dran tA la'i phreng ba'i rgyan kyang gyis//'thab phod stong phrag nyi shu sna tshogs go cha can//mda' mdung lcags mda' mdung thung ral gri
41b3(mdo sde): thogs pa dag/yid 'ong sgra gcan dang skya ldan pa bskor gyis te//lha mo 'jigs pa med pa bya phyir srud zhing gnas//khrus byas spros byugs gos mchog dag gis yan lag brgyan//dud
41b4(mdo sde): med rnams kyis de bskor lha yi bu mo 'dra//yid du 'ong ba'i sgra ldan sil snyan stong blangs te//lha mau der zhugs lha yi bu mo bzhin du gnas//lha yi rin chen rin thang chen pos rtsa smras pa//
41b5(mdo sde): khri la gos mchog mang pos yid 'ong ma la bshams te//mal phyin gtsug gi nor bu rin chen klong byas nas//'dres pa'i nags tshal lha yi bu mo bzhin du gnas//dge slong dang /denas
41b6(mdo sde): rgyal po chen po bzhi dang /lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang /lha'i bu rab 'jab dral dang /yongs su dga' ldan dang /rab 'phrul dga' dang /gzhan 'phrul dbang byed dang /bdud kyi bu
41b7(mdo sde): dod dpon dang /mi mdzad kyi bdag po tshangs pa dang /mdun na 'don tshangs mchog dang /mdun na 'don tshangs bzang dang /'odan bkod pa dang /'od gsol dang /gnas gtsang ma'i ris
42a1(mdo sde): kyi dbang phyug chen po dang /mthar thug dang /'og min pa dang /de dag la sogs pa dang /gzhan yang lha brgya stong mang po 'dus te/gcig la gcig 'di skad ces
42a2(mdo sde): smras so//grogs po dag bdag cag gis byang chub sems dpa' gcig pu gnyis su med par gshegs su gsol na/bdag cag gis byas pa ma shes par 'gyur te/bdag cag la
42a3(mdo sde): mchis/grogs po dag khyed kyi nang nas byang chub sems dpa' thog ma yum gyi lhums su gshegs pa dang /lhums na bzhugs pa dang /bltams pa dang /thor bu dang /byis pa'i
42a4(mdo sde): nang na rol pa dang /btsun mo'i 'khor gyi nong na bzhugs pa dang /rol mo gzigs pa dang /mngon par 'byung ba dang /dka' ba spyod pa dang /byang chub kyi snying por gshegs pa dang /
42a5(mdo sde): bdud 'dul ba dang /byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba dang /chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dang /mya ngan las 'das pa chen po bstan gyi bar du phan pa'i sems dang /dga'
42a6(mdo sde): nga'i sems dang /phangs pa'i sems dang /byams pa'i sems dang /mnyan pa'i sems kyis rtag par rgyun du byang chub sems dpa'i zhabs 'bring na 'khod par su dag spro//de'i
42a7(mdo sde): tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag kyang smras so//khyed las su zhig rtag tu dga' yid kyis//gzugs mchog mnga' ba'i zhabs 'bring byed par spro//su dag rang gi bsod nams gzi
42b1(mdo sde): brji dang /stobs dang grags pa rnam par spel bar 'dod//gang zhig lha yi pho brang 'di dag na//lha mo dag dang 'dod pa'i yon tan gyi//lha yi bde bas dga' bar 'dod pa dag/dri med zla ba'i
42b2(mdo sde): zhal gyi zhabs 'bring gyis//de bzhin 'dres pa'i nags tshal mdzes pa mchog/lha yi 'byung gnas lha yi pho brang na//gser mdog me tog rgyas par dga' 'dod na//dri meng gzi brjid
42b3(mdo sde): mnga' ba'i zhabs 'bring gyis//gang gis sna tshogs shing rta de bzhin du//dga' tshal me tog man+dar 'dab rgyas su//lha mo lhan cig rtse bar 'dod pa dag/skyes bu chen po 'di yi zhabs 'bring
42b4(mdo sde): gyis//'thab bral bdag po 'am dga' ldan bdag po 'am//yang na dbang phyug 'gyur b.re 'dod pa dang //'gro ba kun gyi mchod 'os 'dod pa dag/grags pa mtha' yas 'di yi zhabs 'bring
42b5(mdo sde): gyis/gang zhig 'phrul dga'i khang pa mdzes pa dang //dbang sgyur lha yi gnas su rtse 'dod cing //yid kyi 'phrul gyis thams cad spyod 'dod pa//yon tan mchog mnga' 'di yi zhabs 'bring gyis///
42b6(mdo sde): bdud kyi dbang po zhe sdang yid med pa//rdzu 'phrul dbang phyug kun gyi mthar phyin pa'i//'dod pa'i dbang phyug dbang mthar phyin 'dod na//phan pa mdzad pa 'di dang lhan cig dang //de bzhin
42b7(mdo sde): 'dod pa'i khams las 'da' byas te//tshangs pa'i gnas su gnas par su 'dod pa//de ni ched med bzhi yi gzi mnga' ba//skyes bu chen po'i zhabs 'bring dang nas gyis//'on tang gang zhig
43a1(mdo sde): mi yi nang dgaH//'khor las sbrang yul yangs par skye 'dod na//rin chen 'byung gnas mi 'jigs paden sbyin pa//bsod nams yangs pa mnga' ba'i zhabs 'bring
43a2(mdo sde): gyis//gang zhigs bdag de bzhin tshong dpon bu//phyug cing sgyid la nor mang tshogs chen dang //dgra yi dpung bcom 'khor dang ldan 'dod pa//de ni phan mdzad 'di dang lhan cig dang /
43a3(mdo sde): gzugs dang longs spyod de bzhin dbang phyug dang //snyan pa grags dang spobs dang yon tan dang //bzung 'os tshig dang mnyan po'i tshig 'dod pa//de ni tshangs dbyangs maM bAs pa'i gan
43a4(mdo sde): dusang //lha dang mi yo 'dod pa gang yin dang //srid pa gsum gyi bde ba thams cad dang //bsam gtan bde dang dben pa'i bde 'dod pa//de ni chos kyi dbang phyug zhabs 'bring gyis
43a5(mdo sde): 'dod chags dang ni zhe sdang spang ba dang //nyon mongs mun pa sel bar su 'dod cing //zhi ba rab zhi nyer zhi yid ldan pa//de ni thugs dul zhabs 'bring myur du song //gang zhig slob dang
43a6(mdo sde): mi slo ba rang rgyal dang //thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes thob 'dod cing //stobs bcus seng ge'i sgra sgrogs su 'dod pa//de ni yon tan rgya mtsho mkhas drung song //gang zhig ngan song
43a7(mdo sde): rnams kyi lam gcod cing //bzang 'gro 'chi ba med pa'i lam bye dang //yan lag brgyad lam 'gribs 'gro 'dod na//'gro la ma mthar 'byin 'di yi zhabs 'bring gyis//gang
43b1(mdo sde): zhig bde gshegs yongs su mchod pa dang //thugs rje mngar ba de las chos nyan dang //dge 'dun yon tan thob par 'dod pa ni//yon tan rgya mtsho 'dri yi zhabs 'brid kyis//sgyu rgyun 'chi
43b2(mdo sde): sdug bsngal zad pa dang //'khor ba'i bcings pa rnam par dgrol ba dang //nam mkha'i mtha' mnyam rnam dag spyod 'dod pa//de ni sems can dag pa'i zhabs 'brir gyis//'gro bkun+da na
43b3(mdo sde): yod 'ong sdug mdzes shing //gzugs mchog mtshan dang yon tan rgyas pa dang //bdag dang de bzhin gzhan yang 'brel 'dod pa//de ni blta sdug mkhas pa'i gan du song //tshul khrims
43b4(mdo sde): ting 'dzin de bzhin shes rab dang //zab cing blta dka' gting dpag dka' ba yi//rnam grol thob 'dod mkhas pa gang yin de//sman nga'i rgyal po'i gan du myur du song //yon tan 'di dang
43b5(mdo sde): gzhan yang rnam mang dang //srid pa'i bde dang de bzhin mya ngan 'das//yon tan thams cad rab tu rdzogs 'dod pa//de ni brtul zhugs grubo mkhas gan du song //tshig de thos nas rgyal chen
43b6(mdo sde): bzhi'i ris kyi lha 'bum phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi dang /sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha 'bum dang /'thab bral gyi lha 'bum dang /dga' ldan gyi lha 'bum dang /'phrul dga'i lha 'bum dang /bdud kyi ris
43b7(mdo sde): kyi lha sngon gyi dge ba'i las kyis byung ba drug khri dang /tshangs ris kyi lha drug khri brgya stong dang /'og min gyi bar gyi lha brgya stong mang po dag 'dus par gyur pa dang /gzhan yang shar phyogs dang /
44a1(mdo sde): lho phyogs dang /nub phyogs dang /byang phyogs nas lha'i bu brgya stong mang po 'dus par gyur pa de dag las gang dag mchog tu bya ba'i lha'i bu dag gis lha'i 'khor chen po de dag
44a2(mdo sde): la tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so//bdag cag rnams kyi bsam pa yang dag ci 'dra yi//tshig 'di lha yi dbang po dag gis gsan du gsol//'dod pa'i dga' 'byor bsam gtan
44a3(mdo sde): bde ba mchog spangs te//sems can dag pa dam pa 'di yi zhabs 'bring bgyi//lhums su gshegs dang lhums na bzhugs dang bltams pa'i tshe//bdag nyid chen po mchod 'os shin
44a4(mdo sde): tu mchod par bgyi//bsod nams dag gis bsrungs pa'i drang srong yongs bsrungs na//zhe sdang sems kyis sus kyang glags rnyed 'gyur ma mchis//glu dbyangs sil snyan rol mo'i dbyangs sgra
44a5(mdo sde): legs bsgrags pas//yon tan rgya mtsho mnga' ba'i yon tan bsngags brjod de//gang thos skye bo byang chub mchog tu sems bskyed par//lha dang mo rnams thams cad rab tu dag
44a6(mdo sde): bar bgyi//rgyal po'i pho brang me tog silams rgyas par dgang //eg du mchig nag pos bdugs te dri zhim bgyi//de yi dri tsher lha mi rab tu dga' 'gyur zhing //nad med rims nad bral zhing
44a7(mdo sde): bde bar 'gyur bar bgyi//me tog man+da ra dang kun nas 'du ba dang //sim byed rab tu sim byed sba la rnam snang dang //me tog bzang pos phrin las dag las byung ba de//mchod pa'i slad
44b1(mdo sde): duser skya'i grong kun dgang bar bgyi//ji srid yum gyi lhums na dri gsum ma gos bzhugs//ji srid rga shi mthar 'byin bltams par gyur gyi bar//de srid dus su drang ba'i yid kyis zhabs 'bring
44b2(mdo sde): bgyi//blo gros che mnga' mchod par bgyi bar bdag cag sems//bltams nas gom pa bdun gshegs brgya byin tshangs pa yis//lag tu blangs te spos chu dag gis sku bsil ba//sems can
44b3(mdo sde): rnam par dag pa de ni mthong ba yi//lha mi de dag thob pa rgya chen lags par thob//ji srid bar du 'jig rten rjes su mthun mdzad cing //'dod pa'i nyon mongs 'jom mdzad btsun mo'i nang bzhugs la//
44b4(mdo sde): ji srid gcig na rgyal srid kun spangs khab nas 'byung //de srid dus su dang ba'i sems kyis zhabs 'bring bgyi//ji srid gcig na ran bsnams byang chub snying por gshegs//ji srid gcig na bdud
44b5(mdo sde): bcom byang chub reg gyur cing //tshangs pa khrag khrig 'khor lo bskor bar gsol btab pa//de srid bde bar gshegs la mchod pa rgya tshon bgyi//sems can bye ba khrag khrig 'chi med btul
44b6(mdo sde): gyur te//stong gsum 'dir ni sangs rgyas phrin las nam lags nas//zhi zhing bsil ba'i mya ngan 'das par gshegs gyur pa//de srid kun gyis drang srong grags chen btang mi bgyi/dge
44b7(mdo sde): slong dag de nas 'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha'i bu mo dag gis/byang chub sems dpa'i lus gzugs phun sum tshogs pa mthong nas 'di snyam du sems te/sems can dag pa mchog dam pa 'di lta bu
45a1(mdo sde): 'dzin par 'gyur ba'i na chung de ni ji lta bu zhig yod snyam nas/de dag ngo mtshar du gyur te/me tog dang /spos dang /phreng ba dang /byug pa mchog tu bya ba dag khyer nas lha'i lus yid
45a2(mdo sde): las grub pa thob cing bsod nams kyi rnam par smin pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyis byin gyis brlabs pa/de dag skad cig de nyid la lha'i pho brang de nas mi snang bar gyur te/ser skya'i grong khyer chen po dam pa
45a3(mdo sde): skyed mos tshal brgya stong gis brgyan pa/rgyal po zas gtsang ma'i khyim mchog khang bzang chen po dang sgra ldan zhes bya ba lha'i dbang po'i pho brang lta bu der phyin nas/lha'i bu mo gos lcug lhug po gyon
45a4(mdo sde): po/dge ba dri ma med pa'i bsod nams kyi gzi brjid kyis rab tu brgyan pa/lha'i rgyan gyis lag pa shin tu brgyan pa de dag gis lha mo sgyu 'phrul ma la mchog gi steng na 'dug pa mthong nas/phran
45a5(mdo sde): tshun mdzub mos ston cing /nam mkha'i dkyil na 'khod de/gcig la gcig tshigs su bcad de smras pa/lha gnas 'khod pa'i lha yi bu mo rnams//yid 'ong byang chub sems dpa'i sku
45a6(mdo sde): mthong nas//de tshe de dag 'di snyam sems gyur te//byang chub sems dra pa'i yum gyur ci 'dra snyam//lag na me tog phreng can de dag rnams//the tshom skyes nos rgyal po'i pho brang du//
45a7(mdo sde): me tog de bzhin byug pa thogs nas su//sor bcu thal mo sbyar te 'dud cing lhags//lcug lcug gos gyon 'jo bag gzugs 'chang bas//lha mo sgyu 'phrul mal steng gnas mthong
45b1(mdo sde): nas//lag paganas pa'i marnams byug byas te//me yi bud me gzugs la legs myos 'dzer//bdag cagang rgyal sems kyis mngon sems pa//A sa bu mo gzugs mchag med 'o snyam//
45b2(mdo sde): rgyal ba'i btsun mo 'di yi gzugs mthong na/ li lus kyang zil gyis non par mthong //'di ni gang zag mchog gi yum 'gyur du//yon tan ldan des shin tu ga sha shing 'os//no
45b3(mdo sde): rin chen snod bzang gnas pa sgyur//lhamo 'di ni lha yi lha stong ljin//rlung lag mthil dang spyi man chad du//yan+da lag yod 'di lta las lhag bre ste//mig gis bstan ngoms par 'gyur
45b4(mdo sde): ma min//yid dang sems ni phyir shing dga' bar 'gyur//'di yi kha bzhin lus mdzes sdug pa dri//nam mkha'i dkyil na zla ba mdzes pa 'dra//nyi ltar dri med me ltar 'bar ba ste//'di yi lus
45b5(mdo sde): las 'od gsal bzang po 'byung //gsar snam bcom bzang po rigaser bzhin du//lha mo 'di ya kha dog rnam par mdzes//'di yi skra ni 'jam gtsang dri zhim ste//bung ba mchog gi mdog 'dra
45b6(mdo sde): ljang lor 'khyil//'di yi mig ni pad+ma'i 'dab ma 'dra//rnam dag sngon nam mkha'i skar ma bzhid//rked pa gzhu ltar phra zhing sta zur yangs//phrag pa zlum zhing tshigs rnams mngan pa med//
45b7(mdo sde): brla legs glang po mchog gi sna 'dra ste//byin pa shin tu legs pa byin gyis phra//rkang lag mthil mnyam shin tu dmar bste//'di ni gzhan min lha yi bu mor nges//de ltar rnam mang du
46a1(mdo sde): mar blta byas nas//me tog gtor te bskor ba byas nas ni//grags ldan rgyal ba'i yum la bstod byas te//skad cig gcig gis phyir yang lha gnas dong //de nas phyogs
46a2(mdo sde): bzhi skyong ba bzhi po dang //'thab bral rab dang brgya byin 'phrul pa dang //lha tshogs lha min grul bum srin po dang //mi 'am ci dang lto 'phya ches smras pa//skyes bu mchog gi mdun du khyod deng
46a3(mdo sde): la//skyes bu dam pa de la bsrung ba gyis//'gro ba dag la yid kyis sdang ma byed//mi rnams la yang gtse ba ma byed cig/lha mo sgyu 'phrul khyim mchog gang gnas pa//der ni mthun par
46a4(mdo sde): 'khor dang lhan cig kun//mda' gzhu ral gri mdung thung mtshon thogs la//nam mkha'i dkyil na gnas te blta bar gyis//de ltar sho 'pho'i dus shes lha'i bu rnams//me tog da
46a5(mdo sde): bzhin byug pa thogs nas ni//sor bcu thal mo sbyar te 'dud byos la//dga' ba'i sems kyis sgyu 'phrul drung du dang //smra ba'i song gi dus ni deng lags kyis//'jig rten kun la
46a6(mdo sde): thugs rje brtse bskyed de//mi dbang sems can dag pa 'chi 'pho skyon//mchod sbyin don du bdag cag gsol ba 'debs//dge slong dag de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'tshe 'pho ba'i dus
46a7(mdo sde): kyi tshe shar phyogaso nas byang chub sems dpa' skye ba gcig gis thogs pa dga' ldan gyi gnas dam pa na gnas pa brgya stong phrag mang po dag byang chub sems dpa' la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir/
46b1(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' ga la ba der lhags so//de bzhin du phyogs bcu'i phyogs re re nas kyang byang chub sems dpa' skye ba gcig gis thogs pa/dga' ldan gyi gnas dam pa na gnas pa brgya
46b2(mdo sde): stong phrag mang po dag byang chub sems dpa' la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir//byang chub sems dpa'o ga la ba der lhags so//rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams kyi nang nas lha'i bu mo 'bum phrag brgyad cu
46b3(mdo sde): rtsa bzhi sil snyan dang /glu dbyangs sna tshogs len cing byang chub sems dpa' la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir/byang chub sems dpa' ga la ba der lhags so//de bzhin du sum cu rtsa gsum dang /'thab
46b4(mdo sde): bral dang /dga' ldan dang /'phrul dga' dang /gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams kyi nang nas lha'i bu mo 'bum phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi sil snyan dang glu dbyangs sna tshogs len cing /byang chub
46b5(mdo sde): sems dpa' la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir/byang chub sems dpa' ga la ba der lhags so//de nas byang chub sems dpa' khang pa brtsegs pa chen po bsod nams thams cad kyis yang dag par byung
46b6(mdo sde): ba dpal gyi snying po lha rnams kyis kun nas blta ba'i nang du 'dug ste/byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang /lha bye ba khrag khrig brgya phrag stong gis yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdar nas/dga'
46b7(mdo sde): ldan gyi gnas dam pa nas bskyod par brtsams so//dge slong dag de ltar bskyod par brtsams pa'i tshe/byang chub sems dpas 'od gang gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams
47a1(mdo sde): 'di ltar rgya che zhing yangs la tha gru che ba 'dir sngan chad ma byung ba'i 'od snang ba lha'i 'od las shin tu 'das pas yongs su gsal zhing snang bar gyur to//'jig rten gyi bar gang sdig
47a2(mdo sde): pa sdig pas khebs nas mun pa mun nag smag tu gyur pa snang ba med pa gang du nyi ma dang zla ba 'di gnyis 'di ltar rdzu 'phrul che zhing 'di ltar mthu che la 'di ltar dbang che bar grags pas kyang 'od dang /
47a3(mdo sde): kha dog dang /gzi brjid kyi lam mer ma gyur/thal ler ma gyur/lhang nger ma gyur pa der sems can gang dag skyes pa de dag rang rang gis lag pa brkyang ba'ang mi mthong ba de dag tu'ang de'i tshe
47a4(mdo sde): snang ba chen pos rgyas par khyab par gyur cing /der skyes pa'i sems can de dag snang ba des khyab par gyur nas gtsug gis gcig mthong zhing gcig gis gcig shes te/'di skad du kye
47a5(mdo sde): grogs po dag sems can gzhan dag kyang 'dir skyes so//kye grogs po dag sems can gzhan dag kyang 'dir skyes so zhes zer bar gyur pa de lta bu'i 'od lus las bkye'o//stong gsum
47a6(mdo sde): gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di'ang rnam pa drug dang /ltas chen po bco brgyad du g.yos/rab tu g.yos/kun tu rab tu g.yos so//'gul rab tu 'gul/kun tu rab tu
47a7(mdo sde): 'gul to//ldeg rab tu ldeg/kun tu rab tu ldeg go/'khrugs rab tu 'khrugs/kun tu rab tu 'khrugs so//'ur 'ur rab tu 'ur 'ur/kun tu rab tu 'ur 'ur ro//che mtshem rab tu
47b1(mdo sde): chemachem/kun tu rab tu chem chem mo//mtha' dma' na dbus mtho bar gyur to//dbus dma' na mtha' mtho bar gyur to//shar phyogs dma' na nub phyogs mtho bar gyur to//nub phyogs
47b2(mdo sde): dma' na shar phyogs mtho bar gyur to//lho phyogs dma' na byang phyogs mtho bar gyur to//byang phyogs dma' na lho phyogs mtho bar gyur to//de'i tshe sgra dga' bar 'gyur ba/tshom par
47b3(mdo sde): 'gyur ba/mgu bar 'gyur ba/dang bar 'gyur ba/sim par 'gyur ba/mnyan par 'os pa/bsngags par 'os pa/mtshungs pa med pa/mnyan na gtang mi bra ba/mi mthun pa med pa/
47b4(mdo sde): sdang bar 'gyur ba med pa dag kyang grag par gyur to//skad cig de la sems can gang la'ang gnod pa 'am/'jigs pa 'am/sdang ba 'am/bag non pa med par gyur to//skad cig de la
47b5(mdo sde): nyi zla dang /brgya byin dang /tshangs pa dang /'jig rten skyong ba dag gi 'od kyang mi snang bar gyur to//sems can dmyal ba dang /dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang /gshin rje'i 'jig rten du
47b6(mdo sde): skyes pa'i sems can thams cad kyang skad cig de la sdug bsngal dang bral zhing bde ba thams cad dang ldan par gyur te/sems can gang la 'ong 'dod chags kyis gnod par mi 'gyur/zhe sdang
47b7(mdo sde): gis gnod par mi 'gyur/gti mug gis gnod par mi 'gyur zhing /phrag dog gam/ser sna 'am/nga rgyal lam/'chab pa 'am/rgyags pa 'am/khro ba 'am/gnod sems sam/
48a1(mdo sde): yongs su gdung bas gnod par 'gyur ba med par gyur te/sems can thams cad kyang skad cig de la/phan tshun pha ma tsam du sems pa'i 'du shes su gyur nas/byams
48a2(mdo sde): pa'i sems dang /phan pa'i sems dang ldan par gyur to//lha dang mi'i rol mo sil snyan bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong dag kyang ma dkrol ma blangs par yid du 'ong ba'i sgra 'byin par gyur to//lha
48a3(mdo sde): bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong dag kyang lag pa dang phrag pa dang spyi bos gzhal med khang chen po dri 'deg cing khyer bar gyur to//lha'i bu mo brgya stong dag gis kyang rang rang gi glu dbyangs blangs te/
48a4(mdo sde): mdun dang /rgyab dang /g.yas g.yon dag nas byang chub sems dpa' la glu dbyangs kyi sgra skad kyis mngon par bstod pa/khyed kyis sngan chad dag las bsags pa dang //yun ring dus
48a5(mdo sde): kyi dge bas byung ba dang //khyod kyis chos rnams kun gyi tshul sbyangs pas//de ring mchod pa rgya chen byung bar gyur//bskal pa bye ba mang por khyod kyis sngon//sras mo sras sdug sbyin pa
48a6(mdo sde): mdzad pas na//lha yi me tog char du bab pa 'di//sbyin pa spyod pa de yi 'bras bu lags//gtso bo khyod kyis rang gi sha bcad de//srang lo gcal nas thugs byon bya phyir bting
48a7(mdo sde): sbyin pa de spyad pa yi 'bras bu des//yi dgas 'jig rten rnams kyang zas skom thob//bskal pa bye ba mang por khyod kyis sngon//tshul khrims ma zhig ma nyams bsrungs pas na//tshul
48b1(mdo sde): khrims de spyad pa yi 'bras bu des//ma khom ngan song yongs su dag par gyur//bskal pa bye ba mang por khyod kyis sngon//byang chub bsgrub pa'i gzhir ni bzod pa bsgoms//bzod
48b2(mdo sde): pade spyad pa yi 'bras bu des//lha dang mi kun byams pa'i sems su gyur//bskal pa bye ba mang por khyod kyis ston//brtson 'grus ma gong dam pa bsgoms pas na//brtson 'grus de spyad
48b3(mdo sde): pa yi 'bras bu des//sku ni ri rab bzhin du mdzes par grub//bskal pa bye ba mang por khyod kyis sngon//nyon mongs sbyang slad bsam gtan bsgom mdzad pas//bsam gtan de spyad pa yi
48b4(mdo sde): 'bras bu des//'gro ba dag la nyon mongs gnod mi 'gyur//bskal pa bye ba mang por khyod kyis ston//nyon mongs gcod pa'i shes rab bsgom mdzad pa'i//shes rab de spyad pa yi 'dras
48b5(mdo sde): bu des//'od gsal dam pa rnam par snang zhing mdzes//byams pa'i go mnabs nyon mongs 'joms mdzad cing //sems can kun la thugs rje ches byung ba//dgyes pa mchog brnyes
48b6(mdo sde): btang snyoms mchog ldan pa//bde gshegs tshangs gyur khyod la phyag 'tshal lo//shes rab sgron ma'i 'od dang gzis 'phags shing //gti mug skyon gyi mun pa kun sel ba//'dren pa
48b7(mdo sde): stong gsum dag na mig gyur pa'i//thub pa lam ston khyed lo phyag 'tshal lo//rdzu 'phrul rkang pa mngon shes mchog la mkhas//bden pa gzigs shing dam pa'i don bslabs pa//rgal
49a1(mdo sde): nas srog chags gzhan dag sgrol mdzad pa//bde gshegs grol gyur khyod la phyag 'tshal lo//thabs dang mngon shes dam pa kun la mkhas//'chi 'pho 'chi 'pha
49a2(mdo sde): med pa'i 'pho ba ston//'jig rten chos kyi rjes su mthun mdzad kyang //'jig rten gang du'ang chags pa khyod mi mnga'//gang dag khyod ni nyan tam ltar lhags pa//de dag thob pa dam pa
49a3(mdo sde): bsam mi khyab//khyod la chos nyid thos te gang dad cing //dga' ba yangs pa skyes pa smos ci 'tshal//dga' ldan gnas rnams kun ni mog mog gyur//dzam+bu'i gling du nyi ma mngon du
49a4(mdo sde): shar//srog chags bye ba khrag khrig bsam mi khyab//nyon mongs gnyid kyis log las sad par mdzad//deng ni pho brang 'byor cing rgyas gyur la//bya ba khrag khrig lha rnams lang long gyur//
49a5(mdo sde): lha yi bu mos sil ston sgra phyung bas//rgyal po'i khab na sgra snyan brag par 'gyur//bsod nams gzi brjid rdzogs shing los dge ba//bud med gzugs kyi mchog dang ldan gyur pa//de
49a6(mdo sde): yi sras gyur de ni de ltar 'byor//dpal gyis 'jig rten gsum ni dril gyis gnon//mi mchog 'byung ba de yi gzi brjid kyis//de phyi phyin chad pho brang dam pa 'dir//lus can rnams
49a7(mdo sde): la 'dod sdang 'thang rtsod mod//kun kyang byams pa'i sems kyis sri zhur bcas//'khor los sgyur ba'i rigs rgyal byung bas na//rgyal po'i rigs ni rab tu 'phel bar 'gyur//ser skya'i
49b1(mdo sde): grong 'di shin tu phun sum tshogs//rin chen mdzod kyis rab tu gang bar 'gyur//gnod sbyin srin po grul bum gsang ba pa//lha dang lha min tshogs rnams dbang por bcas//mi mchog srung ba gang dag
49b2(mdo sde): gnas pa rnams//de dag ring por mi thogs thar pa 'thob//gus dang sri zhu la ni gnas nas su//'dren pa khyod bstod bsod nams gang bsags pa//kun kyang byang chub tu ni yongs su bsngo//mi
49b3(mdo sde): yi dam pa khyod ltar myur du shog/bskyod par brtsams pa'i le'u ste lnga pa'o///dge slong dag dro ltar dgun 'das te/dpyid kyi dus la dpyid zla tha chung gi tshe/skar ma sa ga la bab
49b4(mdo sde): pa dus kyi dam pa la shing rnams kyi lo mo rgyas shing me tog mchog tu rgyas nas grang dro dang /mun pa dang /rdul med cing sa'i gzhi sngo gzhon nu skyes pas khebaso par gnas pa'i tshe/'jig rten gsum
49b5(mdo sde): gyi gtso bo 'jig rten gyis mchod pas dus la bab pa'i tshong pa rnam par gzigs nas//ches bco lnga'i zla ba nyal skar ma rgyal gyi dus su//yum gso sbyong blangs pa'i rum du/byang chub sems
49b6(mdo sde): dpa' dga' ldan gyi gnas dam pa nas 'phos te/dran zhing shes bzhin du/glang po'i phrug pu thal dkar mche ba drug dang ldan pa/mgo'i kha dog srin bu lham bu chu gsher gyis mdog lta
49b7(mdo sde): bu/mche ba la gser 'tshig pa/yan lag dang nying lag thams cad dang ldan pa/dbang po nyams pa med par byas te/me'i glo g.yas pa nas zhugs so//zhugs nas kyang glo g.yas pa logs
50a1(mdo sde): su brten te gnas kyi/glo g.yon pa logs su nam yang ma brtan to//lha mo sgyu 'phrul ma la bde ba na nyal ba des kyang rmi lam 'di lta bu mthong ngo //glang po kha ba dngul mdog mche
50a2(mdo sde): ba drug/rkang lag rab mdzes mgo bo dmar sdug pa//'gros bzang lus tshigs rdo rje bzhin brten pa//glang po mchog gcig khong du song snyam byed//des ni de 'dra'i bde ba brgya lam na'ang //
50a3(mdo sde): ma mthong ma thos myong bar ma gyur te//lus kyang bde zhing sems kyang bder gyur nas//bsam gtan mnyam par bzhag pa bzhin du gyur//de nas lha mo sgyu 'phrul rgyan dang gos lcug lhug
50a4(mdo sde): por gyon cing /thogs pa las lus dang sems bde bar gyur te/dga' ba dang /rangs pa dang /nyams bde ba thob nas/mal dam pa de las langs te bud med kyi tshogs kyis yongs
50a5(mdo sde): su bskor cing mdun du bdar nas khang bzang de'i steng nas babs te/shing mya ngan 'tshang gi nags tshal ga la ba der song nas/de mya ngan 'tshang gi nags tshal du bde bar 'dug ste/rgyal
50a6(mdo sde): po zas gtsang ma'i drung du pho nya btang nas/rgyal po gshags su gsol/lha mos khyod kyi zhal mthong bar bzhed do//zhes byas pa dang /rgyal po zas gtsang mas tshig de thos nas/rab tu
50a7(mdo sde): dga' bar gyur te/lus g.yos nas khri bzang po las langs te/blon po dang /grong rdal ba dang /'khor dang /gnyen po'i skye bo dag gis yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdar te/mya ngan
50b1(mdo sde): 'tshang gi nags tshal ga la bu der song ngo //song nas kyang bdag gi lus shin tu lci ba snyam byed nas/mya ngan 'tshang gi nags tshal du 'gro ma nus te/de mya ngan 'tshang gi nags tshal gyi sgor 'dug nas cung
50b2(mdo sde): zad cig bsams te/de'i tshe tshigs su bcud pa 'di smras so//bdag ni g.yul du dpa' ba'i phul phyin pa//dengad ltar lus lci bdag gis myong mi dran//bdag gi khyim du'ang 'gro bar deng ma nus//kye
50b3(mdo sde): ma 'di ci su la dri bar bya//gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha dag nam mkha'i dkyil na 'khod nas lus phyed mngon par sprul te/rgyal po zas gtsang mo la tshigs su bcad de smras pa//dka' thub brtul zhugs
50b4(mdo sde): yon tan ldan pa 'jig rten gsum gyis mchod//byams dang snying rje thob pas bsod nams ye shes dbang bskur ba'i//byang chub sems dpa' che ba dga' ldan gnas nas 'phos gyur te//rgyal po
50b5(mdo sde): khyod kyi sras gyur lha mo sgyu 'phrul mngal du zhugs//de tshe rang gi mgo cogs sor bcu thal mo sbyar byas te//rgyal po rim gror bya bar ldan gyur de yi nang du zhugs//nga rgyal dregs pa mod pas lha mo sku
50b6(mdo sde): 'phrul ngor bltas te//ngas ni khyod la ci bya ci sbar khyod kyis nga la smos//lha mos smras pa/kho ba dngul gyi mdog 'dra nyi zla'i 'od las 'phags pa ste//rkang lag lags shing rab 'byes mche ba drug
50b7(mdo sde): ldan che ba nyid//glang po'i dam pa rdo rje bzhin du tshogs brtan gzugs bzang ba//bdag gi rum du zhugs kyis de yi lo rgyus gsan par gsol//stong gsum khams 'di mdzes par rab rib ma
51a1(mdo sde): mchis bdag gis mthong //bdag ni nyal zhing mchis na lha rnams bye bas rab tu bstod//'on kyang bdag la khro zhing 'tshig dang zhe sdang rmongs ma mchis//zhi ba'i sems su gyur
51a2(mdo sde): cing bsam gtan bde dang ldan snyam bgyid//bdag gi rmi lam 'di ni rigs la dgo 'am dngo 'am ci//bdag gi rmi lam 'di ni yang dag ldan par lung ston pa//rig byed rmi lam gzung la
51a3(mdo sde): mkhas shing gza' yi cho ga mkhan//rgyal po myur du bram ze 'dir ni legs par dgug tu gsol//de skad tshig thos rgyal pos de yi dus kyi skad cig la//bram ze rigs byed bstan bcos
51a4(mdo sde): gzhung la shin tu mkhas pa gnyer//sgyu 'phrul bram ze rnams kyi mdun du 'dug nas 'di skad smras//kho mos rmi lam 'di 'dra mthong na de yi lo rgyas gson//bram ze rnams kyis smras pa/
51a5(mdo sde): lha mo bka' stsal du gsol/khyod kyis rmi lam ci 'dra ba zhig gzigs/thos nas kyang dpyad par bgyi'o//lha mos smras pa/kha ba dngul gyi mdog 'dra nyi zla'i 'od las 'phags pa ste//rkang lag
51a6(mdo sde): legs shing rab 'byes mche ba drug ldan che ba nyid//glang po dam pa rdo rje bzhin du tshigs brtan gzugs bzang ba//bdag gi rum du zhugs pa de yi lo rgyus mnyan par gyis//de skad tshig
51a7(mdo sde): thos nas ni bram ze rnams kyis 'di skad smras//rigs la dngo ba ma mchis dgyes pa rgya chen brnyes par gyur//khyod la sras mnga' mtshan gyis yan lag brgyan pa skye bar 'gyur//rgyal po'i
51b1(mdo sde): rigs su rigs ldan 'khor los sgyur ba che ba nyid//gal te 'dod pa dag dang rgyal srid pho brang spangs gyur te//'jig rten kun la thugs brtse chags med rab tu byung gyur na//de ni 'jig rten gsum na
51b2(mdo sde): sbyin gnas sangs rgyas 'gyur ba ste//bdud rtsi mchog gi ro yis 'jig rten thams cad tshim mdzad 'gyur//de skad tshig snyan lung bstan te//rgyal po pho brang zan zos nas//bya dga' byin pa
51b3(mdo sde): blangs nas su//bram ze de dag phyir dong ngo //dge slong dag de ltar rgyal po zas gtsang mas bram ze mtshan dang ltas shes shing rnam par 'byed pa dang /rmi lam gyi gzhung shes pa dag las de skad
51b4(mdo sde): kyi tshig thos nas/tshim zhing mgu ste/yi rangs la/rab tu dga' zhing dga' ba dang /yid bde ba skyes nas/bram ze de dag bza' ba dang btung ba dang /myang ba mang po nyams su bsod pas
51b5(mdo sde): tshim ning ngoms par byas nas/bya dga' byin te bkye'o//de nyid kyi tshe grong khyer chen po ser skya'i gnas kyi grong khyer chen po de'i sgo bzhin/grong khyer gyi bzhi mdo dang sum mdo thams cad du sbyin pa byin
51b6(mdo sde): te/ji tsam du byang chub sems dpa' la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir/zas 'dod pa rnams la ni zas/skom 'dod pa rnams la ni skom/gos 'dod pa rnams la ni gos/bzhon pa 'dod pa rnams lo
51b7(mdo sde): ni bzhon pa/spos 'dod pa rnams la ni spos/phreng ba 'dod pa rnams la ni phreng ba/byug pa 'dod pa rnams la ni byug pa/mal cha 'dod pa rnams la ni mal cha/gnas 'dod pa rnams la
52a1(mdo sde): ni gnas/'tsho ba 'dod pa rnams la ni 'tsho ba byin no//dge slong dag dri nas rgyal po zas gtsang ma 'di snyam du sems te/lha mo sgyu 'phrul 'di khyim gang na 'dug na bde zhing nyon mongs
52a2(mdo sde): pa med par 'dug par 'gyur snyam pa dang /de nas skad cig de nyid la rgyal po chen po bzhi rgyal po zas gtsang ma'i drung du 'ongs te 'di skad ces smras so//lha thugs las su ma mdzad par btang snyoms
52a3(mdo sde): su bde bar bzhugs shig/bdag cag gis byang chub sems dpa'i pho brang bsham mo//de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin rgyal po zas gtsang ma'i gan du 'ongs te 'di skad ces smras so//skyong ba'i
52a4(mdo sde): gzhal med khang rnams ngan//sum cu rtsa gsum pa yi bzang //byang chub sems dpa'i pho brang ni//rnam par rgyal tsam bdag gis dbul//de nas lha'i bu rab 'thab bral rgyal po zas gtsang
52a5(mdo sde): ma'i gan du 'ongs te 'di skad ces smras so//kho bo'i khang khyim mthong gyur nas//brgya byin bye ba ngo mtshar gyur//'thab bral rab kyi dpal ldan khang //rgyal ba'i sras la bdag 'bul lo//de nas
52a6(mdo sde): lha'i bu yongs su dga' ldan rgyal po zas gtsang ma'i gan du 'ongs te 'di skad ces smras so//grags pa tshe mnga' sngon chad ni//dga' ldan gang du bzhugs gyur pa//pho brang dam pa dgyes pa
52a7(mdo sde): de/rgyal ba'i sras la bdag 'bul lo//de nas lha'i bu rab 'phrul dga' rgyal po zas gtsang ma'i gan du 'ongs te/'di skad ces smras so//dpal ldan yid las grub pa'i khang //de ni rin
52b1(mdo sde): chen rang bzhin te//byang chub sems dpa' mchod don du//rgyal po bdag gis dbul bar bgyis//de nas lha'i bu gzhan 'phrul dbang byed rgyal po zas gtsang ma'i gan du 'ongs te 'di skad ces smras
52b2(mdo sde): so//'dod pa'i khams gnas ji snyed pa//gzhal med khang mdzes gang yod pa//bdag gi gzhal med khang drung na//'od dang mdog kyang stor bar snang //de bas dpal ldan bdag gis dbul//
52b3(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' mchod pa'i phyir//rin chen rang bzhin pho brang bzang //de ni rgyal po blang bar gyis//lha yi me tog rab bkang ste//lha yi spos kyi ngad ldang ba'i//pho brang yangs pa bdag gis
52b4(mdo sde): dbul//der ni lha mo bzhugs par gyis//dge slong dag de ltar 'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha'i dbang po thams cad kyis byang chub sems dpa' la mchod pa'i phyir ser sna'i gnas kyi grong khyer chen po dam
52b5(mdo sde): pa der rang rang gi khyim phul bar gyur to//rgyal po zas gtsang mas kyang mi'i las ni 'das kyi lha yir ni ma gyur pa bshams par gyur te/de la byang chub sems dpas bkod pa chen po'i ting nge 'dzin gyi
52b6(mdo sde): mthus khyim de dag thams cad du lha mo sgyu 'phrul mngon par bstan to//byang chub sems dpa' lha mo sgyu 'phrul gyi rum na 'dug pa'i tshe/glo g.yas phyogs logs su skyil mo drung bcas te gnas
52b7(mdo sde): par gyur to//lha'i dbang po de dag thams cad kyang so so nas bdag nyid kyi khyim na byang chub sems dpa'i ma 'dug gi gzhan ma yin no zhes de ltar shes par gyur to//de la 'di skad ces bya ste/
53a1(mdo sde): ting 'dzin bkod pa che la gnas gyur te//sprul pa bsam gyis mi khyab sprul byas nas//lha rnams thams cad bsam pa rdzogs par byas//rgyal po'ang de ltar yid bzhin bsam
53a2(mdo sde): pa grub/de nas 'khor de'i nang nas lha'i bu kha cig 'di snyam du sems te/rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha gang yin pa de dag kyang mi'i lus kyi dri bro na skyo zhing 'byol na/de ma yin pa'i lha gzhan sum
53a3(mdo sde): cu rtsa gsum mam/'thab bral lam/dga' ldan gyi lha'i bu dag lta smos kyang ci dgos na/ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' gtsang zhing dri nga ba dang bral ba/'jig rten thams cad las mngon par
53a4(mdo sde): 'phags pa/sems can rin po che dga' ldan gyi lha'i ris nas 'phos te/yum gyi lhums mi'i lus dri mi zhim par bzhugs par gyur snyam pa dang /de nas sangs rgyas kyi mthus tshe dang ldan pa
53a5(mdo sde): kun dga' bos/bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das ji tsam du bud med kyi lus ni smad pa lags pa dang /'dod chags la spyod ces bgyi ba'i bar du de bzhin
53a6(mdo sde): gshegs pas gsungs pa ngo mtshar che na/bcom ldan 'das de bas kyang 'jig rten thams cad las mngon par 'phags pa/sngon byang chub sems dpar gyur pa/'di ltar dga' ldan gyis
53a7(mdo sde): lha'i ris nas 'phos te/yum gyi lhums mi'i lus su blo g.yas phyogs su brten te bzhugs so//zhes bgyi ba 'di ni rab tu'ang ngo mtshar cha ste/bcom ldan 'das/sngon bcom ldan 'das
53b1(mdo sde): kyis de ltar mdzad do zhes de skad du smra bar ni bdag la slob ma mchis so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/kun dga' bo khyod byang chub sems dpa'i yongs su spyad pa rin po che bkod pa zhes bya ba
53b2(mdo sde): gang byang chub sems dpa' ma'i rum na gnas pa'i yongs su spyad par gyur pa mthong bar 'dod dam/gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das de'i dus nid lags so//bde bar gshegs pa de'i dus ni da lags
53b3(mdo sde): te/de bzhin gshegs pas byang chub sems dpa'i yongs su spyad pa de bstan te mthong na gro bdaga'a'o//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rnam pa de lta bu'i mtshan ma mdzad de/des mi mdzad kyi bdag po
53b4(mdo sde): tshangs pa/tshangs pa 'bum phrag drug cu rtsa brgyad dang lhan cig tshangs pa'i 'jig rten nas mi snang bar gyur te/bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar phyin nas/des bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos
53b5(mdo sde): phyag 'tshal te/bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas thal mo sbyar te/bcom ldan 'das la 'dud cing phyogs gcig tu 'dug go//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis mkhyen bzhin du
53b6(mdo sde): mo mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa la bka' stsal pa/tshangs pa khyod kyis sngon nga byang chub sems dpar gyur cing ma'i ru me na zla ba bcur 'dug 'dug pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i yongs su spyad pa blangs sam/
53b7(mdo sde): gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das de de lta lags so//bde bar gshegs pa de de lags so//bka' stsal pa/tshangs pa da de ga la yod ston cig/gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das de ni tshangs pa'i
54a1(mdo sde): 'jig rten na mchis so//bka' stsal pa/tshangs pa de'i phyir zla ba bcu pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i yongs su spyad pa de 'dir khyod kyis ston cig dang /ji tsam du 'dus byas pa
54a2(mdo sde): shes par 'gyur ro//de nas mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pas/tshangs pa dag la 'di skad ces smras so//kho bos byang chub sems dpa'i yongs su spyad pa rin po che bkod pa de blang gis de'i
54a3(mdo sde): bar du khyed 'khod cig/de nas mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa/bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/bcom ldan 'das kyi sman snga nas mi snang bar gyur nas skad cig de nyid
54a4(mdo sde): la tshangs pa'i 'jig rten du phyin to//de nas mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pas lha'i bu tshangs pa bzang po la 'di skad ces smras so//grogs po khyod song la tshangs pa'i 'jig rten 'di man chad sum
54a5(mdo sde): cu rtsa gsum gyi gnas yan chad du sgra sgrogs te/byang chub sems dpa'i yongs su spyad pa rin po che bkod pa bdag cag gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan sngar bkur na khyod kyi nang nas mthong
54a6(mdo sde): bar su dga' ba myur du shog cig ces sgras go bar gyis shig/de nas mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pas/lha bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi dang lhan cig tu byang chub sems
54a7(mdo sde): dpa'i yongs su spyad pa rin po che bkod pa blangs te/tshangs pa'i gzhal med khang chen po dpag tshad sum brgya pa'i steng du bzhag nas/lha bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du mas kun nas bskor te/
54b1(mdo sde): dzam+bu'i gling du phab bo//de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis zhabs 'bring du 'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha'i bu 'dus pa chen por gyur te/byang chub sems dpa'i yongs su spyad pa rin po che bkod pa de'ang lha'i gos
54b2(mdo sde): dang /lha'i phreng ba dang /lha'i spos dang /lha'i me tog dang /lha'i rol mo'i dbyangs sgra dang /lha'i langs spyod rnams kyis mngon par 'dus byas par gyur cing lha dbang che bar grags pa dag gis
54b3(mdo sde): yongs su bskor bar gyur pa ni 'di tsam ste/lha'i dbang po brgya byin rgya mtsho chen po'i dbus su 'dug nas rgyang ring po nas gdong thal mos bskyabs te mgo byol nas bltas kyang mthong bar mi nus so//
54b4(mdo sde): de ci'i phyir zhe na/lha'i nang na tshangs pa bdag ni mthu che ba ste/sum cu rtsa gsum dang /'thab bral dang /dga' ldan dang /'phrul dga'o dang /gzhon 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha dag kyang de dag gi
54b5(mdo sde): drung na dma' ba yin na/lha'i dbang po brgya byin lta smos kyang ci dgos/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe/lha'i rol mo'i dbyangs sgra'i sgra de dag zhi bar mdzad do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/de thos pa
54b6(mdo sde): tsam gyis dzAm+bu'i gling gi mi rnams mo myo bor 'gyur du 'ong ba'i phyir ro//de nas rgyal po chen po bzhi lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyi drung du lhags nas 'di skad ces smras so//lha'i dbang po byang chub
54b7(mdo sde): sems dpa'i yongs su spyad pa rin po che bkod pa 'di bdag cag gis mthong bar mi nus na ji ltar bgyi/des de dag la smras pa/grogs po dag kho bos kyang ji ltar bya/kho bo nyid kyis kyang
55a1(mdo sde): mthong bar ma nus so//grogs po dag 'on kyang de ni nam bcom ldan 'das kyis spyan sngar phul ba de'i tshe mthong grang ngo //de dag gis smras pa/lha'i dbang po de bas na ci nas kyang myur
55a2(mdo sde): du mthong bar 'gyur ba de ltar mdzad du gsol/smras pa/grogs po dag lha'i bu mngon par 'phags pa mngon par 'phags pa de dag bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar phyin te/dga' bar bya ba'i
55a3(mdo sde): tshig brjod par gyur gyi bar du sdod cig/de nas de dag phyogs gcig tu 'khod de mgo byol nas bcom ldan 'das logs su lta zhing 'khod par gyur to//de nas mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa
55a4(mdo sde): lha bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi po de dag dang lhan cig tu byang chub sems dpa'i yongs su spyad par bya ba rin po che bkod pa de khyer te/de bzhin gshegs pa ga la ba der phul
55a5(mdo sde): lo//byang chub sems dpa'i yongs su spyad pa rin po che bkod pa de ni gzugs bzang ba mdzes pa blta na sdug pa gru bzhi lham pa/ka ba bzhi zug pa/steng khang pa brtsegs pas legs par
55a6(mdo sde): brgyan pa ste/de'i tshad ni phang du 'di lta ste/dper na byis pa btsas nas zla ba drug lon pa tsam mo//khang pa brtsegs pa de'i nang du khri bshams pa ni 'di lta ste/dper na byis pa bcas
55a7(mdo sde): nas zla ba drug lon pa 'dug pa'i stegs bu tsam mo//byang chub sems dpa'i yongs su spyad par bya ba rin po che bkod pa de yi kha dog dang dbyibs ni 'di lta bu ste/lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig
55b1(mdo sde): rten na de'i dbyibs dang kha dog 'dra ba gang yang med do//lha rnams kyis de mthong na'ang mig 'khrugs shing ngo mtshar du 'gyur ro//de de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan sngar bzhag na lam me/lhan ne//ltung nge
55b2(mdo sde): ste/dngape ron mgar ba mkhas pas shin tu gzhu ste/legs par sbyangs nas/dri ma'i skyon med par byas pa'i gser bzhin du khang pa brtsegs pa de rnam par mdzes so//byang chub sems
55b3(mdo sde): dpa'i yongs su spyad pa de'i nang du khri bshams pa ni/byang chub sems dpa'i dung mgrin mo gtogs pa lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten na de'i dbyibs dang /kha dog 'dra ba gang yang med do//tshangs
55b4(mdo sde): pa chen pos gos bgos pa de'ang byang chub sems dpa'i khri do'i drung na mdzes par mi snang ste/'di lta ste dper na/rlung dang char gyis btab pa'i la ba nag po bzhin no//khang pa brtsegs pa de ni
55b5(mdo sde): tsan+dan sbrul gyi snying po las byas po ste/de'i phye ma zho gcig la'ang stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams kyis rin du mi chog go//khang pa brtsegs pa de ni tsan+dan sbrul gyi snying po de lta bus kun nas bskor ba
55b6(mdo sde): ste/khang pa brtsegs pa de dang 'dra ba gnyis pa gcig kyang khang pa brtsegs pa dang po de'i nang na ma chags ma reg par 'dug go/khang pa brtsegs pa de kho na dang 'dra ba gsum pa gcig kyang
55b7(mdo sde): khang pa brtsegs pa gnyis pa de'i nang na ma rig ma chags par 'dug go/spos kyi khang pa brtsegs pa gsum pa de'i nang du khri de bzhag ste gdan bting ngo //tsan+dan sbrul gyi snying po de'i kha dog
56a1(mdo sde): ni rnam pa 'di lta bu ste/dper na bai DUr+ya sngon po rigs dam pa dang ldan pa bzhin no//spos kyi khang pa brtsegs pa de'i 'khor na me tog lha'i las 'dres pa gang ji snyed cig
56a2(mdo sde): yod pa de dag thams cad kyang ma bskyed par byang chub sems dpa'i sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba'i rnam par smin pas khang pa brtsegs pa der skye'o//byang chub sems dpa'i yongs su spyad pa rin po
56a3(mdo sde): che bkod pa de ni rdo rje'i rang bzhin te/sra zhing brtan la mi shigs pa ste/ka tsa lin+da'i gos ltar reg na bde ba'o//'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha rnams kyi gnas bkod pa gang ji snyed yod pa de dag
56a4(mdo sde): thams cad kyang byang chub sems dpa'i yongs su spyad pa rin po che bkod pa der kun tu snang ngo //gang gi nub mo byang chub sems dpa' ma'i rum du 'jug pa de yi nub mo 'ag gi chu'i phung po
56a5(mdo sde): nas bzung ste/sa chen po'i rngams dpag tshad 'bum phrag drug cu rtsa brgyad brtol te pad+ma byung bas tshangs pa'i 'jig rten gyi bar du mngon par 'phags so//pad+ma de ni kha lo sgyur ba skyes bu'i
56a6(mdo sde): dam pa dang /tshangs pa chen po brgya phrag bcu'i stobs la dbang bas mthong du zad kyi gzhan sus kyang mthong ba med do//stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na nyid khu
56a7(mdo sde): dang /snying po dang /bcud ji snyed yod pa de dag thams cad pad+ma chen po de la zil dngar gyi thigs par chags te/'dug nas de tshangs pa chen pos bai DUr+ya'i snod bzang pos blangs shing
56b1(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' la phul nas byang chub sems dpas kyang de blangs te tshangs pa chen po la snying brtse ba'i phyir 'thungs par gyur to//nying khu'i thigs pa de 'thungs na byang chub sems dpa' srid pa tha
56b2(mdo sde): ma pa byang chub sems dpa'i sa thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa ma gtogs par de yang dag par bde bar zhu nus pa sems can gyi khams na sems can de lta bu de gang yang med do//las gang gi
56b3(mdo sde): rnam par smin pas snying khu'i thigs pa de lta bu byang chub sems dpa' la yod par gyur ce na/byang chub sems dpas sngon yun ring por byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa spyad pa'i tshe/sems can
56b4(mdo sde): nad pa dag la sman byin pa dang /sems can bsam pa la brten pa rnams kyi bsam pa yongs su bskang ba dang /skyabs su 'ongs pa rnams yongs su ma btang ba dang /rtag par me tog gi phud
56b5(mdo sde): dang /'bras bu'i phud dang /ro'i phud de bzhin gshegs pa rnams dang /de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten rnams dang /de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyan thos kyi dge 'dun rnams dang /pha
56b6(mdo sde): dang me la phul zhing phyis bdag nyid yongs su spyod spyod pas las de'i rnam par smin pas tshangs pa chen po zil dngar gyi thigs pa de byang chub sems dpa' la 'bul lo//khang pa brtsegs pa der
56b7(mdo sde): gnas kyi khyad par dga' ba dang /rtsed mo dang /phreng ba brgyus pa dang ldan pa 'phags pa 'phags pa ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad kyang byang chub sems dpa'i sngon gyi las kyi rnam
57a1(mdo sde): par smin pas der byung bar snang ngo //byang chub sems dnga'i yongs su spyad pa rin po che bkod pa der gos stong phrag brgya'i rgyun ces bya ba 'phrugs gcig byung ste/de'i dbyung
57a2(mdo sde): ba ni byang chub sems dpa' srid pa tha ma pa mi gtogs par sems can gyi ris na sems can de lta bu de gang yang med do//gzugs dang /sgra dang /dri dang /ro dang /reg mchog tu bya ba dam
57a3(mdo sde): pa gang ji skad cig yod pa de dag thams cad kyang khang pa brtsegs pa de na med pa gang yang med do///'phags pa rgya cher rol pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo//bam po
57a4(mdo sde): bzhi pa//yongs su spyad par bya ba khang pa brtsegs pa de ni 'di ltar phyi nang shin tu grub pa/'di ltar shin tu yongs su rdzogs pa ste/'di lta ste dper na/yul ka ling+ka nas byung ba'i dar
57a5(mdo sde): ltar reg na bde ba'o//de'ang 'ol phyir bstan par zad kyi/de la dpe med do//byang chub sems dpa'i sngon gyi smon lam gyis 'di ni bsam pas 'grub ste/gdon mi za bar byang chub sems
57a6(mdo sde): dpa' sems dpa' chen po me'i 'jig rten du skye ba dang /mngon par byung nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/chos kyi 'khor lo bskor
57a7(mdo sde): ba dang /ma gang gi rum du skye bar 'gyur ba de'i rum g.yas par khang pa brtsegs pa rin po che bkod pa dam pa sngar mngon par 'grub cing /phyis byang chub sems dpa' dga' ldan nas
57b1(mdo sde): 'phos te khang pa brtsegs pa der skyil krung bcas nas 'dug par 'byung ba dang /byang chub sems dpa' srid pa tha ma pa'i lus nur nur po dang /mer mer po dang /lngar lngar po dang /reng ring por 'gyur
57b2(mdo sde): ba med cing /yan lag dang /nying lag dang /mtshan thams cad phun sum tshogs par 'dug bzhin du 'byung la/lha mo sgyu 'phrul gyi rmi lam du glang po chen po 'ongs par mthong ba 'di ni chos
57b3(mdo sde): nyid do//de de ltar 'dug pa la lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang /rgyal po chen po bzhi dang /gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po nyi shu rtsa brgyad dang /gang las lagran rdo rje skyes pa'i gnod sbyin gyi rigs
57b4(mdo sde): gsang ba pa zhes bya ba de dag byang chub sems dpa' ma'i rum du zhugs par shes nas rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par phyi bzhin 'brang bar gyur to//byang chub sems dpa' la rim gro byed pa'i lha mo
57b5(mdo sde): bzhi yod de/u khu li zhes bya ba dang /mu khu li zhes bya ba dang /rgyal mtshan ldan pa zhes bya ba dang /'od dang ldan pa zhes bya ba ste/bzhi po de dag kyang byang chub sems dpa'i ma'i rum du zhugs
57b6(mdo sde): par shes nas rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par srung ngo //lha'i dbang po brgya byin yang lha'i bu lnga brgya tsam dang lhan cig byang chub sems dpa' ma'i rum du zhugs pa shes nas rtag tu rgyun mi 'tshed
57b7(mdo sde): par phyi bzhin 'brang bar gyur to//byang chub sems dpa' ma'i rum du zhugs pa'i lus ni rnam pa 'di lta bur gyur te/dper na mtshan mo mun pa shin tu gnag pa'i nang na ri'i spo la me'i phung
58a1(mdo sde): po chen po 'dug pa ni dpag tshad gcig nas kyang snang ngo //dpag tshad lnga'i bar nas kyang snang ngo //de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' ma'i rum du zhugs pa'i lus mngon par grub
58a2(mdo sde): pa'ang de lta bur gyur te/'od gsal zhing gzugs bzang la mdzes shing blta na sdug par gyur pa de/khang pa brtsegs pa de'i nang du skyil mo krung du 'dug na gser gyi sa la sbram rigs dang ldan
58a3(mdo sde): pa rin po che bai DUr+yas brgyan pa ltar shin tu mdzes par gyur to//byang chub sems dpa'i mas kyang byang chub sems dpa' rum na 'dug pa mthong bar gyur to//'di lta ste dper na sprin gyi tshogs
58a4(mdo sde): chen po'i nang nas glog byung ba ni snang ba chen po bskyed do//de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' ma'i rum na 'dug pa'ang dpal dang /gzi brjid dang /kha dog gis rin po che'i khang pa brtsegs pa
58a5(mdo sde): dang po de snang bar byed do//snang bar byas nas spos kyi khang pa brtsegs pa gnyis pa snang bar byed do//spos kyi khang pa brtsegs pa gnyis pa snang bar byas nas/spos kyi khang pa brtsegs pa
58a6(mdo sde): gsum pa snang bar byed do//spos kyi khang pa brtsegs pa gsum pa snang bar byas nas ma'i lus thams cad snang bar byed do//de snang bar byas nas de stan gang la 'dug pa de snang bar byed do//
58a7(mdo sde): de snang bar byas nas khyim thams cad snang bar byed do//khyim thams cad snang bar byas nas 'od 'phro ba khyim gyi steng du byung ste/shar phyogs snang bar byed do//de bzhin du lho phyogs dang /
58b1(mdo sde): nub phyogs dang /byang phyogs dang /'og dang /steng dang /phyogs bcu kun tu rgyang grags tsam du phyogs re rer yang byang chub sems dpa' ma'i rum na 'dug pa'i dpal dang gzi brjid dang kha dog gis
58b2(mdo sde): snang bar byas par gyur to//dge slong dag de ltar byang chub sems dpa' de blta ba dang /de la phyag bya ba dang /bsnyen bkur bya ba dang chos mnyan pa'i phyir rgyal po chen po bzhi dang /gnod sbyin gyi
58b3(mdo sde): sde dpon chen po nyi shu rtsa brgyad gnod sbyin lnga brgya tsom dag dang lhan cig tu snga dro'i dus kyi tshe 'ongs te/de'i tshe byang chub sems dpas de dag 'ongs par rig nas lag pa g.yas pa brkyang ste mdzub mo
58b4(mdo sde): bsgreng nas stan ston to//'jig rten skyong ba la sogs pa de dag kyang ji ltar bting ba'i stan la 'khod par gyur te/de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' ma'i rum na 'dug bzhin du/skyes zin pa'i
58b5(mdo sde): gzugs dang 'dra bar lag pa bskyod cing 'deg la/rnam par bskyod cing bzhog pa mthong nas/de dag dga' mgu zhing nyams bde ba thob ste/byang chub sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal bar gyur to//
58b6(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpas kyang de dag de ltar 'khod pa mthong nas/chos kyi gtam gyis yang dag par ston/yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug/yang dag par gzang bstod/yang dag par dga' bar byed
58b7(mdo sde): do//gang gi tshe de dag 'dong bar 'dod par gyur pa de'i tshe'ang /byang chub sems dpas de dag gi sems sems kyis rnam par shes nas lag pa g.yas pa brkyang ste/de dag 'dod pa'i brda ston
59a1(mdo sde): to//de ltar lag pa brkyang ste/'dong ba'i brda bstan nas/phyir bskum par byed de/ma la gnod pa med do//de'i tshe rgyal po chen po bzhi dag kyang 'di snyam du bdag cag ni byang chub
59a2(mdo sde): sems dpas kyang 'dong bar gnang ngo snyam sems shing /de dag byang chub sems dpa' dang /byang chub sems dpa'i ma la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas 'dong bar gyur to//de ltar byang
59a3(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' nub mo mi nyal nas lag pa g.yas pa brkyang zhing brkyang nas kyang bskum pa dang /bskum nas kyang dran zhing shes bzhin du lag pa de 'jog pa'i rgyu ni de yin no/rkyen ni de yin no//
59a4(mdo sde): gzhan yang gang gi tshe skyes pa 'am/bud med dam/khye'u 'am/bu mo su'ang rung ste/byang chub sems dpa' blta ba'i phyir 'ongs pa de'i tshe/thog mar ni byang chub sems dpa' dga' bar bya ba
59a5(mdo sde): smra'o//de'i 'og tu byang chub sems dpa'i ma smra'o//dge slong dag de ltar byang chub sems dpa' ma'i rum na 'dug pa'i tshe/sngar dga' bar bya ba smra ba la mkhas par gyur te/lha 'am/klu 'am/
59a6(mdo sde): gnod sbyin nam/mi 'am/mi ma yin pa su'ang rung byang chub sems dpa' la sngon du dga' bar bya ba'i tshig smra bar nus pa med do//byang chub sems dpa' nyid thog mar dga' bar bya ba
59a7(mdo sde): smra zhing de'i 'og tu byang chub sems dpa'i ma dga' bar bya ba smra'o//de nas snga dro'i dus zad de/nyi ma dgung la bab nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang /sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha'i bu mngon par
59b1(mdo sde): 'phags pa/mngon par 'phags pa dag byang chub sems dpa' blta ba dang /de la bsnyen bkur bya ba dang /chos mnyan pa'i phyir 'ong ba dang /byang chub sems dpas de dag rgyang ring po nas 'ong ba mthong nas/
59b2(mdo sde): gser gyi mdog tu 'dug pa'i lag pa g.yas pa brkyang ste/lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang /sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha dag dga' bar byed cing mdzub mo brkyang ste/stan ston to//dge slong dag de'i tshe'ang lha'i
59b3(mdo sde): dbang po brgya byin gyis byang chub sems dpa' la phyir bzlog ma nus nas ji ltar bting ba'i stan de dag la lha'i dbang po brgya byin+da dang /de ma yin pa'i lha'i bu gzhan dag kyang 'khod par gyur to//byang chub
59b4(mdo sde): sems dpas de ltar 'khod par rig nas chos kyi gtam gyis yang dag par ston//yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug/yang dag par gzang bstod//yang dag par dga' bar byed do//byang chub sems
59b5(mdo sde): dpas lag pa gang du brkyang ba de logs su byang chub sems dpa'i ma'ang lta bar gyur to//des na lha de dag kyang 'di snyam du bdag cag ni byang chub sems dpa' dang dga' bar bya ba smra'o snyam mo//de dag
59b6(mdo sde): re re zhing yang 'di snyam du byang chub sems dpa' ni bdag 'ba' zhig la smra ste/bdag 'ba' zhig la dga' bar bya ba smra'o snyam mo//khang pa brtsegs pa der lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang /sum cu rtsa
59b7(mdo sde): gsum pa'i lha de dag gi gzugs brnyan snang bar gyur to//ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' ma'i rum na gnas pa'i longs spyod yongs su dag par gyur pa de lta bu ni gzhan dag na med do//dge slong
60a1(mdo sde): dag gang gi tshe lha'i dang ba brgya byin dang /de ma yin pa'i rtswa'i bu gzhan dag 'dong bar 'dod par gyur pa de'i tshe'ang byung chub sems dpas de dag gi sems kyi rtog pa sems kyis
60a2(mdo sde): yongs su shes nas/lag pa g.yas pa brkyang ste de dag 'dod pa'i brda ston to//brda bstan nas phyir bskum pa byas te/dran zhing shes bzhin du lag pa bzhag kyang ma la gnod pa med do//
60a3(mdo sde): de'i tshe lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang /de ma yin pa'i lha'i bu sum cu rtsa gsum pa dag kyang 'di snyam du bdag cag ni byang chub sems dpas kyang 'dod par gnang ngo snyam du sems shing /de dag kyang
60a4(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' dang /byang chub sems dpa'i ma la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas dong bar gyur to//dge slong dag nyi ma phyed kyi dus 'das nas phyi dro'i dus la bab pa dang /mi mdzad
60a5(mdo sde): kyi bdag po chings pa lha'i bu brgya stong du mas yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdar te/lha yul pa'i snying khu'i thigs pa de khyer nas byang chub sems dpa' ga la ba der/byang chub sems dpa'
60a6(mdo sde): de blta ba dang /de la phyag bya ba dang /bsnyen bkur bya ba dang /chos mnyan pa'i phyir 'ong bar gyur to//dge slong dag byang chub sems dpas mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa 'khor dang bcas
60a7(mdo sde): te 'ongs par shes nas/byang chub sems dpas yong gser gyi mdog tu 'dug pa'i lag pa g.yos pa brkyang ste/mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa dang /tshangs ris kyi lha'i bu de dag la dga'
60b1(mdo sde): bar bya ba smras te/mdzub mo brkyang nas stan ston to//dge slong dag mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa des kyang byang chub sems dpa'i bka' las bzlog par ma nus nas/ji ltar bting ba'i stan de dag la mi
60b2(mdo sde): mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa dang tshangs ris kyi lha'i bu gzhan dag kyang 'khod par gyur to//byang chub sems dpas de ltar 'khod par rig nas chos kyi gtam gyis yang dag par ston/yang dag par
60b3(mdo sde): 'dzin du 'jug/yang dag par gzeng bstod/yang dag par dga' bar byed do//byang chub sems dpas lag pa gang du brkyang ba de logs su lha mo sgyu 'phrul yang lta bar gyur to//de ltar na lha de
60b4(mdo sde): drag kyang bdag cag ni byang chub sems dpa' dang dga' bar bya ba'i gtam byed do//snyom ste lha'i bu de dag re re zhing yang 'di snyam du byang chub sems dpa' ni bdag 'dra'o zhig la smras te/bdag 'ba'
60b5(mdo sde): zhig la dga' ba'i gtam byed do snyam mo//dge slong dag gang gi tshe/mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa dang /tshangs ris kyi lha'i bu de dag 'dong bar 'dod par gyur pa de'i tshe'ang byang chub sems dpas
60b6(mdo sde): de dag gi sems kyi rtog po sems kyis yongs su shes nas lag pa g.yas pa brkyang ste/de dag 'dod du'i brda ston to//de ltar 'dong ba'i brda bstan nas phyir bskum pa byas te/dran zhing shes
60b7(mdo sde): bzhin du lag pa bzhag kyang ma la gnod nga med do//de'i tshe mi mdzad kyi bdag po tshangs pa dang /tshangs ris kyi lha de dag kyang 'di snyam du bdag cag ni byang chub sems dpas kyang 'dong bar gnang ngo snyam
61a1(mdo sde): du sems shing de dag byang chub sems dpa' dang /byang chub sems dpa'i mal lan gsum bskor ba byas nas 'dod par gyur to//byang chub sems dpa' yang dran zhing shes
61a2(mdo sde): bzhin du lag pa 'jog go//dge slong dag shar phyogs dang /lho phyogs dang /nub phyogs dang /byang phyogs dang /'og dang /steng dang /phyogs bcu kun nas kyang byang chub sems dpa'
61a3(mdo sde): brgya stong mang po byang chub sems dpa' de blta ba dang /de la phyag bya ba dang /bsnyen bkur bya ba dang /chos mnyan pa dang /chos yang dag par brjod par bya ba'i phyir 'ong bar gyur te/de dag de
61a4(mdo sde): ltar 'ongs pa dang /byang chub sems dpas lus las 'od bkye ste/'od kyi bkod pa de dgo seng ge'i khrir sprul nas/de ltar sprul pa'i khri de dag la byang chub sems dpa' de dag 'khor du bcug
61a5(mdo sde): ste/de dag de ltar 'khod par shes nas 'di lta ste theg pa chen po 'di nyid rgya cher rnam par dbye ba'i don du dris te brtags kyang bskal pa mnyam po'i lha rnams ma gtogs par gzhan sus kyang
61a6(mdo sde): dengag ma mthong ste/dge slong dag de ltar byang chub sems dpas nub mo mi nyal nas lus las 'od bkye ba'i rgyu ni de yin no//rkyen ni de yin no//dge slong dag lha mo sgyu 'phrul gyis kyang byang
61a7(mdo sde): chung sems dpa' ma'i rum na 'dug pa'i tshe/lus lci bar mtshor te/gzhan du na yang ba dang /'jam pa dang /bde bar tshor zhing lto mi bde ba'i sdug bsngal gang yod myong bar ma gyur to//
61b1(mdo sde): 'dod chags kyis yongs su gdung ba'am/zhe sdang gis yongs su gdung ba 'am/gti mug gis yongs su gdung bas kyang yongs su gdung bar ma gyur/'dod pa'i rnam par rtog pa 'am/gnod sems
61b2(mdo sde): kyi rnam par rtog pa 'am/gtse ba'i rnam par rtog pa dag la'ang rnam par rtog par ma gyur te/grang ba 'am/tsha ba 'am/bkres pa 'am/skom pa 'am/mun pa 'am/rdul lam/ngal ba tshor ba'am/
61b3(mdo sde): mthong bar ma gyur te/de la gzugs dang /sgra dang /dri dang /ro dang /rog yid du mi 'ong ba snang bar ma gyur to//rmi lam ngan pa'ang mthong bar ma gyur to//de la bud med kyi sgyu 'am/g.yo 'am/phrag
61b4(mdo sde): dog gam/bud med kyi nyon mongs pa dag kyang nyams su gnod par byed par ma gyur to//de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa'i ma ni bslab pa'i gzhi lnga yang dag par blangs te/tshul khrims dang ldan zhing dge
61b5(mdo sde): ba bcu'i las kyi lam la gnas par gyur to//byang chub sems dpa'i ma'ang skyes pa gang la'ang 'dod chags kyi sems skye bar ma gyur la/skyes pa gang yang byang chub sems dpa'i ma la 'dod
61b6(mdo sde): chags kyi sems mi skye'o//ser skya'i grong khyer chen po de dang /yul gzhan dog na skyes pa dang /bud med dang /khye'u dang /bu mo su gang lha dang /klu dang /gnod sbyin dang /dri za dang /'byung pos
61b7(mdo sde): non pa ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad kyang byang chub sems dpa'i ma mthong ma thag tu sos shing dran pa thob par gyur te//mi ma yin pa de dag kyang myur du gnas gzhan du 'dong bar gyur to//
62a1(mdo sde): sems can gang la la zhig nad sna tshogs kyis thebs par gyur te/rlung dang /mkhris pa dang /bad kan dang /'dus pa las byung ba'i nad kyis gnod par gyur pa dang /mig gi
62a2(mdo sde): nad dam/rna ba'i nad dam/sna'i nad dam/lce'i nad dam/mchu'i nad dam/so'i nad dam/lkog ma'i nad dam/shu ba 'am/'bras sam/mdza'am/sha bkra 'am/skem pa 'am/brjed byed
62a3(mdo sde): dam/rims sam/lba ba 'am/phol mig gam/me dpal lam/rkang shu la sogs pa'i nad kyis btab par gyur pa de dag la byang chub sems dpa'i mas/lag pa g.yas pa spyi bor bzhag
62a4(mdo sde): pa tsam gyis nad dang bral bar gyur cing /rang rang gi gnas su 'dong bar gyur to//tha na lha mo sgyu 'phrul gyis rtswa nyag ma 'ga' zhig sa las blangs te sems can nad pa dag la byin yang de dag de
62a5(mdo sde): blangs ma thag tu nad med cing nyams pa med par gyur to//gang gi tshe lha mo sgyu 'phrul des bdag gi lto g.yas par bltas pa de'i tshe/byang chub sems dpa' ma'i rum na 'dug pa de 'di lta ste/
62a6(mdo sde): dper na me long gi dkyil 'khor shin tu dag pa la gdong gi dkyil 'khor snang ba bzhin te/de ltar de mthong nas tshim zhing mgu la yi rangs te/rab tu dga' zhing dga' ba dang /yid bde ba
62a7(mdo sde): skyes par gyur to//dge slong dag byang chub sems dpa' ma'i rum na gnas pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis/nyin mtshan rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par lha'i rol mo sil snyan gyi sgra 'byung zhing lha'i me tog
