62b1(mdo sde): gI char 'bab par gyur to//char ni dus bzhin du 'bab/rlung ni dus bzhin du ldang /dus dang skar ma dag kyang dus bzhin du 'gyur zhing 'pho bar gyur to//rgyal srid kyang bde zhing lo legs la 'khrug pa med
62b2(mdo sde): cing dag med par gyur to//ser skya'i grong khyer chen po de na shAkya'i rigs dang /sems can gzhan dag 'khod pa thams cad kyang za zhing 'thung /dga' zhing rtsel dga' mgur spyod do//sbyin pa dag
62b3(mdo sde): kyang gtong /bsod nams dag kyang byed de/zla ba bzhi 'das pa'i dus ston bzhin du thams cad kyang dga' ba'i mchog gi rtse zhing bde bar gnas pas gnas par gyur te//rgyal po zas gtsang ma'ang
62b4(mdo sde): tshangs pa'i spyod pa yang dag par blangs te/rgyal po'i las btang nas dka' thub kyi nags tshal yongs su dag pa na gnas pa bzhin du thams cad kyang dga' ba'i mchog gis chos kyi rjes su 'brang bar
62b5(mdo sde): gyur to//dge slong dag byang chub sems dpa' ma'i rum na gnas pa ni rnam pa de lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul dang ldan pas gnas par gyur to//de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun
62b6(mdo sde): dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/kun dga' bo khyod kyis byang chub sems dpa'i yongs su spyad pa rin po che bkod pa sngon byang chub sems dpa' ma'i rum na gnas pa'i tshe gnas gnas pa mthong ngam/gsol
62b7(mdo sde): pa/bcom ldan 'das mthong lags so//bde bar gshegs pa mthong lags so//de bzhin gshegs pas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang /lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang /'jig rten skyong ba
63a1(mdo sde): bani dang /de ma yin pa'i lha dang /mi gzhan dag kyang bstan te mthong nas/de dag tshim zhing mgul yi rangs te/rab tu dga' zhing dga' ba dang /yid bde ba skyes so//mi mdzad
63a2(mdo sde): bdag po tshangs pas de phyir yang tshangs pa'i 'jig rten du mchod par bya ba'i phyir bteg ste khyer nas bzhag par gyur to//de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis yang dge slong dag la bka' stsal pa/dge slong
63a3(mdo sde): ngag de ltar byang chub sems dpa' ma'i rum na 'dug pas lha dang mi khrag khrig phrag sum cu rtsa drug theg pa gsum la yongs su smin par byas par gyur to//de la 'di skad ces bya ste/gang tshe rgyal sras
63a4(mdo sde): sems can dam pa ma yi rum gnas pa//de ches 'di tshal dang bcas par rnam pa drug tu g.yos//gser mdog 'od bkye ngan song thams cad rnam par sbyangs par gyur//chos kyi rgyal por
63a5(mdo sde): 'gyur zhes lha yi tshogs rnams rab tu dga'//gzhal med khang chen dbyibs legs rin chen du mas rnam par spras//der ni dpa' bo rnam par 'dren pa zhugs par gyur nas 'dug/tsan+dan
63a6(mdo sde): dri zhimi mchog gis rab tu gang zhing rnam par mdzes//stong gsum rin chen yongs bkang de yi srad byed rin mi chog/stong chen 'jig rten khams kyang 'og nas brtul ba byas nas ni//yon
63a7(mdo sde): tan 'byung ba'i gnas kyi pad+ma'i nying khu'i thigs pa byung //de bzhin zhag bdun bsod nams gzi brjid tshangs pa'i 'jig rten 'phags//de las nying khu'i thigs blangs tshangs pa rgyal ba'i sras
63b1(mdo sde): la 'bul//byang chub sems dpa' dpa' bo tshangs pa 'dra ba ma gtogs par//sems can gang gis de zos 'jur 'gyur sems can ris na med//bskal pa du ma'i bsod nams gzi brjid nyid khu'i
63b2(mdo sde): thigs gnas pa//de zos lus dang sems dang shes pa rnam par dag par gyur//'dren pa mchod phyir brgya byin tshangs pa 'jig rten skyong ba rnams//byang chub sems dpa'i drung du rtag par dus
63b3(mdo sde): gsum rgyun du 'ong //phyag byas mchod byas chos kyi dam pa de dag thos gyur nas//bskor ba byas te kun kyang gang nas 'ongs pa'i gnas su 'dong //'jig rten khams rnams kun nas chos 'dod byang
63b4(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' 'ong //'od bkod khrir gyur rnams la de dag gnas par phan tshun snang //mchog tu bya ba'i theg pa dam pa'i chos ni thos gyur nas//kun kyang dga' ba'i sems gyur bstod pa'i phreng
63b5(mdo sde): ba brjod cing 'dong //bud med dris pa gang dag sdug bsngal ldan par gyur pa dang //'byung pos non dang sems 'khrugs gos med rdul gyis yog pa rnams//de kun lha mo sgyu 'phrul mthong nas
63b6(mdo sde): sems ni rnyed gyur te//blo gros rtogs dang dran pa ldan zhing so so'i khyim khyim 'dong //rlung dang bad kan mkhris pa'i nad dang 'dus pa'i nad thebs dang //mig nad na nad dag gis lus sems mi
63b7(mdo sde): bder gyur pa dag/rnam mang tha dad nad kyi rnam pas gang dag gnod gyur pa//de dag sgyu 'phrul lag pa mgo la bzhag pas nad med gyur//yang na rtswa yi nyag ma 'ga' zhig sa las blangs byas te//
64a1(mdo sde): sgyu 'phrul nad pa byin na thams cad rims nad med par gyur//bde ba thob cing da rod ma nyams so so'i khyim du 'dong //de ni sman gyur sman pa'i rgyal po rum na 'dug phyir ro//glang tshe
64a2(mdo sde): lha mo sgyu 'phrul bdag gi lus la brtag byas pa//de tshe byang chub sems dpa' rum na 'dug pa mthong ba ni//ji ltar bar snang gnas kyi zla ba skar mas bskor gnas pa//de bzhin byang chub sems
64a3(mdo sde): dpa' mtshan gyis kun nas brgyan pa snang //de la 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug gnod par 'gyur ba med//'dod la 'dod pa de med de la phrag dog 'tshe ba med//dga' ba'i sems dang mgu ba'i sems
64a4(mdo sde): dang dga' dang yid bder gnas//de la dkris dang skom dang tsha dang grang ba'i gnod pa med//lha yi rol mo sil snyan dbyangs sgra ma byas rtag tu 'byung //lha yi spos dri me tog dam pa mchog mdzes char
64a5(mdo sde): yang 'bab//lha dang mi rnams de la lta zhing lha mi thams cad kyang //de dag phan tshun gnod pa med cing 'tshe ba gang yang med//sems can dga' bder rno zhing zas dang skom gyi sbyin pa byed//
64a6(mdo sde): dga' ba'i sgra sgrog de dag dga' zhing mgu ba'i yid dang ldan//rgyal po'i srid 'dre 'khrug pa med cing char pa dus bzhin 'bab//tshwa dang sman dang me tog rnams kyang da yi dus su skye//rgyal po'i khab tu zhag
64a7(mdo sde): bdun rin chen cher pababagyur pas//sems can dngul po de las len cing sbyin byeng bde bar spyod//sems can dbul zhing sdug bsngal gyur pa de che gang yang med//ri rab zom gyi dga' tshal
64b1(mdo sde): sems can bzhin du dga' dang ldan//shUkya'i rgyal po de yang gso sbyong rab la nyer gnas shing //de ni rgyal po'i bya ba mi byed chos la rtag par spyod//de ni dka' thub nags tshal sad nas lham
64b2(mdo sde): sgyu 'phrul la//sems can mchog srel khyod kyi lus la bde ba ci 'dra rgod//lhums su 'jug pa'i le'u ste drug pa'o///dge slong dag de ltar zla ba bcu 'das te/byang chub sems
64b3(mdo sde): dpa' btsa' ba'i dus la bab pa dang /rgyal po zas gtsang ma'i skyed mos tshal du snga ltas sum cu rtsa gnyis byung ngo //sum cu rtsa gnyis gang zhe na/me tog thams cad kha 'bus nas rgyas par ma gyur pa
64b4(mdo sde): dang /rdzing dag na me tog ut+pa la dang /pad+ma dang /ku mu da dang /pad+ma dkar po yod pa dag kyang kha 'bus nas rgyas par ma gyur pa dang /me tog dang 'bras bu'i shing ljon pa gsar pa dag kyang sa las 'thon
64b5(mdo sde): te Sha 'bus nas rgyas par ma gyur pa dang /rin po che'i shing ljon pa brgyad byung ba dang /gter chen po nyi khri 'bus te byung nas gnas par snang ba dang /khyim gyi nang du'ang rin po che'i myu gu 'thon pa dang /
64b6(mdo sde): spos chu'i dal gyi wa 'brumar dri zhim pos sngags pa rnams kyang zag par gyur pa dang /gangs kyi ro ngos las seng ge'i phrug gu dag 'ongs te/dga' bar rtse zhing ser sgra'i grong khyer dam pa la bskor ba byas
64b7(mdo sde): nas sgron gnas par gyur kyang sems can kun la'ang 'tshe ba med par gyur pa dang /glang po'i phrug gu bal kar lde brgya lhags te/rgyal po zas gtsang ma'i rkang pa la sna'i rtse mos nyug cing gnas
65a1(mdo sde): par gyur pa dang /lha'i byis pa rogs pa ska rags bcings pa dag kyang rgyal po zas gtsang ma'i btsun mo'i 'khor gyi pad pa nas pang pa dag tu 'gre ldog par snang bar gyur pa dang /klu'i
65a2(mdo sde): bu mo mchod pa sna tshogs kyi yo byad thogs pa dag kyang lus phyed phyung zhing nam mkha' la rgyu bar snang ba dang /lha'i bu mo khri'ang rma bya'i mdongs lag na thogs shing nam mkha' la 'khod par snang ba dang /bum
65a3(mdo sde): pa gang ba khri'ang ser skya'i gnas kyi grong khyer chen po la skor ba byed par snang ba dang /lha'i bu mo khri'ang spos chu'i ril ba b+h+ring ga ra klad la thogs shing 'khod par snang ba dang /lha'i bu mo khri'ang gdugs dang /
65a4(mdo sde): rgyal mtshan dang /ba dan thogs shing 'khod par snang ba dang /lha'i bu mo brgya stong mang po dag kyang dung dang /rnga dang /rdza rnga dang /'khar rnga mgul nas sbyangs te sdod cing 'khod par snang ba dang /rlung thams
65a5(mdo sde): cad kyang mi ldang bar gnas par gyur pa dang /chu klung dang chu bran thams cad kyang mi mgul zhing mi 'bab par gyur pa dang /nyi zla dang /gzhal med khang dang /rgyu skar dang /skar ma'i tshogs rnams
65a6(mdo sde): kyang mi rgyu bar gyur pa dang /skar ma rgyal dang yang ldan par gyur pa dang /rgyal po zas gtsang ma'i khyim yang rin po che'i dra bas yog par gyur pa dang /me'ang mi 'bar bar gyur pa dang /khang pa
65a7(mdo sde): brtsegs pa dang /khang bzang dang /yang thog dang /rta babs dag la'ang nor bu dang rin po che dag 'phyang bar snang bar gyur pa dang /ras bcos bu'i mdzod dang /rin po che sna tshogs kyi mdzod
65b1(mdo sde): rnams kyang sgo bye bar snang ba dang /bya rog dang /'ug pa dang /bya rgod dang /sbrang gi dang /wa'i sgra dag kyang med par gyur pa dang /sgra skad snyan pa'i sgra dag kyang 'byung bar gyur pa dang /skye bo thams cad kyi las
65b2(mdo sde): kyi mtha' yang rgyun chad par gyur pa dang /sa'i phyogs mthon dman du 'dug pa rnams kyang mnyam par gnas par gyur pa dang /lam gyi bzhi mdo dang /sum mdo dang /srang dang /tshong 'dus kyi 'khor
65b3(mdo sde): kyang lag mthil ltar bzhinanyam zhing 'jam la me tog sil mas gang ste mdzes par snang ba dang /sbrum pa thams cad kyang bde ba dang /legs par btsa' bar gyur pa dang /shing sA la'i nags tshal
65b4(mdo sde): gyi lha thams cad kyang shing gi lo ma'i nang nas lus phyed phyung ste/phyag 'tshal zhing gnas par snang ste/snga ltas sum cu rtsa gnyis po de dag byung bar gyur to//de nas lha mo sgyu 'phrul byang chub sems
65b5(mdo sde): dpa' nyid kyi gzi brjid dang mthus byang chub sems dpa' bca' ba'i dus la bab par shes te/nam gyi srod la rgyal po zas gtsang ma'i drung du 'ongs nas tshigs su bcad de smras pa/bdag gi bsam pa
65b6(mdo sde): gang lags gsol gyis lha ni gson du gsol//yun ring ring po 'das nas skyed mos tshal gyi blo skyes te//gal te khyod mi bkyon cing zhe sdang phrag dog mi mnga' na//bdag ni rtse na sa skyed mos tshal du
65b7(mdo sde): myur du mchi bar bgyi//chos dgongs brtson pa dka' thub spyod pa khyod kyang skyo mkhyen grong //bdag kyang sems can dag la bsrel nas yun ni ring lags la//sA la'i shing ljon sdong po mchog kyang
66a1(mdo sde): me tog kha 'bus te//skyed mos tshal gyi dog sa rang ni mchi ba'i rigs so lta//sos ka'i dus mchog bud med rnams kyi rgyan du gyur lags te//nags rgyu khru byug dang ni rma bya sgrar bsnyan
66a2(mdo sde): pa 'byin//gtsang zhing mdzes la sna tshogs me tog rdul gyi ngad kyang ldang //nga ni mchin ma thogs legs par bka' lung stsal du gsol//rgyal po'i dbang pos lha mo las ni de skad tshig thos nas//dga'
66a3(mdo sde): zhing rab tu mgu ba'i sems kyis 'khor la smras pa ni//bzhon pa bzhon che mgyogs pa'i shugs ldan dag kyang bstad par gyis//yon tan phun sum mchog ldan lum+bi ni tshal brgyan par gyis//
66a4(mdo sde): ri sngo'i mdog ldan sprin gyi kha dog mthun par gyur pa yi//glang po stong phrag nyi shu skad cig myur du bstad par gyis//glang po'i dbang po mche ba drug ldan dril mdzes glo la rgyus//gser dang nor bus
66a5(mdo sde): rnam par spras shing gser gyi dra bas spud//rgyal po'i bcibs pa rlung ltar mgyogs pa'i shugs dang ldan pa ste//dngul dang kha ba'i mdog 'dra rnga rdeg lcang lo bzang 'khril ba'i//rta mchog stong phrag nyi
66a6(mdo sde): shu bgrangs pa myur du stod gyis te//gsar dril g.yer ka'i dra ba glo nas sbyang ba gyis//skyes bu rtul phod g.yul la mos shing 'thab 'dod dpa' bo dag/mnga' gzhu ral gri mdung thung zhags pa mtshon
66a7(mdo sde): cha rno thogs pa//stong phrag nyi shu dgrangs pa myur du chos te bsham gyis la//sgyu 'phrul 'khor dang bcas pa bag yod par ni bsrung bar gyis//lum+bi ni der gser dang nor bu'i rgyan khrom brgyan
66b1(mdo sde): par gyis//gos dmar rnam pa mang pos shing rnams thams cad brgyan par gyis//lha yi dga' tshal bzhin du me tog sna tshogs chal par khrum//de ltar thams cad bshams zin byung dub la sbran par
66b2(mdo sde): gyis//'khor rnams kyis ni de skad tshig zos skad cig tu//bzhon pa kun bshams de bzhin lum+bi ni yang brgyan byas te//rgyal gyur rgyal gyur sku tshe ring skyongs rgyal po gshegs su gsol//ji skad bka'
66b3(mdo sde): skul de bzhin kun bgyis dus bab lha gzigs shig/mi yi bdag po dam pa de yang dga' ba'i sems gyur tam//khyim gyi dam par zhugs te bud med rnams la 'di skad smras//gang zhig nga la
66b4(mdo sde): snying lteng la dga' bar 'dod pa dag/nga yi bka' bzhin gyis te bdag gi lus kun brgyan par gyis//spos mchog dad kyi dri zhim kha dog sna tshogs sdug pa'i gos//'jam zhing yid 'ong dga'
66b5(mdo sde): ba'i sems kyis legs par bgo bar gyis//drang na 'phyang ba'i mu tig se mo do yis brgyan par gyis//rgyan gyi khyad par thams cad de ring kun gyis bstan par gyis//'khar rnga rgyud gcig
66b6(mdo sde): gling bu'i di wang rdza rnga dum dum phrag/sil snyan yid du 'ong ba brgya stong dag kyang bsham par gyis//sku snyan thos nas lha rnams rab tu dga' ba skye 'gyur zhing //lha mo rnams kyang de bzhin dga' bar
66b7(mdo sde): 'gyur ba khyed kyis gyis//shing rta'i mchog 'dir lha mo sgyu 'phrul gcig pu 'dug par gyis//bud med skyes pa gzhan dag su yang shing rta der mo 'khod//na chung sna tshogs go can rnams kyis shing
67a1(mdo sde): rta de drongs te//gang du'ang yid du mi 'ong mi mthun sgra rnams mi grag gyis//lha mo sgyu 'phrul khyim nus byung ste sgo drung phyin pa'i tshe//rta dang glang po shing rta rkang thang dpal ldan sna tshogs
67a2(mdo sde): dpung //rgyal po'i sgo drung lcags che sgra chen mang po grag par gyur//rgya mtsho cher po 'khrugs pa'i sgra ltar de dag yongs su grag/de tshe bkra shis don du dril bu brgya stong dkrol bar byas//shing rta
67a3(mdo sde): de yang de ltar rgyal pos sna tshogs brgyan pa la//lha rnams stong gis lha yi khri yang legs par bsham pa byas//rin chen shing ljon me tog lo ma ldan bzhin ldan par byas//rma bya khrung khrung dang
67a4(mdo sde): pa yid du 'ong ba'i sgra yang 'byin//gdugs dang rgyal mtshan pa dan che phra kun nas 'khor bar bsgreng //lha yi gos dang dril bu g.yer ka'i dra ba mchog gis bkab//lha yi bu mo nam mkha' las
67a5(mdo sde): ni shing rta de la lta//lha yi sgra dbyangs snyan pa sgrog cing bstod pa'i tshig brjod de//gang tshe lha mo sgyu 'phrul seng ge'i khri la 'dug gyur pa//de tshe stong gsum sa 'di rnam pa drug tu rab tu g.yos//lha rnams
67a6(mdo sde): gos kyi g.yab mo 'byin cing me tig sna tshogs 'thor//da ring lum+bi ni 'dir 'gro ba'i dam pa bltams gyur te//'jig rten skyong ba bzhi ni shing rta'i mchog de 'dren par byed//sum cu rtsa gsum
67a7(mdo sde): bdag po dbang po'ang lam gyi byi dor byed//tshangs pa skye bo mi srun sel cing sngon du 'gro bar gyur//lha rnams brgya phrag stong yang thal mo sbyar bas phyag 'tshal 'dud//rgyal po rab tu dga' ba'i
67b1(mdo sde): sems kyis bkod pa de la lta//de ni 'di snyam 'di ni lha yi lha zhig yin snyam byed//gang la skyong ba bzhi dang tshangs pa dbang por bcas pa'i lha//mchod pa rgya chen byed pa 'di ni nges par sangs rgyas 'gyur//
67b2(mdo sde): srid pa gsum na lha klu brgya byin tshangs pa 'jig rten skyong //gang yang mchod pa 'di 'dra bzod pa'i sems can de med de//yang na mgo 'gas yang na de dag srog dang bral bar 'gyur//'di ni lha yi dam
67b3(mdo sde): pa yin pas mchod pa thams cad bzod//dge slong dag de nas lha mo sgyu 'phrul rta'i shing rta rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa brgyad khri bzhi stong gis ni kun nas bskor//glang po che'i shing rta rgyan thams cad
67b4(mdo sde): kyis brgyan pa brgyad khri bzhi stong dang /rkang thang dpa' zhing rdul phod pa yan lag dam pa dang ldan pa/go cha legs par bgos pa sra ba'i go gyon pa brgyad khri bzhi stong gis ni yongs su bsrungs/shAkya'i bu
67b5(mdo sde): mo stong phrag drug khris ni mdun du bdar/rgyal po zas gtsang ma'i phu nu'i rigs su skyes pa'i shAkya rgan pa dang /gzhon pa dang /bar ma bzhi khris ni yongs su bsrungs/rgyal po zas gtsang ma'i sras glu dang
67b6(mdo sde): rol mo'i dbyangs sgra byed/'khar ba'i sil khrol dang /pheg rdob sil snyan dang /glu dadangs len pa drug khris ni kun nas bskor/lha'i bu mo brgyad khri bzhi stong dang /klu'i bu mo brgyad khri bzhi stong dang /
67b7(mdo sde): dri za'i bu mo brgyad khri bzhi stong dang /mi 'am ci'i bu mo brgyad khri bzhi stong dang /lha ma yin gyi bu mo brgyad khri ngazhi stong bkod pa'i rgyan sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa sha stag glu dang rol mo'i dbyangs sgra sna
68a1(mdo sde): tshogs kyis bsngags pa brjod pa/rjes su 'brang bas 'gro'o//lu m+bi na'i nags tshal de thams cad kyang spos chu'i chag chag gis btab cing lha'i me tog gis gtor bar gyur to/
68a2(mdo sde): nags tshal dam pa de'i nang na shing ljon pa ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad kyang dus lam bab par lo ma dang me tog dang 'bras bu bskyed par gyur to//nags tshal de ni lha rnams kyis kyang legs
68a3(mdo sde): par brgyan par gyur te/'di lta ste dper na/'dres pa'i tshul lha rnams kyis legs par brgyan pa bzhin no//de nas lha mo sgyu 'phrul lum+bi ni'i nags tshal du phyin nas shing rta dam pa de las babs
68a4(mdo sde): te/mi dang lha'i bu mo dag gis yongs su bskor cing /shing drung nas ni shing drung dag tu 'gro/nags tshal nas ni nags tshal rig tu 'chag/ljon pa nas ni ljon pa dag la lta zhing de rim gyis shing
68a5(mdo sde): rin po che chen po mchog dang phul du bya ba/yal ga shin tu rnam par 'byes pa/lo ma dang dog pa bzang po dang ldan pa/mi dang lha yi me tog sna tshogs rab tu rgyas pa/spos mchog dang phul
68a6(mdo sde): du bya da'i dri'i nged dang ldan pa'i gos kha dog sna tshogs sbyangs pa/nor bu dang rin po che sna tshogs lta bu'i 'od rnam pa tha dad pa 'bar ba/rtsa ba dang /sdong po dang /yal ga dang /lo ma rnams
68a7(mdo sde): rin po che thams cad kyis legs par brgyan pa/yol ga ring zhing shin tu rnam par 'byas pa/blag sha nas bya bas phyogs lag mthil ltar mnyam zhing shin tu bzang la yangs pa/rtswa sngod
68b1(mdo sde): ngorma bya'i mgrin pa lta du skyes pas/ka tsa'i rdza gas ltar reg na bde ba'i sa la 'dug pa/sngon gyi rgyal ba'i yum gyis brten pa/lha'i glu dbyangs blangs pa/gnas gtsang ma'i lha bzang zhing dri ma medal
68b2(mdo sde): rnam par dag pa rab tu zhi ba'i sems dang ldan pa rnams kyis thor tshugs dang cod pan mngon par btud pa'i spyi bos mngon par phyag bya ba'i shing ljon pa blag sha de'i drung du phyin to//de nas byang chub sems
68b3(mdo sde): dpa'i gzi brjid dang mthus shing blag sha des mngon par btud de phyag byas so//de nas lha mo sgyu 'phrul nam mkha'i dkyil du snang ba'i glog gi phreng ba lta bu'i lag pa g.yas pa brkyang nas/blag sha'i
68b4(mdo sde): yal ga las bzung ste/tshul du shis par nam mkha'i dkyil du bltas nas bya smad byed cing 'dug par gyur to//de nas de'i tshe 'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha'i nang nas lha'i bu mo drug khri lhags te/lha mo sgyu 'phrul la
68b5(mdo sde): rim gro dang bkur sti byed par gyur to//byang chub sems dpa' ma'i rus na 'dug pa'i tshe/rnam pa de lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul dang ldan par gnas so//de zla ba bcu tshang nas mi'i glo g.yas pa nas
68b6(mdo sde): dran zhing shes bzhin du mngal gyi dri mas ma gos par byung ste/gzhan ltar ma yin zhing gzhan dag la mngal gyi dra ma zhes bya ba brjod pa lta bu med par gyur to//dge slong dag de'i tshe lha'i dbang po brgya byin
68b7(mdo sde): dang /min jed kyi bdag po tshangs pa gnyis mdun na 'khod de/de gnyis kyis rim gro dam pa chen pos lha'i gos ka sho pa'i sleb mos lus dang yan lag thams cad kyis dran zhing shes bzhin du byang
69a1(mdo sde): chub sems dpa'abrangs so//byang chub sems dpa' khang pa brtsegs pa gang gi nang na 'dug cing ma'i rum na gnas gnas pa de'ang mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa dang /tshangs ras
69a2(mdo sde): kyilha rnams kyis tshangs pa'i 'jig rten du gyen du bteg ste/mchod rten du bya ba dang /mchod pa bya ba'i phyir khyer ro//de ltar byang chub sems dpa' de ni mir gyur pa gang gis kyang ma blangs kyi/byang chub
69a3(mdo sde): sems dpa' de ni lha rnams kyis blangs so//de nas byang chub sems dpa' bcas ma thag tu sa la 'bab ste/byang chub sems dpa' des la babs par gyur ma thag tu pad+ma chen po zhig gis sa 'di'ang
69a4(mdo sde): brtol te byung ngo //klu'i rgyal po chen po dga' bo dang /nye dga' bo gnyis kyang nam mkha'i dkyil na lus phyed phyung ste 'khod nas bsil ba dang /dro ba'i chu'i rgyun gnyis mngon par sprul nas byang chub
69a5(mdo sde): sems dpa'i lus bkrus so//brgya byin dang /tshangs pa dang /'jig rten skyong ba la sogs pa gzhan yang lha'i bu brgya stong mang po dag byang chub sems dpa' bcas ma thag tu spos chu sna tshogs dang /
69a6(mdo sde): me tog sil mas lus 'khru zhing mngon par 'dor ro//bar snang las kyang rdul yab kyi rnga ma gnyis dang /rin po che'i gdugs byung bar gyur to//de pad+ma chen po de la 'dug nas phyogs bzhir rnam
69a7(mdo sde): par lta ste/seng ge'i lta stangs dang /skyes bu chen po'i lta stangs kyis rnam par lta'o//de'i tshe byang chub sems dpas sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba'i rnam par smin pa las byung ba lha'i mig thogs pa
69b1(mdo sde): med pas stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad grong khyer dang grong rdal dang yul 'khor dang pho brang 'khor dang ljongs su bcas/yul du bcas/mi dang lhar bcas pa rnams mthong
69b2(mdo sde): papar gyur to//sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi spyod pa'ang rab tu shes te/shes nas kyang sems can gang tshul khrims sam/ting nge 'dzin nam/shes rab bam/dge ba'i spyod pas bdag
69b3(mdo sde): dang 'dra ba de lta bu gang la la zhig yod dam zhes rnam par lta'o//de'i tshe byang chub sems dpas stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na bdag dang mtshungs pa'i sems can gang yang ma mthong
69b4(mdo sde): nas/de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' seng ge ltar 'jigs pa med cing bag tsha ba med de/zhum pa dang bag 'chums pa med pas legs par bsam pa dran par byas te/bsams brtags nas sems
69b5(mdo sde): can thams cad kyi sems kyi spyod pa shes par bya ste/sus kyang brtan pa med par byang chub sems dpa' dge ba'i rtsa ba'i chos thams cad kyi sngon du 'gro bar bya'o zhes shar phyogs logs su gom pa
69b6(mdo sde): bdun bor ro//de ltar byang chub sems dpa' gang dang gang du gom pa bor ba de dang de dag tu pad+ma dag kyang skyes par gyur to//lha dang mi rnams kyi sbyin pa'i gnas su 'gyur bar bya'o zhes lho phyogs
69b7(mdo sde): logs su gom pa bdun bor ro//nub phyogs logs su gom pa bdun bor nas dom pa bdun pa la gnos te nga ni 'jig rten na phul du phyin pa'o//'di ni nga'i skye ba tha ma ste/skye ba dang /rga ba
70a1(mdo sde): dang /na ba dang /'chi ba mthar dbyung ngo zhes seng ge ltar tshim par gyur pa'i sgra sgrags so//sems can thams cad kyi nang na bla na med par bya'o zhes byang phyogs logs su gom pa
70a2(mdo sde): bdun bor ro//bdud dang bdud kyi sde ni gzhom par bya'o//sems can dmyal ba de thams cad kyi sems can dmyal ba'i me bsad pa'i phyir chos kyi tshor sprin chen po'i char phab ste/de dag
70a3(mdo sde): bde bas tshim par bya'o zhes 'og gi phyogs logs su gom pa bdun bor ro//sems can thams cad kyi gyen du blta bar 'gyur bar bya'o zhes steng gi phyogs logs su gom pa bdun bor nas steng
70a4(mdo sde): bu lta'o//byang chub sems dpas tshig de brjod ma thag tu de nas de'i tshe stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir sgras mngon par go bar gyur te/de ni byang chub sems dpa'i las
70a5(mdo sde): kyi rnam par smin pa las byung ba'i mngon par shes pa'i chos nyid do//gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' srid pa tha ma pa btsa' bar 'gyur ba dang /gang gi tshe bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
70a6(mdo sde): byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba de'i tshe/rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul gyi rnam pa de lta bu de dag 'byung ngo //dge slong dag de'i tshe sems can thams cad kyang rab tu dga' zhing spu
70a7(mdo sde): g.yos par gyur to//'jig rten du sa g.yo ba chen po shin tu 'jigs shing spu g.yo bar 'gyur ba'ang byung bar gyur to//mi dang lha'i sil snyan dang /rol mo'i dbyangs sgrar bya ba thams cad
70b1(mdo sde): kyang ma drangs par sgra 'byin par gyur to//de'i tshe stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du dus dang dus mtshams sa sa'i shing thams cad kyang me tog rgyas shing 'bras bu chags padang
70b2(mdo sde): rnam par dag par gyur to//nam mkha'i dkyil nas kyang sprin gyi sgra grags te/sprin med pa'i nam mkha' las kyang dal bu dal bus phra ba'i char lha yul ba'i kha dog dang ldan pa'i me tog dang /gos dang /rgyan
70b3(mdo sde): dang /spos kyi phye ma dang 'dres pa babs par gyur to//rlung reg na mchog tu bde ba 'jam pa dri zhim po dag kyang ldang bar gyur to//phyogs thams cad kyang mun pa dang /rdul dang /du ba dang /khug rna med cing /
70b4(mdo sde): rab tu dang bas rnam par mdzes par gyur to//steng gi bar snang las kyang tshangs pa'i sgra chen po mi snang zhing zab pa grag par gyur to//nyi zla dang /brgya byin dang /tshangs pa dang /'jig rten skyong ba'i 'od
70b5(mdo sde): thams cad kyang zil gyis mnan te/'od kha dog brgya stong dang ldan pa/reg na mchog tu bde ba/sems can thams cad kyi lus dang sems la bde ba skyed pa/'jig rten las 'das pa stong gsum
70b6(mdo sde): gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad rgyas par gang bar gyur to//byang chub sems dpa' bcos ma thag tu sems can thams cad kyang bde bas shin tu tshim par gyur te/'dod chags
70b7(mdo sde): dang /zhe sdang dang /gti mug dang /dregs pa dang /mi dga' ba dang /shum pa dang /'jigs pa dang /chags pa dang /phrag dog dang /ser sna thams cad dang bral zhing mi dge ba'i bya ba thams
71a1(mdo sde): cad spangs par gyur to//sems can nad pa rnams kyi nad kyang zhi bar gyur to//bkres shing skom pa'i sems can rnams kyang bkres pa dang skom pa med par gyur to//chang gis ra
71a2(mdo sde): ro zhing myos pa rnams kyang myos pa med par gyur to//smyos pa rnams kyang dran pa thob par gyur to//mig med pa rnams kyis kyang mig thob par gyur to//rna ba 'on pa rnams kyis kyang sgra thos par
71a3(mdo sde): gyur to//yan lag dang nying lag nyams pa rnams kyang dbang po nyams pa med par gyur to//dbul po rnams kyis kyang nor thob par gyur to//btson ran 'khod pa rnams kyang btson ra nas thar bar
71a4(mdo sde): gyur to//mnar med pa la sogs pa'i sems can dmyal ba pa'i sems can thams cad kyi nang du bya ba dang sdug bsngal thams cad de'i tshe rgyun chad par gyur to//dud 'gro'i skye gnas pa rnams kyis
71a5(mdo sde): gcig la gcig za ba la sogs pa'i sdug bsngal yang zhi bar gyur to//gshin rje'i 'jig rten pa'i sems can rnams kyi bkres pa dang skom pa la sogs pa'i sdug bsngal yang zhi bar gyur to//
71a6(mdo sde): gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya steng grangs med par spyad pa shin tu spyad pa/brtson 'grus chen po dang ldan pa/mthu chen po dang ldan pa/btsas ma thag tu gom
71a7(mdo sde): pa bdun 'dor ba'i tshe chos nyid thob pas de'i tshe/phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams na bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams sa'i phyogs der de'i tshe zhig par mi 'gyur bar bya
71b1(mdo sde): ba'i phyir rdo rje'i rang bzhin du byin gyis rlob pa mdzad de/dge slong dag de tsam du stobs kyi shugs drag po dang ldan par byang chub sems dpa' bcas ma thag pa gom pa bdun 'dor bar gyur to//'jig rten
71b2(mdo sde): gyi bar thams cad kyang de'i tshe snang ba chen pos rgyas par gang bar gyur to//de'i tshe glu'i sgra chen po'ang byung bar gyur te/gar gyi sgra chen po'ang byung bar gyur to//de'i tshe me tog dang /phye ma dang /spos dang /
71b3(mdo sde): phreng ba dang /rin po che dang /rgyan dang /gos kyi sprin dpag tu med pa dag kyang char du mngon par bab par gyur to//sems can thams cad kyang bde ba'i mchog dang ldan par gyur to/mdor na byang chub
71b4(mdo sde): sems dpa' 'jig rten thams cad las mngon par 'phags pa 'jig rten du byung ba'i tshe/bya ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa byung bar gyur to//de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo stan las langs te/bla
71b5(mdo sde): gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom
71b6(mdo sde): ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa ni sems can thams cad las ngo mtshar du gyur pa ste/byang chub sems dpa' nyid kyang rmad du byung ba'i chos dang ldan par gyur na/nga bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
71b7(mdo sde): pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa lta smos kyang ci 'tshal te/bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar bdag ni lan bzhi 'am/lan lngar yang /lan bcur yang /lan lnga bcu'i bar du'ang /
72a1(mdo sde): lan brgya'i bar du'ang /lan brgya stong du ma'i bar du'ang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la skyabs su mchi'o//de skad ces gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun
72a2(mdo sde): dga' bo la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//kun dga' bo ma 'ongs pa'i dus na dge slong la la lus ma bsgoms pa/sems ma bsgoms pa/tshul khrims ma bsgoms pa/shes rab ma bsgoms
72a3(mdo sde): pa byis pa mi mkhas pa/lhag pa'i nga rgyal can/rgod pa/khengs pa/ma bsdams pa/sems g.yangs pa/nem nur gyi 'khor ba/the tshom mang ba/dad pa med pa/dge sbyong gi dri mar gyur
72a4(mdo sde): pa/dge sbyong gi tshul dang mi 'dra ba dag 'byung ste/de dag ni byang chub sems dpa'i rum du 'gro ba yongs su dag pa 'di lta bu thos nas yid mi ches shing de dag phyogs gcig tu tshogs nas gcig/
72a5(mdo sde): la gcig 'di skad du/kye khyad cag 'di lta bu'i mi rigs pa la ltos/byang chub sems dpa' ma'i mngal na 'dug pa btsog pa'i khu shugs dang 'dres pa la'ang 'di lta bu'i longs spyod yod ces bya
72a6(mdo sde): ba dang /de 'byung ba'i tshe ma'i glo g.yas pa nas mngal gyi dri mas ma gros par 'byung zhes bya ba 'di rigs par ji ltar 'gyur zhes zer bar 'gyur te/skyes bu glen pa de dag ni sems can lags par
72a7(mdo sde): byas pa'i las dang ldan pa rnams kyi lus mi gtsang ba'i khu ba'i nang du mi 'byung ngo zhes bya bar mi shes so//dge slong dag sems can dam pa de lta bu dag gi mngal du 'gro ba dang mngal na gnas pa ni
72b1(mdo sde): shin tu'ang bzang ba yin no//byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni sems can rnams la snying brtse bas mi'i 'jig rten du skye ste/lhar gyur pa nyid kyis chos kyi 'khor lo mi skor ro//de ci'i phyir zhe na/kun
72b2(mdo sde): dga' bo sems can rnams zhum par 'gyur zhing /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom po yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de ni lhar gyur pa yin gyi/bdag cag ni mi tsam du zad
72b3(mdo sde): pas na/bdag cag gis gnas de lta bu yongs su rdzogs par bya bar mi nus so zhes zhum par 'gyur du 'ong ba'i phyir te/skyes bu glen pa chos kyi rkun por gyur pa de dag 'di snyam du sems can de ni
72b4(mdo sde): bsam gyis mi khyab pa ste/de ni bdag cag gis tshod bzung bar bya ba ma yin no snyam du mi sems so//kun dga' bo de dgon de'i tshe sangs rgyas kyi tshe 'phrul la'ang yid mi ches par 'gyur na/de bzhin
72b5(mdo sde): gshegs pa byang chub sems dpar gyur pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i cho 'phrul lta smos kyang ci dgos te/kun dga' bo de ltar skyes bu glen pa rnyed pa dang /bkur sti dang tshigs su bcang pa'i zil gyis
72b6(mdo sde): non pa/mi gtsang bar bying ba/rim gro'i zil gyis non pa/ma rabs kyi ngang tshul can de dag sangs rgyas kyi chos spong zhing bsod nams ma yin pa'i mngon par 'du bya ba mang po ji snyed cig mngon par
72b7(mdo sde): 'du byed pa la ltos//'phags pa rgya cher rol pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo//bam po lnga pa//kun dga' bos gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das ma byung ba'i dus na/'di lta
73a1(mdo sde): bu'i mdo sde bzang po la'ang spong zhing mi snyan par brjod pa de lta bu'i dge slong dag kyang 'byung lags pa lta/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/kun dga' bo de dag ni mdo
73a2(mdo sde): snga 'di lta bu spong zhing mi snyan pa brjod par yang mi zad de/sdig pa rnam pa du ma mngon par 'du bya ba mngon par 'du byed cing dge sbyong gi dngos po don du mi gnyer ba dag kyang 'byung bar 'gyur
73a3(mdo sde): ro//gsol pa bcom ldan 'das 'o na skyes bu dam pa ma lags pa de 'dra ba de dag gi 'gro ba ni ci 'dra ba zhig tu 'gyur/tshe rabs 'phos nas ni ji lta bu zhig tu mchi/bcom ldan 'das
73a4(mdo sde): kyis bka' stsal pa/de dag ni sangs rgyas kyi byang chub med par bya ste/'das pa dang /ma byon pa dang /da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la mi snyan pas skur pa btab
73a5(mdo sde): pa'i 'gro ba gang yin pa'i 'gro ba der 'gro bar 'gyur ro//de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo spu g.yos nas sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo zhes brjod de/bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces
73a6(mdo sde): gsol to//bcom ldan 'das skyes bu dam pa ma lags pa de dag gi spyod pa 'di thos nas bdag ni brgyal ba dang 'dra bar gyur to//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/kun dga' bo
73a7(mdo sde): de dag gi spyod pa ni mnyam par mi 'gyur zhing /sems can de dag ni mi mnyam pa'i spyod pa can du 'gyur ro//kun dga' bo de dag tshul dang mi 'dra ba'i spyod pa des mnar med pa'i sems can
73b1(mdo sde): dmyal ba chen por ltung bar 'gyur ro//de ci'i phyir zhe na/kun dga' bo dge slong ngam/dge slong ma 'am/dge bsnyen nam/dge bsnyen ma gang la la zhig mdo sde 'di lta bu 'di dag thos nas ma mos shing yid
73b2(mdo sde): mi ches pa dang /spong ba de dag ni shi 'phos ma thag tu mnar med pa'i sems can dmyal ba chen por ltung bar 'gyur ro//kun dga' bo de bzhin gshegs pa la ni tshad du ma byed cig/de ci'i phyir zhe na/kun
73b3(mdo sde): dga' bo de bzhin gshegs pa ni tshad med cing zab la rgya che zhing gting dpag dka' ba'o//kun dga' bo la la zhig gis mdo sde 'di lta bu 'di dag thos nas dga' ba dang /mchog tu dga' ba dang /dad pa skye ba'i
73b4(mdo sde): sems can de dag gis ni thob pa lags par thob pa yin te/de dag gis 'tsho ba ni don yod pa'o//de dag gi mi'i dngos po ni don yod pa'o//de dag gi spyod pa ni legs par spyad pa'o//de dag gis ni
73b5(mdo sde): snying po blangs so//de dag ni ngan song gsum las grol ba'o//de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i sras su 'gyur ro//de dag gis ni dgos pa thams cad yongs su thob po//de dag gis ni dad pa thob pa
73b6(mdo sde): ni don yod do//de dag gis ni yul 'khor gyi zas legs par zos so//de dag gis ni sems can dam pa rnams la legs par mos pa yin no//de dag ni bdud kyi zhags pa gtubs pa yin no//
73b7(mdo sde): de dag ni 'khor ba'i 'brog dgon pa las brgal to//de dag gis ni mya ngan gyi zug rngu phyung ngo //de dag gis ni mchog tu dga' ba'i dngos po rjes su thob bo//de dag gis ni skyabs su 'gro ba legs par
74a1(mdo sde): blangs so//de dag ni sbyin pa'i gnas yin te mchod par 'os pa'o//de dag ni 'jig rten na 'byung bar dkon pa'o//de dag ni 'jig rten na smin pa'i gnas su bzung ba'o//de ci'i phyir
74a2(mdo sde): zhe na/de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos 'jig rten thams cad dang mi mthun pa rnam pa 'di lta bu 'di la dad pa'i phyir ro//kun dga' bo sems can de dag ni dge ba'i rtsa ba ngan ngon dang ldan pa ma yin te/
74a3(mdo sde): kun dga' bo sems can de dag ni nga dang tshe rabs 'ga' zhig tu 'grogs par gyur pa'i grogs po yin no//de ci'i phyir zhe na/kun dga' bo la la ni thos pa tsam gyis dga' zhing yid du 'ong ba
74a4(mdo sde): yod kyi mthong na ma yin no//kun dga' bo la la ni mthong bas dga' zhing yid du 'ong ba yod kyi thos pas ma yin no//kun dga' bo la la ni mthong na'ang dga' zhing yid du 'ong la thos na'ang dga'
74a5(mdo sde): zhing yid du 'ong ba yod do//kun dga' bo gang yang rung ste/la la zhig mthong ngam/thos nas dga' zhing yid du 'ong bar gyur na/khyod kyis de la 'di ltar de dag ni nga dang tshe rabs 'ga' zhig
74a6(mdo sde): tu 'grogs pa'i grogs po yin par nges par rtogs par bya ste/de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pas gzigs so//de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pas dgrol bar bya ba'o//de dag ni de bzhin
74a7(mdo sde): gshegs pa dang yon tan gyi cha mnyam pa'o//de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa la skyabs su dong ba'o//de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pas bzung ba'o//kun dga' bo nga sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad
74b1(mdo sde): baspyod pa nyid kyi tshe'ang sems can su'ang rung ste/'jigs pas nyam thag cing 'ongs nas mi 'jigs pa slong na sems can de dag la ngas mi 'jigs pa byin par gyur na/nga bla na med pa yang dag par
74b2(mdo sde): rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pas lta smos kyang ci dgos kun dga' bo dad pa la brtson par gyis shig/'di ni de bzhin gshegs pas bcol ba'o//kun dga' bo khyod kyis
74b3(mdo sde): bya ba ci yod pa de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pas byas so//nga rgyal gyi zug rngu ni de bzhin gshegs pas bsal to//kun dga' bo grogs po'i gtam thos pa tsam gyis kyang dpag tshad brgya'i lam
74b4(mdo sde): du'ang 'gro ste/thos pas kyang dga' bar 'gyur ba yin na/sngar ma mthong ba las mdza' bo mthong bar gyur na smos kyang ci dgos te/gang nga la brten cing dge ba'i rtsa ba skyed par byed pa de dag ni
74b5(mdo sde): mabyon pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis mkhyen cing sems can de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi sngon gyi mdza' bo ste/de dag na
74b6(mdo sde): bdag cag gi'ang mdza' bo yin no snyam du dgongs so//de ci'i phyir zhe na/kun dga' bo mdza' bo gang yin pa de ni mdza' bo la sdug cing yid du 'ong ba yin no//mdza' bo de'i gang sdug pa'i grogs po
74b7(mdo sde): de'ang de la sdug cing yid du 'ong ba yin no//kun dga' bo de lta bas na khyod mos par bya zhing khong du chud par byas/dad pa tsam yang skyed par gyis shig/ngas ma byon pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
75a1(mdo sde): bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams la'ang gtad de/de dag kyang 'di dag ni bdag gi'ang mdza' bo yin no zhes bya bar mkhyen cing /bsam pa rdzogs par mdzad par
75a2(mdo sde): 'gyur ro//kun dga' bo 'di lta ste/dper na skyes bu la la zhig la bu dag nyan cing /mthun par 'dzin pa gcig pu zhig bdog par gyur la/skyes bu de'ang mdza' bo mang ba zhig yin na/pha de shir
75a3(mdo sde): zin kyang pha'i mdza' bos yongs su bzung ba'i bu de ni phongs par mi 'gyur ro//kun dga' bo de bzhin du gang su'ang rung ste nga la dad na de dag ngas bzung ba yin te/de dag ni nga'i mdza' bo'o//de dag
75a4(mdo sde): ni nga la skyabs su dong ba'o//de bzhin gshegs pa ni mdza' bo mang po mnga' ba ste/de bzhin gshegs pa'i mdza' bo de dag kyang yang dag par gsung zhing brdzun du mi gsung bas de bzhin gshegs
75a5(mdo sde): pa'i mdza' bo yang dag par gsung ba ma 'ongs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams la de dag rjes su gtad kyis/kun dga' bo dad pa la brtson
75a6(mdo sde): par gyis shig/'di ni ngas khyod la bcol ba'o//dge slong dag de ltar byang chub sems dpa' btsas pa'i tshe/lha'i bu mo bye ba khrag khrig brgya steng mang po dag nam mkha'i dkyil na gnas shing
75a7(mdo sde): lha mo sgyu 'phrul la lha'i me tog dang /spos dang /phreng ba dang /byug pa dang /gos dang /rgyan gyis mngon par 'thor bar gyur to//de la 'di skad ces bya ste/dge ba dri med rnam dag gser gyi
75b1(mdo sde): 'od ldan nyi zla'i 'od ldan pa//lha yi bu mo sgra dbyangs spyan brjod stong phrag drug cu de yi tshe//skad cig de la lum+bi nir lhags lha mo sgyu 'phrul de la sgra//mi dgyes ma mdzad rab tu dgyes mdzad bdag cag
75b2(mdo sde): khyod kyi phyag rjed lags//bdag cag rnams kyis bgyi ba ci mchi ci bgyi ci 'tshal bka' stsol cig/bdag cag khyod kyi phyag rje de nus ldan nye ba'i sems dang ldan pa lags//khyod kyis dgyes shing bde
75b3(mdo sde): ba'i nyams skyes mi dgyes thams cad spang bar gsol//rga shi sel ba'i sman pa dam pa de ring lha mo myur skyed 'gyur//ji ltar zhugs shing 'di rnams kha 'bus sa la me tog rgyas gyur cing //stong phrag
75b4(mdo sde): babrangs pa'i lha rnams drung na gnas shing lag pa 'dud pa dang //ji ltar dog sa rgya mtshor bcas te rnam pa drug tu g.yos las na//khyod las lha yul mi yul sgra glags 'jig rten 'das pa'i sras
75b5(mdo sde): bltams 'gyur//ji ltar rnam dag 'od kyis rnam par mdzes shing gser gyi kha dog bzang //nam mkha'i dkyil las yid 'ong sil snyan brgya dag ma dkrol sgra 'byin dang //ji ltar dag cing gcing la
75b6(mdo sde): 'dod chags bral ba'i lha rnams brgya spong yang //dga' sems phyag 'tshal ba las de ring 'jig rten kun phan bltams par 'gyur//brgya byin tshangs pa 'jig rten skyong dang de bzhin lha rnams gzhan
75b7(mdo sde): dag kyang //dga' zhing brod pa'i sems kyis drung du gnas nas lag pa 'dud pa bgyid//skyes bu seng ge brtul zhugs grub pa de yang rtsib logs g.yas nas byung //gser gyi ri dang 'dra zhing dag pa'i
76a1(mdo sde): 'od dang ldan pa'i 'dren pa bltams//brgya byin tshangs pa gnyis kyis lag pa dang te thub pa de yang blangs//zhing rnams brgya stong 'od bzang bkyo bas thams cad rab tu g.yos par
76a2(mdo sde): gyur//ngan song gsum gyi sems can rnams kyang bde zhing sdug bsngal med gyur te//lha rnams brgya phrag stong gis me tog gtor te gos kyi g.yab mo phyung //de tshes 'di stobs mthu ldan zhing rdo rje'i
76a3(mdo sde): dngos gnas pad+ma mdzes//sna tshogs mngon 'thon dge la 'dren pa 'khor lo'i mtshan ris zhabs bzhag ste//gom pa bdun du bzhud nas tshangs pa'i sgra dbyangs dam pa gsungs pa ni//rga shi sa la
76a4(mdo sde): ba'i sman pa dam pa sems can mchog tu bdag 'gyur ro//tshangs pa'i mchog dang brgya byin lha mchog nam mkha'i dkyil na 'khod gyur te//gtsang zhod dong la mdzes pa'i spros chu dag gis 'dren pa'i
76a5(mdo sde): sku yang bsil//klu yi rgyal gnyis par snang gnas nas grang dro'i chu yi rgyun kyang gtong //lha rnams brgya stong dag kyang spos chu dag gis 'dren pa'i sku bsil byed//'jig rten skyong ba rnams kyang rim gro
76a6(mdo sde): dam par lag pa bzang pos len//stong gsum 'di'ang rgyu dang mi rgyu bcas par rab tu g.yos par gyur//mdzes pa'i 'od rnams bkye bas ngan song rnams kyang rab tu zhi bar 'gyur//'jig rten rnam
76a7(mdo sde): par 'dren pa bltams pas nyon mongs sdug bsngal de dge zhi//mi yi 'dren pa rgyal ba la//lha rnams me tog sil ma 'thor//stobs dang brtson 'grus ldan pa yi//brtan pa gom pa bdun
76b1(mdo sde): du bzhud//sa phyogs gang du zhabs bzhag pa//der ni pad+ma bzang ba'i mchog/rin chen kun gyis brgyan pa dag/sa las mngon du 'thon par gyur//de ltar gom pa bdun bzhud nas//rga dang
76b2(mdo sde): bsil ba yi//sman pa dam pa 'dir byung zhes//tshangs pa'i dbyangs kyis gsung brjod do//'jigs med phyogs su rnam gzigs te//de nas don ldan gsung phyung ba//nga ni 'jig rten kun gyi
76b3(mdo sde): gno//'jig rten phul phyin rnam par 'dren//rwa yi skye mtha' 'di yin zhes//mi yi 'dren pas 'dzum pa mdzad//lha dbang bcas dang 'jig rten skyong dag rab tu dad sems skyes//spos chu mchog
76b4(mdo sde): gis 'jig rten phan pa'i don mdzad sku yang bsil//klu yi dbang po rnams kyang lhan cig mthun par byas nas ni//dri zhim spos chu dag gis rgyun gyis sku yang bsil ba byas//lha gzhan khrag khrig
76b5(mdo sde): da kyang bar snang la ni gnas nas su//dri zhim spos chu mchog gi rgyun gyis rang byung sku yang bsil//gdugs dkar yangs dang rnga yab bzang po dam pa thogs nas ni//bar snang 'khod de lta rnams
76b6(mdo sde): mi yi khyu mchog sku bsil byed//skyes bu gcig cig rings par 'ongs nus zas gcing de la dgrar smras pa//lha cig 'byor pa rgyas gyur khyod kyi sras ni mtshan gyis brgyan pa bltams//de ni nges
76b7(mdo sde): par 'khor los sgyur ba dbang phyug gdung rabs rin chen 'tsho ba//dzam+bu'i gling 'di gdugs mang cig 'gyur phas kyi dgra yong ma mchis 'gyur//de nas skyes bu gnyis 'ongs zas gtsang rgyal po'i
77a1(mdo sde): mdun du de song ste//lha cig 'byor pa rgyas gyur shAkya'i rigs su rgyal bu skyes gyur na//shAkya rnams kyi grong du rogs pa 'bum phrag ldan bcas pa skyes par gyur//kun kyang gzhan/
77a2(mdo sde): gyis mi thub stobs dang ldan zhing chen po che dang 'dra//skyes bu gzhan 'ongs smras pa bdag las dgyes pa'i sgra gson lha//'dun pa can la sogs pa 'bangs kyi byis pa brgyad brgya bcas par gyur//
77a3(mdo sde): bsngags ldan gyis ni zla bo chibs rta stong phrag bcu dag 'brangs gyur te//chi bas mchog dam pa gser gyi 'od ldan rnga rngog lcang lor 'khril ba lags//mtha' 'khob khams kyi rgyal po stong phrag
77a4(mdo sde): nyi shu dag kyang de bzhin du//rgyal po khyod kyi zhabs kyi drung du mchis kyis legs par rgyal gyur lha//da ni bdag mchis sug las ci bgyi rgyal pos bdag la bka' stsal gsol//rgyal po khyod
77a5(mdo sde): 'dir mnga' brnyes bdag 'bangs jo bo lha cig rgyal bar spyon//gser gyi dra bas mdzes pa'i glang po dam pa stong phrag nyi shu dag/nam mkha' las ni sgra dag 'byin cing rgyal po'i khab tu mgyogs su
77a6(mdo sde): mchis//sa gsum la sogs nag gu zal lu dag dang be'u ni drug skyong 'brangs//lhan cig lha mchog bltam zhing de dag btsas pas rgyal khab phun sum tshogs//rje cig rgyal por gshegs
77a7(mdo sde): tebasod nams gzi 'od ldan pa bltams pa yi//yon tan dag ni mthong bar gyur nas lha dang mi rnams stong 'grangs pa//rab tu dga' bar gyur dang kun la nyid kyis legs par gzigs
77b1(mdo sde): su gsol//myur du rgyal gyur cig ces byang chub dam pa mya ngan med par zhugs//dge slong dag de ltar byang chub sems dpa' btsas pa dang skad cig de la sbyin pa'i gtong ba'ang de bas rgya cher gyur to//
77b2(mdo sde): ya rabs kyi rigs lnga brgya'ang btsas par gyur to//grags ldan la sogs pa bu mo khri dang /bran mo brgyad brgya dang /'dun pa la sogs pa bran lnga brgya dang /rte'u mo khri dang /bsngags ldan la sogs
77b3(mdo sde): pabarte'u pho khri dang //ba lang gi phrug gu mo lnga brgya dang //ba lang gi phrug gu pho lnga brgya po dag kyang bcas shing 'brangs par gyur nas de dag thams cad rgyal po zas gtsang mas sna grangs yi ger bris te sras bu
77b4(mdo sde): gzhon nu rtsen pa'i phyir byin par gyur to//byang chub sems dpa'i longs spyod kyi don du byang chub sems dpa' nyid kyi mthus gling bye ba brgya phrag bzhi'i dbus kyis phyogs nas a shwad tha'i sdong po skyes
77b5(mdo sde): par gyur to//gling phra mo rnams su'ang tsan+dan gyi nag tshal skyes par gyur to//byang chub sems dpa'i longs spyod kyi don du grong khyer gyi khor yug tu'ang skyed mos tshal lnga brgya dag byung bar gyur to//gauter
77b6(mdo sde): lnga stong yang sa'i 'og nas gyen du 'bus te sgo ston par gyur to//de ltar rgyal po zas gtsang ma de'i don bsam pa gang yin pa de dag thams cad phun sum tshogs par gyur nas rgyal po zas gtsang ma
77b7(mdo sde): 'di snyam du bdag gi bu gzhon nu de'i ming ji skad cig gdags par bya snyam pa dang /de 'di snyam du sems te/bu 'di skyes ma thag tu bdag gi don thams cad yang dag par grub par gyur gyis/'di'i
78a1(mdo sde): ming ni don thams cad grub par gdags so snyam ste/de nas rgyal po zas gtsang mas byang chub sems dpa' la rim gro cher byas nas bu 'di'i ming don thams cad grub pa zhes bya'o zhes
78a2(mdo sde): ming du btags so//dge slong dag de ltar byang chub sems dpa' btsas nas ma'i glo g.yas pa'ang ma ral ma nyams shing sngon bzhin du gyur to//der khron pa lan gsum ldud pa dag kyang byung bar gyur//
78a3(mdo sde): spos kyi 'bru mar gyi rdzing bu dag kyang byung bar gyur to//de nas lha'i bu mo lnga stong dag lha'i spos kyis bsgos pa'i 'bru mar dri zhim po khyer te byang chub sems dpa'i ma'i drung du lhags nas/bltas pa
78a4(mdo sde): legs par bltams sam/sku la mi bde ba ma mchis sam zhes 'dri bar gyur to//lha'i bu mo lnga stong dag kyang lha'i byug pa dang /rnam par byug pa thogs te/byang chub sems dpa'i ma'i
78a5(mdo sde): drung du lhags nas bltam pa lags par bltams sam/sku la mi bde ba ma mchis sam zhes 'dri bar gyur to//lha'i bu mo lnga stong dag kyang lha'i spos chus bkang ba'i bum pa thogs te/byang chub
78a6(mdo sde): sems dpa'i ma'i drung du lhags nas bltam pa legs par bltams sam/sku la mi bde ba ma mchis sam zhes 'dre bar gyur to//lha'i bu mo lnga stong dag kyang lha'i byis pa'i gos thogs te byang
78a7(mdo sde): chub sems dnga'i ma drung du lhags nas bltam pa legs par bltams sam/skul mi bdeb ma mchis sam zhes 'dri bar gyur to//lha'i bu mi lnga stong dag kyang lha'i byis pa'i rgyan thogs te/
78b1(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa'i ma'i drung du lhags nas bltam pa legs par bltams sam/sku la mi bde ba ma mchis sam zhes 'dra bar gyur to//lha'i bu mo lnga stong dag kyang glu dbyangs len cing byang chub sems
78b2(mdo sde): dpa'i ma'i drung du lhags te bltam pa legs par bltams sam/sku la mi bde ba ma mchis sam zhes 'dri bar gyur to//dzam+bu'i gling 'di na phyi rol gyi drang srong mngon par shes pa lnga dang ldan pa ji snyed
78b3(mdo sde): cig 'khod pa de dag thams cad nam mkha' las 'ongs te rgyal po zas gtsang ma'i mdun du 'khod nas/rgyal po 'phel bar gyur cig ces bya ba'i sgra sgrogs par gyur to//dge slong dag de ltar byang chub
78b4(mdo sde): sems dpa' btsas nas zhag bdun du lu m+bi ni'i nags tshal du lha dang mi'i sil snyan dang /pheg rdob pas rim gror byas so//bkur stir byas so//bsti stang du byas so//mchod par byas so//bza'
78b5(mdo sde): ba dang /bca' ba dang /myang ba dag kyang drangs par gyur to//shAkya'i tshogs thams cad kyang 'dus nas kun dga' ba'i sgra brjod par gyur to//sbyin pa dag kyang byin no//bsod nams dag kyang byed
78b6(mdo sde): do//bram ze sum khri nyis stong yang nyin gcig bzhin du tshim par byas so//su dag ci 'dod pa de dag la'ang de byin par gyur to//brgya byin dang tshangs pa'ang bram ze'i 'khor der bram ze'i khye'u'i gzugs
78b7(mdo sde): su sprul te gral bye thog ma la 'khod nas bkra shis kyi tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag brjod par gyur to//ji ltar ngan song rnams zhi zhing //ji ltar 'gro kun bde las na//'gro la bde ba 'god
79a1(mdo sde): pa yi//bde ba mdzad cig bltams par mngon//ji ltar rab rib med 'od kyis//lha dang nyi zla'i 'od rnams kyang //mi snang zil du rlag pa las//bsod nams 'od cig byung bar
79a2(mdo sde): mdzod//mig med rnams kyang mthong gyur cing //rna ba 'on pas sgra thos la//smyon pa rnams kyang dran ldan las//'jig rten mchod rten 'gyur bar mngon//ji ltar nyon mongs mi gnod cing ///
79a3(mdo sde): 'gro ba byams pa'i yid gyur pas//tshangs pa bye bas mchod 'os su//gdon mi za bar 'gyur bar mngon//sa la me tog rgyas gyur cing //sa yang mnyam par gnas pa las//'gro ba kun
79a4(mdo sde): gyis mchod pa yi//thams cad mkhyen du 'gyur bar mngon//ji ltar 'jig rten 'khrug med cing //pad+ma chen po 'thon pa las//nges par gzi brjid chen po 'di//'jig rten mgon du
79a5(mdo sde): byon par 'gyur//lha yi spos kyis sbags gyur pa//'jam pa'i rlung gi ngad ldang zhing //sems can nad rnams zhi gyur las//'di ni sman pa'i rgyal por byon//gzugs khams
79a6(mdo sde): gnas pa'i lha brgya po//'dod chags bral ba 'di dag kyang //thal mo sbyar zhing 'dud pa las//'di ni sbyin pa'i gnas su byon//mi rnams kyis ni lha mthong zhing //lha rnams kyis ni mi
79a7(mdo sde): mthong yang //phan tshun 'tshe ba med pa las//'di ni ded dpon chen por byon//me rnams zhi bar gnas gyur cing //chu klung thams cad mi g.yo la//sa yang dal bus g.yo ba las//
79b1(mdo sde): 'di ni yang dag gzigs par 'gyur//dge slong dag de ltar byang chub sems dpa' btsas nas zhag bdun lon pa dang /lha mo sgyu 'phrul shi ba'i dus byas par gyur te/de shi ba'i dus byas nas sum cu rtsa
79b2(mdo sde): gsum gyi lha'i nang du skyes so//dge slong dag khyed 'di snyam du byang chub sems dpa'i lan bon gyis lha mo sgyu 'phrul 'chi ba'i dus byas so snyam na de ltar mi blta'o//de ci'i phyir zhe na/de'i tshe'i tshad ni
79b3(mdo sde): mthar thug pa'i phyir ro//dge slong dag 'das pas byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyang btsas nas zhag bdun lon nam 'chi ba'i dus byas par gyur to//de ci'i phyir zhe na/byang chub sems dpa' skyes
79b4(mdo sde): te dbang po yongs su rdzogs nas mngon par byung na ma snying 'gas su 'ong ba'i phyir ro//dge slong dag de ltar zhag bdun lon nas thog ma ser skya'i gnas kyi grong khyer chen po nas lha mo sgyu 'phrul bkod
79b5(mdo sde): pa ji lta bus skyed mos tshal gyi sar zhugs par gyur pa de dag las bye ba brgya stong gyur pas kyang lhag pa'i bkod pa chen pos byang chub sems dpa' grong khyer chen po ser skya'i gnas su zhugs so//de
79b6(mdo sde): zhugs pa dang /bum pa spos chus gang ba lnga stong gis mdun du drangs par gyur to//de bzhin du bu mo lnga stong ni rma bya'i mdongs lag na thogs te mdun du 'dong bar gyur to//bu mo lnga stong ni shing rta la'i
79b7(mdo sde): yal gzogs shing mdun du 'dong bar gyur to//bu mo lnga stong ni spos chu'i ril pa b+h+ring gar thogs te lam chag cha go gis 'debs shing mdun du 'dong bar gyur to//bu mo lnga stong ni nags tshal gyi me
80a1(mdo sde): tog gi phreng ba 'phyang ba khye'u chang sna tshogs thogs te mdun du 'dong bar gyur to//bu mo lnga stong ni bzang por sgyur ba'i rin po che thogs te/lam gyi byi dor byed cing mdun du 'dong bar
80a2(mdo sde): gyur to//bu mo lnga stong ni stan bzang po thogs shing mdun du 'dong bar gyur to//bram ze lnga stong ni dril bu thogs te bkra shis kyi sgra 'byin cing mdun du 'dong bar gyur to//glang po lnga stong ni rgyan
80a3(mdo sde): thams cad kyis brgyan te mdun du 'dong bar gyur to//rta nyis khri ni gser gyi rgyan gyis bkab cing rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan te mdun du 'dong bar gyur to//shing rta brgyad khri ni gdugs dang /
80a4(mdo sde): rgyal mtshan dang /ba dan bsgreng zhing dril bu g.yer ka'i dra bas legs par brgyan te/byang chub sems dpa'i phyi bzhin 'dong bar gyur to//rkang thang dpa' zhing rtul phod pa/yan lag dam
80a5(mdo sde): pa'i gzugs dang ldan pa/go cha sra ba bgos pa bzhi khri ni byang chub sems dpa' 'gro ba'i phyi bzhin 'dong bar gyur to//'dod pa na spyod pa dang /gzugs na spyod pa'i lha grags pa grags pa
80a6(mdo sde): che ba bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong tshad med grangs med pa dag ni na mo mkha'i dkyil nas bkod pa rnam pa sna tshogs du mas byang chub sems dpa' la mchod pa byed cing phyi bzhin 'dong bar gyur to//shing
80a7(mdo sde): rtagang la byang chub sems dpa' 'dug par gyur pa de'ang 'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha rnams kyis bkod pa chen po du mas legs par brgyan par gyur to//lha'i bu mo rgyan thams cad kyis chas
80b1(mdo sde): pa rin po che'i phreng ba thogs pa nyis khri shing rta de drangs te lha'i bu mo gnyis kyi bar du ni mi'i bu mo gcig 'dug/mi'i bu mo gnyis kyi bar du ni lha'i bu mo gcig 'dug kyang byang chub sems dpa'i mthus lha'i
80b2(mdo sde): bu mos kyang mi'i bu mo'i dri mi zhim pa mi tshor/mi'i bu mos kyang lha'i bu mo'i gzugs mthong na bag med par ma gyur te/dge slong dag ser skya'i gnas kyi grong khyer chen por shAkya lnga brgya tsam gyis byang
80b3(mdo sde): chub sems dpa'i cheng du khyim lnga brgya phub ste/de dag byang chub sems dpa' grong khyer der 'jug pa'i tshe/rang rang gis byas pa'i khyim gyi sgor 'khod do/thal mo sbyar nas lus gus par btud
80b4(mdo sde): de rim gro dang bcas pas 'di skad du/kye don thams cad grub pa 'dir gshegs su gsol/kye lha'i lha 'dir gshegs su gsol/kye sems can dag pa 'dir gshegs su gsol/kye kha
80b5(mdo sde): lo sgyur ba dam pa 'dir gshegs su gsol/kye dga' zhing bde ba dang mchog tu dga' ba mdzad pa 'dir gshegs su gsol/kye smad pa med pa'i grags pa mnga' ba 'dir gshegs su
80b6(mdo sde): gsol/kye kun nas spyan mnga' ba 'dir gshegs su gsol/kye ma mnyam pa dang mnyam zhing 'dra ba med pa'i yon tan dang gzi brjid mnga' ba/mtshan dang dpe byad bzang pos yang dag par
80b7(mdo sde): brgyan pa'i sku mnga' ba 'dir gshegs su gsol zhes de skad 'dzer to//de nas rgyal po zas gtsang mas de dag thams cad dang mthun par bya ba'i phyir/byang chub sems dpa' khyim de
81a1(mdo sde): kun tu'ang zhugs par byas te/zla ba bzhi lon pa nas byang chub sems dpa' nyid kyi khyim du zhugs te rin po che sna tshogs bkod pa zhes bya ba'i khang bzang chen po der byang chub sems
81a2(mdo sde): dpa' zhugs par gyur to//de na shAkya rgan rabs rgan rabs rnams 'dus te bgros pa/phan pa'i sems dang /byams pa'i sems kyis yon tan dang ldan pa dang /'jam pa dang ldan par byang
81a3(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' btsa' ba dang /byi dor bya ba dang /nyams su blang bar sus nus zhes byas pa dang /de na shAkya'i bu mo lnga brgya tsam so so nas 'di skad du bdag gis gzhon nu'i rim gro bgyi'o//
81a4(mdo sde): bdag gis gzhon nu'i rim gro bgyi'o zhes zer ro//de na shAkya ches 'gres ches bgres pa de dag na re bu mo 'di dag thams cad ni byis pa gzhon nu thor bu gzhon nu la gzugs dang dar la bab pas
81a5(mdo sde): rgyags shing dregs pa yin pas 'di dag gis byang chub sems dpa' la dus dus su rim gro bya ba mi nus so//skye dgu'i bdag mo chen mo gau ta mI gzhon nu'i sru mo ste/'dis ni gzhon nu bde ba
81a6(mdo sde): dang legs par bskyed par nus so//rgyal po zas gtsang ma'ang mnyes par nus so zhes thams cad gros gcig tu 'dus te/skye dgu'i bdag mo chen mo gau ta mI dad par byas nas/skye dgu'i
81a7(mdo sde): bdag mo chen mo gau ta mIs gzhon nu de legs par bskyed do//de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa'i rim gror ma ma sum cu rtsa gnyis bkod par gyur te/de la brgyad ni pang na 'tsho ba'i ma ma'o//brgyad
81b1(mdo sde): ni nu ma snun pa'i ma ma'o//brgyad ni rtsen 'grogs kyi ma ma'o//brgyad ni dri ma phyi ba'i ma ma'o//de nas rgyal po zas gtsang mas shAkya'i tshogs thams cad bsogs te dpyad pa/ji lta gzhon nu 'di 'khor
81b2(mdo sde): los sgyur ba'i rgyal po zhig tu 'gyur ram/'on te ma yin gyis rab tu 'byung ba'i phyir mngon par 'byung zhes dpyad pa dang /de'i tshe re'i rgyal po gangs ri'i ngos la drang srong chen po nag po zhes bya ba mngon par
81b3(mdo sde): shes pa lnga dang ldan pa zhig snag gi tsha bo mis byin zhes bya ba dang lhan cig tu 'dug 'dug pa las des byang chub sems dpa' btsas pa'i tshe/ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i cho 'phrul mang du mthong ste/nam
81b4(mdo sde): mkha'i dkyil na'ang lha'i bu mang po sangs rgyas kyi sgra sgrog cing gos kyi g.yab mo g.yob pa dang /dga' zhing phan tshun 'dong ba mthong nas/des bsams pa/ma la bdag gis rnam par blta ba zhig
81b5(mdo sde): tu bya 'am snyam nas/des lha'i mig gis dzam+bu'i gling thams cad du bltas na ser skya'i grong khyer chen po de na rgyal po zas gtsang ma'i khyim du gzhon nu bsod nams kyi gzi brjid kyis gzi dang ldan
81b6(mdo sde): par byas pa/'jig rten thams cad kyis mchod pa/skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis lus legs par brgyan pa zhig btsas par mthong nas/bram ze'i khye'u mis byin la smras
81b7(mdo sde): pa/bram ze'i khye'u shes par gyis shig/dzam+bu'i gling du rin po che chen po byung ste/ser skya'i gnas kyi grong khyer chen po na rgyal po zas gtsang ma'i khyim du gzhon nu bsod nams kyi gzi brjid
82a1(mdo sde): kyis gzi dang ldan par byas pa 'jig rten thams cad kyis mchod pa skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang ldan pa btsas so//de gal te khyim na gnas na ni mtha' bzhi la
82a2(mdo sde): dbang ba'i 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por 'gyur te/rnam par rgyal ba dang ldan pa/chos dang ldan pa/chos kyi rgyal po srid kyi mthu stobs thob pa/rin po che sna bdun dang ldan par 'gyur te/de'i rin
82a3(mdo sde): po che sna bdun ni 'di lta ste/'khor lo rin po che dang /glang po rin po che dang /rta rin po che dang /nor bu rin po che dang /bud med rin po che dang /khyim bdag rin po che dang /blon po rin po che dang bdun
82a4(mdo sde): 'byung bar 'gyur ro//de la bu stong yod par 'gyur te/dpa' ba/rtul phod pa/yan lag mchog gi gzugs dang ldan pa/pha rol gyi sde 'joms pa sha stag 'byung bar 'gyur ro//de ni sa
82a5(mdo sde): chen po'i dkyil 'khor 'di rgya mtsho'i mtha' bskor dang bcas pa chad pa med cing mtshon gyis bda' ba med pa dang /chos dang mthun par rang gi mthus zil gyis mnan cing mngon par phab ste/dbang
82a6(mdo sde): byug gi dbang gis rgyal srid byed par 'gyur ro//de gal te khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung na'ang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas su 'gyur te/ston
82a7(mdo sde): pa 'dren pa gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog pa/'jig rten du sgra rnam par grags par 'gyur ro//de lta ngas na tshur shog da ltar 'dong ngo //de nas drang srong chen po nag po snag gi tsha bo mis byin dang
82b1(mdo sde): 'grogs te/ngang pa'i rgyal po ltar nam mkha'i dkyil nas ldings te ser skya'i gnas kyi grong khyer chen po ga la ba der song nas phyin pa dang /rdzu 'phrul brtul nas rkang gis ser skya'i gnas kyi grong khyer chen por
82b2(mdo sde): dong ste/rgyal po zas gtsang ma'i khyim ga la ba der phyin nas/rgyal po zos gtsang ma'i khyim gyi sgor bsdad do//dge slong dag de ltar drang srong nag po des rgyal po zas gtsang ma'i khyim gyi sgo drung du srog chags
82b3(mdo sde): brgya stong mang po 'dus pa mthong ngo //de nas drang srong nag po sgo ba'i drung du song ste 'di skad ces smras so//kye mi khyod song la rgyal po zas gtsang ma la chab sgon drang srong zhig mchis so zhes gsol cing //de
82b4(mdo sde): nas sgo ba des de ltar bgyi'o zhes drang srong nag po'i ltar mnyan te/rgyal po zas gtsang ma ga la ba der song nas phyin pa dang thal mo sbyar te/rgyal po zas gtsang ma la 'di skad ces smras so//lha mkhyen
82b5(mdo sde): par mdzad du gsol/chab sgo na drang srong rgan po 'khogs pa nas gzer ba zhig mchis te/'di skad du bdag ni rgyal po'i zhal mthong bar 'tshal lo zhes mchi'o//de nas rgyal po zas gtsang mas drang
82b6(mdo sde): srong nag po'i stan 'ding du bcug ste/mi de la 'di skad ces smras so//drang srod de nang du 'ong bar gyis shig/de nas mi de rgyal po'i pho brang nas byung nas/drang srong nag po la 'di skad ces smras te/nang
82b7(mdo sde): du bzhud cig/de nas drang srong nag po rgyal po zas gtsang ma ga la ba der song ste phyin pa dang /mdun du 'dug ste rgyal po zas gtsang ma la 'di skad ces smras so//rgyal po chen po rgyal bar spyon cig/
83a1(mdo sde): rgyal bar spyon cig/sku tshe ring bar srungs shig/chos bzhin du rgyal po mdzod cig/de nas rgyal po zas gtsang mas/drang srong nag po la yon chu dang rkang pa la gtor ba'i
83a2(mdo sde): chus mchod pa byas te shin tu legs par yongs su bskur nas stan la bdar te/de stan la bde bar 'dug par shes nas zhe sa dang bcas/gus pa dang bcas par 'di skad ces smras so//drang
83a3(mdo sde): srong sngon mthong bar mi dran na 'dir ci la byon ci zhig bzhed/de skad ces smras pa dang /drang srong nag pos rgyal po zas gtsang ma la 'di skad ces smras so//rgyal po chen po khyod kyi sras shig bltams
83a4(mdo sde): par gyur pa de lta zhing bdag 'dir mchis so//rgyal pos smras pa/drang srong chen po gzhon nu nyal zhing mchis kyis langs kyi bar du cung zad cig gzhes shig/drang srong gis smras pa/rgyal po
83a5(mdo sde): chen po skyes bu chen po de lta bu ni ring por mi nyal te/skyes bu dam pa de lta bu dag ni sad par gnas pa'i ngang tshul can no//dge slong dag de nas byang chub sems dpas drang srong nag po de la snying brtse
83a6(mdo sde): ba nye bar bzung ste sad pa'i brda byas so//de nas rgyal po zas gtsang mas gzhon nu don thams cad grub pa lag pa gnyis kyis shin tu legs par blangs te/drang srong nag po'i drung du khyer ro//de nas
83a7(mdo sde): drang srong nag pos byang chub sems dpa' bltas na/skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang ldan zhing dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus legs par rnam par spras pa'i lus dang ldan pa/brgya
83b1(mdo sde): byin dang /tshangs pa dang /'jig rten skyong ba las 'phags pa'i lus can nyi mu brgya phrag stong las kyang lhag pa'i gzi brjod dang ldan pa/yan lag thams cad du mdzes pa mthong nas/kye ma 'jog
83b2(mdo sde): rten du ngo mtshar gyis gang zag 'di byung ngo //kye ma 'jig rten du ngo mtshar chen po dang ldan pa'i gang zag 'di byung ngo zhes ched du brjod pa ched du brjod nas/stan las langs te thal mo sbyar nas/byang chub
83b3(mdo sde): sems dpa'i rkang pa gnyis la phyag 'tshal te/bskor ba byas nas byang chub sems dpa' pang du blangs te/sems shing 'dug par gyur to//de nas des byang chub sems dpa'i'o lus la skyes bu chen
83b4(mdo sde): po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis yod pa mthong ste/de dag dang ldan pa'i skyes bu gang zag de rnam pa gnyis su 'gyur gyi/gzhan du mi 'gyur ro//gal te khyim na gnas na ni mtha' bzhi la dbang ba'i
83b5(mdo sde): 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por 'gyur te zhes bya ba nas snga ma bzhin du dbang phyug gi dbang gis rgyal srid byed do zhes bya ba'i bar du 'gyur ba dang /gal te khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung na no de bzhin
83b6(mdo sde): gshegs par 'gyur te/yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas su grags pa 'dren pa gzhan gyi drong mi 'jog par 'gyur ba mthong nas/des de lta bu mthong ba dang /mchi ma blags te ngus nas
83b7(mdo sde): shugs ring du phyung ba dang /rgyal po zas gtsang mas drang srong de mchi ma blags te rus nas shugs ring du 'byin par mthong nas/dngangs te mi dga' zhing rings par rings par drang srong chen po de la
84a1(mdo sde): smras pa/drang srong de ltar bshums mo blags te bshums pa dang /shugs ring du 'byin pa ci zhig nongs/gzhon nu 'di la mi dge ba 'am zhig mi gda' 'am/de skad ces smras
84a2(mdo sde): pa dang /drang srong chen po nag pos rgyal po zas gtsang ma la 'di skad ces smras so//rgyal po chen po bdag ni gzhon nu'i slad du ngu ba'ang ma lags/'di la mi dge ba'ang gang yang ma mchis
84a3(mdo sde): te/bdag nyid du bar bas so//de ci'i slad du zhe na/rgyal po chen po bdag ni rgas shing 'khogs te nas gzer la gzhon nu don thams cad grub pa 'di ni gdon mi 'tshal bar bla na med pa yang
84a4(mdo sde): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ste/bla na med pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo dge sbyong ngam/bram ze 'am/lha 'am/bdud dam/tshangs pa'am/gzhan sus kyang
84a5(mdo sde): rung ste/'jig rten du chos dang mthun par bskor bar mi nus pa skor bar 'gyur ro//lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten la sman pa dang bde ba'i slad du chos ston par 'gyur te/tshangs par spyod
84a6(mdo sde): pa/thog mar dge ba/bar du dge ba/tha mar dge ba'i chos/don bzang po/tshig 'bru bzang po/ma 'dres pa/yongs su rdzogs pa yongs su dag pa/yongs su byang ba'i mthor
84a7(mdo sde): phyin pa'i chos yang dag par ston par 'gyur ro//sems can skye ba'i chos can dag 'di las chos de thos nas/skye ba las yongs su ma grol ba rnams grol bar 'gyur ro//de bzhin du
84b1(mdo sde): sems can rga ba dang /na ba dang /'chi ba dang /mya ngan dang /smre sngags 'don pa dang /sdug bsngal ba dang /yid mi bde ba dang /'khrug pa'i chos can rnams ni rga ba dang /na ba dang /'chi ba dang //
84b2(mdo sde): mya ngan dang /smre sngags 'don pa dang /sdug bsngal ba dang /yid mi bde ba dang /'khrug pa rnams las yongs su grol bar 'gyur/sems can 'dod chags dang /zhe sdang dang /gti mug gi
84b3(mdo sde): mes gdungs pa rnams la ni dam pa'i chos kyi char pas sim par mdzad par 'gyur/sems can lta ba ngan pa sna tshogs thibs pos khebs pa lam gol bar zhugs pa rnams ni lam drang pos
84b4(mdo sde): mya ngan las 'das par 'dren par 'gyur/sems can 'khor ba'i dra ba dang btson+da rar 'khor zhing nyon mongs pa'i 'ching bas bcings pa rnams ni bcings pa las yongs su grol bar mdzad
84b5(mdo sde): par 'gyur/sems can mi shes pa'i mun pa dang /rab rib dang /ling tog gis mig ldong ba rnams la ni shes rab kyi mig skyed par 'gyur/sems can nyon mongs pa'i zug rngus zug
84b6(mdo sde): pa rnams la ni zug rngu 'byin par 'gyur te/rgyal po chen po 'di lta ste dper na u dum+WA ra'i me tog ni brgya la brgya lam na 'jig rten du 'byung ngo //rgyal po chen po de bzhin du bskal pa bye ba khrag
84b7(mdo sde): drig mang por brgya la brgya lam na/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams 'jig rten du 'byung ste/de ltar gzhon nu 'di ni nges par bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par
85a1(mdo sde): rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur te/mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas kyang sems can bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho'i pha rol tu sgrol bar 'gyur zhing 'chi ba
85a2(mdo sde): med pa la rab tu gzhog par 'gyur la/bdag gis ni sangs rgyas dkon mchog de mi mthong ba dang /bdag gi nod ma mchis pa 'di la'ang 'dod chags dang bral bar gyur te/rgyal po chen po bdag
85a3(mdo sde): ni de'i slad du ngu zhing mi dga' bas shugs ring du 'byin pa lags so//rgyal po chen po bdag cag gi bstan bcos las 'byung ba lta na ni gzhon nu don thams cad grub pa'ang khab na bzhugs
85a4(mdo sde): par mi 'gyur ro//de ci'i slad du zhe na/'di ltar rgyal po chen po gzhon nu don thams cad grub pa 'di ni skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang ldan pa ste/sum cu rtsa gnyis gang zhe na/
85a5(mdo sde): rgyal po chen po 'di lta ste gzhon nu don thams cad grub pa ni dbu gtsug tor dang ldan pa ste/rgyal po chen po gzhon nu don thams cad grub pa ni skyes bu chen po'i mtshan dang po 'di dang ldan no//
85a6(mdo sde): rgyal po chen po gzhon nu don thams cad grub pa ni dbu stang zil bcag pa'i 'phro dang rma bya'i mgrin pa ltar mthon mthing du grub cing lcang lor 'khril lo g.yas su 'khyil ba dang /dpral ba'i dbyes
85a7(mdo sde): mnyam pa lags so//rgyal po chen po gzhon nu don thams cad grub pa'i smin mtshams su mdzad spu skyes pa ni kha ba dang dngul gyi mdog ltar mchis pa lags so//rgyal po chen po gzhon
85b1(mdo sde): nu bo ni thams cad grub pa ni spyan gyi rdzim pa'i rje ma lta bu dang /spyan dkar nag 'byes pa dang /tshoms bzhi bcu mnyam pa dang /tshems thags bzang ba dang /choms shin tu dkar ba dang ldan pa lpags
85b2(mdo sde): so//rgyal po chen po gzhon nu don thams cad grub pa ni tshangs pa'i dbyangs dang /ro bro ba'i mchog dang ldan pa dang /ljags shin tu ring zhing srab pa dang /'gram pa seng ge'i 'dra ba dang /dpung mgo shin tu
85b3(mdo sde): zlum pa dang /bdun mtho ba dang /thal gong rgyas pa dang /pags pa slab cing mdog gser 'dra ba dang /bzhengs bzhin du ma btud par phyag pus mo slebs pa dang /ro stod seng ge'i lta bu dang
85b4(mdo sde): ldan pa lags so//rgyal po chen po gzhon nu don thams cad grub pa ni shing n+ya gro d+ha ltar chu zheng gab pa dang /s+phu re re nas skyes pa dang /yan lag gi spu g.yas phyogs nas gyen du 'khyil ba dang /
85b5(mdo sde): 'doms kyi sba ba sbubs su nub pa dang /brla legs par zlum pa dang /byin pa ri dgas kyi rgyal po e na ya'i lta bu dang /sor mo ring ba dang /zhabs kyi rtang pa yangs pa dang /zhabs kyi gong mtho ba dang /
85b6(mdo sde): phyag dang zhabs kyi mthil 'jam pa dang /phyag dang zhabs kyi sor mo dra bas 'bral ba dang ldan pa lags so//rgyal po chen po gzhon nu don thams cad grub pa'i zhabs kyi 'og gi mthil gnyis la
85b7(mdo sde): 'khor lo re re skyes pa ni bzang zhing rtsibs stong dang ldan la/mu khyud dang bcas/lte ba dang bcas pa lags so//rgyal po chen po gzhon nu don thams cad grub pa ni zhabs mnyam zhing shin tu gnas
86a1(mdo sde): pa dang ldan pa lags so//rgyal po chen po gzhon nu don thams cad grub pa ni skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis po 'di dag dang ldan no//rgyal po chen po mtshan gyi rnam pa
86a2(mdo sde): de lta bu dag ni 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po la mi 'byung ste/mtshan de lta bu dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams la 'byung ngo //rgyal po chen po gzhon nu don thams cad grub pa'i sku la dpe byad bzang
86a3(mdo sde): po brgyad cu mchis te/de dag dang ldan pas gzhan nu don thams cad grub pa ni khab na bzhugs par mi 'gyur gyi/gdon mi 'tshal bar rab tu 'byung ba'i don du mngon par 'byung bar 'gyur ro//rgyal
86a4(mdo sde): po chen po dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu po de dag gang zhe na/'di lta ste rgyal po chen po gzhon nu don thams cad grub pa ni sen mo mtho ba dang /sen mo zangs kyi mdog lta bu dang /sen mo mdog snum
86a5(mdo sde): pa dang /sor mo rnams zlum pa dang /sor mo rnams rgyas pa dang /sor mo byin gyis phra ba dang /rtsa mi mngon pa dang /long bu mi mngon pa dang /tshigs mi mngon pa dang /zhabs mnyam zhing
86a6(mdo sde): mi mnyam pa ma mchis pa dang /zhabs kyi rting pa yangs pa dang ldan pa lagaso so//rgyal po chen po gzhon nu don thams cad grub pa ni phyag gi ri mo mtshungs pa dang ldan zhing phyag gi ri mo
86a7(mdo sde): mdangs yod pa dang /phyag gi ri mo zab pa dang /phyag gi ri mo ya yor ma gyur pa dang /phyag gi ri mo rim par 'tsham pa dang /sgros bim+ba ltar dmar ba dang /sgra mi drag pa'i chog dang /ljags
86b1(mdo sde): mnyen zhing 'jam la zangs kyi mdog ltar 'dug pa dang /glang po che'i nga ro dang /'brug gi sgra dang ldan pa dang /snyan zhing 'jam pa dang ldan pa legs so//rgyal po chen po gzhon nu don thams cad grub pa
86b2(mdo sde): ni dpe byad bzang po yongs su rdzogs pa ste/phyag ring ba dang /sku'i na bza' gtsang ma phun sum tshogs pa dang /sku 'jam pa dang /bsnyengs pa mi mnga' ba'i sku dang /zhum pa mi mnga' ba'i sku dang /
86b3(mdo sde): rim por 'tsham pa'i sku dang /shin tu dpa' bar mdzes pa'i sku dang /rnam par legs par grub pa'i sku dang /pus mo'i lha nga yangs shing rgya tsha la shin tu gang ba dang ldan pa lags so//rgyal po chen
86b4(mdo sde): po gzhon nu don thams cad grub pa ni sku zlum pa dang ldan pa ste/sku shin tu 'jam pa dang /sku ya yo ma mchis pa dang /sku rim gyis legs par grub pa dang /lte ba zab pa dang /lte ba ma yo ba dang /lta
86b5(mdo sde): ba rim gyis gzhol ba dang /drang srong ltar gtsang sbras spyod pa dang /kun nas mdzes pa dang /snang ba dam pa shin tu rnam par dag cing /rab rib ma mchis pa'i 'od kun nas 'byung ba dang ldan pa
86b6(mdo sde): lags so//rgyal po chen po gzhon nu don thams cad grub pa ni glang po ltar dal ba'i 'gros dang /seng ge'i stabs lta bu'i 'gros dang /khyu mchog gi stabs lta bu'i 'gros dang /ngang pa'i stabs
86b7(mdo sde): lta bu'i 'bros dang /g.yas phyogs su mdzes par 'khor ba'i 'gros dang /dku zlum pa dang /dku skabs phyin pa dang /dku ma rnyongs pa dang /rked pa gzhu'i 'chang bzung ltar phra ba dang /mdog
87a1(mdo sde): gi nyes pa sngo ba 'am/gnag pa'i skyon dang bral ba'i sku dang ldan pa lags so//rgyal po chen po gzhon nu don thams cad grub pa ni mche ba zlum pa dang /mche ba rno ba dang /mche ba byin
87a2(mdo sde): gyis phra ba dang /shangs legs par mtho ba dang /spyan gsal ba dang /spyan dri ma med pa dang /'dzum pa'i spyan dang ldan pa dang /spyan ring ba dang /spyan yangs pa dang /ut+pa la sngon po
87a3(mdo sde): lta bu'i spyan dang ldan pa lags so//rgyal po chen po gzhon nu don thams cad grub pa ni smin ma'i spu mnyam pa dang /smin me sdug pa dang /smin ma gra nag po dang /smin ma rgyun chags pa dang /
87a4(mdo sde): sgron mngon gyis gzhol ba dang /mabur ba rgyas pa dang /mkhur ba mi mnyam pa med pa dang /mkhur ba skyon dang bral ba dang /sdang ba dang /khro ba'i mdog med pa dang /shin tu rig pa'i dbang
87a5(mdo sde): po dang ldan pa lags so//rgyal po chen po gzhon nu don thams cad grub pa de ni mdzod spu yongs su rdzogs pa dang ldan pa dang /gdong dang dpral ba rkyen du 'bab pa dang /dbu yongs su rgyas pa
87a6(mdo sde): dang /dbu skra gnag pa dang /dbu skra mnyam pa dang /dbu skra dri zhim pa dang /dbu skra mi bshor ba dang /dbu skra mi 'jing pa dang /dbu skra byin gyis phra ba dang /dbu skra lcang lor 'khril ba dang
87a7(mdo sde): ldan pa lags so//rgyal po chen po gzhon nu don thams cad grub pa de ni dbu skra dpal gyi be'u dang /bkra shis dang /g.yung drung 'khyil ba dang /sdong ris kyi dbyibs lta bu'i dbu skra dang
87b1(mdo sde): ldan pa'o//rgyal po chen po 'di dag ni gzhon nu don thams cad grub pa'i dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu ste/de dag dang ldan pas gzhon nu don thams cad grub pa ni khab na bzhugs par mi 'gyur gyi/gdon mi 'chal
87b2(mdo sde): bar rab tu 'byung ba'i slad du mngon par 'byung bar 'gyur ro//de nas rgyal po zas gtsang mas drang srong chen po nag po las gzhon nu'i lung bstan pa de thos nas tshim zhing mgu la yi rangs te rab tu dga' zhing
87b3(mdo sde): dga' ba dang /yid bde ba skyes nas stan las langs te/byang chub sems dpa'i rkang pa gnyis la phyag 'tshal nas tshigs su bcad pa 'di smras so//khyod la lha kun phyag 'tshal zhing //drang srong rnams
87b4(mdo sde): kyis mchod gyur te//'jig rten kun gyi mchod rten pas//bdag kyang khyod la phyag 'tshal lo//dge slong dag de ltar rgyal po zas gtsang mas drang srong chen po nag po dang /snag gi tsha bo mis byin dang bcas
87b5(mdo sde): te/kha zas tshul dang 'dra bas tshim par byas nas/gos bskon te bskor ba byas so//de nas drang srong chen po nag po gnas de nyid nas rdzu 'phrul gyis nam mkha' las rang gi gnas ga la ba der song ngo //de
87b6(mdo sde): nas drang srong chen po nag pos bram ze'i khye'u mis byin la 'di skad ces smras so//mis byin khyod kyis nam sangs rgyas 'jig rten du byung ngo zhes thos pa de'i tshe/khyod song ste de'i bstan pa la rab tu byung zhig dang /
87b7(mdo sde): de ni khyod kyi yun ring po'i don dang /phon pa dang bde bar 'gyur ro//de la 'di skad tsos bya ste/lha'i tshogs rnams nam mkha'i ngos la gnas te sangs rgyas sgra sgrog pa//lha yi drang srong nag po ri sul
88a1(mdo sde): gnas pas mthong nas dga' mchog thob//'di na srog chags rnams kyi dga' skyed sangs rgyas zhes bya'i tshig 'di ci//bdag gi lus kyang rab sim gyur cing sems bde mchog tu zhi
88a2(mdo sde): bar gyur//de lha'am 'on te lha min yang na nam mkha' lding ngam mi 'am ci//sangs rgyas zhes bya dga' dang mos byed tshig 'di sngon chad ma thos ci//lha yi mig gi phyogs bcur ri dang sa dang rgya
88a3(mdo sde): mtsho rnams la bltas//phyis yang sa ri mtsho la rmad du byung ba rnam pa sna tshogs mthong //'od gsal mdzes po lus la sim byed 'di ni rab tu bzang snang zhing //ji ltar ri yi rtse mo rnams su byu ru'i
88a4(mdo sde): myu gu 'thon gyur la//shing ljon rnams kyang me tog bzang rgyas sna tshogs 'bras bus rgyan gyur las//srid pa gsum du dkon mchog dam pa myur du 'byung bar shin tu gsal//sa 'ad
88a5(mdo sde): thams cad mnyam zhing dri med lag mthil bzhin du snang ba dang //lha rnams dga' zhing nam mkha'i dkyil na gos kyi g.yab mo 'byin gyur la//klu rgyal rgya mtsho'i gnas kyi steng na rin chen
88a6(mdo sde): rmad byung 'phyo ba las//dzam+bu'i gling du rgyal ba'i dkon mchog chos kyi 'byung gnas nges par 'byung //ngan song zhi zhing sdug bsngal dril te sems can rnams ni bder ldan la//lha yi tshogs
88a7(mdo sde): rnams nam mkha'i dkyil la dga' dang ldan par rgyu ba dang //ji ltar lha yi glu dbyangs sgra snyan yid du 'ong ba phrag pa las//srid pa gsum 'dir dkon mchog 'byung 'gyur de yi ltas su gdon miH/
88b1(mdo sde): dzam+bu'i gling 'dir drang srong nag pos lha yi mig gis rnam bltas na//ser skya'i grong na rgyal po zas gtsang grong khyer dam pa yod pa der//mthu chen mthu ldan pa can dang bsod nams gzi brjid rgyas pa btsas
88b2(mdo sde): bamadzang //mthing nas dga' mgu rangs shing bde ba'i yid skyes mthu yang skyes par gyur//de nas ngo mtshor rnyed de rang gi slob ma lhan cig rings su dang //phyin nas ser skyar brjod pa'i rgyal po'i grong khyer
88b3(mdo sde): mchog gi sgor 'dug ste//zhangs 'bring srog chags bye ba khrog khrig mang po drang srong des mthong nas//sgo ba de la smras pa chab sgor drang srong phyin ces myur du gsol//de mnyan myur du po dang nang phyin rgyal
88b4(mdo sde): po la ni de bskyed pa//lha cig drang srong rgan 'khogs dka' thub chen po can zhig chab sgor mchis//drang srong mchog de rgyal po'i pho brang nang du mchi bar dga' zhes mchi//rgyal po chen po nang
88b5(mdo sde): du btang ngam mi btang bdag la bka' stsal gsol//de nas de yi stan bting rgyal pos khyod song nang du bos zhes bsgo//drang srong nag pos bsgo ba'i tshig thos dga' mgu ba de dang ldan par gyur//skom
88b6(mdo sde): pa bsil ba'i chu 'dod bkres pas gdungs pa zas la mos da ltar//drang srong dam pa de yang sems can mchog de mthong du mngon par dga'//rgyal po rgyal gyur sku tshe ring bsrung gsol zhes dga' bas
88b7(mdo sde): de skad smras//snyan par brjod nas yid dul dbang po zhi zhing des pa stan la 'dug/rgyal pos gus par smra byas dang srong thub pa de la tshig brjod pa//rgyal po'i pho brang 'dir byon rgyu ci thub pas bdag
89a1(mdo sde): la myur du gsungs//khyod kyi sras bltams gzugs mchog pha rol phyin cing gzi brjid tshe dang ldan//mthu chen mtshan rab sum cu gnyis kyis kun nas brgyan mnga' ba//rgyal
89a2(mdo sde): po khyod sras thams cad don grub de ni mthong bar bdag dga' ste//de slad 'dir mchis rgyal po bdag la 'tshal ba gzhan ni yod ma mchis/legs so legs par byon te mnyel tam mo
89a3(mdo sde): mnyel khyod mthong bdag dga'o//mchog sbyin gzhon nu de nyal de ltar blta ba'i skabs ni ma mchis kyis//re zhig yud tsam gzhes dang 'dir ni zla ba nya ba dri med pa//skar ma'i tshogs kyis
89a4(mdo sde): dargyan po 'dra ba'i dri med gzigs par 'gyur//gang tshe kha lo sgyur mchog zla nga rgyas pa'i 'od mnga' de sad pa//de tshe rgyal pos 'od 'bar gzugs 'chang nyi las 'phags 'od pang blangs te/
89a5(mdo sde): 'di ltar drang srong lha mis mchod pa gser mchog gzugs ldan de gzigs shig/drang srong nag pos de yi rkang pa mdzes pa 'khor lo'i mtshan can mthong //de nas langs te thal mo sbyar nas
89a6(mdo sde): rkang pa gnyis la phyag 'tshal te//bdag nyid chen po bstan bcos mkhas pas pang du blangs nas bsams shing bltas//des ni mthu chen mthu ldan mtshan gyi mchog gis brgyan pa mthong
89a7(mdo sde): gyur nas//mgo gtsogs rig byed bstan bcos mkhas pa des ni de la rnam gnyis mthong //stobs ldan 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po 'am sangs rgyas 'jig rten gtso bor 'gyur//shin tu
89b1(mdo sde): mi dga' lus dang sems kyi mchi ma blags te shugs ring phyung //rgyal po mchog kyang dngangs par gyur nas bram ze ci slad bshums zhes smra//drang srong nag pos bdag gi don grub bgegs shig ma gzigs
89b2(mdo sde): sam/drang srong ci smad pa shums mdzad dag sdig gang gzigs bdag la mang par gsungs//khyod sras don kun grub la bar chad sdig tu 'gyur ba ma mchis te/bdag la bdag nyid rgas shing 'di ltar 'alogs
89b3(mdo sde): par gyur ces mya ngan bgyid//'di ni sangs rgyas 'jig rten mchog 'gyur chos kyang yang dag ston par 'gyur//bdag gis dga' ba thob pas yid kyis mi mthong ngo zhes de skad du//'di yi sku la mtshan rab
89b4(mdo sde): sum bu cu gnyis dri med mnga' ba las//rnam pa gnyis su 'gyur te gsum du ma mchis rgyal po mkhyen par mdzod//'dir los sgyur ba'i rgyal 'gyur yang na sangs rgyas 'jig rten gtso bor byon//'di ni
