89b5(mdo sde): 'dod pa'i yon tan bzhad par mi 'gyur nges par sangs rgyas 'gyur//drang srong lung bstan de thos rgyal po dga' zhing bde ba thob par gyur//de nas langs te thal mo sbyar nas rkang pa gnyis la phyag kyang
89b6(mdo sde): byas//stobs mchog ldan pa khyod ni lces mchod drang srong rnams kyis bsngags pa ste//sid gsum kun gyi 'gro ba'i ded dpon mchog gyur khyod la phyag 'tshal lo//drang srong dga' bas tsha bo de la smras pa
89b7(mdo sde): nga yi gdar sa ngag nyon//gong tshe 'di ni byang chub sangs rgyas 'gro la 'i khor lo bskor thos pa//de rje myur du thub pa'i brnyan la rang zung myo ngan 'das pa 'jog//dang srong dam pa de yis rkang la phyag 'tshal
90a1(mdo sde): bskor ba byas nas ni//'di 'dra'i sras mnga' khyod kyi thob pa rgya chen legs par thob ces smras//'di ni 'jig rten lha dang mir bcas chos kyis tshim par mdzad par 'gyur//drang srong
90a2(mdo sde): mchog de ser skya'i gnas nos byung nas bdag gnas dgon par phyin////'phags pa rgya cher rol pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo//bam po drug pa//dge slong dag de ltar byang chub
90a3(mdo sde): sems dpa' bces ma thag tu lha'i bu dbang phyug chen pos/gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha'i bu rnams la bos te/'di skad ces sras so//grogs po dag byang chub sems dpa' sems
90a4(mdo sde): dpa' chen po gang bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong grangs med par yongs su sbyang ba byas pa/sbyin pa dang /tshul khrims dang /bzod pa dang /brtson 'grus dang /bsam gtan dang /shes
90a5(mdo sde): rab dang /thabs dang /thos pa dang /spyod pa dang /brtul zhugs dang /dka' thubo can spyad pa legs par spyad pa/byams pa chen po dang /snying rje chen po dang /dga' ba chen po dang ldan
90a6(mdo sde): pa/btang snyoms kyis yang dag par 'phags pa'i blo can/sems can thams cad la phan por brtson pa/brtson 'grus brtan pa'i go cha legs par bgos pa/sngon gyi rgyal ba la dge
90a7(mdo sde): ba'i rtsa ba skyed pas byung ba/bsod nams brgya pa'i mtshan gyis yang dag par brgyan pa/rtul ba nges par byas pa dang ldan pa pha rol gyi dmag tshogs rab tu 'joms pa/dga' ba'i
90b1(mdo sde): bsam pa shin tu dri ma med pa phun sum tshogs pa/ye shes chen po'i tog gi rgyal mtshan can/bdud kyi stobs mthar 'byin pa/stong gsum gyi ded dpon chen po/lha dang mis mchod pa/mchod
90b2(mdo sde): sbyin chen po'i mchod sbyin byas pa/bsod nams kyi tshogs shin tu phun sum tshogs pa dang ldan pa/'byung ba'i bsam pa con/skye ba dang /rga ba dang /'chi ba mthar 'byin pa/legs par skye bas
90b3(mdo sde): skyes pa/'gro ba rnam par byang chub par byed pa/bu ram shing pa'i rgyal po'i rigs su skyes nas mi'i 'jig rten du byung ste/de myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs
90b4(mdo sde): par 'tshang rgyas tshur shog/bdag cag de la phyag 'tshal zhing rim gror bya ba dang /bkur stir bya ba dang /mngon par bstod par bya ba'i phyir 'dong ngo //lha'i bu nga rgyal gyi zil gyis non pa gzhan
90b5(mdo sde): drag kyang bdag cag byang chub sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal ba mthong ba dang /de dag kyang nga rgyal dong /dregs pa dang /rgyags pa gtong bar 'gyur te/byang chub sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal
90b6(mdo sde): zhing rim gro dang bkur sti byed par bya ba'i phyir 'dong ngo //de ni lha'i bu de dag la yun ring po'i don dang /phan pa dang /bde ba dang /'chi ba med pa 'thob pa'i bar du 'gyur ro//rgyal po zas gtsang ma
90b7(mdo sde): rgyal ba 'phel ba'ang rjes su bsgrags par 'gyur ro//byang chub sems dpa' yang de kho na'i lung bstan pas lung bstan te bdag cag phyir 'ong bar bya'o//de skad ces bsgo nas lha'i bu dbang phyug chen
91a1(mdo sde): go lha'i bubargya stong phrag bcu gnyis kyis yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdang nas ser sgra'i gnas kyi grong khyer chen po thams cad 'ang byas rgyas par ga ste/rgyal po zas gang ma /
91a2(mdo sde): drang ga la ba der song nas phyin pa dang /sgobs rgyal po la gsol te/rgyal pos gnang nas rgyal po'i pho brang du phyin te/byang chub sems dpa'i rkang pa lnga mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas/bla gos phrag
91a3(mdo sde): pa gcig tu gzar te/lan brgya stong phrag du mar bskor ba byas nas byang chub sems dpa' pang du blangs te rgyalnga po zas gtsang ma la dga' bar bya ba'i phyir 'di skad ces smras so//rgyal po chen po
91a4(mdo sde): dgyes pa'i dam par dgyes par mdzod cig/de ci'i smod du zhe no/rgyal po chen po byang chub sems dpa'i sku mtshan dang dpe byad bzang pos legs par brgyan pa dang /gzhon nus lha dang /mi
91a5(mdo sde): dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten kha dog dang /gzi brjid dang /grags pa dang /dpal gyis zil gyis non pa las na/rgyal po chen po byang chub sems dpa' ni gdon mi 'tshal bar bla na
91a6(mdo sde): med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro//dge slong dag de ltar lha'i bu dbang phyug chen po gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha'i bu mang po dang lhan cig tu
91a7(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' la mchod pa dang /rim gro chen po byas te/de bo na'i lung bstan pas byang chub sems dpa' lung bstan nas phyir bdag gi gnas su song ngo //de la 'di skad ces bya ste/
91b1(mdo sde): yon tan rgya mtsho'i pha rol phyin pa de bltams pa//lha yi dbang pos shes nas dka' ste lha la smras//de thos 'gyur ba'ang bskal pa bye mang shin tu dka'//tshur shog mi yi dbang po de la mchod du
91b2(mdo sde): 'deng //rin chen nor bus gtsug ni legs brgyan spyod lam ldan//gtsug phud mdzes pa 'phyang ba rnam par dag pa'i lha//stong phrag bcu gnyis tshang ba ser skya'i gnas mchog tu//myur du lhag
91b3(mdo sde): nas rgyal po'i sgo yi drung na sdod//de dag rnams kyis sgo ba la ni yid 'ong smras//rgyal po'i pho brang song ste thugs su chud par gsol//chab sgo bas kyang tshig de mnyan nas nang du song //thal mo sbyar
91b4(mdo sde): nas rgyal po de la 'di skad smras//lha cig rtag tu rgyal gyur sku tshe ring du srungs//bsod nams yangs pa rnam dag 'od can chab sgor mchis//rin chen nor bus gtsug ni legs brgyan spyod lam ldan//
91b5(mdo sde): zla ba nya ltar bzhin bzang zla ltar dri med 'ong //rgyal po de dag gang du mchi yang grib mi gda'//sug pa 'dor yang gom pa'i sgra dag thos mi 'gyur//dog sar rgyu ba bgyid kyang rdul ni yong mi ldang //
91b6(mdo sde): skye bo rnams kyang de dag mthong na ngoms mi 'gyur//de dag lus kyi 'od ni shin tu rgya chen gsol//tshig kyang yid du mchis te mi la dpe ma mchis//zab cing 'jam mnyan snyan pa 'byung ba'i gnas
91b7(mdo sde): los na//de dag mi ma lags kyi lha tshogs lags snyam bgyid//me tog mchog phreng phyug pa dar gyi lda ldi dag/kun gyi lag na thogs nas gus dang bcas par sdod//rgyal po lha rnams de dag
92a1(mdo sde): gzhon nu lha yi lha//blta bar 'tshal zhing mchod pa'i slad du mchis su nges//rgyal pos de skad tshig thos rab tu dgar gyur nas//song ste kun kyang pho brang nang du gshegs zhes gyis//
92a2(mdo sde): dedag yon tan spyod lam khyed kyis smras ltar na//rdzu 'phrul de 'dra ba ni me la gang yang med//sgo bas thal mo sbyar te lha la 'di skad smras//rgyal pos gnang gis khyad cag nang du bzhud du gsal
92a3(mdo sde): lag na phreng thogs de dag dga' mgu yi rangs te//lho yi gnas dang 'dra ba'i rgyal po'i khyim du zhugs//lha mchog de dag khyim du phyin par mthong nas ni//rgyal po ston las langs te thal mo sbyar/
92a4(mdo sde): byas nas//rin chen rtsa ba can gyi khwa gdan bshams pa 'dir//thugs brtse mdzad pa'i thugs kyis khyed cag bzhugs su gsol//nga rgyal dregs med de dag stan la 'khod par gyur//bdag
92a5(mdo sde): cig ci slad 'dir mchis rgyal po gsan du gsol//khyod sras rnam dag sku mnga' bsod nams chen po bltams//shin tu legs pa'i zhabs ldan bdag cag mthong bar 'tshal//gang gi 'gro ba
92a6(mdo sde): gang dang sbyor ba gang cir 'gyur//mtshan bzang mtshan gyi cho ga dag ni bdag cag 'tshal//de bas rgyal po'i dam pa mi dgyes spang bar mdzod//sna tshogs mtshan gyi yan lag brgyan pa ngalta
92a7(mdo sde): bar 'tshal//rgyal po bud med tshogs kyis bskor ba de rab dga'//gzhon nu me yi 'od ltar 'bar ba pang du blangs//lha mchog gtsug phud 'phyang ba dag ni nye bar bsnyen//thog ma sgor
92b1(mdo sde): byung stong gsum 'di dag kun tu g.yos//lha mchog de dag 'dren pa'i zhabs dang sen mo ni//zangs mdog dri med rnam dag gzi brjid ldan mthong nas//gtsug phud 'phyang ba de dag myur du langs par
92b2(mdo sde): gyur//dri ma med pa'i 'od kyis zhabs la mgos phyag 'tshal//'di 'dra'i mtshan dang 'di 'drar lta ba dpal can dang //'di 'dra'i bsod nams gzi brjid spyi gtsug mi mthong dang //mdzod spu nas ni
92b3(mdo sde): rgya chen 'od 'byung 'di 'dra las//bdud rnams pham mdzad byang chub brnyes 'gyur gdon mi 'tshal//mun sel nyon mongs bral ba'i yon tan brtags nas su//yang dag yon tan ji ltar don
92b4(mdo sde): mthong de la bstod//skye dang rga dang 'chi dang nyon mongs dgra bsal ba'i//sems can rin chen 'di ni ring por mi thogs 'byung //yongs rtog 'dod chags yul gyi gtsub mas bskyed pa yi//rnam gsum
92b5(mdo sde): mes ni srid gsum kun 'bar yongs gdungs par//dpa' khyod chos kyi sprin gyis stong gsum bkang nas ni//'chi med char gyis nyon mongs gdung bzhi mdzad 'gyur//byams pa'i gsung mnga'
92b6(mdo sde): thugs rje ldan pa 'jam pa'i gsung //tshangs pa'i sgra dbyangs yid 'ong gsung du sgrog mdzad pa//stong gsum kun tu go zhing 'gro ba gor 'gyur ba//bcom ldan khyod kyis sangs rgyas gsung chen
92b7(mdo sde): myur du sgrogs//srid pa'i 'dod chags bcings bying srid pa'i rtser gnas pa//mu stegs can gyi tshogs ngan log par lta ba bcom//khyod kyi rgyu la brtan dang stong pa'i chos zos nas//seng ges
93a1(mdo sde): wa tshogs bzhin du de dag 'byer bar 'gyur//nyon mongs chen po'i du ba ma rig bsgribs bsal te//kun tu byung ba skye bo nges par snang byed pa'i//ye shes 'od 'phro shes
93a2(mdo sde): rab 'od rig gzigs pa yis//'gro ba kun gyi mun pa chen po gsal bar gsol//gang du sems can dag pa rmad byung 'di 'dra byung //lha dang mi rnams kyis ni rnyed pa rgya chen thob//rnam
93a3(mdo sde): par rtogs par mdzad pa'i sems can rin chen 'dis//ngan song lam bcad lha yi lam ni gtod par 'gyur//ser skya'i gnas su lha yi me tog char phab nas//bskor ba byas te gus
93a4(mdo sde): par bstod pa byas nas ni//sangs rgyas sangs rgyas legs zhes de dag tshig brjod cing //lha tshogs de dag tshul du shis par mkha' las dong //bltams pa'i le'u ste bdun pa'o///
93a5(mdo sde): dge slong dag de ltar byang chub sems dpa' gang gi nub mo btsas pa de nyid kyi nub mo rgyal rigs dang /bram ze dang /khyim bdag gi rigs shing sa la chen po lta bu rnams su bu mo nyi khri btsas
93a6(mdo sde): par gyur te/de dag thams cad kyang de dag gi pha ma rnams kyis byang chub sems dpa' la rim gro bya ba dang /bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir phul lo//rgyal po zas gtsang mas kyang bu mo nyi khri
93a7(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' la rim gro bya ba dang /bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir phul lo//mdza' bshes dang /blon po dang /nye du dang /snag gi gnyen mtshams dag gis kyang byang chub sems
93b1(mdo sde): dpa' la rim go bya ba dang /bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir bu mo nyi khri phul lo//blon po'i 'khor rnams kyis kyang byang chub sems dpa' la rim gro dang /bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir bu mo nyi khri phul lo//dge slong
93b2(mdo sde): ngag de'i tshe shAkya rgan rabs rgan rabs rnams 'dus nas/rgyal po zas gtsang ma la 'di skad ces smras so//lho mkhyen par mdzad du gsol/gzhon nu 'di ni lho khang du bkur bar bgyi'o//rgyal pos
93b3(mdo sde): smras pa/gzhon nu de ltar bkur ba legs kyis de bas na grong khyer ni brgyan par gyis shig/srang dang /lam gyi bzhi mdo dang /mdo sum dang /tshong 'dus dag ni mdzes par gyis shig/bkra mi shis
93b4(mdo sde): pa sgur po dang /zhar ba dang /'on pa dang /lkugs pa dang /dbyibs mi mdzes pa dang /gzugs mi mdzes pa dang /dbang po ma tshang ba rnams ni sol cig/bkra shis pa rnams kyang sogs shig/bsod
93b5(mdo sde): nams kyi rnga ni rdungs shig/bkra shis kyi dril ni dkol cig/grong khyer dam pa'i sgo ni rgyan gyis legs par sprad cig/rol mo sil snyan dang pheg rdob pa shin tu yid du 'ong ba dag ni long zhing rdobs shig/
93b6(mdo sde): khams kyi rgyal po thams cad ni sogs shig/tshong dpon dang /khyim bdag dang /blon po dang /sgo ba dang /'khor gyi mi dag ni gcig tu sdus shig/bu mo'i shing rta ni shoms shig/bum pa gang ba
93b7(mdo sde): rnams ni snyen cig/bram ze kha ton pa rnams ni sdus shig/lha khang rnams ni shin tu brgyan par gyis shig/dge slong dag de nas rgyal pos ji skad bsgo ba de bzhin du thams cad sbyar ba dang /de nas
94a1(mdo sde): rgyal po zas gtsang ma rang gi khyim du song nas skye dgu'i bdag mo chen mo go'u t+ya ma la bos te 'di skad ces smras so//gzhon nu lha khang du bkur gyis rgyan gyis legs par brgyan par
94a2(mdo sde): gyis shig/legs so zhes skye dgu'i bdag mo chen mo go'u ta mas de ltar mnyan te/gzhon nu rgyan gyis brgyan to//de nas gzhon nu de rgyan gyis brgyan pa'i tshe/bzhin 'dzum zhing khro gnyer med
94a3(mdo sde): ngas shin tu yid du 'ong ba'i tshi ge gis sru mo la smras pa/ma bdag gang du bkur/smras pa/bu lho khang du bkur ro//de nas gzhon nus bzhin 'dzum ste bgad nas sru mo la tshigs su bcad de smras pa//
94a4(mdo sde): bdag bcas de tshe stong gsum 'di ni g.yos par gyur//brgya byin tshangs pa lha min lto 'phye chen po dang //nyi zla de bzhin rnam thos bu dang gzhon nu yang //spyi bo rkang pa gnyis la gtugs te
94a5(mdo sde): phyag 'tshal na//de ring ma yi gang du bdag dkur bgyi ba yi//lha gzhan bdag gi gong na 'phags pa gang zhig mchis//lha rnams kun las bdag 'phags lha yi lha lags te/
94a6(mdo sde): bdag 'dra'i lha yang ma mchis gong ma ga la mchis//'on kyang 'jig rten rjes bsnyag tsam du bdag mchi'o//bdag gi rnam 'phrul skye bos mthong na dgar 'gyur zhing //rim gro bkur sti
94a7(mdo sde): shin du che bar bgyid 'gyur la//lha mis 'di ni lha yi lha zhes rig par 'gyur//dge slong dag de ltar grong khyer du gzhon nu'i shing rta bshams te rgyan gyis brgyan nas/bkra shis thams
94b1(mdo sde): cad bshams te rgyal po zas gtsang mas gzhon nu bang du blangs nas/bram ze dang /grong rdal pa dang /tshang dpon dang /khyim bdag dang /blon po dang /khams kyi rgyal po dang /sgo ba dang /
94b2(mdo sde): 'khor gyi mi dang /mdza' bshes dang /nye dus bskor te/srang dang /lam gyi bzhi mdo dang /mdo sum dang /tshong 'dus rgyan tshad med pas brgyan pa dag nas bdug spos dri zhim pos ni
94b3(mdo sde): bdugs/me tog sil ma ni gtor/rta dang glang po che dang /shing rta dang /rkang thung gi bun 'odang ni cher gyur/gdugs dang /rgyal mtshan dang /ba dAn no sgreng /sim snyan sna tshogs kyi sgra ni phyung
94b4(mdo sde): ste/song bar gyur to//de'i tshe lha brgya stong dag gis byang chub sems dpa'i shing rta drangs te/lnga'i bu mo bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du mas nam mkha'i dkyil nas me tog gi tshor babaste/sil snyan
94b5(mdo sde): sgra 'byin par gyur to//dge slong dag de ltar rgyal po zas gtsang mas rgyal po'i bkod pa chen po dang /rgyal po'i phun sum tshigs pa chen po dang /rgyal po'i byin chen pos gzhon nu de khyer
94b6(mdo sde): te lha khong du phyin to//de nas byang chub sems dpas lha khang der rkang pa g.yas pa'i mthil bzhag pa dang /de nas lha'i gzugs sems med pa de dag 'di lto ste/gu lang dang /skom byed
94b7(mdo sde): dang /ru so ngan dang /rnyeng dong /nyi ma dang /rnam thos kyi bu dang /brgya byin dang /tshangs pa dang /'jig rten skyong ba la sogs pa'i gzugs thams cad kyang rang rang gi gnas nas langs te/
95a1(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa'i rkang pa la phyag 'tshal bar gyur to//de'i tshe lha dang mi brgya stong ni kye ma a la la zhes bya ba dang /ca co dang /gzha'i sgra brgya stong mang po 'byin par gyur
95a2(mdo sde): to//ser skya'i gnas kyi grong khyer chen po dam pa de thams cad kyang rnam pa drug tu g.yos so//lha'i me tog gi char yang mngon par bab bo//lha'i sil snyan brgya stong du mau dag kyang ma
95a3(mdo sde): dkrol bar sgra 'byin par gyur to//lha gang dag gi gzugs gang yin pa de dag thams cad kyang rang rang gi gzugs bstan nas/tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smra bar gyur to//ri rgyal
95a4(mdo sde): ri mchog ri re bo nam yang yungs kar 'bru la phyag mi 'tshal//rgya mtsho klu rje gnas ni nam yang ba rjes chu la phyag mi 'tshal//nyi zla 'od byeng sin bu me khyer 'di byed de la phyag mi 'tshal//
95a5(mdo sde): bsod nams shes rab rigs byung legs ldan lha rnams gang la'ang phyag mi bzhes//yungs 'bri ba rjes chu dang srin bu me khyer 'dre bar gyur pa ni//stong gsum 'di ni lha mi gang
95a6(mdo sde): yang rung ste nga rgyal gnas pa legs//ri rab rgya mtsho nyi zla 'dra ba 'jig rten rang byung dam pa ste//de la 'jig rten phyag 'tshal ba ni mtho ris mya ngan 'das pa 'thob//byang chub sems
95a7(mdo sde): dpa' lha khang du zhugs pa de bstan pa'i tshe/lha'i bu brgya stong phrag sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par gyur to//dge slong dag byang
95b1(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' lha khang du khyer ba'i tshe btang snyoms su bzhag pa'i rkyen ni de yin/rgyu ni de yin no//lha khang du khyer ba'i le'u ste/brgyad pa'o////dge slong dag de nas
95b2(mdo sde): bram ze mdun na 'don 'char po zhes bya ba 'tshar 'gro'i pha/bram ze lnga brgya tsam gyis bskor te/skar ma mi bzhi 'angs nas nag pa la bab pa'i tshe rgyal po zas gtsang ma'i drung du phyin nas 'di
95b3(mdo sde): skad ces smras so//lha mkhyen par mdzad du gsol/da ni gzhon nu'i rgyan mdzad pa'i rigs so//rgyal pos smras pa/legs kyis byed du chug cig/de'i tshe rgyal po zas gtsang ma dang /
95b4(mdo sde): shAkya lnga brgya tsam gyis/rgyan gyi rnam pa lnga brgya tsam byed du bcug ste/'di ltar lag pa'i rgyan dag dang /rkang pa'i rkyen dag dang /mgo'i rgyan dag dang /mgul gyi rgyan dag dang /sor gdub
95b5(mdo sde): dag dang /rna rgyan dag dang /dpung rgyan dag dang /gser gyi ska rags dag dang /gser skud dag dang /dril bu g.yeng ka'i dra ba dag dang /rin po che'i dra ba dag dang /lham rin po ches spras pa
95b6(mdo sde): ngag dang /do shal rin po che sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa dag dang /gdu bu rgyan can dag dang /mgul gdub dag dang /cod pan dag kyang byed du bcug ste zin nas/skar ma rgyal dang ldan pa'i tshe/
95b7(mdo sde): shAkya de dag rgyal po zas gtsang mi'i drung du dong nas 'di skad ces smras so//lha gzhon nu brgyan du gsol/rgyal pos smras pa/khyed kyi so gzhon nu la brgyan pa dang /mchod pa byas pas chog gis/
96a1(mdo sde): ngas gzhon nu'i rgyan thams cad byed du bcug go/smras pa/dadag cag gi rgyan 'di dag gzhon nu'i sku la gdugs mtshan bdun zhig gdags gsol/de ltar gnang na bdag
96a2(mdo sde): cag gis sug las bgyis pa'ang de na mchis par 'gyur ro//de'i tshe ni ma langs te nyi ma shar ba dang /byang chub sems dpa' skyed mos tshal bkod pa dri ma med pa zhes bya ba der zhugs so//
96a3(mdo sde): de'i tshe skye dgu'i bdag mo tshan mo gau ta mas byang chub sems dpa' pang du blangs so//bud med brgyad khris kyang byang chub sems dpa' bsu ste gdong du lta zhing 'khod par gyur to//bu mo stong
96a4(mdo sde): phrag bcus byang chub sems dpa' bsu ste/gdong du lta zhing 'khod par gyur to//shAkya stong phrag bcus byang chub sems dpa' bsu ste gdong du lta zhing 'khod par gyur to//bram ze lnga
96a5(mdo sde): stong yang lhags nas byang chub sems dpa'i gdong du lta zhing 'khod par gyur to//de nas shAkya'i rgyal po bzang po zhes bya bas rgyan ji snyed cig byas pa de dag byang chub sems dpa'i lus la
96a6(mdo sde): btags te/de dag lus la btags ma thag tu byang chub sems dpa'i lus kyi 'od kyis mogo mog por gyur nas lam mer ma gyur//lhan nor ma gyur/lhang nger ma gyur te/'di lta ste
96a7(mdo sde): dper na/dzan+d+ra'i chu bo'i gser gyi gan du sdug che'i yug bzhag na lam mor mi rung /lhan ner mi rung /lhang nger mi rung ngo //de bzhin du rgyan de dag kyang byang chub sems dpa'i lus kyi
96b1(mdo sde): 'od kyis phog na lham mar mi rung /lhan ner mi rung /lhang nger mi rung ngo //de bzhin du rgyun gyi rnam pa gang dang gang byang chub sems dpa'i lus la btags pa de dang de dag mog mog por gyur te/'di
96b2(mdo sde): lta ste dper na/dzam+bu'i chu bo'i gser gyi gan du snag cha'i yug bzhag pa bzhin no//de'i tshe skyed mos tshal gyi lha mo dri ma med pa zhes bya ba 'dug pa des lus chen po bstan nas mdun du 'dug ste/rgyal
96b3(mdo sde): po zas gtsang ma dang shAkya'i tshogs de dag la tshigs su bcad de smras pa/stong gsum sa 'odi grong khyer grong rdal bcas pa kun//gol te gser gyis gang khyab dri med mdzes gyur kyang //dzam+bu'i chu
96b4(mdo sde): bo'i gser gzegs gcig gis zil rlag ste//gser gzhan dag ni dpal dang bral zhing gsal mi 'gyur//sa 'di mtha' dag dzam+bu'i klung gi gser khebs kyang //'dren pa dpal rgyas spu khud
96b5(mdo sde): 'od phyung zil gyis non//mi snang mi gsal mi mdzes 'od kyang nyams gyur cing //bde gshegs skyob pa'i drung na snag tsha bzhin du 'gyur//yon tan brgyas gang 'di ni rang gi gzi yis brgyan//de ni
96b6(mdo sde): rgyan gyis mdzes min shin tu dri med sku//nyi zla'i 'od dang skar ma nor bu me dag dang //brgya byin tshangs pa'i 'od kyang dpa' stug mdun mi gsal//grang sku sngon gyi dge ba'i 'bras bus mtshan spras
96b7(mdo sde): pa//de la gzhan gyis byas pa'i rgyan phal ci zhig dgos//rgyan rnams phrol 'or mi mkhas mkhas mdzad ma gtso zhig/blo gros mchog mdzad 'di ni bcos ma'i rgyan mi bzhed//'dun pa de na
97a1(mdo sde): rgyal khab sras dang lhan cig btsas//dri med rab tu mdzes pa'i rgyan rnams 'bungs de stsol//shAkya'i rigs mi rgya chen mchog tu 'gyur snyam nas//shAkya dag ni yid dga'
97a2(mdo sde): mgu zhing ngo mtshar gyur//lha mo des de skad ces smras nas/lha'i me tog dag gis byang chub sems dpa' de la mngon par gtor te de nyid du mi snang bar gyur to//rgyan gyi le'u ste dgu pa'o//
97a3(mdo sde): dge slong dag de ltar gzhon nu de ya rbad skyes pa dang /bkra shis brgya stong byas nas khye'u stong phrag bcu dang /bu mo stong phrag bcus yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdar te yi ge'i gror 'jug par
97a4(mdo sde): byas so//bza' ba dang /bca' ba dang /myang bas gang ba'i shing rta stong phrag bcu dang /gser dngul dang /dbyig gis gang ba'i shing rta stong phrag bcu drangs te/ser skya'i gnas kyi grong khyer
97a5(mdo sde): chen po'i srang dang /grong bar dang /tshong 'dus kyi phyogs gang yin pa dag tu gtor to//mngon par byin no//sil snyan 'bum phrag brgyad kyi sgra'ang phyung zhing me tog gi tshor chen po'ang bab
97a6(mdo sde): bo//stegs bu dang /sgo gang dang /rta babs dang /skar khung dang /bsil khang dang /khang pa brtsegs pa dang /khang bzang dag gi steng nas/bu mo brgya stong rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan
97a7(mdo sde): pa dag/byang chub sems dpa' la lto zhing me tog dag 'thor bar gyur to//lha'i bu mo stong phrag brgyad ni rgyan rnams kyis lcug lhug por brgyan te/rin po che bzang byed thogs nas lam
97b1(mdo sde): 'phyag cing byang chub sems dpa'i mdun nas 'dong bar gyur to//lha dang /klu dang /gnod sbyin dang /dri za dang /lha ma yin dang /nam mkha' lding dang /mi 'am ci dang /lto 'phye chen po
97b2(mdo sde): rnams kyang lus phyeng phyung zhing nam mkha'i dkyil nas me tog dang /dar gyi lda ldi bre bar gyur to//shAkya'i tshogs thams cad kyang rgyal po zas gtsang ma mdun du bdar nas byang chub sems dpa'i
97b3(mdo sde): mdun nas 'dong bar gyur te/bkod pa'i rnam pa 'di lta bu 'dis byang chub sems dpa' yi ge'i grwar zhugs par gyur to//byang chub sems dpa' yi ge'i grwar zhugs mo thag tu de nas/byis
97b4(mdo sde): pa'i slob dpon kun gyi bshes gnyen zhes bya bas byang chub sems dpe'i dpal dang gzi brjid mi bzod de/khas bub tu 'gyel to//de ltar 'gyel ba dang dga' ldan gyi ris kyi lha'i bu yan
97b5(mdo sde): lag bzang po zhes bya bas mthong nas/lag pa g.yas pas bteg ste bslang ngo //bslang nas kyang de nam mkha'i dkyil na 'dug ste/rgyal po zas gtsang ma dang skye bo phal po che de dag la
97b6(mdo sde): tshigs su bcad de smras pa/mi yi 'jig rten 'di na bstan bcos gang yod pa//blangs dang yi ge rtsis dang khams kyi rgyud dag dang //'jig rten bzo yi sbyor ba tshad med mang po dag/bskal pa
97b7(mdo sde): bye mang sngon chad 'das ni de dag bslabs//'on kyang skye bo'i rjes su mthun pa tsam mdzad de//byis pa mang po thag pa mchog la smin mdzad dang //sems can khrag khrig gzhan yang 'chi med
98a1(mdo sde): dpyod pa'i phyir//shin tu lobs pa'ang bslab phyir yi ge'i grwar zhugs so//'jig rten 'das pa'i bden bzhi lam gyi tshul mkhyen cing //rgyu la brtan nas ji ltar 'byung ba
98a2(mdo sde): la'ang mkhas/ji ltar 'dus byas 'gags zad bsil 'gyur de tshul yang //mkhyen na yi ge'i bstan bcos tsam cis mi mkhyen//'jig rten gsum ni 'di yi slob dpon gong na med//
98a3(mdo sde): lha dang mir bcas nang na 'di nyid gtso bo ste//bskal pa bye mang sngon chad gang la 'ongs bslabs pa'i//yi ge de dag ming yang khyod kyis shes mi 'gyur//'gro ba rnams kyi sems rgyud sna
98a4(mdo sde): tshogs gang 'byung ba//skad cig gcig gis sems can dag pa 'dis mkhyen te//gzugs med ltar mi snang ba'i tshul yang rab mkhas na//yi ge gzugs yod bltar snang de lta
98a5(mdo sde): smos ci dgos/de skad ces smras pa dang /lha'i bu des byang chub sems dpa' la lha'i me tog mang pos gtor te de nyid du mi snang bar gyur to//de nas ma ma dang bran mo'i 'khor bkod de/
98a6(mdo sde): rgyal po zas gtsang ma la sogs pa shAkya gzhan ni phyir dong ngo //de nas byang chub sems dpa' tsan+dan sbrul gyi snying po las byas pa'i yi go shing lha'i tshon gyis byug pa/gser gyi yang
98a7(mdo sde): tshig gis btags pa/mtha' ma nor bu rin po ches kun nas brgyan pa thogs te/slob dpon kun gyi bshes gnyen la 'di skad ces smras so//kye mkhan pos bdag la yi ge gang zhig
98b1(mdo sde): bslab//tshangs pa'i yi ge 'am/khar sti'i yi ge 'am/pad+ma'i snying po'i yi ge 'am/ang+ga'i yi ge 'am/yul ma ga d+hA'i yi ge 'am/bkra shis pa'i yi ge 'am/sor mo pa'i yi ge 'am/sha ka ni
98b2(mdo sde): yi ge 'am/ya ba na'i yi ge 'am/bgal ba'i yi ge 'am/pa ru shA'i yi ge 'am/'gro lding ba'i yi ge 'am/kI ra tA'i yi ge 'am/lho phyogs pa'i yI ge 'am/drag shul can gyi yi ge'am/
98b3(mdo sde): grangs kyi yi ge 'am/spyi'u tshugs pa'i yi ge 'am/rjes su mthun pa'i yi ge 'am/byA sha'i yi ge 'am/ka sha'i yi ge'am/rgya'i yi ge 'am/phu na'i yi ge 'am/hu ne'i yi ge 'am/yi ge 'bring
98b4(mdo sde): dang /rgyas par bri ba'i yi gaM'am/rgyal gyi yi ge 'am/lha'i yi ge 'am/klu'i yi ge 'am/gnod sbyin gyi yi ge 'am/dri za'i yi ge 'am/mi 'am tswi'i yi ge'am/lto 'phye chen po'i yaM
98b5(mdo sde): gre'am/lha ma yin gyi yi ge 'am/nam mkha' lding gi yi ge 'am/ri dgas kyi 'khor lo pa'i yi ge 'am/khwa skad shes pa'i yi ge 'am/sa bla'i lha'i yi ge 'am/bar snang gi lha'i
98b6(mdo sde): yi ge 'am/nu kyi baglang spyod kyi yi ge 'am/byang gi sgra mi snyan gyi yi ge 'am/shar gyi lus 'phags po'i yi ge 'am/gdug pa'i yi ge 'am/gzhag pa'i yi ge'am/bsnan pa'i yi ge
98b7(mdo sde): 'am/rgya mtsho'i yi ge'am/rdo rje'i yi ge'am/spring yig dang /lan gyi yi ge 'am/rnam 'thor gyi yi ge 'am/rings med kyi yi ge 'am/bstan bcos bskor ba'i yi ge 'am/rtsis bskor
99a1(mdo sde): ba'i yi ge 'am/gdeg pa bskor ba'i yi ge 'am/gzhog pa bskor ba'i yi ge 'am/rkang pas bskor ba'i yi ge 'am/tshig ldan lan gnyis su gdab pa'i tshig gi mtshams
99a2(mdo sde): kyi yi ge'am/tshig gi mtshams bcur brgyud pa'i bar gyi yi ge 'am/bla thabs su bstan pa'i yi ge'am/sgra thams cad kun tu sdud pa'i yi ge 'am/rig pa dang mthun pa'i yi ge 'am/
99a3(mdo sde): rnam par 'dres pa'i yi ge 'am/drang srong gi dka' thub spyad pa'i yi ge 'am/lha nges pa'i yi ge 'am/sa blta ba'i yi ge 'am/nam mkha' blta ba'i yi ge 'am/sman thams cad kyi rgyu
99a4(mdo sde): mthun pa'i yi ge 'am/snying po thams cad kun tu sdud pa'i yi ge 'am/'byung po thams cad kyi sgra sdud pa'i yi ge 'am/kye slob dpon yi ge drug cu rtsa bzhi po de dag gi nang nas bdag la
99a5(mdo sde): gang bslab/de nas byis pa'i slob dpon kun gyi bshis gnyen ngo mtshar du gyur nas bzhin gyi 'dzum phyung ste/nga rgyal dang /dregs pa dang /rgyags pa med par byas nas tshigs su
99a6(mdo sde): bcad pa 'di dag smras so//sems can dag pa ngo mtshar che//bstan bcos kun las bslabs gyur kyang //'jig rten 'jig rten rjes skrag phyir//yi ge'i grwar ni byon par gyur//yi
99a7(mdo sde): ge gang gi ming dag kyang //bdag gis shes par ma gyur pa//de la 'di la byang gyur kyang //yi ge slob pa'i grwang byon to//'di yi zhal ni mthong mod kyi//spyi gtsug 'phags pa bltar
99b1(mdo sde): mi snang //yi ge'i shes rab mthar phyin na//bdag gis 'di go ji ltar bslab//lha yi lha chen lha 'di ni//lha rnams kun gyi mchog mkhas pa//khyad par 'phags shing mnyam pa med//'jig
99b2(mdo sde): rten gang zag do zla med//bdag kyang 'di nyid mthu yis na//shes rab thabs kyi khyad par gyis//'jig rten kun gyi dpung gnyen po//lobs pa 'di ni bslab par bya//dge slong dag de ltar
99b3(mdo sde): byis pa stong phrag bcu po de dag byang chub sems dpa' dang lhan cig tu yi ge slob pa'i tshe byang chub sems dpa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis byis pa de dag yi ge'i phyi mo slob cing gang gi tshe/a zhes brjod pa
99b4(mdo sde): de'i tshe/'du byed thams cad mi rtag pa'i sgra byung ngo //A zhes brjod pa dang bdag med pa'i sgra byung ngo //oM zhes brjod pa dang dbang po shin tu yangs pa'i sgra byung ngo //I zhes brjod pa dang 'gro ba
99b5(mdo sde): ni yams kyi nad mang ba zhes bya ba'i sgra byung ngo //u zhes brjod pa dang 'gro ba ni 'tshe ba mang ngo zhes bya ba'i sgra byung ngo //U zhes brjod pa dang 'gro ba ni dma' ba'o zhes bya ba'i sgra byung ngo //e zhes brjod
99b6(mdo sde): pa dang /nyes pa ni btsal po las byung ngo zhes bya ba'i sgra byung ngo //aM zhes brjod pa dang 'phags pa'i lam ni dge'o zhes bya ba'i sgra byung ngo //oM zhes brjod pa dang chu bo las rgal ba'i sgra byung ngo //
99b7(mdo sde): zhes brjod pa dang rtsub pa'i sgra byung ngo //aM zhes brjod pa dang bdag gi ba mi 'byung zhes bya ba'i sgra byung ngo //aHzhes brjod pa dang nub pa zhes bya ba'i sgra byung ngo //ka zhes brjod pa dang las kyi rnam
100a1(mdo sde): par smin pa la 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i sgra byung ngo //kha zhes brjod pa dang chos thams cad nam mkha' dang mnyam zhes bya ba'i sgra byung ngo //ga zhes brjod pa dang chos zab ces bya
100a2(mdo sde): ba'i sgra byung ngo //g+hi zhes brjod pa dang ma rig pa dang /gti mug gi mun pa dang ling thog stug po bsal zhes bya ba'i sgra byung ngo //nga zhes brjod pa dang yan lag rnam par dag pa zhes bya ba'o/
100a3(mdo sde): sgra byung ngo //tsa zhes brjod pa dang 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi'i sgra byung ngo //tshe zhes brjod pa dang 'dod pa'i 'dod tshogs spang ba'i sgra byung ngo //dza zhes brjod pa dang na shi las yang dag par 'das
100a4(mdo sde): pa'i sgra byung ngo //dz+nyA zhes brjod pa dang 'chi byed kyi rgyal mtshan can gyi dpung tshar bcad pa'i sgra byung ngo //nya zhes brjod pa dang shes par byed pa'i sgra byung ngo //Ta zhes brjod pa dang lam shin tu
100a5(mdo sde): chad pa'i sgra byung ngo //Tha zhes brjod pa dang dri ba bzhag pa'i sgra byung ngo //Da zhes brjod pa dang dkrugs ma dang bdud tshar gcad pa'i sgo byung ngo //D+ha zhes brjod pa dang yul mi gtsang ba'i
100a6(mdo sde): sgra byung ngo //NA zhes brjod pa dang nyon mongs pa ni phra ba zhes bya ba'i sgra byung ngo //ta zhes brjod pa dang de bzhin nyid ni 'dres pa med ces bya ba'i sgra byung ngo //tha zhes brjod pa dang mthu stobs
100a7(mdo sde): dang shugs dang mi 'jigs pa'i sgra byung ngo //nga zhes brjod pa dong sbyin pa dang dul ba dang /yang dag par sdom pa dang /nges pa'i sgra byung ngo //d+ha zhes brjod pa dang 'phags pa rnams kyi nor
100b1(mdo sde): nirnam pa bdun no zhes bya ba'i sgra byung ngo //na zhes brjod pa dang ming dang gzugs yongs su shes par bya ba'i sgra byung ngo //pa zhes brjod pa dang don dam pa'i sgra byung ngo //pha zhes brjod pa dang
100b2(mdo sde): 'bras bu rnyed pa mngon du bya ba'i sgra byung ngo //ba zhes brjod pa dang bcings pa las rnam par thar pa'i sgro byung ngo //b+hA zhes brjod pa dang srid pa 'jigs pa'i sgra byung ngo //ma zhes brjod pa dang
100b3(mdo sde): rgyal dang rgyags pa zhi bar bya ba'i sgra byung ngo //ya zhes brjod pa dang chos ji lta ba bzhin du rtogs par bye ba'i sgra byung ngo //ra zhes brjod pa dang dga' ba la dga' ba med pa ni don dam par dga' ba
100b4(mdo sde): zhes bya ba'i sgra byung ngo //la zhes brjod pa dang 'khri shing ched pa'i sgra byung ngo //wa zhes brjod pa dang theg pa mchog gi sgra byung ngo //she zhes brjod pa dang zhi gnas dang lhag mthong gi sgra byung ngo //2
100b5(mdo sde): zhes brjod pa dang skye mched drug gzhom zhing mngon par shes pa drug dang ye shes thob pa'i sgra zung ngo //sa nas brjod pa dang thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes mngon par rdzogs par byang chub
100b6(mdo sde): bya ba'i sgra byung ngo //ha zhes brjod pa dang nyon mongs pa bcom nyid 'did chags dang bral ba'i hU~M byung ngo // zlas brjod pa dang yi ge'i mthar phyin te/chos thams cade brjod du mod pa'o zhes
100b7(mdo sde): bya ba'i sgo byung ngo //de ltar byis pa de dag yi ge'i phyi mo slob pa'i tshe//byang chub sems dpa'i mthus de dag la sogs pa chos kyi sgo brgya stong grangs med pa byung bar gyur te/byang chub sems dpa'
101a1(mdo sde): yi ge'i grwa na 'dug pa'i tshe byis pa sum khri nyis stong rim gyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su smin par byas so//byang chub sems dpa' logs
101a2(mdo sde): par gyur kyang yi ge'i grwar 'jug pa'i rgyu ni de yin no//rkyen ni de yin no//yi ge bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu pa'o////dge slong dag gzhon nu de de bas kyang ya zad skyes nas
101a3(mdo sde): dus gzhan zhig na gzhon nu de gzhon nu gzhan dag dang zhang blon gyi bu dag dang lhan cig tu zhing pa'i grong lta zhing dong ste/grong bltas nas zhing blas kyi mtha'i skyed mos tshal zhig tu phyin to//de
101a4(mdo sde): na byang chub sems dpa' gcig pu gnyis su med par pha brad 'khyam zhing song song ba dang /dzam+bu'i shing ljon pa mdzes pa blta na sdug pa zhig mthong nas//byang chub sems dpa'
101a5(mdo sde): de'i grib mo la skyil mo krung bcas te 'dug go/'dug nas byang chub sems dpas sems rtse gcig pa rnyed de rnyed nas kyang sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos rnams las dben pa/rtog pa dang
101a6(mdo sde): bcas pa/dpyod pa dang bcas pa/dben pa las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang bde ba can bsam gtan dang po bsgrubs te gnas so//de rtog pa dang dpyod pa dang bral zhing nang yongs su dang
101a7(mdo sde): ste/sems kyi rgyud gcig tu gyur pas rtog pa med pa/dpyod pa med pa/ting nge 'dzin las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang /bde ba can bsam gtan gnyis pa bsgrubs te gnas so//de dga'
101b1(mdo sde): ba'i 'dod chags dang bral ba'i btang snyoms la gnas shing dran pa dang shes bzhin can yin te/bde ba lus kyis myong la/'phags pa rnams kyis gang de ngan pa dang ldan pa/bde ba la gnas
101b2(mdo sde): pa btang snyoms pa'o zhes brjod pa ste/dga' ba med pa'i bsam gtan gsum pa bsgrubs te gnas so//de bde ba'ang spangs te snga nas sdug bsngal yang spangs shing yid bde ba dang /yid mi bde
101b3(mdo sde): ba'ang nub pas bde ba'ang ma yin/sdug bsngal ba'ang ma yin pa btang snyoms dang dran pa yongs su dag pa bsam gtan bzhi pa bsgrubs to gau nas so//de'i tshe phyi rol gyi drang srong mngon par shes
101b4(mdo sde): pa lnga yod pa rdzu 'phrul dang ldan pa nam mkha' las dong ba lnga zhig lho phyogs nas byang phyogs logs su dong dong ba las de dag tshal stug po de'i steng du phyin pa dang /phyir phul ba ltar 'dong ma nus nas
101b5(mdo sde): de dag mi dga' zhing ba spu g.yos te/tshigs su bcad pa 'di smras so//bdagau tsa gr-i 'di na ri rab nor bu rdo rje brtsegs ri shin tu rngams stug pa yang thal phyung ste//glang po a mra'i shing rlon yal
101b6(mdo sde): gas gzings pa mang po bcom nas 'gro bzhin dong dong la//bdag cag 'di na lha yi khyim la'ang thogs med gnod sbyin dri za'i khyim steng nam mkhar gnas gnas na//tshal sdug 'dir phyin nas
101b7(mdo sde): ni sgyid lug gyur pa su yi mthu zhig gis na rdzu 'phrul stobs bzlog gyur//de nas tshal stug po de na lha mo zhig gnas pa des drang srong de dag la tshigs su bcad de smras pa/rgyal po'i gtso bo'i rigs
102a1(mdo sde): byung shAkya'i rgyal sras nyi ma shar ba lta bur rab tu snang ba'i 'od//'jig rten gtso bo mkhas pa zla zhal pad+ma rgyas pa'i snying po'i kha dog lta bur rab mdzes pa//lha dang klu
102a2(mdo sde): dbang gnod sbyin dri zas mchod pa de ni bsam gtan dgongs shing che la sdug 'di na bzhugs//srid pa bye ba brgya dag tu ni bsod nams spel ba de yi mthu yis rdzu 'phrul stobs bzlog go/de
102a3(mdo sde): nas de dag gis 'og logs su bltas pa dang /gzhon nu zhig dpal dang gzi brjid kyis 'bar ba mthong nas 'di dag 'di snyam du su zhig 'di ltar gnas/nor gyi bdag po rnam thos kyi bu
102a4(mdo sde): 'am zhig ma yin nam/'on te 'dod pa'i dbang po bdud lnga 'am/yang na lto 'phye chen po'i dbang po 'am/'on te dbang po rdo rje 'chang ba 'am/yang na gu lang ngam/grul bum gyi bdag
102a5(mdo sde): po 'am/'on te spro ba chen po dang ldan pa nag po 'am/'on te lha'i bu zla ba 'am/'on te 'od zer stong dang ldan pa'i nyi ma 'am/'on te 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po zhig yin nam/su
102a6(mdo sde): zhig snyam mo//dri'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di'ang smras so//gzhon nu 'di ni rnam thos bu yi gzugs las 'phags par gsal bar snang bas ni//'di ni sgra gcan yin nam
102a7(mdo sde): 'on te rdo rje 'chang gi gzugs sam nyi zla'i gzugs//'dod mchog dbang po'i gzugs sam gu lang gzugs sam 'on te nag po'i gzugs yin nam//yang na 'di ni dpal ldan
102b1(mdo sde): yan lag mtshan sgras sdig med sangs rgyas 'gyur ba zhig/de nas tshal gyi lha mo des drang srong de dag la tshigs su bcad de smras pa/rnam thos bu dang mig stong bdog la dpal ni gang yod gyur pa
102b2(mdo sde): dang //'jig rten skyong ba bzhi dang lha min dbang la dpal ni gang yod dang //mi mjed bdag po tshangs dang gza' rnams la yang dpal ni gang yod pa//dpal de shAkya'i sras po 'di drung phyin na gang gi
102b3(mdo sde): char mi phod//de nas drang srong de dag gis lha mo de'i tshig thos nas sa la babs pa dang /de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' mi grayo ba'i lus kyis bsam gtan byed cing /mA'i phung po ltar 'bar
102b4(mdo sde): ba mthong nas/de dag byang chub sems dpa' la sems shing tshigs su bcad pa'i bstod de/de la gcig gis smras pa/'jig rten nyon mongs mes gdungs pa//mtsho 'di rab tu byung gyur
102b5(mdo sde): te//gang gis 'jig rten sim 'gyur ba'i//chos de 'di yis brnyes par gyur//yang gcig gis smras pa/mi shes rab rib 'jig rten du//sgron ma 'di ni rab tu byung //gang gis 'gro
102b6(mdo sde): ba snang 'gyur ba'i//chos de 'di yis brnyes par 'gyur//yang gcig gis smras pa//mya ngan rgya mtsho 'dal ba la//gru yi dam pa 'di byung ste//gang gis 'gro ba sgrol 'gyur ba'i//chos
102b7(mdo sde): de 'di yis brnyes par 'gyur//yang gcig gis smras pa/nyon mongs 'ching bas bcings pa la//'grol bar mdzad pa 'di byung ste//gang gis 'gro ba 'grol 'gyur ba'o//chos de
103a1(mdo sde): 'di yis brnyes par 'gyur//yang gcig gis smras pa/rga dang nad kyis gzir ba la//sman pa dam pa 'di byung ste//gang gis rga shi thar bya ba'i//chos de 'di yis
103a2(mdo sde): brnyes par 'gyur//de nas drang srong de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' la tshigs su bcad pa de dag gis bstod de/lan gsum bskor ba byas nas nam mkha' los dong ngo //rgyal po zas
103a3(mdo sde): gtsang ma'ang byang chub sems dpa'i mi mthong zhing byang chub sems dpa' med pas mi dga' ste/des smras pa/gzhon nu de mi snang na gar song /de'i tshe skye bo phal po che gzhon nu tshol du dong dong
103a4(mdo sde): ba dang /de'i tshe blon po gcig cig gis byang chub sems dpa' dzam+bu'i shing gi grib ma la skyil mo krung bcas te bsam gtan byed cing 'dug pa mthong ngo //des de'i tshe shing thams cad kyi grib ma yol
103a5(mdo sde): na/dzam+bu'i shing gi grib ma ni byang chub sems dpa'i lus mi gtong bar 'dug par mthong nas ngo mtshar du gyur te/tshim zhing mgu la yi rengs nas rab tu dga' ste/dga' ba dang yid bde ba skyes
103a6(mdo sde): nas rings shing myur ba dUr ba'i gzugs kyis/rgyal po zas gtsang ma'i thad du phyin te tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so//rgyal po gzhon nu de la gzigs//dzAm+bu'i shing grib bsom
103a7(mdo sde): gtan mdzad//brgya byin tshangs pa ji bzhin du//gzi brjid dpal gyi rab tu mdzes//zhugs shing gang gi grib ma la//mtshan rab mnga' ba de bzhugs pa'i//bri bai ma de ni des ma gtang //
103b1(mdo sde): skyes mchog bsam gtan mdzad la sgrib//de nas rgyal po zas gtsang ma dzam+bu'i shing ljon pa ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/byang chub sems dpa' dpal dang gzi brjid kyis 'bar ba de mthong ba dang /
103b2(mdo sde): tshogs su bcad pa 'di smras so//ri yi spol mo 'bar 'dra ba ste//zla ba skar me'i tshogs nang 'dug 'dra zhing //gzi brjid sgron 'dra bsam gtan byed mthong na//nga yis lus 'di shin tu
103b3(mdo sde): 'dar bar gyur//de skad ces smras nas/des byang chub sems dpa'i rkang pa la phyag byas te/tshigs su bcad pa 'di smras so//thub pa gang tshe bo ltams pa dang //gang tshe 'od ldan bsam
103b4(mdo sde): gtan mdzad//'dren pa 'di ltar lan gnyis su//mgon po khyod zhabs phyag 'tshal lo//de'i tshe byis pa khri'u thogs pa dag ca co'i sgra 'byin par gyur nas/de dag la blon po dag gis sgra ma
103b5(mdo sde): tshe sgram che zhes byas pa dang /de dag ci zhig nongs zhes zer ro//blon po dag gis smras pa/rgyal po'i sras don thams cad grub pa dge ba'i mtshan bzang po mchog dam pa dang ldan zhing 'od
103b6(mdo sde): 'dom gang ba mnga' ba 'di ri ltar mi g.yo zhing bsam gtan mdzad pa'i tshe/nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor yol te song yang /shing gi grib ma de ma yol zhing sgrib par gnas so//de la 'di skad
103b7(mdo sde): ces bya ste/dpyid 'das dbyar gyi dus bab dbyar zla ra ba la//me tog rgyas shing me tog ya la gas khebs gyur te//khrung khrung rma bya ne co ri skegs skad 'byin pa//shAkya'i bu dag phal cher
104a1(mdo sde): mngon du 'dong bar gyur//'dun pa can gyis smras pa/gzhon nu nags tshal dag ni gzigs pa mdzad slad du//byis pa rnams kyis yongs su bskor te gshegs pa'i
104a2(mdo sde): rigs//bram ze lta bur khyim na bzhugs pas ci zhig bgyi//bdag cag rnams ni bu mo'i tshogs rnams sgron du mchi//nyi na'i gung la sems can rnam par dag pa do//byis pa lnga
104a3(mdo sde): brgya dag gis bskor nas lhan cig tu//yab la ma gsol yum la ma gsol mtshor bar//de ni byung nas zhing pa rnams kyi grong du song //rgyal po dam pa'i zhing pa dag gri grong de na/
104a4(mdo sde): dzam+bu'i sdong chen yal ga mang po rgyas yod pa//gzhon nus mthong na nyam thag sdug bsngal phog gyur te//'dus byas ci rung sdug bsngal mang zhes snying rje byed//dul ba'i sems dang
104a5(mdo sde): ldan pa dzam+bu'i grib mar song //rna dag bsdus te bdag gis gding ba bting nas ni//skyil mo krung 'dug drang por lus srang bsam gtan bzhi//dge ba dag la byang chub sems dpa' bsam
104a6(mdo sde): gtan byed//drang srong lnga zhig nam mkha'i dkyil nus dong drong na//dzam+b+ha'i shing gi steng du phyin nas 'dong ma nus//de dag thogs nas nga rgyal dregs pa spong bya zhing //de dag thams
104a7(mdo sde): cad mthun par lhan cig lte bar byed//bdag cag ri mchog ri rab de bzhini khor yug dag/thal phyung thags thogs med par shugs kyis dong dong na//bdag cag de ring dzam+bu'i shing ljon
104b1(mdo sde): 'di las ni//'dar bar ma nus 'di la rgyu rkyen ci zhig yod//babs tes steng 'dug nas dzam+b+ha'i shing drung na//shAkya'i bu po byang chub sems dpa' gzi brjid can//'jam krung gser gyi 'ong bro'ang
104b2(mdo sde): ba'od zer ldan//skyil mo krung bcas bsam gtan byed pa de tshe mthong //de dag rmad gyur spyi bor sor bcu thal sbyar te//thal mo sbyar ba rkang par gtugs nas phyag 'tshal to//'gro ba shin tu
104b3(mdo sde): bde mdzad lags par bltams pa legs//myur du rnam sangs rgyas te bdud rtsir sems can thul//sdong po mchog ni pad+ma 'dra ba'i spyan la 'dud//gdugs yol gyur kyang grib mas bde bar
104b4(mdo sde): gshegs mi gtong //lha rnams stong phrag mang po gnas pa thal sbyar nas//nges par byas pa de yi rkang par phyag kyang 'chil//zos gtsang rgyal po bdag gi khyim na yongs 'chol zhing //nga'i
104b5(mdo sde): bu gzhon nu de ni gang du song zhing rmed//sru mos smras pa bdag gis bcol kyang ma rnyed na//gzhon nu de ni gar bzhud rgyal pos rma bar gsol//zas gtsang rgyal pos nyung rum dag la rings par
104b6(mdo sde): rmas//nga yi gzhon nu 'di nas byung bar la las mthong ngam zhes//sgo ba rnams dang de bzhin nang mi kun la'ang rmas//lha gcig khyod gson mchog de zhing pa'i grong du bzhud//de ni rings par
104b7(mdo sde): shAkya rnams dang lhan cig tu//byung nas dpal zhugs gyur pa'i zhing pa'i grong du bltas//ji ltar nyi ma bye ba khrag khrig shar ba ltar//de ltar dpal gyis 'bar zhing phan byed 'dug pa mthong //
105a1(mdo sde): da pan sa kyi smras dag pa zang drug dung //canan dus bcu sam rgyags 'gyu//rlung slong bdag tad kun du lags par yang dag//rgyun nga/
105a2(mdo sde): byang chub don du mngon par 'byung du ngos//rab tu dang lha brgya phrag bcu gnyis tshang ba dang //de bzhin shAkya lnga brgya nye bar 'ongs pa dang //bde gshegs yon tan rgya mtsho ldan pa'i rdzu
105a3(mdo sde): 'phrul mthong //bsam pa brtan pas rdzogs dri'i byang chub sems kyang bskyed//des ni stong gsum ma lus sa rnams rab bskyod nas//dran dang shes bzhin ting nge 'dzin las langs gyur
105a4(mdo sde): te//mdog bzang ldan pas yab la tshangs pa'i tshig brjod pa//yab cig zhing blas thong la gzhan las 'tshal ma mdzad//grol te gser zhig 'tshal na'ang bdag gis gser char dbab//
105a5(mdo sde): de ste na bza' 'tshal na'ang bdag gis na bza' dbul//'on te 'bru zhig 'tshal na'ang bdag gis 'bru char dbab//mi dbang khyod kyis 'gro ba kun la yang dag sbyor//yab dang de bzhin skye bo
105a6(mdo sde): 'khor la bstan byas nas//skad cig de la de slar grong khyer mchog tu zhugs//'gro dang mthun pa tsam du grong khyer der gnas kyi//sems can rnam dag mngon par 'byung ba'i yid dang ldan//
105a7(mdo sde): shing pa'i grong gi le'u ste bcu gcig pa'o///'phags pa rgya cher rol pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo//bam po bdun pa//dge slong dag de ltar gzhon nu de de bas
105b1(mdo sde): kyang ya zad skyes pa dang /dus gzhan zhig na rgyal po zas gtsang ma shAkya'i tshogs dang lhan cig tu 'dun sa na 'dug 'dug pa de'i tshe/shAkya rgan rabs rgan rangs kha cig gis rgyal po zas gtsang
105b2(mdo sde): ma la 'di skad ces smras so//lha mkhan par mdzad du gsol//gzhon nu don thams cad grub pa 'di ni bram ze lhas mkhan rnams dang /blo ngas pa dang ldan pa'i lha mang pos 'di skad du bstan
105b3(mdo sde): te/gzhon nu 'di gal te mngon par byung bar gyur na ni/de bzhin gshegs pa dag bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas su 'gyur ro//ji ste mngon par ma byung na ni 'khor los
105b4(mdo sde): sgyur ba'i rgyal po mtha' bzhi las rnam par rgyal ba chos kyi rgyal po chos dang ldan zhing rin po che sna bdun dang ldan par 'gyur ro//de'i rin po che sna bdun ni 'di dag ste/'di ltar 'khor lo rin po che
105b5(mdo sde): dang /glang po rin po che dang /rta rin po che dang /nor bu rin po che dang /bud med rin po che dang /khyim bdag rin po che dang /blon po rin po che dang bdun no//de la bu dpa' ba/rtul phod pa/
105b6(mdo sde): yan lag mchog gi gzugs dang ldan pa/gzhan gyi sde rab tu 'joms pa stong tshang ba 'byung ngo //de gnod par bya ba dang /mtshon cha med par chos dang mthun pas sa'i dkyil 'khor 'di
105b7(mdo sde): las mngon par rgyal bar byas te/gcig pu gnas par 'gyur ro zhes mchi na/de'i slad du gzhon nu de'i btsun mo blang bar bgyi'o//de ltar mdzad dang bud med kyi tshogs kyis yongs su
106a1(mdo sde): bskor te/dgyes pa la longs spyod cing mngon par 'byung bar yang mi 'gyur te/de ltar gyur pa dang bdag cag gi 'khor los sgyur ba'i gdung yang mi chad/khams
106a2(mdo sde): kyi rgyal po thams cad kyis kyang mi snyan par mi brjod cing rim gror bgyi bar 'gyur ro//de nas rgyal po zas gtsang mas smras pa/gal te de ltar bya na de'i phyir gzhon nu'i tshul dang
106a3(mdo sde): mthun pa'i bu mo gang zhig yod khyed kyis ltos shig/de'i tshe shAkya lnga brgya tsam so so nas 'di skad du bdag gi bu mo ni gzhon nu'i tshul dang mthun no//bdag go bu mo ni gzhon nu'i tshul
106a4(mdo sde): dang mthun no zhes zer ro//rgyal pos smras pa/gzhon nu de ni shin tu phul che ba yin gyis/gzhon nu nyid la khyod bu mo gang 'dod ces dri bar bya'o zhes/de dag kun kyang 'dus te/gzhon
106a5(mdo sde): nu la dngos po de brjod do//gzhon nus smras pa/da ste dgung bdun na 'di'i lan gsan par gsol/de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du bsams te/'dod pa'i skyon ni
106a6(mdo sde): bdag gis mtha' yas rig/'thab mo 'khon ces mya ngan sdug bsngal rtsa//'jigs byed dug gi lo ma 'dra ba ste//me dang 'dra zhing ral gri so dang 'dra//'dod pa'i yon tan bdag
106a7(mdo sde): 'dod ma yin te//bdag ni bud med tshogs dang mdzes ma yin//bsam gtan ting 'dzin bde bas ni sems su//bdag ni mi smra nags che la gnas par bya//yang des brtags
106b1(mdo sde): nas thabs mkhas pa mngon du byas te/sems can yongs su smin par bya ba la bltas nas/snying rje chen po bskyed de/de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so//'dam dang lhag lcig
106b2(mdo sde): khrod nas pad+ma rnam par 'phel//mi rnams gang ba'i nang na rgyal po mchod pa 'thob//gang tshe byang chub sems dpa' 'khor mchog thob gyur pa//de tshe sems can bye ba khrag khrig 'tsho med
106b3(mdo sde): 'dul//sngon gyi byang chub sems dpa' mkhas pa gang byung ba//de dag kun gyis btsun mo sras dang slas kyang bstan//'on kyang 'dod pas chags med bsam gtan bde mi nyams//bdag
106b4(mdo sde): kyang de dag yon tan rjes su bslab par bya//gang la spyod lam yon tan bden pa'i tshig med pa//bud med phal pa gang yang bdag gi tshul mthun min//gang zhig bdag gi sems ni mngon
106b5(mdo sde): par dga' byed cing //ngag yod gzugs dang na chod rus rigs dag pa 'os//des ni yon tan tshigs su bcad de yi ger bris//'di 'dra'i bu mo mchis na bdag la bka' stsol cing //skye bo
106b6(mdo sde): phal pam bsnams bdag la mkho ma lags//yon tan brjod pa 'di ldan mchis ni bdag stsol cig/dar cing gzugs bzang ldan yang gzugs kyi dregs dang bral//phri nu ma la byams
106b7(mdo sde): lhar byams pa'i sems ldan zhing //gtang la dga' stod ge sbyong bram ze skyen tshul can//de 'dra'i bupo mchis na ya gyis bdag stsol cig/gang yang rgyal khangs dang shi sdang ma mchis shing //
107a1(mdo sde): g.yo dang phrag dog sgra spangs drang ba'i ngang tshul can//rmi lam na yang skyes pa gzhan la chags dang bral//bdag gi khyos ni cho ga 'tshal rtag sdom bag mchis la//rgyags
107a2(mdo sde): pa ma mchis mi g.yeng zung thub tshul 'chang zhing //nga rgyal ma mchis 'gying dang bral pos bran mo bzhin//sgra dri rol ma chags chang lo ma chags te//'dod bral brnab sems ma mchis
107a3(mdo sde): rang gi nor gyis 'tshal//bden la gnas shing mi 'phyar g.yeng ba ma lags pa//ngo tsha'i gos 'tshal rgod dang khengs pa ma mchis gnas//lha dang bkra shis ma chags rtag tu chos la
107a4(mdo sde): brtson//lus dang ngag dang yid kyi dngos po rab dag po//gnyid dang rmugs pa mi mnga' nga rgyal bren bral zhing //rtog dang ldan la legs pa'i las rnams rtag spyod de//gyos skyug gnyis
107a5(mdo sde): la'ang ston pa bzhin gyi rim gror ldan//bran dang bran mo kun la'ang bdag bzhin byams sbal ba//sbed 'tshang bzhin du bsten bcos cho ga 'tshal cing mkhas//slad kyis nyal zhing sngon du
107a6(mdo sde): mal nas ldang bgyid pa//byams pas rjes snyegs ma bzhin tshul 'chos ma mchis pa//de 'dra'i bud med mchis na yab kyis bdag stsol cig/dge slong dag de nas rgyal po zas gtsang
107a7(mdo sde): mas tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag thos nas/mdun na 'don la smras pa/bram ze chen po khyod ser skya'i gnas kyi grong khyer chen por song la/khyim thams cad du'ang song ste/bu mo
107b1(mdo sde): dag ltos la grang la'ang rung ste yon tAn+da de lta bu dag yod na/rgyal rigs kyi bu mo'ang rung /bram ze'i bu mo'ang rung /rje'u rigs kyi bu mo'ang rung /dmangs rigs kyi bu mo'ang rung gas/bu
107b2(mdo sde): mo de dag 'dir 'on cig/de ci'i phyir zhe na/gzhon nu 'di ni rigs don du gnyer ba ma yin gyi/gzhon nu 'di ni yon tan don du gnyer ba yin no//de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag
107b3(mdo sde): kyang smras so//rgyal rigs bram ze'i bu mo dang //rje'u rigs dmangs rigs de bzhin te//su la yon tan 'di yod pa'i//bu mo de ni 'dir 'on cig/nga yi bu 'di rigs ngag dang //
107b4(mdo sde): rus la ngo mtshar 'dzin ma yin//yon tan bden pa chos kyi rnams//de la 'di yi yid dga' 'o//dge slong dag de nas bram ze mdun na 'don des tshigs su bcad pa yi ger bris pa de
107b5(mdo sde): khyer te/ser skya'i gnas kyi grong khyer chen por song nas/khyim nas khyim du yon tan de lta bu dang ldan pa'i bu mo lta zhing 'chol du song song ba las/yon tan de lta bu dang ldan pa'i bu
107b6(mdo sde): maumo mi mthong ste/de nas rim gyis shAkya lag na be con can gyi khyim du phyin nas/der bltas na/bu mo gzugs mdzes shing blta na sdug la yid du 'ong ba/mdog bzang po rgyas
107b7(mdo sde): pa mchog dang ldan pa/ha cang yang mi ring ba/ha cang yang mo thung ba/ha cang yang mi sbom pa/ha cang yang mi skem pa/ha cang ying mi dkar ba/ha cang yang mi gnag pa/bzod
108a1(mdo sde): mdar la bab pa/bud med rin po che ltar snang ba zhig mthong ba dang /bu mo des bram ze mdun na 'don de'i rkang pa gnyis nas bzung ste/'di skad ces smras so//bram
108a2(mdo sde): ze chen po khyod la dgos pa ci zhig mchis/bram ze 'dun na 'don gyis tshigs su bcad de smras pa/zas gtsang sras po gzugs ni mchog tu mdzes gyur cing //sum cu rtsa gnyis
108a3(mdo sde): mtshan ldan yon tan gzi brjid can//de yis bud med rnams kyi yon tan yi ger bris//su la yon tan 'di yod de yi chung mar 'os zhes smras te/des de la yi geng dbyin no//de
108a4(mdo sde): nas bu ma des tshigs su bcad pa'i yi ge de klags nas/bzhin 'dzum pa bstan te/bram ze mdun na 'don de la tshigs su bcad de smras pa/bram ze yon tan 'di dag bdag la kun
108a5(mdo sde): tshachang gis//des pa'i gzugs can de ni bdag gi khyim thab bo//gal te gzhon nu bzhed na phyi shol ma mdzad gsungs//brgya la skye bo phal drang bzhugs par 'gyur yang gda'//de nas
108a6(mdo sde): bram ze mdun na 'don de/rgyal po zas gtsang mo'i drung du song ste don de brjod pa/rgyal po chen po bdag gis gzhon nu'i tshul dang mthun pa'i bu mo mthong ngo //rgyal pos smras pa/su la
108a7(mdo sde): de lta bu zhig yod/smras pa/lha shAkya lag na be con can la bu mo de lta bu zhig mchis so//de nas rgyal po zas gtsang ma 'ad snyam du sems te/gzhon nu da ni shin tu phul che zhing
108b1(mdo sde): bzang ba la mos pa yin la/bud med dag ni phal cher yon tan med pa dag kyang /bdag la yon tan yod par khas len gyis/bdag gis yid du 'ong ba'i yo byad dag cig byas te/gzhon
108b2(mdo sde): nu 'di bu mo thams cad la sbyin pa byed du gzhug go/bu mo de dag gi nang nas gang la gzhon nu mig mngon par chags par gyur pa de/gzhon nu la sbyin par bya'o snyam mo//de nas rgyal po
108b3(mdo sde): zas gtsang mas yid du 'ong ba'i yo byad gser dang /dngul dang /rin po che sna tshogs las byed du bcug nas ser skya'i gnas kyi grong khyer chen po ri dril gyi sgro bsgrags te/dang nas zhag
108b4(mdo sde): bdun na kun gyis kyang gzhon nu mthong bar 'gyur te/yid du 'ong ba'i yo byad dag kyang bu mo dog la sbyin pa byed kyis/bu mo thams cod kyang 'dun khang du shig cig ces bsgo'o//dge slong
108b5(mdo sde): dag de nas zhag bdun lon pa dang /byang chub sems dpa' mdun khang du song ste/seng ge'i khri la 'dug go//de'i tshe rgyal po zas gtsang mas byar ba dag bkod nas/gzhon nu 'di bu mo gang
108b6(mdo sde): la mig chags pa de ngal gyis shig nos bsgo'o//dge slong dag de nas ser skya'i gnas kyi grong khyer chen po de na bu mo gang ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad 'dun khang ga la ba de dang /byang chub
108b7(mdo sde): sems dpa' ga la ba der byang chub sems dpa' blta ba dang yid du 'ong ba'i yo byad blang ba'i phyir der dong ngo //dge slong dag de nas byang chub sems dpas bu mo ji ltar 'ongs pa de dag lo yid du
109a1(mdo sde): 'ong ba'i yo byad rnams byin no//de nas bu mo de dag gis byang chub sems dpa'i dpal dang gzi brjid ma bzod nas/yid du 'ong ba'i yo byad de dag blangs shing myur ba
109a2(mdo sde): myur bar phyir dong ngo //dri nas shAkya lagr-I na bcon can gyi bu mo sa 'tsho me zhes bya ba/bran mo'i tshogs kyis bskor cing mdun du bdar te/'dun khang ga la ba dang /byang chub sems
109a3(mdo sde): dpa' ga la ba der song ste phyin pa dang /mig mi 'dzums par byang chub sems dpa' la blta zhing phyogs gcig tu 'dug par gyur to//gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpas yid du 'ong ba'i
109a4(mdo sde): yo byad de dag byin zin par gyur pa de'i tshe byang chub sems dpo'i drung du 'ongs nas 'dzum dmul te byang chub sems dpa' la 'di skad ces smras so//gzhon nu bdag gis khyod la
109a5(mdo sde): nongs pa ci zhig bgyis na/bdag la de ltar dang na sdang mdzad/smras pa/ngas ni khyed la dang na sdong byas pa'ang med na/khyod ni shin tu 'phyis te 'ongs so zhes smras nas des sor
109a6(mdo sde): gdub srang brgya stong du ma ri ba phud de de la byin no//bu mo des smras pa/gzhon nu khyod la bdag gis 'di lta zhig 'tshal ba 'os sam/smras pa/'o na rgyan gzhan dang gzhan
109a7(mdo sde): dag yod pa 'di dag kyang khyod khyer cig/des smras pa/gzhon nu bdag ni rgyan ma mchis par bgyid pa ma lags kyi/rgyan dang ldan par bgyid pa lags so zhes smras nas bu mo de song
109b1(mdo sde): ngo //de nas byar bar bkod pa'i mi de dag rgyal po zas gtsang ma'i drung du song nas/lo rgyus de dag smos te smras pa/lha shAkya lag na be con can gyi bu mos 'tsho ma zhes bgyi ba de la gzhon nu
109b2(mdo sde): spyan chags par gyur la cung zad cig tu bka' mchid kyang bgyis so//de nas rgyal po zas gtsang mas tshig de thos nas shAkya lag na becon can gyi gan du bram ze mdun na 'don pho nyar btang ste/
109b3(mdo sde): khyod kyi bu mo zhig yod pa de nga'i gzhon nu la byin cig ces spring ngo //lag na be con can gyis smras pa/'phags pa gzhon nu de ni pho brang na snyid de bar 'khrungs pa lags la/bdag cag gi
109b4(mdo sde): rigs kyi chos ni 'di lta bu lags te/sgyu rtsal shes pa la bu mo gtong gi/sgyu rtsal mi shes pa la mi gtong ba lags na/gzhon nu de ni sgyu rtsal shes pa'ang ma lags la/ral gri'i
109b5(mdo sde): thabs dang /'phongs dang /stobs dang /gyad kyi 'dzin stangs kyi tshul shes pa'ang ma lags na/bdag gis sgyu rtsal shes pa ma lags pa la bu mo ji ltar gtong /tshig de rgyal po la
109b6(mdo sde): bzlas pa dang /de nas rgyal po 'di snyam du sems te/nga la des 'di dang lan gnyis su bsngos te/gang gi tshe ngas shAkya gzhon nu dag gzhon nu'i rim gro byed du ci'i phyir mi 'ong zhes byas pa
109b7(mdo sde): de'i tshe'ang /ci nged lug gi rim gro byed du 'ong ngam zhes zer la/da'ang 'di skad zer ro snyam du sems shing 'dug par gyur to//byang chub sems dpas kyang gtam de thos nas rgyal po
110a1(mdo sde): zas gtsang mug la bA der song ste phyin nas 'di skad ces smras so//ci nongs te de ltar zhal zung gnag par bzhugs/rgyal pos smras pa/gzhon nu de dri bas ci zhig bya/
110a2(mdo sde): gzhon nung smras pa/wA de ni dka' mi sbrul du mi rung ngo zhes ldan gsum gyi bar du byang chub sems dpas rgyal po zas gzung me la dris pa dang /de nas rgyal po zas gtsang mas byung
110a3(mdo sde): nub sems dpa' la dngos po de dag brjod do//byang chub sems dpas smras pa/lha grong khyer 'din bdag dang sgra rgyal gyis 'dran par nus pa 'ga' mchos sam/de nas rgyal po zas
110a4(mdo sde): gtsang mas bgang nas/byang chub sems dpa' la 'di skad ces smras so//bu khyod kyisaso m+b+ha rgyal bstan par nus sum/smras pa/lha de ni bdag gis legs par rdo zlog go/de bstan
110a5(mdo sde): sUrA lnga 'tshal ba rnams kun kyong bsog tu gsol/de dag gi mdun du bdag gis/sbru rtsal bstan par 'gyi'o//de nas rgyal po zas gtsang mas sir skya'i gnas kyi grong khyer chen po
110a6(mdo sde): dril gyi skang skyugs te/dang nas zhag bdun gzhon nu rang gi sgra rtsol ston gyis/der sgra rdul shes pa thams cad shogacig ces bsgo'o//de nas zhag bdun lon pa dang /shAk+Sha gzhon
110a7(mdo sde): ru lnga rgya byar tshogs par gyur to//de nas shAkya gan bcon can gyi bu mos 'tshom rgyal po'i bu tshon du bzhag ste/'dir ral gri'i zangs dang 'bong dang /stobs dang /gyad kyi 'dzin
110b1(mdo sde): sbyangs kyis su rgyal ba de ni 'di khyer cig ces dam bcas nas/de'i tshe thams cad kyi thog ma la gzhon nu lha sbyin grong khyer nas byung ngo //de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa'i bzhon par glang po dkar po
110b2(mdo sde): bong shin tu tshe ba zhig grong khyer du khrid pa gzhon nu lha sbyin gyis mthong nas phrag dog dang /shAkya'i nga rgyal dang /stobs kyi nga rgyal gyis dreg so nas/des glang po de lag pa g.yon pas sna
110b3(mdo sde): nas bzung ste/lag pa g.yas pas thal mo len cig bsnun pas bsad par gyur to//de'i 'og tu gzhon nu mdzes dga' bo byung ba dang /des glang po chen po de grong khyer gyi sgor bsad pa
110b4(mdo sde): mthong nas/sus bsad ces dris pa dang /smras pa/lha sbyin gyis bsad do//smras pa/lha byin gyis de ni ma legs pa zhag byas so zhes/des glang po de'i mjug ma nas bzung ste/
110b5(mdo sde): grong khyer gyi sgo nas gud du bor ro//de'i 'og tu byang chub sems dpa' shing rta la zhon te byung ba dang /byang chub sems dpas glang po de ltar bsad pa mthong ngo //mthong nas kyang sus
110b6(mdo sde): ba do ces dris pa dang /smras pa/lha sbyin gyis bsad do//smras pa lho sbyin gyis de ni ma legs pa zhig byas so//grong khyer 'di'i sgo nas sus bor zhes dris pa dang /smras pa/
110b7(mdo sde): mdzes dga' bos bor ro//smras pa/mdzes dga' ros de ltar byas pa'ang legs na/sems can 'di ni lus chen po dang ljon pa ste/rul na grong khyer thams cad dri mi zhim pas
111a1(mdo sde): gang bar 'gyur ro zhes nas/de nas byang chub sems dpas shing rta la 'dug bzhin du rkang pa ya gcig sa la brkyang ste/rkang pa'i mthe bos glang po de blangs te/ra ba
111a2(mdo sde): bdun rim dang 'obs bdun rim 'das nas grong khyer gyi phyi rol rgyang grags gcig tsam du 'phangs so//glang po de phyogs gang du lhung po'i phyogs de shong chen po zhig tu gyur nas/da ltar
111a3(mdo sde): glang po'i shong zhes bya ba yin no//de'i tshe lha dang mi brgya stong mang po a ma a la la zhes zer zhing ca co dang gA zhi'i sgra brgya stong 'byin la/gos kyi g.yab mo 'byin par gyur to//nam
111a4(mdo sde): mkha'i dkyil nas lho'i bu dag gis kyang tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so//glang po'i dbang po bdo ba bzhin bzhud pa//zhabs kyi mthe bos glang po'i dbang po blangs/ra ba bdun
111a5(mdo sde): dang 'obs bdun yongs bzlas nas//grong khyer 'di yi phyi rol rgyang ring 'phangs//mkhyen pa mchog mnga' 'dis ni gdon mi zar//nga rgyal stobs kyi mtho ba'i lus can rnams//
111a6(mdo sde): 'khor ba'i grong nas phyi rol rgyang ring du//shes rab stobs kyis 'dis ni 'phen par 'gyur//dge slong dag de nas shAkya gzhon nu lnga brgya tsam grong khyer nas 'thon nas/sa'i phyogs
111a7(mdo sde): gang du shAkya gzhon nu dag sgyu rtsal ston pa der dong ngo //rgyal po zas gtsang ma dang /shAkya rgan rabs rgan rabs dag dang /skye bo phal po che dag kyang byang chub sems dpa' dang /shAkya
111b1(mdo sde): gzhon nu gzhan dag gi sgra rtsal gyi khyad par mthong bar 'dod de sa'i phyogs der dong ngo //de nas thog mar shAkya gzhon nu yi ge mkhas shing yi ge'i cho ga shes pa de dag dang /byang chub
111b2(mdo sde): sems dpar yi ge 'gran to//de'i tshe shAkya dri dag gis slob dpon kun gyi bshes gnyen dpang du bzhag ste/gzhon nu 'di dag gi nang nas/yi ge'i 'bru 'am/yi ge'i sna grangs kyi
111b3(mdo sde): mthar phyin pas khyad par du 'phags pa gang yin khyod kyis bye brag phye shig/de nas slob dpon kun gyi bshes gnyen byang chub sems dpa' yi ge la mkhas pa mngon du mthong bas
111b4(mdo sde): bzhin 'dzum pa bstan te//tshigs su bcad pa 'od dag smra so so//mi yi 'jig rten lha yi 'jig rten nam//lha min 'jig rten dri za'i 'jig rten nam//'jig rten kun gyi yi ge
111b5(mdo sde): ji snyed gang //de la sems can dag pa 'dis mthar phyin//mi yi zla ba 'di yis gang mkhyen pa'i//yi ge dag dang yi ge'i sna grangs kyi//ming yang khyed dang ngas ni yong mi shes//
111b6(mdo sde): 'di la mngon sum ngas shes 'di rgyal 'gyur//shAkya rnams kyis smras pa/gzhon nu 'di yi ge'i shes pa la khyad par du 'phags pa lnga'ang 'phags por chug ste/gzhon nu 'di
111b7(mdo sde): grangs kyis shes pa la khyad par ci yod 'gran par bya'o//de nas shAkya srid sgrub ces bya ba rtsis pa chen po byed po bgrang ba dang /rtsis kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhig yod pa de dbang du
112a1(mdo sde): bzhag ste/gzhon nu 'di dag gi nang nas grangs kyi shes pa la khyad par du gang 'phags khyod kyis ltos shig ces byas te/de nas de'i tshe byang chub sems dpas ni rtsis
112a2(mdo sde): mgo phogs/shAkya gzhon nu gcig gis ni brdzis pa dang /byang chub semaso dpa' la slebs par ma nus so//de nas shAkya gzhon nu gnyis dang /gsum dang /bzhi dang /lnga
112a3(mdo sde): dang /bcu dang /nyi shu dang /sum cu dang /bzhi bcu dang /lnga bcu dang /brgya nas/shAkya gzhon nu lnga brgya'i bar gyis dus gcig tu brtsis kyang byang chub sems dpa' la ma slebs
112a4(mdo sde): so//de nas byang chub sems dpas smras pa/khyed kyis ni rtsis mgro phog shig/kho bos ni baN+Di'o//de'i tshe shAkya gzhon nu gcig gis rtsis mgo phog na/byang chub sems
112a5(mdo sde): dpas brtsis kyi chod pa la ma slebs so//de nas shAkya gzhon nu gnyis dang /gsum dang /bzhi dang /lnga dang /bcu dang /nyi shu dang /sum cu dang /bzhi bcu dang /lnga bcu
112a6(mdo sde): dang /ngargya nas shAkya gzhon nu lnga brgya'i bar gyis bus gcig tu rtsis mgo phog kyang byang chub sems dang se rtsis kyis chod pa la ma slebs so//byang chub sems dpas smras pa/
112a7(mdo sde): 'di la bcad de'ang ci rung gis/khyed thams cad gcig tu 'dus te rtsis mgo po ga cig dang /kho bos brtsi'o//de nas shAkya gzhon nu lnga brgyas tshig gcig tu brjod pas snga phyi
112b1(mdo sde): med par gyis mgo phyag na/byang chub sems dpas rmongs pa med par brnyes te/de ltar shAt+tha gzhon nu de dag thams cad ni phug thug par gyur/byang chub sems dpa' la ni thug par
112b2(mdo sde): mtha' med par gyur to//de nas rtsis pa chen po srid sgrub ngo mtshar du gyur te tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so//legs pa'i blo mnga' 'di dris na/mkhyen pa shin tu myur ba ste//shA
112b3(mdo sde): gzhon nu lnga brgya tsam//kun kyang rtsis kyi lam la thug/de yi shes rab 'di 'dra ste//ye shes blo gros dran ldan yang //rjes kyi mkhyen pa rgya mtsho de//da dung sbyong zhing slob pa mdzad//
112b4(mdo sde): nas shAkya tshogs thams cad ngo mtshar du gyur te/shin tu rmad du drung bar sems shing /de'i tshe thams cad mgrin gcig tu tshig 'di skad ces smras so//kyi don grub gzhon nu
112b5(mdo sde): khyod ni rgyal lo rgyal lo zhes thams cad stan las langs te/thal mo sbyar nas byang chub sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal te rgyal po zas gtsang ma la 'di skad ces smras so//rgyal
112b6(mdo sde): chen po khyod la sras de ltar dris pa la spobs pa myur zhing mgyogs la/yang zhing shugs dang ldan pa can mngo' ba ni brkos pa legs par brnyes so//de nas rgyal po zas gtsang mas
112b7(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' la 'di skad ces smras so//bu rtsis pa chen po srid skab grangs kyi shes pa la mkhas pa dang /rtsis kyi lugs 'gran nus sam/smras po/lha rdo zag go//smras pa/
113a1(mdo sde): 'on gyis shig/de nas rtsis pa chen po sring sgrub kyis byang chub sems dpa' la 'di skad ces smras so//gzhon nu khyod bye ba las brgyar gong du bsgres pa zhes bgyi
113a2(mdo sde): ba'i tshis kyi lugs mkhyen tam/smras pa/shes so//smras pa/'on bye ba las brgyar gong du bsgres pa'i rtsis kyi lugs la ji ltar rjes su 'jug par bgyi/byang chub sems dpas
113a3(mdo sde): smras pa/bye ba phrag brgya na ther 'bum zhes bya'o//ther 'bum phrag brgyan khrag khrig ces bya'o//khrag khrig phrag brgyan gtams pa zhes bya'o//gtams pa phyeg brgya na
113a4(mdo sde): de thigs po zhes bya'o//dkrigs pa phrag borgya na mi 'khrugs zhes bya'o//mi 'khrugs phrag brgyan khyad phyin ces bya'o//khyad phyin phrag brgyan phang stong zhes bya'o//phong steng
113a5(mdo sde): phrag brgyan mang 'dzin ces bya'o//mang 'dzin phrag brgya na glang po'i stobs zhes bya'o//glang po'i stobs phrag brgyan ngogs 'thob ces bya'o//ngogs 'thob phrog brgyan rnam par
113a6(mdo sde): bzhag pa gdags pa zhes bya'o//rnam par bzhag pa gdags pa phrag brgya na rgyu rig ces bya'o//rgyu rig phrag brgyan lag sbyin zhes bya'o//lag sbyin phrag brgya na rgyu dbang zhes
113a7(mdo sde): bya'o//rgyu dang phrag brgyan rdzogs thob ces bya'o//rdzogs thob phrag brgya na bgrang rtogs zhes bya'o//dgrang rtogs phrag brgyan sgrib po zhes bya'o//sgrib pa phrag brgya na stobs
113b1(mdo sde): zhes bya'o//stobs phrag brgya na kun stobs zhes bya'o//kun stobs phrag brgya na rnam par brda shes ldan zhes bya'o//rnam par brda shes ldan phrug brgya na brda shes kun+da zhes bya'o//brda
113b2(mdo sde): shes kun phrag brgya na rnam 'byung zhes bya'o//rnam 'byung phrag brgyan de'i mtshan nyid ces bya ste/'di ltar de'i mtshon nyid ces bya ba'i rtsis kyis ni ri'i rgyal po ri rab brtsi ba'i gzhir byas kyang
113b3(mdo sde): chod par rung ngo //de'i yang gong na rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo'i nor bu zhes bya ba'i grangs yod do/grangs des ni gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed brtsi ba'i gzhir byas kyang chod par rung ngo //de'i yong gong
113b4(mdo sde): na rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo nges par sgrogs pa zhes bya ba'i grangs yod do//de'i yang gong na nged 'dren gdags pa zhes bya ba'i grangs yod do//de'i yang gong na gtan la 'bebs pa zhes bya
113b5(mdo sde): ba'i grangs yod do//de'i yang gong na gcod rtog zhes bya ba'i grangs yod do//de'i yang gong na gcod rtogs ldan zhes bya ba'i grangs yod do//de'i yang gong na thams cad rnam par
113b6(mdo sde): 'byed pa zhes bya ba'i grangs yod de/grangs des ni gang+gA'i klung bcu'i bye ma brtsi ba'i gzhir byas kyang chod par rung ngo //de'i yang gong na snying po mchog ces bya ba'i grangs yod de/grangs
113b7(mdo sde): des ni gang+gA'i klung bye ba phrag brgya'i bye ma dang mnyam pa brtsi ba'i gzhir byas kyang chod par rung ngo //de'i yang gong na rdul phra rab la 'jug pa'i rjes su song po zhes bya ba'i grangs yod de/
114a1(mdo sde): grangs de la ni de bzhin gshegs pa dang /byang chub kyi snying po mchog dam par gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' dang /chos thams cad la dbang bskur ba mngon du gyur
114a2(mdo sde): pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ma gtogs par sems can gyi ris nA grangs de shes pa ning dang gzhan yang nga dang 'dra ba sring pa tham par gyur pa khyim gyi gnas nas mngon par ma byung ba'i byang
114a3(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' ma gtogs par gang yang med do//srid sgrub kyis smras pa/gzhon nu rdul phra rab la 'jug pa'i rjes su song ba'i grangs la ji ltar rjes su 'jug par bgyi/byang chub
114a4(mdo sde): sems dpas smras pa/rdul phra rab kyi rdul bdun la ni rdul phra mo gcig go/rdul phra mo bdun la ni chung ngu gcig go//rdul chung ngu bdun la ni nyi zer gyi rdul gcig go//nyi zar gyi
114a5(mdo sde): rdul bdun la ni ra bong rdul gcig go//ri bong rdul bdun la ni lug rdul gcig go//lug rdul bdun la ni glang rdul gcig go/glang rdul bdun la ni sro ma gcig go/sro ma bdun
114a6(mdo sde): la ni yungs 'bru gcig go/yungs 'bru bdun le ni nas gcig go//nas bdun la ni sor gcig go//ser bcu gnyis la ni mtho glang ngo //mtho do la ni khru gang ngo //khru bzhi
114a7(mdo sde): la ni gzhu gang ngo //gzhu stong la ni yul ma ga d+ha'i rgyang grags gcig go//rgyang grags bzhi la ni dpag tshad gcig go/de la khyed kyis nang nas dpag tshad la rdul phra rab de lta
114b1(mdo sde): bu du yod sus shes/sring sgrub kyis smras pa/gzhon nu bdag nyid kyang de la mgo rmongs na gzhan blo chung ngu dang ldan pa lta smos kyang ci 'tshal de bas na gzhon nus dpag tshad la rdul phra rab de lta
114b2(mdo sde): bu du mchis bshad du gsol/byang chub sems dpas smras pa/de la dpag tshad la ni rdul phra rab mi 'khrugs khrag khrig gcig dang /bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag sum cu dang /bya ba
114b3(mdo sde): drug bu phyag brgya dang /bye ba phrag sum bu rtsa gnyis dang /'bum phrag lnga dang /khri nyis stong yod de/dpag tshad la ni rdul phra rab de snyed cig yod do//de ltar 'jug pa des dzam+bu'i gling
114b4(mdo sde): 'di la ni dpag tshad bdun stong yod do//nub kyi ba lang spyod la ni dpag tshad brgyad stong yod do//shar gyi lhas 'phags la ni dpag tshad dgu stong yod do//byang gi sgra mi snyan la ni dpag
114b5(mdo sde): tshad khri yod de/de ltar 'jug pa des gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di la sogs pa gling bzhi pa chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams bya ba phrag brgya dang /rgya mtsho chen po bye ba phrag brgya dang /
114b6(mdo sde): khor yug dang khor yug chen po bye ba phrag brgya dang /ri'i rgyal po ri rab bye ba phrag brgya dang /rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha bye ba phrag brgya dang /sum cu rtsa gsum bye ba phrag brgya dang /'thab bral
114b7(mdo sde): bye ba phrag brgya dang /dga' ldan bye ba phrag brgya dang /'phrul dga' bye ba phrag brgya dang /gzhan 'phrul dbang byed bye ba phrag brgya dang /tshangs ris bye ba phrag brgya dang /tshangs pa'i mdun na
115a1(mdo sde): 'don bye ba phrag brgya dang /tshangs 'khor bye ba phrag brgya dang /tshangs chen bye ba phrag brgya dang /'od chung bye ba phrag brgya dang /tshad med 'od bye ba phrag brgya dang /'od
115a2(mdo sde): gsal bye ba phrag brgya dong /dge chung bye ba phrag brgya dang /tshad med dag bye ba phrag brgya dang /dge rgyas bye ba phrag brgya dang /sprin meng bye ba phrag brgya dang /bsod nams skyes bye ba phrag
115a3(mdo sde): brgya dang /'bras bu che ba bye ba phrag brgya dang /sems can 'du shes med pa bye ba phrag brgya dang /mi che ba bye ba phrag brgya dang /mi gdung ba bye ba phrag brgya dang /gya nom snang bye ba phyag/
115a4(mdo sde): brgya dang /shin tu mthong bye ba phrag brgya dang /'og min gyi lha'i ris bya ba phrag brgya la stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams gcig ces bya ste/yangs shing rgya tsho ba'o//
115a5(mdo sde): de la dpag tshad du yod pa dang /dpag tshad brgya phrag du yod pa dang /dpag tshad stong phrag du yod pa dang /dpag tshad bye ba phrag du yod pa dang /dpag tshad ther 'bum phrag du
115a6(mdo sde): yod pa dang /dpag tshad khrag khrig phrag du yod pa dang /de bzhin du sbyar te/dpag tshad snying po dam pa'i rtsis kyi bar du thug pa la rdul phra rab de lta bu du yod ces bya ba'i rtsis
115a7(mdo sde): de ni grangs dang bgrang ba las 'das pa ste/de ni grangs med pa zhes bya'o//de bas kyang shin tu grangs med pa de snyed kyi rdul phra rab ni snying gsum gyi snying chen po'i 'jig rten gyi
115b1(mdo sde): khams na yod do//byang chub sems dpas kyis kyi le'u 'di bstan pa'i tshe/rtsis pa chen po srid sgrub dang /shAkya'i tshogs thams cad kyang tshim zhing mgul yi rangs te ngo mtshar rgyung ngu
115b2(mdo sde): byung ba thob nas/de dag thams cad kyang gos re re zhig bzhag ste gos dang rgyan lhag ma gzhan byang chub sems dpa' la yon du phul lo//de nas rtsis pa chen po sring sgrub kyis tshigs
115b3(mdo sde): su bcad pa 'di dag smras so//bye ba brgya na thar 'bum ther 'bum de bzhin du//khrag khrig dang ni gtams pa'i rgyud dang de bzhin du//dkrigs pa mi 'khrugs bdag gi shes thug de
115b4(mdo sde): gong min//mtshungs pa med kyi mkhyen pa rtsis la de bas lhag/yang kye shAkya dag/stong gsum dag gi rdul dang rtsi dang nags tshal dang //sman dang chu yi thogs pa ji snyed yod pa dang //
115b5(mdo sde): hu zhes bya ba gcig la 'di yis rtsi nu sa na//lnga brgya tsam drag gi lta ngo mtshar ci zhig tsha//de nas lha dang mi brgya stong dag/e ma a la la zhes zer zhing ca co dang //ga zha'i sgra brgya stong
115b6(mdo sde): 'byin par gyur to//nam mkha'i dkyil nas lha'i bu dag gis kyang tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag brjod do//dus gsum sems can ma lus ji snyed gang yod pa'i//sems dang sems
115b7(mdo sde): byung 'du shes rnam par rtog pa dag/mchog dang tha ma de bzhin rgya chung yangs pa dag/thams cad sems kyi 'gyur ba gcig gis rab tu mkhyen//dge slong dag de ltar shAkya gzhon nu
116a1(mdo sde): de dag thams cad zil gyis non par gyur te/byang chub sems dpa' 'ba' zhig khyad par du 'phags par gyur to//de'i rjes la chongs pa dang /rgyal dang /bang
116a2(mdo sde): sogs pa thams cad la'ang byang chub sems dpa' nyid khyad par du 'phags par gyur nas/nam mkha'i dkyil nus lha'i bu dag gis tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so//brtul
116a3(mdo sde): zhugs dka' thub sdom pa'i yon tan dang //bskal pa bye bor bzod dul byams stobs kyis//lus dang sems ni ci nas yang mdzad pas//de yi shugs kyi khyad par mnyam par
116a4(mdo sde): gyis//sems can mchog 'di grong khyer 'di na bzhugs pa khyed kyis mthong //'on kyang 'di ni phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten khams rnams thams cad du//skrod cig gcig la
116a5(mdo sde): rin chen gser dang mchod pa sna tshogs kyis//rgyal ba dpag tu med pa dag la mchod pa mdzad du bzhud//'on kyang rdzu 'phrul de 'dra brnyes pa de//byon tam bzhud par khyed kyis
116a6(mdo sde): yod mi shes//ji tsam zhugs shes de la ci zhig bskyed//'di ni mtshungs pa med kyis rim gro skyed//de ltar byang chub sems dpa' de gcig pu khyad par du 'phags par
116a7(mdo sde): gyur to//de nas shAkya de dag gis smras pa/gzhon nu 'di la stobs kyi khyad par ci yod pa'ang sod par bya'o//de nas byang chub sems dpa' phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas/
116b1(mdo sde): shAkya gzhon nu lnga brgya po de dag kyang dus gcig tu so so nas stobs 'gyed par gyur te/shAkya gzhon nu sum cu rtsa gnyis shig 'tshogs nas byang chub sems dpa' la brgal ba ltar chas te
116b2(mdo sde): 'khod do//de'i nang nas dga' bo dang /kun dga' bo gnyis kyis byang chub sems dpa' le stobs brgal ba'i phyir drung du phyin pa dang /byang chub sems dpa'i lag gis reg ma thag tu do
116b3(mdo sde): gnyis kas kyang byang chub sems dpa'i mthu dang gzi brjid ma bzod des la skyel to//de'i 'og tu shAkya gzhon nu lhas sbyin nga rgyal can mthu snyims pa de stobs kyi nga rgyal dang shAkya'i nga rgyal
116b4(mdo sde): gyis snyems la/byang chub sems dpa' la sngo zhing thams cad dang ldan pa'i ltad mo pa'i dkyil 'khor la bskor te/bsgyings nas byang chub sems dpa' la stobs brgal to//de nas
116b5(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpas ma stabs shing mi rings par stangs bzang porare gzhon nu lhas byin lag pa g.yas pas bteg ste bsod pa'i blos ma yin gyi nga rgyal bcag pa'i phyir byams pa'i sems
116b6(mdo sde): kyis nam mkha' las bskor bskor te sa'i steng du bor yang de'i lus la gnod par gyur pa med do//de nas byang chub sems dpas smras pa/de lta bu gnod par 'gyur bo'i cho ga gis
116b7(mdo sde): thams cad gcig tu 'dus te brgal bar gyis shig/de nas de dag thams cad nga rgyal gyis rlom zhing byang chub sems dpa' la rub par gyur to//de nas de dag byang chub sems dpa'
117a1(mdo sde): la reg ma thag tu byang chub sems dpa'i dpal dang gzi brjid dang lus kyi mthu ma bzod de/byang chub sems dpas reg pa tsam gyis sa la 'gyel bar gyur to//de nas
117a2(mdo sde): lha dang mi brgya stong de dag e ma a la la zhes zer zhing /ca co dang ga zha'i sgra brgya stong phyung ngo //nam mkha'i dkyil na 'khod pa'i lha'i bu dag gis kyang me tog gi char chen po mngon par
117a3(mdo sde): phab ste/dbyangs gcig tu tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so//phyogs bcu'i sems can gang rnams ji snyed pa//de dag gyad chen stobs po che 'dra la//cig char skyes bu'i
117a4(mdo sde): mchog la rub gyur kyang //reg pa tsam gyis sa la 'gyel bar 'gyur//lhun po ri rab rdo rje'i khor yug dang //phyogs bcu dag na ri gzhan gang yod pa//lag pas mnyes shing
117a5(mdo sde): dmig med phyir klog na//mi lus snying po med pa mtshar ci che//'di ni shing dbang mchog drung sdungad pa'i gyad //dpung bcas bdud rnams rgyal mtshan sder bcas pa//nag po'i
117a6(mdo sde): rtsa lag byamos pa'i stobs kyis 'joms//bla med byang chub zhi bar 'tshang yang rgya//de ltar byang chub sems dpa' de gcig pu khyad par du 'phags par gyur to//de nas shAkya lag
117a7(mdo sde): na be con can gyis shAkya gzhon nu de dag la 'di skad ces smras so//'di dag ni sad kyang zin/mthong yang zin gyis da ni 'phong zhig bstan par gyis shig/de'i tshe kun dga' bos
117b1(mdo sde): rgyang grags gnyis kyi pha rol tu lcags kyi rnga gcig 'ben du btsugs so//de'i 'og tu lha sbyin gyis rgyang grags bzhi'i pha rol tu lcags kyi rnga gcig 'bon du btsugs so//de'i 'og tu mdzes
117b2(mdo sde): dga' bos rgyang grags drug gi pha rol tu lcags kyi rnga gcig 'ben du btsugs so//de'i 'og tu shAkya lag na be con can gyis dpag tshad gnyis kyi pha rol tu lcags kyi rnga gcig 'ben du btsugs
117b3(mdo sde): so//de nas byang chub sems dpas rgyang grags bcu'i pha rol tu lcags kyi rnga gcig 'ben du btsugs te/de'i drung du shing ta la bdun dang ra nas de'i pha rol tu lcags kyi phag rgod kyi gzugs
117b4(mdo sde): 'khrul 'khor du byas pa gcig gtsugs so//de nas kun dga' bos rgyang grags gnyis kyi pha rol na rnga'i 'ben 'dug pa la 'phangs na phog par gyur te/de phan chod kyil phog par ma nus
117b5(mdo sde): so//lha sbyin gyis rgyang grags bzhi'i pha rol na rnga'i 'ben 'dug pa la 'phangs ni phog par gyur te/de phan chad kyi la phog par ma nus so//mdzes dga' bos rgyang grags drug gi pha rol na rnga'i
117b6(mdo sde): 'ben 'dug pa la 'phangs na phog par gyur te/de phan chad kyi la phog par ma nus so//lag na becon can gyis dpag tshad gnyis kyi pha rol na rnga'i 'ben 'dug pa la 'phangs na phog par
117b7(mdo sde): gyur te/thal byung du phyin nas de phan chad kyi la phog par ma nus so//de nas byang chub sems dpa' la gzhu gang dang gang byin pa de dag la la ni gzhu rgyud chad/la la ni chag nas byang
118a1(mdo sde): chub sems dpas smras pa/grong khyer 'di na gzhu gzhan la la bdag gis brdung bzod pa 'am/lus kyi stobs dang mthu bzod pa mchis sam/rgyal pos smras
118a2(mdo sde): pa/bu yod do//gzhon nus smras pa/lha de lta bu gang na mchis/rgyal pos smras pa/bu khyod kyi mes seng ge'i 'gram zhes bya ba byung ste/de'i snam ru da ltar lha khang na spos dang
118a3(mdo sde): phreng bas mchod de/de ni sus kyang brdung bar yang ma nus na/dgang bar lta smos kyang ci dgos pa zhig yod do//byang chub sems dpas smras pa/lha de blang du gsol/sad
118a4(mdo sde): par bgyi'o//de nas gzhu de blangs te 'ongs pa dang /shAkya gzhon nu thams cad kyis nan tan gyi mchog gis bsgrims kyang gzhu de brdung bar yang ma nus na dgang par lta smos
