118a5(mdo sde): kyang ci dgos te ma nus so//de nas gzhu de shAkya lag ne be con can gyis lus kyi mthu stobs thams cad phyung ste/gzhu de brdud par brgal na ma brdungs so//de nas gzhu de
118a6(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' la byin no//de nus byang chub sems dpas gzhu de blangs te stan las ma langs par skyil mo krung phyed bcas te/lag pa g.yon pas bzung nas lag pa
118a7(mdo sde): goyas pa'i sor mo gcig gis brdungs so//gzhu de de ltar brdungs pa'i tshe sor skya'i gnas kyi grong khyer chen po thams cad du sgra mngon par grag par gyur to//grong khyer gyi mi
118b1(mdo sde): thams cad kyang sreg sreg por gyur te/gcig la gcig 'dri zhing 'di lta ci'i sgra zhig ces zer ro//de la la la na re gzhon nu don grub kyis mes kyi snum ru brdungs nas de'i sku byung ba 'di yin
118b2(mdo sde): no zhes zer ro//de nas lha dang mi brgya stong dag e ma a lA la zhes zer zhing ca ci dang ga zha'i sgra brgya stong 'byin par gyur to//nam mkha'i dkyil ni 'khod pa'i lha'i bu dag gis kyang /rgyal po
118b3(mdo sde): zas gtsang ma dang /skye bo'i tshogs phal po che de dag la tshigs su bcad de smras pa/gdan las ma bzhengs brtsel ba ma mchis su//thub pas snum ru 'di 'dra brdungs pa las//gdon
118b4(mdo sde): mi 'tshal bar dgongs po rdzogs gyur te//bdud kyi sde bcom myur du thub par byon//dge slong dag de ltar byang chub sems dpas mda' blangs nas gzhu de dang sbyar te bkang nas 'phags
118b5(mdo sde): pa'i mthu stobs kyis kun dga' bo'i 'ben du rnga btsugs pa dang /lha sbyin gyi 'ben du rnga btsugs pa dang /mdzes dga' bo'i 'ben du rnga btsugs pa dang /log na be con can gyis 'ben
118b6(mdo sde): du rnga btsugs pa de dag thams cad las thal nas rgyang grags bcu'i pha rol tu bdag gi 'ben lcags kyi rnga btsugs pa dang /shing ta la bdun dang ra ba dang /phag rgod kyi gzugs 'khrul
118b7(mdo sde): 'khor du byas pa las kyang thal te mda' de sa la zug nas mi snang bar gyur to//sa phyogs gang du mda' de zug ste nub pa'i sa phyogs der khron pa lta bu'i khung zhig byung nas da ltar yang
119a1(mdo sde): mda'i khron pa zhes bya ba yin no//de'i tshe lha dang mi brgya stong dag/oM ma a la la zhes zer zhing ca no dang gzha'i sgra brgya stong 'byin par gyur to//shAkya'i tshogs de dag
119a2(mdo sde): thams cad kyang ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba thob ste/kye ngo mtshar to//'das ni bslabs kyang ma bslabs par rtsal gyi shes pa de lta bu dang ldan pa ni ngo mtshar che'o zhes zer ro//nam mkha'i
119a3(mdo sde): dkyil na 'khod pa'i lha'i bu dag gis kyang rgyal po zas gtsang ma dang /skye bo'i tshogs phral po che de dag la 'di skad ces smras so//de ltar ngo mtshar yang ci che ste/de ci'i phyir zhe na/
119a4(mdo sde): 'di ni sa yi snying po sngon gyi sangs rgyas gdan la bzhugs//zhi gnas snom du thogs shing stong pa bdag med mda' rnams kyis//nyon mongs dgra rnams bcom ste lta ba'i dra ba dral
119a5(mdo sde): nas su//byang chub dam pa zhi ba rdul med mya ngan med pa 'thob//de skad ces smras nas/lha'i bu de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' la lha'i me tog dag gis mngon par gtor te dong
119a6(mdo sde): ngo //de bzhin du mchongs pa dang /yi ge dang /lag rtsis dang /rtsis dang /grangs dang /byad kyi 'dzin stangs dang /rgyang nas phog pa dang /bang dang /tshar dang /rgyal dang /
119a7(mdo sde): 'phong dpyad dang /glang po che'i gnyar zhon pa dang /rta rtsal dang /shing rta'i thabs dang /mda' gzhu'i thabs dang /brtan pa dang /mthu dang /dpa' ba dang /'gyed stobs dang /
119b1(mdo sde): lcags kyus sbyar thabs dang /zhags pa'i thabs dang /mdun du bskur ba dang /phyir bskur ba dang /bzur ba dang /'dzin stangs dang /gom stobs dang /thor tshugs dang /bcad
119b2(mdo sde): pa dang /dral ba dang /dbug pa dang /gzhig pa dang /gshig pa dang /mi 'tshor bar 'phog pa dang /gnang du 'phog pa dang /sgra grag par 'phog pa dang /tshabs che ba dang /tshe lo'i
119b3(mdo sde): rtsed mo dang /snyan dang bras sbyar ba dang /lam dang /ri mo dang /gzugs dang /gzugs kyi las dang /thabs kyi dpyad dang /me'i las dang /rol mo'i dbyangs sgra dang /gar dang /
119b4(mdo sde): glu dang /yi ge klag pa'i migo 'or dang /gtam dang /gzhad gang dang /rtsed mo dang /bro dang /sgeg pa dang /phreng po dang brgyu ba dang /rlung yab g.yab pa dong /nor bu tshon gyis sgyur
119b5(mdo sde): ba dang /gos tshon gyis bsgyur ba dang /mig 'phrul gyi cho gra dang /rmi lam gyi dpyad dang /bya'i skad dang /bud med kyi mtshan dang /skyes pa'i mtshan dang /glang po che'i mtshan dang /
119b6(mdo sde): rta'i mtshan dang /ba lang gi mtshan dang /ra'i mtshan dang /lug gi mtshan dang /khyi'i mtshan dang /shes gsal dang /sgra nges par sbyor ba dang /nga ro sgyur ba dang /sngon gyi rabs dang
119b7(mdo sde): sngon byung ba dang /rig byed dang /lung bstan pa dang /nges pa'i tshig dang /yi ge lci yang dang /tshig bsdeb pa dang /mchod sbyin gyi cho ga dang /skar ma'i lugs dang /grangs can gyi
120a1(mdo sde): lugs dang /rnal 'byor gyi lugs dang /las kyi tshogs dang /bye brag pa'i lugs dang /nor gyi rig pa dang /phur bu'i lugs dang /chu'i lugs dang /lha ma
120a2(mdo sde): yin gyi lugs dang /bya dang ri dgas kyi skad dang /gtan tshigs kyi rig pa dang /rgya sgyogs kyi 'khrul 'khor dang /spra tshil gyi las dang /'drub shur dang /berko bzhog dang /lo ma dA
120a3(mdo sde): ba dang /spos sbyar ba la sogs pa'i sgyu rtsal 'jig rten pa dang lha'i dad mi'i las 'das pa thams cad la'ang byang chub sems dpa' 'ba' zhig khyad par du 'phags par gyur to//de'i
120a4(mdo sde): tshe shAkya lag na bo con can gyis rang gi bu mos 'tsho ma/byang chub sems dpa' la phul lo//rgyal po zos gtsang mas kyang /de rim gyi so bag mar blangs te byang chub sems
120a5(mdo sde): dpa' la phul lo//de na byang chub sems dpas 'jig rten dang mthun pa tsam du bya ba'i phyir bud med brgyad khri bzhi stong gi nang du 'dug ste/dga' zhing rtse la yongs su spyod pa ston to///
120a6(mdo sde): bud med brgyad khri bzhi stong de dag thams cad kyi nang nas/shAkya'i bu mo sa 'tsho ma btsun mo'i mchog tu dbang bskur bar gyur to//de nas shAkya'i bu mo sa 'tsho ma gyo skyug gom nang mi
120a7(mdo sde): gang mthong yang rung ste/gdong mi sbed do//de dag kyang de la bag sar mo ni zhum zhum por 'dug pa'i rigs na/'di ni rtag tu ma g.yogs so zhes 'phya smod cing mi snyen par zer ro//
120b1(mdo sde): de'i tshe shAkya'i bu mos 'tshoms gtam de thos nas nang mi rnams kyi mdun du 'dug ste/tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so//'dug dang 'greng dang 'chag pa la//'phags pa dag ni ma ga yogs
120b2(mdo sde): mdzes//nor bu rin chen 'od gsal ba//rgyal mtshan rtse mor gsal na mdzes//'phags pa 'gro na'ang mdzes pa ste//'ong na'ang de bzhin mdzes pa yin//'brang ba 'am de bzhin 'dug
120b3(mdo sde): pa dang //thams cad du'ang 'phags pa mdzes//'phags pa smra na'ang mdzes pa ste//mi smrar 'dug kyang de bzhin mdzes//dper na ka lA ping+ga ni//mthong dang sgra thos de bzhin no//tu
120b4(mdo sde): shA'i gos ni byon pa dang //gos dran gyon dang lus rid pa//de ni rang gi gzi yi mdzes//yan tan ldan pa yon tan brgyan//gang la sdig pa med gyur pa//'phags pa kun tu dge ba
120b5(mdo sde): yin//byis pa sdig pa byed pa ni//ji snyed brgyan kyang mdzes ma yin//gang dag snying la sdig pa yod cing tshig 'jam po//de dag dug gi bum par bdud rtsi blugs pa bzhin//brag gi
120b6(mdo sde): ser ge rngub pa lta bur nang yong chub//de 'dra de dag sbrul gyi kha la nyug pa bzhin//des pa de dge gan du kun 'ong kun phyag 'tshal//'bab sngags thams cad lta bur 'bro kun gyi gsos
120b7(mdo sde): 'phags pa dag ni rtag tu'o zhes bkang bum 'dra//bdag nyid dag pa de 'dra mthong na bkra shis dge/gang dag sdig pa'i grogs po yun ring yongs spong zhing //dge ba'i bshes gnyen rin//
121a1(mdo sde): po ches ni yongs bzung la//sdig pa rnam spong sangs rgyas chos la mngon chags pa//de lta bu dag mthong ba bkra shis 'bras bu yod//gang dag lus bsdams lus kyi/
121a2(mdo sde): skyon rnams rab bsdams dang /gang dag tshig bsdams rtag tu tshig 'tshal med gyur la//dbang po sbas shing shin tu bsdams la yid dang bya//de lta bu dag gdong g.yogs te ni ci zhig
121a3(mdo sde): bya//gal te lus le gos ni stong gis g.yogs gyur kyang //gang dag sems pa shus ngo tsha med cing khrel med dang //gang dag 'di 'dra'i yon tan med cing bden tshig med//de dag
121a4(mdo sde): sgren mo byas kyang sgren mor 'jig rten rgyu//gang zhig sems sras rtag tu dbang po bsdams gyur cing //bdag gis khyos chog sems can gzhan la mi sems pa//de 'dra ba dag
121a5(mdo sde): nyi zla bzhin du ma ge yogs snang //de 'dra ba dag gdong g.yogs te ni ci zhig bya//gzhan yang drang srong bdag nyid tshe dang gzhan sems blo mkhas dang //de bzhin lha tshogs dag
121a6(mdo sde): gis kho mo'ang sam pa dang //kho mo'i tshul khrims yon tan sdom dang bag yod mkhyen//de lta bas ni kho mos gdong bkab ci zhig dgos//dge slong dag rgyal po zas gtsang mas
121a7(mdo sde): shAkya'i bu mos 'tshe ma'i spongs pa dang bstan pa'i tshigs su bcad pa rnam pa 'di lta bu 'di zos so//zos nas kyang tshim zhing mgul yi rangs te rab tu dga' zhing dga' ba dang yid
121b1(mdo sde): bde ba skyes nas/ras bcos bu bzang po rin po che du mas spras pa zung gcig dang /mu tig gri do shal srang bye ba brgya stong ri ba dang /mu tig dmar po bzang pos spras pa'i gsar gyi
121b2(mdo sde): phreng ba so shAkya'i bu mo sa 'tsho ma la bkrab nas tshad du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do//kho bo'i bu ni yon tan ci 'dres brgyan pa dang //mna' ma rang gi yon tan ji ltar rab smra ba//sems
121b3(mdo sde): can dag pa de gnyis phrad par gyur pa ni//mar dang mar gyi nying khu ji ltar 'dra ba bzhin//sgyu rtsal bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu gnyis pa'o////'phags pa rgya cher rol pa
121b4(mdo sde): zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo//bam po brgyad pa//dge slong dag de ltar byang chub sems dpa' btsun mo'i 'khor gyi rlung na 'dug pa na/gang dag byang chub sems dpa' la mchod
121b5(mdo sde): pa'i los byed pa la spro bar gyur pa/lha dang /klu dang /gnod sbyin dang /dri za dang /lha ma yin dang /nam mkha' lding dang /mi 'am ci dang /lto 'phyi chen po dang /brgya byin dang /
121b6(mdo sde): tshangs pa dang /'jig rten skyong ba du ma de dag rang rang gi dga' ba'i sgra 'byin cing lhags par gyur to//de la dge slong dag dus gzhan zhig na lha dang /klu dang /gnod sbyin dang /dri
121b7(mdo sde): za dang /lha ma yin dang /nam mkha' lding dang /mi 'am ci dang /lto 'phye chen po dang /brgya byin dang /tshangs pa dang /'jig rten skyong ba mang po dag 'di snyam du sems par
122a1(mdo sde): gyur te/mal skyes bu dam pa 'di btsun mo'i 'khor gyi nang du ha cang yun ring du thogs par gyur na sems can gang dag 'dis yun ring po nas bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi po sbyin pa
122a2(mdo sde): dang /snyan par smra ba dang /don spyad pa dang /don mthun pas yongs su smin par byas pa dang /gang dag 'dis byang chub thob nas/chos bstan pa shes par 'gyur ba chos kyi snod du
122a3(mdo sde): gyur pa'i sems can de dag med par gyur nas/phyis byang chub sems dpa' mngon par byung ste/bla na me pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par 'tshang rgya ba 'ami gcig/
122a4(mdo sde): tu mi 'gyur grang snyam mo//de nas de dag gus pa dang bcas zhes dang bcas par thal mo sbyar te/byang chub sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal nas/nam zhig na bdag cag gis byang
122a5(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' dam pa mchog rab dag pa 'di mngon par byung ba dang /mngon par byung nas kyang shing gi rgyal po chen po de'i drung du 'dug ste/bdud dpung dang bcas pa btul nas bla
122a6(mdo sde): na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang ldan pa dang /de bzhin gshegs pa'i mi 'jigs pa bzhi/
122a7(mdo sde): dang ldan pa dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang ldan pa dang /lan gsum du bzlas te rnam pa bcu gnyis su bskor ba'i chos kyi 'khor lo bla na med bskor zhing sangs
122b1(mdo sde): rgyas kyi rnam par rol pa chen pos lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten mos pa ji lta ba bzhin du legs par bshad pas tshim par byed pa mthong bar 'gyur snyam pa'i bsam pa
122b2(mdo sde): de lta bus sdod cing 'khod par gyur to//dge slong dag de la byang chub sems dpa' ni bskalnga pa grangs med pa'i yang blangs med pa nas bzung ste/yun ring por rtag par rgyun du 'jig rten pa
122b3(mdo sde): dang /'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos thams cad la gzhon gyi dring mi 'jog par gyur cing /dge ba'i chos spyod pa thams cad la bdag nyid slob dpon du gyur pa yin la/yun ring po
122b4(mdo sde): nas dus shes pa dang /tshod shes pa dang /ran pa shes par gyur pa dang /mngon par shes pa las ma nyams pa dang /mngon par shes pa lnga dang ldan pa dang /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pas
122b5(mdo sde): rnam par rtse ba dang /sems can gyi dasam pa dang dbang po la mkhas pa dang /dus dang dus ma yin pa shes pa dang /dus la lta zhing rgya mtsho chen po ltar dus ran pa lngas mi yol bar
122b6(mdo sde): gyur pa'o//de mngon par shes pa'i ye shes kyi stobs dang ldan pas 'di ni rab tu bzung ba'i dus so//'di ni tshar bcad pa'i dus so//'di ni bsdu ba'i dus so//'di ni phan gdags
122b7(mdo sde): de'i dus so//'di ni btang snyoms su bzhag pa'i dus so//'di ni smra ba'i dus so//'di na mi smra bar bya ba'i dus so//'di ni khyim nas 'byung ba'i dus so//'di ni rab tu 'byung ba'i
123a1(mdo sde): dus so//'di ni kha tron bya ba'i dus so//'di ni tshul bzhin yid la bya ba'i dus so//'di ni rab tu dben par bya ba'i dus so//'di ni rgyal rigs kyi 'khor gyi nang du
123a2(mdo sde): 'gro ba'i dus so zhes bya ba nas/'di ni bram ze dang khyim bdag gi bar gyi 'khor gyi nang du 'gro ba'i dus so//'di ni lha dang /klu dadong /gnod sbyin dang /dri za dang /lha ma yin dang /
123a3(mdo sde): nam mkha' lding dang /mi 'am ci dang /lto 'phye chen po dang /brgya byin dang /tshangs pa dang /'jig rten skong ba dang /dge slong dang /dge slong ma dang /dge bsnyen dang /dge bsnyen
123a4(mdo sde): ma'i 'khor gyi nang du 'gro ba'i dus so//'di ni chos bstan pa'i dus so//'di ni nang du yang dag bzhag pa'i dus so zhes bya ba thams cad bdag nyid kyis shes so//byang chub
123a5(mdo sde): sems dpa' dus thams cad du rtag par dus shes par gyur cing /dus la blta ba yin yang dge slong dag 'di ni chos nyid thob pa yin te/srid pa tha ma pa'i byang chub sems dpa'
123a6(mdo sde): btsun mo'i 'khor gyi nang na 'khod pa rnams la phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams na bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams glu dbyangs dang sil ston gyi sgra las chos kyi
123a7(mdo sde): sgo rnam pa 'di lta bu 'di dag gis yang dag par bskul ba mdzad de//de la 'di skad ces bya ste/sems can mchog gang phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten bzhugs//de dag mthu yis sil
123b1(mdo sde): snyan sgra dag las//tshigs bcad sgra snyan 'di dag byung ba yis//mi mchog dam pa rnams la yang dag skul//sdug bsngal brgyas gang sems can mthong nas ni//'gro ba'i mgon dang
123b2(mdo sde): skyabs dang gnas 'gyur zhing //phan byed mchog dang dpung gnyen gyur cig ces//khyod kyis sngon no smon lam de skad btab//dge ba dpa' ngo sngon gyi spyod pa dang //'gro phan bya zhes
123b3(mdo sde): smon btab dran par byos//'di ni khyod kyis dus man chod yin gyis//drang srong mchog rabo mngon par 'byung bar byos//sangs rgyas lha mi 'dul byed 'jig rten mchog/yon tan brgyas
123b4(mdo sde): grang bar ni gyur cig ces//de'i phyir khyod sngon mgo dang rkang lag dang //nor gyi dam pa sna tshogs rnams kyang btang //khyod ni khrims kyis brtul zhugs dka' thub spyad//khyod
123b5(mdo sde): ni bzod pas 'gro la phan pa byed//khyod ni brtson pas yon tan brgya yis gang //bsam gtan shes rab srid gsum mnyam pa med//khro bas non cing tha ba'i dri mang ba//de dog
123b6(mdo sde): bde gshegs khyod kyi byams pas khyab//dge ba'i yon tan bral ba log nges pa//mi mkhas rnam mang dag la khyod snying rje//bsod nams ye shes dge ba'i lus khyab cing //rdul
123b7(mdo sde): bral bsam gtan mngon shes lam mer 'dug/phyogs bcu 'di dag rnams su rab tu gsal//sprin med zla ba dri ma med pa 'dra//'di dang gzhan yang snyan pa rnam mang gis//sil
124a1(mdo sde): snyan dag las rgyal bas sgra bsgrags te//mngon par khyod 'byung dus ni 'di yin zhes//lha mis mchod par 'os la sbrul ma 'debs//dge slong dag byang chub sems dpa'
124a2(mdo sde): khyim dam pa mchog yo byad phun sum tshogs pa thams cad dang ldan pa/bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du bde bar gnas pa dang mthun pa/lha'i khang khyim lta bu stegs bu dang /sgo gang dang /rta
124a3(mdo sde): babs dang /skar khung dang /bsil khang dang /khang pa brtsegs pa dang /khang bzang mchog dang /rin po che sna tshogs kyi rgyan rnam pa tha dad pa dbye ba shin tu rnam par phye ba/gdugs
124a4(mdo sde): dang /rgyal mtshan dang /ba dan bsgreng ba/rin po che'i dril bu g.yer ka'i dra ba du mas legs par brgyan pa/dar gyi lnga ldi brgya stong du mas mngon par dpyangs pa/rin po che sna tshogs
124a5(mdo sde): kyis smras pa'i mu tig gi rgyan phreng rab tu dpyangs pa/rin po che sna tshogs kyi spang leb can gyi zam pas mdzes par byas pa/me tog gi phreng ba dang chun po mang po dpyangs pa/phog snod
124a6(mdo sde): nas spos kyis bdugs pa/dar la'i bla br-i bres pa/dus thams cad pa'i me tog dri mchog tu zhim zhing /shin tu mdzes pa dag bkram pa/rdzing me tog pad+ma dkor po dang /pad+ma dang ldan
124a7(mdo sde): pa'i chu'i gnas yongs su spyad par bya ba mang de/bya 'dab skyo ba dang /ne tso dang /ri skags dang /khu byug dang /ngang pa dang /rma bya dang /ngur pa dang /ku ni la dang /ka la ping+ga dang /
124b1(mdo sde): shang shang te'u la sogs pa bya rnam pa tha dad pa'i tshogs sgra snyan pa 'byin pa/bai DUr+ya sngon po'i sa gzhi gnas yongs su spyad par bya ba/gzugs thams cad kyi gzugs brnyan kun tu ston
124b2(mdo sde): pa/blta bas mi ngoms por nyams dga' ba/dga' ba dang mchog tu dga' ba dam pa bskyed pa'i khyim dam pa mchog de na 'dug ste/byang chub sems dpa' khang pa yangs pa chen po
124b3(mdo sde): mchog na gnas pa/dri ma med pa/dri ma dang bral ba/yan lag dri ma med pa/phreng ba dang rgyan ma bor ba/dri mchog tu zhim pa dam pa'i byug pas lus bskus pa/dkar zhing bzang
124b4(mdo sde): la dri ma med cing rnam par dag la dri ma dang bral ba'i gos gyon pa'i lus dang ldan pa/mal cha lha'i ras bcos bu bzang po phra ba du ma bting ba 'jam pa ka tsa lin+da'i gos ltar reg na bde ba/yan
124b5(mdo sde): lag dam pa'i spras pas mal bzang po'i steng na 'dug pa btsun mo'i 'khor dam pa/lha'i bu mo dang 'dra ba/thams cad du kha na ma tho ba med pa/lta ba dang mthun pa/spyod pa bzang pos
124b6(mdo sde): mdzes par byas pa/gzugs bzang ba'i nang na 'dug pa/dung dang /rnga dang /rdza rnga dang /'khar rnga dang /pi wang dang /rgyad gsum pa dang /'khar ba'i sil khrol dang /pheg dang /
124b7(mdo sde): ki m+ba la dang /na ku la dang /sgra snyan dang /gling bu snyan pa'i sgra 'byung ba'i sgra dbyangs dang /sil snyan dang /glu dbyangs sna tshogs dang ldan pas bslang ba la/bud med kyi tshogs kyis kyang //
125a1(mdo sde): sgra mnyan zhing 'jam pa snyan la yid du 'ongang dang /gling bu 'bud pa'i sgra dbyangs kyis byang chub sems dpa' slong ngo //phyogs bcun bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan
125a2(mdo sde): 'das de dag gi byin gyi rlabs kyis sil snyan sgra byung ba'i sgra skad de dag las byang chub sems dpa' lo skul ba'i tshigs su bcad pa 'di dog byung ngo //bud med gang dag rab tu yid dga'
125a3(mdo sde): sems dang bso//sil snyan yid du 'ong zhing snyan pa'i sgra 'byin tshe//phyogs bcu'i rgyal ba dam pa dag gi mthu yis na//tshigs bcad rnam pa sna tshogs rnam mang 'di dag byung //
125a4(mdo sde): rtag tu mgon med gyur pa'i 'gro ba 'di mthong nas//go 'phong mya ngan med mchog rdul med sangs rgyas te//skye dang rga dang sdug bsngal dag las dgro la lo zhes//dpa' bo khyod sngon
125a5(mdo sde): smon lam de skad btab par gyur//de phyir dge myur grong khyer mchog 'di nas//byung la sngon gyi drang srong zha bos bcags pa//sa phyogs de ni rab tu mnan nas su//rgyal ba'i
125a6(mdo sde): ye shes mtshungs med 'tshang rgyar gyis//khyod kyis sngon chad sna tshogs rin chen nor//rkang lag phongs pa'i lus kyang btang bar gyur//drang srong chen po de ring khyod dus 'di//
125a7(mdo sde): chos kyi chu bo mtha' yas 'gro la phye//khyod kyi tshul khrims ma nyams dri med dag/sngon chad khyod ni rtag tu mchog gis brgyan//drang srong chen po khyod khrims 'dro ba med//'gro
125b1(mdo sde): banyon mongs rnam pa mang las khrol//khyod kyis srid pa brgyar ni bzod pa spyad//khyod ni 'gro bas ngan brjod rnam mang bzod//bzod pas bzod cing dul bas nges pa'i bdag/rkang gnyis
125b2(mdo sde): dbang po mngon par 'byung blo gyis//khyod brtson brtan zhing mi g.yo g.yo bo med//bde bar gshegs pa sngon mthar rgya chen gyur//g.yon can bdud ni sde dang bcas btul te//ngan song
125b3(mdo sde): gsum po mtha' dag skams par gyis//gang phyir khyod kyis brtul zhugs dka' thub spyad//dus ngan nyon mongs snyigs ma bsregs kyis la//khyod kyis bdud rtsi chu bo'i char phob ste//
125b4(mdo sde): mgon med ring mas skom pa tshim par gyis//'o tsho maud mya ngan med gnas sangs rgyas te//skom pas nyam thag bdud rtsis tshim bya zhes//khyod kyis sngon smras tshig mchog dran byos te///
125b5(mdo sde): grong khyer dam pa 'di nas myur du byung //khyod ni shes rab mchog gi spyod pa mkhas//khyod kyi ye shes mtha' yas dri med che//rmongs pa yid gnyis lam la gnas rnams la//shes
125b6(mdo sde): rab 'od dag dam pa mdzes pa gyis//khyod kyis srid pa brgyar ni byams pa spyad//snying rje dang ni dga' mchog btang snyoms dang //khyod kyis spyod pa dam pa gang spyad pa//spyod pa de
125b7(mdo sde): nyid 'gro la rnam par phye//phyogs bcu'i rgyal ba dag gis gzi brjid kyis//yon tan me tog sna tshogs tshigs bcad 'di//sil snyan dag las rnam mang yid 'ong grag/mal na
126a1(mdo sde): 'dug pa'i gzhon nu de la skul//gang gi tshe na dga' byed bung med rab tu dga' ba rnams//shin tu mdzes shing rab tu snyan pa'i sil snyan sgrog pa'i tshe//phyogs bcu dag gi
126a2(mdo sde): rgyal ba lha mi 'dul ba mdzad rnams kyang //sil snyan dag las gsung mchog ha cang mi tshe rjes su sgrog/'gro la phan byed yon tan mang po ldan khyod 'gro rnams su//rnam par rgyu ba'i
126a3(mdo sde): na rgyal ba'i yon tan gnyug mur byas//sngon gyi brtul zhugs dka' thub spyad pa de dag dran gyis te//shing mchog drung du myur song 'chi mod go 'phang thob par gyis//lha mi dag
126a4(mdo sde): ni shin tu skom zhing rgyal ba'i yon tan bral//khyod ni shin tu stobs ldan bdud rtsi'i ro bro rtag tu sbyin//stobs bcu'i ro bro dam pa mkhas pa rnams kyis mchod byas pa//bdud rtsi
126a5(mdo sde): da ni mi bdag khyod kyis myur du rnam par phye//rgyal ba'i yon tan 'gro le phan pa byed la dga' ba po//khyod kyis sngon gyi srid par nor dang nor bu gser rnams botang //chung me bu
126a6(mdo sde): sdug dag dang grong khyer grong rdal bcas pa dang //rang gi mgo dang mig dang lag pa dag drang rkang pa'ang btang //mi mchog khyod ni gna' sngon rgyal po dge bar gyur pa'i che//mi zhig/
126a7(mdo sde): khyed la mngon du phyogs nas 'di skad tshig smras te//grong khyer grong rdal bcas pa'i sa 'di kho bo byin zhes byas//de yi tshe na rab tu dga' zhing 'khrugs par gyur pa med//gna' sngon
126b1(mdo sde): khyod ni rgyal po'i bram ze dge par gyur pa'i tshe//skye bo blam bsnyen bkur byed cing gzhan la 'khu mi byed//bram ze dam pa dag dang skye bo mang po dag la bkod//de nas shi 'phos srid pa'i 'dra
126b2(mdo sde): bo lha yi gnas su skyes//sngon khyod rgyal ngo'i bu los drang srong dam par gyur pa'i tshe//rgyal po ngano pa khros pas khyod kyi yan lag bcad pa na//khyod ni yid 'khrugs gyur pa med par
126b3(mdo sde): ba'i dus byas tA//de yi tshe ne khyod kyi rkang lag dag las 'o ma zag/khyod sngon drang srong sngo spangs zhes byad gang tsho gyur da na//ri mchog gan sngon brtul zhugs dga' zhing bla ma la yang
126b4(mdo sde): dga'//mi yi bdag pos dug mda' dag gis khyod la bsnun pa na//khyod ni rgyal po de la yid 'khrugs med cing snying brtser gyur//khyod sngon ri dwags bdag po yon tan can du gyur
126b5(mdo sde): nga'i tshe//ri gzar 'drab chu chen pos mi zhig khyer bar gyur pa na//phon dang ldan pa khyod kyis mi de phyung ste thang la bzhag/khyod kyi dge bo khrid de 'ongs pa na yang yid ma 'khrugs//mi
126b6(mdo sde): mchog khyod sngon bram ze'i dur ni gang tshe gyur pa no//khyod kyi nor bu rgya mtsho chen po yongs par ltung ba'i tshe//khyod kyis rgya mtsho chen po zad par bya bar brnams pa dang //stobs brtan
126b7(mdo sde): khyu mchog khyod kyi nir bu de tshe phyir yang rnyed//skyes bu mchog khyod gna' sngon drang srong dam par gyur pa'i che//bram ze zhig gis bdag gi skyabs gyor shog ces khyod gan 'ongs//smras
127a1(mdo sde): pa bram ze dam pa kho bo dag las byung zhes byas//khyod kyis dang lus btang gis bram ze de ni ma btang ngo //gna' sngon shing gi gnas su drang srong sngo bsangs drung 'ongs te//
127a2(mdo sde): 'dod pas smras pa shing 'di lo ma du yod grongs zhes bya//shing de lo ma ji snyed yod pa rab bgrangs rab mkhas pas//khyod kyis de bzhin nor pa med cing mthun par tshig tu brjod//khyod
127a3(mdo sde): sngon ne tso yon tan ldan gyur shing la gnas pa'i tshe//zad par gyur kyang sngon gyi drin la bsams te de ma spangs//lha yi bdag pos khyod kyi yon tan dran nas rab tu dga'//snga mkho
127a4(mdo sde): bzhin du shing mchog de ni dpal dang ldan par byas//khyod kyi brtul zhugs dka' thub spyad pa de dag mtshungs med de//yon tan ldan pa yon tan lam la spyad pa yon tan mang //
127a5(mdo sde): khyod kyi dus la dbang grong khyer bcas pa'i sa yang thong //'gro ba dag ni rgyal ba'i yon tan spyod la myur du khod//gang gi tshe na bud med rin chen bzang po'i gos kyis lus brgyan te//
127a6(mdo sde): sil snyan dam pa mchog rab yid du 'ong ba'i sgra ni rab sgrog pa//de tshe phyogs bcu'i rgyal ba'i gzi yas tshigs su bcad pa sna tshogs pa//sgra dbyangs snyan pa 'di dag sil snyan dag
127a7(mdo sde): gi sgra las rab tu byung //rga dang shi bas zin pa'i 'jig rten dag la bdag ni skyabs gyur ces//'jig rten sgron ma khyod kyis bskal mang snga rol smon lam de skad btab//mi yi
127b1(mdo sde): seng ge khyod kyis sngon gyi smon lam dag ni dran gyis shig/rkang gnyis dbang po khyod da mngon par 'byung ba'i dus ni 'di yin no//khyod 'dir srid pa khrag khrig dag tu sbyin pa mang po du ma byin//
127b2(mdo sde): nor dang rin po che dang gser dang gos bzang rin chen smras pa dang //rkang lago dag dang mig dang phangs pa'i bu dang rgyal srid 'byor pa dag/khyod kyis btang yang khyod ni slong ba rnams la
127b3(mdo sde): thA ba zhe sdang med//khyod 'dir zla ba'i tog dang mche ba bzang dang rgyal po zhi bar gyur//snying brtse snying rje'i yid dang zla ba'i sgron dang gtsug na nor bur gyur//rgyal po dpa' bo brtan dang
127b4(mdo sde): mig bzeng dang ni de la sogs pa byas//rgyal po khrag khrig mang po sbyin dga' rnam par 'phrul pa de nyid khyod//bde bar gshegs pa khyed kyis bsgral pa mang por tshul khrims spyod pa
127b5(mdo sde): spyad//nor bu rin chen dri ma med pa lta bur tshul khrims rnam dag gyur//khyod kyis 'bru yi rnga mo ci 'dra de 'drar tshul khrims bsrungs shing spyad//tshul khrims dga' bas khyod kyis 'dir ni
127b6(mdo sde): 'gro la rgya cher don yang byas//'dir khyod glang po mchog tu gyur te rngon pa dag yis mangs bsnun tshe//gtum po dag la snying brtse snying rje bskyed nas de ni khyod kyis bskyabs//bzang
127b7(mdo sde): zhing mdzes pa'i mche ba yongs su btang ste tshul khrims yod ma btang //khyod kyis de la sogs pa tshul khrims rnam par 'phrul pa mang po byos//bzod la dga' bas khyod kyis 'gro
128a1(mdo sde): ba'i mi phan sdug bsngal stong mang dang //tshig rtsub dag dang bsad pa dang ni bcing ba mang po bzod par byas//khyod kyis gna' sngon mi gang dag la bde ba kun gyis rim gro
128a2(mdo sde): byas//de dag phyi nas khyod kyi gshed mar gyur kyang khyod kyis de dag bzod//mgon po khyod ni ri mchog gnas na gang che dred mor gyur pa'i tshe//kha ba bab cing chu brug pas ni 'jigs
128a3(mdo sde): shing skrag pa'i mi bzung ste//rtsa ba 'bras bu rnam po mang dang bde ba kun gyis rim gro byas//de yis myur du khyod la gsod pa khrid 'ongs khyod kyis de la bzod//byang chub btsal phyir brtul
128a4(mdo sde): zhugs dka' thub yon tan rnam mang ye shes la//khyod kyis brtson 'grus shin tu brtan par gnas shing mi g.yo g.yo ba med//dbang sgyur bdud kyang khyod kyis brtson 'grus stobs
128a5(mdo sde): kyis stobs ni med par byas//mI yi seng ge khyod 'dir mngon par 'byung ba'i dus la dbab bo//khyod 'dir gna' sngon kha ba'i kha dog 'dra ba'i rta mchog gyur pa'i tshe//snying rje bskyed
128a6(mdo sde): nas nam mkha' las ni srin po'i gling du myur du song //de tshe phongs shing 'dug pa'i mi de blangs te bde la rab tu bzhag/khyod kyis 'di la sogs pa brtson 'grus rnam par 'phrul po mang
128a7(mdo sde): po byas//myur du 'gyur zhing g.yo la yul la dga' zhing rgod pa'i sems brtul te//bsam gtan par gyur dul des zhi gnas rnams kyis nyon mongs gtso bo bcom//khyod 'dir
128b1(mdo sde): bsam gtan dga' bas rang gi yon tan dag gis 'gro don byas//da 'dir sems can mchog khyod bsam gtan rnams 'phrul bya ba'i dus la bab//gna' sngon khyod ni drang srong bsum
128b2(mdo sde): gtan dga' zhing rab tu gnas par gyur//rgyal po med pa'i mi dag gis ni khyod khrid rgyal srid dbang yang bskur//khyod kyis skye bo dag ni dge ba bcu dang tshangs pa'i lam la bkod//de yi tshe
128b3(mdo sde): na mi las shi 'phos thams cad tshangs pa'i gnas su dong //phyogs dang phyogs mtshams 'gro ba rnam mang shes pa'i cho ga khyod rab mkhas//gzhan gyi spyod dang 'gro ba'i skad shes pa
128b4(mdo sde): dang dbang po shes pa dang //tshul dang 'dul dang blo gros rnam mang rgyu ba'i pha rol khyod phyin gyur//rgyal po'i sras khyod 'dir ni mngon par 'byung ba'i dus la da bab bo//khyod kyis gan
128b5(mdo sde): sngon skye bo lta ba log par zhugs par gyur pa dag/rga shi sdug bsngal rnam pa mang pos nyam thag 'khod pa 'di mthong nas//srid pa rnam par gzhig pa'i drang lam nyid kyis khong du chud byas
128b6(mdo sde): tI/mun pa bcom pa khyod kyis 'jig rten dag la don chen rab tu byas//tshigs bcad rnam pa mang po mdzes pa yon tan ldan pa sna tshogs 'dis//sel snyan sgra bsgrags de las rgyal ba'i/
128b7(mdo sde): gzi yis dpa' bo bskul bar gyur//blo mchog ldan pa khyod 'dir mngon par 'byung ba'i dus ni dbab kyis//sdug bsngal gang ba'i skye bo 'di dag mthong nas bting snyoms ma byed cig
129a1(mdo sde): bud med gos dang rin po che dang do shal spros phreng sna tshogs kyis//rgyan pa dag kyang sems dang phangs pa skyes nas rab tu dga' ba rnams//sems can mchog la
129a2(mdo sde): sil snyan rab tu sgrog cing slong bar byed pa na//rgyal ba'i mthu yis sil snyan dag las tshigs su bcad pa 'di 'dra byung //gang gi don du khyod kyis 'gro la phan phyir bskal pa du mar
129a3(mdo sde): ni//btang bar dka' ba btang zhingo tshul khrims bzod pa brtson 'grus shin tu spyad//bsam gtan shes rab shin tu bsgom pa khyod kyis dus la dbab kyis//'dren pa mngon par
129a4(mdo sde): 'byung ba'i blo la myur soms phyi shol ma byed cig/sngon chad rin chen mdzad dang gser dang dngul dang rgyan rnams rab tu btang //skye ba de dang de dag tu ni mchod sbyin rnam pa mang
129a5(mdo sde): po byas//khyod kyis chung ma bu pho bu mo lus dang rgyal srid srog btang ste//byang chub don du btang bar dka' ba dpag tu med pa khyod kyi so btang //khyod ni rgyal po mo dman bsod
129a6(mdo sde): nams dpal gyis rnam par grags par gyur//mu khyud 'dzin dang mu khyud nag po tshangs pas byin dang ral pa can//mchod sbyin stong ldan dang ni chos sems 'od phro can dang nor brtan
129a7(mdo sde): dang //shin tu don bsams gyur te sems can dman la btang bar dka' ba btang //zla ba'i bu dang brtson 'grus 'bar dang bsod nams 'od zer can du gyur//gtong ba tshe dang ldan
129b1(mdo sde): zhing mthu ldan khyod ni byas pa gzo bar gyur//rgyal po drang song zla ba gzugs ldan dpa' bo bden pa 'phel ba dang //rgyal po legs par smra ba chotshol dang blo gos bzang dang nges par gyur//
129b2(mdo sde): zla ba'i 'od dang khyad par 'gro dang rdul dang phyogs kyi bdag por gyur//rab sbyin dpa' bo ka shi rgyal po rin chen gtsug phud zhi bu bstod//mi dbang de dag rnams dang gzhan du gyur te btang
129b3(mdo sde): bar dka' ba btang //khyod kyis ji ltar gtong ba'i char phab de bzhin chos kyi char pa phob//khyod kyis sngon chad sems can snying po gang+gA'i bye ma snyed cig mthong //sems can thar par bya/
129b4(mdo sde): phyir byang chub dam pa'i mchog ni 'tshal ba na//khyod kyis mchod pa dpag med bsam mi khyab pas sangs rgyas de dag mchod//dpa' bo grong khyer dam pa 'di nas 'byung ba'i dus lau da
129b5(mdo sde): bob bo//thog mar khyod kyis don yod mthong la so la'i me tog gis ni mchod//rnam par snang mdzad la ni dang ba'i sems kyis skad cig bar du bltas//rnga dbyangs ldan pa la
129b6(mdo sde): ni khyod kyis a ru ri yau 'bru cig phul//tsan+dan mthong nas khyod kyis rtswa yi me sgron blangs te khyim du bzung //rtul po grong khyer 'jug pa mthong nas phye ma spar gang rab tu gtor//chos kyi
129b7(mdo sde): dbang phyug chos 'chad pa ni legs zhes bya ba rab tu byin//kun tu gzigs pa mthong nas phyag 'tshal phyag 'tshal lo zhes tshig tu brjod//'od 'phro chen po'i phung po la ni khyod kyis
130a1(mdo sde): dga' bas gser phreng gtor//'od zer rgyal mtshan la ni kha tshar phul zhing gsal la bal sran gtor//ye shes tog la mya ngan med pa'i me tog kha lo sgyur la 'jam//
130a2(mdo sde): rin chen gtsug tor can la mar me pad+ma ldan la sman yang phul//thams cad zil gnon mu tig do shal rgya mtsho la ni pad+ma phul//pad+ma'i snying po la ni bla bre seng ge la ni chare gding phul//
130a3(mdo sde): sA la'i dbang po rgyal la mar phul me tog rgyas la 'o ma phul//grags sbyin kun+da'i me tog phul te bden pa gzigs la zhal zas phul//ye shes lhun la lus btud klus byin la ni na
130a4(mdo sde): bza' dbul ba byas//rab 'thor gshegs dang tsan+dan mchog dang 'od ldan la ni tshwa spar ro//bkod pa che la pad+ma dbul byas 'od zer rgyal la rin chen phul//shAkya thob la spur
130a5(mdo sde): gang gser phulo dbang po'i tog la bstod pa byas//nyi ma'i zhal la me tog rna brgyan blo gros bzang la gser cod pan//klu zil gnon la nor bu phul te rgyal la ras bcos gding
130a6(mdo sde): ba phul//sman gyi rgyal la rin chen gdugs phul seng ge'i tog la khri gdan phul//yon tan mchog ldan rin chen dra ba 'od srungs la ni glu dbyangs kun//spos mchog me tog
130a7(mdo sde): phul zhing 'od 'phro'i tog la rtag tu me tog phul//mi 'khrugs rgyal la khang brtsegs phul zhing 'jig rten mchod la phreng ba phul//rgya spos gtsug lag rgyal srid dbul byas rgyal
130b1(mdo sde): bapar dka' la spros kun phul//sgron mche la bdag phul pad+ma'i mchog la rgyan rnams dbul ba byas//chos kyi tog la me tog sna tshogs sgron ma mdzad la ut+pal//mchod pa rnam pa
130b2(mdo sde): sna tshogs pa dang gzhon de gzhan dag byed pa na//khyod kyis sems can snying po de dag rnams dang gzhan yang sngon chad mchod//'das pa'i sangs rgyas rnams dang ston pa de dag khyod
130b3(mdo sde): mchod dran par gyis//sems can mgon med mya ngan gang ba yal bar mdor mngon par byung //mar me mdzad pa mthong ba tsam gyis khyod kyis bzod pa mchog thob ste//rjes su mthun
130b4(mdo sde): pa'i mngon par shes pa lnga po nyams pa med pa thob//de nas rab tu dga' bas bskal pa grangs med 'jig rten khams kun tu//sangs rgyas dag ni re re la yang mchod pa bsam gyis mi
130b5(mdo sde): khyab byas//bskal pa dpag med de dag zad gyur sangs rgyas de dag mya ngan 'das//khyod kyi lus rnams thams cad dang ni de dag ming yang gang du song //dngos po thams cad tha mar
130b6(mdo sde): zad po'i chos te 'dus byas rtag pa med//'dod pa rgyal srid longs spyod rtag pa min gyis grong khyer mchog nas byung //bskal pa zad par 'gyur tshe gri zi brjid drag po 'jigs pa'i me 'od
130b7(mdo sde): ltar/rga dang na dang 'tsho ba mi bzad 'jigs pa chen po 'ong bar 'gyur//dngos po thams cad pa mar zad pa'i chos te 'dus byas rtag pa med//shin tu sdug bsngal sems can ltos
131a1(mdo sde): la yon tan ldan pa mngon par byung //rgyal po bde ba'i mal na nyal gyur cing //gang tshe mo tshogs gling bu rgyud gcig dang //sil snyan sna tshogs sgra yis slong byed pa//de
131a2(mdo sde): tshe sil snyan sgra las 'di dag byung //srid gsum rga dang nad kyi sdug bsngal 'bar//'chi me rab 'bar 'di ni mgon med pa//srid las 'byung la 'gro ba rtag tu rmongs//bum par chud
131a3(mdo sde): pas bung ba 'khor ba bzhin//srid gsum mi brtan ston ka'i sprin dang 'dra//'gro ba'i tshe 'gro nam mkha'i glog 'dra ste//rig zer 'bab chu lta bur myur mgyogs 'gro/srid sred ma
131a4(mdo sde): rig dbang gis skye bo rnams//mi dang lha gnas ngan song lam gsum po//'gro ba lnga po dag tu mi mkhas 'khor//dper na rdzu mkhan phang lo bskor ba bzhin//rtag tu gzugs
131a5(mdo sde): sdug mchog dang sgra snyan dang //dri zhim ro mchog reg pa bde byed pa//dus ngan snyil 'gro ba 'di dag thogs//dper na rngon pa'i snyi la spre'u thogs bzhin//'dod pa'i yon tan mya
131a6(mdo sde): ngan gnod pa mang //'jigs bcas rtag tu ngag byed nyon mongs bcas//ral gri so 'dra dug sdong lo ma mtshungs//ngan skyugs snod ltar 'phags pa'i skye bos spangs//'dod pa'i
131a7(mdo sde): yon tan 'jigs bcas nyon mongs bcas//rtag tu rjed par byed pa mun pa 'dra//rtag tu 'jigs pa'i rgyu byed sdug bsngal rtse/srid pa'i sred pa'i 'khri shing 'phel bar byed//ji
131b1(mdo sde): ltar me 'bar 'obs ni 'jigs bcas pa//de ltar 'dod 'di 'phags pa'i skye bos rig/'dam rdzab che 'dra ral grig shegs nas 'dra//ral gri'i so la sbrang rtsis skus dang mtshungs//
131b2(mdo sde): ltar sbrul gyi mgo dang ngan skyugs snod//de ltar 'dod 'di mkhas pa rnams kyis rig/bya sha kham bu 'dra zhing gsal shing 'dra//rol khyi ltar dgra dang bcas pa yin//'dod pa'i yon
131b3(mdo sde): tan 'di dag chu zla 'dra//gzugs brnyan mtshungs shing brag cha 'dra ba dang //mig yor 'dra zhing gar la lta 'dra dang //rmi lam mnyam pa 'phags pas skye bos rig/'dod pa'i yon tan
131b4(mdo sde): skad cig yam brla//sgyu ma smig sgyu 'dra zhing brdzun pa can//chu bur dbu ba lta bu yang dag min//yongs su brtags las byung bar mkhas pas rtogs//na chod thog mar gzugs mchog
131b5(mdo sde): 'dzin pa'i tshe//phangs shing sdug 'dod 'di ni byis pa'i spyod//rgan sdug bsngal gzi brjid lus bcom nus//rnam par spong ste ri dwags klung sgyum bzhin//nor 'bru dam pa rdzus mang
131b6(mdo sde): stobs ldan che//phangs shing sdug 'dod 'di ni byis pa'i spyod//nor nyams sdug bsngal bar ni gyur pa'i che//rnam par spong ste mi yis 'brog stong bzhin//ji ltar me tog shing dang
131b7(mdo sde): 'bras bcas shing //de ltar sbyin 'dod mi la dga' bar byed//nor nyams rga bas nyen cing spang ba na//de tshe dga' bar mi 'gyur bya rgod bzhin//rdzas ldan gzugs mchog ldan
132a1(mdo sde): che dpon po bzhin//phrad na sdug cing dbang po dga' bar byed//rga na sdug bsngal nyen cing nor zad na//de tshe 'dod par mi 'gyur 'chi bdag bzhin//rga bas rga byas na
132a2(mdo sde): tshod yol gyur na//sdong po gnam lcags kyis ni bcom pa bzhin//rga bas 'khogs na 'jigs bcas khang rul 'dra//rga las byung ba thub pa myur du smros//bud med skyes pa'i
132a3(mdo sde): tshogs rnams rga bas skems//ma lu'i 'khri shing sA la'i nags stug bzhin//rga bas brtson 'grus rtsal dang shugs 'phrog ste//dper na skyes bu 'dam du bying ba bzhin//rga bas
132a4(mdo sde): gzugs sdug gzugs ni mi sdug byed//rga bas gzi brjid 'phrog cing mthu stobs 'phrog/rga bas bde ba 'phrog cing brnyas par byed//rko bas 'chi byed rga bas mdangs kyang 'phrog/
132a5(mdo sde): nad brgya mang dang nad thibs sdug bsngal gyis//'gro ba gtses te mi yis ri dgas bzhin//rga dang na bas bcom pa'i 'gro ltos la//sdug bsngal las ni 'byung ba myur shod cig/
132a6(mdo sde): dper na dgun smad rung dang kha ba che//rtswa shing gel pa nags smon mdangs kyang 'phrog/de ltar nad 'di 'gro ba'i mdangs 'phrog cing //dbang po gzugs dang stobs na nyams par byed///
132a7(mdo sde): nor 'bru nor tshen tha mar zad par byed//nad ni rtag tu 'gro ba brnyas par byed//gnod pa byed cing sdug la sdang bar byed//yongs su gdung byed mkha' las nyi ma bzhin//'chi
132b1(mdo sde): dang 'pho dang 'chi 'pho dus byed pa//phrangs shing sdug pa'i skye bo rtag tu 'bral//phyir mi 'ong zhing 'phrad par 'gyur ma yin//shing las lo 'bru 'dra zhing klu yi rgyan dang mtshungs//'chi ba
132b2(mdo sde): dbang yod pa dag dbang med byed//'chi ba 'phrog bying chu boso shing ded bzhin//mi ni gnyis min grogs med gcig pur 'gro/rang las 'bras bu ldan pas dbang yang med//'chi bas
132b3(mdo sde): srog chags brgya phrag mang 'dzin te//'byung po'i tshogs la rgya mtsho'i chu srin bzhin//klu la mkha' lding glang chen seng ge 'dra//rtswa rtsi 'byung po'i tshogs la me dang mtshungs//skyon brgya
132b4(mdo sde): mang po 'di 'dra 'di dag las//'gro ba dgrol zhes khyod kyis smon lam btab//sngon gyi smon lam spyod pa de dran byos//khyod ni mngon par 'byung ba'i dus la bab//gang tshe bud med
132b5(mdo sde): tshogs ni rab dga' zhing //sil snyan dag gis thub chen slong byed pa//de tshe bde bar gshegs pa rnams kyi mthus//tshigs bcad sna tshogs sil snyan sgra las byung //'dus byas
132b6(mdo sde): thams cad myur du 'jig pa ste//mkha' la glog rgyan ring du mi gnas bzhin//khyod kyi dus 'di nye bar gnas gyur gyis//brtul zhugs bzang po mngon 'byung dus la bab//'du byed
132b7(mdo sde): mi rtag brtan pa ma yin te//rdza so ma btang lta bur 'jig pa'i bdag/gzhan gyi rdzas ni brnyan po byas dang mtshungs//bye ma'i grong khyer lta bur ring mi thogs//'du byed 'di dag 'jog
133a1(mdo sde): pa'i chos can te//dbyar gyi zhal zhal ji ltar 'gogs pa bzhin//chu ngogs bye ma yod pa 'dra ba ste//rkyen la rag las rang bzhin nyam chung ba//'du byed mar me'i 'od 'phro
133a2(mdo sde): 'dra ba ste//myur du 'byung zhing 'gag po'i chos can yin//rlung dang mtshungs par ring du mi gnas la//dbu ba lta bur nyam chung snying po med//'du byed g.yo ba med cing stong pa ste/
133a3(mdo sde): brtags na chu shing dag gi phung po 'dra//sgyu ma lta bur sems ni rmongs par byed//lag bcangs stong pas byis pa bId dang mtshungs//'dus byas gyur pa thams cad rgyu dag dang //rkyen
133a4(mdo sde): rnams kyis ni rab tu 'byung ba ste//gcig gis gcig rgyu byas te brtan nos byung //byis pa'i skye bos 'od 'dra 'di ma rtogs//dper na gros ma mun 'dza' rten byas la//btsal
133a5(mdo sde): ba'i stobs kyis thag par 'gyur ba dang //zo chun rgyud mo 'khor lor bcas pa yang //de dag re res 'grub par 'gyur ba med//de ltar srid pa'i yan lag kun grub pa//gzhan
133a6(mdo sde): dang gzhan tshogs pa la brtan nas ni//de dag so so re rer 'grub par 'gyur//sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs//sa bon yod na myu gu ji bzhin te//sa bon gang
133a7(mdo sde): yin myu gu de nyid min//de las gzhan min de yang ma yin te//de ltar rtag min ched min chos nyid do//ma rig pa yi 'du byed rkyen yin te//'du byed de yang yang dag nyid
133b1(mdo sde): du med//ma rig pa dang 'du byed de dag kyang //rang bzhin stong ste g.yo ba med pa yin//rgya las rgya yi 'bur ni snang mod kyi//rgya de 'phos par gyur pa'ang yod ma yin//de la de med gzhan
133b2(mdo sde): las ma yin te//de ltar 'dus byas rtag med chad pa med//mig dang gzugs la brten pa byas nas su//mig gi rnam par shes pa 'dir 'byung yang //mig ni gzugs la brten pa ma
133b3(mdo sde): yin la//gzugs kyang mig la 'pho ba yod ma yin//'di dag bdag med mi sdug chos can yang //de dag bdag dang sdug par brtags pa ste//nor pa yang dag ma yin brtags yin
133b4(mdo sde): yang //de las mig gi rnam par shes pa 'byung //rnam par shes pa 'gags nas 'byung 'gyur te//mkhas pas skye dang 'jig pa rnam par mthong //gang du ma song gang nas 'ongs pa min//
133b5(mdo sde): rnal 'byor pas ni stong pa sgyu ltar mthong //dper na gtsub shing dang ni gtsub stan dang //lag pas bcol ba byas pa gsum tshogs pa//de la brtan nas me ni 'byung 'gyur te//byung nas
133b6(mdo sde): ring por mi thogs 'gag par 'gyur//de nas mkhas pa la las brtags byas te//'di ni gang nas 'ongs la gar song zhes//phyogs dang phyogs mtshams kun tu brtags byas nas//de
133b7(mdo sde): yi 'ong ba'am 'gro ba mi dmigs so//phung po dag dang skye mched khams rnams kyi//rkyen ni ma rig pa dang sred dang las//de dag tshogs pa sems can zhes brjod kyang //de ni dam pa'i don
134a1(mdo sde): du dmigs su med//mchu dang lkog ma rkan la brtan nas ni//lce bsgyur ba las yi ge'i sgra 'byung yang //lkog mar brten nas ma yin rkan las min//re rA la ni mi
134a2(mdo sde): ge dmigs su med//tshogs pa de la brten nas ngag de ni//yid kyi blo yi dbang gis 'byung mod kyi//yid dang ngag ni mi snang gzugs med do//nang dang phyi rol na yang dmigs
134a3(mdo sde): su med//mkhas pas ngag skad sgra dang dbyangs rnams kyi//skye dang 'jig la rnam par brtags byas na//dri tshe ngag kun brag ca lta bu dang //skad cig pa dang snying po med par mthong //
134a4(mdo sde): dper na shing dang rgyad la brten byas la//lag pas brtsol po byas pa gsum tshogs na//sgo snyan pa bang gling bu la sogs pa//de dag las ni sgra yang 'byung bar 'gyur//de nas
134a5(mdo sde): mkhas pa la las brtags byas te//'di ni gang nas 'ongs la gar song zhes//phyogs dang phyogs mtshams kun tu brtags byas na//sgra yi 'ong ba 'am 'gro ba mi dmigs so///
134a6(mdo sde): de ltar rgyu dag dang ni rkyen rnams las//'du byed gyur pa thams cad byung ba ste//yang dag mthong ba'i rnal 'byor pa yis ni//'du byad stong pa g.yo ba med par mthong //phung po
134a7(mdo sde): dag dang skye mched khams rnams ni//nang yang stong la phyi rol stong pa ste//thams cad bdag gis dben zhing gnas med la//chos kyi mtshan nyid nam mkha'i ngo bo nyid//chos kyi
134b1(mdo sde): mtshan nyid 'di 'dra 'di dag ni//mar me mdzad pa mthong nas khyod kyis rtogs//ji ltar nyid kyis rjes su rtogs pa ltar//de bzhin lha mir bcas pa rtogs par gyis//gnod pa yang dag ma
134b2(mdo sde): yin brtags pa yi//'dod chags zhe sdang dag gis 'gro ba gdungs//snying rje'i sprin las zhi ba bsil ba'i chu//'dren pa bdud rtsi rgyun ni rab tu phob//byang chub dam pa yang dag thob nas ni//
134b3(mdo sde): 'phags pa'i nor gyis srog chags bsdu'o zhes//mkhas pa khyod kyis gang gi ched kyi phyir//bskul pa bye ba mang po sbyin pa byin//sngon gyi spyod de rjes su dran gyis te//'phags pa'i
134b4(mdo sde): byis dman dngul sdug bsngal la//sems can kha lo sgyur po ma g.yel bar//'phags pa'i nor gyis de dag bsngo ba gyis//ngan song sa yi lam ni bcad pa dang //mtho ris bdud rtsi
134b5(mdo sde): sgo mo mchog de ni//sems can bya ba mang la bstan zhes te//khyod kyis rtag tu tshul khrims shin tu bsrungs//tshul khrims ldan pas bsams pa 'grub 'gyur gyis//sngon gyi spyod
134b6(mdo sde): de rjes su dran gyis la//ngan song gsun po'i sa yi sgo rgod de//mtho ris bdud rtsi'i sgo ni dbye bar gyis//srog chags rnams kyi khong khro khro gzhi la dang //srid pa'i mtsho las sems
134b7(mdo sde): tsani bsgral byas te//ni da rims ni 'ad la dgod de nas//khyod kyis rtag tu bzod pa shin tu bsgoms//sngon gyi spyod de rjes su dran gyis te//dgra dang gnod sems 'tshebs dgas
135a1(mdo sde): pA li//'tsheb spyod la yal bar mdor brla//'gro ba 'di dag bzod pa'i sa la khod//chos kyi glu ni legs par sbyar byas la//srid pa'i mtsho las 'gro ba rnams
135a2(mdo sde): bsgral te//zhi bde rims nad med la dgod do zhes//gang gi don du khyod kyis brtson 'grus bstan//sngon gyi spyod de rjes su dran gyis la//'gro ba chu bo bzhi yis khyer gyur pa//sems
135a3(mdo sde): can mgon med pa dag brtson stobs dang //brtul ba'i shugs kyis myur du 'di dag thon//dbang po 'khrul dang phal pa'i dbang po dang //spre'u 'dra'i sems las zho gnas ngas dgod
135a4(mdo sde): ces//'dren pa khyod kyis gang gi ched kyi phyir//nyon mongs gzhil ba'i bsam gtan bsgoms gyur pa//sngon gyi spyod de rjes su dran gyis te//nyon mongs dra bas dkrugs par gyur pa
135a5(mdo sde): yi//'gro la ma g.yel nyon mongs gtses pa las//bsam gtan mchog la skye dgu 'di dag khod//gti mug ma rig mun pas bsgribs pa yi//'gro la chos brgya mang po mthong
135a6(mdo sde): byed pa//yang dag mthong ba'i mig ni sbyin no zhes//khyod kyis sngon chad shes rabo shin tu bsgoms//sngon gyi spyod de rjes su dran gyis la//gti mug ma rig mun pas bsgribs
135a7(mdo sde): pa yi//'bro la shes rab dam pa 'od bzang ba//chos mig dri med nyon mongs med pa byin//bud med rnams kyi sil snyan glu dbyangs las//tshigs su bcad pa 'di 'dra 'di byung
135b1(mdo sde): ste/de thos nas ni rgyags pa rnam spangs nas//byang chub dam pa mchog tu sems btang ngo //dge slong dag de ltar byang chub sems dpa' btsun mo'i 'khor gyi nang na 'dug pa'i tshe'ang chos
135b2(mdo sde): mnyan pa dang bral bar ma gyur to//chos yid la byed pa dang bral bar ma gyur to//de ci'i phyir zhe na/dge slong dag 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' ni yun ring po nas chos dang chos smra ba
135b3(mdo sde): rnams la gus pa dang bcas par gyur cing //bsam pa thag pa nas chos don du gnyer ba/chos 'dod pa/chos kyi kun dga' la dga' zhing mos par gyur pa/chos tshol bas ngoms
135b4(mdo sde): mi shes pa/ji ltar thos pa'i chos yang dag par ston pa/bla na med pa'i chos chen po'i sbyin bdag tu gyur pa/zang zing med par chos ston pa/chos sbyin pa la ser sna med pa/chos
135b5(mdo sde): la slob dpon gyi dpe mkhyud dang bral ba/chos kyi rjes su mthun pa'i chos sgrub pa/chos la nan tan byed pa la dpa' ba/chos la gnas su 'dzin pa/chos la skyabs su 'dzin pa/chos
135b6(mdo sde): la dpung gnyen du 'dzin pa/chos la rton pa/chos la nges par sems pa'i bzod pas nges par byung ba/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad pa ste/thabs la mkhas par rtogs
135b7(mdo sde): par khong du chud pa yin no//dge slong dag de la byang chub sems dpa' thabs mkhas pa chen pos rnam par rtse zhing btsun mo'i 'khor thams cad kyi mos pa ji lta ba bzhin du spyod lam ni
136a1(mdo sde): bstan/sngon gyi byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten gyi yul thams cad las yang dag par 'das pa rnams kyi 'jig rten dang mthun par bya ba'i chos nyid dang mthun par ni byas/
136a2(mdo sde): yun ring po nas 'dod pa'i skyon shin tu rtogs pa yin yang sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i dbang gis 'dod pa'i longs spyod ni kun tu bstan/dge ba'i rtsa ba dpag tu med pa bsags
136a3(mdo sde): pa'i bsod nams kyi stobs kyi tshogs kyi khyad par gyis 'jig rten gyi dbang du bya ba mtshungs pa med pa ni kun tu bstan/lha'i dang mi'i las shin tu 'das pa snying po dang ldan zhing rgya che la/rnam
136a4(mdo sde): pa tha dad pa rnam pa sna tshogs kyi gzugs dang /sgra dang /dri dang /ro dang /reg mchog tu dga' ba nyams dga' ba'i 'dod pa'i dga' ba'i bde ba ni bstan/'dod pa'i dga' ba'i yul thams
136a5(mdo sde): cad la 'dzin pa med par rang gi sems la dbang sgyur ba ni bstan/sngon gyi smon lam gyi stobs kyis grogs su gyur pa/dge ba'i rtsa ba bsags pa'i sems can rnams ni mtshungs par
136a6(mdo sde): gnas pas yongs su smin par byas nas/'jig rten gyi kun nas nyon mongs pa'i dri ma thams cad kyis ni sems la kun nas nyon mongs pa med par btsun mo'i 'khor gyi nang na gnas te/
136a7(mdo sde): ji ltar 'gron du gnyer ba'i sems can gyi khams yongs su smin par bya ba'i dus la lta zhing /de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' shin tu rgya cher sngon gyi dam bcas pa rjes su dran no//sangs
136b1(mdo sde): rgyas dang chos kyang mngon du byed do//smon lam gyi stobs kyang mngon par sgrub pa//sems can rnams la'ang snying rje chen po gto dang //sems can rab tu thar bar bya bar yang sems so//
136b2(mdo sde): 'byor pa thams cad kyi mtha' ni rgud pa yin par yang so sor rtog go//'khor ba la gnod pa dang /'jigs pa mang po du ma yod par yang rtog go//bdud dang nyes pa'i zhags pa yang
136b3(mdo sde): dag par gcod do//'khor ba'i rgyud las kyang bdag nyid 'da' bar byed do//mya ngan las 'das pa la'ang sems yang dag par gtong ngo ////'phags pa rgya
136b4(mdo sde): cher rol pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo//bam po dgu pa//dge slong dag de la byang chub sems dpa' ni sngon gyi mtha' nyid nas kyang 'khor ba'i skyon shin tu rig pa yin/'dus byas
136b5(mdo sde): la bsam pa thag pa nas don du mi gnyer ba yin/nye bar len pa yongs su 'dzin pa thams cad don du mi gnyer ba yin/sangs rgyas kyi chos don du gnyer ba yin/mya ngan las 'das
136b6(mdo sde): pa la mngon du phyogs pa yin/'khor ba la rgyab kyis bltas pa yin/de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyod yul la mngon du dga' ba yin/bdud kyi spyod yul dang ma 'dres pa yin/srid
136b7(mdo sde): pa la 'bar bar skyon du mthong ba yin//khams gsum pa las byung ba'i bsam pa can yin/'khor ba'i skyon dang nyes dmigs dang 'byung ba la mkhas pa yin/rab tu 'byung bar
137a1(mdo sde): 'dod pa yin/mngon par 'byung ba'i bsam pa can yin/dben pa la gzhol ba yin/dben pa la 'bab pa yin/dben pa la bab pa yin/dgon pa dang bas
137a2(mdo sde): mthar mngon par dga' ba yin/rab tu dben pas rab tu zhi bar 'dod pa yin/bdag dang gzhan la phan par zhugs pa yin/bla na med pa'i nan tan la dpa' ba yin/'jig rten gyi
137a3(mdo sde): don du 'dod pa yin/phan par 'dod pa yin/bde bar 'dod pa yin/grub pa dang bde bar 'dod pa yin/'jig rten la snying brtse ba can yin/phan par 'dod pa can yin/byams
137a4(mdo sde): pa la gnas pa can yin/snying rje chen po dang ldan pa yin/bsdu ba'i dngos po la mkhas pa yin/rtag tu yid yongs su mi skyo ba yin/sems can yongs su smin par bya ba dang 'dul
137a5(mdo sde): ba la mkhas pa yin/sems can thams cad la bu gcig pa dang 'dra bar sdug par sems pa yid la byed pa dang ldan pa yin/dngos po thams cad la mi lta bar yongs su btang
137a6(mdo sde): ba yin/sbyin pa bged pa la dga' ba yin/lhug par gtong ba yin/lag pa brkyang ba yin/gtong ba la dpa' ba yin/mchod sbyin byas pa yin/bsod nams shin tu
137a7(mdo sde): phun sum tshogs pa yin/bsod nams kyi yo byad shin tu bzung ba yin/dri ma dang ser sna dang bral ba yin/sems kun tu ma bzung ba yin/bla na med pa'i sbyin bdag chen
137b1(mdo sde): po yin/byin nas kyang rnam par smin pa la mi re ba yin/sbyin pa la dpa' ba yin/'dod pa dang /'dod pa che ba dang /chags pa dang /zhe sdang dang /rgyags pa dang /nga rgyal dang /gti
137b2(mdo sde): mug dang /ser sna la sogs pa nyon mongs pa'i dgra'i tshogs phyir rgol ba thams cad tshur bcad pa'i phyir mngon par byung ba yin/thams cad mkhyen pa'i sems bskyed pa'i rgyun las mi
137b3(mdo sde): g.yo ba yin/gtong ba chen po'i sems kyi go cha shin tu bgros pa yin/'jig rten la snying btso ba can yin/phan par 'dod pa can yin/ya ladra bgos pa yin/go cha bgos
137b4(mdo sde): pa yin/sems can rab tu thar bar bya ba la dmigs pa yin/snying rje chen po'i stobs dang rnam par gnon pa dang /pha rol gnon pa dang ldan pa yin/phyir mi ldog pa yin/
137b5(mdo sde): sems can thams cad la sems mnyam pa yin/gtong ba'i lag cha can yin/sems can gyi bsam pa dang re ba ji lta ba bzhin du tshim par byed pa yin/byang chub kyi snod du
137b6(mdo sde): gyur pa yin/dus dang byed par chos rtogs pa yin/smon lam byang chub tu yongs su bsngos pa yin/rgyal mtshan mu bsnyal ba yin/'khor gsum yongs su dag pa'i sbyin pa
137b7(mdo sde): yongs su gtong ba dang ldan pa yin/ye shes mchog gi rdo rje'i mtshan che sra ba dang ldan pa yin/nyon mongs pa'i phyir rgol ba shin tu tshar gcod pa yin/tshul khrims dang /
138a1(mdo sde): yon tan dang /spyod pa la zhugs pa yin/lus dang /ngag dang /yid kyi las kyi mtha' legs par bsrungs pa yin/kha na ma thob phra rab tsam lA'ang 'jigs par lta
138a2(mdo sde): ba yin/tshul khrims yongs su dag pa yin/dri ma med cing dri ma dang bral la dri ma spangs pa'i sems dang ldan pa yin/ngan du smras pa dang /ngan du brjod pa'i tshig gi lam dang
138a3(mdo sde): brgyad pa dang /spro ba dang /smad pa dang /bshud pa dang /brdeg pa dang /bsdigs pa dang /bsad pa dang /bcing ba dang /gzung ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad kyis sems ma pa rnyogs
138a4(mdo sde): pa yin/sems ma 'khrugs pa yin/bzod pa dang des pa phun sum tshogs pa yin/gnod par mi sems pa yin/gnod pa mi byed pa yin/gnod sems med pa'i sems
138a5(mdo sde): dang ldan pa yin/sems can thams cad la phan par bya ba'i brtson 'grus 'bad pa brtsams pa yin/yid ma la brtan pa yin/dge bo'i chos thams cad yang dag par sgrub pa la
138a6(mdo sde): phyir mi ldog pa yin/dran pa dang ldan pa yin/shes bzhin can yin/shin tu mnyam par bzhag pa yin/sems mA g.yengs pa yin/bsam gtan la rtse gcig tu yid
138a7(mdo sde): la byed pa yin/chos rab tu rnam par 'byed pa la mkhas pa yin/snang ba thob pa yin/mun pa mun gnag dang bral ba yin/mi rtag pa dang sdug bsngal ba dang /bdag med pa
138b1(mdo sde): dang /mi sdug pa'i rnam par sems yongs su bsgoms pa yin/dran pa nye bar bzhag pa dang //yang dag pa'i spong ba dang /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang /dbang po dang /stobs dang /byang chub
138b2(mdo sde): kyi yan lag dang /lam dang /byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos thams cad shin tu yongs su sbyang ba byas pa'i yid la byed pa dang ldan pa yin/zhi gnas dang lhag mthong gis shin tu dkar bar byas
138b3(mdo sde): pa'i blo dang ldan pa yin/rten cing 'bral por 'byung bar lta ba yin/bden pa rjes su rtogs pas gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog pa yin/rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum gyis rnam par rtse ba yin/chos
138b4(mdo sde): thams cad kyi tshul sgyu ma dang /smig rgyu dang /chu zla dang /brag ca dang /mig yor lta bur rtogs pa yin no//dge slong dag byang chub sems dpa' de ni de ltar rang bzhin gyis chos la gnas
138b5(mdo sde): pa yin/de ltar ye shes la gnas pa yin/de ltar yon tan gyi che ba nyid la gnas pa yin/de ltar sems can gyi don la brtson par gnas pa yin te/phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi
138b6(mdo sde): byin gyi rlobs kyis byin gyis brlabs pas sil snyan dang glu dbyangs las byung ba'i tshigs su bcad pa de dag gis rgya cher bskul ba dang /de'i tshe sngon gyi byang chub sems dpa' srid pa tha ma
138b7(mdo sde): par gyur pa rnams kyi btsun mo'i 'khor yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir chos kyi sgo bzhi mngon du byed do//bzhi gang zhe na/'di lta ste/sbyin pa dang /ston par smra ba dang /don bya ba dang /don
139a1(mdo sde): mthun pa bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi la sbyor ba sgrub pa rnam par dag pa zhes bya ba'i chos kyi sgo mngon du byed pa dang /dkon mchog gsum gyi rigs yang dag par 'dzin pa'i
139a2(mdo sde): bsam pa chud mi za ba'i thams cad mkhyen pa'i sems smon lam gyi stobs bskyed pa'i phyir mi ldog pa'i yul zhes bya ba'i chos kyi sgo mngon du byed pa dang /sems can thams cad yongs
139a3(mdo sde): su mi btang ba'i lhag pa'i bsam pa snying rje chen po'i stobs la zhugs pa zhes bya ba'i chos kyi sgo mngon du byed pa dang /byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos thams cad kyi tshig rab tu dbye ba dang /
139a4(mdo sde): don la rnam par nges pa'i ye shes kyi tshogs kyi stobs kyi khyad par yang dag par sgrub pa bkod pa chen po zhes bya ba'i chos kyi sgo mngon du byed pa'o//byang chub sems dpas chos kyi
139a5(mdo sde): sgo bzhi po de dag mngon du byas nas/btsun mo'i 'khor thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir de'i tshe/rnam pa ji lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du bya ba mngon par 'dus
139a6(mdo sde): byas pas byang chub sems dpa'i mthus sil snyan dang glu dbyangs de dag las chos kyi sgo rnam pa 'di lta bu brgya stong 'byung ba de lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du bya ba mngon par byed do//
139a7(mdo sde): mos pa rgya tshon dang ni bsam pa dang //lhag pa'i bsam dang srog chags snying rje bas//byang chub dam pa mchog tu sems skye zhes//de 'dra'i sgra dag sol snyan rnams las byung ///
139b1(mdo sde): dang zhing dad dang mos dang gus pa dang //nga rgyal med cing bla la 'dud pa dang //dri dang dge ba ci zhes 'tshol ba dang //rjes su dran pa bsgoms pa'i sgra byung ngo //sbyin dang dul dang sdom drang
139b2(mdo sde): tshul khrims sgra//bzod pa'i sgra dang de bzhin brtson 'grus sgra//bsam gtan mngon par sgrub dang ting 'dzin sgra//shes rab dang ni thabs kyi sgra yang byung //byams pa'i sgra dang de bzhin
139b3(mdo sde): snying rje'i sgra//dga' dang btang snyoms mngon par shes pa'i sgra//bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi po rnam nges pas//sems can yongs su smin byi'i sgra yang byung //dran pa nye bar bzhag pa
139b4(mdo sde): rab dbye sgra//yang dag spong dang de bzhin rdzu 'phrul dang //dbang po lnga dang stobs lnga rab dbye dang //byang chub yan lag sgra ni sil snyan byung //yan lag brgyad pa'i 'phags lam
139b5(mdo sde): mchog dbye dang //zhi gnas sgra dang de bzhin lhag mthong dang //mi rtag pa dang sdug bsngal bdag med sgra//mi sdug sgra yang sel snyan rnams las byung //'dod chags bral sgra de bzhin
139b6(mdo sde): dben+da pa'i sgra//zad pa shes pa'i sgra dang mi skye sgra//'gog pa'i sgra dang de bzhin gnas med sgra//mya ngan 'das pa'i sgra yang sil snyan byung //rdzogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i mthu
139b7(mdo sde): yis ni//sil snyan dag las 'di 'dra'i sgra byung ste//sgra de thos nas bud med thams cad kyis//sems can mchog rab rjes bslabs byang chub smon//dge slong dag de ltar byang
140a1(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' btsun mo'i 'khor gyi nang na 'dug pas bud med brgyad khri bzhi stong dang /lha'i bu brgya stong mang po gang dag der 'dus par gyur pa dag kyang bla na med pa yang dag
140a2(mdo sde): par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su smin par byas par gyur to//de nas byang chub sems dpa' mngon par 'byung ba'i dus la bab pa dang /dga' ldan gyi ris kyi lha'i bu khral yod pa'i lha
140a3(mdo sde): zhes bya ba bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog pa des mtshan mo mi nyal tsam na/lha'i bu 'bum phrag sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis bskor cing mdun du badrar te byang chub
140a4(mdo sde): sems dpa' la rim gro bya ba'i khang bzang ga lo ba der song ste phyin nas/nam mkha'i dkyil na 'dug ste/byang chub sems dpa' la tshigs su bcad de smras pa//shi 'pho ba ni shin
140a5(mdo sde): tu bstan//skyes bu seng ges tshe yang bstan//btsun mo'i 'khor yang bstan pa mdzad//khyod kyis 'jig rten rjes mthun mdzad//'jig rten chos ni rjes thob pas//lha mi mang
140a6(mdo sde): po yongs smin mdzad//mngon par 'byung ba'i blo dgongs pa'i//de yi dus la deng bab bo//ma grol bas ni dgol mi nus//long bas lam yang ston mi nus//grol bas dgrol
140a7(mdo sde): bar byed par nus//mig ldan long ba lam ston nus//sems can gang dag 'dod pas 'khol//khyim nor bu dang chung ma chags//de dag khyod kyi rjes slob cing //mngon par
140b1(mdo sde): 'byung bar bzhed par mdzod//dbang phyug 'dod pas rtse ba dang //gling bzhi rin chen bdun spangs te//khyod ni mngon par 'byung rig nas//lha mir bcas pa'i 'jig rten mos//khyod ni
140b2(mdo sde): 'dod la mi dgyes te//bsam gtan bde bas gnas mdzad kyang //lha mi brgya phrag mang po dag/gnyid kyi log las sad par mdzad//dar la bab 'di shin tu 'da'o//rig zar 'bab
140b3(mdo sde): chu mgyogs 'gro bzhin//dar la bab pa yal gyur nas//mngon par 'byung ba mdzes ma lags//de slad thog mar gzhon pa'i tshe//dar bab dam par mngon byung ste//thugs dam
140b4(mdo sde): nyams 'og chud mdzod la//lha mi don ni mdzad pa'i rigs//'dod pa'i yon tan mi ngoms te//dper na lan tshwa'i chu dang mtshungs//'phags pa rdul med 'jig rten 'das//shes
140b5(mdo sde): rab gang ldan de dag ngoms//khyod 'dir rgyal po zas gtsang dang //yul 'khor rnams kyi yid 'ong sdug/'dab ma brgya pa'i zhal 'dra ba//mngon par 'byung ba dgongs su gsol//nyon
140b6(mdo sde): mongs gdung bas rab gdungs shing //'byung med bcing bas dam bcings rnams//dpa' bos myur du mtshungs med pa//zar lam bzhi la dgong du gsol//khyod ni sman pa khams la
140b7(mdo sde): mkhas//sems can yun ring na rnams la//chos kyi sman ni sbyor mdzad de//mya ngan 'das bde myur du 'khod//mig med mun pa gti mug glags//lta ba'i dra bas dkris pa yi//
141a1(mdo sde): lha rnams dang ni mi yi mig/shes rab sgron mas myur du sbyongs//byang chub thob pa blta bya zhing //bla na med pa'i chos mnyan ces//lha dang lha min klu dag dang //
141a2(mdo sde): gnod sbyin dri za mang po sdod//klu yi rgyal pos rang gi gnas//khyod kyi dpal gyis snang bar mthong //mchod pa dag ni mtha' yas bgyid//de yi brtul zhugs bsam po skongs//
141a3(mdo sde): byang chub shing drung yid rdzogs la//lhung bzed bzhi ni dbul lo zhes//'jig rten skyong bzhi sder bcas pa//de dag khyod la sdod cing mchis//tshangs pa rab tu zhi spyod pa//byams
141a4(mdo sde): ldan snying rje thob pa yang //bla med 'khor lo rab skor bar//mi dbang gsol snyam sdod cing mchis//byang chub bsnyen bkur byid pa'i lha//byang chub snying por gnas rnams
141a5(mdo sde): kyang //byang chub rnam par 'tshang rgya ba//blta'o zhes te sdod cing mchis//byang chub sems dpa' btsun mo'i nang //bya ba ston pa gzhan yang mchis//de dag thog mar khyod gyur
141a6(mdo sde): mdzod//de dag 'og tu lus sa ro//dbyangs snyan cing ni dbyangs 'jam pa//mar me mdzad kyis lung bstan dgongs//yang dag de bzhin ma nor ba//rgyal ba'i sgra dbyangs bsgrag
141a7(mdo sde): tu gsol//bskul ba'i le'u ste bcu gsum pa'o///dge slong dag de ltar lha'i bu des byang chub sems dpa' bskul ma thag tu rgyal po zas gtsang ma la rmi lom 'di bstan
141b1(mdo sde): to//rgyal po zas gtsang ma gnyid kyis log pa'i rmi lam du rmis pa/byang chub sems dpa' mtshan mo mi nyal tsam na/lha'i tshogs kyis bskor te mngon par 'thung zhing mngon par byung nas kyang
141b2(mdo sde): rab tu byung ste/gos ngur smrig gyon pa rmis so//de nas de sad pa dang /rings pa rings par nyung rum la dris pa/gzhon nu btsun mo'i 'khor gyi nang na 'dug gam/des smras pa lha bzhugs
141b3(mdo sde): so//de nas rgyal po zas gtsang ma 'di snyam du/gzhon nu ni gdon mi za bar mngon par 'byung bar 'gyur te/snga ltas su snang ba ni 'di dag yin snyam nas/khong pa'i snying la mya ngan gyi zug
141b4(mdo sde): rngus zug par gyur to//de'ang 'di snyam du sems te/bdag gi gzhon nu ni skyed mos tshal gyi sar yang nam yang 'gro bar mi 'gyur te/bud med kyi tshogs kyi nang na mngon paro dga' bas
141b5(mdo sde): 'di nyid du chags par 'gyur te/mngon par 'byung bar ni mi 'gyur ro snyam mo//de nas rgyal po zas gtsang ma gzhon nu'i longs spyod kyi phyir/dpyid dang /dbyar dang /ston gyi dus ji lta ba
141b6(mdo sde): bzhin du khang bzang gsum byed du bcug go//de la dpyid sa gang yin pa de ni grang dro ran pa'o//dbyar sa gang yin pa de ni shin tu bsil ba'o//dgun so gang yin pa de ni rang bzhin gyis
141b7(mdo sde): dro ba'o//khang bzang re re'i gru skas rnams kyang mi lnga brgya lnga brgyas 'dzugs shing 'bebs so//de dog de ltar 'dzugs shing 'bebs pa na gzhon nu sus kyang ma tshor bar mngon par byung bar
142a1(mdo sde): 'gyur du 'ong ngo zhes sgra dpag tshad phyed du grag pa byung ngo //ltas pa dang mtshan mkhan kun gyis kyang /gzhon nu ni chab sgo bkra shis pa nas mngon par 'byung bar
142a2(mdo sde): 'gyur ro zhes lung bstan to//de nas rgyal pos bkra shis kyi sgo'i sgo 'phar chen po byed du bcug ste/sgo 'phar re re'ang mi lnga brgya lnga brgyas 'byed cing gcod do//de dag gi sgra'ang dpag
142a3(mdo sde): tshad phyed du grag go/de la 'dod pa'i yon tan mtshungs pa med pa'ang sbyor ro//glu dang rol mo'i sgra dbyangs len pa dang /gar byed pa'i na chung dag kyang rtag tu bzhag par gyur to//dge slong
142a4(mdo sde): dag de nas byang chub sems dpas kha lo sgyur ba la smras pa/deng skyed mos tshal gyi sar 'gros shing rje myur du sbyor cig/de nas kho lo sgyur ba rgyal po zas gtsang ma'i gan du song ste 'di skad
142a5(mdo sde): ces smras so//lha gzhon nu skyed mos tshal gyi sar 'byung ngo zhes gsung ngo //de nas rgyal po zas gtsang ma 'od snyam du sems te/bdag gis gzhon nu skyed mos tshal gyi sar nam yang
142a6(mdo sde): ma phyung bas sa bzang po blta bar bya ba'i phyir bdag gis gzhon nu skyed mos tshal gyi sar phyung na 'on tang gzhon nu bud med kyi tshogs kyis bskor te dga' bo myong bar 'gyur bas/mngon par
142a7(mdo sde): mi 'byung ngo snyam mo//de nas rgyal po zas gtsang ma byang chub sems dpa' la byams pa dang /rim gro byed pas de ste zhag bdun na gzhon nu sa bzang po blto ba'i phyir skyed mos tshal gyi
142b1(mdo sde): sar 'byung gis/der khyed kyis gzhon nu'i mig tu mi 'ong ba mthong bar mi 'gyur bar yid du mi 'ong ba thams cad ni sol cig/yid du 'ong ba dang /yul nyams dga' ba thams cad ni sbyor cig
142b2(mdo sde): ces grong khyer du dril bsgrags so//de nas zhag bdun gyi nyin par grong khyer thams cad brgyan to//skyed mos tshal yang mdzes par byas te/ras bcos bu kha dog tha dad pa'i bla bre ni bris/gdugs
142b3(mdo sde): dang rgyal mtshan dang /ba dan gyis ni legs par brgyan to//byang chub sems dpa' lam gang nas 'go ba'i lam de'ang chag chag btab ste/phyags nas/spos chu'i chag chag btab ste/me tog
142b4(mdo sde): sil ma ni chal bar bkram/pog phor nas ni bdugs/bum pa grang bas ni mdzes par byas/chu shing ljon pa ni bsgreng /dar tha dad pa sna tshogs kyi bla bre ni bras/rin po che'i dril bu
142b5(mdo sde): g.yer ka'i dra ba dang /rgyan phreng dang chun po ni sbyangs/dpung bzhi'i bkod pa ni byas so//g.yog 'khor kyang gzhon nu'i btsun mo'i 'khor brgyan pa'i phyir brtson par gyur to//de nas
142b6(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' bkod pa chen pos grong khyer gyi shar phyogs kyi sgo nas skyed mos tshal gyi sar byung ngo //de nas byang chub sems dpa' nyid kyi mthus gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha'i bu
142b7(mdo sde): rnams kyis mi rgan po gtugs pa/'khogs pa/lus las rtsa rgyus 'thon pa/so rgal ba/lus gnyer mas gang ba/skra byi ba/skur ba gdung rten ltar dgu pa/zhom pa/'khar ba
143a1(mdo sde): la brten pa/mthu zad pa/dar yal ba/med pa nas sgra ngar ngar po 'byung ba/lus dgu pas 'khar ba la brten nas yan lag dang nying lag thams cad 'dar ba zhig lAm
143a2(mdo sde): kur bstan par gyur to//de nas byang chub sems dpas shes bzhin du kha lo sgyur ba la 'di skad ces smras so//kha lo sgyur ba mi rid nyam chung zhing /sha khrag skams la rgyus lpags nyi
143a3(mdo sde): tshes dkris//mgo dkar so rgal lus ni rab skam la//'khar ba brten cing mi bde 'khyor 'gros su//kha lo sgyur bas smras pa/lha cig mi 'di rga bas zil gyis non//dbang po nyams
143a4(mdo sde): shing sdug bsngal brtson stobs nyams//gnyen gyi skye bos brnyas shis mgron med gyur//don bgyid mi nus nags khrod shing ltar bor//byang chub sems dpas smras pa/'di yi
143a5(mdo sde): chos 'di rigs kyi yin nam 'on tam ni//'gro po 'di kun la yang 'di srid de smros shig/tshig 'di yang dag ji bzhin myur du smros shig dang //thos nas de bzhin don la 'dir
143a6(mdo sde): ni tshul bzhin bsam//kha lo sgyur bas smras pa/lha 'di rigs chos ma lags yul 'khor chos ma lags//skye bo kun gyi dar la bab pa rga bas 'joms//khyod kyi yab dang
143a7(mdo sde): yum dang nye du gnyen tshogs kyang //rga las thar 'gro ba yi thabs ni gzhan ma mchis//byang chub sems dpas smras pa/kha lo sgyur ba byis pa'i skye bo mi mkhas pa'i//blo ngan gzhon
143b1(mdo sde): pas rgyugs shing myos pas rga ma mthong //nga ni slar 'gro nga yi shing rta myur du sbyar//nga yang rgal gnas pas rtse dgas ci zhig bya/de nas byang chub sems dpa' shing rta'i mchog de slar sbyar te
143b2(mdo sde): phyir grong khyer du zhugs so//dge slong dag de ltar byang chub sems dpa' dus gzhan zhig na/bkod pa chen pos grong khyer gyi lho phyogs kyi sgo nas skyed mos tshal gyi sar zhugs pa dang /dris lam
143b3(mdo sde): kan mi nad kyis nyen pa/dmu rdzing can lus nyam chung ba/rang gi gcin skyug tu bying ba/mgon med pa/skyabs med pa/shin tu sha thang bar dbugs dbyung zhing brngub dgos pa zhig
143b4(mdo sde): mthong ngo //mthong nas kyang yang byang chub sems dpas shes bzhin du kha lo sgyur ba la 'di skad ces smras so//kha lo sgyur ba mi rtsub lus kyi mdog dran la//dbang po thams cad nyams
143b5(mdo sde): shing dbugs dbyung rab tu dka'//yan lag kun skams lto bas dkrugs shing nyams thag gyur//rang gi gcin rtug smad pa'i gnas na 'dug 'di su//kha lo sgyur bas smras pa/lha
143b6(mdo sde): cig mi 'di shin tu nad kyis btab pa ste//nad kyi 'jigs pa nye bar mchis pas 'gum la thug/nad med gzi brjid ma mchis stobs kyang rnam par nyams//mgon dang skyabs dang gling
143b7(mdo sde): dang dpung gnyen ma mchis lags//byang chub sems dpas smras pa/nad med pa yang rmi lam na ni rtse dang mtshungs//nad kyi 'jigs pa 'di ltar shin tu mi bzad pa//skyes bu mkhas
144a1(mdo sde): pas gnas 'di mthong nas ji lta bur//rtsel dga' dang sdug pa'i 'du shes skyed par 'gyur//dge slong dag de nas byang chub sems dpa' shing rta mchog de slar sbyar te
144a2(mdo sde): phyir yang grong khyer du zhugs so//dge slong dag de ltar byang chub sems dpa' dus gzhani zhag na bkod pa chen pos grong khyer gyi nub phyogs kyi sgo nas skyed mos tshal gyi sar zhugs pa dang /des
144a3(mdo sde): lam ka na mi shi bar gyur pa/khyogs la bzhag pa/ras kyi bla bre phub pa/nye du'i tshogs kyis bskor te/kun kyang ngu zhing skad phyung ste/ngu la sgro sngags 'don cing skra bshig la mdo
144a4(mdo sde): las 'thor zhing brang rdung la cho nge 'don cing phyi bzhin 'brang bar gyur pa mthong ngo //mthong nas kyang yang byang chub sems dpas shes bzhin du kha lo sgyur ba la 'di skad ces smras so//kha lo
144a5(mdo sde): sbyar ba mi 'di khyogs la bzhag nas ni//mi dag skra bshig mgo la sa yis 'thor byed cing //sna tshogs dag gi tshig ni brjod la brang rdung bas//kun nas bskor ba byas te khyer ba su
144a6(mdo sde): zhig yin//kha lo sgyur bas smras pa/lha cig mi 'di dzam+bu'i gling du gum pa ste//slan chad pha ma mchis brang bu rnams mthong mi 'gyur//longs spyod khyim dang mdzu'i gnyen tshigs
144a7(mdo sde): rnams spangs nas ni//'jig rten pha rol mchis te sman ched gnyen ni mthong //byang chub sems dpas smras pa/rga bas gnod par 'gyur ba'i gzhon pa cir mi rung //sna tshogs
144b1(mdo sde): nad kyis gnod 'gyur nad med cir mi rung //ring du mi gson gson pa mkhas la cir mi rung //rga la chags pa skyes bu mkhas la cir mi rung //gal te rga med nad med 'chi ba med gyur
144b2(mdo sde): kyang //'on kyang phung po lnga 'dzin sdug bsngal che yin na//rga na 'chi ba rtag tu 'brang ba smos ci dgos//legs par slor zlog rab tu thar bar bya ba bsam//dge slong dag de nas byang chub sems
144b3(mdo sde): dpa' shing rta mchog de slar bzlog ste/phyir yang grong khyer du zhugs so//dge slong dag de ltar byang chub sems dpa' dus gzhan zhig na grong khyer gyi byang phyogs kyi sgo nas skyed mos tshal gyi sar
144b4(mdo sde): zhugs pa dang /byang chub sems dpa'i mthus lha'i bu de dag nyid kyis lam ka der dge slong zhig mngon par sprul pa dang /byang chub sems dpas dge slong zhi ba/dul ba yang dag par bsdams
144b5(mdo sde): pa/tshangs par spyod pa/mig pham pa/gnya' shing gang tsam du lta ba/spyod lam mdzes pa phun sum tshogs pa/'gro ba dang ldog pa mdzes pa phun sum tshogs pa/mdun du lta ba dang /
144b6(mdo sde): g.yas g.yos su lta ba mdzes pa/bskum pa dang smyung ba mdzes pa/chos gos snam sbyar dang lhung bzed dang chos gros thogs pa mdzes pa zhig lam ka na 'dug pa de mthong ngo //mthong nas
144b7(mdo sde): kyang byang chub sems dpas shes bzhin du kha lo sgyur ba la 'di skad ces smras so//kho lo sgyur ba skyes bu sems zhi rab zhi zhing //mig phab 'gro la gnya' shing gang tsam lta byed cing /dung
145a1(mdo sde): smrig gos gyon shin tu rab tu zhi ba spyod//lhung bzed thogs nas mi rgod ma khengs su zhig yin//kha lo sgyur bas smras pa/lha cig mi 'di dge slong zhes ni bgyi ba lags//
145a2(mdo sde): 'dod pa'i dga' ba spangs shing shin tu dul bar spyod//bdag nyid zhi ba chel zhing rab tu byung bar gyur//'dod chags zhe sdang bral bar bsod snyoms spyod cing rgyu//byang chub sems
145a3(mdo sde): dpas smras pa/'di ni dge par legs smras ngo yang 'dod pa ste/rab tu byung ba mkhas pa rnams kyis rtag tu bsngags//de ni bdag la phan zhing sems can gzhon la'ang phan//
145a4(mdo sde): 'tsho ba bde zhing nyams mthun 'chi med 'bras bur 'gyur//dge slong dag de nas byang chub sems dpas shing rta mchog de slar bsgyur te phyir yang grong khyer du zhugs so//dge slong dag de ltar
145a5(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' la skul ba rnam pa 'di lta bu 'di dag rgyal po zas gtsang mas mthong zhing thos nas/byang chub sems dpa'i yongs su bsrung po'i phyir ra ba rgya chen po byed du bcug ste/
145a6(mdo sde): 'obs kyang dror bcug/sgo gtan dam po'ang 'dzugs su bcug/srung ma'ang bkod/dpa' bo rnams kyang spyan/bzhon pa'ang sta gon byas/go cha 'od gyon du bcug go//byang chub sems
145a7(mdo sde): dpa' bsrung ba'i phyir//grong khyer chen po'i sgo bzhi'i lam gyi mdo sum rnams su dpung chen po'i bkod pa bzhag ste/byang chub sems dpa' mngon par 'byung nga ro zhes de dog de srung du
145b1(mdo sde): bcug go//btsun mo'i 'khor la'ang res 'ga' tsam yang glu dbyangs kyi rgyun chang dA raM/dga' ba dang rtse ba thams cad kyang sbyor cig/ci nas kyang gzhon nu chags nas rab tu 'byung bar mi 'gyur
145b2(mdo sde): ba dang /mgu bar 'gyur bar bud med kyi sku'ang ston cig tso so bsgo'o//de la 'di skad ces bya ste/thab mo mos pa'i skyes bu lag na ral gri mtshon thogs sgro gar bkod//go bgos mi rta
145b3(mdo sde): glang po shing rta mi bskyon glang po'i phreng ba'ang bkod//'obs dang shing thags dag dang rta babs phyir 'thon po yang byed du bcug/sgo mo rgyang grags grag pa'i sgra 'byung ba yang gtan pa dam
145b4(mdo sde): po bcug/shAkya'i tshogs rnams thams cad yid mi dga' zhing nyin mtshan bsrung bar byed//dpung chen de dag rnams kyang sgra skad chen po shin tu grag par byed//nges pa 'di nas 'byung
145b5(mdo sde): du 'ong zhes grong khyer 'khrugs shing yid dngangs skrag/shAkya'i rigs skyes song na rigs 'di chad par mi 'gyur grang snyam byed//skye bo bud med dag la bsgo po rtag tu glu dbyangs rgyun ma bcad//
145b6(mdo sde): rtse bas dga' ba rnams kyi bsnyen bkur gyis shing yid kyang mgu bar gyis//bud med sgyu thabs spyod pa gang yin rnam pa du mo mang po ston//nges pa 'gror mi 'gyur bar bsrung bar byos
145b7(mdo sde): shing bgegs kyang rab tu byos//kha lo sgyur ba mchog de mngon par 'byung ba'i snga ltas 'di dag ste//ngang pa khyung khrung dag dang rma bya sgeg dag dang ne co rnams//khang bzang skar khung d+ha
146a1(mdo sde): babs mchog dang yang thog khri la 'khod nas ni//dman zhing dman la mi dga' mi bde mgo smad sems shing sgra mi 'byin//rdzing dang rdzing chen dag gis pad+ma dag kyang
146a2(mdo sde): rnyis shing rnyis par gyur//shing ljon skams shing yal ga me tog lhags la me tog slar mi 'chags//pi bang gling bu rgyud gsum rgyud kyis brgyan pa de tshe blo bur chad//rnga dang rdzang
146a3(mdo sde): dag kyang lag pas brdungs na 'chag cing sgra mi 'byung //grong khyer de dag thams cad 'khrugs par gyur cing shin tu gnyid kyis non//gang gi yid kyang gar byed pa dang glu len pa la
146a4(mdo sde): dga' ba med//rgyal po'ang mchog tu rab tu yid dman gyur te sems khongs chud cing 'dug/i ma ma rung shAka rigs rdzu 'phrul rgya chen mi tshig grang snyam byed//sa 'tshe ma dang rgyal
146a5(mdo sde): bu mal cig na ni nyal zhing 'khod pa'i tshe//nam phyed tsam nas 'tsho ma yi rmi lam du ni 'di dag rmis//sa 'di thams cad rtse mor ldan pa'i ri dang bcas te g.yos par gyur//shing ljon/
146a6(mdo sde): rnams kyang rlung gis bskyod nas rtsa nas 'thon te sa la skyel//nyi ma zla ba skar ma'i rgyan dang bcas te mkha' las sa la lhung //lag pa g.yon pas skra yang rab tu 'bal zhing cod pa na
146a7(mdo sde): lhung ba mthong //lag pa chad la de bzhin rkang pa'ang chad cing bdag ni sgren mor mthong //bdag gi mu tig do shal nor bu gser gyi 'og dpag chad par mthong //nyal khri de yi rkang pa
146b1(mdo sde): bzhi chags yi steng na nyal ba mthong //rgyal po'i gdugs kyi yu ba spras pa dpal ldan mdzes pa chag par mthong //rgyan rnams kun kyang rnam par 'khor cing chu yis khyer bar gyur pa dang //khyimathar
146b2(mdo sde): rgyan yang gos drang cod pan bcas te mal steng 'bor bar mthong //grong khyer dag nas me skyon phyir byung grong khyer mun pas non pa dang //rin po che las byas pa'i dra ba mdzes pa'ang chang por gyur
146b3(mdo sde): pa rmis//mu tig do shal 'phyang ba lhung nas rgya mtsho chen pos dkrugs pa dang //de mi tshon ro yi rgyal po ro rab gnas nas g.yos pas rmis//shAkya'i bu mo'i rmi lam du ni 'di 'dra 'di dag rmis
146b4(mdo sde): gyur nas//des mig nas mchi ma zag cing rang gi khyol 'di skad smras//lha cig rmi lam 'di 'dra rmis pa cir 'gyur ba ni bka' stsol cig/bdag ni dran pa 'khrul cing mig kyang 'khrul la
146b5(mdo sde): yid ni mya ngan nor//de yis da bos ka la bing+ga rnga sgra tshangs dbyangs sgyu snyan pas//sa 'tsho ma la smras pa khyod ni rab tu dgar 'gyur sdig pa med//sems can glang dag bsod nams sngon spyad
146b6(mdo sde): de dag rmi lam 'di 'dra mi//sdug bsngal du mas sbyin pa rmi lom 'di 'dra rmi bag lnga yod//khyod kyis so ni rab tu g.yos pa dang //ri rtser bcas te sa la lhung rmis pa//lha dang klu dngango sun
146b7(mdo sde): de 'byung ba'i tshogs//kun gyis khyed mchod gca mar byed par 'gyur//khyod kyis shing rnams canas 'dzin rmis shing //mig pa g.yon pas sgrar la rmis pa ni//sa 'tsho myung du
147a1(mdo sde): mongs dra ba bcad//'dus byas dag las lta ba'i dra ba 'byin//khyod kyis nyi zlas la lhung rmis shing //skab ma rnams kyang ltung bar rmis pa ni//sa 'tsho myur du nyon mongs
147a2(mdo sde): dgra bcom ste//khyod ni 'jig rten mchod pa bsngags par 'gyur//khyod kyis mu tig do shal 'thor rmas shing //lus kun chad dang sgren mo rmis pa ni//sa 'tsho myur du bud med lus
147a3(mdo sde): spangs te//ring por mi thogs skyes pa'i lus su 'gyur//khyod kyis khri rkang chag par rmis pa dang //gdugs yu rin chen spras pa chag rmis pa//sa 'tsho myur du chu bo bzhi rgal cing //
147a4(mdo sde): nga ni 'jig rten gdugs gcig 'gyur ba mthong //khyod kyis rgyan rnams chus khyer rmis pa dang //nga yi gos dang cod pan khri steng rmis//sa 'tsho myur du mtshan gyis brgyan nas ni//'jig
147a5(mdo sde): rten kun gyis nga la bstod pa mthong //khyod kyis mar mo brgya phrag bye ba dag/grong khyer byung nas mun gnag gyur rmis pa//sa 'tsho myur du ma rig rmongs pa'i mun//'jig rten kun la shes
147a6(mdo sde): rab snang byed 'gyur//khyod kyis mu tig do shal chad pa dang //gser gyi tshong tshong smras pa chad rmis pa//sa 'tsho myur du nyon mongs dra bcad de//'dus byas dag las 'du shes skud
147a7(mdo sde): pa 'byin//sa 'tsho gang phyir nga la gus par ni//rtag tu rim gro mchog gis mchod byed na//khyod la ngan 'gro med cing mya ngan med//myur du dga' zhing mchog tu dga' ba 'thob/
