147b1(mdo sde): ngas ni sngon chad sbyin pa gya nom byin//tshul khrims bsrungs dang rtag tu bzod pa bsgoms//de bas nga la dad pa gang rnyed pa//de dag thams cad dga' zhing rab dga' rnyed//'khor bar
147b2(mdo sde): bskal pa bye ba mtha' yas su//ngas ni byang chub lam mchog rnam par sbyangs//de bas nga la dad pa gang byed pa//de dag thams cad ngan song gsum po chad//dga' ba 'thob kyis mi dga'
147b3(mdo sde): maskyed cig/tshim pa thob par gyis la mgu skyed cig/dga' dang mchog tu dga' ba myur 'thob ste//khyod kyi rmi ltas bzang gis sa 'tsho nyol//sngon chad dge ba'i las ni yang dag bsngags gyur
147b4(mdo sde): pa//mi mchog rnams ni mngon par 'byung ba'i dus bab tshe//mtshan ma 'di dag bsod nams gzi brjid bsags pa dang //dpal gyi gzi brjid snying po can des rmi bar 'gyur//de ni rkang pa dag
147b5(mdo sde): dang lag pa chen po yis//rgya mtsho chen po bzhi po dag gis chu dkrug dang //sa 'di thams cad sna tshogs mal char gyur pa dang //ri bo lhun po mchog kyang sngas su gyur pa rmi//rmi lam na
147b6(mdo sde): ni 'od rab bkye bas 'jig rten na//mun pa mun nag chen po rnam par bsal ba dang //sa las gdugs shig byung bas 'jig rten gsum khyab dang //'od kyis reg pas log lhung
147b7(mdo sde): sdug bsngal rab zhi rmi//dkar nag srog chags bzhi zhig rkang pa ldag pa dang //kha dog bzhi pa'i bya 'ongs kha dog gcig sgyur dang //mchog tu ngan pa smad pa ngan skyugs ri la yang //'dzegs
148a1(mdo sde): nas 'gro yang den gos pa med pa rmi//rmi lam na ni chu bo chu yis rab gang nas//srog chags bye ba khrag khrig mang po khyer ba lngas//der ni grur byas bsgral te gzhan dag
148a2(mdo sde): bsgral nas ni//de yis 'jigs med mya ngan med mchog zang bkod rmi//rmi lam na ni nad pa mang po nad btab po//nad med gzi brjid bral zhing stobs kyang nyams rnams la//da ni sman
148a3(mdo sde): par gyur nas rtsi sman mang byin pas//nad btab sems can khrag khrig mang po thang byed rmi//ri rab ngos la seng ge'i khri la 'dug nas ni//slob ma thal mo sbyar cing lha rnams phyag 'tshal
148a4(mdo sde): la//bdag ni g.yul las rgyal zhing lha rnams nam mkha' las//kun tu dga' ba'i sgra sgrog par ni rmi lam rmi//bkra shis brtul zhugs bzang po yongs su rdzogs par yang //byang
148a5(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' rmi lam rnam pa de dag rmi//de thos nas ni 'di ni ring por mi thogs pare//mi yi lha yi lhar 'gyur snyam ste lha mi dga'//rmi lam gyi le'u ste/bcu bzhi pa'o///
148a6(mdo sde): dge slong dag de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du sems te/bdag gis rgyal po chen po zas gtsang ma la'ang ma byas shing /phas gnang ba med par mngon par 'byung ba 'di ni bdag
148a7(mdo sde): la me rigs te/byis pa gzo ba ma yin par 'gyur ro snyam nas/de mtshan mo mi nyal tsam na rang gi gnas kyi khang bzong nas byung ste/rgyal po zas gtsang ma'i khang bzang du phyin nas
148b1(mdo sde): 'dug go/byang chub sems dpa' 'dug ma thag tu khang bzang thams cad 'od kyis gsal bar gyur to//de nas rgyal po sad pa dang /'od de mthong ste mthong nas kyang myur ba myur bar nyung rum la smras
148b2(mdo sde): pas kye nyung rum ci nyi ma shar tam/gang gis na 'di 'od kyis rnam par mdzes/nyung rum gyis smras pa/lha da dung du dgung phyed kyang ma bas so//lha gzhan yang nyi ma'i 'od ni shing dang rtsig pa
148b3(mdo sde): thal mi phyin//lus la gdung bar bgyid cing tsha bar rab tu bgyid//nang par dus na ngang pa dag dang rma bya dang //ne tso khu byug ngur pa dag kyang rang sgra 'byin//'od 'di lha mi'i yid du mchi zhing
148b4(mdo sde): bde ba ste//rab tu sim bgyid dge bgyid gdung bar bgyid ma lags//shing dang rtsig pa thal phyung sgrib pa yod ma mchis//yon tan ldan pa gcig cig dang ni 'di 'byon nges//rgyal po de ni mi
148b5(mdo sde): dga' phyogs bcur bltas pa dang //sems can dag pa pad+ma'i mig can de mthong nas//de ni mal nas ldang bar 'dod na ma nus te//rnam dag blo can dam pa pha la gus pa bskyed//de ni
148b6(mdo sde): rgyal po'i mdun du 'dug nas 'di skad smras//lha cig bdag ni mngon par 'byung ba'i dus bab rigs//bgegs kyang ma mdzad mi dgyes pa yang ma mdzad cig/rgyal po gnyen bcas yul
148b7(mdo sde): 'khor bcas te bzod par mdzod//rgyal po de ni mchi mas mig gang 'di skad smras//khyod ni phyir ldog pa yi dgos pa ci zhig yod//bdag la dam pa ci slong smros shig thams cad sbyin//
149a1(mdo sde): bdag dang pho brang 'khor dang yul 'khor 'di phan thogs//de tshe byang chub sems dpas snyan pa'i tshig smras pa//lha cig dam pa gzhi 'tshal de ni bdag la stsol//gal
149a2(mdo sde): te stsal bar spyod na mnga' ni khyod la mchis//'on dang rtag tu khyim na gzims shing 'byung mi 'gyur//lha cig bdag ni rga bas tshugs par mi 'gyur zhing //rtag tu mdog bzang dar
149a3(mdo sde): la bab par gnas pa dang //nad ma mchis pa thob cing nad kyis mi btab dang //tshe dang ga ma mchis pa dang rgud par mi 'gyur 'tshal//rgyal pos tshig thos shin tu sdug bsngal nyam thug
149a4(mdo sde): ste//gzhon nu gnas min slong bas bdag la mthu med do//bskal par gnas pa'i drang srong rnams kyang nam du yang //rgan 'chi ba'i 'jigs dang rgud las ma thar to//rgan 'chi ba'i
149a5(mdo sde): 'jigs dang rgud par mi 'gyur ba//lha cig gal te mchog bzhi 'di dag mi stsol na/gzhan yang mchog cig gsol gyis rgyal po gsan du gsol//'di nas shi 'phos nying mtshams
149a6(mdo sde): sbyor bar mi 'gyur mdzod//mi yi dam pa'i tshig ni de skad thos pa dang //sred pa bsrabs te bu la chags pa yongs su gcod//phan byed 'gro ba thar byed rjes su yi rang ngo //khyod kyi
149a7(mdo sde): bsam pa rnams ni yongs su rdzogs gyur cig/dge slong dag de nas byang chub sems dpa' slar song ste/rang gi khyim du phyin nas mal na 'dug pa dang /de song ba 'am 'ongs par
149b1(mdo sde): sus kyang mtshor ro//dge slong dag de'i nam nangs pa dang /rgyal po zas gtsang mas shAkya'i tshogs thams cad bsogs te de'i lo rgyas rnams smos nas/gzhon nu ni mngon par 'byung na da rje
149b2(mdo sde): ltar bya zhes smras so//shAkya rnams kyis smras pa/lha bsrung bar bgyi'o//de ci'i slad du zhe na/shAkya'i tshogs 'di ni mang la/de ni gcig pur gyur pas mthus mngon par 'byung ba'i nus pa
149b3(mdo sde): de la ma mchis so//de nas shAkya de dag dang rgyal po zas gtsang mas shAkya gzhon nu 'thab chos sbyangs pa/'os su gyur pa/'phong bslabs pa/chen po che chen po'i stobs dang ldan pa lnga brgya
149b4(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' bsrung ba'i phyir grong khyer gyi shar sgor bkod de/byang chub sems dpa' bsrung ba'i phyir shAkya gzhon nu re re la'ang 'khor shing rta lnga brgya lnga brgya dang /shing rta re ra
149b5(mdo sde): lo'ang 'khor dpung bu chung lnga brgya lnga brgya bkod do//byang chub sems dpo' bsrung ba'i phyir/de bzhin du grong khyer gyi lho dang nub dang byang gi sgor yang shAkya gzhon nu 'thab chos sbyongs pa
149b6(mdo sde): 'os su gyur pa/'bang bslabs pa chen po che chen po'i stobs dang ldan pa lnga brgya lnga brgya dang /shAkya gzhon nu re re la'ang 'khor shing rta lnga brgya lnga brgya dang /shing rta re re la'ang 'khor dpung
149b7(mdo sde): bu chung lnga brgya lnga brgya bkod do//byang chub sems dpa' bsrung ba'i phyir shAkya rgan rabs rgan rabs rnams kyang lam gyi bzhi mdo dang /mdo sum dang /lam po che mang po thams cad na
150a1(mdo sde): gdod cing 'khod ngo //rgyal po zas gtsang ma'ang shAkya gzhon nu lnga brgyas bskor cing mdun gyis bltas te/rta dang glang po che dag la zhon nas rang gi khyim sgon mel che byed do//skye
150a2(mdo sde): dgu'i bdag mo chen mo gau ta mas kyang rang gi bran mo'i tshogs la smras pa/mar me dri ma med pa bus la nor bu thams cad rgyal mtshan rtse mor thogs//mu tig rgyan phreng rnams kyang spyongaso la khyim
150a3(mdo sde): 'di kun tu 'od kyis snang bar byos//glu dbyangs dag kyang sbyor la do mod g.yel ba med par mel tshe dam du gyis//gzhon nu ci nas ma tshor bar ni 'gro bar mi 'gyur tshul du bsrung ba gyis/go bgos
150a4(mdo sde): lag na lag cha ral gri dang //mdung thung mda' dang mtshon cha rtse gnyis thogs//sdug pa'i bu ni bsrung bar bya ba'i phyir//kun kyang rab tu bsgrim pa chen po gyis//sgo kun chod la gtan pa
150a5(mdo sde): dam du chub//sgo 'phar sra ba rked par gtan chug la//dus la ma bab par ni sgo ma de bye//sems can dam pa 'di ni shor ta re//nor bu do shal mu tig do shal thogs//me tog zla
150a6(mdo sde): gam seng ge shing lo ris//skra rags sor gdub rna rgyan chings shing thogs//rkang gdob dag kyang shin tu legs par thogs//lha mi phan pa glang po dregs bzhin 'gro/gal te glo bur
150a7(mdo sde): mngon par byung dar//ci nas mi bde rnyed par ma gyur par//de lta de ltar nan tan cher gyis shig/bud med gang dag mdung thung thogs pa dag/dri ma med pa mal na 'dug pa bskor//ci
150b1(mdo sde): nas gnyid kyis log par ma gyur par//phye ma leb bzhin mig gis bsrung bar gyis//rgyal bu 'di ni bsrung bar bya ba'i phyir//khyim 'dir rin pa cha yi dra ba bres//gling bu dag kyang rab tu bud chung
150b2(mdo sde): long //ngor nga rdul dang bral ba bsrung bar gyis//phan tshun gcig la gcig ni sbron byas te//de meng ma nyal shin tu bsrung bgyis//rgyal srid dang ni yul 'khor spangs nas sra//khyim nas ngon
150b3(mdo sde): du'abyung bar gyur ta re//'di ni mngon par byung bar gyur na go/rgyal po'i pho brang 'di kun nyams mi dga'//rgyal po'i rigs rgyud yun ring gnas pa yang //rgyal po'i rigs dang rgyud ni
150b4(mdo sde): chad par 'gyur//dge slong dag de nas gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon lnga rtsen la sogs pa gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po nyi shu rtsa brgyad dang /'phrog ma'i bu lnga brgya rnams gcig tu 'dus nas 'di skad
150b5(mdo sde): ces smras te/grogs po dag de mod byang chub sems dpa' mngon par 'byung gis khyed cag de la mchod pa byed pa'i las la spro bgyis shig/rgyal po chen po bzhi'ang lhung la can gyi pho brang
150b6(mdo sde): du zhugs nas gnod sbyin gyi 'khor chen po la smras pa/phyogs po dag da med byang chub sems dranga' mngon por 'byung gis khyod kyis bcibs pa'i rkang lag nas theg la 'thung bar gyis shig/
150b7(mdo sde): goded sbyi kyi 'khar gyis smras pa/spu ni srid med bu yi stengs ldan rdo rje lta khror mi byings la sI//sems can kun gyi dam pa de ni brtson 'grus stobs ldan g.yo ba mi mnga' ste//ri la
151a1(mdo sde): dam pa lhun po chen po rmang nas phyung ste nam mkhar bzung nus kyi//rgyal ba'i yon tan lhun po ri lci bsod nams ye shes gnas pa sus kyang gang du bkur mi nus//rnam thos
151a2(mdo sde): bus smras pa/mi gang nga rgyal 'gying ba de la ston pa lci//gang dag dga' gus gnas pa de dag yang bar tshor//bsam pa thag pas brtson par byos la gus pa yis//bya yis sha kham bzhin
151a3(mdo sde): du yang bar shes par gyis//kho bo mdun nas 'gro yis khyed cag rnams kyis bcibs pa thag/byang chub sems dpa' mngon par 'byung tshe bsod nams mang po sogs//dge slong dag de
151a4(mdo sde): nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams la smras pa/kye grogs po dag do mod byang chub sems dpa' mngon par 'byung gis de la khyed thams cad mchod pa'i las la spro
151a5(mdo sde): bar gyis shig/de na lha'i bu zhi ba'i blo gros zhes bya ba des 'di skad ces smras so//bdag gis ni sor skya'i gnas kyi grong khyer chen po'i skyes pa dang /bud med dang khye'u dang bu mo thams cad
151a6(mdo sde): gnyid kyis log par bgyi'o//lha'i bu rtse ba bkod pa zhes bya ba des 'di skad ces smras so//bdug gis nau rta dang glang po che dang /bong bu dang /rnga mo dang /ba lang dang /ma he dang /skyes
151a7(mdo sde): pa dang /bud med dang /khye'u dang /bu mo rnams kyi sgra mi grog par bgyi'o//lha'i bu bkod pa'i blo gros zhes bya ba des 'di skad ces smras so//bdag gis ni nam mkha'i dkyil du shing rta
151b1(mdo sde): chen po bdun rin po che'i stegs bus 'khor bar bskor ba nor bu rin po che me shel gyi 'od 'bar ba/gdugs dang /rgyal mtshan dang /bdan sgreng ba/me tog sna tshogs chal par bkram pa dog por
151b2(mdo sde): nas bdug spos sna tshogs kyis bdugs pa dag byang chub sems dpa' lam gang nas 'byung ba'i lam ngar bkod pa bgyi'o//klu'i rgyal po sa srung gi bu zhes bya bas 'di skad ces smras so//bdag gis
151b3(mdo sde): ni bdag nyid kyi sna la khang pa brdegs pa dpag chod sum cu rtsa gnyis pa bgyis te der lha'i bu mo dag bkod la sil snyan dang /glu dbyangs len du sprul cing glu dang rol mo'i dbyangs sgra chen pos byang chub
151b4(mdo sde): sems dpa' la rim gro dang bsnyen bkur bgyid cing mchi bar bgyi'o//lha'i dbang po brgya byin nyid kyis 'di skad ces smras so//kho bas ni sgo dbye'o//lam mtshon par bya'o//lha'i bu chos spyod
151b5(mdo sde): kyis 'di skad ces smras so//bdag gis ni btsun mo'i 'khor rnams mi sdug par bstan par bgyi'o//lha'i bu yang dag skul pos smras pa/bdag gis ni byang chub sems dpa' gzims
151b6(mdo sde): mal nas bzhengs par gsol bar bgyi'o//de na klu'i rgyal po chu lha dang /klu'i rgyal po gzi can dang /klu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho dang /klu'i rgyal po ma dros pa dang /klu'i rgyal po dga' bo dang nywa dga'
151b7(mdo sde): bos 'di skad ces smras so//bdag cag gis ni byang chub sems dpa' la mched pa'i las kyi phyir dus kyi rjes su 'brang ba'i tsan+dan gyi sprin mngon par sprul te/tsan+dan sbrul gyi snying po'i phye ma'i
152a1(mdo sde): char dbab bo//dge slong dag de ltar lha dang klu dang /gnod sbyin dang /dri za rnams kyis rnam pa 'di lta bu'i bsam pa nges pa bsams te brtsams so//byang chub sems
152a2(mdo sde): dpa' chos sems pa la zhugs pa/glu dbyangs len po'i khang bzang na mal bde ba la 'dug pa/btsun mo'i 'khor gyi nang na 'dug pa ni sngon gyi sangs rgyas kyi spyod pa rnam par sems
152a3(mdo sde): shing sems can la phan pa bya ba rjes su sems la/sngon gyi smon lam gyi tshig pani mngon du byed do//bzhi gang zhe na/sngon nga rang byung gi bdag po 'dod cing thams cad mkhyen pa nyid don du
152a4(mdo sde): gnyer ba na/go cha 'di lta bu dgos par gyur te/sems can sdug bsngal ba dag mthong nas kye ma'o bdag gis 'jig rten gnas pa bcings te 'khor ba'i btson ra chen por bcug
152a5(mdo sde): pa la 'khor ba'i btson ra dral te/bcings pa bkrol ba'i sgra bsgrag go//sred pa'i zhags pa dang /sgrog dam pos bcings pa'i sems can rnams kyang rab tu dgrol lo zhes bya ba
152a6(mdo sde): sngon gyi smon lam gyi tshig dang po 'di mngon du gyur to//kye ma'o bdag gis 'jig rten ma rig pa'i mun pa mun gnag thibs po chen por zhugs pa mi shes pa'i ling tog dang ra bo rib
152a7(mdo sde): kyis mig bsgribs pa shes rab kyi mig dang bral ba/ma rig pa dang gti mug gis ldongs pa la chos kyi snang ba chen po bya zhing ye shes kyi sgron ma'ang nye bar bsgrubs la/rnam par thar
152b1(mdo sde): pa'i sgo gsum shes pa'i mig sman re'u dang sman thabs dang shes rab dang /ye shes dang ldan pa btang ste/ma rig pa'i mun pa mun gnag dang /gti mug gri mun pa dang /rab rib dang /ling tog dang /
152b2(mdo sde): rnyog pa thams cad bsal nas shes rab kyi mig rnam par sbyang ngo zhes bya ba sngon gyi smon lam gyi tshig gnyis pa 'di mngon du gyur to//kye ma'o bdag gis 'jig rten nga rgyal gyi rgyal mtshan bsgreng ba/ngar
152b3(mdo sde): 'dzin pa dang /nga yir 'dzin pa la mngon par zhen pa/bdag dang bdag gir 'dzin pa dang ldan pa'i yid can/'du shes dang /sems dang /lta ba phyin ci log gis phyin ci log tu gyur pa bzung
152b4(mdo sde): ba ngan pas zin pa la 'phags pa'i lam bstan te/nga'o snyam pa'i nga rgyal bsnyal bar bya'o zhes bya ba sngon gyi smon lam gyi tshig gsum pa 'di mngon du gyur to//kye ma'o 'dog gis 'jig rten rnam
152b5(mdo sde): par ma zhi ba/thags 'khrugs pa lta bur gyur pa/dru bu 'dzings pa lta bur gyur pa/'ong ba dang 'gro bar gyur pa/'jig rten 'di nas 'jig rten pha rol dang /'jig rten pha rol nas 'jig rten
152b6(mdo sde): 'dir kun tu rgyug cing 'khor la 'khor ba las mi ldog pa mgal me'i 'khor lo lta bur gyur pa la nye bar zhi bar byed pa'i shes rab kyis chog par byed pa'i chos kyang bstan to zhes bya ba sngon gyi smon
152b7(mdo sde): lam gyi tshig bzhi po 'di mngon du gyur te/sngon gyi smon lam gyi tshig bzhi po de dag mngon du gyur to//skad cig de la lha'i bu chos spyod dang /gonas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha'i bu rnams kyis
153a1(mdo sde): btsun mo'i 'khor mi sdug par bsgyur te/mi sdug par gnas pa dang /smad pa'i gzugs su bstan nas nam mkha' la 'khod de/byang chub sems dpa' la rigs su bcar/
153a2(mdo sde): de smras pa/de nas lha'i bu rdzu 'phrul che rnams kyis//pad+ma rgyas pa yangs pa'i spyan la smras//dur khrod dbus 'dir bzhugs par gyur lags na//khyod ni ji ltar dgyes pa skye bar 'gyur//
153a3(mdo sde): lha yi dbang phyug rnams kyis de bskul nas//yud tsam btsun mo'i 'khor la lta zhing rtog/bltas nas smad par gyur pa de dag mthong //dur khrod gnas par gyur pa bden snyam byed//byang chub
153a4(mdo sde): sems dpas thams cad dang ldan pa'i bud med kyi tshogs la rnam par bltas pa dang /kha cig ni gos lhung bar gyur/kha cig ni skra zhig/kha cig ni rgyan brul/kha cig na cod pan

153b3(mdo sde): pa'i btsun mo'i 'khor la lta zhing byang chub sems dpa' dur khrod kyi 'du shes skyed do//de la 'di skad ces bya ste/'jig rten mgon des de mthong yid byung ste//snying rjes shugs phyung nas ni 'di skad
153b4(mdo sde): spras//e ma skye dgu dag ni sdug bsngal gyur//srin mo'i tshogs la dga' ba ji ltar rnyed//'dod pa'i yon tan yod min yon tan 'dzin//gti mug mun pas rab bsgribs blo gros ngan//dper
153b5(mdo sde): na bya ni bya rgyar chud pa bzhin//nam yang 'byung ba snyed par 'gyur ma yin////'phags pa rgya cher rol pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo//dam po bcu pa//de nas byang
153b6(mdo sde): chub sems dpas chos snang ba'i sgo 'dis yang btsun mo'i 'khor la rtog cing snying rje chen po'i smre bas sems can gyi phyir smre ste/'di na byis pa de dag ni gsod pa ste/bsad pa'i gnas su
153b7(mdo sde): bsad par bya ba gsod pa dang mtshungs so//'di na byis pa de dag ni chags pa ste/ngan skyugs kyis gang ba'i sdod ri mo can rnams la mi mkhas pa chags pa dang mtshungs so//'di na byis
154a1(mdo sde): pa de dag ni 'bying ba skye/glang po che chur bying ba dang mtshungs so//'di na byis pa de dag ni bcas pa ste/btson ra'i nang gi btson bcas pa dang mtshungs so//'di na byis pa de
154a2(mdo sde): dag ni mngon par dga' ba ste/phag mi gtsang ba la dga' ba dang mtshungs so//'di ni byos pa de dag ni chags pa ste/khyi keng rus la chags pa dang mtshungs so//'di na byis pa de dag ni
154a3(mdo sde): rab tu lhung ba ste/phye ma leb mar me'i me lcer lhung ba dang mtshungs so//'di na byis pa de dag ni thogs pa ste/spre'u rnyong la thogs pa dang mtshungs so//'di na byis pa de dog ni yongs su

154a6(mdo sde): byis pa de dag ni phongs pa ste/rgya mtsho chen por gru'i snam bu zhig pa dang mtshungs so//'di na byis pa de dag ni rab tu lhung ba ste/dmus long g.yang sa chen por lhung ba dang mtshungs so//
154a7(mdo sde): 'di na byis pa de dag ni yongs su zad par 'gyur ba ste/sa'i steng gi mtshams su song ba'i chu dang mtshungs so//'di na byis pa de dag ni du ba 'thul ba ste/bskal pa zad pa'i sa chen po
154b1(mdo sde): dang mtshungs so//'di na byis pa de dag ni 'khor ba ste/rdza mkhan gyi 'khor lo'i shugs dang mtshungs so//'di na byis pa de dag ni 'brog rtsol ba ste/dmus long ri la phyin pa dang mtshungs so//'di

154b3(mdo sde): ngag ni yongs su nyams pa ste/zla ba mar gyi ngo'i zla ba dang mtshungs so//'di dag ni byis pa rnams la za ba ste/klu la nam mkha' lding dang mtshungs so//'di dag ni byis pa rnams la 'cha' ba
154b4(mdo sde): ste/gru bo che la chu srin chen po dang mtshungs so//'di dag ni byis pa rnams la 'joms pa ste/'gron po la tshim po mang po dang mtshungs so//'di dag ni byis pa rnams la 'jig pa ste/shing sA
154b5(mdo sde): la la rlung dmar chen po dang mtshungs so//'di dag ni byis pa rnams la gsod pa ste/skye bo la sbrul mig gdug pa dang mtshungs so//byis pa rnams ni ro myang ba'i 'du shes kyis chod pa ste/ral
154b6(mdo sde): gri'i sau sbrang rtsis bskus pas chod pa bzhin no//'od dag ni byis pa rnams khyer nga ste/shing gi phung po chu bo'i chus khyer ba dang mtshungs so//'di dag ni byis pa rnams rtsen pa ste/byis pa chung
154b7(mdo sde): du rang gi gcin rtuge la rtse ba dang mtshungs so//'di dag ni bos pa rnams kun tu sgyur ba ste/glang po che la lcags kyu dang mtshungs so//'di dag ni byis pa rnams la slu ba ste/g.yon can gyis
155a1(mdo sde): byis pa'i rang bzhin can dag brid pa bzhin no//'di dag ni byis pa de dag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba zad par byed pa ste/brgyan po la dga' ba'i nor dang mtshungs so//'di dag gis
155a2(mdo sde): byis pa rnams la 'chos pa ste/srin mo rnams kyis tshong pa 'chos pa dang mtshungs so//byang chub sems dpa' rnam pa sum cu rtsa gnyis po 'di dag gis btsun mo'i 'khor la yongs su
155a3(mdo sde): brtag pa byas nas/lus la mi gtsang ba'i 'du shes rnam par sgom/mi mthun pa'i 'du shes nye bar sgrub/smad pa'i 'du shes skyed/rang gi lus la'ang de dang 'dra bar rnam par sgom//
155a4(mdo sde): lus kyi nyes dmigs yang dag par mthong /lus la lus su mngon par zhen pa las spyod/sdug pa'i 'du shes rnam par 'jig/mi sdug pa'i 'du shes 'jug par byed/'og
155a5(mdo sde): gi rkang pa'i mthil nas steng gi klad pa man chad mi gtsang ba las byung ba dang /mi gtsang ba las gyur pa dang /rtag tu mi gtsang ba zag par mthong ngo //de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag
155a6(mdo sde): kyang smras so//lus kyi zhing las skyes shing sred pa'i tshu las byung ba 'jig tshogs ming du btags//mchi ma rdul dang mchil mas brlan la gcin gyis bsgyur cing khrag gi thigs pas
155a7(mdo sde): gang //zhag dang rnag dang lgang pa dang ni klad rgyas dag dang sdig pa rnams kyis gang //rtag tu ngan skyugs zag cing kun kyang dri ma rnam pa sna tshogs tha dad pa//pags dang so dang skra dang sru
155b1(mdo sde): yis bsgyur cing pags pas g.yogs la spu dang ldan//rgyu ma mchin pa mtshar pa chu ser kha chu 'di dag bsags pa nyam pa chung ba//rkang dang chu rgyus dag gi sbrel te 'khrul 'khor 'dra zhing sha yis
155b2(mdo sde): mdzes par byas//sna tshogs nad kyis gang zhing mya ngan khyab la bkres dang skom pas kun tu nyin//skye ba po dag lus ni bu ga mang zhing 'chi dang rga ba'i gnas gyur pa//mthong nas mkhas pa su
155b3(mdo sde): zhig rang gi lus la dgra dang mtshungs par sems mi 'gyur//de ltar byang chub sems dpa' lus la lus su song ba'i dran pas gnas par gyur to//nam mkha'i dkyil na 'khod pa'i lha'i bu
155b4(mdo sde): rnams kyis lha'i bu chos spyod la 'di skad ces smras so//grogs po don grub 'di ni btsun mo'i 'khor la rnam par lta zhing 'dzum yang ston//sems ni mi dga' mig ni phyir zhing lta na phyi shol byed
155b5(mdo sde): dam ci//yang na 'di ni rgya mtsho'i zabs dang mtshungs te 'di tshad bzung bar mi nus so//yang na chags pa med pa 'di yul rnams la chags par mi 'gyur grang //lha rnams kyis bskul ba/
155b6(mdo sde): yi yi dam brjes par ma gyur grang //lha'i du chos spyod kyis smras pa/de skad smra ci dgos/'di sngon byang chub kyi phyir spyod pa na'ang mngon par 'byung ba dang /gtong ba la rnam pa de lta bur
155b7(mdo sde): chags pa med par gyur pa de khyed la mngon sum du gyur pa yin na/da srid pa tha ma pa la gnas pa chags par mi 'gyur ba lta smos kyang ci dgos/dge slong dag de nas byang chub sems dpa'
156a1(mdo sde): nges par byas pa/yid byung bar gyur pa/blo brtul ba/tshul du shis shing rings thabs med par skyil mo krung bshig ste/glu dbyangs len pa'i khang bzang na shar phyogs
156a2(mdo sde): su lta zhing 'dug nas log pa g.yas pas rin po che'i dra ba smad de/khang bzang gi steng du song nas sor mo bcu thal mo sbyar te/sangs rgyas thams cad bsams nas sangs rgyas thams
156a3(mdo sde): cad la phyag 'tshal te/nam mkha'i dkyil du bltas pa dang des mthong ba/nam mkha'i dkyil na lha'i dbang po mig stong dang ldan pa lha brgya stong gis bskor cing /me tog dang /spos dang /
156a4(mdo sde): phreng ba dang /byug pa dang /phye ma dang /gos dang /gdugs dang /rgyal mtshan dang /ba dan dang /me tog gi rna rgyan dang /rin po che'i do shal gyi chun po thogs te/lus btud nas
156a5(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal zhing 'dug pa mthong ngo //'jig rten skyong ba bzhi'ang gnod sbyin dang srin po dang dri za dang klu'i tshogs kyis bskor cing go cha sra ba bgos/ral gri dang /

156a7(mdo sde): la phyag 'tshal zhing 'dug pa mthong ngo //lha'i bu nyi ma dang zla ba gnyis kyang glo g.yas g.yon na 'dug par mthong ngo //skar ma'i bdag po rgyal yang nam phyed na shar bar mthong ngo //mthong
156b1(mdo sde): nas kyang byang chub sems dpas 'dun pa la smras pa/da yis bkra shis 'di ni don kun grub//dra mo gdon mi za bar don grub kyis//'dun pa phyi shol mu byed la gong du//rta rgyal rgyan gyis btsun
156b2(mdo sde): pang la byon//de nas 'dun pas tshig da thos nas/yid mi dga' zhing 'di skad ces smras so//smin ma ring zhing pad+ma'i 'drab mi rgyas 'dra'i spyan mnga'i mi yi song gi ston ka'o zla ba nya ba lta bu dang //

157a3(mdo sde): da ni gling bzhi'i dbang phyug 'khor los sgyur//nor bdun dang ni rab tu ldan par 'gyur//gal te 'jig rten sdug bsngal bltas nas ni//btsun mo'i 'khor spangs mngon par byung 'gyur na/

158b6(mdo sde): kyis ma bsngags pa/mi mkhas pa rnams kyis yongs su brdung ba/byis pa rnams kyis bsten pa yin no//de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di'ang smras so//mkhas pa rnams kyis sbrul gyi

160b1(mdo sde): yang 'dun pa nga ni sdug bsngal mya ngan dgon pa'i 'khor bar gnas pa nyon mongs gdug pas dkrugs shing nyam ngas rtag tu khyer te mgon med skyabs med cing //gti mug ma rig mun pa

161b4(mdo sde): so//de na dri za'i bdag po rgyal po chen po yul 'khor srung ni dri za bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du ma dag dang lhan cig tu sil snyan dang glu dbyangs sna tshogs len cing shar phyogs nas 'ongs
161b5(mdo sde): par gyur te/'ongs nas kyang ser skya'i gnas kyi grong khyer chen po la bskor ba byas te/ji ltar 'ongs pa'i shar phyogs nyid du gnos nas byang chub sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal
161b6(mdo sde): zhing 'dug go/rgyal po chen po 'phags skyes po ni grul dum mu tig gi do shal sna tshogs lag na 'phyang ba/nor bu rin po che sna tshogs thogs pa/spos chu sna tshogs kyis gang
161b7(mdo sde): ba'i bum pa thogs pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du ma dag dang lhan cig tu lho phyogs nas 'ongs por gyur te/'ongs nas kyang ser skya'i gnas kyi grong khyer chen po la bskor ba
162a1(mdo sde): byas te/ji ltar 'ongs pa'i lho phyogs nyid du gnas nas/byang chub sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal zhing 'dug go//rgyal po chen po mig mi bzang ni klu mu tig gi do shal sna tshogs lag
162a2(mdo sde): na 'phyang ba/nor bu rin po che sna tshogs thogs pa/spos kyi phye ma dang me tog gi char gyi sprin kun nas slong ba'i rlung dal zhing dri zhim pa sna tshogs gtong ba bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du ma dag dang lhan cig/
162a3(mdo sde): tu nub phyogs nas 'ongs par gyur te/'ongs nas kyang ser skya'i gnas kyi grong khyer chen po la bskor ba byas te/ji ltar 'ongs pa'i nub phyogs nyid du gnas nas/byang chub sems dpa' la
162a4(mdo sde): phyag 'tshal zhing 'dug go/rgyal ngo chen po lus ngan ni gnod sbyin nor bu rin po che skar ma'i 'od zer thogs pa/lag na mar me thogs pa/sgron ma 'bar ba lag ni thogs pa/mda' gzhu
162a5(mdo sde): dang /ral gri dang /mdung thung dang /mtshon rtse gnyis pa dang /rtse gsum pa dang /'khor lo dang /mtshon rtse gcig pa dang /'phang mdung la sogs pa mtshon cha sna tshogs thogs pa/go/cha dang
162a6(mdo sde): yalang sra ba bgos pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du ma dag dang lhan cig tu byang phyogs nas 'ongs par gyur te/'ongs nas kyang ser skya'i gnas kyi grong khyer chen po la bskor ba byas te/
162a7(mdo sde): ltar 'ongs pa'i byang phyogs nyid du gnas nas/byang chub sems dpa' lo phyag 'tshal zhing 'dug go/lha'i dbang po brgya byin yang sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha/lha'i me tog dang /spos
162b1(mdo sde): dang /phreng ba dang /byug pa dang /phye ma dang /gos dang /gdugs dang /rgyal mtshan dang /ba dun dang /me tog na rgyun dang /rgyan thogs pa rnams dang /lhan cig tu 'ongs par
162b2(mdo sde): gyur te/'ongs nas kyang ser skya'i gnas kyi grong khyer chen po la bskor ba byas te/ji ltar 'ongs pa'i steng gi bar snang la 'khor dang bcas te/byang chub sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal
162b3(mdo sde): zhing 'dug go/dge slong dag de ltar 'dun pas byang chub sems dpa'i tshig thos nas/mig mchi mas grang zhing byang chub sems dpa' la 'di skad ces smras so//rdo jo khyod ni dus mkhyen
162b4(mdo sde): pa/tshod mkhyen pa/ran pa mkhyen pa lags ni/da ltar ni bzhud pa'i dus dang tshod ma lags na/ci'i slad du bka' de skad stsal/byang chub sems dpas smras pa/'dun pa de ni dus
162b5(mdo sde): la bab bo//smras pa/rdo jo gang gi dus la bab/byang chub sems dpas smras pa//sems can rnams kyi don no tshol ba na//byang chub rga shi med pa'i gnas thob nas//'gro ba dgrol
162b6(mdo sde): zhes nga yis yun ring nas//smon lam btab pa de yi dus la bab//'di la 'di ni chos nyid de//de la 'di skad ces bya'o//sa bla ba dang bar snang dri bzhin skyong //lha dbang brgya byin
162b7(mdo sde): rang gi phyogs dang bcas//'thab bral lha dang dga' ldan 'phrul dga' dang //gzhan 'phrul dbang byed lha rnams brtson par gyur//klu rgyal chu lha dang ni gzi can dang //ma dros pa dang
163a1(mdo sde): de bzhin rgya mtsho yang //mi mchog mngon par byung ba'i dus bab pas//de dag rnams kyang mchod phyir brtson par gyur//gang dag gzugs na spyod pa'i lha rnams drang
163a2(mdo sde): rtag tu bsam gtan spyod yul rab zhi spyad//de dag rnams kyang 'jig rten gsum mchod pa//mi mchog de la mchod phyir mngon par brtson//sngon spyad spyod tshe grogs por gyur pa yi//
163a3(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa'i phyogs bcur lpags pa yang //rgyal ba mngon par 'byung ba lta byed cing //rjes su mthun pos mchod pa bya snyam byed//gsang ba'i bdag po bdag nyid chen
163a4(mdo sde): po de rdo rje 'bar thogaso nam mkha'i dkyil na gnas//lus la go bgos stobs brtson rtsal dang ldan//gsang ba lag na rdo rje 'bar po thogs//lha'i bu nyi ma zla ba de gnyis
163a5(mdo sde): kyang na g.yas dang g.yon na rab tu gnas par gyur//sor mo bcu yi thal mo sbyar byas te//mngon par 'byung la rjes su rtog par byed//skar ma rgyal de 'khor dang bcas pa yang
163a6(mdo sde): rang gi lus ni rgya chen sprul byas te//mi yi dam pa dri yi mdun 'dug nus//yid du 'ong ba'i sgra ni rab 'byin te//sgrar ma rgyal ldan bzhud pa'i dus la bab//do mod khyod dge bkra
163a7(mdo sde): shis thams cad grub//bdag kyang khyod dang thabs cig mchi bar bgyi//'dod chags sel ba bar chod 'byung mi 'gyur//lha'i bu yang dag srul pos bskul byas pa//stobs
163b1(mdo sde): dang brtson 'grus 'phags pa myur du bzhengs//sdug bsngal nyan pa'i sems can thams cad sgrol//de ni mngon par 'byung ba'i dus la bab//lha rnams bye ba stong phrag mang po yang //yid
163b2(mdo sde): 'od me tog char pa 'bebs shing lhags//de ni skyil mo krung bcas mchog la 'dud//lha yos bskor cing mdzes la gza brjid 'bar//grong khyer na ni smyos pa bud med khye'u dang bu mo gang
163b3(mdo sde): yod pa//de dag thams cad yid ngal gyur nas nyal te spyod lam rnams las nyams//rta dang glang po ba lang ne tso khrung khrung rma bya ri skegs rnams//de dag rnams kyang yid ngal myur du nyal
163b4(mdo sde): te de dag gzugs mi mthong //shAkya'i bu gang rdo rje sra bo mtshon cha rtse gnyis thogs bkod dang //glang chen rta dang shing rta rta bobs mchog drung bkod pa de dag nyal//rgyal po rgyal bu rgyal
163b5(mdo sde): po'i skye bo kun kyang gnyid kyis log par gyur//bud med tshogs rnams gnyid log gos bral gcer bur gyur kyang yong ma tshor//de ni tshangs dbyangs yid du 'ong tshig ka la ping+ge'i sgra dbyangs
163b6(mdo sde): kyis//nam phyed 'das te nam gyi dpung la bab nas 'dun pa de la smras//'dun pa rna po bsngags ldan bzang po legs brgyan legs par nga la byon//gal te nga la byams par soms na
163b7(mdo sde): bgegs ma byed par myur du byin//'dun pas tshig thos mchi mas mig gang rang gi jo bo de la smras//sems can kha lo sgyur mchog gar bzhud bcibs pas khyod la ci zhig bgyi//dus
164a1(mdo sde): mkhyen cing ni chod mkhyen chos spyod gang du'ang gshegs pa'i dus ma lags//khyod kyi sgo bkum gtan pa dam stsal su'ang chab sgo 'byed mi 'gyur//brgya byin gyi ni yid kyi sems
164a2(mdo sde): pa'i dbang gis sgo yang bye bar gyur//'dun pas de 'dra mthong nas dga' zhing sdug bsngal de ni mchi ma 'khor//kyi hud bdag grogs su yod ji ltar bya zhing phyogs ni gar brgyug snyam//gzi brjid
164a3(mdo sde): ldan pas drag shul can gyi tshig smras brgya byin 'ba' zhig zos//yan lag bzhi ldan dpung dang bcas pa 'di yang 'di na ci zhig byed//rgyal po rgyal bu rgyal po'i skye bo de dag rnams kyis 'dir chos
164a4(mdo sde): bud med tshogs kyang gnyid log lha rnams kyis ni grags ldan gnyid log byas//kyi hud 'di yis sngon chad bsams pa'i smon lam thams cad grub gyur cig/lho stong bye ba de dag dga' ba'i yid
164a5(mdo sde): kyis 'dun pa de la smras//'dun pa rta mchog bsngags ldan legs par phul cig 'dren pa skyom bya//lha dang lha min dag gis rnga dung rdza rnga rol mo khrag khrig byas//'on kyang ltas bskal
164a6(mdo sde): ba yi grong khyer mchog 'di sad par yod ma gyur//'dun pa bar snang dri ma med la lha yi 'od rab mdzes la ltos//khyod kyis byang chub sems dpa' bye ba mang po mchod phyir gang lhags
164a7(mdo sde): ltos//bdi sogs khyim zab brgya byin dpung 'i skor sgron mdzes par 'dug pa dang //lha dang lha min mi 'am ci tshogs gang dgo mchod phyir lhags lo ltos//'dun pa des kyang lha
164b1(mdo sde): tshig de thos bsngags ldan rta po de la smras//sems can kha lo sgyur mchog 'di bzhud khyod ni rta skad sgrogs shring shog/de yis dbyar gyi kha dog can de rmig pa gser gyis brgyan byas nas/
164b2(mdo sde): yid mi dga' bzhin yon tan rgya mtsho mnga' ba'i bcibs paro dbul ba byas//mtshan mchog mnga' zhing phan mdzad khyod kyi tshobs 'di rigs bzang dge ba lags//khyod kyis sngon
164b3(mdo sde): chad gang dgongs smon lam de grub gyur cig gshegs su gsol//gang dag bgegs bgyid zhi bar gyur cig dgongs pa'i brtul zhugs grub gyur cig/'gro ba kun la bde dang mtho
164b4(mdo sde): ris pa dang zhi ba sbyin gyur cig/de ni gang che mal nas langs tshe sa 'di thams cad rnam drug g.yos//rta rgyal dam pa zla ba nya pa'i dkyil 'khor 'dra ba de la zhon//skyong ba'i lag pa rnam
164b5(mdo sde): dag pad+ma dri med 'dra bas rta mchog bteg/brgya byin tshangs pa de gnyis de yi mdun na lam ni 'di zhes ston//de yis gsal ba dri ma med pa'i 'od btang sa rnams snang bas gsal//de tshe
164b6(mdo sde): ngan song kun zhi sems can bde ldan nyon mongs gnod pa med//me tog char bab sil snyan bye ba sgra byung lha dang lha min bstod//thams cad dga' dang ldan nas grong khyer mchog la
164b7(mdo sde): bskor ba byas te dong //skyes bu chen po song bas grong khyer dam pa'i lha yang yid ni dman par gyur nas 'ongs//mdun du 'dug nas snying rjer ngu ba'i yid ldan de yis pad+ma 'dra ba'i
165a1(mdo sde): bzhin la smras//khyod bral sgren mor mi mdzes sa 'di grong khyer thams cad mun pas kun tu dkrugs par gyur//do mod khyod kyis khab 'di spangs na bdag la dga'
165a2(mdo sde): bde bgyid pa 'ga' ma mchis//slan chad pa tshogs rnams kyis skra dag dang //grags pa mtha' yas khyod ni sad bgyid pa'i//btsun mo'i 'khor gyi gling du snyan pa dang //bkra
165a3(mdo sde): shis sgra dang glu sgra thos mi 'gyur//nyon mongs bcom pa khyod ni gshegs gyur na//gdugs mtshan khyod la mchod pa bgyid pa yi//lha dang grub tshogs slan chad mthong mi 'gyur//
165a4(mdo sde): lha yi dri yang smon chad snom mi 'gyur//phreng ba btags nas zhag lon gyur pa ltar//khyod kyis do mod pho brang de bzhin spangs//khyod bzhud slan chad gzi brjid dpal ma mchis//gar
165a5(mdo sde): la lta ba bzhin du bdag la gda'//grong khyer kun gyi byin dang stobs phrogs te//'di ni dgon pa 'dra zhing mdzes ma lags//gang gis sa 'dir 'khor lo stobs can du//lung
165a6(mdo sde): bstan drang srong tshig ni deng brdzun gyur//bsod nams sdong po chen po khyod byung na//sa 'dir shAkya'i stobs ni stobs ma mchis//rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor 'dir gdung yang 'chad//
165a7(mdo sde): shAkya'i tshogs 'di bsam pa rab tu nyams//dri med dri bral khyod ni gar bzhud par//bdag kyang khyod dang lhan cig mchi bar bgyi//'on kyang thugs brtse thugs rje bskyed nas
165b1(mdo sde): ni//khyod kyis pho brang 'di la gzigs su gsol//blo gros ldan pa khyim la bltas nas ni//snyan pa'i nga ros 'di skad tshig smras te//skye 'chi mthar 'byin ma thob bar du ni//nga yis ser
165b2(mdo sde): skye'i grong khyer 'jug mi bya//rga shi med pa'i gnas mchog 'chi med pa/byang chub dam pa nga yis ma thob par//nga ni ser skya'i gnas su mngon phyogs te//'greng 'dug nyal dang
165b3(mdo sde): 'chag pa mi bya'o//gong tshe 'gro ba'i gtso bo pa//byang chub sems dpa' do byung zhing //de ni mkha' las 'gro ba'i tshe//lha yi bu mo rnams kyis bstod//'di ni sbyin pa'i gnas
165b4(mdo sde): chen yin//'di ni bsod nams zhing chen yin//'di ni bsod nams 'dod pa'i zhing //'chi med 'bras bu sbyin mdzad pa//sems can rnams la thugs rje bas//'di yis bskal
165b5(mdo sde): pa bye mang du//sbyin dang dul dang sdom pa yis//'dis ni byang chub yang dag bsgrubs//'di yi tshul khrims yongs su dag/brtul zhugs bzang zhing spyod ma nyams//'dod pa
165b6(mdo sde): dag dang longs spyod rnams//don du mi gnyer tshul khrims srung //sems can yongs su bskyab pa'i phyir//'di ni rtag tu bzod pa gsung //yan lago nying lag bcad gyur kyang //
165b7(mdo sde): khro ba mi mnga' sdang mi mnga'//'di na rtag tu brtson 'grus ldan//bskal pa bye bar skyo mi mnga'o//'di yis byang chub yang dag bsgrubs//mchod sbyin dag ni bye ba mdzad//'di rtag
166a1(mdo sde): bsam gtan bsam gtan pa//thugs ni zhi zhing rab tu zhi//nyon mongs thams cad bsregs nas ni//sems can bye ba 'grol bar 'gyur//'di ni shes rab chags mi
166a2(mdo sde): mnga'//rtog dang rnam par rtog ldan las//grol zhing thugs ni rnam grol te//rang byung ba yi rgyal bar 'gyur//'di ni rtag tu byams thugs ldan//thugs rje yi ni pha rol byon//
166a3(mdo sde): dga' dang btang snyoms bsam gtan pa//tshangs pa'i lam gyi cho ga mkhyen//'di ni shin tu lha yi lha//lha rnams kyis ni mchod pa'i 'os//thugs dge dag cing dri ma bral//yon
166a4(mdo sde): tan khrag khrig pha rol byon//'jigs pas nyen pa rnams kyi skyabs//mig med rnams kyi sgron ma ste//gnod pa rnams kyi skabs kyang lags//rid nas na ba'i sman pa lags///
166a5(mdo sde): rgyal po dam pa chos kyi rgyal//dbang po lta bur spyan stong mnga'//tshangs pa lta bur rang byung gyur//lus dang sems ni rab sbyangs pa//brtan zhing shes rab rab tu mang //dpa'
166a6(mdo sde): zhing thugs ni 'dod chags bral//nyon mongs 'joms pas dpa' bo ste//ma rgyal dgra las rgyal ba lags//seng ge lta bur bsnyengs pa spangs//glang po lta bur rab dul
166a7(mdo sde): thugs//khyu mchog lta bur tshogs kyi gtso//bzod de 'khrug pa rab tu spangs//zla ba lta bur rab tu gsal//nyi ma lta bur snang ba mdzad//sgron ma lta bur gsal mdzad
166b1(mdo sde): pa//skar ma lta bur mun pa bral//pad+ma lta bur chags mi mnga'//me tog lta bur khrims dri gda'//ston pa lhun po ltar mi g.yo//dog sa lta bur gsos su gyur//rin chen 'byung gnas
166b2(mdo sde): ltar mi 'khrugs//'di ni phung po'i bdud las rgyal//'di ni 'chi bdag bdud las rgyal//'di ni lha yi bdud kyang bcom//'di ni ded dpon chen po ste//lam ngan ngag na gnas rnams
166b3(mdo sde): la//yan lag brgyad pa lam gyi mchog/ring por mi thogs ston par 'gyur//rga shi nyon mongs 'jom pa po//mun pa rab rib rnam par grol//sa dang lha yul grags pa yi//rang
166b4(mdo sde): byung rgyal bar byon pa lags//skyes bu mchog gi gzugs mnga' ba//dpag tu med la bstod pas bstod//khyod la bstod pa'i bsod nams des//smra ba'i seng ge 'dra bar shog/dge
166b5(mdo sde): slong dag de ltar byang chub sems dpa' mngon par byung nas shAkya'i yul dang /ke'u ta'i yul dang /gyad yul las 'das te me ne ya'i yul gyi grong rdal rjes su dpag pa zhes bya ba nas
166b6(mdo sde): dpag tshad drug tu byang chub sems dpa' phyin pa dang na ma nangs par gyur to//de nas byang chub sems dpa' rta bsngags ldan las babs te sa la 'dug nas/lha dang /klu dang /gnod
166b7(mdo sde): sbyin dang /dri za dang /lha ma yin dang /nam mkha' lding dang /mi 'am ci dang /lto 'phye chen po'i tshogs chen po slar bkye'o//slar bkye nas kyang de 'di snyam du sems te/rgyan 'di
167a1(mdo sde): dag dang rta bsngags ldan yang 'dun pa'i lag tu gtad de slar btang ngo snyam mo//de nas byang chub sems dpas 'dun pa la bos te 'di skad ces smras so//'dun pa khyod
167a2(mdo sde): song la rgyan 'di dag dang rta bsdigs ljin khyer te slar log cig/sa phyogs grang nas 'dun pa slar legro pa der mchod rten brtsigs te/dong sang du'ang mchod rten de la 'dun po slar
167a3(mdo sde): log pa'i mchod rten zhes grags pa yin no//yang byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du sems te/ji ltar na gtsug phud kyang yod la rab tu byung ba zhes bya bar yang 'gyur snyam nas
167a4(mdo sde): des ral gris gtsug phud bcad de bar snang la bor po dang /de sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyis mchod pa'i phyir blangs te/dang sang du'ang sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams
167a5(mdo sde): gtsug phud kyi dus ston byed do//der mchod rten yang byas te/drang sang du'ang mchod rten de gtsug phud blangs pa'i mchod rten zhes ming du chags so//yang byang chub sems
167a6(mdo sde): dpa' 'di snyam du sems te/rab tu byung yang gos ka shi pa gyon pa ji ltar rung gis gal te nags tshal gyi gnas nas tshul dang mthun pa'i gos shig rnyed na ni leg so so snyam du
167a7(mdo sde): bsams pa dang /de nas gnas gcing ma'i ris kyi lha rnams 'di snyam du sems te/byang chub sems dpa' la ngur smrig dgos par gyur to snyam mo//de na lha'i bu gcig cig
167b1(mdo sde): lha'i gzugs nimi mngon par byas te/rngam pa'i gzugs lta bus gos ngur smrig bgros nas byang chub sems dpa'i mdun du phyin to//de nas byang chub sems dpas de la 'di skad ces smras so//
167b2(mdo sde): gal te grogs po khyod kyis gos ngur smrig rnams kho bo la byin na/kho bo'i gos ka shi pa 'di rnams kyang khyod la sbyin no//des smras pa/gos 'od dag kyang khyod la mdzes la/'o ni rnams kyang kho
167b3(mdo sde): bo la mdzes so//byang chub sems dpas smras pa/kho bos khyod la bslang ngo //de nas lha'i bu rngon pa'i gzugs lta bu des gos ngur smrig rnams byang chub sems dpa' la byin te/gos ka shi pa
167b4(mdo sde): rnams kyang blangs so//de nas lha'i bu des mos pa bskyed de lag pa gnyi ga sa gos de dag blangs nas spyi bo la bzhag ste/de dag la mchod pa dang bkur sti bya ba'i phyir de nyid nas lha'i 'jig rten du song ngo ///
167b5(mdo sde): de'ang 'dun pas mthong bar gyur nas des mchod rten brtsigs te/deng sang du'ang mchod rkyen de ngur smrig blangs pa zhes ming du chags so//gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpas gtsug phud bcad nas
167b6(mdo sde): gos ngur smrig rnams bgos pa de'i tshe/lha'i bu brgya stong dga' zhing mgu la tshim zhing yi rangs te/mchog tu rab tu dga' nas/dga' ba dang yid bde ba skyes te/kye grags po dag gzhon
167b7(mdo sde): nu don grub rab tu byung ngo //de ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar 'gyur te/sems can skye ba'i chos can
168a1(mdo sde): grangs med pa dag skyeb pas yongs su 'grol bar 'gyur ba nas/rga ba dang /'chi ba dang /na ba dang /mya ngan dang /smre sngags 'don pa dang /sdug bsngal ba dang /yid ma
168a2(mdo sde): bde ba dang /'khrug bdag las sems can rnams yongs su bkrol te/'khor ba'i rgya mtsho'i pha rol tu bsgral nas/bde ba 'jigs pa med pa/mya ngan med pa/gnod pa med
168a3(mdo sde): pa/Nazhi ba/rdul dang bral ba/'chi ba med pa'i chos kyi dbyings la 'god par 'gyur ro zhes nas/a la la zhes bya ba dang /ca co dang ga zha'i sgra skad phyung bar gyur to//sgra de'ang gcig
168a4(mdo sde): nas gcig tu rgyud nas 'og min gyi gnas kyi bar du grags par gyur to//de nas btsun mo'i 'khor rnams kyis gzhon nu ma mthong nas/dpyid dang dgun dang dbyar gnas pa'i khang
168a5(mdo sde): bzang rnams dang /khri rnams dang /khyim rnams su 'tshol zhing gang gi tshe ma rnyed pa de'i tshe gcig tu 'dus nas/bya ku ra ra mo bzhin dud mo 'thon par gyur to//de na bud med
168a6(mdo sde): kha cig ni shin tu mya ngan gyis nyam thag nas/khwa cig ni kyi hud bu zhes 'dzer cing ngu'o//kha cig ni kyi hud ming po zhes 'dzer cing ngu'o//kha cig ni kyi hung khyim thab ces 'dzer to//
168a7(mdo sde): kha cig ni jo bo zhes 'dzer to//kha cig ni sdug pa'i tshig sna tshogs smra'o//kha cig ni lus rdeb cing ngu'o//kha cig ni mgo 'bal lo//kha cig ni gcig gi gdong du gcig lta zhing
168b1(mdo sde): du'o//kha cig ni mig bsgyur cing ngu'o//kha cig ni lag pa brla la rdeb cing du'o//kha cig ni brang rdung zhing ngu'o//kha cig ni lag pa dpung par rdeb cing ngu'o//kha cig ni mgor rdung zhing ngu'o//kha cig
168b2(mdo sde): ni mgo la sa 'thor zhing dri'o//kha cig ni skra 'jig cing ngu'o//kha cig ni skra 'bal zhing ngu'o//kha cig ni lag pa bstod de bsgreng nas cho nge 'don to//kha cig ni ri dwags mo dug mdas phog pa
168b3(mdo sde): bzhin du blo bur du rgyug cing ngu'o//kha cig ni gdong gos kyis g.yogs shing ngu'o//kha cig ni chu shing rlung dmar gyis bskyod pa bzhin du lus 'khor zhing ngu'o//kha cig ni sa la 'gyel te ma
168b4(mdo sde): shi tsam du gyur to//kha cig ni nya chu nas bton pa bzhin du sa la 'gre ldog cing ngu'o//kha cig ni shing rtse nas byung ba bzhin du glo bur du sa la 'gyel nas ngu'o//sgra de'ang rgyal pos thos nas/
168b5(mdo sde): shAkya rnams la smras pa/ci'i phyir btsun mo'i 'khor na sgra chen po 'di grag/shAkya rnams kyis shes nas smras pa/rgyal po chen po gzhon nu btsun mo'i 'khor na mi gda' zhes gda'o//
168b6(mdo sde): rgyal pos smras pa/myur du grong khyer gyi sgo rnams chod la nang du gzhon nu tshol cig/de dag gis phyi nang du btsal kyang ma rnyed nas skye dgu'i bdag mo chen mo gau ta mi smre sngags 'don te/sa
168b7(mdo sde): la 'gre ldog cing rgyal po zas gtsang ma la 'di skad ces smras so//rgyal po chen po bdag bu dang myur du sprad du gsol//de nas rgyal pos phyogs bzhir pho nya rta pa bkye ste/khyed dang la
169a1(mdo sde): gzhon nu ma rnyed kyi bar du skar ma ldog cig/mtshan mkhan dang ltas mkhan rnams kyis kyang byang chub sems dpa' ni bkra shis kyi chab sgo nas mngon par
169a2(mdo sde): 'byung ngo zhes lung bstan nas de dag bkra shis kyi sgor dong ba dang /lam gyi bar zhig na me tog gi char 'bab paro mthong ngo //de nas de dag 'di snyam du sems te/gzhon nu ni
169a3(mdo sde): lam 'di nas byung ngo snyam nas de dag cung zad cig pha zad du song ba dang /lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa'i gos ka shi pa rnams mgo la thogs te 'gro ba de mthong nas de dag 'di snyam
169a4(mdo sde): du sems te/'di dag ni gzhon nu'i gos ka shi pa rnams yin na/gos 'di dag gi phyir 'dis gzhon du bsad de 'di dag khyer bar ma gyur tam snyam mo//de nas yang de dag
169a5(mdo sde): gis de'i phyi bzhin du 'dun pa rta bsngags ldan dang rgyan rnams thogs te 'ong ba mthong ngo //de nas de dag phan tshun du smras pa/kye 'dun pa rta bsngags ldan khrid de 'ong gis
169a6(mdo sde): de la ma dris kyi bar du hur 'dums ma byed cig ces smras nas/de dag gis 'dun pa la dris pa/kye 'dun pa gos ka shi pa 'di dag gi phyir mi 'dis gzhon nu bkrongs par ma
169a7(mdo sde): gyur grang /'dun pas smras pa/de lta ni ma yin te 'dis kyang gzhon nu la gos ngur smrig rnams phul lo//gzhon nus kyang na bza' kau shi pa 'di rnams 'di la byin no//de
169b1(mdo sde): nas lha'i bu des de dag mchod pa'i phyir gos de rnams lag pa gnyi gas spyi bo la thogs te/de nyid nas lha'i 'jig rten du song ngo //de dag gis yang 'dun pa la dris pa/'di la ji snyam
169b2(mdo sde): du sems/kho bo cag shAkya gzhon nu zlog tu dong na nus sam/des smras pa ni nus so//gzhon nu ni brtson 'grus dang brtul ba brtan pa ste/nga bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
169b3(mdo sde): byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs ma rgyas kyi bar du ser skya'i gnas kyi grong khyer chen por mi 'jug go zhes de de skad gsung bas phyir mi ldog ste/gzhon nus ji skad gsungs pa de de
169b4(mdo sde): bzhin du 'gyur ro//de ci'i phyir zhe na/gzhon nu ni brtson 'grus dang brtul ba brtan pas slar mo ldog go/de nas 'dun pa rta bsngags ldan dang rgyan rnams khyer te btsun mo'i 'khor
169b5(mdo sde): gyi nang du phyin to//de nas ring ba zhig lon pa dang /rgyan de dag shAkya gzhon nu bzang po dang /ming chen dang /ma 'gags pas bteg pa dang /sred med kyi bu chen po ltar mkhregs
169b6(mdo sde): pa dang /sred med kyi bu phyed ltar mkhrags pa'i rgyan de rnams de dag gis ma theg go//gang gi tshe de dag gang gis kyang theg par ma nus pa de'i tshe/skye dgu'i bdag mo chen mo gau ta mi 'di snyam
169b7(mdo sde): du sems te/bdag gis ji srid du rgyan 'di dag mthong ba de srid du bdag gi snying la mya ngan du 'gyur gyis/bdag gis rgyan 'di dag rdzing du dor ro snyam mo//de nas skye dgu'i bdag
170a1(mdo sde): mo chen mo gau tA mis rgyun de dag rdzing du bor te/deng sang dungang rgyun gyi b+h+ring zhes ming du chags so//de la 'di skad ces bya ste/gang che byang chub sems dpa' mkhas pa
170a2(mdo sde): dpa' bo byung //de tshe ser skya'i grong khyer pa dag mtha' dag sad//kun gyi snying la gzhon nu mal na nyal snyam sems//mgu zhing rab tu dga' nas phan tshun tshig kyang smra//sa 'tshom
170a3(mdo sde): dang de bzhin btsun mo'i 'khor rnams sad//mal du ltas na byang chub sems dpa' ma mthong nas//kyi hud bdag bslus byang chub sems dpa' gar bzhud ces//rgyal po'i khyim
170a4(mdo sde): du dud mo'i sgra yang byung bar gyur//rgyal pos sgra de thos nas so la 'gyel gyur te//e ma nga yi bu gcig pa zhes dud mi phyung //de nas de la bum pa'i chu thugs khrus byas naso//
170a5(mdo sde): shAkya mang po dag gis de ni dbugs kyang phyung //sa 'tsho ma yang mal nas sa la lhung bar gyur//skra rnams 'bal zhing rgyan rnams dag kyang bkrol bar gyur//sdug pa kun dang bral
170a6(mdo sde): pabaring por mi thogs zhes//'dren pas bdag la sngon gsungs kye ma legs par gsungs//gzugs ni gzugs bzang shin tu dri med yan lag spras//gsil zhing rnam dge 'gro/
170a7(mdo sde): ba rnams kyi yid 'ong sdug/dpal yon ldan pa bsngags pa lha mis mchod pa'i 'os//bdag ni mal du bor ta khyod ni gang du bzhud//yon tan mnga' ba'i byang chub sems dpa'
170b1(mdo sde): ma mthong bar//skom yang mi 'tshal rgyags pa rnams kyis rgyags mi bgyi//sa la nyal zhing ral pa rnams kyang thogs par bgyi//khrus bgyi spangs te brtul zhugs dka' thub spyad par
170b2(mdo sde): bgyi/skyed mos tshal kun lo ma me tog 'bras ma mchis//rnam dag se mo do yang mun rdul phyag dang 'dra//mi mchog dam pa khyod kyis spangs par gang gyur pa'i//grong khyer khyim rnams
170b3(mdo sde): mdzes po ma lags 'brog dang mtshungs//kyi hud glu dbyangs rab tu snyan pa'i sgra skad can//kyi hud lhag lhug pa yi rgyan thogs btsun mo'i 'khor//kyi hud gser gyi dro bas khyab pa'i
170b4(mdo sde): bar snang yang //yon tan ldan dang bral bas phyin chad mo blta'o//sru mo de yang shin tu sdug bsngal thob gyur cing //shAkya'i bu mo ma du zhig ces dbugs kyang 'byin//nga ni 'jig
170b5(mdo sde): rten dag na rga shi mthar byed ces//mi mchog dom pa des ni sngon yang smras pa yin//drang sring chen po dge ba stong dag spyad pa de//nam phyed nas ni dpag tshad drug tu song gyur nas/
170b6(mdo sde): 'dun pa de la rta mchog dang ni rgyan rnams btad//'dun pa 'di dag khyer la ser skya'i grong song zhig/yab dang yu mo dag la yang nga yi tshig gis ni//gzhon nu song gis slar zhing
170b7(mdo sde): thugs ngan ma mdzad cig/byang chub sangs rgyas nas ni slar 'dir mchi bar bgyi//chos rnams gsan nas thugs kyang zhi bar 'gyur zhes smos//'dun pa de bzhin 'dren pa la ni
171a1(mdo sde): slar smras pa//'dun pa legs ldan byang chub sems dpa' gar khrid ces//mi mchog gnyen gyi tshogs rnams bdag la rdeg 'gyur gyis//bdag la nus pa ma
171a2(mdo sde): mchis stobs dang mthu ma mchis//byang chub sems dpas slar smras 'dun pa ma 'jigs shig/nga yi gnyen gyi tshogs rnams dga' bar gyur nas ni//khyod la ston pa'i 'du
171a3(mdo sde): shes rtag tu bsgom gyur te//nga la byams pa bzhin du khyod la'ang byams par 'gyur//'dun pa rta mchog dang ni rgyan rnams khyer nas su//mi mchog dam pa de yi skyed mos tshal
171a4(mdo sde): du phyin//skyed mos tshal gyi srung ma dga' ba'i shugs skyes nas//kun tu dga' ba'i sgra ni shAkya rnams la smras//gzhon nu 'di yi rta mchog dang ni 'dun pa yang //skyed mos
171a5(mdo sde): tshal du phyin gyis thugs ngan ma mdzad cig/rgyal pos de skad thos nas shAkyas bskor nas ni//rab tu dga' ba'i shugs skyes skyed mos tshal du phyin//sa 'chos byang
171a6(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' blo gros brtan rig nas//tsha ga de la ni yid ma ches te dgar ma gyur//gzhon nu byang chub ma thob bar du phyir 'dir yang //byon cing ldog par 'gyur
171a7(mdo sde): ba de ni gnas ma yin//rgyal pos rta mchog dang ni 'dun pa de mthong nas//dud mi btab ste sa yi steng du 'gyel bar gyur//kyi hud nga'i bu gling bu rol mo sgra dbyangs mkhas///
171b1(mdo sde): rgyal srid thams cad bor te khyod ni gang du song //'dun pa khyod kyis nga la 'dir ni legs par smros//byang chub sems dpa' gar song sbyor ba ci 'dra zhig/sgo ni su yis phye zhing gang gis
171b2(mdo sde): khrid par gyur//lha tshogs rnams kyis de la mchod pa ji ltar byas//'dun pas smras pa rgyal po'i dbang po bdag la gson//dgrong phyed grong khyer byis pa rgan po gnyid log nas//
171b3(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dbyangs bdag la 'di skad du//'dun pa rta rgyal nga la myur du byin zhes gsung //bdag gis skyes pa'i tshogs dang bud med tshogs kyang bslang //de dag
171b4(mdo sde): log cing rab tu log pas tshig mo thos//bdag ni ngu zhing bdag gis chibs kyi rgyal po phul//phan pa mdzad pa gang du dgyes par gshegs zhes bgyis//brgya byin gyis ni 'khrul
171b5(mdo sde): 'khor ldan pa'i chab sgo phye//'jig rten skyong ba bzhis ni chibs kyi rkang lag btog/dpa' bo bcibs nas stong gsum lam rnams rab tu g.yos//nam mkha' shin tu yangs
171b6(mdo sde): pa 'di las gshegs gyur te//'od ni rob tu btang bas mun pa mun nag bsal//me tog bab cing sil snyan brgya dag sgra yang byung //lha dang de bzhin lha yi bu mo rnams kyis bstod//
171b7(mdo sde): nam mkha' las ni lha tshogs rnams kyis bskor te gshegs//'dun pa rta mchog dang ni rgyan rnams khyer nas su//da ni ngu zhing btsun mo'i 'khor du phyin pa dang //sa 'chos 'dun
172a1(mdo sde): pa de dang rta mchog mthong gyur nas//rab tu brgyal bar gyur te sa yi steng du 'gyel//bud med tshogs mang thams cad rab tu brtson par ni//chu dag blangs shing shAkya'i
172a2(mdo sde): bu mo 'khru bar byed//mya ngan rnyed pas 'chi ba'i dus byed gyur du 'ong //phangs pa gnyis dang bral bar 'gyur du 'ong snyam byed//shAkya'i bu mo sdug bsngal gyur pa mthu bskyed nas///
172a3(mdo sde): rtswa yi rgyal po rno mchog de yi mgul nas 'jus//sngon chad dga' bas rtse ba dag kyang dran byas nas//mya ngan gyur cing sna tshogs tshig kyang rab tu skye//kyi hud bdag gi dga' sbyad
172a4(mdo sde): kyi hud bdag gi mi mchog dri med zla ba'i zhal mnga' ba//kyi hud bdag gi gzugs mchog gzugs can gyi hud bdag gi mtshan mchog dri med gzi brjid ldan//kyi hud bdag gi
172a5(mdo sde): yan lag ma smad legs par 'khrungs pa rim gyis 'phags pa mnyam med pa//kyi hud bdag phra yon tan mchog ldan lha mis mchod pa thugs rje chen po mchog ldan pa/
172a6(mdo sde): hud bdag gi stobs ldan sred med bu yi mthu dang ldan pa dgra yi tshogs bcom pa//kyi hud bdag gi shin tu 'jam dbyangs ka la bing+ge'i sgra skad tshangs dbyangs snyan ldan pa//kyi hud
172a7(mdo sde): bdag gi grags pa mtha' yas bsod nams brgyas 'phags bsod nams rgya chen mnga' ba po//kyi hud bdag gi bsngags pa mtha' yas yon tan tshogaso brgyan drang srong tshogs
172b1(mdo sde): rnams dga' mdzad pa//kyi hud bdag gi nags mchog bung ba sgra 'byin lum+bi ni der bltams pa legs bltams pa//kyi hud bdag gi sgra grags lha mi rnams kyis mngon par mchod pa'i ye
172b2(mdo sde): shes sdong po che//kyi hud bdag gi ro bro dam pa bim+ba'i sgros can pad+mo'i spyan mnga' gser mdog 'dra//kyi hud bdag gi shin tu rnam dge tshoms ldan pa zho ba mo lta bu'i tshams ldan pa//kyi
172b3(mdo sde): hud bdag gi shangs legs smin lags smin mtshams bar na dri med mdzad spu gnas pa po//kyi hud bdag gi dpung mgo rab zlum gzhu 'dra'i rked pa e ne'i byin pa rked pa zlum//kyi hud
172b4(mdo sde): bdag gi glang po'i sna 'dra brla ldan phyag zhabs rnam dag mdzes pa'i sen mo can//de yi rgyan rnams 'di dag bsod nams dag gis byas pa rgyal po rab tu dga' byed pa//kyi hud bdag
172b5(mdo sde): gi grwa dang dbyangs sgra dam pa me tog byug pa bzang po dus bzang ba//kyi hud bdag gi me tog spos rnams glu len dag dang btsun mo'i 'khor ni dga' byed pa//kyi hud bsngags ldan
172b6(mdo sde): legs skyes nga yi khyim thab grogs pa yin na khyod kyis gang du khrid//kyi hud 'dun pa snying rje med pa mi yi dam pa bzhud tshe sbron cing slong ma phod//do mod grong khyer dam pa 'di nas mi yi
172b7(mdo sde): kha lo sbyor ba thugs rje ldan gshegs te//phan pa mdzad pa 'di ni gshegs zhes skabs der tshig gcig tsam zhig ce yi phyir ma smras//phan pa mdzad pa ji ltar gshegs shing rgyal
173a1(mdo sde): po'i pho brang 'di nas su yis phyung ba byas//grang gis phyogs gshegs nags tshal gel ba'i lha mo de yi grogs su gyur pa dpal yon ldan//'dun pa kho mo shin
173a2(mdo sde): tu sdug bsngal gter bstan nas ni mig phyung 'dra bas mig byin cig/'dun pa rgyal ba kun gyis pha dang ma dag mchod pa'i 'os zhes rtag tu bsngags mdzad na//de dag rnams kyang
173a3(mdo sde): spangs te byung na bud med 'dod pa'i dga' ba 'di lta smos ci dgos//kyi hud sdug pa rnams dang bral ba gar la lta ba'i rang bzhin 'dra ste rtag ma yin//byis pa 'du shes kyis bzung
173a4(mdo sde): lte ba phyin ci log pas skye dang 'chi 'pho gnas par gyur//de yis sngon yang rga shi ldan pa'i 'dus byas dag la grogs po 'ga' yang med ces bstan//khyod kyi dgongs pa yongs
173a5(mdo sde): su rdzogs nas shing mchog drung du byang chub dam pa mchog thob gyur//rdul med byang chub sangs rgyas nas ni grong khyed dam pa 'dir ni slar yang gshegs su gsol//'dun pa
173a6(mdo sde): de yang mchog tu yid mi dga' zhing sa 'tsho ma yi tshig ni thos gyur nas//de ni nga re 'thon cing tshig tu smras pa sa 'chi ma khyod bdag tshig legs par gson//nam gyi dgung
173a7(mdo sde): thun bud med tshogs rnams thams cad rab tu gnyid kyis log ste dben gyur pa//de yi tshe na bsod nams brgyas 'phags de yis bdag la bsngags ldan nga la byin zhes gsung //
173b1(mdo sde): de skad tshig thos nas ni de ma thag tu bdag gis khyod ni gzims mal gzims la bltas//de tshe khyod kyi sdug pa 'di ni gshegs kyis sa 'tsho bzhengs zhes sgra skad chen po phyung //lha yis
173b2(mdo sde): tshig de bklag par gyur pas bud med rnams las 'ga' tsam zhig kyang sad ma gyur//bdag ni rab tu dro zhing rta yi rgyal po brgyan pa bgyis nas mi mchog de la phul//bsngags ldan drag shul
173b3(mdo sde): can gyi gzi ldan sgra phyung de yi sgra ni rgyang grags tsam du grags//'on kyang lha yis gnyid kyis log par bgyis pas grong khyer pa las 'ga' yang sad ma gyur//gser dang dngul dang nor
173b4(mdo sde): bu rnams kyis g.yogs pa'i sa la bsngags ldan rkang lag rab tu brdabs//de las snyan dang 'jigs dang mdzes pa'i sgra byung 'on kyang mi las 'ga' tsam sad ma gyur//de yi bar skabs
173b5(mdo sde): skar ma rgyal dang ldan gyur zla ba skar ma dag kyang mkha' la gnas//mkha' las lha rnams bye ba thal mo sbyar te btud nas phyag kyang rab tu 'tshal//gnod sbyin srin po tshogs rnams nye bar
173b6(mdo sde): gnas shing 'jig rten skyong ba rdzu 'phrul che ldan bzhis//pad+ma'i za ba lta bur rnam dag dri med lag pas bsngags lhun gyi ni rkang lag btag/bsod nams gzi brjid brgyas 'phags
173b7(mdo sde): de yang ku mu da dang bar sho lta bu de la bcibs//sa ni rnam pa drug tu rab tu g.yos shing sangs rgyas zhing rnams dri med 'od kyis khyab//bde sogs khyim thabs brgya byin lha yi gtso
174a1(mdo sde): bo nyid kyis de tshe chab sgo dbye ba bgyis//de ni bya khrag khrig lha yis mdun du bdar te lha dang klu yis mchod nas gshegs//bsngags ldan gyis ni 'du shes
174a2(mdo sde): tsam gyis de na 'jig rten mgon po mkha' las bkur bar shes//lha dang lha ma yin tshogs dbang por bcas pa de dag bcibs te bde bar gshegs pa gshegs//lha yi bu
174a3(mdo sde): mo bla dbyangs mkhas pa rnams kyang byang chub sems dpa'i yon tan rab brjod cing //de dag bsngags ldan la yang stobs mthung byed cing snyan la yid du 'ong ba'i sgra yang 'byin//
174a4(mdo sde): bsngagaso ldan 'jig rten 'dren pa myur ba myur bar khyer la skyo ba mi dga' ma skyed cig/'jig rten mgon po mnyes par byas na khyod la 'jigs dang ngan song ngan 'gro med par
174a5(mdo sde): 'gyur//lha rnams re re zhing yang bdag la 'jig rten mgon po bcibaso par mngon du dga' bar gyur//yul sa 'od na bye ba lha yi rkang pa dag gis non par ma gyur cung
174a6(mdo sde): zad med//bsngags ldan nam mkha'i skabs na sna tshogs spras shing mdzes pa'i lam gnas rin chen stegs bu ni//rnam pa sna tshogs dag gis brgyan cing lha yi bdug pa snying
174a7(mdo sde): po mchog bdugs 'di le ltos//bsngags ldan dge ba'i las 'dis sum cu rtsa gsum lha gnas shin tu legs par sprul pa der//lha yi bu mos bskor cing mdun gyis bltas
174b1(mdo sde): la lha yi 'dod pa'i dga' bas dga' bar gyis//legs pa sa 'tsho ma khyod phyir zhing ma bshums dgyes par mdzad cing mchog tu dgyes par mdzod//mi mchog byang chub brnyes nas
174b2(mdo sde): lha yis mdun du bdar ba ring por mi thogs gzigs par 'gyur//sa 'tsho mi rnams gang dag legs pa'i las bgyis de dag rtag tu bshums par bgyi mA lags//de ni bsod
174b3(mdo sde): nams gzi brjid brgyas 'phags lags kyis dgyes par mdzad la bshums mo ma mdzad cig/rgyal po mngon par byung ba de na lha dang mis mchod pa yi bkod pa gang lags pa/
174b4(mdo sde): bkod pa de ni sa 'tsho bdag gis dpung bdun bar du brjod kyang rdzogs par brjod mi nus//khyod kyis 'gro la phan mdzad pa la bsnyen bkur mdzad pas brnyes mchog bsam gyis mi khyab
174b5(mdo sde): brnyes//bdag gis dasams na khyod kyang mi yi dam pa de ni ci 'dra de 'drar 'gyur snyam bgyid//mngon par 'byung ba'i le'u ste bco lnga pa'o///'phags pa rgya cher
174b6(mdo sde): rol pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo//bam po bcu gcig pa//dge slong dag de ltar byang chub sems dpa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis 'dren pas rgyal po zas gtsang ma dang /shAkya'i bu
174b7(mdo sde): mos 'tsho ma dang /btsun mo'i 'khor thams cad dang /shAkya'i tshogs thams cad kyi mya ngan bsang ba'i gtam smras so//dge slong dag de ltar byang chub sems dpas lha'i bu rngon
175a1(mdo sde): nga'i gzugs lta bu la glos ka shi pa rnams byin nas de la gos ngur smrig rnams blangs te/'jig rten dang mthun par bya ba dang /sems can la snying brtse ba dang /
175a2(mdo sde): sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir bdag nyid rab tu byung ngo //de nas byang chub sems dpa' bram ze rigs ldan gyi gnas gol ba der song ba dang /des byang chub sems
175a3(mdo sde): dpa' gnas par bya ba dang /zas la mgron du bos so//de nas byang chub sems dpa' bram ze pad+ma'i gnas su song ba dang /des kyang byang chub sems dpa' gnas par bya ba dang /
175a4(mdo sde): zas la mgron du bos so//de nas bram ze'i drang song nam gru'i gnas su song ba dang /des kyang de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' mgron du bos so//de bzhin du gdul ba'i the
175a5(mdo sde): con can gyi bu 'od ldan gyis kyang byang chub sems dpa' mgron du bos te/dge slong dag de ltar byang chub sems dpa' rim gyis grong khyer chen po yangs pa can du phyin to//de'i tshe
175a6(mdo sde): sgyu rtsal shes kyi bu ring 'phur nyan thos kyi dge 'dun chen po dang /slob ma su ma brgya dang lhan cig tu grong khyer yangs pa can du gnas bcas shing gnas te/de slob ma dag/
175a7(mdo sde): li ci'ang med pa'i skye mched kyi brtul zhugs dang mthun pa'i chos ston pa des byang chub sems dpa' rgyang ring po nas 'ong ba mthong nas ngo mtshar du gyur te slob ma rnams la smras pa/
175b1(mdo sde): kye 'di'i gzugs la ltos shig/de dag gis smras pa/de bzhin du de la blta bar bgyis te 'di ni ya mtshan che'o//dge slong dag de nas nga sgyu rtsal shes kyi bu ring 'phur ga la ba der song ste//
175b2(mdo sde): sgyu rtsal shes kyi bu ring 'phur la 'di skad ces smras so//kye sgyu rtsal shes kyi bu ring 'phur khyod las bdag gis tshangs par spyad pa spyod do//des smras pa/kye gau ta ma dad pa'i rigs kyi bus
175b3(mdo sde): gang la spyad na tshegs chung ngus kun shes pa thob par 'gyur ba'i chos bstan pa de lta bu la spyod cig/dge slong dag ngas 'di snyam du sems te/nga la mos pa'ang yod/nga la brtson 'grus/
175b4(mdo sde): kyang yod/dran pa'ang yod/ting nge 'dzin kyang yod/shes rab kyang yod kyis/chos de nyid thob par bya ba dang /mngon du bya ba'i phyir bdag gcig pu bag yod pa dang /brtun pa dang
175b5(mdo sde): dben par gnas par bya'o snyam nas/dge slong dag de nas nga gcig pu bag yod pa dang /brtun pa dang /dben par gnas nas/tshegs chung ngus chos de khong du chud cing mngon
175b6(mdo sde): du gyur to//dge slong dag de nas nga sgyu rtsal shes kyi bu ring 'phur ga la ba der song ste 'di skad ces smras so//kye ring 'phur khyod kyis chos 'di tsam zhig khong du chud cing mngon du gyur tam//
175b7(mdo sde): des smras pa/kye gau ta ma da de bzhin no//ngas smras pa/kye kho bos kyang chos de mngon du byas shing khong du chud do//des smos pa/kye gau ta ma de bas na chos gang kho bos shes pa de khyod
176a1(mdo sde): kyis shes la gang khyod kyis shes pa de'ang kho bos shes te/de bas na bdag cag gnyi gas slob ma'i tshogs 'di la bstan to//dge slong dag de nas sgyu rtsal shes kyi
176a2(mdo sde): bu ring 'phur gyis nga la mchod pa dam pas mchod de/nga slob ma rnams la'ang don mthun par byed du bcug go/dge slong dag ngas 'di snyam du bsams te/ring 'phur gyi chos
176a3(mdo sde): 'di ni nges par 'byung ba ma yin te/de byed pa yang dag par sdug bsngal zad par nges par 'byung ba ma yin gyis/bdag gis de las lhag pa zhig btsal zhing spyad do snyam mo//
176a4(mdo sde): dge slong dag de nas nga ji srid dga' ba'i bar du grong khyer yangs pa can du gnas nas/yul ma ga d+hAr yul rgyu zhing yul ma ga d+ha'i rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po ga lo ba der song ste/
176a5(mdo sde): ri'i rgyal po skya bo ga la ba der song nas/ri'i rgyal po skya bo de'i ngos la nga gcig pu gnyis su med cing grogs med par lha bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du mas bsrungs shing gnas so///
176a6(mdo sde): de nas da nang par sham thabs dang chos gos bgos/lhung bzed thogs te/chu dron can gyi sgo nas rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen por 'gro ba dang /ldog pa dang /mdun du lta ba
176a7(mdo sde): dang /g.yas g.yon du lta ba dang /bskum pa dang brkyang ba mdzes pa dang /snam sbyar dang /thang pa dang /lhung bzed dang /chos gos 'dzin pa mdzes pa dang /dbang po ma g.yongs
176b1(mdo sde): bapa dang /sprul pa bzhin du yid phyi rol tu ma byung ba dang /'bru mar gyis gang ba'i snod thogs pa bzhin gnya' shing gang tsam du lta zhing bsod snyoms kyi phyir zhugs so//de nas rgyal po'i khang
176b2(mdo sde): mi rnams kyis mthong nas ngo mtshar du gyur te/ci 'di tshangs pa yin nam/lha'i dbang po brgya byin nam/'on te rnam thos kyi bu 'am/'on te ri'i lho 'ga' zhig yin nam snyam mo//de la 'di
176b3(mdo sde): skad ces bya ste/de nas gzi brjid mtha' yas dri med ldan//byang chub sems dpa' bdag nyid rab byung ste//sems ni zhi zhing spyod lam rab dul bar//ri yi rgyal po skye bo'i ngos la gnas/
176b4(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpas nam nangs shes nas ni//mchog tu blta na mdzes par sham thabs bgos//lhung bzed thogs te dana' ba'i yid kyis su//de ni rgyal po'i khab tu bsod snyoms
176b5(mdo sde): zhugs//gser gyi sa le sbram bzhin rab dul la//sum cu rtsa gnyis mtshan gyi go bgos pa//skyes pa'i tshogs dang bud med kyis mthong na//su yang lta bas ngoms par mi 'gyur ro//
176b6(mdo sde): srang dag rin chen gos dang 'brus kyang brgyan//gang gi mthus ni grong khyer kun mdzes pa'i//sngon chod ma mthong sems can 'di su zhes//skye bo sel cing de yi phyi bzhin 'brang //bud med
176b7(mdo sde): stong dag khang pa'i steng 'dug cing //de bzhin sgo dang de bzhin skar khung dang //srang dag bkang ste khyim ni stong byas nas//de dag las gzhan med par mi mchog lha//skyes bu mchog
177a1(mdo sde): gi gzugs la lta ba'i cha//lto dang 'tshong ba dag kyang mi byed cing //chang dang can kyang chad ni mi 'thung la//khyim dang srang na 'dug par mi dga'o//rings par
177a2(mdo sde): mi zhig rgyal po'i khab song ste//de dga' rgyal po gzugs can snying po lo//grong 'dir tshangs pa bdag nyid bsod snyoms spyod//lha khyod brnyes pa dam pa brnyes zhes zer//kha
177a3(mdo sde): cig brgya byin lha yi rgyal zhes zer//gzhan dag 'thab bral lha yi bu zhes zer//de bzhin yongs su dga' ldan 'phrul pa dang //gzhan dag rab 'phrul lha yi bu zhes zer//kha
177a4(mdo sde): cig nyi ma zla ba de bzhin du//sgra gcan stobs ldan thags bzangs ris zhes zer//kha cig dag ni tshig kyang 'di skad du//ri rgyal skya la 'dug pa 'di yin zer//rgyal pos tshig
177a5(mdo sde): ni de dag thos gyur nas//yid ni mchog tu dga' zhing skar khung 'dug/shin tu sbyangs pa'i gser ltar dpal 'bar ba//byang chub sems dpa' sems can mchog mthong ngo ///
177a6(mdo sde): rgyal po gzugs can snying pos mi de la//bsod snyoms byin la gar song ltos zhes bsgo//ri yi mchog la de ni song mthong nas//kha cig ri yi ngos la de mchis smras//gzugs
177a7(mdo sde): can snying pos nam nangs shes nas ni//mi dbang skye bo mang pos yongs bskor te//ri yi rgyal po skya bo'i drung du song //ri de dpal ni rab tu 'bar bar mthong //gzhon pa las
177b1(mdo sde): ni babs te rkang gis song //ji ltar lhun po bzhin du mi g.yo zhing //rna bting steng na skyil mo krung 'dug pa'o//byang chub sems dpa' mchog tu gus pas mthong //rgyal pos rkang par
177b2(mdo sde): mgo bos phyag byas te//rnam pa sna tshogs dag gi gtam byas nas//khyod la rgyal srid kun gyi phyed sbyin gyis//'dod pa'i yon tan 'di spyod ma 'phyan smras//byang chub sems dpas
177b3(mdo sde): 'jam po'i tshig smras pa//sa yi bdag po yun rings tshe srungs shig/kho bos rgyal srid sdug pa bor nas su//re ba med par zhi phyir rab tu byung //gzhon nu thor bu dar la bab dang ldan
177b4(mdo sde): lus kyi kha dog mdzes shing shugs ldan na//nor mang dag dang bud med tshogs bzhes te//bdag gi rgyal srid 'dir bzhugs 'dod pa spyod//ma ga d+hA'i rgyal pos byang chub sems dpa'
177b5(mdo sde): la smras pa/bdag khyod mthong bas mchog tu dga'//bdag gi rgyal srid kun gyi grogs mdzod cig/bdag ni khyod la mnga' 'bul 'dod pa spyod//nags tshal stong pa dag tu ma bzhugs
177b6(mdo sde): shig/slan chad sa gnas zla steng ma bzhugs shig/khyod kyi sku ni mchog tu rab tu gzhon//bdag gi rgyal srid 'dir bzhugs 'dod pa spyod//byang chub sems dpas 'jam zhing rgya
177b7(mdo sde): gyu med//dga' 'gyur phan zhing snying brtse'i tshig smras pa//rgyal po khyod ni rtag tu bkra shis gyur//kho bo 'dod pa'i yon tan mi 'dod do//'dod pa dug 'dra nyes pa mtha' yas ldan//
178a1(mdo sde): sems can dmyal drang yi dgas dud 'gror ltung //mkhas pas slad cing 'dod pa 'phags ma yin//kho bos ngar snabs rul pa bzhin du bor//'dod pa shing gi
178a2(mdo sde): 'bras bu bzhin du lhung //ji ltar sprin dang char pa bzhin du 'gro//mi brtan 'gyur la ji ltar rlung bzhin 'gro//dge ba thams cad rnam par 'thor zhing slu//de bzhin 'dod pa mi rnyed phyir
178a3(mdo sde): yang gdung //rnyed du zin kyang tshig par 'dzin mi 'gyur//gang tshe dbang med ma rung rab gyur pa//de tshe 'dod pa sdug bsngal drag chen bskyed//rgyal po lha yi 'dod pa gang yin
178a4(mdo sde): dang //mi yi 'dod pa bzang po gang yin pa'i//'dod pa thams cad mi gcig gis thod kyang //de la chog pa med de yang 'tshal lo//rgyal po gang dag zhi zhing dul gyur pa//'phags
178a5(mdo sde): pa zag med chos kyis 'du shes gang //shes rab mkhas pas chog pa de legs chog/'dod pa'i yon tan chog pa cung zad med//rgyal po 'dod pa dag la bsten byas shing //
178a6(mdo sde): sngan chad 'dus byas pa yi mtha' ma med//ji ltar mi drag lan tshwa'i chu 'thungs bzhin//'dod pa bsten na phyir zhing sred pa 'phel//rgyal po lus la yang ltos de mi brtan//snying
178a7(mdo sde): pamed de sdug bsngal 'khrul 'khor bzhin//bu ga dgu yi sgo nas rtag tu 'jog/rgyal po kho bo 'dod pa'i 'dod chags med//kho bos 'dod pa mang dang de bzhin du//blta na sdug
178b1(mdo sde): pa'i bud med stong bor te//mchog zhi byang chub dam pa thob 'dod nas//kho bo srid pa mi dga' nges par 'byung //dge slong phyogs ni gang dang grang nas byon//gang du khyod skyes yab yum gang
178b2(mdo sde): na bzhugs//rgyal rigs lags sam bram ze 'am rgyal po lags//dge slong khur gyi 'du shes med na gsungs//rgyal po shAkya rnams kyi ser skya'i grong //mchog tu 'byor cing rgyas pa
178b3(mdo sde): thos gyur tam/kho bo'i pha yi mang ni zas gtsang yin//yon tan 'dod pas kho bo der rab byung //khyod mthong legs par mthong ste lags pa logs//gang las khyod skas bdag kyang
178b4(mdo sde): de'i slob ma//'dod chags bral ba 'dod par sman drangs pa//thugs nas bdag la bzod pa mdzad du gsol//gang tshe khyod kyis bang chub brnyes gyur tshe//chos rjes bdog la chos kyi/
178b5(mdo sde): bgo bsha' mdzod//rang byung bdag gi yul na bzhugs pa ni//bdag gis mchog tu rnyed pa rab rnyed do//de nas kyang ni rkang par phyag byas te//rgyal pos shin tu gus par bskor
178b6(mdo sde): byas nas//mi dbang rang gi skye bos yongs bskor te//slar yang rgyal po'i khab tu zhugs par gyur//'jig rten mgon po mu ga d+ho yi grong zhugs te//ji srid 'dod par zhi ba'i yid
178b7(mdo sde): kyis 'dug/lha dang mi rnams kyi ni don byas nas//mi dbang nai rany+dza na'i chu 'gram song //gzugs can snying po 'ongs pa'i le'u zhes bya ba ste bcu drug pa'o////dge
179a1(mdo sde): slong dag yang de'i tshe rangs byed kyi bu lhag spyod rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen por gnas bcas nas slob ma'i tshogs chen po slob ma bdun brgya dang lhan cig tu gnas
179a2(mdo sde): te/de de dag la 'du shes med 'du shes med min gyi brtulalo zhugs dang mthun pa'i chos ston to//dge slong dag byang chub sems dpa' rangs byed kyi bu lhag spyod tshogs dang ldan pa
179a3(mdo sde): tshogs can/tshogs kyi slob dpon/brags pa mngon par 'dod pa/skye bo mang pos mchod pa/mkhas pa/kun gyis shes pa mthong ngo //mthong nas kyang de 'di snyam du sems
179a4(mdo sde): te/rangs byed kyi bu lhag spyod 'di tshogs dang ldan pa/tshogs can/cho gos kyi slob dpon/grags pa mngon par 'dod pa/skye bo mang pos mchod pa/mkhas pa kun gyis shes
179a5(mdo sde): pa yin na/gal te bdag de'i drung du song ste brtul zhugs dang dka' thub ma brtsams na ni/'di bdag la khyad par du 'phags pa'i 'du shes kyang mi skyed la/mngon sum gyi shes
179a6(mdo sde): pas kyang shes par mi 'gyur ba dang /'dus byas zag pa dang bcas pa nye bar len pa dang bcas pa'i bsam gtan dang ting nge 'dzin dang snyoms par 'jug pa dag kyang sun phyung
179a7(mdo sde): bar ma gyur gyis/gang gis na de la bsam gtan gyi spyod yul dag dang snyoms par 'jug pa'i dmigs pa dag mngon sum du 'gyur ba dang /'jig rten pa'i ting nge 'dzin dag kyang
179b1(mdo sde): 'byung ba ma yin par bstan par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i thabs shig bstan par bya 'am/bdag rangs byed kyi bu lhag spyod kyi drung du song ste/bdag gi ting nge 'dzin gyi yon tan gyi khyad par bstan
179b2(mdo sde): pa'i phyir de'i slob mar khas blangs la/'dus byas kyi ting nge 'dzin snying po med par bstan par bya 'am snyam mo//dge slong dag de nas byang chub sems dpas don de'i dbang du byas te/
179b3(mdo sde): rangs byed kyi bu lhag spyod ga la ba der song nas phyin pa dang /rangs byed kyi bu lhag spyod la 'di skad ces smras so//grogs po khyod kyi ston pa ni su zhig/sus chos bstan pa kun shes/
179b4(mdo sde): de skad ces smras pa dang /rangs byed kyi bu lhag spyod kyis byang chub sems dpa' la 'di skad ces smras so//grogs po kho bo lo ston pa gang yang med de/'on kyang kho bo rang gis 'di yang
179b5(mdo sde): dag par khong du chud do//byang chub sems dpos smras pa/khyod kyis ci khong du chud/smras pa/'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa'i lam mo//byang
179b6(mdo sde): chub sems dpas smras pa/bdag gis khyod las ting nge 'dzin gyi lam gyi gdams ngag dang rjes su bstan pa thob par 'tshal lo//smras pa/de ltar bya'o zhes byas nas gdamos
179b7(mdo sde): ngag byin pa'i bar du'o//de nas byang chub sems dpa' phyogs gcig tu song ste skyil mo krung bces nas 'dug go/'dug ma thag tu byang chub sems dpa'i bsod nams kyi khyad par dang /
180a1(mdo sde): ye shes kyi khyad par dang /sngon spyad pa legs par spyad pa'i 'bras bu'i khyad par dang /ting nge 'dzin thams cad la 'dris pa'i khyad par dang /de sems la dang sgyur
180a2(mdo sde): ba'i phyir bsam gtan la sogs pa'i 'jig rton pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa brgya stong thams cad rnam pa dang bcas/bye brag dang bcas par mngon sum du gyur to//de nas byang chub
180a3(mdo sde): sems dpa' dran pa dang shes bzhin du stan las langs te/rangs byed kyi bu lhag spyod ga la ba der song nas phyin pa dang /rangs byed kyi bu lhag spyod la 'di skad ces smras so//grogs
180a4(mdo sde): po 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi lam las gong na gzhon 'ga' zhig yod dam/des smras pa/med do//de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du sems te/lhag
180a5(mdo sde): spyod 'ba' zhig la dad pa yod pa dang /brtson 'grus dang /dran pa dang /ting nge 'dzin dang /shes rab yod pa ma yin gyi/bdag la'ang dad pa dang /brtson 'grus dang /dran pa
180a6(mdo sde): dang /ting nge 'dzin dang /shes rab yod do snyam mo//de nas byang chub sems dpas rangs byed kyi bu lhag spyod la 'di skad ces smras so//grogs po khyod gang du nges par byung ba'i
180a7(mdo sde): chos de kho bos kyang khong du chud do//des smras pa/de bas na 'dod khyod dang kho bos tshogs 'di dag rjes su bslab bo zhes byang chub sems dpa'i don mthun pa dang /slob dpon
180b1(mdo sde): gyi gnas su bzhag go//byang chub sems dpas smras pa/grogs po lam 'di ni yid 'byung bar 'gyur ba ma yin/'dod chags dang bral bar 'gyur ba ma yin/'gog par 'gyur ba ma
180b2(mdo sde): yin/nye bar zhi bar 'gyur ba ma yin/mngon par shes par 'gyur ba ma yin/rdzogs par byang chub par 'gyur ba ma yin/dge sbyong nyid du 'gyur ba ma yin/mya ngan las 'das par
180b3(mdo sde): 'gyur ba ma yin no//dge slong dag de ltar byang chub sems dpas lhag spyod slob ma dang bcas pa 'dun par byas nas/de tsam gyis chog gi zhes bya ba nas chog par byas te song ba'i
180b4(mdo sde): bar du'o//de'i tshe lnga sde bzang po rangs byed kyi bu lhag spyod las tshangs par spyad pa spyod pa de dag 'di snyam du sems te/bdag cag gis 'di'i phyir yun ring por bcol cing brtson par
180b5(mdo sde): byas kyang mtha' dang mu khong du chud par mi nus kyi/dge sbyong gau ta mas tshegs chung ngus khong du chud cing mngon du byas la de de yang mi 'dod cing /de las gong du tshol ba las the tshom
180b6(mdo sde): med par de ni 'jig rten gyi sten par 'gyur ro//gang des mngon du byed par 'gyur ba de bdag cag la'ang bgod par 'gyur ro snyam mo//de ltar dpyad nas lnga sde bzang po rangs byed
180b7(mdo sde): kyi bu lhag spyod kyi drung nas dong ste/byang chub sems dpa'i phyi bzhin 'brang ngo //dge slong dag de ltar byang chub sems dpa' ji srid dga' ba'i bar du rgyal po'i khab tu gnas nas lnga
181a1(mdo sde): sde bzang po dang lhan cig tu yul ma ga d+har yul rgyu zhing song song ngo //yang de'i tshe rgyal po'i khab dang /rig yA'i bar na tshogs gzhan dag cig dus ston byed de/tshogs
181a2(mdo sde): de dag gis kyang byang chub sems dpa' lnga sde bzang po dang lhan cig tu gnas par bya ba dang /zas la mgron du bos so//dge slong dag de nas byang chub sems dpa' yul ma ga d+hAr yul
181a3(mdo sde): rgyu zhing yul ma ga d+hi'i rigra yAg la ba der song ste/der phyin par gyur to//rog yA'i rtse mo der byang chub sems dpas spong ba'i phyir gnas te/de der gnas pa'i tshe/sngon ma thos
181a4(mdo sde): pa dang /sngon mi shes pa'i dpe gsum mngon du gyur to//gsum gang zhe na/dge sbyong dang bram ze gang la la 'dod pa dag las lus dben par mi gnas 'dod pa dag las sems
181a5(mdo sde): dben par mi gnas shing /de dag gi 'dod pa la dga' ba dang /'dod pa la chags pa dang /'dod pa la 'dun pa dang /'dod pa la skom pa dang /'dod pa la yongs su gdung ba dang /
181a6(mdo sde): 'dod pa la zhen pa gang yin pa de ni nye bar zhi ba ma yin la/de dag bdag nyid kyis gnod pa byed cing lus la gdung bar byed pas/sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba drag po mi zad pa tsha ba myong
181a7(mdo sde): ste/'on kyang de dag mi'i chos bla ma las mchog tu gyur pa/'phags pa ye shes mthong ba'i khyad par mngon du byid mi nus so//'di lta ste dper na skyes bu zhig me 'dod la shing rlon
181b1(mdo sde): pa'i gtsub stan dang /shing rlon pa'i gtsub shing thogs la chur bcug ste btsupas na des me phyin par mi nus so//de bzhin du dge sbyong dang /bram ze de dag 'dod pa rnams las lus
181b2(mdo sde): dben par mi gnas/'dod pa rnams la sems dben par mi gnas te/de dag gi 'dod pa la dga' ba dang /'dod pa la sred pa dang /'dod pa la 'dun pa dang /'dod pa la sgom pa
181b3(mdo sde): dang /'dod pa la yongs su gdung ba dang /'dod pa la brgyal ba dang /'dod pa la zhen pa gang yin pa de ni nye bar zhi ba ma yin gyi/de dag bdag nyid kyis gnod par byed cing /lus
181b4(mdo sde): la gdung bar byed pas/sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba drag po mi zad pa tsha ba myong mod kyi 'on kyang de dag mi'i chos bla ma las mchog tu gyur pa 'phags pa ye shes mthong ba'i khyod par mngon
181b5(mdo sde): du byed mi nus so snyam ste/'di ni byang chub sems dpa' la dpe mngon du gyur pa dang po'o//yang de 'di snyam du sems te/gang dge sbyong dang /bram ze 'di dag 'dod pa rnams
181b6(mdo sde): las lus dang sems dben par granas kyang /de dag bri 'dod pa la dga' ba zhes bya ba nas me tshol ba zhes bya ba'i bar du thams cad snga ma bzhin du sbyar te/des shing rlon pa'i gtsub stan
181b7(mdo sde): thogs la thang la bzhag ste/shing rlon pa'i gtsung shing gis gtsubs na des me phyin par mi nus so//de bzhin du gang dge sbyong dang bram ze 'di dag ces bya ba nas thams cad snga ma
182a1(mdo sde): bzhin du sbyar te/me'i chos bla ma las mchog tu gyur pa 'phags pa ye shes mthong ba'i khyad par mngon du bya bar mi nus so snyam ste/'di na sngon ma thos shing ma/
182a2(mdo sde): shes pa'i dpe mngon du gyur pa gnyis pa'o//gzhan yang gang dge sbyong dang /bram ze 'di dag 'dod pa rnams las lus dang sems dben par gnas shing /de dag gi 'dod pa la
