182a3(mdo sde): dga' ba zhes bya ba nas/thams cad de bzhin du sbyar te de dag gi de na nye bar zhi ba yin te/de dag bdag nyid kyis gnod pa byed cing lus la gdung bar byed pas sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba
182a4(mdo sde): drag po mi zad pa myong mod kyi 'on kyang de dag mi'i chos bla ma la mchog tu gyur pa/'phags pa ye shes mngon du mthong ba'i khyad par mngon du bya bar nus so//'di lta ste dper na
182a5(mdo sde): sras bu zhig me 'dod cing 'od 'dod pa dang /'od 'chol bar gyur la/des shing skam po'i gtsub stan dang /gtsub shing thogs shing thang la bzhag ste gtsubs na/des
182a6(mdo sde): mo dbyung ba dang 'od 'bar bar byed nus so//de bzhin du gang dge sbyong dang bram ze 'di dag ces bya ba nas/tshor ba myong zhes bya ba'i bar du snga ma bzhin te/'on kyang de mi'i chos
182a7(mdo sde): bla ma las mchog tu gyur pa 'phags pa ye shes mthong ba'i khyad por mngon du bya bar nus so snyam ste/'di ni sngon mo thos shong sngon mi shes pa'i dpe gsum pa'o//dge slong
182b1(mdo sde): dag de nas byang chub sems dpa' de 'di snyam du sems te/bdag kyang da ltar 'dod pa rnams las lus dben par gnas/'dod pa rnams las sems dben par gnas la/bdag gi
182b2(mdo sde): 'dod pa la dga' ba zhes bya ba nas thams cad snga ma bzhin du sbyar te/bdag gi de'ang nye bar zhi ba yin la bdag nyid kyis gnod pa byas shing lus la gdung bar byed pas sdug bsngal zhes
182b3(mdo sde): bya ba nas tshor ba myong zhes bya ba'i bar du snga ma bzhin du sbyar te/'on kyang bdag mi'i chos bla ma las mchog tu gyur pa 'phags pa ye shes mthong ba'i khyad par mngon du bya bar nus so snyam
182b4(mdo sde): mo//dge slong dog de ltar byang chub sems dpa' ji srid dga' ba'i bar du ga yA'i ri ra ga yA'i rtse mo la gnas te/rkang gis yul rgyu zhing sde dpon gyi grong lteng rgyus ga la ba der song ste phyin pa
182b5(mdo sde): dang /dre na klung nai rany+dza na chu gausal ba 'bab stegs bde ba/shing dang shing gel ba mdzes pa dag gis brgyan pa nye 'khor na spyod yul gyi grong yod pa mthong ste/de la byang chub sems
182b6(mdo sde): dpa' yid shin tu dge' bar gyur nas 'di snyam du sems te/e ma 'os phyogs 'di ni mnyam shing nyams dga' ba/nang du yang dag 'jog dang mthun pa ste/rigs kyi bu sbyong ba
182b7(mdo sde): don du gnyer ba li ni 'dis chog go/bdag kyang spong ba don du gnyer ba yin gyis bdag 'di nyid du gnas par bya'o snyam mo//dge slong dag de ltar byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam
183a1(mdo sde): du sems te/bdag ni dzam+bu'i gling 'dir snyigs mu lha'i dus la bab khyeng sems can rnams dman pa la mos pa dang /mu stegs can gyi sdes gang ba dang /lta bsna
183a2(mdo sde): tshogs la zhugs pa dang /lus la ril por 'dzin pa la zhen pa'i tshe 'ongs te/blun po dag gdung bas yongs su gdung ba rnam pa sna tshogs kyis dag pa tshol zhing ston pa 'di lta ste
183a3(mdo sde): sngags spyod pa dang /lag pA la ldag pa dang /mi slong ba dang /mi smra ba dang /rtsa ba du ma za ba dang /sha dang nya mi za ba dang /byar mi byung ba dang /chang dang /phub ma dang /chu yongs
183a4(mdo sde): sru spangs pa dang /khyim gcig dang /gsum dang /lnga dang bdun nas zas len pa dang /rtsa ba dang /'bras bu dang /nyo lcibs pa dang /DA ku she dang /lo ma dang /ba lang
183a5(mdo sde): gi lci ba dang /ba'i go cin dang /'o thug dang /zho dang /mer dang /bu ram dang /ma brtags pa za zhing 'thung ba dang /bya ngang pa dang /phug rin gyis zos te bor ba bkrus te
183a6(mdo sde): za ba dang /grong dang dgon pas 'tsho ba dang /ba lang gi brtul zhugs dang /ri dgas dang /khyi dang /phag dang /spre'u dang /glang po che'i dartul zhugs dang /'greng ba dang /mi
183a7(mdo sde): slab dang /depa' bo'i tshul du 'dug pa dang //kham gcig za ba dang /kham bdun gyi bar du zang dang /zas la ni dacig za ba dang /nyin zhag gcig dang /bzhi da
183b1(mdo sde): lnga dang drug gi skabs skabs su za ba dang /zla ba phyed dang /zla ba gcig za bar byed pa dang /zla ba la lta ba dang /bya rgod dang /'ug pa'i gshog pa thogs pa dang /shing leb dang /
183b2(mdo sde): muny+tsA dang /zar ma'i shun pa dang /rtswa dar b+he dang /gres ma dang /rnga bal gyi la ba dang /ra bal gyi la ba dang /skra'i la ba dang /ko lpags gyon pa dang /gos gsher ba dang /
183b3(mdo sde): snyigs bu'i steng dang /chu'i nang na nyal ba dang /thal ba dang /rdo dang /gyo mo dang /shing leb dang /tsher ma dang /rtswa dang gtun shing gi steng du nyal ba dang /mgo thur du bstan pa
183b4(mdo sde): dang /cog tsog por 'dug pa dang /thang la nyal ba dang /gros gcig dang /gos gnyis dang /gsum dang /bzhi dang /lnga dang /drug dang /bdun dang /gos mang po srel
183b5(mdo sde): ba dang /gcer bur 'dug pa dang /'khru ba dang /mi 'khru ba'i cho ga can dang /skra dang /sen mo dang /ag tshem ring por 'jog pa dang /ral pa'i thor tshugs 'chang ba dang /rgya shug
183b6(mdo sde): dang /til dang /'bras 'bru gcig za ba dang /thal ba dang /snag tsa dang /me tog spyad spyad pa dang /rdul 'thul ba dang /rdul nag po dang /phyag dar dang /rdzab kyis lus la
183b7(mdo sde): skud pa dang /ba spu dang /mi'i thod pa dang /skra dang /sen mo dang /tshal bu'i smad g.yo gos dang /rdzab dang /kang rus thogs pa dang /chu dron po dang /'bras kyi khu ba dang /la bar
184a1(mdo sde): btsags pa dang /khrud ma 'thung ba dang /mngag ma dang /tshon rtsi dang /gos ngur smrig dang /khar ba gsum dang /mgo 'dreg pa dang /ril ba dang /mI'i thod
184a2(mdo sde): pa dang /khri'i zur shing 'chang bas blun po rnams dag par khong du chud do//du ba rngub pa dang /me rngub pa dang /nyi ma la lta ba dang /gdung ba lnga byed pa dang /rkang pa gcig dang /
184a3(mdo sde): lag pa gcig bstod pa dang /rkang pa gcig btsugs pa dang /gnas gcig na 'dug pas dka' thub la sogs pa dang /phub ma la sogs pa dang /'dab ma bsregs pa dang //
184a4(mdo sde): bum pa bsregs pa dang /rdo bsregs pa dang /me 'bar bar 'jug pa dang /zas mi za ba dang /mya ngam dang /'bab stegs su song ste shi bas sdug pa'i 'gro ba 'tshal lo//rab
184a5(mdo sde): bsngags zhes bya ba dang /gzhi mi 'grib pa zhes bya ba dang /gzhi srung zhes bya ba dang /gzhi tshu gos zhes bya ba dang /smon lam dang /bstod pa dang /sbyin bsreg dang /dbab
184a6(mdo sde): pa dang /sngags kyi bzlas brjod dang /klag pa 'dzin cing byed pas dag par khong du chud do//bdag dag par sems shing de dag la brten te/'di lta ste tshangs pa dang /dbang po
184a7(mdo sde): dang /gu lang dang /khyab 'jug dang /lha mo dang /gzhon nu dang /ma mo dang /kA t+yA ya'i bu dang /zla ba dang /nyi ma dang /rnam thos kyi bu dang /chu lha dang /nor can gyi bu dang
184b1(mdo sde): tha skar gyi bu dang /klu dang /gnod sbyin dang /dri za dang /lha ma yin dang /nam mkha' lding dang /mi 'am ci dang /lto 'phye chen po dang /srin po dang /'byung po dang /grul bum dang /
184b2(mdo sde): yi dgas dang /'khor dang /tshogs dang /mtshun dang /sha za dang /lha'i drang srong dang /rgyal po'i drang song dang /tshangs pa'i drang srong dag la phyag 'tshal zhing de dag la snying por 'du
184b3(mdo sde): shes so//sa dang /chu dang /me dang /rlung dang /nam mkha' la'ang brten/rI dang /ri sul dang /klung dang /chu mig dang /mtsho dang /mtshe'u dang /rdzing dang /rgya mtsho dang /
184b4(mdo sde): lteng ka dang /khron pa dang /rdzing bu dang /shing dang /shing gal pa dang /'khri shing dang /rtswa dang /sdong dum dang /lhas dang /dur khrod dang /bzhi mdo dang /sum mdo dang /
184b5(mdo sde): srang dag la'ang brten to//khang pa dang /ka ba dang /rdo dang /tho ba dang /ral gri dang /gzhu dang /dge sna dang /mda' dang /mdung thung dang /rtse gsum pa dag la'ang phyag 'tshal
184b6(mdo sde): lo//zho dang /mar dang /yungs kar dang /nas dang /shing bal gyi phreng ba dang /TI dUr ba dang /nor bu dang /gser dang /dngul la sogs pa la bkra shes par 'dzin te/gzhan
184b7(mdo sde): mu stegs can 'di dag 'khor bas 'jigs skrag nas rnam pa de lta bu dag byed cing bstan to//'di na kha cig bdag cag gi mtho ris dang thar pa'ang 'di lta bu dag las 'grub bo snyam
185a1(mdo sde): du sems te/de ltar log pa'i lam du song bas skyabs ma yin pa la skyabs su 'du shes shing /bkra shis ma yin pa la bkra shis par 'du shes la/dag pa
185a2(mdo sde): ma yin pa la dag par sems kyis bdag gis ci nas kyang phas kyis rgol ba thams cad tshar bcad par 'gyur ba dang /sems can las dang bya ba chud zos pa rnams kyi las
185a3(mdo sde): dang bya ba chud mi za ba bstan par bya ba dang /gzugs na spyod pa'i lha bsam gtan spyod yul pa rnams la bsam gtan gyi khyad par bstan pa so 'dun par byed pa de lta bu'i brtul
185a4(mdo sde): zhugs dang /dka' thub kyi khyad par brtsam mo snyam mo//dge slong dag de ltar byang chub sems dpas de snyam du bsams nas lo drug tu brtul zhugs dang /dka' thub shin
185a5(mdo sde): tu drag po shin tu spyad par dka'o ba/shin tu bya bar dka' ba'i dka' ba spyad par brtsams so//ci'i phyir dka' ba spyad pa zhes bya zhe na/de ni spyad par dka' ba ste/de bas na
185a6(mdo sde): dka' bar spyad pa zhes bya ste/byang chub sems dpa' srid pa tha ma pa gang bsam gtan mkha' khyab la snyoms par zhugs pa ma gtogs par sems can gyi ris ni mi 'am mi ma
185a7(mdo sde): yin pa sus kyang dka' ba spyad pa de lta bu spyod par nus pa med do//ci'i phyir mkha' khyab ces bya zhe na/de dang po nyid du bsam gtan bzhi pa la snyoms par 'jug pa'i tshe//
185b1(mdo sde): dbugs phyi nang du rgyu ba nye bar 'gog kun tu 'gog ste/bsam gtan de ni rtog pa med/rnam par rtog pa med/g.yo ba med/sems pa med/'gyur ba med cing thams cad du
185b2(mdo sde): rjes su song ba/thams cad la mi brten pa ste/bsam gtan de la sngon slob pa 'am/mi slob pa 'am/rang sangs rgyas sam/spyod pa la zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'
185b3(mdo sde): sus kyang snyoms par ma zhugs so//mkha' zhes bya ba ni nam mkha' ste/khyab par mi byed pa med pa/rnam par mi 'thor ba ste/des thams cad khyab par byed pos na/bsam gtan
185b4(mdo sde): de nam mkha' dang mnyam pa ste/de bas na mkha' khyab ces bya'o//dge slong dag de nos byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten rnams la ngo mtshar yang dag por bstan par bya ba dang /
185b5(mdo sde): mu stegs can rnams kyi rgyags pa gzhil ba dang /phas kyis rgol ba rnams cher gcad pa dang /lha rnams 'dun par bya ba dang /sems can chad pa dang /rtag par smra ga las
185b6(mdo sde): dang bya ba chud zos pa rnams las dang bya ba la gzud pa dang /bsod nams kyi 'bras bu brjod pa dang /ye shes kyi 'bras bu yang dag par bstan pa dang /bsam gtan gyi yan
185b7(mdo sde): lag rnam par dbye ba dang /lus kyi stobs dang mthu yang dag par bstan pa dang /sems kyi dpa' ba yang dag par bskyed pa'i phyir/byi dor ma byas pa'i sa tha mal pa la skyil mo
186a1(mdo sde): krung bcas te 'dug go/'dug nas rang gi lus sems kyis tshar bcad cing gzir to//dge slong dag de nas de dgun gyi tshes brgyud pa'i nub mo de ltar lus tshar
186a2(mdo sde): bcad cing gzir bas/mchan khung nas kyang rdul byung ste zags/dpral ba nas kyang rdul byung ste zags nas sa la lhung ste zil par tshegs nas dro zhing rlangs pa byung ngo //'di lta ste
186a3(mdo sde): dper na skyes bu stobs dang ldan pas skyes bu shin tu nyam chung ba zhig mgrin pa nas bzung ste btsir ba de bzhin du dge slong dag lus 'di sems kyis tshar bcad cing gzir na mtshan khung
186a4(mdo sde): nas kyang rdul byung zhing zags/dpral ba nas kyang rdul byung zhing zags nas sa la lhung ste/zil par chags nas dro zhing rlangs pa byung ngo //dge slong dag de nas ngas 'di snyam du
186a5(mdo sde): bsams te/bdag gis bsam gtan mkha' khyab la bsam gtan du bya'o snyam nas/dge slong dag de nas nges bsam gtan mkha' khyab la bsam gtan du byas pa dang /
186a6(mdo sde): kha dang sna nas dbugs phyi nang du rgyu ba 'gags por gyur to//rna ba'i bu ga gnyis nas sgra drag po chen po byung ngo //'dri lta ste dper na/sdud pa bus pa'i tshe sgra drag po dang /skra
186a7(mdo sde): chen po byung ba de bzhin du dge slong dag kha dang sna nas dbugs phyi nang du rgyu ba 'gags par gyur pa dang /rna ba'i bu ga gnyis nas sgra drag po dang /sgra chen po byung ngo //dge slong
186b1(mdo sde): dag de nas ngas 'di snyam du bsams te yang bdag gis bsam gtan mkha' khyab la bsam gtan du bya'o snyam pa dang /de nas nga'i kha dang sna dang rna ba 'gags par gyur to//de dag 'gags
186b2(mdo sde): pa dang /rlung gong du mgo'i thod pa la gnod par gyur to//dge slong dgo 'di lta ste dper na skyes bu zhig gis mdung thung rtul pos mgo'i thod pa la btang ba de bzhin du dge slong dag kha
186b3(mdo sde): dang sna dang rna ba'i dbugs phyi nang du rgyu ba 'gags pa dang /gong du mgo'i thod pa la gnod por gyur to//der lha'i bu gcig gis byang chub sems dpa' na ba de mthong nas 'di skad
186b4(mdo sde): ces smras so//e ma'o klo hud gzhan nu don grub pa 'di 'chi ba'i dus byas so//gzhan zhig gis 'di skad ces smras so//'di 'chi ba'i dus byas pa ma yin gyi dgra bcom pa bsam
186b5(mdo sde): gtan la gnas pa rnams kyi tshul ni de lta bu'o zhes smras nas/de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so//mi yi dbang po shAkya'i sras po 'od//brnag pa ma rdzogs don kyang ma mdzad
186b6(mdo sde): cing //'jig rten gsum po sdug bsngal mgon med par//mdzad nas dgon 'dir grongs par mi 'gyur grang //kyi hud sems can snying po thugs ngam brtan//mgon pos sngan chad
186b7(mdo sde): bdag cag dga' ldan du//dam chos mchod sbyin la ni mgron du bos//sems can dag khyod dam bcas de ga re//de nas lha de sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha'i nang du song ste lha mo sgyu
187a1(mdo sde): 'phrul la gzhon nu ni 'chi ba'i dus byas so zhes don de brjod do//de nas lha mo sgyu 'phrul lha'i bu mo'i tshogs kyis bskor nas/nam phyed tsam na klung nai rany+dza na'i
187a2(mdo sde): 'gram ga la ba dang /byang chub sems dpa' ga la bo der song ba dang /des byang chub sems dpa' lus skems shing 'chi ba'i dus byas pa dang 'dra ba mthong ngo //mthong nas
187a3(mdo sde): mchi mas brnangs shing ngus nas/de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so//lum+bi ni zhes bya ba'i tshal du nga bu bcas pa'i tshe//seng ge bzhin du 'dzin pa med par gom bdun
187a4(mdo sde): khyod nyid song //phyogs bzhir bltas shing 'di ni nga yi skye ba tha ma zhes//khyod kyis tshig snyan smras pa de yang khyod la yong ma rdzogs//'jig rten sangs rgyas 'gyur zhes drang srong
187a5(mdo sde): nog pos bstan pa yi///de yi lung bstan pa yang nyams la mi rtag des ma mthong //bus ni yid dga' 'khor los sgyur ba'i dpal yang ma myong la//byang chub kyang ni rjes su
187a6(mdo sde): ma thob tshal du shi bar gyur//bu phyir su la bsgrub phyir sdug bsngal su yi gan du mdud//bdag gi bu gcig cung zad gson pa'i srog ni suM yis sbyin//byang chub sems
187a7(mdo sde): dpas smras pa/shin tu snying rje bar ni du byed cing //skra yang beshig la mdzes pa rnams bor ba//shin tu bu yi smre sngags 'don byed la//sa steng 'dug cing 'greng ba
187b1(mdo sde): 'di su zhig/lha mo sgyu 'phrul gyis smras pa/bdag gis zla ba bcu par du//rdo rje 'dra ba mngal du bcangs//bu de'i ma ni bdag yin te//rab tu sdug bsngal rnam par smra//de nas byang chub
187b2(mdo sde): sems dpa' ma'i dbugs 'byin cing smras pa/bu la byams pa khyod kyi ngal ba 'bras bu yod par byas/ma 'jigs shig/sangs rgyas par bya ba'i phyir yongs su btang ba ni don yod
187b3(mdo sde): pa ste/drang srong nag pos bstan pa'ang mngon du gsal bar bya'o//mar me mdzad kyis lung bstan pa'ang mngon du gsal bar bya'o//sa ni rnam brgyar 'thor bar 'gyur yang srid//rin
187b4(mdo sde): chen rtse mo lhun po chur 'phyo srid//nyi zla skar tshogs sa la lhung 'gyur srid//so so'i skye bo yin yang nga mi 'cha//de phyir 'di la mya ngan khyod ma byed//ring por mi thogs byang chub
187b5(mdo sde): sangs rgyas mthong //lha mo sgyu 'phrul gyis thos ma thag tu dga' ste/be spu g.yos nas byang chub sems dpa' la me tog man+da ra bso gtor te/lon gsum bskor ba byas nas/lho'i
187b6(mdo sde): sil snyan dkrol zhing /rang gi gnas ga la ba der song ngo //dge slong dag ngas 'di snyam du bsams te/dge sbyong dang bram ze gang dag kha cig zas chung ngus dag par sems pa
187b7(mdo sde): yod kyis/ngas kyang zas chung ngu la nan tan bya'o snyam mo//dge slong dag ngas mngon par shes te/zas su rgyo shug khru gcig pu kho na ste gnyis su med pa zos so//dge slong dag
188a1(mdo sde): khyed kyi blo 'di snyam du de'i tshe'i rgya shug che ba snyam du sems par gyur na de ltar mi blta ste de'i tshe'i rgya shug kyang 'di nyid tsam mo//dge slong dag ngas zas su
188a2(mdo sde): rgya shug 'bru gtsig pu kho na ste gnyis su med pa zos pas lus shin tu nyam chung zhing rid par gyur to//dge slong dag 'di lta ste dper na ldum bu a si ta ka'i tshigs pa dang /
188a3(mdo sde): ko li ka'i tshogs pa ci 'dra bar nga'i yan lag dang nying lag rnams kyang de 'dra bar gyur to//'di lta ste dper na srog chags kar ka ta'i rtsib logs ci 'dra bar nga'i rtsib logs kyang
188a4(mdo sde): de 'dra bar gyur to//'di lta ste dper na bzhon pa'i bres khang ngam/glang po'i bres khang rnying pa ngos gnyis zhigs pa ni gdung rten gyi bar snang zhing mngon no//de bzhin du nga'i rtsib
188a5(mdo sde): logs gnyis ka nas lus kyi nang snang zhing mngon no//'di lta ste dper na ldan bur blas pa ni mthon dman dang mnyam pa dang mo mnyam par gyur to//de bzhin du nga'i skal tshigs
188a6(mdo sde): kyang mthon dman dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam par gyur to//'di lta ste dper na sgrub kha bo gzhon nur bcad pa ni rnyis pa dang /kun tu rnyis pa dang rtswam zlum por 'gyur ro//de bzhin
188a7(mdo sde): du nga'i mgo'ang rnyis pa dang kun tu rnyis pa dang rdum rdum por gyur to//'di lta ste dper na sos ka'i zla ba tha ma la khron pa'i skar ma dma' bar song ste tshigs chen pos snang bar 'gyur
188b1(mdo sde): ro//de bzhin du nga'i mig gi 'bras bu'ang khung du song ste tshogs chen pos snang bar gyur to//'di lta ste/dper nA nga'i rkang pa 'am rnga mo'i rkang pa ci 'dra bar nga'i mtshan khung dang lto dang
188b2(mdo sde): brang la sogs pa'ang de 'dra bar gyur to//dge slong drag de nas nga gang gi tshe lag pas lto la byug go snyam na sgal tshigs nyid la reg go/ldang ngo snyam nas langs na'ang de bzhin du skur
188b3(mdo sde): por gyur te 'gyel to//sha thang sto langs nas rdul gyis lus yog pa lag pas phyis pa dang /ba spu rul pa thams cad lus las lhags so//gang sngon nga kha dog mdzes shing
188b4(mdo sde): 'jam par gyur pa de'ang 'di ltar bdag nyid spong ba rtsub por btang bas med par gyur to//nga'i spyod yul gyi grong na gnas pa'i skye bo nyen kor ba rnams kyang de la 'di ltar/e ma'o/
188b5(mdo sde): dge sbyong gau ta ma ni gnag go/e ma'o dge sbyong gau ta ma ni sngo bsangs so//e ma'o dge sbyong gau ta ma ni nya mang gu ra'i mdog 'da'o//sngon 'di'i mdog mdzes pa gsal bar gyur pa de'ang
188b6(mdo sde): med por gyur to snyam du shes so//dge slong dag ngas 'di snyam du bsams te bdag gis dro bas kyang zas chung ngu la nan tan bya'o snyam mo//dge slong dag ngas mngon par shes te/ngas
188b7(mdo sde): zas su 'bras 'bru gcig pu kho na ste/gnyis su med pa zos so//dge slong dag khyod 'di snyam du de'i tshe'i 'bras che ba snyam du sems par gyur na de ltar mi blta ste/de'i tshe'i 'bras
189a1(mdo sde): kyang 'di nyid tsam mo//dge slong dag da zas su 'bras 'bru gcig zos pas lus myur du snga ma bzhin du gyur te/e ma'o dge sbyong gau ta ma nya mang gu ra'i mdog
189a2(mdo sde): 'dra'o//sngon 'di'i mdog mdzes pa gsal bar gyur pa de'ang med par gyur te zhes bya ba'i bar du'o//dge slong dag ngas 'di snyam du bsams te/bdag gis de bas kyang zas
189a3(mdo sde): chung ngu nyid la nan tan bya'o snyam mo//dge slong dag ngas mngon par shes te/ngas zas su til 'bru gcig pu kho na ste gnyis su med pa zos pa nas/de'i kha dog 'jam
189a4(mdo sde): pa med par gyur to zhes bya ba'i bar du'o//dge slong dag ngas 'di snyam du bsams te/dge sbyong dang bram ze gang dag kha cig zas mi za bas dag par sems te/bdag gis
189a5(mdo sde): kyang thams cad kyi thams cad du zas mi za bar nan tan bya'o snyam nas dge slong dag de nas zos mi za bar 'dug go/dge slong drag ngas ma zos pas lus shin tu skams shing
189a6(mdo sde): nyam chung ba dang rid par gyur to//'di lta ste dper na ldum bu a si ta ka'i tshigs pa dang /ka li ka'i tshigs pa bas kyang nyis gyur dang /sum gyur dang /bzhi gyur
189a7(mdo sde): dang /lngar gyur dang /bcu gyur gyis nga'i yan lag dang /nying lag skems par gyur te/'di lta ste rtsib logs ni srog chags kar ka ta ka'i rtsib logs dang /bzhon pa'i
189b1(mdo sde): bres khang lta bur gyur to//sgal tshigs ni lan bu blas pa lta bur gyur to//mgo'i thod pa ni sku ba kha bo lta bur gyur to//mig gi 'bras bu ni khron pa'i skar ma lta bur gyur to//dge slong
189b2(mdo sde): dag nga legs par ldang ngo snyam nas lus kyis bskod na/skar por gyur te 'gyel to//sha thang ste langs nas rdul gyis lus yog pa/lag pas phyis pa dang /ba spu rul pa
189b3(mdo sde): thams cad lus las lhags so//gang sngon nga kho dog mdzes shing 'jam par gyur pa de'ang 'di ltar bdag nyid spong ba rtsub por btang ba'i phyir med par gyur to//nga'i spyod yul gyi
189b4(mdo sde): grong na gnas pa'i skye bo nyen kor ba rnams kyang /'di ltar a ma'o dge sbyong gau ta ma ni gnag go//e ma'o dge sbyong gau ta ma ni sngo bsangs so//e ma'o dge sbyong gau ta ma ni nya mang gu
189b5(mdo sde): ra'i mdog 'dra'o//sngon 'di'i kha dog mdzes pa gsal bar gyur pa de'ang med par gyur to snyam du shes so//de'i tshe rgyal po zas ge tsang ma'ang nyin re zhing byang chub sems dpa'i drung du
189b6(mdo sde): pho nya gtong ngo //dge slong dag de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' snga ma bzhin du 'jig rten du bya ba rmad du byung ba bstan pa dang /bya ba nyams pa'i sems can rnams las dang bya ba la
189b7(mdo sde): gzung pa dang /bsod nams kyi tshogs rnams brjod pa dang /ye shes chen po'i yon tan bstan pa dang /bsam gtan gyi yan lag rnams rnam par dbye ba'i phyir ti lo 'bru
190a1(mdo sde): gcig dang /rgya shug 'bru gcig dang /'bras 'bru gcig gis lo drug gi bar du dka' ba spyod pa bstan te yid dman pa med do//byang chub sems dpa' lo drug gi
190a2(mdo sde): bar du skyil mo krung bcas nas/ji ltar 'dug pa bzhin du gnas te/spyod lam nyams pa med do//nyi maso bab nas kyang grib ma la ma song ngo //grib ma las kyang nyi ma la ma song ngo //
190a3(mdo sde): rlung dang nyi ma dang char pa'i skyabs ma btsal to//sha sbrang dang /sbrang bu dang /sdig sbrul ma bskrad do//bshang ba dang /gci ba dang /mchil ma dang /snabs ma bor ro//bskum
190a4(mdo sde): pa dang /sbyang ba ma byas so//glos phab pa'am/khas bub bam/gan rkyal ma yin par gnas pas gnas so//sprin chen po dang /yul ngan chen po dang /char pa dang /
190a5(mdo sde): ser ba dang /ston dang /dpyid dang /dgun gang yin pa de dag gis kyang byang chub sems dpa'i lus la ma phog go//tha na byang chub sems dpas lag pas kyang ma bskyabs
190a6(mdo sde): so//dbang po'ang ma bkag go//dbang po'i yul yang ma blangs so//gang dag dir 'ong ba grong gi gzhon nu'am/grong gi gzhon nu ma 'am/ba lang rdzi'am/phyugs rdzi'am/
190a7(mdo sde): rtswa thun nam/shing thun nam/lci thun de dag kyang byang chub sems dpa' la rdul khrod kyi 'dre yin pa snyam du sems shing de la rtsen te/de las skud do//der byang chub sems dpa'
190b1(mdo sde): lo drug po de dag gis lus ngan pa dang /gong ba dang rid par gyur te/de'i rna ba gnyis su rtswa 'am shing bal bcug nas sna'i bu ga gnyis su 'byin to//sna'i bu ga gnyis su bcug nas rna ba'i bu
190b2(mdo sde): ga gnyis su 'byin to//rna ba'i bu ga gnyis su bcug nas khar 'byin to//khar bcug nas rna ba dang sna'i bu gar 'byin to//snar bcug nas rna ba dang khar 'byin to//lha dang klu dang /
190b3(mdo sde): gnod sbyin dang /dri za dang /lha ma yin dang /nam mkha' lding dang /mi 'am ci dang /lto 'phye chen po gang dag byang chub sems dpa'i yon tan mngon sum du gyur pa de dag nyin mtshan
190b4(mdo sde): du gnas shing byang chub sems dpa' la mchod pa byed do//smon lam yang 'debs so//de ni byang chub sems dpa' lo drug gi bar du dka' ba spyod pa ston cing lha dang mi khrag khrig phrag
190b5(mdo sde): bcu gnyis tshang ba dag theg pa gsum la yongs su smin par byas so//de la 'di skad ces bya ste/byang chub sems dpa' khyim byung ba//yon tan dag dang ldan pa de//sems can
190b6(mdo sde): don dang phan pa'i phyir//thabs dang ldan pa'i bsami pa skyes//snyigs ma lnga yi dus kyi tshe//chos dman mos pa'i 'jig rten po//las dang bya bor 'jig rten du//dzam+bu'i gling
190b7(mdo sde): 'dir sres par gyur//mu stegs tshogs kyis rab tu gong //ltad mo dang ni ltas su lta//lus la gnod pa bya ba byed//byis pa de dag dag por sems//g.yang sa mi dang mya
191a1(mdo sde): ngan 'jug/sgren mo sa dang lci bas skud//lus ni yongs su gdung ba'i phyir//gdung ba lnga la brtson dang ldan//lag pa brkyang ste rgyu ba dang //mi mkhas kha cig
191a2(mdo sde): lag pa ldag/bum pa khar gzhong las mi len//sgo dang ka bas chod mi len//gang no khyi yod pa nas min//'dug ce'am tshur shog ces las min//khyim nas kha zas gcig
191a3(mdo sde): len pas//bdag ni dag par 'gyur snyam sems//mar dang 'bru mar bu ram zho//nyi dang sha dang 'o ma spong //ldam ldum sri da pad+ma'i rtsa//gzegs dang ba lang lci ba za//rtsa ba
191a4(mdo sde): 'bras bu lo ma dang //ku sha tshal bu la ba lpags//srel byed kha cig sgren mor rgyu//glen pa 'di bden gzhan brdzun snyam//lag pa sgreng bar byed pa dang //skra bsgreng ral pa
191a5(mdo sde): bsgreng ba dag/lam las rab tu rnam par nyams//las min gnas shing bde 'gro 'dod//rtswa dang gtun shing thal bar nyal//tsher mar nyal zhing tsog pur 'dug/kha cig rkang
191a6(mdo sde): pa gcig pus 'greng //gdong bstod nyi dang zla ba lta//chu mig mtsho dang lteng ka dang //rgya mtsho chu bo nyi zla dang //shing dang ri yi rtse mo dang //rdza dang sa la phyag kyang 'tshal//glen
191a7(mdo sde): pa de dag gnod mang gis//lus ni yongs su skams par byed//log par lta dang ldan pa dag/myur du ngan song rnams su lhung //nga ni dka' thub brtul zhugs dang /dka'
191b1(mdo sde): spyad gang zhig lha dang mis//spyad par nus pa ma yin pa'i//dka' spyad drag po rtsom snyam sems//bsam gtan gang zhig rang rgyal gyis//blta bar nus pa ma yin pa'i//rdo rje
191b2(mdo sde): lto bur brtan gnas pa//mkho'i khyab bsam gtan bsam gtan byed//mu stegs brtul zhugs ngan pa yis//dga' ba'i lha mi 'di na yod//de dag yongs su smin bya'i phyir//
191b3(mdo sde): dka' spyad brtul zhugs drag po brtsams//sa steng ci yang ma bting bar//skyil mo krung ni bcas te 'dug/rgya shug til dang 'bras 'bru gcig/za ba'i cho ga rnam par ston//
191b4(mdo sde): dbugaso dbyung brngub pa rnam par spangs//stobs dang ldan pa g.yo ba med//lo drug bar du bsam gtan mchog/nam mkha' khyab la bsam gtan byed//rtog dang rnam par rtog
191b5(mdo sde): med pa//g.yo ba med cing sems rgyu med//nam mkha'i khams su khyab pa yi//mkha' khyab bsam gtan bsam gtan byed//de ni nyin las grib mor ram//grib las nyi ma song
191b6(mdo sde): ma byas//lhun po lta bur mi g.yo ba'i//mkha' khyab bsam gtan bsam gtan byed//rlung dang char dang sha sbrang dang //sdig sbrul sbrang bu skyob mi byed//rnam par ma 'khrugs spyod
191b7(mdo sde): pa yis//mkha' khyab bsam gtan bsam gton byed//bdag nyid gcig pu'i don gyi phyir//mkha' khyab bsam gtan byed pa min//gzhan du snying rje sems kyis ni//'jig
192a1(mdo sde): rten don mang ched du bsgom//grong gi byis pa ba lang rje//shing thun dag dang rtswa thun dag/de la rdul khrod 'dre snyam sems//de la sa yis skud byed cing //mi
192a2(mdo sde): gtsang ba yang 'thong bar byed//de dag gnod pa mang byed kyang //guyo ba med cing 'khrugs med par//mkha' khyab bsam gtan bsam gtan byed//mtho ba mdo cing dma' ba
192a3(mdo sde): med//lus ma bsrungs par chos ma reg/bshang ba mi byed gci mi byed//sgra yis mi 'jigs gzhan mi lto//sha dang khrag rnams skams gyur te//lpags pa rtsa rgyus dus
192a4(mdo sde): pa lus//sgal tshigs dag ni lto bar snang //lan bu zlas pa ji bzhin no//gang dag lhag par byas lha dang //lha min gnod sbyin dri zag//yon tan ldan pa mngon sum
192a5(mdo sde): pas//nyin dang mtshan du mchod pa byed//ji ltar mkha' 'dra'i sems ldan 'di//mkha' khyab bsom gtan bsam gtan byed//de 'drar bdag cag myur gyur ces//smon lam
192a6(mdo sde): dag kyang 'debs par byed//snying rje'i blo yis 'jig rten gyi//don med phyir byed ma gtogs par//bdag phyir ma yin pade blos min//bsam gtan ro ni myang phyir min//
192a7(mdo sde): phas kyi rgol ba rab tu bcom//mu stegs blo nyams zil gyis mnan//mgo reg byang chub ga la yod//byang chub bskal meng rnyed dka' zhes//'od srung la ni chog smras
192b1(mdo sde): pa'i/las dang bya ba rab tu bstan//skye bo dag ni dga' bya'i phyir//mkha' khyab bsam gtan bsam gtan byed//lha mi khrag khrig bcu gnyis tshad//theg pa gsum la rab tu btul///
192b2(mdo sde): de yi ched du blo gros bzang //mkha' khyab bsam gtan bsam gtan byed//dka' ba spyad pa'i le'u zhes bya ba ste/bcu bdun pa'o////dge slong dag bdud sdig can yang
192b3(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' lo drug gi bar du dka' ba spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe phyi bzhin 'brang ste/grogs bltas skabs btsal kyang nam yang glags cung zad kyang ma rnyed do//de grags ma rnyed nas
192b4(mdo sde): yi ched de yid la gcags bzhin du song ngo //de la 'di skad ces bya ste//dgon pa nyams ni dga' ba dang //nags tshal gel ba sgra med dang //lteng rgyas kyi ni shar phyogs na
192b5(mdo sde): chu klung nai rany+dza na der//spong ba'i phyir ni brtson pa byas//rtag tu mthu rtsal brtan pa po//grub dang bde ba thob bya'i phyir//brtson pas rab tu brtul de la//bdud ni 'jam zhing snyan
192b6(mdo sde): pa'i tshig/smra bar byed cing 'ongs par gyur//kyi srog gces kyis 'tsho bar gyis//gson na chos ni spyod par 'gyur//gson che bya ba gang yod pa//de dag byas na mya dran med//
192b7(mdo sde): khyod ska mdog nyam so dman par gyur//khyod ni sha la thug cing 'dug/'chi ba'i cha ni stong snyed tsam//cha gcig tsam zhig gson par zad//sbyin pa dag ni rtag tu byin//me yi
193a1(mdo sde): sbyin sreg sbyin bsreg byos//'on kyang bsod nams chen por 'gyur//spong ba yis ni ci zhig bya//spong ba'i lam ni sdug bsngal te//sems dul ba ni bya dka'
193a2(mdo sde): zhes//de tshe bdud kyis de skad tshig/byang chub sems dpa' de la smras//de skad smra ba'i bdud de la//byang chub sems dpas 'di skad smras//sdig can myos pa'i rtsa lag po//
193a3(mdo sde): khyod ni rang gi dran phyir 'ongs//nga la bsod nams chud zad kyang //don du gnyer ba med do bdud//gang dag bsod nams don du gnyer//de la de skad smra ba'i rigs//'tsho ba'i
193a4(mdo sde): mtha' ni 'chi yin pas//mI 'chi snyam dung mi sems//tshangs par spyod la gzhol gyur pas//phyir ldog par ni mi bya'o//chu klung dag gi chu rgyun kyang //rlung gis rnam par
193a5(mdo sde): skems byed na//spangs pa nyid kyi khrag tsam lta//'di yis ci phyir skoms mi 'gyur//khrag ni skems par gyur pa dang //de yi 'og tu sha skams 'gyur//sha ni zad par gyur/
193a6(mdo sde): pa dang //phyir zhing sems ni dang bar 'gyur//phyir zhing 'dun dang brtson 'grus dang //ting nge 'dzin kyang gnas par 'gyur//da ni de ltar gnas pas na//tshor ba dam
193a7(mdo sde): pa thob gyur kyang //lus dang srog la mi lta ste//srin thub dag par gyur la ltos//nga la 'dun pa yod gyur cing //brtson 'grus dang ni shes rab yod//nga yi brtson 'grus
193b1(mdo sde): bskyod nus pa//'jig rten de ni ngas ma mthong //srog chad shi ba ches bla ste//'tsho ba ngan pa de lta min//g.yul ngor shi ba legs pa ste//pham nas gson pa de lta min//sngar ma
193b2(mdo sde): dpung las mi rgyal te//dpa' bo dpung las rgyal bar 'gyur//rgyal yang de ni rlom sems med//bdud khyod las ni myur rgyal bya//'dod pa khyod kyi dang po'i dpung //mi dga'
193b3(mdo sde): ba ni gnyis pa yin//khyod kyi gsum pa bkres dang skom//sred pa dpung chags bzhi pa yin//rmugs dang gnyid ni lnga pa ste//'jigs pa drug par brjod pa yin//khyod kyi
193b4(mdo sde): the tshom bdun pa ste//khro dang 'chab pa brgyad pa yin//'thong dang tshigs bcad bkur sti dang //log par grags pa gang thob dang //bdag la bstod par byed pa dang //gzhan la

193b6(mdo sde): bcas kyis//'jig rten 'di ni rab 'dul ba//so btang ma byas snod chus bzhin//shes rab kyis ni de dag gzhig/dran pa legs par nyer bzhag ste//shes rab legs
193b7(mdo sde): par bsgom byas nas//shes bzhin du ni spyod par bya//blo ngan khyed kyis ci byar yod//de skad ces smras pa dang /bdud sdig can sdug bsngal zhing yid mi bde ste/yi ma rangs
194a1(mdo sde): nas yid la bcags bzhin du de nyid du mi snang bar gyur to///'phags pa rgya cher rol pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo//bam po bcu gnyis pa//dag
194a2(mdo sde): slong dag de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du sems te/dge sbyong dang bram ze gang dag kha cig 'das pa dang /ma 'ongs pa dang da ltar byung ba'i dus na bdag la gnod pa byed pa dang //
194a3(mdo sde): lus la gdung ba byed de/sdug bsngal drag po che ba mi bzad pa/yid du mi 'ong ba'i tshor ba myong bar byed pas de dag shin tu sdug bsngal ba myong ngo snyam mo//dge slong dag ngas
194a4(mdo sde): 'di snyam du bas mos te/spyod pa 'di dang bsgrub pa 'dis mi'i chos bla ma las mchog tu gyur pa/'phags pa ye shes mthong ba'i khyad par gang yang mngon du ma byas te/'dri ni
194a5(mdo sde): byang chub kyi lam ma yin/lam 'di ni ma 'ongs pa'i skye ba dang /rga ba dang 'chi ba 'byung ba nub par byed pa ma yin te/byang chub kyi lom ma 'ongs pa'i skye ba dang /rga ba dang 'cha
194a6(mdo sde): bo'i sdug bsngal 'byung ba nub par byed pa gzhan zhig yod do snyam mo//dge slong dag ngas 'di snyam du bsams te/ngas pa'i skyed mos tshal du shing dzam+b+hi'i grib ma la 'dug ste/'dod
194a7(mdo sde): ba rnams las dben pa/sdig po mi dge ba'i chos rnams las dben pa/rtog pa dang bcas pa/dpyod pa dang bcas pa/dben pa las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang /bde ba
194b1(mdo sde): can ngasam gtan dang po nus bsam gtan bzhi pa'i bar bsgrubs te gnas pa de byang chub kyi lam yin te skye ba dang /rga ba dang 'chi ba'i sdug bsngal 'byung ba rnams nub par 'gyur ba yin
194b2(mdo sde): snyam nas/de byang chub kyi lam yin no snyam ste/nga'i rnam par shes pa rjes su 'brang bar gyur to//ngos 'di snyam du bsams te/'di ltar nyim chung bar gyur pas ni lam dri mngon par
194b3(mdo sde): rdzogs par byang chub par bya mi nus so//gal te nga 'di ltar lus dran zhing nyam chung bzhin du mngon par shes pa dang /ye shes kyi stobs kyis byang chub kyi snying por song na ni ngas phyi
194b4(mdo sde): nA'i skye bo la snying brtse ba byas par mi 'gyur te/'di'ang byang chub kyi lam ma yin gyis/ngas kha zas rags pa zos la lus kyi mthu stobs bskyed de/de nas gdod byang chub kyi
194b5(mdo sde): snying por 'gro'o snyam mo//dge slong dag don lha'i bu gang dag ngan pa la mos pa de dag gis nga'i sems kyi yongs su rtog pa sems kyis shes nas/ngag la ba der 'ongs ti nga la 'di
194b6(mdo sde): skad ces smras so//skyes bu dam pa zhal zas rags pa ma gsol cig/bdag cag gis ba spu'i khung bur mdangs stsal bar bgyi'o//dge slong dag ngas 'di snyam du bsams
194b7(mdo sde): te/bdag ni zas mi bzo' bar bdag nyid kyis dam bcas la/bdag gi spyod yul gyi grong na gnas pa'i skye bo nyen kor ba rnams kyis kyang /'di ltar dge sbyong gau ta ma ni zas mi
195a1(mdo sde): za ba yin par shes te/ngan pa la mos pa'i lha'i bu 'di dag gis nga'i ba spu'i khung bur mdangs bcug par gyur na/nga shin tu brdzun smras par gyur to snyam ste/de nas
195a2(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpas brdzun smra ba spang ba'i phyir lha'i bu de dag gi tshig ma mnyan par kha zas rags pa bza' bar sems btud do//dge slong dag de ltar byang chub sems dpas lo drug
195a3(mdo sde): gi bar du brtul zhugs dang dka' thub nyams su blangs nas/stan de las langs te/kha zas rags pa 'di lta ste bu ram gyi dbu ba dang /mon sran sde'u'i khu bcud dang /ha ra nu
195a4(mdo sde): kha'i khu bcud dang /zan dang /'bras chan dang /'dren mar bza'o zhes tshig tu brjod do//dge slong dag de nas lnga sde bzang po dag 'di snyam du sems te/dge sbyong gau ta mas
195a5(mdo sde): lam 'di dang bsgrub pa 'dis mi'i chos bla ma las mchog tu gyur pa 'phags pa ye shes mthong ba'i khyad par gang yang mngon du byed ma nus ni kha zas rags pa 'di zos te/bsod
195a6(mdo sde): snyoms la sbyor ba dang ldan par gnas pas ci nus te mi gsal ba byis pa yin no snyam du bsams nas byang chub sems dpa'i gan nas song ste/grong khyer ba ra NA sir song nas drang
195a7(mdo sde): srong lhung ba ri dgas kyi nags su gnas so//de na byang chub semos dpa' thog ma nyid du dka' ba spyad pa spyod pa na grong pa'i bu mo gzhon nu bcus lta bo dang phyag bya ba'i phyir bsnyen
195b1(mdo sde): bkur byas so//lnga sde bzang po de dag gis kyang rim gro byas shing rgya shug 'bru gcig dang /'bras 'bru gcig dang /tIl 'bru gcig dbul ba'ang phul lo//grong pa'i bu mo bcu ni bu mo
195b2(mdo sde): stobs ldan ma zhes bya ba dang /stobs sbed ma dang /shin tu sdug dang /sde las rnam par rgyal dang /a ti mut+ta ka'i phreng ba can dang /mdzes ma dang /rdza byed ma dang /skra lcang lo rgyas
195b3(mdo sde): dang /ral bu can dang /legs skyes ma zhes bya ba ste/gzhon nu ma de dag gis byang chub sems dpa'i tshod ma'i rnam pa de dag thams cad byas te phul lo//byang chub sems dpas kyang
195b4(mdo sde): de dag zos nas rim gyis spyod yul gyi grong du bsod snyoms spyad pas mdog dang /gzugs dang /stobs dang ldan par gyur to//de tshun chad byang chub sems dpa' la dge sbyong mdzes
195b5(mdo sde): pa/dge sbyong chen po zhes 'dzer to//dge slong dag de na byang chub sems dpa' dang po nyid du dka' ba spyad pa spyod pa na byang chub sems dpas brtul zhugs dang /dka' thub nyams
195b6(mdo sde): 'og tu chud par bya ba dang /lus rtas par bya ba'i phyir grong ba'i bu mo legs skyes mas nyin gcig bzhin du/bram ze brgyad brgya zan byin zhing 'di skad du bdag gi zas zos pas byung
195b7(mdo sde): chub sems dpa'i bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar shog cig ces smon lom yang btab bo//dge slong dag lo drug 'das nas/dge slong
196a1(mdo sde): dgangs 'di snyam du bsams te/gal te bdag gis 'doms yog 'ga' zhig bsten na re stes snyam mo//dge slong dag de'i tshe grong pa'i bu mo legs skyes ma'i
196a2(mdo sde): bran mo grub ma zhes bya ba zhig shi nas de sha na'i ras kyis dkris te/dur khrod du bor bar gyur pa'i phyag dar khrod pa de ngas mthong nas/ngas phyag dar khrod pa de blang ba'i phyir rkang
196a3(mdo sde): pa g.yon pas mnan te/rkus nas lag pa g.yas pa brkyang ba dang /de nas sa bla'i lhas bar snang gi lha rnams la sgra bsgrags pa/grogs po dag 'di ltar rgyal po chen po'i
196a4(mdo sde): rigs su skyes pa 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal srid bor te/phyag dar khrod pa la sems btud pa ngo mchir te/grogs po dag 'di ni rmad du byung ba'o//bar snang gi lha rnams kyis
196a5(mdo sde): sa bla'i lha rnams kyis sgra thos nas rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams la sgra bsgrags so//rgyal chen bzhi'i ris pas kyang sum cu rtsa gsum pa la'o//sum cu rtsa gsum pas
196a6(mdo sde): kyang 'thab bral ba la'o//'thab bral bas kyang dga' ldan pa la'o//dga'i ldan pas kyang 'phrul dga' ba la'o//'phrul dga' bras kyang gzhan 'phrul dbang byed pa la'o///
196a7(mdo sde): gzhan 'phrul dbang byed pas kyang tshangs ris pa'i bar du'o//skad cig de dang /thang cig de dang /yud tsam de la grogs po dag 'di ltar rgyal po chen po'i rig so su skyes pa/
196b1(mdo sde): 'khor lo sgyur ba'i rgyal sring por te/phyag dar khrod pa la sems btud pa ngo mtshar te/'di ni rmad du byung ba'o zhes sgra gcig dang /brjod pa gcig 'og min gyi gnas kyi bar du grags
196b2(mdo sde): par gyur to//de nas byang chub sems dpa' yang 'di snyam du bsams te/bdag gis phyag dar khrod pa ni rnyed na/gal te chu zhig rnyed na re stes snyam mo//de nas de nyid du lhas lag pa
196b3(mdo sde): sa la brlabs pa dang /der rdzing bu zhig byung bar gyur te/deng sang du'ang lag pa brdabs pa'i rdzing zhes grags so//de nas yang byang chub sems dpas 'di snyam du bsams te/bdag
196b4(mdo sde): gis chu ni rnyed na/gal te phyag dar khrod pa 'di bdag nyid rdo leb cig rnyed na re stes snyam pa dang /skad cig de nyid la brgya byin gyis der rdo le ba bzhag nas/de la byang chub sems dpas
196b5(mdo sde): phyag dar khrod pa de bkrus so//de nas lha'i rgyal po brgya byin gyis byang chub sems dpa' la 'di skad ces smras so//skyes bu dam pa 'di kho bo la stsol zhig dang kho bos bkru'o//de nas
196b6(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpas rab tu byung ba ni bdag nyid kyis bya bar bston pa'i phyir brgya byin la ma byin par bdag nyid kyis bkrus so//de lus ngal te chad nas rdzing nas 'byung snyam pa dang
196b7(mdo sde): bdud sdig can phrag dog gi chos dang ldan pas rdzing bu gad pa mthon po zhig sprul to//rdzing de'i 'gram na shing sgrub byed ces bya ba chen po zhig yod do//byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten
197a1(mdo sde): dang mthun par bya ba dang /lha mo la phan gdags pa'i phyir shing de'i lha mo la smras pa/lha mo shing gi yal ga slong cig/des kyang shing yal gasmad nas byang chub
197a2(mdo sde): sems dpa' de la 'jus te byung ngo //byung nas kyang shring sgrub byed de'i drung du phyag dar khrod pa chos gos snam sbyar du byas nas drubs te/deng sang du'ang de phyag dar khrod po drubs
197a3(mdo sde): pa zhes ming du glags so//de nas gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lho'i bu 'od dri ma med pa zhes bya ba des/lha'i gos ngur smrig gi tshon du btsos pa rung ba dge sbyong gi tshul dang mthun pa
197a4(mdo sde): dag byang chub sems dpa' la phul lo//byang chub sems dpas kyang de dag blangs te/snga dro sham thabs dang chos gos bgos nas spyod yul gyi grong du phyogs pa dang /de na
197a5(mdo sde): lha rnams kyis lteng rgyas kyi sde dpon gyi grong na dga' byed ces bya ba'i grong mi zhig yod pa'i bu mo legs skyes ma la nAm phyed tsam na smras pa/khyod kyis gang gi phyir mchod sbyin
197a6(mdo sde): byas pa de brtul zhugs de nyams 'og tu chud nas do kha zas rogs pa bzang po bza' bar sems kyis/sngon khyod kyis blo dag gi zas zos nas byang chub sems dngo' bla na med pa
197a7(mdo sde): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar shog cig ces smon lam btab pa gang yin pa'i khyod kyi bya ba de gyis shig/dge slong dag de nas grong mi dga'
197b1(mdo sde): byed kyi bu mo legs skyes mas lha de dag gi tshig de thos nas myur ba myur bar ba stong gi 'o ma lan bdun du nying khur byas pa bzang po mchog tu 'gyur ba snying po can blangs te/blangs nas kyang 'o/
197b2(mdo sde): mo de 'bras saraR+sha pa sor pa dag dang /phru ba sar par blugs nas thab sar par btsugs te/kha zas de sgrub bo//de sgrub pa na sna ltas 'di dag snang ste/'o ma de'i nang na dpal be'u
197b3(mdo sde): dang /bkra shis pa dang /g.yu drung 'khyil ba dang /pad+ma dang /sdong ris la sogs pa bkra shis rnams snang ngo //de nas des 'di snyam du bsdams te/ltas 'di lta bu 'di dag snang
197b4(mdo sde): b.las na/byang chub sems dpas zas zos nas byang chub 'thob par 'gyur du the tshom med do snyam pa dang /rgya mtsho ba shes shing cho ga shes pa'i mtshan mkhan phyogs der phyin par
197b5(mdo sde): gyur nas/des kyang bdud rtsi 'thob pa nyid du lung bstan to//de nas legs skyes mas thug pa de chos pa dang thang la bzhag ste/me tog gis gtor/spos chus gtor nos gus
197b6(mdo sde): par stan bting ste/byan mo gong ma zhes bya ba la smras paM/gong ma song la bram ze bos shig/ngas ni 'o thug sbrang rtsi can 'di blta'o//jo mo legs so zhes de'i lter mnyan nas/shar
197b7(mdo sde): phyogs logs su song ba dang /des byang chub sems dpa' mthong ngo //de bzhin du lho phyogs logs su song nas yang byang chub sems dpa' mthong ngo //de bzhin du nub dang
198a1(mdo sde): byang phyogs logs su song na'ang de dang der des byang chub sems dpa' mthong ngo //de'i tshe na gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha'i bu rnams kyis gzhan mu stegs can
198a2(mdo sde): thams cad cher bcad par gyur pas 'ga' tsam yang mi snang ngo //de nas de slar log ste jo mo la 'di skad ces smras so//gang dang gang du mchis kyang dwa dang den dag sbyong mdzes
198a3(mdo sde): pa gda' ba las/dge sbyong ngam bram ze gzhan ni 'ga' yang mi gda'o//legs skyes mas smras pa/de nyid bram ze yin te/de'i phyir 'di brtsams kyis/gong mo song la de
198a4(mdo sde): nyid bos shig/jo mo legs so zhes smras te/gong ma song nas byang chub sems dpa'i rkang pa gnyis la gtugs te legs skyes mo zhes bgyi bas spyan 'dren to zhes smras so//
198a5(mdo sde): dge slong dag de nas byang chub sems dpa' grong pa'i bu mo legs skyes ma'i khyim du song ste stan bting ba la 'dug go/dge slong dag de nas de dag grong pa'i bu mo legs skyes mas 'o
198a6(mdo sde): thug sbrang rtsi can gyi so gser gyi snod chen po bkang ste/byang chub sems dpa' la phul lo//de nas byang chub sems dpas 'di snyam du bsams te/legs skyes mos kha zas 'di
198a7(mdo sde): lta bu 'di byin pa 'di bdag gis dang zos te/the tshom med par bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bya'o snyam mo//de nas byang chub
198b1(mdo sde): sems dpas zas de blangs nas grong pa'i bu mo legs skyes ma la 'di skad ces smras so//che zhe gser gyi snod chen po 'di ji ltar bya/des smras pa/khyod snoms shig/byang chub
198b2(mdo sde): sems dpas smras pa/kho bo la ni snod 'di lta bu mi dgos so//legs skyes mos smras pa/ci dgyes su mdzod cig/bdag ni sdod ma mchis par su la'od zas mi stsol to//de nas
198b3(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpas zas de thogs te/lteng rgyas nas byung nas dro la bob pa dang /klu'i klung chu bo nai rany+dza na'i ngogs su song ste/zas dang chos gos rnams phyogs gcig tu bzhag nas/
198b4(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' lus bsil bar bya ba'i phyir klung nai rany+dza na'i nang du zhugs so//dge slong dag byang chub sems dpa' khrus byed pa'i tshe/lha'i bu brgya stong du ma drug 'di lta ste/byang
198b5(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' la mchod pa'i las kyi phyir lho'i a~M ga ru dang /tsan+dan gyi phye ma dang /byug pa dag klung du ldugs shing lha'i me tog kha dog sna tshogs dag kyang chu'i nang du 'thor ro//
198b6(mdo sde): de'i tshe klung chen po nai rany+dza na lha'i spos rnams dang /me tog rnams kyis gang por gyur te 'bab bo//byang chub sems dpa' spos chu gang gis khrus byas par gyur pa de lha'i bu bye ba khrag
198b7(mdo sde): khrig brgya stong dag gis blangs te mchod rten du bya ba dang /mchod par bya ba'i phyir rang rang gi gnas su khyer ro//byang chub sems dpa'i sgra dang ag chom gang yin pa de dag kyang
199a1(mdo sde): grong pa'i bu mo legs skyes mas bkra shis pa yin no snyam nas/mchod rten du bya ba dang /mchod par bya ba'i phyir khyer ro//byang chub sems dpa' klung nas
199a2(mdo sde): byung nas 'dug par 'dod de gling la blta'o//de nas klud nai rany+dza na'i klu'i bu mo gang yin pa de sa'i 'og nas byung ste/yid las byung ba'i seng ge'i khri byang chub sems dpa' la phul nas
199a3(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' de la 'dug ste/grong pa'i bu mo legs skyes ma la snying brtse ba nye bar bzung nas/ji tsam dgos par 'o thug sbrang rtsi can de 'thungs so//'thungs nas kyang
199a4(mdo sde): gser gyi snod chen po de la ma chags par chur bor ro//bor ma thog tu klu'i rgyal po rgya mtshos mchod pa'i 'os yin no zhes dad pa dang gus pa bskyed de blangs nas rang gi gnas su
199a5(mdo sde): song ngo //de nas mig stong pa grong khyer 'jig pa nam mkha' lding gi gzugs su sprul nas kha rdo rje'i mchur bsgyur te/klu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho las gser gyi snod chen po de dbrog tu brgal
199a6(mdo sde): na ma nus nas rang gi gzugs kyis gus par byas te/bslangs nas mchod rten du bya ba dang /mchod par bya ba'i phyir sum cu rtsa gsum gyi gnas su khyer ro//khyer nas kyang snod
199a7(mdo sde): chen po'i dge 'dun gyi dus ston byas te/deng sang du'ang sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams lo gcig bzhin du snod chen po'i dus ston byed do//seng ge'i khri de'ang klu'i bu mo de nyid kyis
199b1(mdo sde): mchod rten du bya ba dang /mchod par bya ba'i phyir khyer ro//dge slong dag byang chub sems dpas zas rags pa zos ma thag tu byang chub sems dpa'i bsod nams kyi stobs dang /shes rab
199b2(mdo sde): kyi stobs kyis skad cig de nyid la lus lo snga ma'i'o kha dog bzang po rgyas pa dang /skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang /dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu dang /'od 'drom gang ba'ang
199b3(mdo sde): byung bar gyur to//de la 'di skad ces bya ste/lo drug par du brtul zhugs nyamos 'og chung bas bcom ldan blo gos 'di snyam sems//gal te bdag ni 'di ltar ring bzhin bsam
199b4(mdo sde): gtan mngon shes ye shes stobs ldan pa//shing gri rgyal po'i drung du song ste thams cad mkhyen nyid 'tshang rgyar bya na ni//de dag na yang bdag gis phyi ma'i skye bo dag la snying brtsem
199b5(mdo sde): byas 'gyur//bsod nams ngan ngon tsam dang ldan pa'i lha mi 'di dag ngan pas ye shes 'tshol//de dag lus ni nyam chung gyur na bdud rtsi 'tshang rgya byed par mi nus pas//kha zas
199b6(mdo sde): rags pa dam pa zos te lus kyi mthu stobs bskyed pa byas na ni//shing gi rgyal po'i drung du song ste thams cad mkhyen nyid 'tshang rgyar bya bar bsams//grong pa'i bu mo sngon chad spyod pa
199b7(mdo sde): spyad pa legs skyes ma zhes bya ba de//'dren pa brtul zhugs grub par shog ces de lta'i yid kyis rtag tu mchod sbyin byed//de ni lho yis bskul ba thos nas de tshe'o thug sbrang rtsi can
200a1(mdo sde): blangs te//klung gi 'gram du song nas dga' ba'i yid kyis nai ran+d+ha na'i ngogs na 'dug/bskal pa stong du spyod pa spyad cing dbang po zhi la rab tu zhing de//lha dang klu ma
200a2(mdo sde): tshigs dang drang srong dag gis bskor te ne rany+dzan ra 'ongs//pha rol pargyal nas sems can sgrol ba blo gros ldan pa khrus byar ba sams nis ni//thub pa dag pa dri med 'jig rten rnying
200a3(mdo sde): phyir ni klung du zhugs te 'khru//bye ba phrag stong lha dag dga' ba'i yid kyis spos rnams dang ni phye ma dag/klud du 'dzer zhing sems can dam pa dkru ba'i don du tshul gang bar byed//
200a4(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' dri mo nges pa bkrus te ngogs na 'dug par shes gyur nas//lce stong rab tu dga' ste sems can dag pa bkrus pa'i chu mchod phyir khyer//ngur smri/
200a5(mdo sde): bordung po drim med pa'i gros dag lha yi du yis de labyin//rung ba dag dang sha mthungs bgos nas bcom ldan 'das ni chu drung ngogs ni 'dug/klu yo bu mo dga'o zhing rab tu mchu
200a6(mdo sde): ba'i yid rjes seng ge'i khri yang bshams//de la 'jig rten dag gi mig byed yid kyang rab tu zhi ba de 'dug nas//blo gas ldan pa legs skyes ma des gser gyi snod du kha zas
200a7(mdo sde): thugs te byin//rkang par phyag 'tshal nas ni de dag kha lo sgyur ba bdag gis gsol zhes byas//blo gros ldan pas triHma dgos par zas kyang zos nas snod ni chur bar te//de ni
200b1(mdo sde): grong khyer 'jig pa lha yi bla mas bdag gis mchod par bya zhes khyer//gang tshe rgyal bas kha zas rags pa dam pa zos pa de yi skad cig la//de yi lus kyi stobs dang gzi brjid dag dang dpal
200b2(mdo sde): yang snga ma po bzhin du gnas//legs skyes ma dang lho rnams dag la chos gtam byas nas don kyang mang du byas//seng ge ngang pa'i stabs dang glang po'i dbang po'i 'gros kyis byang chub
200b3(mdo sde): shing drung chas//nai rany+dza na'i le'u zhes bya bo ste/bco brgyad pa'o////dge slong dag de ltar byang chub sems dpa' klung nai rany+dza nar khrus byas te/zas zos nas lus kyi
200b4(mdo sde): mthu stongs bskyed de/bdud las rnam par rgyal bar bya ba'i phyir rnam pa bcu drug dang ldan pa'i sa phyogs shing gri rgyal po byang chub chen po'i drung gi la ba der skyes bu chen po'i stabs
200b5(mdo sde): yin pa'i stobaso des song ste/mi bskyod pa'i stabs dang /dbang po'i mchod sdong lta bu'i stabs dang /ri'i rgyal po lhun po ltar shin tu brtan pa'i stabs dang /mi dngom pa ma
200b6(mdo sde): yin pa'i stangs dang /ya yo med pa'i stangs dang /'tshe ba med pa'i stangs dang /rings pa ma yin pa'i stabs dang /sdod pa med pa'i stabs dang /'khrugs pa med pa'i
200b7(mdo sde): stabs dang /'byor ba med pa'i stangs dang /'drud pa med pa'i stabs dang /zhum pa med pa'i stabs dang /ha cang mi sdod pa'i stabs dang /mi g.yos pa'i stabs dang /ta btab
201a1(mdo sde): po med pa'i skyabs dang /tshul du shis pa'i stabs dang /dri ma med pa'i stabs dang /dge ba'i stabs dang /zhe sdang med pa'i stabs dang /gti mug med pa'i
201a2(mdo sde): stabs dang /chags pa med pa'i stabs dang seng ge'i stabs dang /ngang pa'i rgyal po'i stabs dang /klu'i rgyal po'i stabs dang /sred med kyi bu'i stabs dang /sa la mi reg pa'i stabs

201a5(mdo sde): pa 'dor ba'i stabs dang /sngon dge ba legs par smad pa'i 'gos kyi skabs dang /son gyi sangs rgyas seng ge'i khri la bzhud pa'i sbubs dang /rdo rje ltar bsami pa brtan zhing mi phred
201a6(mdo sde): pa'i stabs dang /ngan song ngan 'gro thams cad gcod pa'i stabs dang /bde ba thams cad bskyed pa'i stabs dang /thar pa'i lam ston pa'i stabs dang /bdud kyi stobs stobs med
201a7(mdo sde): par byed pa'i stangs dang /ngan pa'i tshogs can gyi tshogs pas kyis rgol ba chos dang mthun pos tshar bcad pa'i stabs dang /mun pa'i ling thog dang /nyon mongs pa sel ba'i
201b1(mdo sde): stabs dang /'khor ba'i phyogs phyogs med par byed pa'i stangs dang /brgya byin dang /tshangs pa dang /dbang phyug chen po dang /'jig rten skyeng ba rnams zil gyis gnon pa'i stabs dang /
201b2(mdo sde): stong gsum gyi stong chen po na dpa' bo gcig pu'i stabs dang /rang byung zil gyis ma non pa'i stabs dang /thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes thob par byed pa'i stabs dang /dran pa dang blo/

201b5(mdo sde): rnams kyis lam phyag dar byas par gyur to//char sprin rnams kyis spyos chus tshig chag btab bo//me tog kyang chal mur bkram mo//stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams
201b6(mdo sde): 'di na shing ji snyed yod pa de dag thams cad kyang shing byang chub ga la ba de logs su rtse mo 'dud par gyur to//gang dag de'i nyin par bcas pa'i byis pa de dag kyang byang chub kyi snying po logs su
201b7(mdo sde): mgo bstan te nyal lo//stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na ri rab la sogs pa ri gang dag yod pa de dag thams cad kyang byang chub kyi snying po ga la ba de logs su 'dud
202a1(mdo sde): par gyur to//klung nai rany+dza na nas bzung ste/byang chub kyi snying po'i bar der 'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha'i bu rnams kyis kha tshon rgyang grags tsam tshun chad kyi lam mngon par
202a2(mdo sde): bkod par gyur to//lam de'i 'gram g.yas g.yon du'ang rin po che sna bdun gyi stegs bu 'phang du shing ta la bdun tsam du mtho ba/steng du rin po che'i'adra ba bres pa/lha'i gdugs
202a3(mdo sde): dang /rgyal mtshan dang /ba dan gyis legs par brgyan pa sprul to//mda' rgyang gang tsam/mnga' rgyang gang tsam zhing rin po che sna bdun gyi shing ta la stegs bu de bas mtho ba mngon
202a4(mdo sde): par sprul te/shing ta la thams cad rin po che brgyus pas phan tshun 'brel bar 'dug go//shing tA la gnyis gnyis kyi bar du rting spos chus yongs su gang ba gser gyi bye ma bdalnga ba/

202a6(mdo sde): dang /bya bar dang /ngang pi dang /ngur pa dang /khrung khrung dang /rma bya sgra 'byin pa'i rdzing dag byas so//lam de nA lha'i bu mo brgyad khri ni spos chus chog chag 'debs so//lha'i bu ma

202b1(mdo sde): brum nan+dan dang /a ga ru'i phye ma'i phur ma thogs pa dang /dus kyi rjes su 'brang ba'i 'dug pa'i phyug par thogs pa brgyad khri 'khod par gyur to//rin po che'i mkha' rten thams cad la rgya
202b2(mdo sde): bu mo lha'i glu dbyangs len pa lnga khri 'khod par gyur to//dge slong dag de ltar byang chub sems dpa' zhing rnams ni rab tu skyong /'od zer bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong ni 'byin/sil snyan brgya stong
202b3(mdo sde): ni sgrogs/me tog mang po'i char chen po ni 'bebs/gos brgya stong gi g.yab mo ni 'dor/rnga bo che brgya stong ni rdung /rta dang glang po che dang /glang khyu ba rnams ni sgra 'byin/bya ne tsa dang /ri
202b4(mdo sde): skegs dang /khu byug dang /ka la bing+ga dang /shang shang te'u dang /ngang pa dang /ngur pa dang /khrung khrung dang /rma bya brgya stong ni bskor ba byed/bkra shis brgya stong ni 'bul zhing lam gyi
