202b6(mdo sde): de nyid kyi nub mo stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i bdag po tshangs pa dbang sgyur zhes bya ba des tshangs pa'i 'khor chen po de la bos te 'odadi skad ces smras so//grogs po dag shes par gyis shig/
202b7(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha chen po mnangs pa/dam bcas pa chen po ma bor ba/go cha sra ba mnabs pa/thugs yongs su mi skyo ba/byang chub sems dpa'i
203a1(mdo sde): spyod pa thams cad char phyin pa/pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad kyi pha rol tu byon pa/byang chub sems dpa'i sa thams cad la mnga' dbang brnyes pa/byang chub sems
203a2(mdo sde): dpa'i bsam pa thams cad kyi bya ba shin tu mkhyen pa/sems can thams cad kyi dbang po'i rjes su zhugs pa/de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang ba thams cad la shin tu zhugs pa/
203a3(mdo sde): bdud kyi las kyi lam thams cad las yang dog par 'das pa/dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad la gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog pa/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs
203a4(mdo sde): pa/sems can thams cad la rab tu thar pa'i lam ston pa/ded dpon chen por gyur pa/bdud kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad 'joms par mdzad pa/stong gsum na dpa' bo
203a5(mdo sde): gcig pur gyur pa/chos kyi sman thams cad yang dag par bsgrubs pa/sman pa'i rgyal po chen po rnam par grol ba'i thabs thob pa/chos kyi rgyal po chen po shes rab kyi 'od chen po
203a6(mdo sde): gtong ba/tog chen po'i rgyal po 'jig rten gyi chos brgyad kyis ma gos pas pad+ma chen po lta bu/chos thams cad kyi gzungs ma bsnyel ba/rgya mtsho chen po dang 'dra ba/rjes su
203a7(mdo sde): chags pa dang khong khro ba dang bral ba/mi g.yo ba/mi bskyod pa/ri rab chen po lta bu/shin tu dri ma med pa/shin tu yongs su dag pa/shin tu dkar ba'i blo dang ldan pa/nor bu
203b1(mdo sde): rin po che chen po dang 'dra ba/chos thams cad la dbang sgyur ba/sems las su rung ba/tshangs pa chen po lta bu'i byang chub sems dpa' de bdud kyi sngo rab tu 'dul ba dang /bla na med pa yang
203b2(mdo sde): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par byang chub par bzhed pa dang /stobs bcu dang /mi 'jigs po bzhi dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad yongs su rdzogs
203b3(mdo sde): par mdzad pa dang /chos kyi 'khor lo chen po bskor ba dang /seng ge'i sgra chen po bsgrags pa dang /chos kyi sbyin pas sems can thams cad tshim par mdzad pa dang /sems can
203b4(mdo sde): thams cad kyi chos kyi mig rnam par sbyang ba dang /phas kyi rgol ba thams cad chos dang mthun pas tshar bcad pa dang /sngon dam bcas pa yongs su rdzogs pa kun tu bstan pa dang /
203b5(mdo sde): chos thams cad la dbang phyug gi mnga' dbang brnyes par mdzad pa'i phyir byang chub kyi snying por bzhud kyis/de la grogs po dag khyed byang chub sems dpa' la mchod pa dang /rim gro
203b6(mdo sde): bya ba'i las thams cad la spro bar gyis shig/de nas tshangs pa chen po dbang sgyur gyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so//gong gi bsod nams ngag dang gzi brjid dpal gyis
203b7(mdo sde): byabyoms dang snying rje dga' ba dang //btang snyoms dang ni bsam gtan dag dang de bzhin mngon shes tshangs pa'i lam snang ba//bskal pa stong du spyod pa spyad pa de ni byang chub shing drung
204a1(mdo sde): chas par gyur//thub pa de la bsam pa'i brtul zhugs sgrub par byed pa'i mchod pa legs par bya//de la skyabs su song nang na 'gro'i 'jigs dang mi phrad mi khom
204a2(mdo sde): mi 'gyur te//lha yi nang du 'dod pa'i bde ba rnyed nas tshangs pa'i gnas yangs 'gro bar 'gyur//lo drug bar du dka' ba spyod pa spyad nas 'di ni byang chub shing drung bzhud//kun
204a3(mdo sde): kyang dga' zhing rab tu mgu ba'i yid kyis de la mchod pa legs par gyis//de ni stong gsum rgyal po dbang phyug dam pa chos kyi dbang phyug rgyal po ste//brgya byin tshangs pa nyi zla'i
204a4(mdo sde): grong khyer dag na de dang mnyam pa grang yang med//gang btsas tshe na zhing rnams bya ba khrag khrig rnam pa drug tu g.yos gyur pa//de ni de ring bdud kyi dpung las rgyal bar mdzad phyir shing
204a5(mdo sde): tshachen mchog drung bzhud//gang gi spyi gtsug tshangs pa'i gnas 'dir gnas kyang blta bar nus pa ma yin zhing //gang gi sku la mtshan rab dam pa ldan zhing sum cu rtsa gnyis legs
204a6(mdo sde): brgyan la//gang gi gsung 'dir yid du 'ong zhing snyan la rnar 'thad tshangs dbyangs sgra snyan cing //gang gi thugs ni rab zhi khro dang bral ba de la mchod pa byed du 'dong //gang dag blo
204a7(mdo sde): gros brgya byin tshangs pa'i gnas su bsam gtan bde bas 'da' bye dang //nyon mongs 'ching ba'i'i khri shing kun dang dra ba de dge gcod par byed 'dod dang //gzhan las ma
204b1(mdo sde): thos par ni rang rgyal byang chub zhi pa 'chi med 'thob 'dod dang //bral te sa gsum dag na sangs rgyas nyid 'dod de dag 'dren pa mchod par gyis//gang gis rgya mtshor bcas pa'i sa dang de bzhin
204b2(mdo sde): rin po che rnams mtha' yas dang //khang bzang skar khung bsil khang mang ldan pa dang zung du sbrel dang bzhon pa dang //me tog phreng ba shin tu mdzes pas brgyan sa skyed mos tshal gyis rab
204b3(mdo sde): brgyan dang //rkang lag mgo dang mig rnams yongs su btung ba de ni byang chub snying por zhugs//dge slong dag de ltar stong gsum gyi tshangs pa chen po de skad cig de lo stong gsum gyi stong
204b4(mdo sde): chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'dar phyin te/lag mthal ltar mnyam par gyur pa/gyo mo dang rdo med pa dang /nor bu dang mu tig dang /bai DUr+ya dang /dung dang /man shel dang /khyu
204b5(mdo sde): ru dang /gser dang /dngul mang ba/rtsa sngo zhing 'jam pa g.yas su 'khyil cing g.yung drung 'khyil pa/ka tsa lin+da'i gos ltar reg na bde ba dag gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i
204b6(mdo sde): 'jig rten gyi khams khyab pa 'dir phyin to//de'i tshe rgya mtsho chen po thams cad sa lta bur gyur kyang chu na rgyu ba'i sems can rnams la gnod pa cung zad kyang med do//'jig rten gyi khams
204b7(mdo sde): de ltar brgyan pa 'di phyogs bcu'i brgya byin dang /tshangs pa dang /'jig rten skyong ba rnams kyis mthong nas byang chub sems dpa' la mchod pa'i las kyi phyir sangs rgyas kyi ning brgya
205a1(mdo sde): migs par brtanaH//d+hu chub sems dpa' lamaHdpa'i lus phyi byung chu sa sa pa rnams kyis /'ong tshulalas sh-id d+ha 'das pa'o
205a2(mdo sde): pabakad pa rnams kyis phyags bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing dadrug tu med pa brgyan par gyur ///sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag thams cad nga shing pa'i rkyen sna tshogs kyis brtan pas
205a3(mdo sde): spangs rgyas kyi zhing gzhi ga lta bur snang bar gyur to//'jig rten gyi bar dag dang /ri nag pa dang //kha~Mr yug dang //dzAr smug chen po dag kyang mi snang bar gyur to//snangs rgyas d+d+hi
205a4(mdo sde): zhing de dag thams cad ni byang chub sems dpa'i 'od kyis gas la bar snang ngo //byang chub kyi snying pa yongs su sbyong ba'i lha'i bu bcu drug yod de/'di lta ste/lha'i bu ut+pa
205a5(mdo sde): bya ba dang /'i bu sum+b+ha la zhes bya ba dang /skye dgu'i bdag po dang /dang stobs dang /dpung rgyan stongs dang /rab brtani dang /sa 'dzi /snang byed drung /du
205a6(mdo sde): mdo nga /chos kyi ba phyug dang /rgyas nga /'gre dang /migazigs pa rnye dang /shA ba rgyan bya dang /tshul khrims rnam pashrI dri ljin dpe/ 'a /
205a7(mdo sde): sgra'i du bru drug po de dag ni byang chung kyi snying pa yongs su myong ba dag ste/thams cad kyang phyir mi ldog pa'i bzod pa thob pa shastog go//de dag gis kyang byang chub sems kyin
205b1(mdo sde): la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir byang chub kyi snying po brgyan te/dpag tshad brgyad cu khor yug tu rin po che sna bdun gyi stegs bu rim bdun gyis ni bskor/shing ta la'i phreng ba rim bdun dang /rin
205b2(mdo sde): po che'i dril bu g.yer ka'i dra ba ram bdun dang /rin po che brgyus pa rim bdun gyis ni bskor/dzam+bu'i chu bo'i gser gyi glegs ma rin po che thams cad kyis spras pa dag dang /gser gyi tshong
205b3(mdo sde): tshong dag dang /dzam+bu'i chu bo'i gser gyi pad+mo dag gis ni khebs par byas/snying po mchog gi spos kyis ni bdugs/rin po che'i dra ba ni bres so//phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams
205b4(mdo sde): tha dad pa dag na shing sna tshogs mngon par 'phags pa/bzang po mngon du mchod pa/lha yul ba dang /mi yul ba gang dag na yod pa de dag thams cad kyang byang chub kyi snying po der snang
205b5(mdo sde): bar gyur to//phyogs bcu dag na chu nas skye ba dang /thang las skye ba'i me tog rnam pa sna tshogs gang dag yod pa de dag thams cad kyang byang chub kyi snying po der snang bar gyur to//phyogs
205b6(mdo sde): bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams tha dad pa dag na/byang chub sems dpa' gang dag bsod nams dang /ye shes kyi tshogs tshad med pa'i bkod pa dag gis byang chub kyi snying po brgyan
205b7(mdo sde): par byed pa de dag kyang byang chub kyi snying po der snang bar gyur to//de ltar lha'i bu byang chub kyi snying po yongs su skyong ba dag gis byang chub kyi snying por bkod pa de 'dra ba dag sprul par
206a1(mdo sde): gyur te/de dag lha dang /klu dang /gnod sbyin dang /dri za dang /lha ma yin dag gis mthong nas rang rang gi gnas la dur khrod tsam gyi 'du shes bskyed par gyur to//bkod
206a2(mdo sde): pa de dag mthong nas shin tu ngo mtshar cher 'dzin te/e ma'o bsod nams kyi rnam par smin pa'i rgyu mthun pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa legs so zhes ched du brjod pa tshad du brjod do//byang chub
206a3(mdo sde): kyi shing gi lha mo bzhi 'di lta ste/'od ma dang /snyan ldan dang /yid bzang dang /mdangs ldan ma ste/byang chub kyi shing gi lha mo bzhi po de dag gis kyang byang chub sems dpa' la mchod pa bya
206a4(mdo sde): ba'i phyir byang chub kyi shing rtsa ba phun sum tshogs pa/sdong po phun sum tshogs pa/yal ga dang /lo ma dang /me tog dang /'bras bu sna tshogs phun sum tshogs pa/khron
206a5(mdo sde): dang sboms phun sum tshogs pa mdzes pa/blta na sdug pa/shin tu 'grel ba/'phang du shing tA la bdun pa srid tsam du mtho ba/de dang 'tshim par 'grel ba/bkra bA/blta na
206a6(mdo sde): sdug pa/yid du 'ong ba/rin po che sna bdun gyi stegs bu rim bdun gyis bskor ba/rin po che'i shing ta la'i phreng rim bdun dang /rin po che'i dril bu g.yer ka'i dra ba rim
206a7(mdo sde): bden dang /rin po che rgyus pa'i phreng rim bdun gyis kun nas bskor cing phyi rim bskor ba/shing yongs 'dus brtol dang 'dra ba/mig gis blta bas mi ngoms pa bskyed do//
206b1(mdo sde): gang du byang chub sems dpa' 'dug nas byang chub mngon par rdzogs par byang chub par 'dod pa'i sa phyogs de ni stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rdo rje'i dkyil te/sra
206b2(mdo sde): ba/snying po yod pa/mi phyed pa/rdo rje'i rang bzhin du gnas par gyur pa'o//dge slong dag de ltar byang chub sems dpa' byang chub kyi snying por 'gro ba na lus las rnam pa 'di lta bu'i 'od
206b3(mdo sde): 'gyed de/'od des ngan song thams cad zhi bar gyur to//mi khom pa thams cad bcad par gyur to//ngan 'gro'i tshor ba thams cad bskams par gyur to//sems can gang dag
206b4(mdo sde): dbang po ma tshang ba de dag ni dbang po yongs su rdzogs pa thob par gyur to//nad kyis btab pa rnams ni nad sos par gyur to//mi bde ba thams cad ni bde ba thob par gyur to//'jigs
206b5(mdo sde): pas nyen pa rnams ni dbugs phyin pa thob par gyur to//bcing bas bcings pa rnams ni bcings pa las grol bar gyur to//sems can dbul po rnams ni longs spyod dang ldan par
206b6(mdo sde): gyur to//nyon mongs pas gdungs pa rnams ni yongs su gdung ba med par gyur to//bkres pa rnams ni lci 'grangs par gyur to//skom pa rnams ni skom pa med par gyur to//sbrum ma
206b7(mdo sde): rnams ni bde bar bcas par gyur to//zhum pa nyamar chung ba rnams ni stobs phun sum tshogs par gyur to//de'i tshe sems can gang la'ang 'dod chags dang zhe sdang dang /gti mug
207a1(mdo sde): dang /khro ba dang /chags pa dang /tha ba dang /gnod sems dang /phrag dog gi gnod pa med par gyur to//de'i tshe sems can gang yang 'chi ba med/'pho ba med/skye
207a2(mdo sde): ba med do//de'i tshe sems can thams cad byams pa'i sems dang /phan pa'i sems dang ldan zhing gcig la gcig pha mar 'du shes bskyed par gyur to//de la 'di skad ces bya ste//
207a3(mdo sde): mnar med pa la thug pa'i bar//dmyal ba mi bzad snang ba yi//sems can rnams kyi sdug bsngal zhi//bde ba'i tshor ba thob par 'gyur//dud 'gro'i skye gnas sems can rnams//
207a4(mdo sde): phan tshun gnod byed ji snyed pa//thu bo chen 'od kyis reg pas na//de dag byams pa'i sems kyang skyes//yi dgas 'jig rten yi dgas rnams//bkros skom nyan pa ji snyed pa//
207a5(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa'i gzi brjid kyis//de dag zas bsgom rnyed par gyur//mi khom thams cad chad gyur cing //ngan 'gro rnams kyang skams par gyur//sems can thams cad
207a6(mdo sde): bder gyur te//lha yi bde bas rab tu tshim//mig dang rna ba med pa dang //gzhan yang gang dag dbang po nyams//de dag dbang po kun rdzogs shing //yan lag thams cad mdzes
207a7(mdo sde): par gyur//'dod chags zhe sdang la sogs pa'i//nyon mongs rnams kyis sems can gang //gnod gyur de tshe nyon mongs kun//zhi bar gyur te bde dang ldan//smyos pa dag ni dran
207b1(mdo sde): ldan zhing //dbul po dag kyang nor dang ldan//nad kyis btab pa nad sos shing //bcing bas bcings pa grol bar gyur//ser sna med cing dgra med de//gnod sems dang ni rtsod pa dag/
207b2(mdo sde): phan tshun byed pa med gyur te//de tshe byams pa'i sems su gnas//pha dang ma dag bu gcig la//ji ltar phangs par sems pa ltar//de bzhin sems can phan tshun du//de tshe bu
207b3(mdo sde): phangs bzhin du sems//byang chub sems dpa'i 'od dra yis//phyogs bcu'i phyogs ni kun tu yang //gang+gA'i bye ma'i grangs snyed kyi//zhing rnams bsam gyis mi khyab gsal//ri tsa
207b4(mdo sde): nag po rnams dang ni//khor yug dag kyang mi snang gyur//rgya chen zhing rnams de dag kun//gcig po ji bzhin de ltar snang //lag mthil lta bur gyur pa ste//byang chub sems
207b5(mdo sde): dpa' mchod pa'i phyir//zhing rnams thams cad legs brgyan pas//thams cad rin chen nyid du snang //byang chub snying po'i rim gro pa//lha ni da ltar bcu drug yod//
207b6(mdo sde): dpag tshad brgyad cu'i sa khyon nang //byang chub snying po brgyan par gyur//zhing rnams bye ba mtha' yas na//bkod po chen po gang yod pa//byang chub sems dpa'i gzi brjid kyis///
207b7(mdo sde): de dag thams cad der yang snang //lho dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang //mi 'am ci dang lto 'phye che//rang rang gzhal med khang rnams la//dur khrod tsam du shes par gyur//'dir ni
208a1(mdo sde): bkod pa de mthong nas//lha dang mi rnams ngo mtshar gyur//bsod nams gang gi rgyu mthun 'dir//phun sum 'di 'dra 'di legs 'dzer//lus dang ngag dang yid
208a2(mdo sde): rnams kyis//brtson pa bya ba med par yang //dri yi yid la 'dod pa dang //bsam pa thams cad rab tu 'grub//ji ltar bsam pa gzhan dag kyang //sngon spyod chen rdzogs gyur
208a3(mdo sde): pa/las dri'i rnam par smin pa yis//'di 'dra'i phun sum tshogs 'di byung //byang chub shing gi lha mo bzhis//lha yi shing ni yongs 'dug/de bas khyad par 'phags pa yis//
208a4(mdo sde): byang chub snying po brgyan pa byas//byang chub snying po'i bkod pa gang //lha yis mngon par 'dus byas pa//yon tan de dag tshig gis ni//thams cad brjod par yod mi
208a5(mdo sde): nos//dge slong dag de ltararo byang chub sems dpa'i lus las 'od phyung ba rnam par dag pa/dri ma med pa/lus dang sems tshim par byed cing dga' ba bskyed pa/nyon mongs
208a6(mdo sde): pa thams cud sel ba/sems can la dga' ba dang /bde ba dang /dad pa dang /mchog tu dga' ba thams cad bskyed pa des klu'i rgyal po nag po'i gnas snang bar byas par mthong
208a7(mdo sde): nas/de'i tshe klu'i rgyal po nag po rang gi 'khor gyi mdun du 'dug ste tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so//gang phyi ro bdag gi gi nas 'di gser gyi 'od kyis brgyan par lha nger
208b1(mdo sde): gyur pa las//ji ltar 'khor ba 'jig gi 'od mdzes mthong zhing gser zhes bya ba'i mthong ba dang //ji ltar 'od srung chos kyi rgyal po skyon med pa yi dri med 'od mthong ltar//mtshan mchog ldan
208b2(mdo sde): zhing phan mdzad ye shes 'od ldan pa zhig 'byung du the tshom med//sngon chad nyes par byas pa'i las kyis bdag gi khyim ni shin tu mun pas gang //khyim 'di na ni nyi ma zla ba dag gis rgya cher
208b3(mdo sde): 'od kyang yod mi snang //me dang nor bu dag dang dri med glog dang skar ma rnams kyi 'od mi snang //brgya byin 'od dang tshangs pa'i 'od dang lha min rnams kyi 'od kyang mi snang na//de ring khyim
208b4(mdo sde): 'di'i nang du nyi ma'i 'od 'dra ba yi dge bas mdzes gyur la//sems kyang dga' ba bskyed cing lus kyang bde bar gyur la lus ni bsil gyur to//lus kyi steng du bye chen 'bab pa de yod
208b5(mdo sde): bdag la bsil bar gyur pa las//bskal pa bya ba mang por spyad pa byang chub shing drung bzhud par shin tu gsal//klu yi me tog mdzes dang bzang la dri zhim gos dang mu tig do shul
208b6(mdo sde): dang //rgyan dang gdu bu dag dang phye ma rnams dang bdug pa mchog rnams myur thogs la//klu dbyangs dag dang rol mo'i dbyangs sgra sna tshogs gyis shig rnga dang rdza rnga bzang //brdung zhing
208b7(mdo sde): 'gro bla kun gyis mchod 'os phon pa mdzad la mchod pa byed du 'ding //de ni langs te klu yi bu mo rnams dang lhan cig phyogs bzhir bltas pa dang //de nas ri bo lhun po lta bur gzi
209a1(mdo sde): brjid rnams kyis legs par brgyan pa zhig/lha dang lha min bye ba dag drang tshangs pa'i dbang dang gnod sbyin rnams kyis bskor//dpa' ba'i yid kyis de la mchod
209a2(mdo sde): byed shul ni 'di zhes ston cing 'drong ba mthong //klu yi rgyal de rab tu dga' zhing mogu nas 'jig rten mchog la mchod byas te//gus dang bcas pas de yi rkang pa gnyis la phyag 'tshal
209a3(mdo sde): thob pa'i mdun du 'dug/klu yi bu mo rnams kyang dga' zhing mgu ba'i yid kyis thub la mchod pa byed//me tog rnams dang spros dang byug pa dag kyang 'thor zhing sil snyan rnams kyang
209a4(mdo sde): byed//klu yi rgyal po rab tu dga' nas thal sbyar yang dag yon tan rnams kyis bstod//'dren pa 'jig rten dam pa dpung zla nya ba'i zhal 'dra mthong bar gyur pa lags//bdag gis
209a5(mdo sde): sngon chad dang srong rnams kyi mtshan ma mthong ba khyod kyang de 'dra ste//de ring khyod kyis bdud kyi dpung rnams bcom ste bzhed pa'i go 'phang brnyes par 'gyur//gang gi don du sngon chad
209a6(mdo sde): dul dang sbyin dang bsnams shing bdog pa kun btang la//gang gi don du dul dang tshul khrims byams dang snying rje ba dang bzod pa bsgoms//gang gi don du brtson 'grus brtan dang bsam
209a7(mdo sde): gtan dgyes dang shes rab 'bar mdzad pa//khyod kyi smon lam de dag thams cad rab tu rdzogs nas de ring rgyal bar 'gyur//ji ltar ljon shing lo ma me tog 'bras bur bcas pa
209b1(mdo sde): byang chub shing la 'dud//ji ltar bum pa chub kyis gang bstong dag khyod la bskor ba rab bgyid cing //ji ltar tsa sha'i tshogs rnams rab tu dga' ste snyan pa'i sgra skad 'byin pa dang //ji ltar
209b2(mdo sde): ngong pa khrung khrung tshogs kyang mkha' las mchi zhing tshul du shis ldan por//dang ba'i yid kyis drang srong la ni bskor ba bgyid las de ring dgra bcom 'gyur//ji ltar gser gyi kha dog lta
209b3(mdo sde): bur mdzes pa'i 'od rnams zhing ni brgyar mchis te//ji ltar ngan song mtha' dag zhi bar bgyid cing skye dgu sdug bsngal thar bgyid dang //ji ltar nyi ma zla ba'i gnas kyi rgyun tshad bser
209b4(mdo sde): ma'ang dal bus ldang bA las//srid pa gsum du skye dang rga ba thar mdzad pa yi ded dpon de ring 'gyur//ji ltar lha rnams 'dod pa'i dga' ba spangs te khyod la mchod du lhags pa dang /
209b5(mdo sde): tshangs dang tshangs pa'i mdun na 'don dang lha rnams bsam gtan bde ba spangs pa dang //gang yang srid pa gsum na dbang phyug dam pa mchis pa thams cad 'dir lhags las//srid pa
209b6(mdo sde): gsum du skye rga thar pa mdzad pa'i sman pa'i rgyal dor de ring byon//ji ltar lha rnams dag gis phyag dar bgyis pa'i shul de nas ni khyod gshegs la//bcom ldan 'khor ba 'jig dang
209b7(mdo sde): gser zhes bgyi dang 'od srung dag kyang de nas gshegs//ji ltar pad+ma bzang po dri ma ma mchis rnam dag dogs brtol byung ste//de la stobs chen ldan pa zhabs kyi gom pa 'dor las de
210a1(mdo sde): ring dgra bcom 'gyur//bye ba khrag khrig stong phrag du ma gang+gA klung gi bye ma snyed kyi bdud//de dag rnams kyis byang chub shing drung nas ni khyod la bskyod pa 'am g.yos
210a2(mdo sde): ma nus//mchod sbyin khrag khrig phrag stong rnam pa du ma gang+gA klung gi bye ma snyed//khyod kyis mdzad cing 'gro la phan phyir spyad po des na 'dir ni rnam par mdzes//rgyu skar zla bar
210a3(mdo sde): bcas shing skar ma nyi mar bcas pa mkha' las sar lhung gde'o//ri mchog chen po rang gi gnas nas g.yo zhing rgya mtsho skams par 'gyur yang gda'//skyes bu mkhas pa la
210a4(mdo sde): las khams bzhi po dag re re nas ni ston nus gda'//khyod ni shing gi rgyal po'i drung du gshegs nas byang chub ma thob bzhengs mi gda'//gang gi slad du kho lo sgyur ba mthong zhing
210a5(mdo sde): mchod bgyis yon tan brjod pa dang //byang chub tu yang spro bas bdag gis rnyed pa 'phel ba rgya chen rnyed par gyur//bur bcas bdag dang klu yi bu mo thams cid skye gnas
210a6(mdo sde): 'di las thar gyur cing //glang po dregs pa'i stabs su bzhud pa khyod kyi stabs des bdag cag mchi bar bgyi//dge slong dag de ltar klu'i rgyal po nag po'i chung ma dmo pAg ser
210a7(mdo sde): 'od ces bya ba klu'i bu mo rin po che'i gdugs sna tshogs thogs po dang /sil snyen sna tshogs thogs pa dang /mu tig gi de shalaM sna tshogs thogs pa dang /nor bu rin pa
210b1(mdo sde): che sna tshogs thogs pa dang /lha'i dang mi'i phreng ba brgyus pa sna tshogs thogs pa dang /pog por sna tshogs thogs pa dang /silnga snyan dang glu dbyangs sna tshogs len pa rab tu mang pos
210b2(mdo sde): yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdar te/byang chub sems dpa'i gan du 'dod zhing rin po che'i me tog sna tshogs mngon par gtor te tshigs su bcod pa 'di dag gis kyang bstod do//'khrul
210b3(mdo sde): pa mi mnga' mi bsnyengs mi 'dzem bag mi tsho//ma zhum mi dman rab tu dgyes pa gdul dka' ba//ma chags mi sdang ma rmongs brkam pa mi mnga' ba//chags bral rnam grol
210b4(mdo sde): drang srong khyod la phyag 'tshal lo//sman pa zug rngu bral ba gdul ba 'dul mdzad pa//'gro ba sdug bsngal rnams las ther mdzad sman pa mchog/gnas dang skyabs ma mchis shing
210b5(mdo sde): dman pa mkhyen nos ni//'jig rten gsum 'dir gnas dang skyabs su khyod byung ngo //ji ltar lha tsho gas rab tu dad cing dgar gyur te//me tog char pa chen po mkha' las 'bebs
210b6(mdo sde): pa dang //'di dag ji ltar gos chen 'thor bar bgyid pa las//de ring rgyal bar 'gyur gyis rab tu dgyes par mdzod//shing dbang drung du gshegs la bsnyengs pa mi mngar bzhugs
210b7(mdo sde): bdud kyi sde las rgyal mdzad nyon mongs dra ba drol//sngon gyi rgyal dbang rnams kyis ji ltar sangs rgyas ltar//byang chub zhi ba dam pa mchog ni 'tshang rgyar mdzod//khyod kyis gang
211a1(mdo sde): gi don du bskal pa bye mang du//'gro ba sgrol ba'i don du dka' ba spyad pa mdzad//khyod kyi dgongs pa rdzogs te dus la dbab kyis//shing dbang drung du gshegs te
211a2(mdo sde): byang chub mchog reg mdzod//dge slong dag de nas byang chub sems dpas 'di snyam du bsams te/sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa de dag ci zhig la bzhugs nas bla na med pa yang
211a3(mdo sde): dog par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas snyam mo//de nas dris yang 'di snyam du bsams te/rtswa bting nas bzhugs so snyam mo//de nas gnas gtsang
211a4(mdo sde): ma'i ris kyi lha'i cho gas brgya stong par snang la 'khod pa dag gis byang chub sems dpa'i sems kyi yongs su rtog pa sems kyis shes nas tshig 'di skad ces smras so//de de bzhin no///
211a5(mdo sde): skyes bu dam pa de de bzhin te/sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa de dag rtswa bting ba la bzhugs nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas
211a6(mdo sde): so//dge slong dag byang chub sems dpas lam gyi g.yas rol na rtswa 'tshong bkra shis pa zhes bya ba rtswa sngo ba/'jam pa/shin tu gzhon po/nyams dga' ba/lcang lor 'khril byar
211a7(mdo sde): 'dug pa/g.yas su 'khyil pa/rma bya'i mgrin pa lta bu/ka tsi lin+da'i gos ltar reg na bde ba dri rab tu zhim pa/kha dog dang ldan pa/yid du 'ong ba dag brda zhing 'dug pa mthong
211b1(mdo sde): po/mthong nas kyang byang chub sems dpas lam bor te/rnga 'tshod bkra shis pa gal ba der song nas phyin pa dang /rtswa 'tshong bkra shis pa la snyan pa'i tshig gis smras te/tshig de ni kun shes
211b2(mdo sde): par byed pa dang /rnam par shes par byed pa dang /rnam par gsal ba dang /mi chod pa dang /tshogs par byed pa dang /snyan cing 'jebs pa dang /mnyan por 'os pa dang /snum pa
211b3(mdo sde): dang /go bar byed pa dang /skul ba dang /tshim par byed pa dang /dga' bar byed pa dang /mi rtsub pa dang /sha sho bo ma yin pa dang /mi brlang ba dang /mi brkam pa dang /'dzem pa
211b4(mdo sde): dang /snyan pa dang /rnar bde ba dang /lus dang sems shin tu dga' bar byed pa dang /'dod chags dang zhe sdang dang gti mug dang 'thab pa dang /rnyog pa sel ba dang /ka la bing+ka'i sgra skad
211b5(mdo sde): lta bu dang /bya kun la dang /shang shang te'u la sogs pa sgra 'byin pa'i ngo ro lta bu dang /rnga bo che dang /glu dbyangs kyi sgra skad kyi nga ro dang ldan pa dang /gnod pa med pa dang /bden pa dang /
211b6(mdo sde): gsal ba dang /yang dag pa dang /tshangs pa'i sgra skad bsgrags pa'i gdangs lta bu dang /rgya mtsho'i sgra'i shugs lta bu dang /ri rdob pa'i sgra lta bu dang ldan pa dang /lha'i dbang po dang /lha ma
211b7(mdo sde): yin gyi dbang pos mngon par bstod pa dang /zab pa dang /gting dpag dka' ba dang /bdud kyi stobs stobs med par byed pa dang /phas kyi rgol ba'i smra ba 'joms pa dang /seng
212a1(mdo sde): ge'i sgra'i shugs lta bu dang /rta dang glang po che'i sgra 'byin pa'i nga ro lta bu dang /klu sgra sgrog pa lta bu dang /'brug zer ba'i sgra lta bu dang /phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas
212a2(mdo sde): kyi zhing thams cad rgyas par 'gengs pa dang /'dul ba'i sems can thams cad tshim par byed po dang /tabatab bor ma yin pa dang /'chi ba med pa dang /me shol ba dang /
212a3(mdo sde): 'tsham pa dang /rigs pa dang /dus su smra ba dang /dus la mi yol ba dang /chos brgya stong legs par brgyus pa dang /mnyan pa dang /thogs pa med pa dang /rgyun chad
212a4(mdo sde): pa med pa'i spobs pa dang ldan pa dang /skad cig gis skad thams cad sgrog pa dang /bsam pa thams cad shes par byed pa dang /bde ba thams cad bskyed pa dang /thar
212a5(mdo sde): pa'i lam yang dag par ston pa dang /lam gyi tshogs smra ba dang /'khor las mi 'da' ba dang /'khor thams cad tshi mo par byed pa dang /sangs rgyas thams cad kyis gsungs
212a6(mdo sde): pa dang mthun pa ste/byang chub sems drapas de lta bu'i tshig gis rtswa 'tshong bkra shis pa la tshigs su bcad de smras pa//bkra shis rngu dag nga la myur du byin//de ring nga la rtsas ni
212a7(mdo sde): don chen 'gyur//dpung dang bcas pa'i bdud ni bcom nas su//byang chub dam pa zhi ba reg par 'gyur//gang gi ched du nga yis bskal stong du//sbyin dang dul dang sdom
212b1(mdo sde): dang gtong byas drang //tshul khrims brtul zhugs dka' thub rab spyad pa//de ni de ring nga yis thob par 'gyur//bzod pa'i stobs dang de bzhin brtson 'grus stobs//bsam gtan
212b2(mdo sde): stobs dang de bzhin shes rab stobs//bsod nams dang ni mngon shes rnam thar stobs//de ni de ring nga la grub par 'gyur//shes rab stobs dang thabs kyi stobs dag dang //rdzu
212b3(mdo sde): 'phrul dang ni chags med byams pa'i stobs//so so yang dag rig dang bden pa'i stobs//de ni de ring nga la 'grub par 'gyur//de ring nga la rtswa sbyin byas na ni//khyod la bsod nams
212b4(mdo sde): stobs ni mtha' yas te//de ni khyod kyi ngan pa'i rgyur mi 'gyur//khyod kyang ston pa bla na med par 'gyur//bkra shis pas ni 'dren pa'i tshig snyan rab tu mdzes thos nas//dga' zhing
212b5(mdo sde): mgu la yi rangs rab tu dga' ba'i yid kyis ni//rtswa 'jam gzhon zhing bzang la reg par ldan pa spar gang thogs//mdun du 'dug nas rab tu dga' ba'i sems kyis 'di skad
212b6(mdo sde): smras//gal te rtswa yis byang chub go 'phang dam pa 'chi med pa//mchog gyur zhi ba lta dka' sngon gyi rgyal ba'i lam 'thob na//yon tan chen po'i rgya mtsho grags pa dpag med khyod gzhes
212b7(mdo sde): shig/bdag gis go 'phang dam pa 'chi med thog mar 'tshang rgyar bgyi//brtul zhugs dka' thub rnam mang bya dka' bskal mang ma spyad par//bkra shis rtswa mchog bting bas byang chub
213a1(mdo sde): 'di ni 'thob mi 'gyur//gang tshe blo gros ldan pa shes rab bsod nams thabs kyis 'phags//de nas rgyal ba thub pas rdul med 'gyur zhes lung ston to//bkra shis
213a2(mdo sde): gal te byang chub skye bo gzhan la sbyin nus na//srog chags bsdu ba byas te sbyin par yid gnyis khyod ma za//gang che nga yis byang chub thob zhes bdud rtsi rnam par dbyes//khyod 'ongs
213a3(mdo sde): chos kyi ngom po nyon dang rdul dang bral por 'gyur//'dren pa sa shin tu mchog tu 'jam pa'i rtse ni spar gang blangs//seng ge ngang pa'i stabs kyis ches nas sa ni rab tu g.yos//lhak+Sha
213a4(mdo sde): tshogs rnams thal mo sbyar te rab tu dga' yid kyis//deng 'dis bdud dpung bcom nas bdud rtsi reg par 'gyur snyam sems//dge slong dag de ltar byang chub sems dpa' byang
213a5(mdo sde): chub kyi shing drung du 'gro ba na lha'i bu rnams dang /byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis byang chub sems dpa' dang 'dir 'dug nas byang chub thob par 'gyur zhing mngon par rdzogs par
213a6(mdo sde): 'chang rgya bar 'gyur snyam ste/byang chub kyi shing brgyad khri brgyan par gyur to//de nas byang chub kyi shing kha cig ni me tog gi rang bzhin can la 'phang du dpag tshad brgya pa'ang yod/byang
213a7(mdo sde): chub kyi shing kha cig ni spos kyi rang bzhin can la 'phang du dpag tshad stong pa'ang yod/byang chub kyi shing kha cig ni tsan+dan gyi rang bzhin can la'ang 'phang du dpog tshad 'bum
213b1(mdo sde): pa'ang yod/byang chub kyi shing kha cig ni gos kyi rang bzhin can la 'phang du dpag tshad lnga 'bum pa'ang yod/byang chub kyi shing kha cig ni rin po che'i rang bzhin can la 'phang du dpag
213b2(mdo sde): tshad 'bum phrag bcu pa'ang yod/byang chub kyi shing kha cig ni rin po che thams cad kyi rang bzhin can la 'phang du dpag tshad bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong pa'ang yod do//byang chub kyi shing de
213b3(mdo sde): dag thams cad kyi drung na'ang ji ltar 'dug pa'i seng ge'i khri lha'i ras bcos bu sna tshogs bting ba bshams par gyur to//byang chub kyi shing kha cig gi drung du ni pad+ma'i khri stan bshams
213b4(mdo sde): par gyur to//kha cig gi drung du ni spos kyi khri stan no//kha cig gi drung du ni rin po che rnam pa sna tshogs kyi khri stan no//byang chub sems dpa' ni rol pa bkod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la
213b5(mdo sde): snyoms par zhugs te/byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin rol pa bkod pa 'di la byang chub sems dpa' snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu de nas skad cig de nyid lo byang chub sems dpa'
213b6(mdo sde): mtshan dang dpe byad bzang pos legs par brgyan pa'i lus kyis byang chub kyi shing drung gi seng ge'i khri de dag thams cad la 'dug par kun tu snang ste/byang chub sems dpa' dang /lha'i bu
213b7(mdo sde): so so'i yid la'ang byang chub sems dpa' ni bdag nyid kyi seng ge'i khri la snyoms par zhugs shing 'dug gi gzhan gyi khri lan ma yin par shes so//ji ltar de dag gis shes pa de bzhin
214a1(mdo sde): du byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin rol pa bkod pa 'di nyid kyi mthus sems can dmyal ba pa dang /dud 'gro'i skye gnas pa dang /glashin rje'i 'jig rten pa
214a2(mdo sde): thams cad dang /lha dang mi thams cad dang /'gro ba thams cad du skyes pa'i sems can thams cad kyis kyang byang chub sems dpa' byang chub kyi shing drung ni seng ge'i khril 'dug
214a3(mdo sde): par mthong ngo //de lta mod kyi 'on kyang dman pa la mos pa'i sems can rnams kyi blo gros yongs su tshim par bya ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' rna spar gang thogs te/byang chub
214a4(mdo sde): kyi shing ga la ba der song nas phyin pa dang /byang chub kyi shing la lan bdun bskor ba byas te/bdag nyid kyis rtswa'i rtse mo ni nong du bstan/rtsa ba ni phyir bstan nas/rtswa'i gding ba kun
214a5(mdo sde): nas bzang po bting ste/song ge lta bu dang /dpa' bo lta bu dang /stobs lta bu dang /brtan pa lta bu dang /brtson 'grus lta bu dang /mthu lta bu dang /glang po lta bu dang /dbang phyug
214a6(mdo sde): lta bu dang /rang drung lta bu dang /ye shes can lta bu dang /bla na med pa lta bu dang /khyad par lta bu dang /mngon par 'phags pa lta bu dang /grags pa lta bu dang /brjod pa lta bu
214a7(mdo sde): dang /sbyin pa lta bu dang /tshul khrims lta bu dang /bzod pa lta bu dang /brtson 'grus lta bu dang /bsam gtan lta bu dang /shes rab lta bu dang /ye shes lta bu dang /bsod
214b1(mdo sde): nams lta bu dang /bdud phyir rgol ba bcom pa lta bu dang /tshogs lta bur skyil mo krung bcas nas rtswa bting ba de la shar phyogs su bltas te 'dug nas/lus drang por bsrang ste/dran pa mngon
214b2(mdo sde): du bzhag nas 'di 'dra ba'i yod ma brtan po byas so//stan 'dir bdag gi lus ni skams kyang rung //lpags pa rus pa sha rnams zhigs kyang rung //bskal mang rnyid dka' byang chub mthob par//
214b3(mdo sde): stan 'di las ni lus bskyod mi bya'o//byang chub kyi snying por bzhud pa'i le'u zhes bya ba ste/bcu dgu pa'o///'phags pa rgya cher rol pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/
214b4(mdo sde): bam po bcu gsum pa//dge slong dag de ltar byang chub sems dpa' byang chub kyi snying po la 'dug pa dang /'dod pa na spyod pa drug gi lha rnams byang chub sems dpa' la bar chad byed pa mi
214b5(mdo sde): 'byung grang snyam ste/shar phyogs logs su gnas par gyur to//de bzhin du lho dang nub dang /byang phyogs kyang lha rnams kyis yongs su nga bsrungs par gyur to//dge slong dag de ltar bya
214b6(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' byang chub kyi snying po la 'dug pa de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' skul ba zhes bya ba'i 'od byung nas 'od des phyogs bcu kun tu grangs med dpag tu med pa/chos kyi dbyangs
214b7(mdo sde): kyis klas pa/na mo mkha'i mthas gtugs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad sdang bar gyur to//de nas shar phyogs na de bzhin gshegs pa dri ma med pa'i 'od kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig
215a1(mdo sde): rten gyi khams dri ma med par byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bde ba bkod pa zhes bya ba 'od des bskul bas byang chub sems dpa' bgrang ba las 'das pa
215a2(mdo sde): dag gis yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdar te/byang chub kyi snying po ga la ba dang /byang chub sems dpa' go la ba der song ste phyin nas/byang chub sems dpa' la mchod pa'i
215a3(mdo sde): las kyi phyir de'i tshe rdzu 'phrul gyi mngon par 'du bya ba de lta bu byas te/rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du bya ba de byas pas phyogs bcur nam mkha'i mabs gtugs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams
215a4(mdo sde): cad 'khor gyi khyams bai DUr+ya sngon po dag las byas pa zhig tu bstan to//'gro ba lngar skyes pa'i sems can thams cad kyi mdun du'ang byang chub sems dpa' byang chub kyi snying po la
215a5(mdo sde): 'dug pa bstan to//sems can de dag kyang phan tshun du sor mo gcig gis byang chubo sems dpa' ston cing sems can tshul du shes pa'i gzugs 'di lta bu dang ldan pa 'di
215a6(mdo sde): su zhig/'di ltar rnam par mdzes pa'i sems can 'di su zhig ces 'dzer to//sems can de dag gi mdun du byang chub sems dpa' des byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyang sprul
215a7(mdo sde): te/de na byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs de dag gis tshigs su bcad pa 'di smras so//ci yang med pa'i 'dod chags zhe sdang rnyog pa gang yino bag chags bcas bton pa//gang gis
215b1(mdo sde): lus las 'od byung phyogs bcu'i 'od rnams thams cad 'od ni med par byas//gang gis bsod nams ting 'dzin ye shes tshogs ni bskal pa mang por kun spel ba//shAkya thub pa thub pa chen
215b2(mdo sde): po dam pa 'di ni phyogs rnams kun tu mdzes//de nas lho phyogs na de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen 'od 'phro'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che bkod par byang chub sems dpa'
215b3(mdo sde): sems dpa' chen po rin po che'i gdugs brtsegs pa kun tu ston pa zhes bya ba 'od des bskul bas byang chub sems dpa' bgrang ba las 'das pa dag gis yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdar
215b4(mdo sde): te byang chub kyi snying po ga la ba dang /byang chub sems dpa' ga la ba der song ste phyin nas byang chub sems dpa' la mchod pa'i las kyi phyir rin po che'i gdugs gcig gis thams cad
215b5(mdo sde): dang ldan pa'i 'khor gyi khyams de bkab bo//de na brgya byin dang /tshangs pa dang /'jig rten skyong ba dag phan tshun 'di skad 'dzer te/gang gi phyir rin po che'i gdugs bkod pa rnam pa 'di
215b6(mdo sde): lta bu 'di snang bar gyur pa 'di su'i 'bras bu zhes 'dzer to//de nas rin po che'i gdugs de las tshogs su bcad pa 'di byung ngo //gang gis rin po che dang spos gdugs stong phrag bye ba khrag
215b7(mdo sde): khrig dag/byams pa'i yid kyis do zla med pa bzhugs dang mya ngan 'das la phul//de yis mtshan mchog ldan pa phan mdzad sred med bu yi mthu ldan pa//yon tan mnga' ba byang chub
216a1(mdo sde): shing drung gshegs pa de la mchod pa byas//de nas nub phyogs na de bzhin gshegs pa me tog gi phreng ba nags tshal gyi phreng ba me tog kun tu rgyas pa mngon par
216a2(mdo sde): mkhyen pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams me tog tsam+b+ha ka lI ba dag tu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dbang po'i dra ba can zhes bya ba 'od des bskul bas byung
216a3(mdo sde): chubo sems dpa' bgrang ba las 'das pa dag gis yongs su bskur cing mdun du bdar te/byang chub kyi snying po gal ba dang /byang chub sems dpa' ga la ba der song ste phyin nos/
216a4(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' la mchod pa'i las kyi phyir rin po che'i dra ba gcig gis thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor gyi khyams de bkob bo//de nas phyogs bcu'i lha dang klu dang /gnod
216a5(mdo sde): sbyin dang /dri za dag phan tshun du 'di skad 'dzer te/'od kyi bkod pa rnam pa 'di lta bu 'di su'i yin zhes 'dzar to//de nas rin po che'i dra ba de las tshigs su bcad pa 'di byung ngo //
216a6(mdo sde): rin chen 'byung gnas 'jig rten gsum dga' rin chen tog/rin chen dam pa rin chen grags pa de chos dgyes//dkon mchog gsum po rgyun mi 'chad pa'i brtson 'grus brnyes//
216a7(mdo sde): byang chub mchog brnyes 'gyur te de yi mchod pa 'di//de nas byang phyogs na de bzhin gshegs pa nyi zla zil du rlag par byed pa'i 'od dang ldan pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi
216b1(mdo sde): khams nyi ma 'khor bar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bkod pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba 'od des bskul bas byang chub sems dpa' bgrang ba las 'das pa dag gis yongs
216b2(mdo sde): su bskor cing mdun du bdar te/byang chub kyi snying po ga la ba dang /byang chub sems dpa'o ga la ba der song ste/phyin nas byang chub sems dpa'i la mchod pa'i las kyi phyir phyogs
216b3(mdo sde): bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa ji snyed pa de snyed 'khor gyi khyams der kun tu bston to//de na byang chub sems dpa' kha cig 'di skad 'dzer
216b4(mdo sde): bkod pa rnam pa 'di lta bu 'di su'i yin zhes 'dzer to//de nas bkod pa de dag thams cad las tshigs su bcad pa 'di byung ngo //gang gis bsod nams ye shes shin tu mang pos
216b5(mdo sde): lus ni rnam sbyangs shing //gang gis brtul zhugs dka' thub dag dang bden pa'i chos kyis ngag spangs la//gang gis khrel yod mos pa byams dang de bzhin snying rjes sems sbyangs
216b6(mdo sde): pa/de ni shing rgyal drung gshegs shAkya khyu mchog de la mchod pa byed//de nas shar lho'i phyogs mtshams na de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan gyi rgyal po snang ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig
216b7(mdo sde): rten gyi khams yon tan gyi 'byung gnas su byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yon tan gyi blo gros zhes bya ba 'od des bskul bas byang chub sems dpa' bgrang ba las 'das pa dag
217a1(mdo sde): bris yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdar te/byang chub kyi snying po ga la ba dang /byang chub sems dpa' ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/byang chub sems dpa' la
217a2(mdo sde): mchod pa'i las kyi phyir 'khor gyi khyams der yon tan gyi bkod pa thams cad dang ldan pa'i khang po brtsegs pa mngon par sprul te khang pa brtsigs pa de lngas tshigs su bcad pa 'di
217a3(mdo sde): byung ngo //gang gi yon tan dag gis lha dang lha min dang //gnod sbyin lto 'phye che dag rtag tu yon tan bgros//yon tan tsan de yon tan ldan pa'i rgyal rigs skyes//yon tan rgya
217a4(mdo sde): mtsho byang chub shing gi drung na bzhugs//de nas lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams na de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen srog shing gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khoms rin po che 'byung
217a5(mdo sde): bar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rin po che 'byung ba zhes bya ba 'od des bskul bas byang chub sems dpa' babrang ba las 'das pa dag gis yongs su bskor cing mdun
217a6(mdo sde): du bdor te/byang chub kyi snying po ga la ba dang /byang chub sems dpa' go la ba der song ste phyin nas/byang chub sems dpa' la mchod pa'i las kyi phyir 'khor gyi khyams der rin po
217a7(mdo sde): che'i mkha' rten grangs med dpag tu med pa mngon par sprul te/rin po che'i mkha' rten de dag las tshigs su bcad pa 'di byung ngo //gang gis rgya mtshor bcas pa'o sa dang de bzhin
217b1(mdo sde): rin chen rnams dag drang //dang bzang skar khrung bsil khang mchog dang zung dang bzhon pa mkha' rten brnyan//me tog phreng ba mdzes dang 'dun sa dag dang skyed mos tshalnga rnams dang //rkang
217b2(mdo sde): pa lag pa mgo dang mig btang ba de byang chub snying por 'dug/de nas nub byang gi phyogs mtshams na de bzhin gshegs pa 'brug sgra rgyal po'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams sprin dang ldan
217b3(mdo sde): par byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sprin brtsegs 'brug bsgrags dbyangs zhes bya ba 'od des bskul bas byang chub sems dpa' bgrang ba las 'das pa dag gis yongs su bskor
217b4(mdo sde): cing mdun du 'dar te/byang chub kyi snying po ga la ba dang /byang chub sems dpo' ga la bo der song ste phyin nas/byang chub sems dpa' la mchod pa'i las kyi phyir dus kyi rjes su 'brang
217b5(mdo sde): ba'i a ka ru'i sprin mngon por sprul te 'khor gyi khyams der tsan+don sbrul gyi snying po'i phye ma'i char mngon par phab bo//dus kyi rjes su 'brang ba'i sprin gyi dkyil 'khor de las kyang tshigs su
217b6(mdo sde): bcad pa 'di byung ngo //rig dang rnam par grol ba'i 'od kyi chos kyi sprin gyis srid gsum thams cad khyab//dam chos 'dod chags bral ba bdud rtsi mya ngan 'das pa thob byed char pa 'bribs///
217b7(mdo sde): 'dod chags nyon mongs 'ching ba'i 'khri shing thams cad bag chags bcas te gcod par 'gyur//bsam gtan rdzu 'phrul stobs dang dbang po'o me tog rgyas par dad par byed pa 'byin//
218a1(mdo sde): de nas byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams na de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i gdugs mngon par 'phags pa snang ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams gser gyi
218a2(mdo sde): dra bas khebs pa na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gser gyi dra bas brgyan pa zhes bya ba 'od des bskul bas byang chub sems dpa' bgrang ba las 'das pa dag gis
218a3(mdo sde): yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdar te/byang chub kyi snying po ga la ba dang /byang chub sems dpa' ga la ba der song ste phyin nos byang chub sems dpa'i la mchod pa'i las kyi phyir dang
218a4(mdo sde): pa brtsegs pa de dag thams cad dang /rin po che'i mkha' rten rnams su byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis legs par brgyan pa dag mngon par sprul te/
218a5(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs de dag thams cad kyang lha dang mi'i me tog gi phreng ba thogs shing byang chub sems dpa' ga la ba de logs su lus btud nas me tog gi phreng ba spangs
218a6(mdo sde): te tshigs su bcad pa 'di smras so//gang gis sangs rgyas khrag khrig sngon bstod cing //gus dong bcas pas dad pa che bskyed la//tshangs pa'i sgra dbyangs snyan pa'i tshig smos
218a7(mdo sde): pa//byang chub snying por byon la mgos phyag 'tshal//de nas 'og gi phyogs na de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu gzigs kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams kun tu rnam par
218b1(mdo sde): bltas par byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rin po che'i snying po zhes bya ba 'od des bskul bas byang chub sems dpa' bgrang ba las 'das pa dag gis yongs su bskor cing mdun
218b2(mdo sde): dubadUr te/byang chub kyi snying po ga la ba dang /byang chub sems dpa' gal ba der song ste phyin nas byang chub sems dpa' la mchod pa'i las kyi phyir bai DUr+ya'i 'khor gyi khyams der dzam+b+ha'i
218b3(mdo sde): gling gi gser gyi pad+ma rnams mngon du byung bar bstan to//pad+ma de dag gi snying po la bud med lus phyed snang ba//kha dog dang gzugs phun sum tshogs pa/rgyun thams cad kyis brgyan
218b4(mdo sde): pa bstan te/lag pa g.yas g.yon na mgul gdub dang /gdu bu dang /dpung rgyan dang /gser skud dang /mu tig gi do shal la sogs pa rgyan rnam pa mang po thogs shing me tog dang
218b5(mdo sde): dar gyi lda ldi spangs nas byang chub kyi snying po ga la ba dang /byang chub sems dpa' ga la ba de logs su lus btud de tshigs su bcad pa 'di smras so//gang zhig rtag tu sangs rgyas nyan
218b6(mdo sde): thos dang //rang rgyal dog dang bla ma rnams lnga 'dud//khrims ldan rtag dran dga' la nga rgyal med//yon tan ldan pa de la 'dud pa byos//de nas steng gi phyogs na de bzhin gshegs
218b7(mdo sde): pa tshogs kyi dbang po'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams tshogs kyi dam par byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha' mdzod ces bya ba 'od des bskul bas byang chub
219a1(mdo sde): sems dpa' bgrang ba las 'das pa dag gis yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdar te/byang chub kyi snying po glal ba dang /byang chub sems dpa' gral ba der song ste phyin
219a2(mdo sde): nas/byang chub sems dpa' la mchod pa'i las kyi phyir nam mkha'i dkyil na 'dug bzhin du phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad ni sngon ma mthong ma thos pa'i me tog dang /bdug pa
219a3(mdo sde): drang /spos dang /phreng ba dang /byug pa dang /phye ma dang /bdug spos dang /gos dang /rgyan dang /gdugs dang /rgyal mtshan dang /be dan dang /rnam par rgyal ba'i khang pa dang /
219a4(mdo sde): rin po che dang /nor bu dang /gser dang /dngul dang /mu tig dang /rta dang /glang po che dang /shing rta dang /dpung bu chung dang /bzhon pa dang /shing ljon pa dang /lo ma dang /me
219a5(mdo sde): tog dang /'bras bu dang /khye'u dang /bu mo dang /lha dang klu dang /gnod sbyin dang /dri za dang /lha ma yin dang /nam mkha' lding dang /mi 'am ci dang /lto 'phye chen po dang /brgya byin
219a6(mdo sde): dang /tshangs pa dang /'jig rten skyong ba dang /mi dang /mi ma yin pa ji snyed yod pa de dag thams cad nam mkha'i dkyil nas cher chen por mngon par phab ste/thams cad dga' ba
219a7(mdo sde): dang /bde ba bskyed kyi sems can gang 'o'ang 'jigs pa'am gnod par mi byed do//de bzhin du sbyar te de la 'di skad ces bya'o//phyogs bcu de dag rnams nas rgyal ba'i sras po gang //
219b1(mdo sde): phan par byed pa mchod par byang chub lhags gyur pa//'gro la phan pa de dag rnams kyi bkod rim dang //rtsal dang rim pa mdzes pa dag gi dpe tsam nyon//kha cig do shal khrag khrig rab tu spang byas
219b2(mdo sde): te//namo mkha' las ni 'drug ltar shin tu sgrogs shing lhags//kha cig mkha' las me tog gzhal med khang ston cing //cod pan rin chen thogs la gtsug phud 'phyang zhing lhags//kha cig
219b3(mdo sde): stong pa mtshan med smon med mchog brjod cing //sa las seng ge lta bur shin tu sgrogs shing lhags//kha cig sngon chad ma mthong me tog mdzes 'thor zhing //khyu mchog ci 'dra
219b4(mdo sde): de 'drar shin tu sgrogs shing lhags//kha cig rang gi lus kyi kha dog stong ston cing //rma bya lta bur mkha' las shin tu sgrogs shing lhags//kha cig bde gshegs sras kyi yon tan phreng brjod
219b5(mdo sde): cing //zla ba lta bur mkha' las shin tu rgyas shing lhags//kha cig nyi ma lta bur 'od zer rab 'gyed de//bdud kyi gnas rnams thams cad mog mog byed cing lhags//bsod nams
219b6(mdo sde): tshogs bsags kha cig dbang po'i mchod sdong 'dra'i//dri med tog thogs byang chub snying po der yang lhags//kha cig mkha' las nor bu rin chen dra ba 'thor//zla ba zla bzang thang skyes
219b7(mdo sde): rnam mdzes man+ta ra//paR+Ya tsam+ba ka dang sna ma'i me tog phreng //byang chub se mos dpa' shing rgyal drung na bzhugs la 'thor//kha cig rkang pa gnyis kyis sa ni rab bskyod la//sa bskyod nas
220a1(mdo sde): kyang skye bo dga' bar byed cing lhags//kha cig ri bo lhun po lag na thogs byed la//bar snang gnas te me tog skon bu 'thor zhing lhags//kha cig rgya mtsho bzhi
220a2(mdo sde): po mgo la thogs nas ni//sa la spos chu 'thor te chag chag 'debs shing lhags//kha cig rin chen mchod sdong sna tshogs thogs nas ni//rgyang ring 'dug ste byang chub sems
220a3(mdo sde): dpa' ston cing lhags//kha cig tshangs pa lta bur zhi ba'i gzugs bsgyur te//yid zhi rab zhi gnas shing bsam gtan bsam gtan pa//de dag ba spu dag las byams dang snying rje
220a4(mdo sde): dang /dga' dang btang snyoms tshad med yid 'ong sgra 'byung lhags//kha cig brgya byin lha ltar stong phrag khrag khrig gi/lha rnams dag gis mdun du bdar nas lhags gyur cing //de dag
220a5(mdo sde): byang chub shing drung phyin nas thal sbyar te//brgya byin thogs pa'i nor bu rin chen sna tshogs 'thor//kha cig phyogs bzhi dag gi skyong ba ji lta bar//dri za srin po mi 'am ci yis
220a6(mdo sde): yongs bskor te//glog ltar gsol ba'i me tog char pa 'bebs shing lhags//dri za mi'am ci yi skad kyis brtan pa bstod//kha cig me tog rgyas pa'i ljon shing 'bras bur bcas//
220a7(mdo sde): me tog bcas shing mchog gi dri ni rab 'byin la//lo mar sangs rgyas sras po lus phyed gnas thogs lhags//btud nas sa yi snying por me tog rnams kyang 'thor//kha cig
220b1(mdo sde): pad+ma ut+pal pad+ma dkar po rgyas//pad+ma'i snying por sum cu rtsa gnyis mtshan ldan gnas//de 'drar me tog rgyas pa'i rdzing bu thogs te lhags//chags med yid ldan byang chub sems dpa'
220b2(mdo sde): mkhas la bstod//kha cig lhun po lte bur lus cheni bsgyur te lhags//ber snang gnas nas rang gi lus kyang rab tu 'dor//bor ma thag tu me tog phreng ba rnams su gyur//stong gsum
220b3(mdo sde): ngag gi rgyal ba'i zhing rnams khebs par byed//kha cig mig gnyis sreg pa'i bskal pa lta bu dang //de bzhin chags pa dang ni 'jig par ston cing lhags//de dag lus las chos kyi sgo
220b4(mdo sde): mo mang grag ste//de dag thos pas sems can khrag khrig sred pa spong //kha cig mchu ni bim+bi 'dral bzhin mdzes shing //kha bzhin rdzogs la mi 'am ci 'dra'i sgra sgrogs lhags//do shal
220b5(mdo sde): sna tshogs legs brgyan bu mo chas pa 'dra//de la lta bas lha yi tshogs rnams ngoms mi 'gyur//kha cig rdo rje lta bur mi phyed lus can de//rkang pas 'og gi chu yi phung po 'bog cing lhags//
220b6(mdo sde): /nyim 'dra zhing zla ltar bzhin rgyas snang byed la//'od byed nyon mongs skyon rnams bcom pa kha cig lhags//kha cig rin po ches brgyan lag na rin chen thogs//zhing mang bye ba stong dag
220b7(mdo sde): khebs par byed cing lhags//sems can mang lo phan dang bde dang tshim bya'i phyir//rin chen me tog dam pa dri zhim char pa 'bebs//kha cig gzungs chen rin po che yi mdzod gyur
221a1(mdo sde): cing //ba spu rnams nas mdo sde khrag khrig rab brjod la//spobs par ldan zhing blo gros ldan la blo mchog ldan//rgyags shing rab dregs skye bo rtogs par byed cing lhags//
221a2(mdo sde): kha cig ri bo lhun po rnga ltar thogs nas ni//rab tu rdung zhing mkha' las yid 'ong sgra 'byin lhags//de yi sgra ni phyogs bcur bye ba'i zhing song ste//bdud rtsi ma thob ston pa de mod 'tshang rgyar
221a3(mdo sde): sgrog/byang chub kyi snying por bkod pa'i le'u zhes bya ba ste nyi shu pa'o////dge slong dag de ltar byang chub sems dpa' la mchod pa'i las kyi phyir/byang chub sems
221a4(mdo sde): dpa' dag gis byang chub kyi snying por bkod pa rnam pa de lta bu de dag mngon par byas par gyur to//byang chub sems dpa' nyid kyis kyang phyogs bcu dag gi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
221a5(mdo sde): 'das pa dang /ma byon pa dang /da ltar byung ba rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad na byang chub kyi snying po'i rgyan bkod pa ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad byang chub kyi snying po der
221a6(mdo sde): kun tu bstan to//dge slong dag de nas byang chub sems dpa' byang chub kyi snying po la 'dug nas 'di snyam du sems te/'dod pa'i khams 'di'i bdag po dbang phyug dbang sgyur ba bdud
221a7(mdo sde): sdig can de la bdag gis me sbran par bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba de ni bdag gi mi chas/bdag gis bdud sdig can bskul
221b1(mdo sde): bar bya'o//dri las rnam par rgyal na 'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha la sogs pa thams cad tshar bcad par 'gyur ro//'on tang bdud kyi 'khor na bdud kyi ris kyi lha'i bu sngon dag ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa
221b2(mdo sde): 'khod pa dag gis nga'i seng ge rnam par rol pa mthong na bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par 'gyur ro snyam mo//dge slong dag de nas byang chub sems dpas de ltar
221b3(mdo sde): bsams nas de'i tshe smin mtshams kyi bur gyi mdzod spu nas bdud kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad 'joms par byed pa zhes bya ba'i 'od zer gcig phyung ste/'od zer des stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i

221b5(mdo sde): rten gyi khams 'di thams cad kyang snang ba chen pos yongs su khyab par gyur to//bdud sdig can gyis 'od de las rnam pa 'di lta bu'i sgra 'di'ang thos so//sems can shin tu dag pa

222a1(mdo sde): mya ngan 'das nas gzhan dag mya ngan zlo//ngan song gsum po ma lus stongs par byed par 'gyur//lha mi rnams kyi grong khyer gang bar byed par 'gyur//phan pa
222a2(mdo sde): byed pa de ni bdud rtsi thob gyur nas//bsam gtan mngon shes bdud rtsi bde mchog sbyin par 'gyur//gang tshe rang byung nyid kyis chos cher mngon phab tshe//nag po'i rtsa lag khyod

222a4(mdo sde): sdig can bskul ba'i tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis bskul nas rmi lam rnam pa sum cu rtsa gnyis rmis so//rnam pa sum cu rtsa gnyis gang zhe na/'di lta ste/bdag gi gnas mun
222a5(mdo sde): pas khyab par rmis pa dang /rang gi gnas rdul gyis gang zhing gyo mo dang gseg mas gang bar rmis pa dang /bdag nyid dngangs skrag nas phyogs phyogs su 'bros par rmis pa dang /
222a6(mdo sde): bdag cod pa na dang bral zhing rna cha lhung bar rmis pa dang /bdag mchu dang gre ba dang /rkan skams par rmis pa dang /bdag snying kun tu gdungs par rmis pa dang /skyed mos tshal gyi
222a7(mdo sde): lo ma dang /me tog dang /'bras bu rnams rnyis par rmis pa dang /rdzing rnams skams te chu med par rmis pa dang /ngang pa dang /khrung khrung dang /rma bya dang /ko la bing+ga dang /ku na
222b1(mdo sde): la dang /shang shang te'u la sogs pa bya'i tshogs rnams 'dab gshog zegs par rmis pa dang /rnga dang /dung dang /rdza rnga dang /'khar rnga dang /rgyud gcig pa dang /pi wang dang /rgyud

222b3(mdo sde): cing phyogs gcig tu dong nas sems shing 'khod par rmis pa dang /chung ma'i dam pa phreng ba can yang mal nas se la lhung ste lag pa gnyis mgo la rdeb par rmis pa dang /bdud kyi bu gang dag
222b4(mdo sde): shin tu brtson 'grus dang ldan pa dang /shin tu stobs dang ldan pa dang /shin tu gzi brjid dang ldan pa dang /shin tu shes rab dang ldan pa de dag kyang byang chub sems dpa' byang chub kyi snying

222b6(mdo sde): gyon par rmis pa dang /bdag mgo rdul gyis gang la skya bo bsang bseng po dang /nyams chung ba dang /mdangs nyams par rmis pa dang /bsil khang dang /khang pa brtsegs pa dang /skar
222b7(mdo sde): khung dang /rta babs rnams kyang rdul gyis gang nas rdi bo par rmis pa dang /de'i sde'i dpon gnod sbyin dang /srin po dang /grul bum dang /dri za'i bdag po gang yin pa de dag thams cad
223a1(mdo sde): kyang soms tshugs bcas te ngu zhing cho ngas btab nas byer bar rmis pa dang /'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha rnams kyi lha'i bdag po 'di lta ste/yul 'khor srung dang /'phags
223a2(mdo sde): skyes po dang /mig mi bzang dang /rnam thos kyi bu dang /brgya byin dang /rab 'thab bral dang /yongs su dga' ldan dang /rab 'phrul dang /dbang sgyur la sogs pa gang yin pa de
223a3(mdo sde): dog thams cad kyang bdud la mi gus shing byang chub sems dpa' la phyogs par rmis pa dang /'thub mo'i nang na de'i ral gri shugs nas ma phyin cing bdag mi shis pa'i sgra 'byin par rmis
223a4(mdo sde): pa dang /rang gi 'khor gyis bdag bor bAr rmis pa dang /bkra shis kyi bum pa sgor lhung bar rmis pa dang /bram ze mes byin gyi bu'ang bkro mi shis pa'i sgra sgrogs par rmosau pa dang /sgo
223a5(mdo sde): ba kun tu dga' byed kyang kun tu mi dga' ba'i sgra sgrogs par rmis pa dang /nam mkha'i dkyil mun pas khebs par rmis pa dang /'dod pa'i gnas na gnas pa'i dpal yang ngu bar rmis
223a6(mdo sde): pa dang /bdag gi dbang yang dbang med par gyur par rmis pa dang /rang gi phyogs kyang phyogs ma yin par rmis pa dang /nor bu dang mu tig gi dra ba rnams kyang chad cing rnam par chad nas
223a7(mdo sde): 'bral bar rmis pa dang /bdud kyi gnas thams cad kyang rab tu g.yos par rmis pa dang /shing rnams kyang bcad cing ba gam yang lhung bar rmis pa dang /bdud kyi sde bkod pa thams
223b1(mdo sde): cad kyang kha sbub tu 'gyel bar rmis pa ste/dge slong dag de ltar bdud sdig can gyi rmi lam du rnam pa sum cu rtsa gnyis po 'di lta bu rmis so//de sad pa dang /'jigs skrag dngangs nas
223b2(mdo sde): nang mi thams cad bsogs te/dpung dang bcas pa dang /'khor dang sde dpon dang /sgo ba dang de dag 'dus par rig nas tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so//bdud des rmi lam de dag
223b3(mdo sde): mthong nas nyam thag ste//sde dpon bdud po seng ge za 'gram zhes bya dang //bu rnams dag dang 'khor rnams gang dag yin la smras//nag po'i rtsa lag de dag kun la yongs su dris//
223b4(mdo sde): shAkya'i nang du skyes pa mtshan mchog yan lag spras//lo drug bar du bya dka' brtul zhugs drag po spyad//byang chub shing drung 'ongs kyis rab tu sgrims shig ces//mdang sum par
223b5(mdo sde): snang las ni tshogs bcad de skad grags//byang chub sems dpa' de nyid rnam par sangs rgyas nas//sems can bye ba khrag khrig mang po rnams rtogs byed//gang tshe bdud rtsi thob
223b6(mdo sde): ste bsil ba'i dngos reg che//des ni nga gnas ma lus stongs par byed par 'gyur//dpung chen rnams dang lhan cig der ni rab dong la//shing dbang drung 'dug dge sbyong gcig de gzhon
223b7(mdo sde): par bya//yan lag bzhi pa'i sde rnams myur du rab tu sgrims//gal te nga la sdug sems phyi shol ma byed cig/dag bcom rang sangs rgyas kyis 'jig rten gang gyur kyang //mya ngan
224a1(mdo sde): 'da' bas bdag dpung nyam chung yong mi 'gyur//de yang gcig pu rgyal ba chos rgyal gyur na ni//bgrang las 'das pa'i rgyal ba'i rigs ni gzhar mi 'chad//
224a2(mdo sde): dge slong dag de nas bdud kyi bu ded dpon zhes bya bas bdud sdug can de la tshigs su bcad de smras pa//yab cig ci nongs zhal gyur cing ni zhal mdog nyams//thugs kyang 'phar
224a3(mdo sde): la khyod kyi yan lag nyid lag 'drar//khyod kyis cigs na ci gzigs myur du bka' stsol cig/yang dag bsams nas de bzhin sbyar ba 'tshal bar bgyi//nga rgyal med bdud smras
224a4(mdo sde): pa bu cig nga las nyon//ngas ni sdig pa'i rmil pa shin tu mi bzang rmis//de ring 'khor 'dir de kun ma lus smras na ni//khyed rnams brgyal te sa la rab tu stsol bar 'gyur//ded
224a5(mdo sde): dpon gyis smras pa/gal te 'thab dus bab ste rgyal na nongs ma mchis//gal te de ring bcom par gyur na nongs dang bcas//gal te khyed kyi rmi lam de 'dra'i lhas lags na/bzhag
224a6(mdo sde): na dge ste g.yul ngor yongs su bstang mi 'gyur//bdud kyis smras pa/brtsal ba grub pa'i skyes bu g.yul ngor grags par 'gyur//gal te brtan la brten te legs byas bdag
224a7(mdo sde): cag rgyal//kho bo 'khor dang bcas pa mthong nas langs nas su//kho bo'i rkang par mgos phyag mi 'tshal des mi nus//ded dpon gyis smras pa/rgya chen dpung bdog kyang ni
224b1(mdo sde): shin tu mthu chung ste//stobs ldan dpa' ngo gcig pu mchis na g.yul las rgyal//gal te srin bu me khyer stong gsum gang gyur kyang //nyi ma gcig pu'i zil du brlag ste 'od mi bgyid//
224b2(mdo sde): gzhan yang gang la nga rgyal gti mug mchis la dpyod ma mchis//mkhas dang mi mthun bgyid pa de ni gso mi nus//dge slong dag de ltar bdud sdig can gyis ded dpon gyi tshig ma mnyan
224b3(mdo sde): nas yan lag bzhi pa'i dpung chen po stobs che bo/'thab mo la dpa' ba/'jigs su rung ba/spu zing zhes byed nus pa/lha dang mi rnams kyis sngon ma mthong ma thos pa/bzhin dasgyur/
224b4(mdo sde): ba rnam pa mang po bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma bsgyur ba'i rnam pa dang ldan pa/rkang lag sbal brgya stong gis dkris pa dang ldan pa/ral gri dang /mnga' gzhu dang /mdung thung dang /mda'
224b5(mdo sde): bo che dang /sta re dang /rtse gsum kha gdang dang /bong ba dang /gtun shing dang /be con dang /zhags pa dang /dbyug to dang /'khor lo dang /rdo rje dang /rdo rje rtse gcig pa thogs pa/
224b6(mdo sde): lus la go cha bzang po bgos pa/mgo dang /rkang lag dang /mig ldog par 'dug pa/mgo dang /mig dang /gdong 'bar ba/lto dang rkang lag dbyibs mi sdug pa/bzhin gzi brjid
224b7(mdo sde): drag po dang ldan pa/shin tu bzhin bsgyur cing so gtsigs pa/'jigs su rung bar mche ba gtsigs pa/lce stug cing zheng mche ba mang po 'phyang ba/lce 'bar 'bur can re lnga dang 'du
225a1(mdo sde): ba/mig me dang sbrul nag pa drug gis rgyas pa'i tshig ltar dmar ba dag khar bcug ste/de la kha cig ni sbrul gdug skrag pa/kha cig ni nam mkha' lding gis rna ma
225a2(mdo sde): nas phyung ba bzhin du lag mthil du sbrul gdug pa bzhag ste za//kha cig ni mi'i sha dang /khrag dang /rkang lag dang /migo dang /mkhal ma dang /nang grol dang /ngan sngags la
225a3(mdo sde): stsogs pa za/kha cig ni gzugs sde bsangs dang /kham pa po dang /sngon po dang /dmar po dang /ser por 'dug ste/'jigs su rung ba'i gzugs sna tshogs can//kha cig
225a4(mdo sde): ni mi gzhigs pa dang /mig dron pa lta bu dang /mig phyung ba lte ba dang /mig 'brar ba dang /mig bzung ba/mi sdug pa/kha cig ni mig log pa dang /'bar ba dang /mi sdug
225a5(mdo sde): pa/kha cig ni ri 'bar ba thogs te/'gying zhing ri gzhan la non te 'ong /kha cig ni shing za thon byas te byang chub sems dpa' logs su rgyug cing 'ong /kha cig gi rna ba ni
225a6(mdo sde): phag rna lta bu dang /zhib ma lta bu dang /glang po'i rna ba lta bu dang /'phyang ba dang /phag rna lta bur 'dug po/kha cig ni rna ba med pa/kha cig ni keng rus mang po sprul nas lus
225a7(mdo sde): rid cing gsus pa che la sna nom pa/gsus pa bum pa lta bur 'dug pa/rkang pa mgo'i thod pa ltar 'dug pa/pags pa dang /sha dang khrag skams pa/rna ba dang /sna dang /rkang
225b1(mdo sde): lag dang /mig dang /mgo bcad pa/kha cig ni khrag 'thung 'dod pas gcig la gcig mgo gcod pa/kha cig ni skra sha sha po dang /sgra mi snyan pa dang /'jigs su rung ba dang /sgra nub
225b2(mdo sde): pa dang ldan pa/hu tu zhes bya ba dang /mchi zhes bya ba dang /hu lu hu lu zhes bya ba'i sgra 'byin pa dang /spyugs pa len pa dang /dge sbyong gau ta ma 'dri shing dang chos te 'o na cig ces
225b3(mdo sde): zer ba dang /'or cig ces zer ba dang /rgyob cig ces zer ba dang /rab tu rgyob cig ces zer ba dang /chings shig ces zer ba dang /zung zhig ces zer ba dang /chod cig ces
225b4(mdo sde): zer ba dang /gtubs shig ces zer ba dang /gtogs shig ces zer ba dang /bab bab tu 'or cig ces zer ba dag go/kha cig ni wa dang /ce spyang dang /phag dang /bong bu
225b5(mdo sde): dang /ba lang dang /glang po che dang /rta dang /rnga mo dang /rkyang dang /ma he dang /ri bod dang /g.yag dang /bse dang /ri dgas ldang sgo skra la sogs pa'i kha gdong sna tshogs
225b6(mdo sde): 'jigs su rung ba dang nges par byed pa/mi sdug pa dang ldan pa dag go//kha cig ni seng ge dang /stag dang /phag rgod dang /drad dang /spre'u dang /gzig dang /byi la dang /ra

226a1(mdo sde): lta bu'i lus dang ldan pa dag go/kha cig ni gzugs mi sdug pa dag go/kha cig ni mgo gcig pa dang /mgo gnyis pa nas mgro brgya stong gi bar dang ldan pa dag
226a2(mdo sde): go/kha cig ni mgo med pa'o//kha cig ni lag pa gcig pa nas lag pa brgya stong gi bar dang ldan pa dag go/kha cig ni lag pa med pa dag go//kha cig na rkang pa gcig pa nus rkang
226a3(mdo sde): pa brgya stong gi bar dang ldan pa dag go/kha cig ni rkang pa med pa dag go/kha cig ni rna ba dang /kha dang /sna dang /mig dang /lte ba'i khung bu nas sbrul gdug pa 'byin to//kha cig ni
226a4(mdo sde): ral gri dang /mda' gzhu dang /mdung thung dang /rtse gsum kha gdang dang /dgra sta dang /'khor lo drang /mda' bo che dang /rdo rje rtse gcig pa dang /rdo rje dang /bong ba dang /mtshon rtse
226a5(mdo sde): gcig pa la sogs pa mtshon cha sna tshogs gsor zhing gar byed la/byang chub sems dpa' la sdigs mo byed do//kha cig ni mi'i sor mo bcad nas phreng bar brgyus te thogs so///
226a6(mdo sde): kha cig ni keng rus dang /thod pa dang /phreng ba lta bur brgyus te thogs so//kha cig ni lus sbrul gdug pas dkris so//khwa cig ni mgo la zhugasA ling me can thogs te/glang

226b2(mdo sde): dang /lcags dang /zangs 'brar ba'i char 'debs pa dang /lho 'bebs po dang /rdo rje'i lho 'bebs pa dang /lcags kyi phyi mtshan pa'i cher 'bebs pa dang /sprin nag po bsdus te rlung gi
226b3(mdo sde): char 'debs pa dang /mda'i sprin bsdus te char du 'bebs pa dang /mun gnag ston pa dang /sgra 'byin cing byang chub sems dpa'i logs su rgyug pa dag go/kha cig ni zhags pa bskor

226b5(mdo sde): lag dang /nying lag 'thor ba dang /lus skor ba dang /gad mo cher rgod pa dang /drang rdung ba dang /brang la rdeb pa dang /mgo gseg pa dang /mgo 'bar zhing skra gyen du 'grang ba dang /
226b6(mdo sde): phan tshun shugs phyung zhing rgyug cing wa'i mig lta bus byang chub sems dpa' la 'jigs par byed do//bud med rgan mo dag kyang ngu zhing byang chub sems dpa'i gan du lhags te/'di skad
226b7(mdo sde): du kyi hud bu/kyi hud nga'i bu/longs shig/longs la myur du bros shig ces 'dzer to//srin mo'i gzugs dang /sha za mo'i gzugs dang /yi dgas long ba/theng po/rke ba/
227a1(mdo sde): dkres pas ringad pa/lag pa bsgred ba//kha gcus pa dag kyang /ngu zhing 'jigs pa ston te/dngas par byed cing byang chub sems dpa'i mdun na rgyug ga/bdud byu du
227a2(mdo sde): 'dus pa rnam pa de lta bu des dpag tshad brgyad cu kho ra khor yug tu gang bar gyur to//bdud gcig gi ji lta ba de bzhin du stong gsum gyi skyong chen po bye ba phrag brgyar gtogs pa'i bdud sdig can
227a3(mdo sde): rnams kyi dpung dag gros thadA ka dang /steng gang bar gyur to//de la 'di skad ces bya ste/gnod sbyin grul bum lto 'phye chen po'i gzugs//srin po yi dgas sha za'i gzugs
227a4(mdo sde): dang bcas//'jig rten mi sdug drag gzugs ji snyed pa//thams cad sgyu yis dong ni sprul pa byas//mgo gcig mgo gnyis mgo gsum ldan pa nas//mgo stong bar du ldan
227a5(mdo sde): bzhin gnod sbyin mang //lag gcig lag gnyis lag gsum ldan pa nas//lag stong bar du ldan pa rab tu mang //rkang gcig rkang gnyis rkang gsum ldan pa nas//rkang stong
227a6(mdo sde): bar du ldan pa gzhan yang mang /kha bzhin sngo la lus ni ser ba dang //kha bzhin ser la lus ni sde ba dang //kha bzhin dkar la lus ni gnag pa dang //kha bzhin gnag la lus
227a7(mdo sde): ni dkar nga dang //kha bzhin gzhan la lus kyang gzhan pa dang //de 'dra'i phyag brnyan dag gi dpung rnams lhags//stag dang sbrul dang phag gi gdong can dang //glang po rta dang
227b1(mdo sde): bong bu rnga mor gdong //spre'u dang seng ge dred kyi gdong can dang //de 'dra'i kha gdod ldan pa'i dpung rnams lhags//ral pa brdzes la 'jigs pa'i gnod sbyin mang //lug mgo rus
227b2(mdo sde): pa'abar 'bur lba ba can//lus ni mi yi khrag gis rab tu sngags//gnod sbyin de 'dra ba dag der yang lhags//rkang pa dag ni rko ba'i rkang pa 'dra//mig gi 'bras bu spre'u'i mig dang
227b3(mdo sde): mtshungs//mche ba dag ni glang po'i mche ba 'dra//kha gdong de 'dra'i dpung rnams der yang lcags//lus kyi dbyibs ni chu srin 'dra ba ste//mig gi 'bras bu gnyis ni rab tu 'bar//rna
227b4(mdo sde): ba dag ni ra yi rna ba 'dra//kha gdong de 'dra'i dpung rnams der yang lhags//kha cig dag ni lag na dbyug pa thogaso//tho bo mdung thung rtse gsum lag na thogs//kha cig ri bo lhun po
227b5(mdo sde): lag na thogs//'jigs su rung ba'i gzugs cad gnod sbyin lhags//gshol thogs 'khor lo thogs shing mig bsgyur dang //ri rtse chen po lag na thogs pa dang //rlung dang rdo dang
227b6(mdo sde): gnam lpags rab 'bebs shing //gnod sbyin 'jigs su rung ba drir yang lhags//rlung ni rab tu gtong zhing char yang 'byongs//bad+ma phrag stong gi glog kyang rab tu 'byin//'brug gi
227b7(mdo sde): sgra yang sgrog cing shing ljon skyel//byang chub shing gi lo me tsam mi g.yo//char pa rab tu 'bebs shing rlung yang gtong //chu bo 'bebs shing chu yis sa yang ga //de ltar 'jigs
228a1(mdo sde): su rung ba mtshan mo byung //de yi nub mo sems med shing yang skyel//thams cad dbyibs mi sdug cing gzugs mi sdug/'jigs pa'i gzugs ldan de dag mthong
228a2(mdo sde): nas kyang //yon tan mtshan dang gzi brjid ldan pa po//lhun po lta bur sems ni g.yo ba med//sgyu ma 'dre zhing rmi lam mtshungs pa dang //sprin dang 'dra bar chos rnams kun la
228a3(mdo sde): rtog/de ltar chos kyi tshul la rtog pas na//legs gnas bsam gtan byed cing chos la gnas//gang zhig nga dang nga yi snyam sems shing //dngos dang lus la yang dag mngon
228a4(mdo sde): zhen pa//mi mkhas 'dzin par gnas des mthong nas ni//'jigs par gyur cing bdag kyang rab tu myos//shAkya'i sras pos chos rnams brten byung ba//dngos po med pa'i
228a5(mdo sde): ngo bo nyid du rtogs//nam mkha' lta bu'i sems dang rab tu ldan//dpung bcas g.yo sgyu mthong yang myos pa med //dge slong dag de ltar bdud sdig can gyi bu stong po de dag gi
228a6(mdo sde): nang nas ded dpon la sogs pa bdud kyi bu gang dag byang chub sems dpa' la na ngon par dad po de dag ni bdud kyi g.yas rol tu 'khod par gyur to//gang dag bdud kyi phyogs byed
228a7(mdo sde): pa de dag ni bdud sdig can gyi g.yon rol tu 'khod par gyur to//de nas bdud sdig can gyis rang gi bu de dag la smras pa/yu bu cag ci 'dra ba'i dpung gis byang chub sems dpa'
228b1(mdo sde): gdul bar bya/de na g.yas rol nas bdud kyi bu ded dpon zhes bya bas pha la tshigs su bcad de smras pa/klu yi dbang po gnyid log skyong 'dod dang //glang po'i dbang po gnyid log slong 'dod
228b2(mdo sde): dang //ri dgas rgyal po gnyid log slong 'dod pa//dri na mo dbang legs gnas slong bar 'dod//g.yon rol nas bdud kyi bu blo gros ngan pa zhes bya ba des 'di skad ces smras so//l+h+was
228b3(mdo sde): pa tsam gyis snying yang rab tu 'gas 'gyur la//'jig rten dag na snying po ldan pa'i shing chen 'gas//bdag gi lta bas phog na 'gro ba mchis phog ltar//'tsho bar 'gyur ba'i
228b4(mdo sde): mthu ni de la ga la mchis//g.yas rol nas dbyangs snyan ces bya bas smras pa/bltas pa tsam gyis shing yang 'gas na mi rnams la//bdag bsgrim ci dgos zhes smras snying po ga la
228b5(mdo sde): yod//gal te bltas pas ri bo lhun po 'jig 'gyur yang //de yi mdun du khyod ni mig 'byed yong mi nus//gzhan yang mi gang rgya mtsho lag pa gnyis kyis rgal 'dod cing //de yi
228b6(mdo sde): chu ni brngubs te 'thung bar nus 'gyur gyi//de yi kha bzhin dri ma med la mngon sum du//lta ba de ni de bas sdug bsngal che zhes smras//g.yon rol nas lhag brgya pa zhes bya bas
228b7(mdo sde): smras pa/bdag gi lus 'di lag pa brgya mchis pa//gcig gis kyang ni mnga' brgya 'phang bgyis te//dge sbyong de yi lus ni dbug par bgyi//yab cig bder 'gyur mo shol
229a1(mdo sde): khyod gshegs shig/grayas rol nas blo bzang po zhes bya bas smras pa/ba spu rnams kyang ci phyir lag pa min//lag pa brgya dang khyad par ci zhig yod//lag pa
229a2(mdo sde): re rer de ltar mdung yod kyang //de dag gis kyang de la ci mi nus//ci'i phyir zhe na/des ni 'jig rten 'das pa'i byams pa bsgoms//byams ldan thub pa de yi sku la ni//dug dang
229a3(mdo sde): mtshon dang me yis mi tshugs te//mtshon cha 'phangs pa thams cad me tog 'gyur//gzhan yang mkha' dang so dang chu la stobs ldan gang //mi 'am gnod sbyin ral gri dgra ste
229a4(mdo sde): thogs//mi dbang bzod pa'i stobs ldan de drung phyin//stobs chen stobs ldan de kun stobs chung 'gyur//g.yon ral nas gzi brjid drag shul can zhes bya bas smras pa/bdag
229a5(mdo sde): ni de yi lus bzang gi/khong du zhugs te bsreg por bgyi//'brog gi me ltar chung ngu yis//rkang dang bcas pa'i shing yang bskum//g.yas rol nas mi brngos kyis smras pa/khyod
