229a7(mdo sde): thams cad 'gul yang srid//rgya mtsho chen po zad kyang srid//nyi zla sa la ltung yong srid//sa ni zhu bar 'gyur yang srid//'jig rten don du rtsom mdzad pa//thugs dam
229b1(mdo sde): nges par mdzad pa po//byang chub dam pa ma thob par//shing chen drung nas bzhengs mi srid//g.yon rol nas lag rings kyis bsgyings te smras pa/khyod kyi gnas 'dir mchis
229b2(mdo sde): bzhin du//bdag gi sug pas nyi ma dang //zla ba skar ma rnams kyi gnas//thams cad rab tu mnye bar bgyi//rgya mtsho chen po bzhi po las//tshul du shis par chab kyang blang //
229b3(mdo sde): yab cig dge sbyong de bzung ste//rgya mtsho'i pha rol dor bar bgyi//yab cig dpung 'di gzhag tu gsol//khyod ni thugs ngan che ma mdzad//byang chub shing de drangs phyung ste//sug pas
229b4(mdo sde): phyogs phyogs gtor bar bgyid//g.yas rol nas dang ba thob pas smras pa/gal te khyod ni dregs bsgyings te//lha dang lha min dri zar bcas//sa dang ri dang rgya mtshor bcas//de
229b5(mdo sde): dgra lago pas phyer klog kyang //khyod dang 'dra ba stong phrag ni//gang+gA'i bye ma snyed rnams kyis//byang chubo sems dpa' shes rab can//de yi ba spu g.yos mi nus//g.yon rol nas
229b6(mdo sde): 'jigs byed kyis smras pa/dpung gi nang na bzhugs bzhin du//yab khyod ci slad rab tu bsnyungs//de la dpung grogs ga la mchis//ci slad khyed 'dir de la bsnyengs/g.yas
229b7(mdo sde): rol nas blo gros rtse gcig gis smras pa/'jig rten dag na nyi zla dpung ma mchis//'khor los sgyur dang seng ge dpung ma mchis//byang chub sems dpa' 'di ni dpung ma mchis//
230a1(mdo sde): 'on kyang gcig pus bdud ni gzhom par spyod//g.yon rol nas glags ltas smras pa/mdung thung rtse gsum dbyug to ral grirta//glang po shing rta rkang thung ma mchis pa//
230a2(mdo sde): dge sbyong gcig pu mchis pa de bdag gis//do mod dgum gyis cung zad ma bsnyengs yab//g.yas rol nas bsod nams brgyan gyis smras pa/srid med bu ltar mi phyed mi shigs
230a3(mdo sde): sku dang ldan//bzod stobs go mnangs brtson 'grus brtan pa'i ral gri mnga'//rnam par thar gsum bzhon pa shes rab gozhu lags yab//bsod nams stobs kyis de ni
230a4(mdo sde): bdud kyi dpung las rgyal//g.yon rol nas phyir mi ldog pas smras pa/'brog me rtsa la tshig pa phyir mi ldog/lobs pas 'phangs pa'i mda' yang phyir mi ldog/mkha' las rdo
230a5(mdo sde): rje 'bab par phyir mi ldog/shAkya'i bu las mi rgyal bdag gnas med//g.yas rol nas chos 'dod kyis smras pa/gsher ba'i rtswa dang phrad na me yang ldog/brag gi rtse mor bab
230a6(mdo sde): na mda' yang ldog/rdo rje sar bab de nas gang du 'gro/zhi ba bdud rtsi ma thob de mi ldog/ci'i phyir zhe na/yab cig par snang la ni ri mo bri bar nus kyang gda'//sems can ji
230a7(mdo sde): snyed kun gyi sems ni gcig bsdur nus kyang gda'//yang cig nyi zla rlung ni zhags pas bcing du nus kyang gda'//byang chub sems dpa' byang chub snying po las ni bskyod mi nus//
230b1(mdo sde): g.yon rol nas nye bar ma zhi bas smras pa/lta ba'i gdug pa chen pos lhun po bsreg par bgyi//rgya mtsho chen po rnams kyi chab kyang thal bar bgyi//bdag gis do mod de gnyis thal
230b2(mdo sde): bar brlag par bgyis//yab cig byang chub dang ni dge sbyong gzigs su gsol//g.yas rol nas don grub kyis smras pa//gal te dug gis 'di kun gang gyur la//stong gsum
230b3(mdo sde): dam pa rab tu 'bar gyur kyang //yon tan 'byung gnas kyis ni gzigs tsam gyis//dug ni drug ma yin par rab tu 'gyur//srid pa gsum na gdug pa drag po ni//'dod chags
230b4(mdo sde): zhe sdang de bzhin gti mug ste//de dag de yi sku dang thugs la med//mkha' la rdzab dang rdul ni med pa bzhin//sku dang gsung dang thugs kyang rab tu dag/sems can kun la
230b5(mdo sde): byams pa'i thugs dang ldan//de la mtshon drang dug gis yong mi tshugs//de bas yab cig thams cad bzlog tu gsol//g.yon rol nas dga' ba chags pas smras pa/bdag
230b6(mdo sde): gis sil snyan stong dag rab bgyis te//lha yi bu mo brgyan pa bye stong gis//chags par bgyis te grong khyer mchog tu bkri//'dod la dga' bar khyod kyi dbang du bgyi//g.yas rol
230b7(mdo sde): nas chos dgas smras pa/de 'dir rtog tu chos la dgyes pas dgyes//bsam gtan dgyes shing bdud rtsi don la dgyes//sems can thar par mjed dang byams la dgyes//'dod
231a1(mdo sde): rmugs dka' la de ni dgyes ni mdzad//gnan rol nas rlung gi shugs zhes bya bas smras pa//bdag gi thugs kyis nyi zla rnyed pabyis lnga//nan mkha' las nr-i rAng
231a2(mdo sde): yang rab btang zhing //yab cig da mod dge sbyong bzung nas ni//rlung gis phub ma bzhin du gtor bar bgyi//g.yas rol nas bdud kyi bu blo gros mi g.yo ba zhes bya ba des 'di skad
231a3(mdo sde): ces smras so//ji ltar khyod kyi shugs mgyogs drag pa ltar//gal te lha dang mi rnams de 'drar gyur//de dag thams cad gcig tu 'dus pas kyang //zla med gang zag de la
231a4(mdo sde): gnod mi nus//g.yon rol nas tshangs pa'i blo glos kyis smras pa/de 'dra ba yi drag po phal cher gyur kyang ni//khyod kyi nga rgyal cung zad 'jom mi nus//bgyi ba thams cad mang
231a5(mdo sde): pos 'grub lags na//gcig bus khyod la ci bgyi smos ci 'tshal//g.yas rol nas seng ge'i blo gros kyis smras pa/sa la seng ge khyus 'khor sngon ma byung //lta ba'i gdug
231a6(mdo sde): pa dag kyang khyus mi 'khod//gzi ldan po don pa pha rol ginon pa po//skyes bu khyu mchog rnams kyang khyus mi 'khod//g.yon rol nas thams cad du gdol pa zhes bya bas smras
231a7(mdo sde): pa/ji ltar khyod kyi sras po brtson 'grus dang //shugs dang stobs dang ldan pa sgra sgrogs pa//tshig 'bar de 'dra yab kyis sngon gsan tam//myur du dge sbyong de ni gzhom du
231b1(mdo sde): bzhud//g.yas rol nas seng ge sgra sgrogs zhes bya bas smras pa/nags tshalnga dag gi khrod na lnga mang pos//seng ge med pa de na sgra yang sgrog//seng ges sgra bsgrags 'jigs pa thos pa dang /
231b2(mdo sde): skrag nas phyogs phyogs dag tu rab tu 'bros//de ltar bdung bu mi mkhas 'di dag kyang //mi mchog gsung ni ma thos de bar du//de dag spyi rtol byed cing byung rgyal smra//mi yi seng ges
231b3(mdo sde): gsungang sgrogs 'dres par 'gyur//g.yon rol nas nyes par bsam pa sems pas smras pa/bdag gis gang bsams myur du 'dir 'grub na//de ni ca slad dang tshogs 'di mi lta//
231b4(mdo sde): gang phyir langs te myur du mi 'bros pas//de ni glen pa cho ga ma 'tshal ba//g.yas rol nas don legs par bsam pa sems pa zhes bya bas smras pa/de ni mi glen pha rol gnon
231b5(mdo sde): pa ste//khyed cag gleni zhing shin tu ma bsdams pa//khyed kyis de yi mthu rtsal yod mi shes//de yi shes rab stobs kyis thams cad pham//bdud kyi bu ni gang+gA'i bye ma snyed//khyed
231b6(mdo sde): cag rnams kyis de 'dra'i mthu rtsal can//de yi ba spu gocig kyang g.yos mi nus//bsad par bsams pa mi 'grub smos ci dgos//khyod ni de la yid kyis gnod ma sems//bus
231b7(mdo sde): dang bcas par dad pa'i sems su gyis//'di ni srid gsum rgyal por gyur pas na//'thab mo ma byed par ni slar log cig/de bzhin du sbyar te de ltar bdud kyi bu dkar po'i phyogs
232a1(mdo sde): pa dang nag po'i phyogs pa stong du tshang ba de dag thams cad kyis so so nas bdud sdig can la tshigs su bcad de smras so//de nas bdud sdig can gyi sde dpon sde bzang po
232a2(mdo sde): zhes bya ba des bdud sdig can la tshogs su bcad de smras pa/gang dag khyod kyi rjes 'brang brgya byin dang //skyong dang mi 'am ci yi tshegs rnams dang //lce min dbang dang mkha' lding
232a3(mdo sde): dbang po rnams//thal mo sbyar te de la phyag 'tshal na//khyod kyi rjes su 'brang ba ma lags pa//tshangs pa 'od gsal lha yi bu rnams dang //gnas gtsang ris kyi lha rnams de
232a4(mdo sde): dag kun//de la phyag 'tshal ba ni smos ci 'tshal//khyod kyi sras po shes rab can//stobs dang ldan zhing yid gzhungs pa//de dag byang chub sems dpa' la//snying dang
232a5(mdo sde): mthun gyur phyag 'tshal lo//dpag tshad brgyad cur khyab pa yi//gnod sbyin la sogs bdud dpung 'di//phal cher rab tu dang yid kyis//kun kyang nyes pa med la lha//
232a6(mdo sde): 'jigs su rung zhing drag bsgyur ba//dpung tshogs mi bzad 'di gzigs nas//ngo mtshar ma gyur zhum mi mnga'//nges par do mod 'dri rgyal 'gyur//gang na dpung 'di
232a7(mdo sde): gnas pa rerare//wa dang dug pa sgra 'byin la//bya rog bong bu sgra 'byin pas//myur du slar ni ldog pa'i rigs//byang chub snying por gzigs su gsol//pa ta kun ta dang
232b1(mdo sde): pa dang //khu byug rma bya mngon skor bas//nges par dro mod 'di rgyal 'gyur//gang na dpung 'di gnas pa dar//rdul dang skrag cha'i char 'bab la//sa dkyil me tog char 'bab pas//bdag
232b2(mdo sde): gi tshig bzhin ldog pa'i rigs//gang na dpung 'di gnas pa de//shang shong gyur cing tsher mas gang //sa dkyil dri med gser gyur pas//shes rab can dag ldog pa'i rigs//gal
232b3(mdo sde): te mi 'dod sngar rmis pa'i//rmi lam de dag mngon sum 'gyur//drang srong rnams kyi yul brlag pa//de bzhin dpung 'di thal bar rlog/rgyal po 'gro ba drang srong mchog/tshangs pas
232b4(mdo sde): byin gyis khros byas pas//dan+da ka yi nags tshal tshig/lo mang zhig tu rtswa ma skyes//drang srong brtul zhugs spyod pa po//dka' thub ldan pa'i 'jig rten na//ji snyed 'khod pa
232b5(mdo sde): kun gyi mchog/'byung po kun la mi 'tshe 'di//gang gi lus la mtshan rab 'bar//khyim nas kyang ni byung ba der//nyon mongs phram byes 'tshang rgya zhes//khyod kyis sngon chad ma
232b6(mdo sde): gsan nam//rgyal sras rnams kyis mchod don du//'byor pa 'di 'dra 'di dag sprul//de bas nges par sems can mchog/sbyin srog dam pa len par 'gyur//'di yi mdzod
232b7(mdo sde): spu dri med pa//bye ba khrag khrig zhing du mdzes//de yis bdog cag mog mog bgyis//bdud dpung des bcom gdon mi 'tshal//srid pa'i rtse gnas lha rnams kyis//de yi spyi
233a1(mdo sde): gtsug bltar mi nus//nges par gzhan gyis ma bstan par//thams cad mkhyen nyid thob par 'gyur//ji ltar lhun po dor yug dang //nyi zla brgya byin tshangs
233a2(mdo sde): pa dang //shing ljon rnams dang ro mchog kun//sa dkyil phyag 'tshal bgyid las na//bsod nams stobs can shes rab stobs//ye shes stobs can bzod pa'i stobs//brtson
233a3(mdo sde): 'brus stobs dang ldan pa de//bdud phyogs stobs med mdzad pa nges//glang pos so ma btang sdod dang //seng ges ji ltar wa bcom dang //nyi mas srin bu me khyer ltar//bde
233a4(mdo sde): bar gshegs pas dpung bcom 'gyur//tshig de skad thos pa dang bdud kyi bu gzhan zhig shin tu khros nas mig dmar por gyur te smras pa/khyod ni gcig pu de yi bsngags pa
233a5(mdo sde): dag/shin tu dpag tu med par brjod byed na//gcig pu des ni ci zhig bya bar nus//'jigs su rung ba'i dpung chen ma mthong ngam//de nas g.yas rol nas bdud kyi bu
233a6(mdo sde): bdud rab tu 'joms pa zhes bya bas smras pa/'jig rten nyi zla seng ge dang //'khor los sgyur la grogs byed med//byang chub bzhugs nas nges pa yi//byang chub sems

233b2(mdo sde): 'phen cing /ri rab tsam gyi re de dag kyang byang chub sems dpa'i steng du 'phangs pa dang /me tog gi bla bra dang /gzhal med khang du gyur te gnas pa dang /gang dag mig gdug pa dang
233b3(mdo sde): myur du gdug pa dang /dbugs gdug po rnams me lce gtor ba'i me'i dkyil 'khor de'ang byang chub sems dpa' la 'od kyi dkyil 'khor lta bur gnas par bya ba'i phyir pad+ma 'dab ma

233b5(mdo sde): mthong nas lho phyogs su bros po dang ci'ang ma yin no snyom nas yang slar log go/slar log nas kyang byang chub sems dpa'i steng du mtshon cha rnam pa sna tshogs ral gri dang //mda'
233b6(mdo sde): gzhu dang /mdung thung dang /mda' bo che dang /dgra sta dang /breng ba dang /gtun shing dang /rdo rje rtsi gcig pa dang /dbyug ta dang /'khor lo dang /tho ba dang /shing drungs
233b7(mdo sde): phyung dang /pha bong dang /zhags pa dang /lcags kyi thu lum shin tu 'jigs pa du ma 'phen te/de dag kyang 'phangs ma thag tu me tog gi phreng ba dang /me tog gi bla brer gyur te/
234a1(mdo sde): gnas so//me tog sil mar yang gyur nas sa la 'thor ba dang /phreng ba'i chun por yang 'phyang bas byang chub kyi shing brgyan par gyur to//byang chub sems dpa'i bkod
234a2(mdo sde): pa 'byor pa de dag mthong nas bdud sdig can phrag dog dang ser snas sems la gnod de/byang chub sems dpa' la smras pa/kye rgyal bu gzhon nu bzhengs/bzhengs/rgyal srid la spyod cig/

234a7(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' la slar smras pa/sngon chad kho bos mchod sbyin kho na mtho med//gtan pa meng pa byas pa khyod 'dir dbang du yod//khyod la 'od na dbang po gang yang yod min pas///

235a1(mdo sde): chem mo//'di lta ste dper na/yul ma ga d+ha'i brdab khar sgra 'byung zhing sgra rgyun ring ba de bzhin du sa chen po 'di'ang byang chub sems dpas lag pas bsnun mthag

237a1(mdo sde): thog ma shar ba lta bu dang /gser gyi mchod sdong lta bu dang /pad+ma 'dab ma stong pa rgyas pa lta bu dang /gtor bar bya ba gtor ba'i me lta bu dang /lhun po ltar mi g.yo ba dang /
237a2(mdo sde): khor yug ltar mngon par 'phags pa dang /dbang po shin tu bsrungs pa dang /glang po ltar sems shin tu dul bar mthong ngo //de nas bdud kyi bu mo de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' shin
237a3(mdo sde): tu chags par bya ba'i phyir glu dang gar du sbyar ba'i tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so//dus kyi dam pa sos ka bzang la bab//zhugs shing me tog rgyas kyis dgyes par rol//khyod kyi
237a4(mdo sde): gzugs ni gzugs bzang mdzes pa ste//mtshan gyis spras pa'i dbang du bdag cag 'gyur//bdag cag skyes pa legs skyes dbyibs legs te//lha mi bde ba'i rkyen du bdag

237a6(mdo sde): brgyan pa 'dri dog rnams la gzigs//gzugs 'di bltas nas shing rul lta bur srog tsom lus pa yang //chags par 'gyur na chags pas dga' ba su zhig chags mi 'gyur//
237a7(mdo sde): sgra 'jam shin tu dri nim dri dang ldan//cod pan rna cha 'dab ris bzhin rgyas la//dadel ba legs shing legs byugs bzhin dang ldan//pad+ma rgyas pa lta bur mig yangs legs//
237b1(mdo sde): kha bzhin zla ba nya ba lta bu ste//shing tog bim+ba smin 'dra'i mchu dang ldan//dung dang kum+bu kha ba dAkar so ldan//sdug pa dga' la chags pa rnams la gzigs//num shin tu ma drung zhing rgyas/
237b2(mdo sde): la 'bur//lto ba'i rkeng na gnyer gsum shin tu mdzes//rkang pa 'khor sa lta bur yengs shing mdzes//ni chung shin tu mdzes la mgon po gzigs//glang po'i sna 'dra ba yi brla ldon
237b3(mdo sde): zhing //lag pa gdu bus chal par gang ba can//rkang pa gser gyi phrag ska rab mdzes brgyan//khyod kyi bran mo 'di la mgon po gzigs//ngang pa'i spangs ldan dal gyis mchi bgyid pa/
237b4(mdo sde): 'jam zhing yid 'ong 'dod ldan mdzes smra ba//rnam pa 'di ltar shin tu legs brgyan la//lha yi dga' ba rnams la shin tu mkhas//glu dang rol mo'i dbyangs sgra grwar rab bslabs/
237b5(mdo sde): dga' ba'i ched du mdzes pa'i gzugs can skyes//'dod la rab dga' gal te mi bzhed na//'jig rten dag na khyod ni shin tu bslus//mi glen nor gyi bde ba mi shes 'ga'//gter
237b6(mdo sde): mthong nas ni 'bros par bgyid pa ltar//khyod kyang 'dod chags mi mkhyen rang lhags pa//na chung rnams la mi spyod de dang 'dra//dge slong dag de nas byang chub sems dpa' mig mi
237b7(mdo sde): 'dzums par 'dzum dmul te/bzhin gyi 'dzum phyung zhing /dbang po rnam par ma 'khrugs pa dang /lus ma bcos pa dang /brjid pa dang /ma chags pa dang /mi sdang ba dang /ma
238a1(mdo sde): rmongs pa dang /ri'i dbang po ltar mi g.yo ba dang /ma zhum pa dang /ma gyur pa dang /'dzem pa med pa dang /blo shin tu legs par gnas pa dang /nyon mongs pa
238a2(mdo sde): rnams shin tu spangs pa'i phyir rang gi kha na las pa'i ye shes kyi sgo dang /'jam zhing snyan pa'i tshig dang /tshangs pa las lhag pa'i nga ro dang /byA ka la pidI'i sgra dbyangs dang /snyan pa
238a3(mdo sde): dang /yid du 'ong bas bdud kyi bu mo de dag la tshigs su bcad pas slar smras pa/'dod pa sdug bsngal mang po sogs shing sdug bsngal rtsa ba ste//mi mkhas rnams la bsam gtan
238a4(mdo sde): rdzu 'phrul dka' thub nyams par byed//bud med 'dod pa'i yon tan chog pa med ces mkhas pas smras//nga ni mi mkhas rnams la shes rab chog par byed par 'gyur//'dod pa
238a5(mdo sde): bsnyen na sred pa phyir zhing rnam par 'phel 'gyur te//dper na mi 'ga' la la tshwa chu 'thungs par gyur pa bzhin//de la zhugs pa bdag gi don min gzhan gyi don kyang min//nga ni bdag gi
238a6(mdo sde): don dang bzhon gyi don la spro ba yin//khyod kyi gzugs ni chu bur dag drang dbu ba mtshungs shing 'dra//sgyu ma'i tshun ltar rang gi blo yis rnam par bsrungs pa ste//rmi lam dag na rtse
238a7(mdo sde): ba lta bur mi brtan mi rtag kyang //byis pa mi mkhas rnams kyi sems ni rtag tu rmongs par byed//mig ni chu yi chu bur mtshungs shing 'dra ste pags pas g.yogs//khrag rlang
238b1(mdo sde): mkhrung zhing 'bur ba dper na nad kyi 'byas dang mtshungs//lto ni gcin dang phyi sa sogs te shin tu mi gtsang ba//sdug bsngal 'khrul 'khor las dang nyon mongs pa las yang dag byung //byis
238b2(mdo sde): pa'i blo can dag ni rmongs gyur phyin ci log pa yis//lus gang la ni sdug par rtog pa mkhas pa de lta min//sdug bsngal rtsa bar gyur pa'i 'khor bar yun ring 'khor byed na//sems
238b3(mdo sde): can dmyal ba rnams su sdug bsngal mi bzed mang po myong //rked pa nas ni rab tu yid mi 'ong ba'i dri can 'dzag/brla dang byin pa rkang pa dag ni 'khrul 'khor lta bur gnas//nga yis khyed
238b4(mdo sde): la yang dag brtags na sgyu ma ji bzhin te//phyin ci log gi rgyu dang rkyen las byung bar gyur pa yin//'phags pa'i ye shes lam las gol bar phyin gyur pa//me dang dug gi lo mo 'dra
238b5(mdo sde): zhing sbrul chen khros 'dra ba//'dod pa'i yon tan yon tan mi ni zhid yon tan nyams mthong na//de la byis pa bde ba'i 'du shes skyed cing brgyal bar gyur//mi gang 'dod pas bud med
238b6(mdo sde): rnams kyi khol por gyur pa dang //gang zhig chos kyi dga' ba bor te 'dod pas dga' byed cing //dga' la brkam pa de ni tshul khrims lam las gol gyur cing //bsam gtan
238b7(mdo sde): lam gol blo nyams ye shes las ni rab ring gnas//nga ni 'dod chags zhe sdang lhan cig gnas pa ma yin te//rtag dang sdug dang bdag dang lhan cig gnas par byed ma yin//
239a1(mdo sde): mi dga' ba dang dga' dang lhan cig gnas pa ma yin la//nga yi sems ni rab tu grol te mkha' la rlung dang 'dra//gal te khyed 'dra'i 'gro ba kun gyis 'dir ni gang gyur la///
239a2(mdo sde): bskal par de dag rnams dang lhan cig 'dre zhing gnas kyang ni//nga la tha ba med cing chags med gti mug mi 'gyur te//rgyal ba rnams kyi thugs ni nam mkha' mtshungs shing 'dra phyir ro//
239a3(mdo sde): lha dang lha mo shin tu dri med la//khrag dang rus pa med cing rab bzang ba//de dag kun kyang 'jigs pa cher gnas te//rtag dngos bral zhing ther zug med phyir ro//de nas bdud kyi bu
239a4(mdo sde): mo bud med kyi sgyu rnams shin tu bslabs pa de dag de bas kyang cher 'dod chags dang /rgyags pa dang /dregs pa bskyed de/steg pa bstan nas lus rnams brgyan te/bud med kyi
239a5(mdo sde): g.yo nye bar bstan nas byang chub sems dpa' la rjod do//de la 'di skad ces bya ste/bu mo'i nang na gces mchog sred dong dga' dang dga' can lhan cig tu//bdud kyis btang ba shin
239a6(mdo sde): tu tshul du shis par rings par lhags gyur te//shing gi lcug ma gzhon nu lo mar bcas pa rlung gis bskyod pa bzhin//gar byed cing ni rgyal po'i sras po shing drung 'dug la rjod par
239a7(mdo sde): byed//dus kyi nang na dam pa mchog tu bgyi ba sos ka'i dus 'di ste//skyes pa dag dang bud med dga' gyu ro bgyid cing mun pa rdu la yang bcom//khu byug dang ni ngang pa rma bya sgra 'byin
239b1(mdo sde): bya tshogs rnams kyis gang //'dod pa'i yon tan dga' ba myong bar bgyi ba'i dus la da bab po//bskal pa stong du tshul khrims dga' zhing brtul zhugs dka' thub spang gyur pa//ri yi rgyal po lta
239b2(mdo sde): bur mi g.yo nyi ma shar ma thag pa'i gzugs//'brug bsgrogs lta bur sgra snyan ri dgas dbang po sgra bsgrags 'dra ba po//'gro la phan pa byed pa de yis don dang ldan pa'i tshig smras pa//'dod
239b3(mdo sde): partsod dang dgra dang 'thab dang nyon mongs bcas dang 'jigs byed pa//byas pa'i skye bos nye bar bsten gyi mkhas pa'i skye bos rtag spangs pa//gang du bde gshegs rnams kyis bdud rtsa
239b4(mdo sde): brnyes pa'i dus la bab gyur gyis//do mod bdud las rgyal to stobs bcu rnams dang ldan pa dgra bcom 'gyur//sgyu rnams bsten nas smras pa zhal ras pad+ma 'dra ba gsan du gsol//khyod
239b5(mdo sde): ni rgyal po dbang phyug dam pas bdag stobs dang ldan par 'gyur//bud med dam pa'i tshogs kyis sil snyan stong dge rab tu bgyid 'gyur na//thub pa'i cha byed kyis ni ci bgyis spongs la
239b6(mdo sde): dga' ba bstan du gsol//byang chub sems dpas smras pa//nga ni srid pa gsum na dbang phyug lha dang mi rnams kyis mchod la//chos kyi 'khor los 'gro zhing stobs bcu'i stobs dang
239b7(mdo sde): ldan pa'i rgyal por 'gyur//slob dang mi slob bu rnams khrag khrig rtag tu 'dud pa mngon du byed//chos kyi dga' bas dga' yi yul la nga yi yid ni dga' ma yin//de dag gis
240a1(mdo sde): /smras pa/re zhig dar la bab pa ma yol dang po thor bur gyur pa dang //khyod ni re zhig snyun gyis ma btab mi shis bgres par ma gyur dang //ji srid dar la bab cing bdag
240a2(mdo sde): cag grogs kyang dar la bab gyur pa//de srid bar du 'dzum pa'i zhal gyis 'dod pa'i dga' ba spyad du gsol//byang chub sems dpas smras pa/ji srid do mod dal ba dam pa 'chi
240a3(mdo sde): med dkon pa rnyed pa dang //ji srid lha dang lha min grong khyer mi khrom sdug bsngal spangs pa dang //ji srid rga dang na dang 'chi ba'i dgra yis dkrugs par ma gyur pa//de srid nga ni 'jigs
240a4(mdo sde): med grong khyer 'gro ba'i lam mchog bsgom par bya//de dag gis smras pa/lha yi gnas na sum cu rtsa gsum bdag po lha mos bskor ba dang //'thab bral 'thab bral rab dang dga'
240a5(mdo sde): ldan rab dang bdud kyi grong khyer na//lha mchog bstod pa bzhin du bud med dbang du gyur nas 'dod dga' la//rol cing spyod la bdag cag rnams dang lhan cig dgyes pa rgya chen
240a6(mdo sde): mdzod//byang chub sems dpas smras pa/'dod pa rtswa rtse'i zil thigs bzhin du myur la ston ka'i sprin dang mtshungs//klu yi bu mo khro ba lta bur shin tu 'jigs par byed pa yin//
240a7(mdo sde): brgya byin 'thob bral rab lha dga' ldan pa dag bdud kyi dbang du song //'phags min rnams kyis 'dod pa sdug bsngal ldan pa 'di la su zhig dga'//de dag gis smras pa/shing
240b1(mdo sde): mchog 'di dag lo ma gzhon dang ldan zhing me tog rgyas gyur la//shang shang te'u dang khu brug sgra 'byin bung ba sgra 'byin ldan pa gzigs//sa las rtswa 'khrungs rab sngo 'jam zhing snum la lcang lo
240b2(mdo sde): can mchis bu//nags mchog mo ni tshogs kyis bstan par na rlung rnams dang dgyes par mdzod//byang chub sems dpas smras pa/lo na rabacas de'i shing rnams 'di dag dus kyi
240b3(mdo sde): dbang gis me tog rgyas//bung ba dag kyang bkres dang skom pas nyin nas me tog rnams su lhags//gang zhig dus nA sa las skyes pa rnams kyang nyi mas skams par 'gyur//nga 'dir sngon gyi
240b4(mdo sde): rgyal ba rnams kyis spyad pa bdud rtsi nges par spyad//bdud kyi bu mo rnams kyis smras pa/zla 'dra'i zhal mnga' gzigs shig pad+ma sar pa 'dra ba'i kha bzhin can//snyan cing yid du 'ong
240b5(mdo sde): ba'i tshig ldan so ni dngul dang kha ba 'dra//'di 'dra lha yi gnas na dkon na mi yi gnas nA ga la mchis//gang dag lha mchog rnams kyis rtag tu 'dod par bgyi ba khyod kyis brnyes//byang
240b6(mdo sde): chub sems dpas smras pa/lus ni ngan skyugs mi gtsang sbyin bu'i rigs kyis gang ba shig shig po//myur du 'gyes shing 'jig pa bde ba ma yin rnams dang ldan par mthong //rgyu
240b7(mdo sde): par bcas dang mi rgyu ba yi 'gro la bde ba mchog byed pa//go 'phang 'chi 'pho med pa skye bo mkhas pas mchod pa de thob bya//de dag 'dod pa'i sgyu rtsal drug cu rtse bzhi myong bar gyur pa
241a1(mdo sde): ste//rlung gdung gser gyi phag sku 'khrol zhing gos kyang shig shig byas nas ni//'dod pa'i mnga' yis phog pa rgyugs pa 'dzum zhing 'di skad skyes//rdo rdo khyod la nongs
241a2(mdo sde): pa ci zhig bgyis na 'di dag bsten mi bgyi//srid pa kun gyis nyes pa rig nas rdul dang bral bas 'di skad smras//'dod pa ral gri mdung thung rtsi gsum sbrang rtsi can gyi spu gri 'dra//sprul
241a3(mdo sde): gyi mgo dang me mur 'dra bar ngas 'dir rab tu rig pas nA//bud med yon tan 'phrog pas de phyir nga yis bud med tshogs rnams spangs//bud med yon tan rnam po mang po khrag khrig
241a4(mdo sde): byed pa de dag gis//gang gis tshe na glang po'i phyag gu'i stabs can de brjod ma nus tshe//ngo tsha skyengs nas thub pa'i rkang pa gnyis la rab tu phyag 'tshal te//dga' zhing mgu ba
241a5(mdo sde): bskyed nas phan pa byed pa de la bstod pa byas//pad+ma dri ma med pa'i snying po 'dra zhing ston zla lta bu'o zhal//mar gyis sbyin sreg bgyis pa'i 'od 'phro me 'dra gser gyi ri 'dra ba//srid
241a6(mdo sde): pa brgya nas spyad cing dgongs dang smon lam btab pa grub gyur cig/bdag nyid brgal nas sdug bsngal dag dang ldan pa'i 'gro ba bsgral du gsol//de drag rnams kyis dong ka'i
241a7(mdo sde): shing dang tsam+ba kau 'dra rnams mang bstod//mchog tu gyur pa'i ri ltar mi g.yo ba la bskor ba byas nas ni//song ste pha yi rkang le mgo bos phyag 'tshal 'di skad tshig kyang smras//
241b1(mdo sde): yab cig lha dang mi yi bla ma de la khong khro spangs nA legs//bzhin ni 'dzum par gyur nas pad+ma'i 'dab ma 'dra ba'i mig gis lta//de ni chags pas skye bo mi lta de la khro gnyer mchis ma
241b2(mdo sde): lags//lhun po g.yo zhing rgya mtsho skams la nyi zla ltung bar 'gyur yang gda'//srid pa gsum gyi nyes mthong de ni bud med rnams kyi dbang mi 'gyur//de nas bdud sdig can gyis tshig
241b3(mdo sde): de skad thos nas de bas kyang cher sdug bsngal zhing yid mi bde la//yi ma rangs shing tshig pa za ba'i yid kyis rang gi bu mo de dag la smras pa/kye mi shes shing glen te/khyed kyi gzugs dang da rod
241b4(mdo sde): ma mthong ngam/ji ltar gyur na de byang chub kyi snying po las bslang bar ma nus/de nas bdud kyi bu mo de dag gis rang gi pha la tshigs su bcad pas slar smras pa/snyan cing 'jam por smra yang
241b5(mdo sde): chags pa ma mchis te//gsong ba chen po lta yang sdang ba mchis ma lags//spyod lam dag dang spyod pa lta yang rmongs ma mchis//lus rnams thams cad rtogs kyang bsam pa shin
241b6(mdo sde): tu zab//bud med nongs pa rgya chen the tshom ma mchis rtogs//'dod las dben pa'i yid ldan 'dod tshogs chags ma mchis//gang zhig de yi sems dang spyod pa yongs 'tshal ba//lha
241b7(mdo sde): yul mi yul 'di na lha mi de ma mchis//de la bud med sgyu rnams gang lags bstan na yab//chags bcas gang lags de yi snying zhu 'gyur rigs na//de dag mthong yang de yi sems
242a1(mdo sde): ni gcig ma g.yos//ri dbang rgyal po bzhin du de ni mi g.yo g.yo ma mchis//bsod nams gzi brjid brgyas bltams yon tan gzi brjid rdzogs//bskal pa bya
242a2(mdo sde): ba mang por tshul khrims brtul zhugs spyad//lha dang tshangs pa sems can gzi brjid rnam dag dge/de dag de yi rkang par mgos gtugs phyag kyang 'tshal//sde dang bcas pa'i
242a3(mdo sde): bdud rnams bcom nas sngon chad kyi//rgyal bas bzhed pa byang chub dam pa 'thob 'gyur nges//yab cig bdag cag g.yul ngor 'thab pa mi 'tshal te//stobs ldan ngag dang
242a4(mdo sde): 'thab par sbyor 'di tshegs rab che//yab cig mkha' la nor bu rin chen gtsug phud can//rdzogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' khrag khrig gus par gnas//rin chen 'byung
242a5(mdo sde): gnas yan lag me tog phreng bas brgyan//stobs bcu mnga' bas mchod phyir 'drar btang rnams la gzigs//gang dag sems pa ma mchis gang dag sems ma mchis//shing
242a6(mdo sde): ri lha dbang gnod sbyin mkha' lding dbang po dag/yon tan ri bor mngon par 'dud cing phyogs pa las//yab cig do mod slar log na ni legs pa 'dra//gzhan yang gang gi
242a7(mdo sde): pha mthar mi phyin dor ni rkyal mi bgyi//gang zhig rtsa nas mi phyin de ni brko mi bgyi//gong la bzod pa yang gsol de ni dkrug mi bgyi//gang gis yid mi bde bar 'gyur ba de mi
242b1(mdo sde): bgyi//dge slong dag de nas de'i tshe shing gi lha mo brgyad la 'di lta ste/dpal ldan dang /'phel mo dang /dka' thub dang /dge ma dang /mkhas ma dang /mdangs stongs dang /bden sgra dang /
242b2(mdo sde): ldan ma ste/de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' la yang dag par mchod nas dpal rnam pa bcu drug gis byang chub sems dpa' 'phel bar byed//mngon du bstod par byed de/sems can
242b3(mdo sde): dam pa khyod ni dpung zla yar gyi ngo ltar mdzes pa'o//blo rnam par dam pa khyod ni gdugs dang po shar ba ltar ltung nge ba'o//sems can dam pa khyod ni chab kyi nang na pad+ma ltar rob tu rgyas pa'o//sems
242b4(mdo sde): can dmo pa khyod ni nags dang nags 'dab na rgyu ba'i seng ge ltar sgrosmos pa'o//sems can dam pa khyod ni rgya mtsho'i dbus na ri'i rgyal po lhor mdzes pa'o//sems can dam pa khyod ni khor
242b5(mdo sde): yug gi ri ltar mngon par 'phags pa'o//sems can dam pa khyod ni rgya mtsho ltar rin po ches bltamar zhing gting dpag dka' ba'o//'jig rten gyi mgon po khyod ni nam mkha' ltar thug pa
242b6(mdo sde): ma mchis shing thugs kyi rgya che ba'o//sems can rnam par dag pa khyod ni dog sa ltar sems can thams cad kyi 'tsho bar gyur cing thugs shin tu brtan pa'o//sems can dam pa khyod
242b7(mdo sde): ni mchom dros pa ltar rtag tu dang zhing thugs rnyog pa mi mnga' ba'o//sems can dam pa khyod ni rlung dmar ltar 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad la rtag tu mi chags shing thugs gnas ma
243a1(mdo sde): mchis pa'o//sems can dam pa khyod ni gzi brjid kyi rgyal po ltar rlom sems thams cad spangs shing bsnyen par dka' ba'o//sems can dam pa khyod ni sred med kyi bu
243a2(mdo sde): ltar thul bar dka' zhing stobs dang ldan pa'o//'jig rten gyi mgon po khyod ni byang chub kyi snying po las mi bzhengs pas dam bcas pa brtan pa'o//sems can dam pa khyod ni dbang po'i
243a3(mdo sde): lag gis 'phangs pa'i rdo rje ltar slar mi ldog pa'o//sems can dam pa khyod ni ring por mi thogs par stobs bcu dang ldan par byon pos brnyes pa legs par brnyes pa'o//dge slong
243a4(mdo sde): dag de ltar byang chub kyi shing gi lha mo rnams kyi dpal rnam pa bcu drug gis byang chub sems dpa' 'phel bar byed do//dge slong dag de na gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha'i bu rnams kyis
243a5(mdo sde): rnam pa bcu drug gis bdud nyams dmas par byed de/rnam pa bcu drug gang zhe na/'di lta ste/sdig can khyod ni khrud khyung rgan po ltar sems khongs su chud cing dmas pa'o//sdig can
243a6(mdo sde): khyod ni glang po rgan po 'dam du bying ba ltar nyam chung ba'o//sdig can khyod ni dpa' bor khas 'ches pa pham pa ltar gcig pur gyur pa'o//sdig can khyod ni nad kyis nyen pa 'brog tu
243a7(mdo sde): bor ba ltar gnyis su med pa'o//sdig can khyad ni glang bu khal gyis nyon mongs pa ltar stobs med pa'o//sdig can khyod na shing rlung gis btab pa ltar skyel ba'o//sdig can
243b1(mdo sde): khyod ni 'don pa lam sbyor ba ltar lam ngan par gnas pa'o//sdig can khyod ni mi dbul po bu lon can ltar dman pa bas kyang dman pa'o//sdig can khyod ni bya rog byung rgyal ba ltar mu cor
243b2(mdo sde): smra ba'o//sdig can khyod ni ma dul ba byas pa mi gzo ba ltar nga rgyal gyis zil gyis non pa'o//sdig can khyod ni seng ge'i sgras wa 'bros pa ltar deng 'bros par 'gyur ba'o//sdig can khyod ni
243b3(mdo sde): rnam par 'thor rlung gis gtor ba'i bya bzhin du deng 'dar bar 'gyur ba'o//sdig can khyod ni sprang po bsod nams zad pa ltar dus mi shes pa'o//sdig can khyod ni sdod chag pa rdul gyis gang
243b4(mdo sde): be ltar dang rnam par spang bar 'gyur ba'o//sdig can khyod ni sngags la dpa' ba sbrul la bab pa ltar dang tshar chod par 'gyur ba'o//sdig can khyod ni mi rkang log bcad pa ltar stobs thams
243b5(mdo sde): cad dang bral ba'o zhes bya'o//dge slong dag de ltar granas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha rnams kyis rnam pa bcu drug gis bdud sdug can nyam dmas pa byas so//dge slong dag de la byang chub kyi
243b6(mdo sde): bsnyen bkur ba'i lha rnams kyis rnam pa bcu drug gis bdud sdig can zlog par byed de/bcu drug gang zhe na/'di lta ste/sdig can khyod ni dpa' bos pha rol gyi sde bcom po ltar byang
243b7(mdo sde): chub sems dpas da mod pham par byas par 'gyur ro//sdig can khyod ni gyang stobs chung ngu la gyang stobs chen po bab pa ltar do mod byang chub sems dpas tshar bcad par 'gyur ro//
244a1(mdo sde): sdig can khyod ni srin bu me khyer la nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor bab pa ltar do mong byang chub sems dpas zil gyis non par 'gyur ro//sdig can khyod ni phub ma spar gang la
244a2(mdo sde): rlung dmar btab pa ltar do mod byang chub sems dpas gtor bar 'gyur ro//sdig can khyod ni wa la seng ge bab pa ltar do mod byang chub sems dpas dngangs par byas par 'gyur
244a3(mdo sde): ro//sdig can khyod ni shing sA lo chen po rtsa ba nas bcad pa ltar do mod byang chub sems dpas bsgyel bar 'gyur ro//sdig can khyod ni me mdza' ba'i grong khyer la rgyal po chen po bab pa ltar
244a4(mdo sde): ngo mod byang chub sems dpas brlag par 'gyur ro//sdig can khyod ni ba rjes kyi chu la nyin chen chen po bab pa ltar do mod byang chub sems dpas yongs su zad par byas par 'gyur ro///
244a5(mdo sde): sdig can khyod ni mi g.yon can bsad par bya ba shor ba ltar ngo mod byang chub sems dpas 'bros par byed par 'gyur ro//sdig can khyod ni me'i tsha bas bud pa'i khyu ltar do mod
244a6(mdo sde): byang chub sems dang sa mgo 'khor bar byed par 'gyur ro//sdig can khyod ni chos kyi rgyal po rgyal srid nyamos pa ltar de mod byang chub sems dpas mya ngan byed du bcug par 'gyur ro///
244a7(mdo sde): sdig can khyod ni khrung khrung rgan po 'dab mo bregs pa ltar do mod byang chub sems dpas sems khongs su bcug par 'gyur ro//sdig can khyod ni 'brog dgon par lam rgyags
244b1(mdo sde): chad pa ltar do mod byang chub sems dpas phongs par byas par 'gyur ro//sdig can khyod ni rgya mtsho chen por gru zhig pa ltar do mod byang chub sems dpas smre sngags 'don du bcug par
244b2(mdo sde): 'gyur ro//sdig can khyod ni sdig pa'i bskal pas nr-i dang nags tsha la ltar da mod byang chub sems dpas rnyis par byas par 'gyur ro//sdig can khyod ni ri'i rtse mo la rdo rje bab pa ltar do
244b3(mdo sde): mong byang chub sems dpas brnyil bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'o//dge slong dag de ltor byang chub kyi bsnyen bkur ba'i lha'i bu rnams kyis rnam pa bcu drug gis bdud sdig can zlog par
244b4(mdo sde): byed kyang bdud sdig can phyir ma log do//dri la 'di skad ces bya ste/lce yi tshogs kyis yang dag bskul ba thos kyang bdud ni phyir log ma gyur te//slongs shig rgyud cig 'di ni brlag
244b5(mdo sde): par gyis shig srog kyang sbyin par ma byed cig/'di ni rang nyid rgyal nas nga yi yul nas gzhan yang sgrol bar byed par 'gyur//langs te bros pa ma gtogs dge sbyong 'di la thar
244b6(mdo sde): gzhan cung zad med ces smos//byang chub sems dpas smras pa/ri yi rgyal po lhun po gnas nas g.yo srid 'gro ba thams cad med 'gyur srid//skar ma'i cho ga so rnams thams
244b7(mdo sde): cad zla ba bces par mkha'i las sa la lhung yang srid//sems can kun gyi bsam pa gcig byed 'gyur srid rgya mtsho chen po skam srod kyi//nga 'dra shing gi rgyal po'i drung na 'dug
245a1(mdo sde): pa la ni g.yo ba yong mi srid//bdud kyis smras pa/kho bo 'dod pa'i dbang phyug 'jig rten 'di kun dbang //lha dang lha min tshogs bcas mi dang dud 'gro rnams//
245a2(mdo sde): kho bos khyab ste thams cad kho bo'i dbang du 'gyur//kho bo'i yul na 'dug pa longs la tshig bzhin gyis//byang chub sems dpas smras pa/gal te 'dod dbang khyod yin gsal
245a3(mdo sde): bar khyod dbang min//yang dag nga ltos nga yang chos kyi dbang phyug yin//gal te ngan 'gror mi 'gro khyod ni 'dod dbang phyug/dbang med khyod ni lta bzhin byang chub ngas thob 'gyur//
245a4(mdo sde): bdud kyis smras pa/dge sbyong bdag nyid gcig pu dgon par ci zhig byed//khyod kyis gang btsal de dang 'phrad par sla ma yin//rab 'gro shes ldan la sogs dka' thub rab bsgrims
245a5(mdo sde): kyang //go 'phang mchog de ma thob mir gyur khyod ci smos//byang chub sems dpas smras pa/khro ba'i zil non blo dang lha yul 'dod pa dang //bdag la rtag dang mi rtag snyam du gnas
245a6(mdo sde): pa dang //yul du 'gro bas gnas pa thar snyam gi nas pa yi//dang srong mi shes sngon du 'gro bas dka' thub sprad//de dag yang dag don dang bral zhing skyes bu smra//khyab
245a7(mdo sde): dang phyogs gcig ces dang kha cig rtag ces smra//lus can lus me ni yon tan mi ne dang yon tan can//byed pa po dang byed po min zhes gzhan dag 'dzor//stan 'dir 'dug
245b1(mdo sde): ste nga rgyal bcom pas sde dpung bcus//khyod phram byas te byang chub rdul med deng thob nas//'gro ba 'di la 'byung dang byung dang mya ngan 'das//sdug bsngal zhi ba bsil ba'i dngos po
245b2(mdo sde): bstan par bya//bdud ni khros shing 'khrugs te tshig pa zos nas mdun du chub pa'i tshig tu smras pa dge sbyong 'di zung zhig/gtsog pu dgon par bor bar gyur pa 'di ni nga yi mdun nas bzung
245b3(mdo sde): la stong ste myur du dbang du gyis//nga yi khyim du myur du song la shing sgrog dang ni lcags sgrog phrugs su chug ste sgo ba byed du chug/sdug bsngal nyen nas ku co rnam pa mang po 'don cing lha yi khol
245b4(mdo sde): po yin par bdag gis bdag mthong byos//byang chub sems dpas smras pa/nam mkha' la ni ri ma rnam pa sna tshogs cha tsha risi ris phye ste so sor bri bar nus kyang srid//phyogs dang
245b5(mdo sde): phyogs mtshams 'gro ba'i shugs can rlung ni mi yis rab tu bsgrims te zhags pas bcing du nus kyang srid//nyi ma zla ba mun pa rab rib med byed mkha' las sa la ltung bar byed pa nus srid
245b6(mdo sde): kyi//khyod dang 'dra ba rab tu mang po bgrang las 'das pa dag gis shing drung nas ni dwa bskyod nus mi 'gyur//bdud dpung stobs dang ldan pa longs te he zhes zer//dung dang rdo dang rdza rnga
245b7(mdo sde): mchog gi sgra'i byin langs//bdud dpung shin tu 'jigs pa 'di dag mthong nas ni//kyi hud bu sdug khyod cis ma rung gyur ces zer//'dzam krung gser dang tsam pa'i snying po 'dra bar
246a1(mdo sde): ser//shin tu gzhon nu lha mis bstod cing mchod pa'i 'os//khyod deng g.yul ngo chen por rab tu brlag 'gyur te//dbang pos lha min lta bur bdud kyi dbang du 'gyur//tshangs
246a2(mdo sde): nga'i dbyangs dang ka la bing+ka'i sgra skad kyis//bde bar gshegs pas gnod sbyin srin tshogs de la smras//mi mkhas gang zhig nam mkha' skrag par byed 'dod pa//de ni shing mchog drung
246a3(mdo sde): nas nga 'dra slong bar 'dod//gang zhig stong gsum chen po bshig nas rdul 'grong dang //gang zhig ba spu yis ni rgya mtsho chu 'byin dang //skad cig gis ni rdo rje'i rang bzhin ri 'thor
246a4(mdo sde): ba//des kyang shing drung 'dug pa nga la 'tshe mi nus//bdud khros sems kyis gnya' shing gang gis bar tsam 'dug/shubs nas phyung ba'i ral gri non po lag na thogs//dge
246a5(mdo sde): spyong myur longs nga yis bsam pa bzhin du song //'od ma'i myu gu sngo ltar do mod bcad dA re//byang chub sems dpas smras pa/gal te stong gsum sa rnams 'di dag thams
246a6(mdo sde): tsid bdud kyis rab tu gang gyur la//kun gyi lagra na ri bo lhun pa mchog 'dra ba yi ral gri thogs gyur kyang //de dag nga yi ba spu bskyod par mi nus da la gnod byed smos ci dgos//
246a7(mdo sde): sun 'byin ma rings shig dang de'u re btags ti nga yis brtan por dran par bya//rnga mo ba lang glang tshon mgo dang 'jigs mig dang //myur gdug sbrul dang mig gdug mi bzad
246b1(mdo sde): 'dra ba dag/me 'bar kha dog rtse mor bcas pa'i ri 'phen cing //rtsa bar bcas pa'i shing dang zangs dang lcags rnams 'phen//sprin ltar langs te phyogs bzhi dag tu sgra sgrog cing //rdo rje'i
246b2(mdo sde): lce dang lcags kyi thu lum char pa 'bebs//ral gri mdung thung rno dang dag sta dug can 'bebs//sa ni brtol bar byed cing shing dag rab tu 'joms//kha cig lag pa brgya dag gis ni mda' ba rgya
246b3(mdo sde): 'phen//kha nas myur du gdug pa'i sbrul dang me yang 'thor//chu skyes chu srin la sogs pa dag mtsho nas le no//kha cig nam mkha' lding du bsgyur nas klu yang 'phen//kha cig khros nas
246b4(mdo sde): lcags kyi thu lum ri rab tsam//mo 'bar kha dog rtse mor bcas pa rnams kyang 'phen//sa la lhags nas sa ni rab tu 'khrugs par byed//'og gi chu yi phung po'i chu yang rnam par 'khrug/
246b5(mdo sde): kha cig de yi mdun dang de bzhin rgyab tu mchong //kye ma bu zhes g.yas dang de bzhin g.yon du mchong //rkang pa lag pa log par 'dug cing mgo 'bar la//glog ltar rab tu 'bar
246b6(mdo sde): bar mig nas mngon du 'byin//bdud kyi dpung ni bsgyur ba mi sdug byas mthong nas//sems can dag pa sgyu ma byas pa ji bzhin rtog/'di la bdud med stobs med 'gro med bdag
246b7(mdo sde): kyang med//chu zla'i tshul 'dra ba yi 'jig rten gsum po 'khor//mig dang skyes pa bud med med cing bdag gi ming//rna ba sna dang de bzhin lce dang de bzhin lus//chos 'di byed pa po
247a1(mdo sde): dang tshor ba po dang bral//brten nas skyes te nang yang stong zhing phyi yang stong //bden tshig gang gis 'dir chos shin tu stong zhe na//'dul mthun gnod sbyin nges pa
247a2(mdo sde): gang yin de dag gis//lag pa'i mtshon cha me tog phreng bar mthong gyur ces//rtag tu bden smras de yis bden pa'i tshig byas te//de yis lag mthil g.yon pa dra ba mchog spras pa//
247a3(mdo sde): sen mo zangs mdog rab mdzes rtsibs stong 'khor lo can//'jam krung gser 'bar dang 'dra bsod nams dges bsten pas//tshul du shis par mgo nas rkang pa'i bar du byugs//
247a4(mdo sde): mkha' las glog 'dra bar ni lag pa brkyang byas nas//tshig tu smras pas 'ding yi dbang yin te//ngas ni sngon chad mchod sbyin khrag khrig sna tshogs byas//slong la mi sbyin snyam ste/
247a5(mdo sde): don med gzhar ma byin//chu dang me dang rlung ni nga yi dbang yin te//tshangs pa skye dgu bdag dang skar bcas nyi zla dang //gang dag phyogs bcu dag na bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas dang //
247a6(mdo sde): bdag khrims brtul zhugs byang chub yan lag 'phags pa dbang //sbyin dngango tshul khrims de bzhin bzod pa nga yi dbang //brtson 'grus de bzhin bsam gtan de ltar shes
247a7(mdo sde): rab dang //tshad med bzhi dang de bzhin mngon shes nga yi dbang //rim gyis byang chub spyod pa thams cad nga yi dbang //phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten sems can mtha' dag ji snyed
247b1(mdo sde): pa//de dag rnams kyi bsod nams tshul khrims ye shes dang //gtan pa med pa'i mchod sbyin byas pa bsdoms kyang ni//de dgang yi ba spu'i bad+ma yi char mi phod//de yis tshul du shis par lag
247b2(mdo sde): pa sa la brdabs//khar ba'i snod ltar sa 'di sgra yang byung bar gyur//bdud kyi sgra thos nas ni sa la skyel gyur te//nag po'i rtsa lag rgyab cig zung zhig sgra yang thos//lus las rdul byung
247b3(mdo sde): gzi brjid nyams shing bzhin mdog gyur//rga bas bcom par bdud de nyid kyis mthong bar gyur//brang rdung cho nge 'don cing 'jigs nyan mgon yang med//bdud kyi yid 'khrul gyur
247b4(mdo sde): cing sems ni myos par gyur//glang po rta dang bzhon pa shing rta sa la lhung //srin po grul bum dag dang sha za dngangs shing rgyug/mgo rmongs lam mi rnyed cing gnas med skyabs kyang med//
247b5(mdo sde): rlung btAb na ga so mas bya ltar bltas nas song bar gyur//pha ma bu deng sring mo de bzhin phu nu dag/gang na mthong zhing gang du dong zhes 'dri bar byed//de yi rkyen gyis de dag phan tshun
247b6(mdo sde): 'thab cing rtsod//bdag ni sdug bsngal gyur te 'tsho ba'i skabs kyang med//bdud dpung rgya che mang ba mi 'khrugs snying po de//thams cad rnam por 'thor cing tha dgur gyes gyur te//zhag
247b7(mdo sde): bdun 'das kyi bar du phan tshun phrad ma gyur//mthong nas smras pa gal te gson na dga' zhes 'dzer//shing gi lha mos de tsha de la snying rje byas//chu yi bum pa thogs te nag po'i rtsa
248a1(mdo sde): 'ag gtor//rlur du longs la phyi shol ma byed skyon du song //bla ma'i tshig ma mnyan pas de ltar gyur pa yin//bdud kyis smras pa/bdag gi bu yi snyan tshig
248a2(mdo sde): dran pa ma mnyan te//sems can shin tu dag la nyes pa byos pos na//sdug bsngal 'jigs phongs mya ngan brlag dang brnyas pa dang //cir mi rung ba'i sgra dang dman nyid bdag
248a3(mdo sde): gis thob//lha mos smras pa//mi mkhas gang zhig nyes pa med la nyes byed pa//de ni nyes dang sdug bsngal ba dang phongs pa dang //cir mi rung zhes bya ba'i sgra dang dman nyid dang /
248a4(mdo sde): bsad dang bcing dang nyes pa du ma rnyed par 'gyur//lha dang lha min mkha' lding mi ci srin po'i dbang //tshangs pa brgya byin gzhan 'phrul 'og mi ni bcas pa dag/'di ltar khyod
248a5(mdo sde): kyis 'di 'dra'i bdud kyi dpung btsem pas//'jig rten dpa' bo rgyal zhes de yis rgyal ba brjod//rgyan phreng chun po zla ba gdugs dang rgyal mtshan ba dan 'bul//me tog
248a6(mdo sde): a ga ru dang rgya smos tsan+dan phye char 'bebs//sil spyan dag kyang rab tu dkrol ba byed cing tshig brjod pa//dpa' bo dag tshogs rgyal rnams khyod la dgab pa mdzad par 'gyur//
248a7(mdo sde): stan mchog 'dir ni byams pas g.yon can bdud kyi phyogs//rgya chen pham mdzad dpa' bo do mod byang chub brnyes//stobs bcu ma 'dres so so yang dag rig pa dang /
248b1(mdo sde): sangs rgyas yul rnams thams cad do mod brnyes par 'gyur//bdud gdul ched du 'dir ni g.yul ngor rab tu zhugs//rdzogs de'i byang chub sems dpa'i stobs rtsal sus mthong ba//bye ba
248b2(mdo sde): sum cu drug dang khrag khrig nyi shu bzhi//de dag sangs rgyas byang chub mchog tu yid kyis smon//bdud btul ba'i le'u zhes bya ba ste/nyi shu rtsa gcig pa'o////dge slong
248b3(mdo sde): dag de ltar byang chub sems dpa' bdud phyir rgol ba bcom po/dgra btul ba/g.yul ngor g.yul las rnam par rgyal ba/gdugs dang /rgyal mtshan dang /ba dan bsgreng bas 'dod
248b4(mdo sde): pa rnams ltos dben pa/sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos rnams las dben pa/rtog pa dang bcas pa/dpyod pa dang bcas pa/dben pa las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang bde ba can bsam gtan
248b5(mdo sde): dang po rdzogs par byas te gnas so//de rtog pa dang dpyod pa dang bral zhing nang yongs su dang sa/sems kyi rgyud gcig tu gyur pas rtog pa med pa/dpyod pa med pa/ting nge 'dzin
248b6(mdo sde): las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang bde ba can bsam gtan gnyis pa rdzogs par byas te gnas so//de dga' ba'i 'dod chags dang bral bas btang snyoms la gnaso shing /dran pa dang shes
248b7(mdo sde): bzhin can yin te/bde ba lus kyis myong la/'phags pa rnams kyis gang de dran pa dang ldan pa bde ba la gnas pa btang snyoms pa'o zhes brjod pa ste/dga' ba med pa bsam
249a1(mdo sde): gtan gsum pa rtags par byas te gnas so//de bde ba'ang spangs te/snga nas sdug bsngal yang spangs shing yid bde ba dang yang mi bde ba'ang nub pas bde ba'ang
249a2(mdo sde): ma yin/sdug bsngal ba'ang ma yin pa btang snyoms dang dran pas yongs su dag pa bsam gtan bzhi pa rdzogs par byas te gnas so//de nas byang chub sems dpa' de lta bur
249a3(mdo sde): snyoms par zhugs pa'i sems yongs su dag pa/yongs su byung ba/'od gsal ba/nyon mongs pa med pa/nye ba'i nyon mongs pa dang bral ba mnyen pa/las su rung bar gnas
249a4(mdo sde): pa/mi g.yo bar gyur pas nam gyi cha stong la lha'i mig les ye shes mthong ba'i rig pa mngon du bya ba'i phyir sems mngon par sgrub cing mngon par gtod do//de nas byang chub
249a5(mdo sde): sems dpa' lha'i mig yongs su dag pa mi'i las shin tu 'das pas sems can shi 'pho ba dang /ske bo dang /kha dog bzang po dang /kha dog ngan pa dang /bzang po dang /ngan
249a6(mdo sde): pa rnams mthong ngo //las ji lta ba bzhin du 'gro ba'i sems can rnams kyang rab tu shes te/kye mo sems can 'di dag ni lus kyis nyes par spyad pa dang ldan pa/ngag dang
249a7(mdo sde): yid kyis nyes par spyad pa dang ldan pa/'phags pa rnams la skur pa 'debs pa/log par lta ba dag ste/de dag log par lta ba'i las yang dag par blangs pa'i rgyus lus
249b1(mdo sde): zhig ste shi ba'i 'og tu ngan song ngan 'gro log par ltung ba sems can dmyal ba rnams su skye bar 'gyur ba dag go/sems can 'di dag ni lus kyis legs par spyad pa dang ldan pa/ngag
249b2(mdo sde): dang yid kyis legs par spyad pa dang ldan pa/'phags pa rnams la sbyor ba mi 'debs po/yang dag par lta ba dag ste/de dag yang dag par lta ba'i las yang dag par blangs pa'i rgyus
249b3(mdo sde): lus zhig nas bde 'gro mtho ris kyi 'jig rten du lha'i nang du skye bar 'gyur ba dag go zhes bya bar rab tu shes so//de ltar lha'i mig rnam par dag pa mi'i las shin tu 'das pas sems
249b4(mdo sde): can 'chi 'pho ba dang /skye ba dang /kha dog bzang po dang /kha dog ngan pa dang /bde 'gror song ba dang /ngan 'gror song ba dang /ngan pa dang /bzang po dag dang /las ji lta ba
249b5(mdo sde): bzhin du 'gro ba rnams mthong ngo //dge slong dag de ltar byang chub sems dpa' nam gyi cha stod la rig pa mngon sum du byed do//mun pa sel to//snang ba bskyed do//de nas byang
249b6(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' de lta bur snyoms par zhugs pa'i sems yongs su dag pa/yongs su byang ba/'od gasngal ba/nyon mongs pa med pa/nye ba'i nyon mongs pa dang bral ba/
249b7(mdo sde): mnyan pa/las su rung bar gnas pa/mi g.yo bar gyur pas nam gyi gung thun la sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran pa'i ye shes mthong ba'i rig pa mngon du bya ba'i phyir sems mngon par
250a1(mdo sde): sgrub cing mngon par gtod do//de bdag dang sems can gzhan dag gi sngon gyi gnas rnam pa du ma rjes su dran te/'di lta ste/skye ba gcig dang /gnyis dang /gsum
250a2(mdo sde): dang /bzhi dang /lnga dang /bcu dang /nyi shu dang /sum cu dang /bzhi bcu dang /skye ba lnga bcu dang /skye ba brgya dang /skye ba stong dang /skye ba brgya stong dang /skye ba brgya stong phrag
250a3(mdo sde): dumA dang /skye ba bya ba dang /skyeb bye ba phrag brgya dang /skye ba bye ba phrag stong dang /skyeb byi ba brgya stong dang /skye ba bye ba khrog khrig brgya stong dang /sgrub bye ba brgya phrag du ma dang /skye
250a4(mdo sde): ba bye ba stong phrag du ma dang /skyob bye ba brgya stong phrag du ma dong /skye ba bye ba khrag khri go brgya stong phrag du ma nas/'jig pa'i bskal pa dang /'chagaso pa'i bskal pa dang /'jig
250a5(mdo sde): padod 'chags pa'i bskal po dang /'dzeg pa dang 'chags pa'i bskol pa du ma dag kyang rnaMs su dran no//bdag che ge mo zhes bya ba zhig tu gyur te/ming 'dri zhes bya bar gyur to//
250a6(mdo sde): rus ni 'di zhes bya'o//rigs ni 'di zhes bya'o//kha dog ni 'di lta bu'o//kha zas nI 'odi lta bu zhig za za'o//tshe'i tshad ni 'di tsam zhig thub bo//yun ni 'di srod gcig
250a7(mdo sde): gnas gnas so//bde ba dang sdug bsngal ni 'di lta bu zhig myong ngo //bdag de nas shi 'phos nas che ge mo zhes bya ba zhig tu skyes so//de nas shi 'phos nas kyang che ge mo nas
250b1(mdo sde): bya ba zhig tu skyes so//de nas shi 'phos nas 'dir skyes so zhes rnam pa dang bcas/yul phyogs dang bcas par bdag dang sems can thams cad kyi sngon gyi gnas rnam pa du ma rjes su
250b2(mdo sde): drin no//de nas byang chub sems dpa' de lta bur snyoms par zhugs pa'i sems yongs su dag pa/yongs su byang ba/'od gsal ba/nyon mongs pa med pa/nye ba'i nyon mongs pa dang
250b3(mdo sde): bral ba/mnyen pa/lus su rung bar gnas pa/mi g.yo bar gyur pas nam gyi cha smad skya reng 'char ba'i dus kyi tshe rnga brdung ba'i nam chod tsam na sdug bsngal dang /kun 'byung ba nub
250b4(mdo sde): par bya ba dang /zag pa zad pa shes pa mthong ba'i rig pa mngon du bya ba'i phyir sems mngon par sgrub cing mngon par gtod de/de 'di snyam du sems te/kye ma 'jig rten 'di ni 'ad
250b5(mdo sde): lta ste/skye ba dang /rga ba dang /na ba dang /'chi ba dang /'chi 'pho ba dang /skye bas sdug bsngal bar gyur pa yin na/'on kyang rga ba dang /na ba dang /'chi ba la sogs pa'i sdug bsngal gyi phung
250b6(mdo sde): po chen po 'bra' zhig 'di las 'byung bar bya ba mi shes te/e ma'o rga ba dang /no ba dang /'chi ba la sogs pa sdug bsngal gyi phung po chen po 'bra' zhig 'di thams cad zad par bya/
250b7(mdo sde): bar shes na ci ma rang snyam nas/de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du sems te/gang yod pas rga ba dang 'chi ba byung /rga ba dang 'chi ba'i rkyen ni gang yin snyam nas/des 'od
251a1(mdo sde): snyam du bsams te/skye ba yod pas rga shi byung ste/rga shi'i rkyen ni skye ba yin no snyam mo//de nas yang byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du sems te/gang yod
251a2(mdo sde): pas skye ba byung /skye ba'i rkyen ni gang yino snyam nas/des 'di snyam du bsams te/srid pa yod pas skye ba byung ste/skye ba'i rkyen ni srid pa yin no snyam mo//de nas yang byang chub sems
251a3(mdo sde): dpa' 'di snyam du soms te/gang yod pas srid pa byung /srid pa'i rkyen ni gang yin snyam nas/des 'di snyam du bsams te/len pa yod pas srid pa byung ste/srid po'i rkyen ni len
251a4(mdo sde): pa yin no snyam mo//de nas yang byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du sems te/gang yod pas len pa byung /len pa'i rkyen ni gang yin snyam nas/des 'di snyam du bsams te/sred
251a5(mdo sde): pa yod pas len pa byung ste/len pa'i rkyen ni sred pa yin no snyam mo//de nas yang byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du sems te/gang yod pas sred pa byung /sred pa'i rkyen ni
251a6(mdo sde): gang yin snyam nas/des 'di snyam du bsams te/tshor ba yod pas sred pa byung ste/sred pa'i rkyen ni tshor ba yin no snyam mo//de nas yang byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du sems
251a7(mdo sde): te/gang yod pas tshor ba byung /tshor ba'i rkyen ni gang yin snyam nas/des 'di snyam du bsams te/reg pa yod pas tshor ba byung ste/tshor ba'i rkyen ni reg pa yin no snyam mo//de nas
251b1(mdo sde): yang byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du sems te/gang yod pas reg pa byung /reg pa'i rkyen ni gang yin snyam nas/des 'di snyam du bsams te/skye mched drug yod pas reg pa byung
251b2(mdo sde): ste/reg pa'i rkyen ni skye mched drug yin no snyam mo//de nas yang byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du sems te/glang yod pas skye mched drug byung /skye mched drug gi rkyen ni gang yin snyam
251b3(mdo sde): nunas/des 'od snyam du sems te/ming dang gzugs yod pas skye mched drug byung ste/skye mched drug gi rkyen ni ming dang gzugs yin no snyam mo//de nas yang byang chub sems dpa
251b4(mdo sde): 'di snyam du sems te/gang yod pas ming dang gzugs byung /ming dang gzugs kyi rkyen ni gang yin snyam nas/des 'odi snyam du bsams te/rnam par shes pa yod pas ming dang
251b5(mdo sde): gzugs byung ste/ming dang gzugs kyi rkyen ni rnam par shes pa yin no snyam mo//de nas yang byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du sems te/ga yod pas rnam par shes pa byung /
251b6(mdo sde): rnam par shes pa'i rkyen ni gang yin snyam nas/des 'di snyam du bsams te/'du byed yod pas rnam par shes pa byung ste/rnam par shes pa'i rkyen ni 'du byed yin no snyam mo///
251b7(mdo sde): de nas yang byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du sems te/gang yod pas 'du byed byung /'du byed kyi rkyen ni gang yin snyam nas/des 'di snyam du bsams te/ma rig pa yod
252a1(mdo sde): pas 'du byed byung ste/'du byed kyi rkyen ni ma rig pa yin no snyam mo//de ltar byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du sems te/ma rig pa'i rkyen gyi 'du byed rnams/'du
252a2(mdo sde): byed kyi rkyen gyis rnam par shes pa/rnam par shes pa'i rkyen gyis ming dang gzugs/ming dang gzugs kyi rkyen gyis skye mched drug/skye mched drug gi rkyen gyis rig pa/reg pa'i
252a3(mdo sde): rkyen gyis tshor ba/tshor ba'i rkyen gyis sred pa/sred pa'i rkyen gyis len pa/len pa'i rkyen gyis srid pa/srid pa'i rkyen gyis skye ba/skye ba'i rkyen gyis rga shi drang mya ngan dang /skye
252a4(mdo sde): sngags 'don pa dang /sdug bsngal ba dang /yid mi bde ba dang /'khrug pa rnams 'byung bar 'gyur te/de ltar sdug bsngal gyi phung po chen po 'ba' zhig 'di 'byung bar 'gyur ro/
252a5(mdo sde): snyam mo//dge slong dag sngon ma thos pa'i chos rnams la kun 'byung kun 'byung zhes tshul bzhin yid la byed cing mang du byed pas byang chub sems dpa'i ye shes skyes/mig skyes/
252a6(mdo sde): rig pa skyes/mang po shes pa skyes/yid gzhungs pa skyes/shes rab skyes so//snang ba byung ngo //de nas yang byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du sems te/gong med pas rko
252a7(mdo sde): shi med por 'gyur/gang 'gogs pas rga shi 'gag snyom nas/des 'di snyam du bsams te/skye ba med na rga shi med par 'gyur te/skye ba 'gags pas rga shi 'gag go snyam
252b1(mdo sde): mo//de nas yang byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du sems te/gang med pas skye ba med par 'gyur/gang 'gags pas skye ba 'gag snyam nas/des 'di snyam du bsams te/srid pa med
252b2(mdo sde): na skye ba med par 'gyur te/srid pa 'gags pas skye ba 'gag go snyam mo//de nas yang byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du sems te/gang med pas zhes bya ba nas rgyas par sbyar te/'du
252b3(mdo sde): byed med par 'gyur/gang 'gags pas 'du byed 'gag snyam pa'i bar du'o//des 'di snyam du bsams te/ma rig pa med pas 'du byed med par 'gyur te/ma rig pa 'gags pas
252b4(mdo sde): 'du byed 'gag go/'du byed 'gags pas rnam par shes pa 'gag go zhes bya ba nas/skye ba 'gags pas rga shi dang /mya ngan dang /smre sngags 'don pa dang /sdug bsngal ba dang /
252b5(mdo sde): yid mi bde ba dang /'khrug pa rnams 'gag par 'gyur te/de ltar sdug bsngal gyi phung po chen po 'ba' zhig 'di 'gag par 'gyur ro snyam pa'i bar du'o//dge slong dag de ltar sngon ma
252b6(mdo sde): thos pa'i chos rnams la tshul bzhin yid la byed cing mang du byed pas byang chub sems dpa'i ye shes skyes/mig skyes/rig pa skyes/mang po shes pa skyes/yid gzhungs pa skyes
252b7(mdo sde): shes rab skyes so//snang ba byung ngo //dge slong dag ngas de'i tshe 'di ni thog pa sdug bsngal lo zhes yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du shes so//'di ni zag pa'i kun 'byung ba'o//'di ni thog
253a1(mdo sde): pa 'gog pa'o//'di ni zag pa 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam mo zhes yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du shes so//'di ni 'dod pa'i zag pa'o//'di ni skyid pa'i zag pa'o//'di
253a2(mdo sde): ni ma rig pa'i zag pa'o//'di ni lta ba'i zag pa'o//'dir zag pa ma lus par 'gag go/'dir zag pa ma lus par mi snang bar 'gyur zhing nub par 'gyur ro//'di ni ma rig pa'o//
253a3(mdo sde): 'di ni ma rig pa'i kun 'byung ba'o//'di ni ma rig pa 'gog pa'o//'di ni ma rig pa 'grog par 'gro ba'i lam mo zhes yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du shes so//'dir ma rig pa ma lus
253a4(mdo sde): par mi snang bar 'gyur te nub par 'gyur ro zhes bya bar de bzhin du sbyar ro//'di dag ni 'du byed rnams so//'di ni 'du byed kyi kun 'byung ba'o//'di ni 'du byed 'gog pa'o//
253a5(mdo sde): 'di ni 'du byed 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam mo zhes yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du shes so//'di ni rnam par shes pa'o//'di ni rnam par shes pa'i kun 'byung ba'o//'di ni rnam
253a6(mdo sde): pAr shes pa 'gog pa'o//'di ni rnam par shes pa 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam mo zhes yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du shes so//'di ni ming dang gzugs so//'di ni ming dang gzugs
253a7(mdo sde): kyi kun 'byung ba'o//'di ni ming dang gzugs 'gog pa'o//'di ni ming dang gzugs 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam mo zhes yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du shes so//'di ni skye mched
253b1(mdo sde): drug go//'di ni skye mched drug gi kun 'byung ba'o//'di ni skye mched drug 'gog pa'o//'di ni skye mched drug 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam mo zhes yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du shes so//'di ni
253b2(mdo sde): reg pa'o//'di ni reg pa'i kun 'byung ba'o//'di ni reg pa 'gog pa'o//'di ni reg pa 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam mo zhes yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du shes so//'di ni tshor ba'o//'di ni
253b3(mdo sde): tshor ba'i kun 'byung ba'o//'di ni tshor ba'i 'gog pa'o//'di ni tshor ba 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam mo//'di ni sred pa'o//'di ni sred pa'i kun 'byung ba'o//'di ni sred pa 'gog pa'o//'di
253b4(mdo sde): ni sreng ba 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam mo//'di ni len pa'o//'di ni len pa'i kun 'byung ba'o//'di ni len pa 'gog pa'o//'di ni len pa 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam mo//'di ni srid pa'o//
253b5(mdo sde): 'di ni srid pa'i kun 'byung ba'o//'di ni srid pa 'gog pa'o//'di ni srid pa 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam mo//'di ni skye ba'o//'di ni skye ba'i kun 'byung ba'o//'di ni skye ba 'gog pa'o//
253b6(mdo sde): 'di ni skye ba 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam mo//'di ni rga ba'o//'di ni rga ba'i kun 'byung ba'o//'di ni rga ba 'gog pa'o//'di ni rga ba 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam mo//'di ni 'chi ba'o//'di
253b7(mdo sde): ni 'chi bo'i kun 'byung ba'o//'di ni 'chi ba 'gog pa'o//'di ni 'chi ba 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam mo zhes yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du shes so//'di dag ni mya ngan dang /smre sngags
254a1(mdo sde): 'don pa dang /sdug bsngal ba dang /yid mi bde ba dang /'khrug pa rnams te/de ltar sdug bsngal gyi phung po chen po 'ba' zhig 'di 'byung bar 'gyur ba nas/'gog
254a2(mdo sde): par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i bar du yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du shes so//'di ni sdug bsngal lo//'di ni sdug bsngal gyi kun 'byung ba'o//'di ni sdug bsngal 'gog pa'o//'di ni sdug
254a3(mdo sde): bsngal 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam mo zhes yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du shes so//dge slong dag de ltar byang chub sems dpas nam gyi cha smad skya reng 'char ba'i dus kyi tshe rnga brdung ba'i nim
254a4(mdo sde): chod tsam na skyes bu dang /skyes bu dam pa dang /skyes bu mchog dang /skyes bu chen po dang /skyes bu khyo mchog dang /skyes bu glang po dang /skyes bu seng ge dang /skyes bu skyes mchog
254a5(mdo sde): dang /skyes bu dpa' bo dang /skyes bu rtul phod dang /skyes bu cang shes dong /skyes bu pad+ma dang /skyes bu pad+ma dkar po dang /skyes bu ljing khyor ba dang /skyes bu kha lo sgyur ba bla na med
254a6(mdo sde): pas 'phags pa'i ye shes kyis shes par bya ba dang /khong du chud par bya ba dang /thob par bya ba dang /blta bar bya ba dang /mngon du bya ba gang ci 'ong rung ste/de thams cad
254a7(mdo sde): sems kyi skad cig gcig dang ldan pa'i shes rab kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas rig pa gsum thob bo//dge slong dag de nas
254b1(mdo sde): lha'i bu rnams kyis smras pa/grogs po dag bcom ldan 'das mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyis me tog gtor cig ces byas so//de na lha'i bu gang dag sngon gyi sangs rgyas mthong ba
254b2(mdo sde): de dag 'dus nas de dag gis de dag la smras pa/grogs po dag sngon gyi yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyang brda' mdzad cing brda' mngon par sprul pa mdzad kyis/bcom ldan 'das
254b3(mdo sde): kyis brda' ma mdzad kyi bar du me tog ma gtor cig/dge slong dag de nas de bzhin gshegs pas lha'i bu de dag yid gnyis su gyur par mkhyen nas/shing ta la bdun tsam du nam mkha'
254b4(mdo sde): la mngon par 'phags te/der bzhugs nas lam gyi rgyun ni chad do//rdul ni nye bar zhi'o//zag pa ni skams te yang mi zag go/lam ni chad de yang mi 'jug go//'di ni sdug bsngal
254b5(mdo sde): gyi mtha' zhes bya'o zhes ched du brjod pa ched du brjod do//de nas lha'i bu de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa la lha'i me tog gis gtor te/de nas lha'i me tog pus mo nub tsam du bkram
254b6(mdo sde): par gyur to//dge slong dag de ltar de bzhin gshegs pas mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/mun pa mun nag dang ni bral/sred pa ni rnam par sbyangs/lta ba ni bzlog/nyon
254b7(mdo sde): mongs pa rnams ni rnam par dkrugs/zug rngu ni phyung /mdud pa ni bkrol/nga rgyal gyi rgyal mtshan ni bsnyal/chos kyi rgyal mtshan ni bsgreng /bag la nyal rnams ni bton/chos kyi
255a1(mdo sde): de bzhin nyid ni mkhyen/yang dag pa'i mtha' ni thugs su chud/chos kyi dbyings ni yongs su mkhyen/sems can gyi khams ni rnam par bkod/yang dag
255a2(mdo sde): pa nyid du nges pa'i phung po ni bsngags/log pa nyid du nges pa'i phung po ni smad/ma nges pa'i phung po ni yongs su bzung /sems can gyi dbang po rnams la ni rnam par gzigs//
255a3(mdo sde): sems can gyi spyod pa ni yongs su mkhyen/sems can gyi nad gso ba ni thugs su chud/bdud rtsi'i sman sbyar ba ni grub/sman pa'i rgyal por ni byung /sdug bsngal thams
255a4(mdo sde): cad las rab tu thar bar mdzad pa por ni gyur/mya ngan las 'das pa'i bde ba la 'jog pa por ni gyur/de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po/de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi rgyal
255a5(mdo sde): po'i khri chen po la ni bzhugs/rnam par grol ba'i thabs ni brnyes/thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi grong khyer du ni zhugs/sangs rgyas thams cad dang yang dag par ni 'dres//
255a6(mdo sde): chos kyi dbyings thugs su chud pa las dbyer med par ni gyur to//dge slong dag de bzhin gshegs pa nges 'dir thog ma med pa'i skye ba dang /rga ba dang /'chi ba'i sdug bsngal
255a7(mdo sde): mthar phyung ngo zhes zhag bdun pa dang po lo byang chub kyi snying po de nyid na bzhugs so////'phags pa rgya cher rol pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i medo//bam po
255b1(mdo sde): bco lnga pa//dge slong dag byang chub sems dpas thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob ma thag tu de nas skad cig de nyid la phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi sems can
255b2(mdo sde): thams cad skad cig de dang /thang cig de dang /yud tsam de la mchog tu bde ba dang ldan par gyur to//'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyang snang ba chen pos snang bar byas
255b3(mdo sde): nas/'jig rten gyi bar sdig pa sdig pas khyab pa mun nag ces bya ba snga ma bzhin no//phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad rnam pa drug tu g.yos/rab tu
255b4(mdo sde): g.yos/kun tu rab tu ge yos so//ldeg/rab tu ldeg/kun tu rab tu ldeg go/'grol/rab tu 'gul/kun tu rab tu 'gul to//'khrugs/rab tu 'khrugs/
255b5(mdo sde): kun tu rab tu 'khrugs so//chem chem/rab tu che me tsham/kun tu rab tu chem chem mo//'ur 'ur/rab tu 'u ra 'ur/kun tu rab tu 'ur 'ur ro//sangs rgyas thams
255b6(mdo sde): cad kyis kyang de bzhin gshegs pa mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/chos kyi dgrab pa dag kyang bskur ro//chos kyi dgab pa de dag gis
255b7(mdo sde): stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir rin po che'i gdugs gcig gis khebs par gyur te/rin po che'i gdugs de las kyang rnam pa de lta bu'i 'od zer gyi dra ba
256a1(mdo sde): byung ste/de dag gis phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med dpag tu med pa dag snang bar byas nas phyogs bcu'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang /
256a2(mdo sde): burnams kyang kun dga' ba'i sgra brjod par gyur te/sems can mkhas pa'i pad+ma ye shes kyi mtsho las byung gi/'jig rten gyi chos rnams kyis ma gos pa byung ngo //thugs rje
256a3(mdo sde): chen po'i sprin yang dag par 'phags te/chos kyi dbyings kyi gnas khyab par mdzad nas/'dul ba'i skye bo'i sman gyi chos kyi char/dge ba'i rtsa ba'i sa bon thams cad kyi myu gu skyeng
256a4(mdo sde): pa/dad pa'i myu gu rnams rnam par 'phel bar byed pa/rnam par grol ba'i 'bras bu rnams 'byin paro byed pa'i char 'bebs par 'gyur ro zhes 'dzer to//de la 'di skad ces bya
256a5(mdo sde): ste/skyes bu seng gi de yis dpung bcas bdud btul te//ston pas bsam gtan bde ba mngon du mdzod nas ni//gang tshe stobs bcus rig pa gsum po brnyes gyur tshe//
256a6(mdo sde): phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas zhing mang bye ba g.yos par gyur//chos 'dod byang chub sems dpa' gang dag yongs lhags pa//zhabs la gtugs te 'di skad tshig smras ma mnyal
256a7(mdo sde): dom//bdag cag mngon sum ci 'dro shin tu 'jigs dpung de//sheso rab bsod nams stobs dang brtson 'grus stobs kyis bcom//khrag khrig zhing nas sangs rgyas
256b1(mdo sde): rnams kyis gdugs rnams skur//nges pa skyes bu chen po bdud kyi snga rnams btul//khyod kyis gnas mchog 'chi med mya ngan med pa brnyes//srid pa gsum du dam chos
256b2(mdo sde): cher pa myur du phob//phyogs bcu'i sems can snying po rnams kyis phyag brkyang ste//ko la baing+ka'i sgra yi gsung du brjod pa ni//bdag cag ji ltar byang chub thob ltar khyod sangs
256b3(mdo sde): rgyas//dper na mar dang mor gyi nying khu mtshungs 'dra bzhin//dge slong dag de nos 'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha'i bu mo dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa byang chub kyi snying po la bzhugs pa
256b4(mdo sde): mngon par shes pa brnyas pa dang /brnag pa yongs su rdzogs pa dang /g.yul las rnam par rgyal ba dang /bdud phyir rgol ba pham par mdzad pa dang /gdugs dang /rgyal
256b5(mdo sde): mtshan dang /ba dan bsgreng ba dang /dpa' ba dang /rgyal ba 'phags pa dang /skyes bu dang /skyes bu chen po dang /smon pa'i mchog dang /zug rngu 'byin pa chen po dang /song
256b6(mdo sde): ge ltar me bsnyengs shing spu zing zhes byed pa mi mnga' ba dang /glang po ltar thugs shin tu dul ba dang /dri mu gsum spangs pas dri ma mi mnga' ba dang /rig pa gsum brnyes
256b7(mdo sde): pas mkhyen pa po dang /chu bo bzhi las brgal bas pha rol tu byon pa dang /rin po che'i gdugs gcig 'dzin pas rgyal rigs su gyur pa dang /sdig pa'i chos spangs
257a1(mdo sde): pas 'jig rten gsum gyi bram zer gyur pa dang /ma rig pa'i sgo nga'i sbungs bcom pas dge slong du gyur pa dang /chags pa thams cad las yang dag par 'das
257a2(mdo sde): pas dge sbyong du gyur pa dang /nyon mongs pa bsal bas gtsang sbra can du gyur pa dang /rgyal mtshan ma bsnyal byas dpa' ba dang /stobs bcu mnga' ba'i shin tu stobs dang ldan pa
257a3(mdo sde): dang /rin po che'i 'byung gnas ltar chos rin po che thams cad yongs su rdzogs par rig nas byang chub kyi snying po logs su phyogs te tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par
257a4(mdo sde): bstod do//'di ni shing gi rgyal drung du//bdud sde mngon du pham mdzad nas//ri rab lta bur mi g.yo bzhugs//bsnyengs pa mi mnga' 'bros mi mdzad//'dis ni bskal pa bye
257a5(mdo sde): mang du//sbyin dang dul dang sdom pa yis//byang chub dam pa yang dag bsgrubs//des na 'di ni do mod mdzes//byang chub dam pa 'tshol ba na//'di yis bskal pa bye mong
257a6(mdo sde): du//tshul khrims brtul bzhugs dka' thub kyis//brgya byin tshangs pa zil du brlag/'di yis bskal pa bye mang du//bzod pa'i stobs kyi go mnubs te//sdug bsngal rnams
257a7(mdo sde): ni dang du blangs//des ni gser mdog 'od dang ldan//'di yis bskal pa bye mang du//brtson 'grus stobs dang rtsal gyis ni//gzhan dag phyir bsnyil mdzad mdzad de/
257b1(mdo sde): des na bdud kyi sde las rgyal//'di yis bskal pa bye mang du//bsam gtan mngon shes ye shes kyis//thub pa'i dbang po yang dag mchod//des na do mod 'di la mchod//'dri
257b2(mdo sde): yis bskal pa bye mang du//shes rab dang ni gson pa bsags//sems can bye ba phan yang btags//des nu byang chub myur du brnyes//'di ni phung po'i bdud las rgyal//'chi
257b3(mdo sde): bdag nyon mongs bdud las rgyal//'di ni lha yi bdud las rgyal//des 'di mya ngan mi 'da'o//'di ni shin tu lha yi lha//lha rnams kyis kyang mchod pa'i tshe//'jig rten gsum
257b4(mdo sde): na mchod pa'i 'os//bsod nams don du gnyer ba'i zhing //'chi med 'bras bu sbyin mdzad pa//'di ni sbyin gnas dam pa ste//'di la sbyin pa btang na de//byang chub dam pa
257b5(mdo sde): thob bar du//bar ma dor ni chud mi za//'di yis mdzod spu mdzes pa yis//zhing mang bye ba gsal bar bgyid//nyi zla dag kyang zil du brlag/sems can rnams la snang
257b6(mdo sde): bar gyur//'di yis gzugs ni gzugs mdzes te//gzugs kyi dam pa legs pa'o gzugs//mtshan mchog mnga' zhing phan pa bzhed//'jig rten gsum na
257b7(mdo sde): mchod pa'i 'os//'di spyan shin tu rnam dag ste//zhing rnams dang ni sems can tshogs//sems dang ldan dang sems med pa//mang po dag la rang byung gzigs//'di
258a1(mdo sde): snyan shin tu rnam dag ste//lha yi dag dang mi yi dang //rgyal ba rnams kyi chos smra dang //mtha' yas pa yi sgra rnams gsan//'di yi ljags ni yangs pa ste//ka la
258a2(mdo sde): pid+ma 'jam pa'i dbyangs//'chi med rab tu zhir 'gro ba'i//chos ni 'di las bdag cag mnyan//bdud kyi sde rnams gzigs gyur kyang //de yi thugs ni 'khrugs mi mnga'//lha
258a3(mdo sde): yi tshogs rnams gzigs gyur kyang //shin tu thugs gzhungs dgyes mi mnga'//'di yis mtshon dang mda' rnams kyis//bdud kyi sde las rgyal ma lags//bden pa brtul
258a4(mdo sde): zhugs dka' thub kyis//sdang ba'i gyad las 'di rgyal lo//gdan las ma bskyod bzhin du ni//de yi sku la gnod ma byung //dri yaM skabs su byams mi mnga'//zhe sdang gyur
258a5(mdo sde): pa'ang ma lags so//gang dag khyod las chos thos nas//sgrub pa bgyid par 'tshal ba yi//lha dang mi rnams de dag ni//rnyed pa legs par rnyed pa lags//rgyal ba bsod
258a6(mdo sde): nams gzi mnga' ba//khyod la bstod pa'i bsod nams kyis//mi yi zla ba khyod 'dra bar//kun kyang myur du 'gyur bar shog/skyes bu khyu mchog 'dren pas byang chub sangs rgyas
258a7(mdo sde): nas/khrag khrig zhing rnams bskyod cing bdud kyang pha ma mdzad de//tshangs pa'i dbyangs dang ka la ping+ka'i sgra skad kyis//'dren pos thog mar tshigs su btsod pa 'di gsungs
258b1(mdo sde): so//bsod nams rnam smin bde ste sdug bsngal thams cad sel//bsod nams ldan pa'i mi yi bsam pa rnams kyang 'grub//bdud bcom nas ni byang chub myur du reg par 'gyur//mya ngan
258b2(mdo sde): 'das pa zhi ba bsil ba'i dngos po thob//de bas bsod nams bya bas chog par su zhig 'dzin//bdud rtsi chos mnyan pas kyang chog par su zhig 'dzin//skye bo med pa'i nags gnas chog
258b3(mdo sde): pAr su zhig 'dzin//sems can don bya bas kyang chog par su zhig 'dzin//byang chub sems dpas lag pa brkyang ste tshig brjod pa//mchod pa byas kyis rang rang dag gi zhing du dang //kun
258b4(mdo sde): gyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhabs la phyag 'tshal nas//sna tshogs bkod pas rang rang dag gi zhing du dong //dpung rnams phan tshun chen po byung ba de gzigs nas//bde bar
258b5(mdo sde): gshegs pa tshul du shis par rnam por rol//dpung bcas bdud las rgyal te bdud rtsi reg shog ces//sems can rnams kyis mtshungs med sems kyis byang chub smon//
258b6(mdo sde): dge slong dag de bzhin gshegs pa byang chub kyi shing drug na seng ge'i gdon la bzhugs te mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/skad cig de la sangs rgyas kyi rnam par rol
258b7(mdo sde): pa dpag tu med pa mdzad de/de dag ni bskal par yang bstan par sla ba ma yin no//de la 'di skad ces bya ste/sa ni lag mthil lta bur mnyam par gnas par gyur//'dab
259a1(mdo sde): ma brgya pa rgyas pa 'od dang ldan pa drung //lha rnams brgya stong byang chub snying por rab tu 'dud//seng ge sgra yi mtshan ma dang po 'di 'dir mthong //stong gsum shing
259a2(mdo sde): brgya dag dang ri rnams du ma dang //ri yi rgyal po lhun po byang chub snying por 'dud//stobs bcu'i gan du song ste brgya byin tshangs pa 'dud//'di yang mi yi seng ge byang chub snying
259a3(mdo sde): bor rol//sku las 'od zer brgya stong dag ni rab baikye ste//rgyal ba'i zhing mchog khyab nas ngan song gsum po zho//de nas skad cig yud tsam mi khom skams par gyur/
259a4(mdo sde): sems can gang la'ang thA ba rgyags snang gnod pa med//'di yang mi yi seng ge gdan la bzhugs pa'i rol//nyi zla nor bu mi dang glog deng lha yi 'od//'od dang ldan pa'i rlabs
259a5(mdo sde): kyis zil mnan lam ma min//'gro nga gang gis kyang ni ston pa'i gtsug mi mthong //'dri yang mi yi seng ge gdun la bzhugs pa'i rol//phyag gi mthil gyis reg nas sa
259a6(mdo sde): yang rnam drug g.yos//de yi bdud kyi sde rnams shing bral bzhin du dkrugs//bdud ni mda' thogs sa la ri mo gang 'dri ba//'di yang mi yi seng ge gradan la rol pa lags//
259a7(mdo sde): mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa'i le'u zhes bya ba ste nyi shu rtsa gnyis pa'o///de nas gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha'i bu rnams kyis byang chub kyi snying po
259b1(mdo sde): la bzhugs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa la bskor ba byas te/lha'i tsan+dan gyi phye ma'i char mngon par phab nas/tshul dang mthun pa'i tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis bstod do//'jig
259b2(mdo sde): rten gsal bar mdzad pa byung //'jig rten mgon po 'od mdzad pa//'jig rten ldongs par gyur pa la//nyon mongs spangs pa mig sbyin pa//khyod ni g.yul las rnam par rgyal//
259b3(mdo sde): bsod nams dag gis dgongs pa rdzogs//dkar po'i chos rnams kun tu rdzogs//khyod ni 'gro ba tshim mdzad 'gyur//sdig pa mi mnga' 'dram las rgal//gau ta ma ni thung la bzhugs/
259b4(mdo sde): sems can gzhan dag klung chen gyis//khyer ba rnams kyang sgrol bar 'gyur//shes rab chen po khyod 'phags te//'jig rten dag nA bla ma mchis//'jig rten chos kyis khyod migs//
259b5(mdo sde): chab na mchis pa'i pad+ma bzhin//'jig rten ring nas gnyid log 'di//mun pa'i phung pos gtings pa la//khyod ni shes rab sgron ma yis//rab tu sad par mdzad pa sbyong //'tsho ba'i
259b6(mdo sde): 'jig rten ring nas ni//nyon mongs nad kyis gzir ba la//nad rnams kun las thar mdzad pa//sman pa'i rgyal po yang dag byung //'jig rten mgon po khyod byung bas//mi khom rnams
259b7(mdo sde): ni stong par 'gyur//lha rnams dang ni mi dag kyang //bdeng rnams dang ldan par 'gyur//skyes bu khyu mchog nges pa khyod//lta bar gang dag 'dod bgyid pa//de dag bskal pa
260a1(mdo sde): stong rnams su//nam yang ngan 'gror mchi mi 'gyur//gang dag chos nyan 'gyur ba rnams//de dag mkhas shing nad med dang //zab dang phung po zad pa dang /
260a2(mdo sde): 'jigs pa med pa rnams su 'gyur//nyon mongs bcings pa bcad nas ni//kun kyang len pa ma mchis par//myur du rab tu grol 'gyur te//dge ba mchog gi 'bras bu 'thob//
260a3(mdo sde): de dag 'jig rten sbyin gnas te/sbyin pa rnams ni spang ba'i 'os//de dag yon phul mi chung ste//kun kyang mya ngan 'das rgyu lags//dge slong dag de ltar gnas gtsang ma'i ris
260a4(mdo sde): kyi lha'i bu rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa la mngon par bstod nas thal mo sbyar te/de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal zhing phyogs gcig tu 'khod do//de nas 'od gsal
260a5(mdo sde): gyi lha'i bu rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa byang chub kyi snying po la bzhugs pa lo me tog dang /bdug pa dang /spos dang /phreng ba dang /byug pa dang /gdugs dang /rgyal mtshan
260a6(mdo sde): dang /ba dan rnam pa sna tshogs kyis cho ga bzhino du mchod nas lan gsum bskor ba byas te/tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par bstod do//thub pa thugs zab gsung
260a7(mdo sde): ni shin tu snyan//thub mchog tshangs dbyangs glu ltar gsung snyan mchog/byang chub rab mchog shin tu dam pa brnyes//dbyangs kun mthar phyin khyod la phyag 'tshal lo//khyod
260b1(mdo sde): skyabs khyod gling khyod ni dpung gnyen te//khyod ni 'jig rten mgon po byams thugs mdzad//khyod ni sman pa'i dam pa zug rngu 'byin//gso ba phan mdzad khyod ni dam pa mchog/mar me nA rdung
260b2(mdo sde): po gzigs ma thog tu khyod//byams dang thugs rje'i sprin gyi dra ba bsgrubs//mgon po bdud rtsi'i rkyen gyi char phob la//lha mi rnams kyi gdung ba zhi par mdzod//khyod ni srid gsum mi gos
260b3(mdo sde): pad+ma 'dra//khyod ni mig ro mi bskyod lhun po 'dra//khyod ni thugs dom mi g.yo rdo rje bzhin//yon tan mchog kun mnga' skye zla ba 'dra//dge slong dag de ltar 'od gsal gyi lha rnams
260b4(mdo sde): kyis de bzhin gshegs pa la mngon par bstod nas thal mo sbyar te/de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal zhing phyogs gcig tu 'khod do//de nas lha'i bu rab tshangs pa la sogs pa
260b5(mdo sde): tshangs ris kyi lha rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa byang chub kyi snying po la bzhugs pa la nor bu rin po che bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du mas spras pa'i rin po che'i dra bas bkab ste lan gsum
260b6(mdo sde): bskor ba byas nas tshul dang mthun pa'i tshigs su bcod pa 'di dag gis mngon par bstod do//dge ba dri med shes rab 'od dang gzing rjid ldan//mtshan gyi dam pa sum cu rtsa gnyis
260b7(mdo sde): mchog mnga' ba//dran dang ldan zhing blo gros ldan pa ye shes mnga'//mnyel ba mi mnga' khyod la mgo bos phyag 'tshal lo//dri gsum dri mi mnga' ba dri med dri ma bral//'jig rten
261a1(mdo sde): gsum du grags shing rig pa gsum brnyes pa//rnam par thar pa dam pa gsum gyi mig sbyin pa//spyan gsum dri ma mi mda' khyod la phyag 'tshal lo//dus ngan rnyog
261a2(mdo sde): pa bsal ba rab tu zhi thugs ldan//thugs brtse thugs rjes 'phags pa 'gro ba'i don mdzad pa//thub pa dgyes pas 'phags pa thugs ni rab zhi bo//khyod ni yid gnyis grol
261a3(mdo sde): bar mdzad pa btang snyoms dgyes//brtul zhugs dka' thub 'phags pa 'gro ba'i don mdzad pa//rang spyod rnam par dag cing spyod pa'i pha rol byon//bden pa bzhi po ston pa
261a4(mdo sde): rnam thar dgyes pa po//grol bar gyur nas 'gro ba gzhan yang grol mdzad pa//stobs dang brtson 'grus ldan pa'i bdud po 'dir lhags pa//shes rab brtson 'grus de bzhin
261a5(mdo sde): byams pas pham mdzad nas//khyod kyis go 'phang dam pa 'chi ba med pa brnyes//g.yon can dpung rnams bcom pa khyod la phyag 'tshal lo//dge slong dag de ltar lha'i bu rab
261a6(mdo sde): tshongs pa la sogs pa tshangs ris kyi lha rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa la tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par bstod nas thal mo sbyar te/de bzhin gshegs pa la
261a7(mdo sde): phyag 'tshal zhing phyogs gcig tu 'khod do//de nas bdud kyi bu dkar po'i phyogs pa de dag de bzhin gshegs pa ga la ba der song ste phyin pa dang /rin po che'i gdugs dang /
261b1(mdo sde): blabre chen po rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa la mngon par bkab nas thal mo sbyar te/de bzhin gshegs pa la tshul dang mthun pa'i tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par bstod do//
261b2(mdo sde): khyod stobs shin tu rgya che ba dang bdud dpung drag po bdag cag mngon sum ste//bdud dpung rab 'jigs chen po de yang khyod kyis skad cig gcig la pham par mdzad//khyod ni bzhengs par ma
261b3(mdo sde): gyur sku yang mi g.yo gsung yang brjod pa ma mdzad de//thub pa don kun 'grub pa 'jig rten gsum gyis mchod pa khyod la bdag phyag 'tshal//bdud po bye ba khrag khrig stong phrag du ma gang+gA'i
261b4(mdo sde): bye ma snyed//de dag rnams kyis byang chub shing mchog drung nas khyod ni bskyod cing g.yo ma nus//mchod sbyin bye ba khrag khrig stong phrag du ma gang+gA'i bye mo snyed mdzad de//byang chub shing
261b5(mdo sde): drung bzhugs pa des na de ring khyod ni rnam par mdzes pa lags//byang chub spyad pa dam pa spyod mdzad tshe na shin tu sdug pa'i btsun mo dang //phangs pa'i sras dang bran mo de bzhin skyed mos
261b6(mdo sde): tshal dang grong khyer dang //yul 'khor grong rdal dag dang rgyal srid rnams dang btsun mo'i 'khor dang glang po dang //dbu dang spyan dang ljags dang de bzhin zhabs btang des na de rong rnam
261b7(mdo sde): par mdzes//nga ni sangs rgyas 'gyur te bsam gtan rdzu 'phrul blo yi go bgos nas//sems can bye ba khrag khrig mang po sdug bsngal rgya mtshos khyer bar gyur pa rnams//dam chos
262a1(mdo sde): gru yis nyid kyis bsgral bar bya zhes khyod kyis lan mang gsung brjod pa//khyod kyis smon lam de ni grub ljags srog chags rnams kyang sgrol bar mdzad par 'gyur//sgra
262a2(mdo sde): ba'i khyu mchog 'jig rten mig sbyin mdzad pa khyod la bstod pa'i bsod nams de//bdag cog thams cad dga' mgu yid gyur thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du smon lam 'debs//sangs
262a3(mdo sde): rgyas rnams kyis rab bsngags byang chub dam pa mtshungs med yang dag bsgrubs nas ni//de ltar bdud sde 'khor de bcom nas thams cad mkhyen nyid 'tshang rgyar 'gyur bar shog/dge slong
262a4(mdo sde): ngag de ltar bdud kyi bu rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa la mngon par bstod nas thal mo sbyar te/de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal zhing phyogs gcig tu 'khod do//de nas
262a5(mdo sde): lha'i bu gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha'i bu brgya stong du mas yongs su bskor te/mdun du bdor nas de bzhin gshegs pa la dzam+bu klung gi gser gyi pad+ma dag gis mngon par gtor te/
