262a6(mdo sde): spyan snga nas tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par bstod do//gsung ni dpyas ma mchis shing ma 'khrul rnam par ma 'khrugs pa//mun rdul bral zhing 'chi med rtogs par
262a7(mdo sde): thugs su chud par gyur//lha yul mi yul pa yi dpal dang bgyi ba gzhal med 'os//rab tu 'bar ba'i blo gros ldan la mgo bos phyag 'tshal lo//dga' ba mdzad pa nyon mongs spong ba
262b1(mdo sde): rdul dang dri ma sel//shin tu dga' ba'i gsung gis lha dang mi rnams dga' bar mdzod//sku mchog 'od zer rgyas pa dri ma shin tu mi mnga' bas//lha dang mi yi bdag po bzhin du 'gro ba 'di las
262b2(mdo sde): rgyal//pha rol tshogs rnams rab tu 'joms pa gzhan gyi spyod mkhas pa//lha dang mi yi srid par dga' ba gzhan gyi blo sel ba//shin tu mkhas pa blo ldan gzhan gyi spyod pa rnam par phye//stobs/
262b3(mdo sde): bcu mnga' ba gshegs pa'i lam 'dir rnam par rgya ba mdzod//srid pa 'dzin dang sdug bsngal log 'dzin rgya chen 'dor sel te//lha mi blo grol 'dul ba ji lta bzhin du 'dul ba mdzod//zla ba
262b4(mdo sde): bzhin du mkha' las phyogs bzhi dag tu rnam rgya ba//srid pa gsum 'dir rmad byung mig dang dpung gnyen gyur par shog/lha dang mi yi srid pa dga' yang yul la 'khrul mi mnga'//'dod pa'i
262b5(mdo sde): dga' dang bral zhing dge ba'i dga' la dgyes pa po//'khor la sgrogs pa 'jig rten gsum na khyod dang mtshungs ma mchis//khyod 'dir 'gro ba rnams kyi mgon dang skyabs dang dpung gnyen
262b6(mdo sde): lags//dge slong dag de ltar lha'i bu dbang sgyur la sogs pa gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha'i bu rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa la mngon par bstod nas thal mo sbyar te/de bzhin gshegs
262b7(mdo sde): pa la phyag 'tshal zhing phyogs gcig tu 'khod do//de nas lha'i bu rab 'phrul rab 'phrul gyi lha'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdar te/de bzhin gshegs pa la dar gyi lnga ldis
263a1(mdo sde): garogs nas spyan snga nas tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon dar bstod do//dri ma rnam gsum spangs pas khyod ni chos kyi snang ba yang dag 'phags//gti mug dang ni lta
263a2(mdo sde): dngam rig 'joms pa 'jam dang dpal gyis rgyas//log pa'i lam la dga' ba'i skye bo 'di dag 'chi meng 'god mdzad pa//'jig rten 'dir byung mchod rten lha yul ba dang mi yul pas mchod pa//
263a3(mdo sde): khyod ni gso ba'i sman pa mangs pa bdud rtsi bde ba sbyin papo//lha dang nyon mongs pa dang ma rig bsags pa sngon gyi bag la nyal//lus can rnams kyi nad kun sngon gyi rgyal ba'i lam gyis sel
263a4(mdo sde): ba ste//de bas sman pa dam pa 'dren pa khyod ni sa la rnam par rgyu//nyi zla'i 'od dang skar ma rnams dang me dang de bzhin nor bu dang //brgya byin tshangs pa'i 'od rnams dpal stug spyan sngar
263a5(mdo sde): lam me ma lags te//shes rab snang ba mdzad dang 'od mdzad 'od dang dpal gyis rab tu rgyas//khyod kyi ye shes rmad byung mngon sum gyur pas mgo bos phyag 'tshal lo//rnam par
263a6(mdo sde): 'dren pa snyan pa'i gsung ldan pa de ni dang bden min gsung //dul ba thugs zhi dbang po thul ba rab tu zhi ba'i thugs ldan pa//ston pa lha dang mi yi 'khor la bstan par bgyi ba
263a7(mdo sde): ston mdzad pa//shAkya thub pa mi yi khyu mchog lha mis mchod la phyag 'tshal lo//ye shes mnga' ba ye shes bka' mchid mchog can srid gsum go mdzad pa//dri ma gsum bsal
263b1(mdo sde): rig pa gsum dang rnam par thar gsum ston pa po//thub pa blo gros ji ltar gdul ba skal dang skal med rab mkhyen pa//stong gsum rmad du byung ba lha mis mchod pa khyod la phyag 'tshal lo//dge slong
263b2(mdo sde): dag de ltar lha'i bu rab 'phrul 'khor dang bcas pas de bzhin gshegs pa la mngon par bstod nas thal mo sbyar te/de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal zhing phyogs gcig tu 'dug go//de nas
263b3(mdo sde): lha'i bu yongs su dga' ldan dga' ldan ris kyi lha'i bu dang lhan cig tu de bzhin gshegs pa ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/lha'i gos kyi dra ba chen pos byang chub kyi snying po la bzhugs pa'i de bzhin
263b4(mdo sde): gshegs pa la mngon par bkab ste/spyan snga nas tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par bstod do//khyod ni dga' ldan gnas na bzhugs tsho der ni khyod kyis rgya chen chos kyang bshad//
263b5(mdo sde): khyod kyis bstan pa de ni da dung lha yi bu rnams chos spyod rgyun mi 'chad//khyod la blta bas ngoms par mi 'gyur chos mnyan pas kyang ngoms pa rnyed mi 'gyur//yon tan rgya mtsho 'jig rten sgron
263b6(mdo sde): mo khyod la mgro dang yid kyis phyag 'tshal lo//khyod ni dga' ldan gnas nas 'phos te de tshe khyod kyis mi khom thams cad sbyangs//gang tshe byang chub shing drung bzhugs tshe 'gro ba kun gyi nyon
263b7(mdo sde): mongs rab tu zhi//gang gi tshod du rgya chen byang chub btsal ba brnyes te bdud kyang pham par mdzad//khyod kyi smon lam de ni rab tu rdzogs kyis 'khor lo rgya chen myur du bskor//chos 'tshal
264a1(mdo sde): ba dag chos mnyan bgyi zhes te//srog chags stong phrag mang po sdod cing mchis//'khor lo rgya chen myur du bskor du gsol//srog chags stong rnams srid las bsgral
264a2(mdo sde): du gsol//dge slong dag de ltar lha'i bu yongs su dga' ldan 'khor dang bcas pas de bzhin gshegs pa la mngon par bstod nas thal mo sbyar te/de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal
264a3(mdo sde): zhing phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/de nas lha'i bu rab 'thab bral la sogs pa 'thab bral gyi lha rnams bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste phyin nas/me tog dang /spos dang /phreng ba dang /
264a4(mdo sde): byug pa sna tshogs kyis byang chub kyi snying po la bzhugs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod de/spyan snga nas tshul dang mthun pa'i tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par bstod do//
264a5(mdo sde): tshul khrims ting 'dzin de bzhin shes rab kyis//khyod dang mtshungs pa ma mchis ga la lhag/mos dang rnam par grol la mkhas pa po//de bzhin gshegs pa khyod la mgos
264a6(mdo sde): phyag 'tshal//byang chub snying po lha yis gang bgyis pa//bkod pa mdzes pa de dag mthong lags te//ji ltar khyod la lha dang mis mchod pa//de ni gzhan gang lnga yang 'os ma
264a7(mdo sde): lags//khyod byung don ma mchis pa ma lags te//gang gi don du dka' ba mang po spyad//shin tu g.yon can sngo dang bcas las rgyal//khyod kyis bla na med pa'i byang chub brnyes//
264b1(mdo sde): phyogs bcu dag tu snang ba mdzad par gyur//shes rab sgron mas 'jig rten gsum po gsal//khyod ni rab rib sel bar 'gyur ba ste//'gro la bla na med pa'i mig sbyin pa//khyod la bstod pa
264b2(mdo sde): bskal par brjod kyang ni//khyod kyi ba spu'i khung bu mtha' ma mchis//yon tan rgya mtsho 'jig rten rnam par grags//de bzhin gshegs pa khyod la mgos phyag 'tshal//de ltar rab 'thab
264b3(mdo sde): bral la sogs pa 'thab bral gyi lha'i bu de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa la mngon par bstod nas thal mo sbyar te/de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal zhing phyogs gcig tu 'khod do//de nas
264b4(mdo sde): lha'i dbang po brgya byin sum cu rtsa gsum ris kyi lha rnams dang lhan cig tu me tog dang /spos dang /phreng ba dang /byug pa dang /gdugs dang /rgyal mtshan dang /ba dan bkod pa rnams kyis
264b5(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod nas tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par bstod do//thub pa ma 'khrul kha na ma tho mi mnga' rtag tu legs bzhugs lhun po 'dra//phyogs bcu dag
264b6(mdo sde): tu ye shes 'od grags bsod nams dag dang gzi brjid ldan pa po//thub pa khyod kyis sngon chad sangs rgyas brgya phrag mtha' yas yang dag mchod pa mdzad//de yi yul de yis ni byang
264b7(mdo sde): chub shing drung bdud kyi sde las rgyal bar gyur//tshul khrims dang ni zos dang ting 'dzin shes rab 'byung gnas ye shes rgyal mtshan tog/rga shi 'joms par mdzad pa sman pa dam pa 'jig
265a1(mdo sde): rten dag la mig sbyin pa//thub pa dri ma gsum dang tha ba spangs shing dbang po zhi la thugs zhi ba//shAkya khyu mchog 'gro ba dag gi chos kyi rgyal po khyod la skyabs su mchi//khyod kyis
265a2(mdo sde): brtson 'grus mthu yis 'phags pa'i byang chub spyod pa mtha' yas gyur lags te//shes rab stobs dang thabs dang byams pa'i stobs dang bsod nams stobs rnams dang //stobs rnams
265a3(mdo sde): de dag bcom ldan 'das khyod byang chub bzhugs pa'i tshe na mtha' yas te//stobs dang ldan pa de ring byang chub snying por bzhugs nas stobs bcu mnga' bar gyur//dpung tshags mtha'
265a4(mdo sde): yas mthong nas dge sbyong rgyal po byang chub snying por bzhugs pa de//nyams par mi 'gyur grang zhes lho rnams thams cad rab tu dngangs shing skrag par gyur//khyod ni 'byung po rnams
265a5(mdo sde): kyis bsnyengs par mo gyur sku yang g.yo ba mi mnga' ste//khur lci phyag gis brdabs nas kun tu g.yos te bdud kyi sde las rgyal bar gyur//ji ltar snga ma rnams kyis seng ge'i khri la byang
265a6(mdo sde): chub dam pa brnyes gyur pa//de ltar khyod kyis rjes su sangs rgyas mtshungs shing mnyam ste gzhan du gyur ma lags//yid kyang mnyam zhing sems kyang mnyam ste khyod bdag nyid kyis thams
265a7(mdo sde): cad mkhyen nyid brnyes//des na khyod ni 'jig rten dam pa rang byung 'gro ba rnams kyi bsod nams zhing //dge slong dag de ltar lha'i dbang po brgya byin sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams
265b1(mdo sde): dang lhan cig tu de bzhin gshegs pa la mngon par bstod nas thal mo sbyar te/de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal zhing phyogs gcig tu 'dug go//de nas rgyal po chen po bzhi po dag
265b2(mdo sde): rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha'i bu rnams dang lhan cig tu de bzhin gshegs po ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/me tog a ti muk+ta ko dang /tsam+ba ka dang /sna ma'i me tog dang /paR+Ya ka dang /d+ha
265b3(mdo sde): nu ka rI'i phreng ba dang /chun po thogs te/lha'i bu mo brgya stong gis bskor nas lha'i glu dbyangs len pas de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa byas te/tshul dang mthun pa'i tshigs su bcad
265b4(mdo sde): pa 'di dag gis mngon par bstod do//shin tu gsung snyan dbyangs ni yid du mtsho//zla ltar rab tu zhi mdzad thugs dang ba//'dzum pa'i zhal ldan ljags ni rab yangs pa/
265b5(mdo sde): thub mchog dga' mdzad khyod la phyag 'tshal lo//lha mo rnams kyi snyan cing dgar 'gyur ba//sgra skad gang dag 'jig rten mchis pa kun//khyod kyi 'jam pa'i gsung ni phyung bas
265b6(mdo sde): na//mi yi sgra skad thams cad zil gyis non//'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug nyon mongs ni//mi man dga' ba rnam par dag pa skyed//rnyog pa mi mchis snying gis chos thos nas//
265b7(mdo sde): de kun 'phags pa'i rnam par grol ba thob//khyod ni mi mkhas rnams la brnyas mi mdzad//mkhas pa'i rgyags pas rnams kyang rgyags ma gyur//khyod ni 'gying ba mi mnga' zhum mi
266a1(mdo sde): mnga'//rgya mtsho'i dbus nas ri mchog 'phags pa bzhin//de 'dra'i sems can 'jig rten byung bas na//mi rnams 'dir ni rnyed pa legs par rnyed//pad+ma dpal ltar nor
266a2(mdo sde): rnams sbyin pa po//de ltar 'jig rten kun la mchod sbyin mdzad//de ltar rgyal po chen po bzhi la sogs pa rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams kyis byang chub kyi snying po la bzhugs pa'i de bzhin
266a3(mdo sde): gshegs pa la mngon par bstod nas thal mo sbyar te/de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal zhing phyogs gcig tu 'khod do//de nas bar snang gi lha rnams de bzhin gshegs pa'i
266a4(mdo sde): drung du lhags te/mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa la mchod pa'i las kyi phyir bar snang thams cad rin po che'i dra ba dang /dril bu g.yer ka'i dra ba dang /rin po che'i gdugs rnams
266a5(mdo sde): dang /rin po che'i ba dan rnams dang /rin po che dang /dar gyi lda ldi dang /rin po che'i me tog rna rgyan dang /mu tig gi chun khor dang /me tog gi lda ldi sna tshogs rnams lus phyed phyung
266a6(mdo sde): ba'i lha rnams kyis bzung ba dang /zla gam rnams kyis legs par brgyan nas de bzhin gshegs pa la phul lo//phul nas kyang spyan snga nas tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon
266a7(mdo sde): par bstod do//thub pa mkhas la bdag cag mchis nas ni//'gro ba'i spyod kun ji bzhin gsal bltas shing //sems can dag pa khyod kyi spyod bltas na//de ltar khyod kyi thugs
266b1(mdo sde): gcig 'khrul ma mthong //mchod phyir byang chub sems dpa' gang lhags pa//mi yi 'dren pa de dag nam mkha' khyab//'di ltar de dag nam mkha'i lus lags pas//gzhal med
266b2(mdo sde): khang rnams la yang gnod ma mchis//bar snang nas ni me tog char bab pa//stong chen byer bur rab tu gang gyur pa//de dag ma lus khyod kyi skur bab kyang //'bab chu rgya mtshor bab pa
266b3(mdo sde): bzhin du gyur//gdugs dang me tog rna rgyan me tog phreng //me tog tsan+ma ka yi lnga ldi dang //rgyan phreng zla ba zla gam rnams kyang 'thor//lce yis gtor kyang 'dres par gyur ma mchis//
266b4(mdo sde): bar snang thams cad lha yis gang gyur to//'di la skye tsam gzhag pa'i gnas ma mchis//rkang gnyis mchog la mchod pa bgyid kyang ni//khyod la rgyags pa 'am ngo mtshar 'gyur mi
266b5(mdo sde): mnga'i//de ltar bar snang gi lha rnams kyis byang chub kyi snying po la bzhugs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa la mngon par bstod nas thal mo sbyar te/de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal zhing
266b6(mdo sde): phyogs gcig tu 'khod do//de nas sa d+ma'i lho rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa'i las kyi phyir sa gzhi thams cad legs par phyags te byugs nas spros chus chog chag btab
266b7(mdo sde): ste/me tog gis chal bar bkang nas ras btsos bu sna tshogs kyi bla bri bres te de bzhin gshegs pa la phul nas tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par bstod do//stong gsum rdo rje lta
267a1(mdo sde): bur mi shigs gnas par gyur//nga 'dir pags pa sha dang rus pa rkang skams kyang //byang chub ma reg nga ni 'di nas mi ldang zhes//rdo rje'i gnas kyis de ni byang chub
267a2(mdo sde): snying por bzhugs//gal te mi yi seng gi khyod kyis stong gsum kun//byin gyis ma brlabs na ni gang dag rkang mthil gyis//bye ba'i zhing rnams bskyod pa de ltar shugs che ba//byang
267a3(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' lcags tshe ma lus zhigs par 'gyur//sa phyogs gang du sems can dam pa 'chag pa ni//sa yi lha yis rnyed pa rgya chen legs par rnyed//'jig rten rdul rnams ji
267a4(mdo sde): snying khyod kyis snang bar mdzad//stong gsum mchod rten gyur na khyod sku smos ci 'tshal//'og gi chu yi phung po brgya stong ji snyed dang //sa yi steng na 'gro ba'i 'tsho ba ji snyed pa//stong gsum
267a5(mdo sde): sa rnams thams cad bdag cag bzung bar bgyi//khyed la kun 'bul ji ltar bzhed bzhin spyad du gsol//gang du khyod ni bzhugs sam 'chag gam mnal ba dang //gau ta ma
267a6(mdo sde): bde bar gshegs pa'i sras po nyan thos gang //chos gtam smra dad gang yang de dag nyan pa dang //dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad byang chub phyir bsngo'o//de ltar sa bla'i lha rnams kyis
267a7(mdo sde): byang chub kyi snying po la bzhugs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa la mngon par bstod nas thal mo sbyar te/de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal zhing phyogs gcig tu 'khod do//mngon
267b1(mdo sde): par bstod pa'i le'u zhes bya ste nyi shu rtsa gsum pa'o///dge slong dag de ltar mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa la lha rnams kyis bstod cing skyil
267b2(mdo sde): mo krung ma bshig/spyan mi 'dzums par shing gi rgyal po la gzigs shing bsam gtan dang dga' ba'i zas kyi bde ba myong bar byang chub kyi shing drung du zhag bdun 'das par gyur to//de nas
267b3(mdo sde): zhag bdun 'das pa dang /'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha'i bu rnams spos chu'i bum pa khri thogs te/de bzhin gshegs pa gral bo der lhags so//gzugs na spyod pa'i lha'i bu rnams kyang
267b4(mdo sde): spos chu'i bum pa khri thogs te/de bzhin gshegs pa ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas/byang chub kyi shing dang /de bzhin gshegs pa spos chus bkrus so//lha dang /klu dang /gnod
267b5(mdo sde): sbyin dang /dri za dang /lha ma yin dang /nam mkha' lding dang /mi 'am ci dang /lto 'phye chen po bgrang ba las 'das pa dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku la phog pa'i spos chu des rang
267b6(mdo sde): rang gi lus la bskus so//bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu'ang sems bskyed do//lha'i bu la sogs pa de dag rang rang gi gnas su phyin kyang spos chu de dang ma bral bar
267b7(mdo sde): gyur te/spos gzhan la 'dod pa mi skyed do//de dag de bzhin gshegs pa la gus par yid la bya ba las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang /mchog tu dga' ba des bla na med pa yang dag
268a1(mdo sde): par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par gyur to//dge slong dag de nas lha'i bu kun nas me tog ces bya ba 'khor de nyid du 'dus par gyur pa des de bzhin gshegs
268a2(mdo sde): pa'i zhabs gnyis la gtugs te/thal mo sbyar nas de bzhin gshegs pa la 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das ting nge 'dzin gang dang ldan pas de bzhin gshegs pa
268a3(mdo sde): dgung bdun du skyil mo krung ma bshig par bzhugs pa'i ting nge 'dzin de'i ming ci zhes bgyi/dge slong dag de skad ces gsol pa dang /de bzhin gshegs pas lha'i bu de la 'di skad
268a4(mdo sde): ces bka' stsal to//lha'i bu ting nge 'dzin 'di'i ming ni dga' ba'i zas bkod pa zhes bya ste/ting nge 'dzin 'di dang ldan pas de bzhin gshegs pa la zhag bdun du skyil mo krung ma
268a5(mdo sde): bshig par bzhugs so//dge slong dag de nas lha'i bu kun nas me tog gis de bzhin gshegs pa la tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par bstod do//zhabs ni 'khor los
268a6(mdo sde): khyab pa po//pad 'dab rdul med stong gzi ldan//lha yi cod pan zhabs gtugs pa//dpal sdug zhabs la phyag 'tshal lo//bde gshegs zhabs la phyag 'tshal nas//de
268a7(mdo sde): tshotshe lta bu de sems dga'//lha min rab tu zhi byed pa//yid gnyis sel ba'i tshig 'di smras//shAkya'i rigs la dgyes skyed pa//chags sdang gti mug mthar 'byin pa//zhus pa rnams
268b1(mdo sde): nga ma pa 'byin pa//ma dgasu pa bas pa drag sa//dag med pazlas ca tsun spyod//sangs rgyas rlabs pa sgyu du//rgyal ba dgas skyong po das//dang bdun kyilam
268b2(mdo sde): krung ma ba shig/'dub brgya rgyas pa'i spyan mnga' ga//ci zhig gzigs nA dgung bdun du//mi mi seng gi rna ma dag spyan//spyan mi 'dzums par gzigs pa mdzad//gling gis shing rgya la drud du
268b3(mdo sde): ni//skyil krung ma bshig dgung bdun bzhugs//smon lam 'di ni khyod kyi'am//smra ba'i seng ge kun gyi legs//tshims ni mnyam zhing rnam dag pa//stobs bcu'i zhal ni dri rab gda'//
268b4(mdo sde): mnar legs par bka' stsol te//lha dang mi rnams dga' bar mdzod//zla 'dra'i zhal gyis bka' stsal pa//ngas bshad lha yi bu nyan cig/ngas ni dris pa de yo lan//cung zad tsam
268b5(mdo sde): zhig bshad par bya//dper na rgyal po phyogs gang du//gnyen gyi tshogs kyis dbang bskur ba//zhag bdun par dus phyogs de//mi 'dod rgyal po'i chos nyid do//de bzhin stobs bcu
268b6(mdo sde): mnga' ba yang //grang tshe smon rdzogs dbang bskur ba//sa yi snying po zhag bdun du//rgyal ba skyil mo krung mi 'jig/dper na dpa' bo dag tshogs rnams//ma lus pham byas ltab
268b7(mdo sde): ltar//byang chub snying por sangs rgyas kyang //nyon mongs bcom nas gzigs pa mdzad//gti mug byung ba'i 'dod dang khro//de dag 'gro ba'i dgra 'dra ste//chom po chas ni bzang 'dra ba/
269a1(mdo sde): de dag ma lus ngas 'dir bshig/nga 'dir nga rgyal rnam dgu dang //gnas med rlom sems rab tu bcom//zag pa thams cad rab tu spangs//nga yi ye shes dam pa skyes//
269a2(mdo sde): ngas 'dir sred pa'i srid rgyu dang //ma rig bya min byed pa de//bag nyal bcas rtsa dra ba rnams//ye shes gsal ba'i me yis bsregs//ngas 'dir nga dang nga yi dang //nyes zhags ring 'gro rtsa
269a3(mdo sde): drug pa//sgrib pa'i mdud pa dam po de//ye shes mtshon gyis bcad par gyur//ngas 'dir ring nas nga'i ldan pa//srub tha ma rnam 'jig pa//len par bcas pa'i phung po de//ye shes
269a4(mdo sde): kyis ni yongs su shes//gnyis su rmongs pa log 'dzin pa//tha mar dmyal 'gyur de dag rnams//ngas 'dir ma lus bsal bya ste//phyin chad nam yang skyer mi 'gyur//ngas 'di
269a5(mdo sde): dge ba'i rtsa ba yi//me yis sgrib pa'i nags tshal bsregs//phyin ci log ni rnam bzhi yang //nga yis ma lus nges par bsregs//'du shes skud pas brgyus pa yi//rnam rtog
269a6(mdo sde): phreng ba gnod byed pa//ngas 'dir byang chub yan lag gis//phreng ba sna tshogs rnams kyis bzlog/bgrod dka' drug cu rtsa lnga dang //gti mug sum cu dri ma can//sdig pa dag
269a7(mdo sde): ni bzhi bcungaso//sa yi snying po 'dor bsal to//sa yi snying por 'dug nas ngas//sdom pa ma yin bcu drug dang //khams ni rnam pa bco brgyad dang //khyab pa nyi shu rtsa lnga bas la//
269b1(mdo sde): nyon mongs chu ba nyi shu dang //'gro ba 'jigs pa nyi shu brgyad//brtson 'grus mthu dang brtul ba yis//nga 'dir de dag shin tu 'das//de bzhin sangs rgyas bsgyings sgrog pa//lnga brgyangs
269b2(mdo sde): 'dir yang dag rtogs//brgya phrag stong du tshang ba yi//chos rnams nga yis yang dag rtogs//ngas 'dir bag nyal ma lus pa//dgu bcu rtsa brgyad rtsar bcas mtha'//kun nas ldang ba'i
269b3(mdo sde): lo ma rnams//ye shes me yis nges par bsregs//dogs dang yid gnyis kun 'byung ba//lta ba'i chu yis gang gyur pa//mi dge ngogs can sred pa'i klung //shugs dreg ye shes nyi
269b4(mdo sde): mas skams//tshul 'chos pa dang kha bsag spangs//sgyu dang ser sna phrag dog sdang //nyon mongs dgon pa dring 'dir bcad//'dul ba'i me yis rab tu bsregs//'dir ni rtsod pa'i rtsa
269b5(mdo sde): bde//ngan 'gro nyam ngar 'dren byed pa//'phags la skur pa 'debs pa'i tshig/ye shes mchog gi sman gyis bskyugs//ngas 'dir ye shes yon tan dang //ting 'dzin thob nas ngu ba dang //
269b6(mdo sde): tsho 'don dang mya ngan dang //slob ma lus mtha' mar phyin//ngas 'dir bden tshul ting nge 'dzin//thob nas chu ba sbyor ba dang //mdud pa mya ngan zug rngu dang //rgyags dang bag med kun
269b7(mdo sde): las rgyal//ngas 'dir nyon mongs gzings pa yi//srid pa'i ljon shing rtog rtsa brtan//dran pa'i sta res ma lus par//bcad nas ye shes me yis bsregs//nga 'dir nga snyam nga rgyal
270a1(mdo sde): te//khams gsu su bang byed stobs chag//g.yon can yo shes ral gas bcom//lha min dbang la dbang po bzhin//drab ma lum sum cu bya//'jug pas
270a2(mdo sde): snying po 'di//shes rab la gr-i ts+tshas ldan pas//bcad das ye shes me yis bsregs/nyon mongs rgya ba brag nyal bcas//sdug bsngal mya ngan 'jung de dag/dus 'di
270a3(mdo sde): shes rab dam pa yi//bong lpags kyis ni ma lus d+h+yan//rang bzhin gyis dag sems can ni//shes rab smig 'drir nga phyis sbyang gi//ye shos mig sgron chen po yis//
270a4(mdo sde): mug ling tog rgya chen bsal//'byung khams bzhi po rgyags pa yi//chu srin gyis dkrugs sred yangs pa//srid pa'i rgya mtsho dran pa dang //zhi gnas nyi ma'i 'od kyis bskams//
270a5(mdo sde): ngas 'dir yul gyi shing gi tshogs//rnam rtog du 'thul chags chen mo//rab tu 'bor ba rnam thar chu//bsil ba'i khro bas bsad par gyur//ngas 'dir bag la nyal ba'i spris
270a6(mdo sde): ro myang zlog 'du nam tog 'drug/brtson 'grus stobs kyi rlung shugs kyi//bangs te kun tu gtor bar gyur//ngas 'dir dran pas dri med pa'i//ting 'dzin thob nas sems spyong
270a7(mdo sde): dgro//srid pa'i khon rgyud ma lus par//shes rab ral gri stobs kyis bcad//ngas 'dir rgyal mtshan mchog 'chang ba//shing rta glang po rtas mtho ba//gzugs bsku
270b1(mdo sde): bdud dpung brtson pa'i sde//byams pa thob nas rnam par bcom//mi sdug ting nge 'dzin thob nas//ngas 'dir dbang po drug gi rta//'dod pa'i yon tan lngas ltas pa//rtag tu rgyags
270b2(mdo sde): yan ma lus btags//smon med ting nge 'dzin thob nas//ngas 'dir rjes su chags pa dang //khong khro ba dang 'thab pa dang //cod spang ma lus mtha' mar phyin//stong pa'i ting nge 'dzin
270b3(mdo sde): thob nas//ngas 'dir phye dang nang dag gi/rlom sems kun dang rtog pa dang //rnam par rtog pa yongs su zad//mtshan med ting nge 'dzin thob nas//lha mi srid pa'i rtser thug pa'i///
270b4(mdo sde): bde ba thams cad ma lus par//nga yis 'dir ni yongs su btang //ngas 'dir rnam thar gsum thob nas//ngas 'dir shes rab stobs kyis ni//srid pa dag go 'ching ba kun//ma
270b5(mdo sde): lus kun las grol bar gyur//ngas 'dir rgyu mthong gyur nas ni//rtag dang mi rtag 'du shes dang //bdag dang bdag med bde sdug bsngal//rgyu yi 'du shes gsum las rgyal//ngas
270b6(mdo sde): 'dir las kyi rnam pa dag/skye mched drug rtse kun 'byung las//byung ba thams cad shing dbang drung //mi rtag pa yis bstan te bcad//ngas 'dir ye shes nyi ma yis//gti mug
270b7(mdo sde): mun pa'i rnyog pa dang //lta gyur rgyags dang khros gang ba//yun ring mun pa bsal snang byas//ngas 'dir brtson 'grus stobs kyi grus//'dod dang chags pa'i chu srin can//ngan 'dzin
271a1(mdo sde): ltu ngan sred rlangs chu//'khor ba'i rgya mtsho che las rgal//gang rtogs chags dang gti mug dang //sems kyi rnam par rtog bsregs te//phye brang nags mer lhung
271a2(mdo sde): 'dra ba//ngas 'dir de ni rjes su rtogs//nga 'dir ring nas song ba yi//bskal pa dpag med bye khrag khrig/'khor ba'i lam gyis nyon mongs pa//gdung ba med nas dal yang
271a3(mdo sde): soso//'jig rten phan phyir rga shi dang //mya ngan sdug bsngal mthar phyin pa//phas rgol kun gyis ma thob pa//bdud rtsi de ni ngas 'dir rtogs//sred las byung ba'i skye mched kyis///
271a4(mdo sde): sdug bsngal phung pos sdug bsngal ba//phyis mi 'byung ba 'jigs maud kyi//grong khyer 'dir ni ngas phyin to//ngas 'dar nang gi dgra chen po//khyab pa de dag rjes su rtogs//rtogs
271a5(mdo sde): nas rab tu bsregs te ngas//de dag yang byung gnas med byas//bdud rtsi'i don du bskal pa ni//bye ba khrag khrig rang gi sha/mig dang rin chen mang btang ba//de 'dir nga yis
271a6(mdo sde): rjes su rtogs//sngon gyi rgyal ba dpag med pas//gang sangs rgyas de ngas 'dir rtogs//gang gi snyan pa nyams dga' ba//sgra ni 'jig rten rnams su grags//rten nas
271a7(mdo sde): byung ba'i 'gro ba stod//sems kyi skad cig gcig la 'jig/smig rgyu dri za'i grong khyer 'dra//de 'dir nga yis rjes su rtogs//gang gis lag pa'i mthol du ni//shing tog
271b1(mdo sde): bzhag bzhin 'jig rten khams//thams cad mthong ba'i mig mchog de//nga yis 'dir ni dag par byas//stan gyi ba nas ni ngas 'dir dran//reg pa gsum yang thob par gyur//bskul
271b2(mdo sde): pa khrag khrig dpag med pa//gnyid kyis log las sad bzhin dran//lha mi nor zhing 'du shes log/phyin ci log gyur gang 'bar ba//de yang de bzhin ma nor bar//ngas 'dir bdud
271b3(mdo sde): rtsi'i nying khu 'thungs//gang gi don du stobs bcu po//sems can kun la byams pa bsgoms//byams pa'i stobs kyis rgyal gyur nas//ngas 'dir bdud rtsi'i nying khu 'thungs//gang gi
271b4(mdo sde): don du stobs bcu po//sems can kun la snying rje bsgoms//snying rje'i stobs kyis rgyal gyur nas//ngas 'dir bdud rtsi'i nying khu 'thungs//gang gi don du stobs bcu po//sems
271b5(mdo sde): can kun la dga' ba bsgoms//dga' ba'i stobs kyis rgyal gyur nas//ngas 'dir bdud rtsi'i nying khu 'thungs//gang gi don du stobs bcu po//bskal pa khrag khrig btang snyoms bsgoms//
271b6(mdo sde): btang snyoms 'di yis stobs kyis rgyal//ngas 'dir bdud rtsi'i nying khu 'thungs//stobs bcu gang+gA'i bye ma bas//rab tu mang bas gang gsol pa//sngon rgyal seng ges sngon gsol pa//
271b7(mdo sde): dadung rtsi'i nying khu ngas 'dir 'thungs//rga shi mtha' mar ma phyin par//skyil mo krung ni mi gzhig ces//sder bcas pa yi bdud mdun 'dir//nga yis tshig ni gang smras pa//ye shes
272a1(mdo sde): rdo rje brtan 'bar byas//nga yis ma rig pa yang bcom//stobs bcu nyid ni thob par gyur//de lta bas na skyil krung bzhig/nga yis dgra bcom nyid thob ste/
272a2(mdo sde): dA yi zag pa ma lus zad//bdud kyi sde yang bcom par gyur//de lta bas na skyil krung gzhing //sgrib pa lnga yi sgo glegs rnams//nga yis 'dir ni thams cad bcug/srid pa
272a3(mdo sde): khri shing rnams kyang bcad//nga 'dir skyil mo krung ba zhig go/de nas mi yi zla ba de//dal gyis gdan las bzhengs nas su//dbang bskur chen po bzhes nas ni//sing ge'i
272a4(mdo sde): gdan la bzhugs par gyur//lha tshogs rnams kyis rin chen snod//steng nas spos chu sna tshogs kyis//stobs bcu yon tan mthar phyin pa//'jig rten rtsa lag sku yang bsil//
272a5(mdo sde): bye ba khrag khrig lha rnams dag/lha mo khrag khrig lhan cig tu//kun nas rol mo stong dag gis//mchod pa gzhal du med pa byed//de ltar lha yi bu dag ni//sa yi snying po zhag
272a6(mdo sde): bdun du//rgyal ba'i skyil krung ma bshig pa//rgyur bcas rkyen bcas gzhi dang bcas//dge slong dag de ltar byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa
272a7(mdo sde): ngas 'dir bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so//ngas 'dir thog mo med pa'i skye ba dang /rga ba dang /'chi ba'i sdug bsngal mthar phyung
272b1(mdo sde): ngo zhes zhag bdun pa dang po la gdan de nyid la bzhugs so//zhag bdun pa gnyis pa'i tshe ni de bzhin gshegs pa stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi bar du rgyang ring du 'chag
272b2(mdo sde): pas 'chag go//zhag bdun pa gsum pa'i tshe ni de bzhin gshegs pa ngas 'dir bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas thog ma med pa'i
272b3(mdo sde): skyed dang /rga ba dang /'chi ba'i sdug bsngal mthar phyung ngo zhes byang chub kyi snying po la spyan mi 'dzums par gzigs so//zhog bdun pa bzhi pa'i tshe ni de bzhin gshegs pa shar gyi rgya mtsho nas
272b4(mdo sde): nub kyi rgya mtsho'i bar du mi ring ba'i'i chags pas 'chag go///'phags pa rgya cher rol pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo//bam po bcu drug pa//de nas bdud
272b5(mdo sde): sdig can de bzhin gshegs pa ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/de bzhin gshegs pa la 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das nga yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'i dus la bab lags
272b6(mdo sde): kyis/bcom ldan 'das yongs su mya ngan las 'do' bar gsol/bde bar gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar gsol/dge slong dog de skad ces gsol pa dang /de bzhin
272b7(mdo sde): gshegs pas bdung sdig can la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//sdig can nga'i dge slong gnas brtan gnas brtan/dul ba/gsal ba/byang ba/bag tsha ba med pa/mang du thos pa/chos
273a1(mdo sde): kyi rjes su mthun pa'i chos la zhugs pa/bdag nyid slob dpon du sgrogs pa dang /phas kyis rgol ba byung ba rnams chos dang mthun pas tshar bcad de dad par byas nas
273a2(mdo sde): cho 'phrul dang bcas pa'i chos ston par nus pa dag ma byung gi bar du de srid du nga yongs su mya ngan las mi 'da'o//sdig can ngas 'jig rten du sangs rgyas dang /chos dang /dge 'dun
273a3(mdo sde): gyi sgra bzhag par ma gyur pa dang /byang chub sems dpa' dpag tu med pa dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan par ma gyur gyi bar du de srid du nga yongs su mya
273a4(mdo sde): ngan las mi 'da'o//sdig can ngo'i 'khor bzhi po dul ba/gsal ba/byang ba/bag tsha ba med pa nas cho 'phrul dang bcas pa'i chos ston pa'i bar du nus pa dag byung bar ma gyur gyi
273a5(mdo sde): bar du de srid du nga yongs su mya ngan las mi 'da'o//de nas bdud sdig can gyis tshig de skad thos nas sdug bsngal zhing yid mi bde ste/phyogs gcig tu song nas 'dug ste mgo smad nas
273a6(mdo sde): mangs sa la ri mo 'dri zhing bdag gi yul las 'das so snyam du sems par gyur to//de nas bdud kyi bu mo dga' ma dang /mi dga' ma dang /sred ma gsum gyis bdud sdig can
273a7(mdo sde): la tshigs su bcad de smras pa/yab cig ji ltar thugs mi dgyes//mi dgyos gang lags bka' stsol dang //'dod chags zhags pas de bcings nas//glang po bzhin du dgug
273b1(mdo sde): par bgyi//bkug nas de ni myur du yang //khyod kyi dbang du 'gyur bar bgyi//de ltar thugs ngan 'o brgyal 'or//dgyes pa rgya chen brnyes pas 'gyur//bdud kyis smras pa/'jig rten dgra bcom
273b2(mdo sde): bde bar gshegs//'dod chags dbang du de mi 'gro//nga yi yul las shin tu 'das//de bas nga ni mya ngan che//de nas de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i mthu byang chub sems dpa'
273b3(mdo sde): mdzad pa snga nas kyang shes mod kyi/bud med kyis mi brtan pas pa'i tshig ma mnyan te/bu cig btsas tsam gyin tshod kyis ngar la bab par bsgyur nas/mig gi mi rtsol bar bya bas las kyi/phyir
273b4(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa'i gan du dong ba dang /de bzhin gshegs pas de dag yid la ma mdzad par de dag rga bas 'khogs par byin gyis brlabs so//de nas de dag pa'i gan du song ste/'di skad
273b5(mdo sde): ces smras so//de ni chags pas mi bkri ste//nga yi yul las shin tu 'das//de bas mya ngan nga che zhes//yab kyis bdag cag gsungs pa med//gau ta ma ni brlag pa'i phyir//bdag
273b6(mdo sde): cag rnams kyi gang sprul pa//gzugs lag pa te de lta na//de yi de snying 'gas par 'gyur//yab bdag cag gi lus rga bas 'khogs pa 'di ma mchis par mdzad du gsol/bdud kyis smras
273b7(mdo sde): pa/gang zhig sangs rgyas byin gyis brlabs ni gzhan du bsgyur bar byed nus pa//rgyu dang mi rgyu dag gi 'jig rten dag na mi de ngas ma mthong //myur du song ste thub bde las rang byas shog cig
274a1(mdo sde): dang //de ni khyed kyi bsam pa bzhin du sngon gyi lus su bsgyur bar 'gyur//de nas de dag dong ste bdag cag gis bcom ldan 'das la sku brnyas bgyi bar bsams pas/bcom
274a2(mdo sde): ldan 'das ji ltar byis pa rnams dang /ji ltar glen pa rnams dang /ji ltar mi gsal ba mi mkhas shing ma 'tshal ba rnams ltar bdag cag nongs pa can du bzung du gsol/bde bar gshegs
274a3(mdo sde): pa bdag cag nongs pa can du bzung du gsol zhes de bzhin gshegs pa la bzod par gsol to//de nas de bzhin gshegs pas de dag la tshigs su bcad pas bka' stsal pa/sen mos
274a4(mdo sde): ri la bru ba dang //so yis lcags ni bca' ba dang //mgo yis re ni dbug pa dang //gting mi dpogs la dpog par 'dod//de lta bas na bu mo khyed nyes pa can du bzung ngo //de ci'i phyir
274a5(mdo sde): zhe na/gang nyes pa la nyes par mthong nas 'chags shing phyin chad kyang sdom par byed pa de ni 'phags pa'i chos 'dul ba la 'phel bar 'gyur ro//dge slong dag zhag bdun pa lnga pa zhag bdun
274a6(mdo sde): yul dran chen po byung ba'i tshe na/de bzhin gshegs pa klu'i rgyal po btang zung gi gnas na bzhugs so//de nas klu'i rgyal po btang zung bcom ldan 'das kyi sku la grang ba dang rlung gis phog
274a7(mdo sde): du 'ong zhes rang gi gnas na byung ste/lus kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku la lan bdun du bkres nas mgo'i gdengs ka rnams kyis bkab bo//bcom ldan 'das kyi sku la grang ba dang
274b1(mdo sde): rlung gis phog tu 'ong ngo zhes shar phyogs nas kyang klu'i rgyal po gzhan mang du lhags te/de bzhon gshegs pa'i sku la lus rnams kyis lan bdun du dkris nas mgo'i gdengs kwa rnams kyis bkab bo//
274b2(mdo sde): shar phyogs nas ji lta ba bzhin du bcom ldan 'das kyi sku la grang ba dang rlung gis phog tu 'ong ngo zhes lho dang nub deng byang phyogs nas kyang klu'i rgyal po rnams lhags nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku la
274b3(mdo sde): lus rnams kyis ldan bdun du dkris te mgo'i gdengs ka rnams kyis bkab bo//klu'i rgyal po'i lus kyi phung po de ni ro'i dbang po lhun po ltar mthon por gnas par gyur to//klu'i rgyal po
274b4(mdo sde): de dag gis kyang ji ltar nyin bdun mtshan bdun du de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku la rig par gyur pa de lta bu'i bde ba de dag gis sngon nam yang ma rnyed do//de nas zhog bdun 'das nas
274b5(mdo sde): klu'i rgyal po de dag gis yul ngan med par shes te/de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku las lus bkrol nas/de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/lan gsum
274b6(mdo sde): bskor ba byas nas/rang rang gi gnas su dong ngo //klu'i rgyal po btang zung yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/lan gsum bskor ba byas nas rang gi gnas
274b7(mdo sde): su zhugs so//zhag bdun pa drug pa'i tshe na de bzhin gshogs pa klu'i rgyal po btang zung gi gnas nas shing t+ya gro d+har skyong gi drung du bzhud do//klu'i rgyal po btang zung gi gnas dang shing
275a1(mdo sde): n+ya gro d+har skyong gi bar du klung nai rany+dza na'i ngogs su spyod pa pa dang /kun tu rgyu dang /nyan thos rgan po dang /gau ta ma dang /gcer bu pa dang /kun tu 'tsho ba pa la sogs pas de
275a2(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa mthong nas/bcom ldan 'das gau ta mas zhag bdun pa yul ngan chen po'i dus 'di bde bas bde bar 'das par byas sam zhes 'dzer to//dge slong dag de nas de
275a3(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa'i de'i tshe ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do//chos thos pa dang mthong ba dang //dben par dga' ba bde ba yin//srog chags 'byung po rnams la bsdams//gnod
275a4(mdo sde): pa mi byed 'jig rten bde//sdig pa rnams las rab 'das pa//'dod chags bral ba 'jig rten bde//nga snyam nga rgyal gang 'dul ba//de ni mchog tu bde ba yin//dge slong dag de
275a5(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pas skye ba dang /rga ba dang /na ba dang /'chi ba dang /mya ngan dang /smre sngags 'don pa dang /sdug bsngal ba dang /yid mi bde ba dang /'khrug pa rnams kyi 'jig
275a6(mdo sde): rten kun tu 'angar zhing rab tu 'bar bar gzigs nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do//sgra reg ro dang gzugs dang dri rnams kyis//'jig rten 'di ni
275a7(mdo sde): kun tu gdungs par gyur//srid pas 'jigs kyang srid pa'i sred pa yis//phyir zhing srid pa tshol bar byed pa yin//zhag bdun pa bdun pa'i tshe ni de bzhin gshegs pa shing
275b1(mdo sde): sgrol rgyu'i drung du bzhugs so//de'i tshe byang phyogs pa'i tshong pa ga gon dang bzang po zhes bya ba mkhas pa gsal ba spun gnyis rnyed pa chen po rnyed nas/zong rnam pa mang ba thogs te/'gron pa phar
275b2(mdo sde): po che dang /shing rta shin tu gang ba lnga brgya dang lhan cig tu lho phyogs nas byang phyogs su dong ngo //de gnyis la glang bu cang shes legs skyes dang grags pa zhes bya ba gnyis yod do//de gnyis la
275b3(mdo sde): thogs pa'i 'jigs pa med de gang du glang bu gzhan mi thar pa der de gnyis gtong ngo //brang du mdun rol na 'jigs pa yod pa der de gnyis phur pa la btags pa bzhin du 'dug go//de gnyis
275b4(mdo sde): la lcag gis mi 'ju'i me tog ut+pa la sbar grang ngam/sna ma'i me tog gi phreng bas de gnyis dad do//shring sgrol rgyu dang nye ba zhig tu shing 'o ma can gyi nags na gnas pa'i lha mos byin gyi rlabs
275b5(mdo sde): kyis byin gyis brlabs pas/de dag gi shing rta de dag thams cad mi 'gro ste/'bring ba la sogs pa shing rta'i tshe rkyen thams cad kyang chad grugs so//shing rta'i 'phang lo rnams kyang lte ba
275b6(mdo sde): la thug par sa'i nang du nub ste/thams cad kyis rab tu sgrims kyang shing rta de dag 'gro bar ma gyur nas/kha cig ngo mtshar dang skrag par gyur te/shing rta 'di dag zang la'ang thogs par
275b7(mdo sde): gyur pa 'di la rgyu ni ci zhig yod/'di'i 'gyur ba ni ci zhig yin snyam nas/de dag gis glang bu legs skyes dang grags bde gnyis 'dren du bcug ste/me tog ut+pa la spar gang dang /sna
276a1(mdo sde): ma'i me tog gi phreng bas bdas kyang 'gro bar ma gyur nas de dag 'di snyam du sems te/gang gi phyir 'di gnyis kyang mi 'gro ba las mdun na 'jigs pa 'ga' zhig 'byung du
276a2(mdo sde): gdon mi za'o snyam nas/de dag gis sa 'khru brta pa dag sngar btang ngo //sa 'khru brta pa rnams slar log nas 'jigs pa ci'ang med ces smras so//lha mo des kyang rang gi gzugs bstan nas
276a3(mdo sde): ma 'jigs shig ces dbugs phyung ngo //glang bu de gnyis kyis kyang de bzhin gshegs pa ga la ba de logs su shing rta drangs pa dang /de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa mi ltar rab tu 'bar
276a4(mdo sde): bskyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtswa gnyis kyi mtshan gyis legs par brgyan pa/nyi ma shar nas ring por malon pa lta bu dpal gyis 'bar ba mthong ngo //mthong nas kyang de dag ngo mtshar
276a5(mdo sde): du gyur te/'di ci zhig tshangs pa 'dir phyin tam/'on te lha'i dbang po brgya byin nam/'on te rnam thos kyi bu 'am/'on te nyi ma dang zla ba 'am/'on tA ri'i lha 'ga' zhig gam/rlung
276a6(mdo sde): gau d+ha zhig snyam mo//de nas de bzhin gshegs pas na bza' ngung smrig rnams bstan to//de nas de dag gis ngur smrig bgos pa 'di ni rab tu byung ba yin gyis bdag cag 'jigs pa med
276a7(mdo sde): de nas smras te/de dag dang pathob nas yang phan tshun du smras pa/rab tu byung ba 'di ni dus su za ba yin na/cung zad ci yod/smras pa/sbrang rtsi dang skyom dang /buram shing bshus
276b1(mdo sde): payod do//de dag gis sbrang rtsi dang /sgrom dang /ru ram shing ba shus pa khyer nas/de bzhin gshegs pa ga la ba der dong ste phyin pa dang /de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal
276b2(mdo sde): te/lan gsum bskor ba byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do//phyog so gcig tu 'khod nas kyang de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa la 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das bdag cag la
276b3(mdo sde): thugs brtse bar dgongs te skyon gzigs 'di bzhes su gsol/dge slong dag de nas de bzhin gshegs pa 'di snyam du dgongs te/bdag gis lag pas 'di blangs na ni ma legs na sngon gyi yang dag
276b4(mdo sde): par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis snod ji lta bus bzhes snyam nas mkhyen pa 'jug par gyur to//dge slong dag de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i sbubs kyi dus la bab par rig nas skad cig de nyid
276b5(mdo sde): la phyogs bzhi nas rgyal po chen po bzhi gser gyi lhung bzed bzhi thogs te/lhag nas de bzhin gshegs pa la bcom ldan 'das bdag cag la thugs brtse bar dgongs te/gser gyi lhung bzed bzhi po
276b6(mdo sde): 'di dag bzhes su gsol zhes phul lo//de dag dge sbyong gi cha ma yin par dgongs nas/de bzhin gshegs pas ma bzhes so//de bzhin du dngul gyi bzhi dang /bai DUr+ya dang /shel dang /sprug
276b7(mdo sde): dang /rdo'i snying po las byas pa bzhi bzhi dang /rin po che thams cad las byas pa'i lhung bzed pa ni thogs te/de bzhin gshegs pa la phul na'ang dge sbyong gi cha ma yin par dgongs te/
277a1(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pas ma bzhes so//dge slong dag de nas de bzhin gshegs pas yang 'di snyam du dgongs te/sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis lhung bzed rnam pa ci 'dra
277a2(mdo sde): ba dag gis bzhes snyam dgongs na/rdo'i lhung bzed rnams kyis bzhes par mkhyen nas/de bzhin gshegs pas de lta bu'i thugs bskyed pa dang /de nas rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bus rgyal
277a3(mdo sde): po chen po gzhan gsum la smras pa/grogs po dag sngon po'i ris kyi lha'i bu rnams kyis bdag la rdo'i lhung bzed bzhi byin pa dang /de la bdag gis 'di snyam du bsams te/'di spyad par
277a4(mdo sde): bya'o snyam pa dang /de nas sngon po'i ris kyi lha'i bu rnam par snang byed ces bya ba des bdag la 'di skad ces smras so//kye snod 'di dag spyad par ma bya bar//'di dag chongs shig mchod rten
277a5(mdo sde): grogs par 'gyur//shAkya thub ces bya ba'i rgyal ba 'byung //de la lhung bzed 'di dag dbul ba gyis//grogs po dag gis shAkya thob pa la//snod dbul ba yi dus dang tshod la bab//glu
277a6(mdo sde): dbyangs dag dang sil snyan sgre phyung ste//mchod pa byas nas lhung bzed dbul bar bya//snod de chos kyi rang bzhin mi shigs pa//snod 'di rdo ba'i rang bzhin bzhes su rung //gzhan gyis
277a7(mdo sde): blong bar bzod pa ma yin gyis//da ni bdag cag de dag len du dong //de nas rgyal po chen po bzhis rang gi gnyen dang 'khor du bcas te me tog dang /bdug pa dang /spos dang phreng ba
277b1(mdo sde): dang /byug pa dang sil snyan dang /pheg rdob pa dang /glu dbyangs len cing rang rang gi lag tu lhung bzed de dag thogs nas/de bzhin gshegs pa ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/de bzhin gshegs
277b2(mdo sde): papal mchod pa byas te/lhung bzed de dag lha'i me tog gis bkang nas de bzhin gshegs pa la phul lo//dge slong dag de nas de bzhin gshegs pa 'di snyam du dgongs te/rgyal po chen po dang
277b3(mdo sde): pa dang ba bzhi po 'di dag gis bdag la rdo'i lhung bzed bzhi phul na/bdag la ni bzhir mi rung la/ji ste gcig gi blangs na ni gsum yang mi dga' bar 'gyur na/bdag gis lhung bzed bzhi po 'di
277b4(mdo sde): dag blangs te lhung bzed gcig tu byin gyis brlab bo snyam mo//dge slong dag de nas de bzhin gshegs pas phyag g.yas pa brkyang ste/rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu la tshigs su bcad pas
277b5(mdo sde): bka' stsal pa/bde bar gshegs pa lhung bzed phul zhig dang //khyod ni theg pa mchog gi snod du 'gyur//nga 'dra dag la lhung bzed phul ba ni//dran dang blo gros nams kyang nyams mi 'gyur//
277b6(mdo sde): dge slong dag de nas de bzhin gshegs pas thugs brtse bar dgongs te/rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu las lhung bzed bzhes so//bzhes nas kyang rgyal po chen po yul 'khor srung la tshigs
277b7(mdo sde): su bcad pas bka' stsal pa/gang zhig de bzhin gshegs la lhung bzed 'bul//nams kyang dran dang shes rab nyams mi 'gyur//bsil dngos go 'phang sangs rgyas thob bar du//bde
278a1(mdo sde): bas bde bar dus rnams zad par byed//dge slong dag de nas de bzhin gshegs pas thugs brtse bar dgongs te/rgyal po chen po yul 'khor srung las lhung bzed ba zhes
278a2(mdo sde): so//bzhes nas kyang rgyal po chen po 'phags skyes po la tshigs su bcad pas bka' stsal pa/rnam par dag sems de bzhin gshegs pa la//khyod kyis yongs dag lhung bzed phul cig
278a3(mdo sde): dang //khyod kyi sems ni myur du dag par 'gyuraro//lha mi 'jig rten dag na bsngags par 'os//dge slong dag de nas de bzhin gshegs pas thugs brtse bar dgongs te/rgyal po chen po
278a4(mdo sde): 'phags skyes po las lhung bzed bzhes so//bzhes nas kyang rgyal po chen po mig mi bzang la tshigs su bcad pas bka' stsal pa/skyon med sems dang dad pas skyon med snod//de bzhin
278a5(mdo sde): gshegs pa tshul khrims skyon med cing //tshul skyon med la rab tu phul zhig dang //khyod kyi sbyin pa bsod nams skyon med 'gyur//dge slong dag de ltar de bzhin gshegs pas thugs
278a6(mdo sde): brtse dar dgongs te/rgyal po chen po mig mo bzang las lhung bzed bzhes so//bzhes nas kyang mos pa'i stobs kyi lhung bzed gcig tu byin gyis brlabs te/de'i tshe ched du brjod
278a7(mdo sde): pa 'di ched du brjod do//nga yis sngon gyi srid par snod kyi rnams//bzang byas 'bras bus rab tu bkang ste byin//de nas lhung bzed dbyibs legs bzhi po 'di//rdzu 'phrul chen po'i
278b1(mdo sde): lha bzhi rnams kyis byin//de la 'di skad ces bya ste//brtan pa dam pa'i don de dgongs pa de//zhag bdun byang chub shing mchog gzigs nas ni//seng ge'i stabs 'dra mi yi seng ge de//sa ni rnam
278b2(mdo sde): pa drug tu bskyod nas bzhengs//glang po'i dbang ltar kun tu dal gyis gshegs//rim gyis sgrol rgyu'o shing gi drung byon nas//lhun po lta bur g.yo ba mi mnga' bzhugs//thub pa bsam gtan//
278b3(mdo sde): ting nge 'dzin rnams dgongs//de yi tshe na ga gon bzang po spun//gnyis dang tshong pa'i tshogs dang shing rta ni//nor gyis gang ba dag dang lhan cig tu//sA la'i me tog nags tshal rgyas par
278b4(mdo sde): zhugs//dang song chen po'i gzi yis slad cig tu//sog shing thugs par 'phang los nang nub//de dag de 'dra ba yi gnas mthong nas//tshong pa'i tshogs ni 'jigs pa chen po skyes//de
278b5(mdo sde): dag ral gri mda' dang mdung thung thogs//nags na ri dgas bzhin du su zhes 'chol//sprin med 'od zer stong ldan 'dra ba'i rgyal//zhal ras ston gyi zla ba 'dra ba mthong //khro ba spongs shing
278b6(mdo sde): rgyags pas bsal nas su//mgo bos phyag 'tshal 'di ni su zhes dpyod//mkha' las lha yis 'di skad tshig smras te//'di ni sangs rgyas 'jig rten phan don mdzad//nyin bdun mtshan
278b7(mdo sde): bdun bza' dang 'atung ba dag/thugs rje'i bdag nyid 'di ni ma gsol to//gal te bdag gis nyon mongs ni 'dod no//sku dang thugs bsgoms 'di la bshos gsol zhig/de dag gis ni sgra
279a1(mdo sde): snyan de zos nas//rgyal la phyag 'tshal bskor ba byas nas ni//dga' nas de dag grogs dang lhan cig tu//rgyal ba bshos gsol bar ni gros bcad do//dge slong dag de'i
279a2(mdo sde): tshe tshang ba gagon dang bzang po gnyis kyi ba'i khyu mtha' 'khob kyi 'or zhig na gnas so//de nas de'i tshe ba de dag banos nas mar gyi nying khu drung bar gyur to//de nas pa lang rdzid dag gis mar gyi
279a3(mdo sde): nyid khu de khyer nas/tshong pa gla gron dang bzang po ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/de dag gis tshul smos te/btsun pa dag mkhyen par mdzad du gsol/khyed kyi ba thams cad ni bzhos
279a4(mdo sde): na/mar gyi nying khu byung na 'di ci dge ba zhig lags sam/'on te mu lcags/de na bram ze zas la brkam pa'i rang bzhin can dag 'di skad ces 'di ni dge ba ma yin te/bram ze rnams
279a5(mdo sde): la mchod sbyin chen po bya dgos so zhes 'dzer to//dge slong dag de'i tshe tshong pa gA gon dang bzang po dag gi tshe rabs snga ma'i snag gi gnyen mtshams bram ze rma bya zhes bya ba tshangs pa'i 'jig
279a6(mdo sde): rten du skyes par gyur pa des bram ze'i gzugs su sprul nas/tshong pa de dag la tshigs su bcad de smras pa//khyod kyis sngon ni smon btab pa//byang chub brnyes nas de bzhin gshegs/
279a7(mdo sde): bdag cag rnams kyi bshos gsol te//chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar shog/smon lam de ni rdzogs zin gyis//byang chub brnyes pa de bzhin gshegs//de la zhal zas phul zhig
279b1(mdo sde): dang //gsol nas 'khor lo bskor bar 'gyur//khyed kyi dmar nying khu byung //shin tu bkra shis skar ma bzang //drang srong chen po de yi ni//bsod nams las kyi mthu 'di'o//de ltar tshong pa
279b2(mdo sde): bskul nas ni//rma bya rang gi gnas su song //ga gon zhes ni bya la sogs//thams cad yid ni mgu bar gyur//ba stong 'o ma ji snyed yod pa dag/de kun ma lus par ni bsdus nas su//
279b3(mdo sde): de yi steng nas spris ma bo zham byas te//de dag rab tu gus par zhal zas sbyor//rin chen gzhong pa tshim byed ces bya ba//skad cig la yang 'bum phrag cigar ba//gtsang mar rib bkrus ng+ge
279b4(mdo sde): ma med byas nas//zhal zos kyis ni khangad chang du bkang //sbrang rtsi dang ni ron chen gzhong thogs te//sgro la rgyu'i shong gi drung song ston pa la//btsun pa bzhes te bdag cag sman yang thogs//
279b5(mdo sde): zhal zas gya nom pa 'ad mnabs su gsol//spun gnyis po la thugs brtse mdzad pa dang //byang chub zhugs pa'i sngon gyi bsam mkhyen nas//ston pa bzhes pa mdzad de zhal zas gsol/
279b6(mdo sde): gsol nas gzhong pa nam mkha'i dkyil du bor//lha yi bu pho rang tshangs zhes bya ba//de yi rin chen gzhong pa mchog de blangs//des de dung chings pa'i 'jig rten na//lha gzhan grogs
279b7(mdo sde): dang lhan cig mchod pa byed//de nas de'i tshe de bzhin gshegs pas tshong pa go gon dang bzang po de dag la 'di dag gis rab tu dga' bar mdzad do//lha yi bkra shis don sgrub cing //phyogs
280a1(mdo sde): rnams bkra shes byed pa des//khyed kyi don rnams 'grub gyur cig/thams cad myur du mthun par shog/phreng ba mgo la 'dug pa ltar//lag pa g.yas na dpal yod
280a2(mdo sde): shog/g.yon na'ang dpal ni gnas gyur cig/yan lag kun na'ang dpal yod shog/tshong pa dag ni nor tshol zhing //phyogs bcu dag tu 'gro ba rnams//rnyed pa chen po rnyed gyur
280a3(mdo sde): cing //de dag bde ba skyed par shog/dgos pa la la gang gi phyir//shar phyogs su ni 'gro ba na//gang dag phyogs der gnas pa yi//rgyu skar khyed la skyod gyur cig/smin drug dang
280a4(mdo sde): ni snar ma dang //mgo dang lag dang nabs so dang //rgyal dang skag ces bya ba ste//de dag rnams ni shar phyogs pa//rgyu skar bdun po de dag ni//'jig rten skyong ba grags ldan pa//
280a5(mdo sde): shar phyogs 'ogs na yod ces bstan//de dag khyed la kun tu srungs//de dag bdag po rgyal po ni//yul 'khor srung zhes grags pa ste//de ni dri za kun gyi bdag/nyi ma lhan cig
280a6(mdo sde): srung ngar shog/de la bu ni mang yod la//mkhas shing ming yang mthun pa ste//dgu bcu rtsa gcig zad par yang //dbang po zhes bya stobs po che//de rnams khyed la nad med cing //
280a7(mdo sde): shes pa lhag par skyong gyur cig/shar phyogs logs kyi phyogs chan//lha mo gzhon nu brgyad yod de//rgyal dang rnam par rgyal ma dang //don grub ma dang mi 'ang ma dang //dga'
280b1(mdo sde): mchog ma dang dga' sde dang //dpa' can ma dang dga' 'phel ma//de dag khyed la nad med cing //shes par lhag par skyong bar shog/shar phyogs logs kyi phyogs chan//gzhi 'dzin zhes
280b2(mdo sde): bya'i mchod rten yod//rgyal ba skob pa dag bcom pa//de rnams kyis ni bzhugs shing mkhyen//de yang khyed la nad med cing //shis par lhag par skyong gyur cig/phyogs na khyed cag bde
280b3(mdo sde): bar shog/khyad cag sdig par mo gyur ci ge/lha rnams kun gyis rab bsrungs nas//nor rnams rnyed de ldog par shog/dgos pa la la gang gi phyir//lho phyogs su ni 'gro ba na//gang dag/
280b4(mdo sde): phyogs der gnas pa yi//rgyu skar khyed la stong gyur cig/mchu dang bre dang dbo dang ni//mi bzhi nag pa lnga pa yin//sa ri dang ni sa ga ste//de dag rnams ni lho phyogs pa//rgyu skar bdun
280b5(mdo sde): po de dag ni//'jig rten skyong ba grags ldan pa//lho phyogs logs na yod ces bstan//de dag khyed la kun tu srungs//de dag bdag po rgyal po ni//'phags skyes po zhes bya bar
280b6(mdo sde): brjod//de ni grul bur kun gyi bdag/gshin rje lhan cig srung bar shog/de la bu ni mang yod la//mkhas shing ming yang mthun pa ste//dgu bcu rtsa gcig zad par yang //dbang
280b7(mdo sde): po zhes bya stobs pa che//de rnams khyed la nad med cing //shes par lhag par skyong gyur cig/lho phyogs logs kyi phyogs cha no//lha mo gzhon nu brgyad yod de//dpal ldan ma dang
281a1(mdo sde): grags ldan ma//grags pa thob dang grags 'dzin dang //legs par langs dang rab snga dang //legs par sad dang bde sgrub ma//de dag khyed la nad med cing //shis par
281a2(mdo sde): lhag par skyong bar shog/lho phyogs logs kyi phyogs cha na//pad+ma zhes bya'i mchod rten yod//rtag tu gzi brjid kyis kyang 'bar//rtag tu thams cad gsal byed pa//de yang khyed la nang
281a3(mdo sde): med cing //shis par lhag par skyong gyur cig/phyogs na khyed cag bde bar shog/khyed cag sdig par ma gyur cig/lha rnams kun gyis rab srungs nas//nor rnams rnyed do ldog par
281a4(mdo sde): shog/dgos pa la la gang gi phyir//nub phyogs su ni 'gro ba na//gang dag phyogs der gnas pa yi//rgyu skar khyed la skyong gyur cig/lha mtshams dang ni snron dang yang //brtson 'grus
281a5(mdo sde): brtan ldan sbubs dang ni//chu stod chu smad bye bzhin dang //gro bzhin te ni bdun pa yin//rgyu skar bdun po de dag ni//'jig rten skyong ba grags ldan pa//nub phyogs logs na yod
281a6(mdo sde): ces bsten//de dag khyed la kun tu srungs//de dag bdag po rgyal po ni//mig mi bzang zhes bya bar shes//de ni klu rnams kun gyis bdag/chu lha lhan tsog srung bar shog/de la
281a7(mdo sde): bu ni mang yod la//mkhas shing ming yang mthun pa ste//dgu bcu rtsa gcig zad par yang //dbang po zhes bya stobs po che//de dag khyed la nad mod cing //shis par lhag
281b1(mdo sde): par skyong gyur cig/nub phyogs logs kyi phyogs chan//lha mo gzhon nu brgyad yod de//rna cha sgra 'dres ma dang ni//pad+ma dkar dang skya reng dang //cha med gcig dang dgu pa dang //rol dang gnag
281b2(mdo sde): dang stobs myur srid//de dag khyed la nad med cing //shis par lhag par skyong bar shog/nub phyogs logs kyi phyogs chan//nub ces bya ba'i ri bo yod//nyi ma zla ba rnams kyang gnas//nu
281b3(mdo sde): pa'ang khyed la nor sbyin gyur//de yang khyed la nad med cing //shis par lhag par skyong gyur cig/phyogs na khyed cag bde bar shog/khyed cag sdig par ma gyur cig/lha rnams kun gyis
281b4(mdo sde): rab bsrungs nas//nor rnams rnyed de ldog par shog/dgos pa la la gang gi phyir//byang phyogs su ni 'gro ba na//gang dag phyogs der gnas pa yi//rgyu skar khyed la skyong gyur cig/mon
281b5(mdo sde): gru dang ni mon gre dang //khrums stod dang yang khrums smad dang //nam gru dang ni tho skar dang //brany+tsi ste na bdun pa yin//rgyu skar bdun po de dag ni//'jig rten skyong ba gragos ldan pa//byang
281b6(mdo sde): phyogs logs na yod ces bstan//de dag khyed la kun tu srungs//de dag bdag po rgyal po ni//mi la zhon pa lus ngan po//gnod sbyin kun gyi bdag po ste//nor bzeng lhan cig
281b7(mdo sde): srung bar shog/de la bu ni mang yod la//mkhas shing ming yang mthun pa ste//dgu bcu rtsa gcig zad par yang //dbang po zhes bya stobs po che//de dag khyed la nad med cing /shis
282a1(mdo sde): par lhag par sbyong gyur cig/byang phyogs logs kyi phyogs chan//lha mo gzhon nu brgyad yod de//rab chags lha mo stong lha mo//sa dang de bzhin pad+ma can//rgyal
282a2(mdo sde): po che la nyer gnas dang //ro dang khrel yod dpal ldan ma//de dag khyed la nad med cing //shis par lhag par skyong bar shog/byang phyogs logs kyi phyogs cha na//spos ngang
282a3(mdo sde): ldang ba'i ri bo yod//gnod sbyin 'byung po rnams kyi gnas//rtse mo sna tshogs lta na sdug/de yang khyed la nad mod cing //shis por lhag par skyong gyur cig/phyogs na khyed cag
282a4(mdo sde): bde bar shog/khyed cag sdig par ma gyur cig/lha rnams kun gyis rab bsrungs nas//nor rnams rnyed de ldog par shog/rgyu skar nyi shu rtsa brgyad po//phyogs bzhi dag na
282a5(mdo sde): bdun bdun gnas//lha yi bu mo sum cu gnyis//phyogs bzhi dag na brgyad brgyad gnas//dge sbyong brgyad dang bram ze brgyad//yul rnams na ni grong rdal brgyad//dbang por
282a6(mdo sde): bcas pa'i lha brgyad rnams//de dag khyed la kun tu srungs//khyed cag 'gro na'ang bkra shis gyur//ldog pa na yang bkra shis shog/gnyen la lta ba bkra shis gyur//gnyen
282a7(mdo sde): gyis blta ba'ang bkra shis shog/dbang bcas gnod sbyin rgya chen dang //dgra bcom pa dag snying brtse bas//thams cad du ni bkra shis dang //bdud rtsi shis pa thob par shog/
282b1(mdo sde): tshangs pa dang ni de bzhin nor rgyas dang //zag pa med pa rnam par grol rnams dang //klu dang gnod sbyin rtag tu snying brdzes bsrung //ston brgyar mtshungs par tshe ni skyong bar shog/rnam 'dren zla
282b2(mdo sde): med 'jig rten mgon po yis//de dag mthun par sbyin pa'i bsngags pa gsungs//khyed rnams kyi ni dge ba'i las 'di yis//sbrang rtsi 'byung zhes bya ba'i rgyal bar 'gyur//'jig rten rnam
282b3(mdo sde): bar 'dren pa rgyal ba yis//lung bstan chags medo 'di ni dang po yin//phyin chad byang chub sems dpa' mtha' yas mang //gang dag lung bstan de dag phyir mi ldog/rgyal bas lung bstan
282b4(mdo sde): pa ni 'di thos nas//sems ni mgu zhing mchog tu dga' gyur te//de dag sngun dang grogs dang lhan cig tu//de dag sangs rgyas chos la skyabs su dong //ga gon dang bzang po'i le'u
282b5(mdo sde): zhes bya ba ste/nyi shu rtsa bzhi pa'o////dge slong dag de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa shing sgrol rgyu'i drung na bzhugs pa dang po mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa gcig
282b6(mdo sde): pu dben par gshegs te/nang du yang dag bzhag nas 'jig rten dang mthun par mdzad pa'i phyir 'di snyam du dgongs te/kye ma ngas thob cing mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i chos 'di ni
282b7(mdo sde): zab pa/zhi ba rab tu zhi ba/nye bar zhi ba gya nom pa/mthong bar dka' ba/khong du chud par dka' ba/brtag mi nus pa rtog ge'i spyod pa ma yin pa 'phags pa mkhas pa dang 'dzangs pas rig
283a1(mdo sde): pa ste/'di lta ste phung po thams cad bor ba kun tu rig pa/nges par rig pa/tshor ba thams cad 'gog pa/don dam pa kun gzhi med pa bsil ba'i dngos po len pa
283a2(mdo sde): med pa nye bar len pa med pa/rnam par rig pa ma yin pa/rnam par rig par bya ba ma yin pa/'dus ma byas pa yul drug las shin tu 'das pa/mi rtog pa rnam par mi rtog pa/brjod
283a3(mdo sde): du med pa sgra med pa sgras brjod du med pa/bstan du med pa thogs pa med pa/dmigs pa thams cad laso yang dag par 'das pa/zhi gnas kyi lam gyis chod pa/stong pa nyid
283a4(mdo sde): dmigs su med pa/sred pa zad pa/'dod chags dang bral ba 'gog pa mya ngan las 'das pa ste/gal te bdag gis chos 'di gzhan dag la bstan la//gal te de dag gis ma
283a5(mdo sde): shes na/de ni bdag ngal ba dang /log par brtsal ba dang /chos bstan pa don med par 'gyur gyis/bdag snying las chung ngur kha rog par gnas par bya snyam mo//de'i tshe tshigs
283a6(mdo sde): su bcad pa 'di dag gsungs so//zab zhi rdul bral 'od gsal 'dus ma byas//bdud rtsi chos ni bdag gis thob par gyur//bdag gis bstan kyang gzhan gyis mi shes te//
283a7(mdo sde): mi sma nags 'dabs gnas par bya ba snyam//tshig brel dag gi lam gyis mo gos pa//de bzhin nyid chos rang bzhin nam mkha' 'dra//sems dang yid kyis rgyu ba rab grol ba//
283b1(mdo sde): mchog rab ngo mtshar che ba dam pa shes//don tshul 'di ni yi ge rnams kyis su//shes par mi nus 'dzangs pas rig pa yin//sngon gyi rgyal la lhag byas sems can rnams//de dag
283b2(mdo sde): chos 'di thos na yid ches 'gyur//'di na chos ni gang yang yod min te//yod med gang yin de ni yod ma yin//gang gis rgyu dang bye ba brgyud shes pa//de la yod pa'am med pa yod
283b3(mdo sde): ma yin//bskal pa brgya stong dpag tu med par ni//sngon gyi rgyal ba'i gan nas bdag gis spyad//'on kyang gang na bdag dang sems can dang //srog med bzod pa de ni bdag ma thob//
283b4(mdo sde): gang tshe 'di na skye 'chi gang med pa//chos 'di thams cad rang bzhin bdag med pa'i//bzod 'od bdag gis thob pa de yi tshe//sangs rgyas mar me mdzad kyis bdag lung bstan//'jig rten
283b5(mdo sde): kun la snying rje mtha' yas nga //gzhan gyis gsol ba btab la nga mi sdod//skye bo 'di dag tshangs la dad pa ste//de yis gsol ba btab na 'khor lo bskor//gal te tshangs pas nga yi
283b6(mdo sde): rkang par gtugs//rnam pa bzang po 'tshal 'gyur sems can mchis//rdul phral gya nom chos shod gsol btab na//de ltas nga yi chos 'di gzung 'os 'gyur//dge slong dag de ltar
283b7(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pas de'i tshe smin mtshams kyi mdzod spu nas 'od gang gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di snang ba chen pos khyab par 'gyur ba'i 'od phyung ngo //de nas
284a1(mdo sde): stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i bdag po tshangs pa chen po gtsug phud can sangs rgyas kyi mthus de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs kyi rnam par rtog pa sems kyis shes te/bcom ldan
284a2(mdo sde): 'das thugs las chung ngu la thugs btud cing chos mi ston par shes nas/de 'di snyam du sems te/bdag song la de bzhin gshegs pa la chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar bskul gor
284a3(mdo sde): ma chag snyam mo//de nas tshangs pa gtsug phud can gyis de'i tshe/de ma yin pa tshangs ris kyi lha'i bu gzhan dag la smras pa/grogs po dag de bzhin gshegs pas bla na med pa yang
284a4(mdo sde): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas kyang /'di ltar chos mi ston par thugs las chung ngu la thugs btud pas/kye ma 'jig rten 'di ni ma rung ngo //
284a5(mdo sde): grogs po dag kye ma 'jig rten 'di ni rnam par ma rung ngo //bdag cag dong ste de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar
284a6(mdo sde): bskul gor ma chag go/dge slong dag de nas tshangs pa chen po gtsug phud can tshangs pa 'bum phrag drug cu rtsa brgyad kyis bskor te/mdun du bdar nas de bzhin gshegs pa ga la ba
284a7(mdo sde): der song ste phyin pa dang /de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/thal ma sbyar nas de bzhin gshegs pa la 'di skad ces gsol to//'di ltar de bzhin
284b1(mdo sde): gshegs pas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas kyang chos mi ston par thugs las chung ngu la thugs btud pas kye ma'o bcom ldan 'das
284b2(mdo sde): 'jig rten 'di ni ma rung ngo //kye ma'o bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten 'di ni rab tu ma rung ngo //sems can rnam pa bzang ba go sla ba/bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa'i don 'tshal bar
284b3(mdo sde): rdo thug pa/skal ba dang ldan pa/nus pa dang ldan pa dag mchis te/de lta lags pas bcom ldan 'das chos legs par bstan du gsol/bde bar gshegs pa chos bstan du gsol/
284b4(mdo sde): de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag kyang smras so//ye shes chen po mchog gi dkyil 'khor bsgrubs nas ni//phyogs bcu dag tu 'od zer rnam par 'gyed mdzad de//ye shes zer
284b5(mdo sde): gyis mi yi pad+ma kha 'byed pa//smra ba'i nyi ma de ring ci slad btang snyoms bzhugs//'phags pa'i nor la sems can dag ni mgron gnyer te//srog chags bye ba mang po dbugs phyung
284b6(mdo sde): mdzad nas ni//gang skad mi gsung 'gro la btang snyoms mdzad pa 'di//'jig rten rtsa lag khyod la rigs pa ma lags so//ches kyi dam pa'i rnga bo tsha ni brdung du gsol//dam
284b7(mdo sde): pa'i chos kyi dung ni myur du bud du gsol//chos kyi mchod sdong chen po bsgreng bar mdzad du gsol//chos kyi mar me chen po 'bar bar mdzad du gsol//chos chu mchog gi char pa
285a1(mdo sde): rab tu dbab tu gsol//srid pa'i rgya mtshor gnas pa 'di dag bsgral du gsol//nad chen nyon mongs 'di dag thar bar mdzad du gsol//nyon mongs mes gdungs rab
285a2(mdo sde): tu zhi bar mdzad du gsol//bde ba shis pa rims med mya ngan med gyur pa//zhi ba'i lam ni khyod kyis nges par bstan du gsol//mya ngan 'das pa'i lam du mi 'gro mgon med pa//log
285a3(mdo sde): pa'i lam du gnas la mgon po thugs rje mdzod//rnam par thar pa'i sgo rnams rab tu dbye bar gsol//chos tshul 'khrug pa ma mchis de ni gzung du gsol//skye bo dmus long du ni
285a4(mdo sde): gyur pa de dag la//mgon po khyod kyis chos mig dam pa sbyang du gsol//mi yi zla ba mgon po khyod ni ma gtogs par//'jig rten dag gi skye dang rga ba sel bgyid pa//tshangs pa'i/
285a5(mdo sde): 'jig rten dang ni lha yi 'jig rten dang //gnod sbyin dri za mi yi 'jig rten na ma mchis//lha rnams thams cad lhag par spyad par bgyis nas ni//bdag ni chos rgyal khyod la gsol
285a6(mdo sde): ba 'debs pa lags//bsod nams 'di yis bdag kyang rab tu myur bar ni//chos kyi 'khor lo dam pa rab tu bskor gyur cig/dge slong dag de bzhin gshegs pas lha dang
285a7(mdo sde): mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten rjes su gzung ba'i phyir//thugs brtse bar dgongs te/tshangs pa chen po gtsug phud can la cang mi gsung bas gnang ngo //de nas tshangs
285b1(mdo sde): pa chen po gtsug phud can gyis de bzhin gshegs pas cang mi gsung bas gnang bar rig nas/lha'i tsan+dan gyi phye ma dang /a ga ru'i phye mas de bzhin gshegs pa la gtor nas dga' ba dang
285b2(mdo sde): mchog tu dga' ba skyes te/de nyid du mi snang bar gyur to//dge slong dag de nas de bzhin gshegs pas chos la 'jig rten gus pa bskyed pa dang /tshangs pa chen po gtsug phud can yang
285b3(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa la yang dang yang du bskul bas dge ba'i rtsa ba rnam par spel ba dang /chos kyang shin tu zab pa'i phyir yang gcig pu dben par gshegs te/nang du yang dag bzhag
285b4(mdo sde): nas/thugs la 'di lta bur rnam par rtog par gyur te/bdag gis chos zab pa phra ba/gsal ba/khong du chud par dka' ba/brtag mi nus pa/rtog ge'i spyod yul ma yin pa/
285b5(mdo sde): mkhas pa dang 'dzangs pas rig pa/'jig rten thams cad dang mi mthun pa/mthong bar dka' ba/phung po thams cad bor ba/'du byed thams cad nye bar zhi ba/zhi gnas kyi lam
285b6(mdo sde): gyis chud pa/stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa/sred pa zad pa/'dod chags dang bral ba/'gog pa/mya ngan las 'das pa 'di mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/gal te bdag
285b7(mdo sde): gis chos 'di bstan pa/gzhan gyis bdag gis khong du ma chud na de ni bdag la shin tu mtho 'tshams par 'gyur gyis bdag snying las chung ngur gnas pas gnas par bya gor ma chag
286a1(mdo sde): snyam mo//dge slong dag de nas sangs rgyas kyi mthus/tshangs pa chen po gtsug phud can gyis yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs kyi rnam par rtog pa de lta bu de sems kyis
286a2(mdo sde): shes nas/lha'i dbang po brgya byin ga lnga ba der song ste phyin nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces smras so//kau shi ka shes par gyis shig/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang
286a3(mdo sde): dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ni chos mi bsten par thugs las chung ngu la thugs btud de/'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas chos mi
286a4(mdo sde): ston par thugs las chung ngu la thugs btud pas/kau shi ka kye ma'o 'jig rten 'di ni ma rung bar 'gyur ro//kau shi ka kye ma'i 'jig rten 'di ni rnam par ma rung bar 'gyur ro//kye ma'o
286a5(mdo sde): 'jig rten 'di ni ma rig pa'i mun pa chen por bcug par 'gyur na/bdag cag de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la chos kyi 'khor lo bskor
286a6(mdo sde): bar bskul du ci'i phyir mi 'dod/de ci'i phyir zhe na/ma bskul bar de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi 'khor lo mi skor ba'i phyir ro//grogs po legs so zhes te/brgya byin dang /
286a7(mdo sde): tshangs pa dang /so bla'i lha rnams dang /bor snang ba rnams dang /rgyal chen bzhi'i ris dang /sum cu rtsa gsum dang /'thab bral dang /dga' ldan dang /'phrul dga' dang /
286b1(mdo sde): gzhan 'phrul dbang byed dang /tshangs ris dang /'od gsal dang /'bras bu che dang /dge rgyas dang /gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha'i bu brgya stong rab tu mang po kha dog mngon par 'phabs pa dag
286b2(mdo sde): nam sros pa dang /lha'i kha dog dang /lha'i snang bas shing sgrol rgyu'i drung nye tshe snang bar byas nas/de bzhin gshegs pa ga la ba der dong ste phyin pa dang /de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhabs
286b3(mdo sde): la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/bskor ba byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do//de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis de bzhin gshegs pa ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/de
286b4(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa la tshigs su bcad pas mngon par bstod do//zla ba nya ba gza' las thar pa ltar//khyod kyis thugs ni rnam par grol ba lags//g.yul los rnam par rgyal ba
286b5(mdo sde): bzhengs su gsol//'jig rten mun par shes rab 'od dbyung ba gsol//de skad ces gsol pa dang /de bzhin gshegs pa cang mi gsung bar bzhugs so//de nas tshangs pa
286b6(mdo sde): chen po gtsug pud can gyis lha'i dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces smras so//kau shi ka ji ltar khyod kyis bskul ba de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
286b7(mdo sde): sangs rgyas la chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar gsol ba mi gdab bo//de nas tshangs pa chen po gtsug phud cen gyis bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar te/pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la
287a1(mdo sde): btsugs nas/de bzhin gshegs pa ga la bde logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/de bzhin gshegs pa la tshigs su bcad pas gsol pa/g.yul las rnam
287a2(mdo sde): par rgyal ba bzhengs su gsol//'jig rten mun par shes rab 'od dbyung gsol//kun tu 'tshal bar 'gyur ba mchis lags kyis//thub pa khyod kyis chos ni bstan du gsor/
287a3(mdo sde): dge slong dag de skad ces gsol pa dang /de bzhin gshegs pas tshangs pa chen po gtsug phud can la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//tshangs pa ngas chos zab pa phra ba/gsal
287a4(mdo sde): ba 'di mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas zhes bya ba nas/de ni bdag la shin tu mtho 'tshams par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i bar du sbyor ro tshangs pa tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag nga la
287a5(mdo sde): rgyun tu snang mod kyi/nga'i lam rgyun las bzlog par 'gro ba zab pa/mthong bar dka' ba de ni 'dod chags kyis ldongs pa dag gis mo mthong ste/de lta bas na bstan kyang mi phan no//
287a6(mdo sde): skye dgu 'dod pa rnams la bcings//rgyun gyis rab tu 'dras pa yin//ngas 'di tshegs ni chen pos rnyed//de lta bas na bstan mi phan//dge slong dag de nas tshangs pa chen
287a7(mdo sde): po gtsug phud can dang /lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis de bzhin gshegs pa cang mi gsung bar gyur par rig nas/lha'i bu de dag dang lhan cig tu sdug bsngal zhing yid mi bde nas//
287b1(mdo sde): de nyid du mi snang bar gyur to//lan gsum gyi bar du de bzhin gshegs pa thugs las chung ngu la thugs btud do//dge slong dag de'i tshe yul ma gad+hA'i mi rnams la sdig pa mi dge ba'i lta bar
287b2(mdo sde): gyur pa 'di lta bu dag byung bar gyur te/'di lta ste/kha cig ni 'di skad du rlung ldang bar mi 'gyur ro zhes 'dzer ro//kha cig ni 'di skad du me 'bar bar mi 'gyur ro zhes 'dzer ro//kha cig
287b3(mdo sde): nino 'di skad du char 'bab par mi 'gyur ro zhes 'dzer ro//kha cig ni chu 'bab par mi 'gyur ro zhes 'dzer ro//kha cig ni lo tog skye bar mi 'gyur ro zhes 'dzer ro//kha cig ni bya rnams num
287b4(mdo sde): mkha' la 'phur bar mi 'gyur ro zhes 'dzer ro//kha cig ni sbrum ma rnams nad med par bca' bar mi 'gyur ro zhes 'dzer ro//dge slong dag de nas tshangs pa chen po gtsug phud can gyis
287b5(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs kyi rnam par rtog pa de lta bu de'ang shes/yul ma gA d+ha'i mi rnams kyi lta bar gyur pa de dag kyang rig nas/nam sros pa dang /kha dog mngon par 'phags
287b6(mdo sde): pa dang /lha'i snang bas shing sgrol rgyu'i drung thams cad snang bar byas nas/de bzhin gshegs pa ga la ba der song ste phyin pa dang /de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhabs la mgo bos
287b7(mdo sde): phyag 'tshal te/bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/de bzhin gshegs pa ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/de
288a1(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa la tshigs su bcad pa gsol pa//ma ga d+hAr ni sngon chos ma dag pa//dri mar bcas par sems pa'i smra ba byung //de slad thub pa bdud ci'i sgo
288a2(mdo sde): dbye gsol//dri med sangs rgyas chos ni nyan cing mchis//khyod ni rang gi dgos mdzod rang dbang gyur//sdug bsngal mngon par 'du byed de ma spangs//khyod kyi dge ba 'phrul dang
288a3(mdo sde): 'grib ma mchis//khyod 'di chos mchog pha rol byon par gyur//thub pa khyod 'dra 'jig rten 'dir ma mchis//drang srong tshe khyod ldog pa ga la mchis//srid gsum 'di na rnam
288a4(mdo sde): par lhang nge ste//lha min gnas na mchis pa'i ri bo 'dra//sdug bsngal skye bo thugs rje che bskyed gsol//khyod 'dra nam yang btang snyoms mdzad mi rigs//khyod ni mi 'jigs
288a5(mdo sde): stobs dang yang dag ldan//khyod ni skye bo rab tu sgrol bar spyod//lha dang dge sbyong bram zer bcas pa kun//skye dgu 'di dag ring na zug rngur bcas//nad rims ma mchis nang
288a6(mdo sde): ma mchis gyur cig/'di na de dag skyobs ni gzhan ma mtshos//chos de rgya bo bas thugs su chud gyur te//ji lta bzhin du mi nyung ston 'gyur zhes//dge ba'i sems kyis bdud
288a7(mdo sde): rtsi don gnyer zhing //lha dang mi rnams khyod phyir ring nas 'brang //de srad ma bu rgyal bzang po khyod la gas so//ring nas la mi les nyams pa'i sems can thul//mthos don nams
288b1(mdo sde): rab tu thos par 'tshal//shin tu nyam chung rtas par 'tshal dang 'dra//rab tu skam pa'i sa la sprin lta bur//'dren pa chos kyi char pas tshim par mdzod//ring nas nyams pa'i mi
288b2(mdo sde): rnams srid pa na//lha ngan thibs po cher mar bcas par rgyu//gang bsgoms na ni bdud rtsi thob 'gyur ba//tshor ma ma mchis drang lam de bstan gsol//long ba g.yang lhung 'dren
288b3(mdo sde): pa ma mchis pa//'di na de dag gzhan gyis drang mi nus//blo ldan khyu mchog khyod ni mos bskyed de//g.yang sa chen por lhung ba gdon du gsol//thub pa khyod dang ring nas rtag
288b4(mdo sde): mi 'jal//u dum wa ra'i me tog brgya lam ltar//'dren pa rgyal ba dag ni sa la 'byung //mgon po dal rnyed sems can dgol du gsol//rang rgal nas ni bsgral bar bya'o zhes//
288b5(mdo sde): sngon srid khyod kyi dgongs pa 'di 'byung ngo //da ltar khyod ni pha rol byon par nges//bden pa'i mthu rtsal thugs dam mang bar mdzod//thub pa chos kyi sgron mas mun pa sol//de bzhin
288b6(mdo sde): gshegs pa'i rgyal mtshan khyod kyis bsgreng //snyan pa'i gsung brjod pa yi dus la bab//rnga sgra ri dgas dbang ltar bsgrag tu gsol//dge slong dag de nas de bzhin gshegs pas
288b7(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'jig rten la gzigs na/sems can dman pa dang /'bring dang /gya nom dang /mtho ba dang /dma' ba dang /bar ma dang /
289a1(mdo sde): rnam pa bzang po dang /rnam par sbyang sla ba dang /rnam pa ngan pa dang /rnam par sbyang dka' ba dang /zur tsam gyis go ba dang /tshig lhur len pa dang /sems can
289a2(mdo sde): gyis phung po gsum ste/gcig ni log pa nyid du nges pa dang /gcig ni yang dag pa nyid du nges pa dang /gcig ni ma nges pa gzigs so//dge slong dag 'di lta ste dper na/mi
289a3(mdo sde): zhig rdzing gi 'gram na 'dug pas pad+ma kha cig ni chu'i nang nas ma 'thon/kha cig ni chu dang mnyam/kha cig ni chu las 'phags pa dag mthong ngo //dge slong dag de bzhin du de bzhin
289a4(mdo sde): gshegs pas sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'jig rten na sems can phung po gsum du rnam par gnas pa dag gzigs so//dge slong dag de nas de bzhin
289a5(mdo sde): gshegs pa 'di snyam du dgongs te/ngas chos bstan kyang rung /ma bstan kyang rung ste/gang log pa nyid du nges pa'i phung po 'di ni chos 'di shes par mi 'gyur ro//dam chos
289a6(mdo sde): bstan kyang rung ma bstan kyang rung ste/gang yang dag pa nyid du nges pa'i phung po 'di ni chos 'di shes par 'gyur ro//ma nges pa'i phung po gang yin pa 'di ni gal te chos bstan na ni shes
289a7(mdo sde): par 'gyur ji ste chos ma bstan na ni shes par mi 'gyur ro snyam mo//dge slong dag de nas de bzhin gshegs pas ma nges pa'i phung por rnam par gnas pa'i sems can rnams las
289b1(mdo sde): brnams te thugs rje chen po bskyed do//de nas de bzhin gshegs pas bdag nyid kyi yang dag pa'i ye shes 'di'i dbang du mdzad de/tshangs pa chen po gtsug phud can gyis bskul ba'ang
289b2(mdo sde): mkhyen nas/tshangs pa chen po gtsug phud can la tshigs su bcad pas bka' stsal pa/tshangs pa ma ga d+ha yi sems can gang //rna ba ldan zhing dad dang ldan gyur la//mi 'tsho 'du shes
289b3(mdo sde): rtag tu chos nyan pas//de dag la ni bdud rtsi'i sgo phye'o//de nas tshangs pa chen po gtsug phud can gyis de bzhin gshegs pas gnang bar rig nas tshim zhing mgu la yi rangs te/rab
289b4(mdo sde): tu dga' nas dga' ba dang yid bde ba skyes te/de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas de nyid du mi snang bar gyur to//dge slong dag de nas de'i tshe sa bla'i lha rnams
289b5(mdo sde): kyis bar snang gi lha rnams la tshig tu brjod cing sgra bsgrags pa/grogs po dag do mod de bzhin gshegs pa dag bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis chos kyi 'khor lo bskor
289b6(mdo sde): bar gnang ste/de ni skye bo mang po la phan pa dang /skye bo mang po la bde ba dang /'jig rten la thugs brtse ba dang /skye bo phal po che dang /lha dang mi rnams kyi don dang /phan pa dang /bde
289b7(mdo sde): bar 'gyur ro//kye grogs po dag lha ma yin gyi ris ni yongs su 'grib par 'gyur ro//lha'i ris ni yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/'jig rten na sems can mang po yongs su mya
290a1(mdo sde): ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ro//de ltar bar snang gi lha rnams kyis sa bla'i lha rnams las thos nas rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams la sgrar brjod do//rgyal chen bzhi'i
290a2(mdo sde): ris kyi lha rnams kyis sum cu rtsa gsum dang /'thab bral dang /dga' ldan dang /'phrul dga' dang /gzhan 'phrul dbang byed rnams la'o//de dag gis kyang tshangs ris kyi lha
290a3(mdo sde): rnams la tshig tu brjod cing sgra bsgrags te/grogs po dag do mod de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar gnang ste//
290a4(mdo sde): de ni skye bo mang po la phan pa dang /skye bo mang po la bde ba dang /'jig rten la thugs brtse ba dang /skye bo phal po che dang /lha dang mi rnams kyi don dang phan pa dang bde bar 'gyur ro//
290a5(mdo sde): grogaso po dag lha ma yin gyi ris ni yongs su 'grib par 'gyur ro//lha'i ris ni 'phel bar 'gyur ro//'jig rten na sems can mang po yongs su mya ngan las 'dra' bar 'gyur
290a6(mdo sde): ro//dge slong dag de ltar skad cig de dang /thang cig de dang /yud tsam de las bla'i lha rnams nas bzung ste/tshangs ris kyi lha'i bar man chad du grogs po dag de bzhin gshegs
290a7(mdo sde): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis do mod chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar gnang ste zhes bya ba nas snga ma bzhin du sgra skad cig mngon du byung bar gyur to//dge slong
290b1(mdo sde): dgra de nas byang chub kyi shing gi lha chos sred ces bya ba dang /chos 'dod dang /chos kyi blo gros dang /chos spyod dang /byang chub kyi shing gi lha bzhi po de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhabs
290b2(mdo sde): gnyis la gtugs te/'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das gang du chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar mdzad/dge slong dag de skad ces gsol pa dang /de bzhin gshegs pas lha de dag
290b3(mdo sde): la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//grong khyer bA rat+na sir drang srong lhung ba ri dgas kyi nags su'o//de dag gis gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das grong khyer bA rat+nA si ni skye bo'i tshogs chung ba lags
290b4(mdo sde): rigs kyi nags ni zhugs shing gi grib mo chung ba legs te/bcom ldan 'das grong khyer chen po 'byor pa/rgyas pa/bde ba/lo legs pa/nyams dgyes pa/mi dang skye bo mang
290b5(mdo sde): pos gang ba/skyed mas tshal dang nags dang nags 'dab kyis brgyan pa/gzhan dag kyang mchis no/bcom ldan 'das de dag cig tu chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar gsol/de bzhin
290b6(mdo sde): gshegs pasngo bka' stsal pa/bzhin bzang dag de skad ma zer cig/de ci'i phyir zhe na/der ni nga yis mchod sbyin stong phrag bye ba khrag khrig drug cu byas//der ni sangs rgyas stong
290b7(mdo sde): phrag byed khrag khrig drug cu de dag mchod//bA ra NA si dam pa de ni sngon gyis drang srong rnams kyi gnas//sa de lha dang klu yis mngon bstod rtag tu chos ni mngon par gzhol//ngas
291a1(mdo sde): ni sngon chad sangs rgyas bye ba stong phrag dgu bcu rtsa gcig dran//de dag drang srong zhes bya nags mchog der ni 'khor lo dam pa bskor//zhi zhing nyer zhi bsam gtan
291a2(mdo sde): mngon gyur rtag tu ri dgas rnams kyis bsten//de phyir drang sror zhes bya nags mchog der ni 'khor lo dam pa bskor//bskul ba'i le'u zhes bya ba ste/nyi shu rtsa lnga pa'o///
291a3(mdo sde): 'phags pa rgya cher rol pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo//bam po bcu bdun pa//dge slong dag de nas de bzhin gshegs pa bya ba mdzad pa/byed pa mdzad pa/bcings pa
291a4(mdo sde): thams cad yang dag par chad po/nyon mongs pa thams cad bsal ba/dri ma dang nyon mongs pa sbyangs pa/bdud phyir rgol ba bcom pa/sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyi tshul
291a5(mdo sde): gyis rjes su zhugs pa/thams cad mkhyen pa thams cad gzigs pa/stobs bcu dang ldan pa/mi 'jigs pa bzhi brnyes pa/sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad
291a6(mdo sde): rab tu rdzogs pa/spyan lnga dang ldan pa//sangs rgyas kyi spyan sgribs pa mi mnga' bas 'jig rten thams cad la gzigs nas 'di snyam du dgongs te ngas thams cad kyi thog mar gang
291a7(mdo sde): la'ang chos bstan por bya/sems can dag pa/rnam pa bzang ba/gdul sla ba/go sla ba/sbyang sla ba/'dod chags dang /zhe sdang dang gti mug chung ba/rnam par shes
291b1(mdo sde): pa lkog tu ma gyur pa gang chos ma thos na yongs su nyams par 'gyur ba/gang dag la bdag gis thog mar chos bstan par bya/gang la chos 'di bstan nas kyang shes par 'gyur zhing mtho
291b2(mdo sde): 'tsham par mi 'gyur ba ni gang yin snyam mo//dge slong dag de nas de bzhin gshegs pa 'di snyam du dgongs te/rangs byed kyi bu lhag spyod ni dag pa/rnam pa bzang ba/go sla ba/sbyang
291b3(mdo sde): snang /'dod chags dang zhe sdang dang gti mug chung ba/rnam par shes pa lkog tu ma gyur pa ste/de chos ma thos na yongs su nyams par 'gyur ba'o//de ni nyan thos rnams la 'du shes
291b4(mdo sde): med 'du shes med min skye mchid kyi brtul zhugs dang mthun par chos ston pa yin na/de da ltar ga la 'dug snyam dgongs pa dang /de 'chi ba'i dus byas nas deng du zhag bdun lon par
291b5(mdo sde): mkhyen to//lha rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhabs la gtugs te 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das de de lta lags so//bde bar gshegs pa de de lta lags te/
291b6(mdo sde): rangs byed kyi bu lhag spyod gum nas dang du dgung bdun lags so//dge slong dag ngas 'di snyam du bsams te/e ma rangs byed kyi bu lhag spyod de chos shin tu bzang po 'di lta bu 'di ma
