329b4(mdo sde): dog lta bur mngon par grub par gyur cing /sa'i phyogs gang du 'greng ba dang /'dug pa dang /'gro ba'i sa phyogs de dag kyang gser gyi kha dog lta bu'i 'od kyis snang bar gyur te/
329b5(mdo sde): des gos dmar po 'am/dkar po'am/gang dag gyon par gyur pa'i gros de dag thams cad kyang gser gyi kho dog lta bu nyid du kun tu snang ngo //bu mo de'ang skye bo'i tshogs
329b6(mdo sde): thams cad la dga' zhing yid gcugs pa dang /lta bas mi ngoms shing bka' blo bde la nges pa dang /'jam pa dang /sbyin pa dang /dga' bar smra zhing bzhin 'dzum pa
329b7(mdo sde): dang /shin tu mthun par 'dzin pa dang /khro gnyer med pa dang /mi rtsub pa dang /mi brlang bar gyur pas rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po de na rgyal bu gzhon nu rnams
330a1(mdo sde): dang /blon po'i bu gzhon nu rnams dang /tshong dpon gyi bu gzhon nu rnams dang /khyim bdag gi bu gang ji snyed pa de dag kyang de la shin tu chags shing yid
330a2(mdo sde): 'brang bar gyur te lta bas chog mi shes so//smad 'tshong ma'i bu mo gser mchog 'od dpal de skyed mos tshal lam/'bab chu 'am/rdzing bu 'am/khyim mam/lam po

330a6(mdo sde): dan bsgreng zhing me tog dang /bdug pa dang /spos dang /phye ma dang /me tog phreng gis mdzes par byas pa/me tog tsAs+sa ka'i phreng bas skar khung byas pa'i nang du
330a7(mdo sde): stan bzang po bshams pa la 'dug nas/'di ltar rtse zhing dgo' ba'i bsam pas shing rta de'i mdun du ni sil snyan dang /pheg rdob pa dang /glu dbyangs len pa dag gis
330b1(mdo sde): shing rta de'i phyi bzhin du ni nye bar spyad pa dang /yongs su spyad pa thogs pa thams cad rjes su 'brang la/skye bo'i tshogs chen po ltad mo lta ba'i bsam pa can dag kyang phyi bzhin
330b2(mdo sde): 'brang bar gyur cing skyed mos tshal gyi sar dong ngo //de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa nang du yang dge 'jog las langs te/sems can thams cad la snying rje chen po
330b3(mdo sde): skyes nas 'di snyam du sems te/su zhig rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul lam/kun brjod pa'i cho 'phrul lam/rjes su bstan pa'i cho 'phrul gyis 'dul bar 'gyur ba'i sems can
330b4(mdo sde): gang theg pa chen po la yongs su smin par bya snyam pa dang /'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas smad 'tshong ma'i bu mo gser mchog 'od dpal tshong dpon gyi bu 'jigs byin dang
330b5(mdo sde): lhan cig tu shing rta la zhon te skyed mos tshal gyi sar 'gro ba mthong ngo //mthong nas kyang gdul ba'i phyir de'i dbang po dang /stobs dang brtson 'grus kyi bye brag la rnam par
330b6(mdo sde): bltas na de sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa bo dang ldan zhing chos kun shes par bya ba'i nus pa dang /mthu dang /skal ba yod par rig nas/de'i tshe 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas
330b7(mdo sde): 'di lta bu rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du bye ba mngon par byas te/ji lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par byas pas/'di ltar rang gi lus bstan ma thag tu nyi ma dang zla ba'i 'od kyang
331a1(mdo sde): zil du brlag par byed na/sems can gzhan dag gi lta smos kyang ci dgos pa de lta bur rang gi lus mngon par sprul nas/gos gang gi 'od kyis dpag tshad
331a2(mdo sde): gcig tsam gyi khor yug snang bas snang bar byed pa'i gos de lta bu'ang lus la gyon par kun tu bstan to//rang gi lus rgyan thams cad kyis rnam par brgyan par yang bstan to//
331a3(mdo sde): de nas 'jam dpal gzhi ni nur gyur pas luso la gos dang rgyan thams cad kyis legs par brgyan nas lamA gang nas smad 'tshong ma'i bu mo gser mchog 'od dpal 'ong ba'i lam
331a4(mdo sde): de'i mdun logs su bsdad do//'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas der bsdad ma thag tu de nas tshong dpon gyi bu de'i shing rta'ang mog mog por gyur/smad 'tshong ma'i bu mo gser
331a5(mdo sde): mchog 'od dpal gyi lus thams cad kyang mog mog por gyur to//'di lta ste dper na/dzam+bu'i chu bo'i gser gyi drung du/snag tsha'i yug bzhag na lam mer mi 'dug/lhan
331a6(mdo sde): ner mi 'dug/lhung ngar mi 'dug go//de bzhin du 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i lus kyi 'od kyis reg pa na bu ma do'i lus kyang lam mer mi 'dug/lhan ner mi 'dug
331a7(mdo sde): lhang nger mi 'dug go/smad 'tshong ma'i bu mo gser mchog 'od dpal gyis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa lha'i bu gzhon nu ltar 'dug la/lus la rgyan gyis brgyan cing
331b1(mdo sde): gsal ba'i gos legs par gyon la/gos de las kyang 'od 'byung bar mthong ste/mthong ma thag tu de bdag gi lus la brnyas pa'i 'du shes dang /dman pa'i 'du shes skyes
331b2(mdo sde): shing gos de la'ang mngon par 'dod pa dang /bzud pa'i 'du shes skyes nas de 'di snyam du sems te/tshad dpon gyi bu 'dis chog gis bdag shing rta 'di las babs la 'di dang
331b3(mdo sde): lhan cig tu dga' ba dang /rtse ba dang /dga' mgur spyad lags 'di'ang bslang bar bya'o snyam mo//bu mo des de lta bu'i sems bskyed ma thag tu/de nas 'jam dpal gzhon
331b4(mdo sde): nur gyur pa'i byin gyis brlabs kyis rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bus bdag nyid mi'i gzugs su mngon par sprul nas bu mo de la 'di skad ces smras so//bu mo khyod skyes bu dam pa 'di
331b5(mdo sde): la kun tu chags pa'i sems ma skyed cig/de ci'i phyir zhe na/'di ni 'dod pa don du gnyer ba ma yin pa'i phyir ro//bu mos smras pa/'di su zhig yin/'di'i ming ci//
331b6(mdo sde): rnam thos kyi bus smras pa/'di ni byang chub sems dpa' ste/'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa zhes bya'o//bu mos smras pa/byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de ci zhig
331b7(mdo sde): yin/ci de lha 'am/'on te klu 'am/gnod sbyin nam/dri za 'am/lha ma yin nam/nam mkha' lding ngam/mi 'am ci'am/lto 'phye chen po'am/brgya byin
332a1(mdo sde): nam/tshangs pa 'am/'jig rten skyong ba'am/rgyal po chen po 'am/byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de ci zhig yin/rnam thos kyi bus smras pa/bu mo
332a2(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de ni lha'ang ma yin/klu'ang ma yin/gnod sbyin yang ma yin/dri za'ang ma yin/lha ma yin yang ma yin/nam mkha'i lding yang

332a4(mdo sde): ma yin te/bu mo de ni sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa kun yongs su rdzogs par byed pa ste/de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'o zhes bya'o//'di ni bslangs pa thams
332a5(mdo sde): cad sbyin par byed de/yongs su mi gtong ba ci'ang med pas de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya'o//de nas bu mo de 'di snyam du se mos te/de skad grags pa las na
332a6(mdo sde): 'dis bdag lo gos 'di sbyin par 'gyur ro snyam nas/de nas smad 'tshong ma'i bu mo gser mchog 'od dpal shing rngu dI las babs nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la
332a7(mdo sde): 'di skad ces smras so//'jam dpal gang khyod kyi sku la gsol ba'i na bza' 'di bdag la stsal du gsol/de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di'ang smras so//gal te khyod
332b1(mdo sde): ni byang chub la yang zhugs gyur na//'jam dbyangs na bza' 'di ni bdag la stsal du gsol//ser sna can gyi byang chub sems dpa' mi mdzes te//dper na chab dang bral
332b2(mdo sde): zhing skams pa'i klung dang mtshungs//'jam dpal gyis smras pa/gal te bu mo khyod ni byang chub zhugs gyur na//kho bos de ring gos 'di khyod la sbyin par bya//gang dag pa yo
332b3(mdo sde): ba med par byang chub sems la gnas//de dag 'di na lhar bcas 'jig rten mchod 'os yin//bu mos smras pa/byang chub ces bgyi tshig gi don ni gang zhig lags/de ni gang

332b5(mdo sde): gyis smras pa/sring mo brjod pa med pa dang /yi ge med pa dang /phung po dang /khams dang /skye mched dag las rnam par grol ba dang /stong pa dang /mtshan ma dag dang
332b6(mdo sde): bral ba dang /nyon mongs pa med pa dang /zhi ba dang /rab tu zhi ba dang /nye bar zhi ba ni byang chub ces bya'o//de skad ces smras nas/yang 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur

333a1(mdo sde): bgyi ba de gang lags/'jam dpal gyis smras pa/sring mo khyod nyid byang chub yin no//bu mos smras pa/'jam dpal khyod kyis gsungs pa'i don de
333a2(mdo sde): bdag gis ma 'tshal na ji ltar bdag byang chub lags/'jam dpal gyis skyes po/sring mo de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang drag por rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
333a3(mdo sde): shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba zhig bzhugs pa de 'di skad du/'di ltar lus mnyam pa nyid kyis byang chub mnyam pa nyid do//byang chub mnyam pa nyid kyis lus mnyam pa nyid do zhes
333a4(mdo sde): chos ston te/sring mo de'i phyir ngas khyod la 'di skad du khyod nyid byang chub bo zhes smras so//sring mo 'di ji snyam du sems/khyod kyi lus 'di la phung po dang /khams dang /
333a5(mdo sde): ste mched mngon par grub pa yod dam/de nas bu mo des bstan pa 'di thos nas de sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba'i rgyu mthun pas chos la snang ba skyes par gyur te/des snang ba
333a6(mdo sde): thob nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so//'jam dpal de ni da lta lags te/bdag gi lus 'di la phung po dang /khams dang /skye mched
333a7(mdo sde): dag mngon par grub lags so//'jam dpal gyis smras pa/sring mo 'di ji snyam du sems/gzugs la sems pa 'am/rnam par shes pa yod dam/bu mos
333b1(mdo sde): smras pa/'jam dpal de ni ma mchis so//'jam dpal gyis smras pa/sring mo byang chub kyang mi sems shing rnam par shes pa mad de/sring mo de'i phyir gzugs mnyam pa nyid
333b2(mdo sde): kyis byang chub mnyam pa nyid do//byang chub mnyam pa nyid kyis gzugs mnyam pa nyid do//sring mo de'i phyir ngas khyod la 'di skad du khyod nyid byang chub bo zhes smos so//sring mo 'di ji snyam
333b3(mdo sde): du sems/tshor ba dang /'du shos dang /'du byed rnams dang /rnam par shes pa la sems pa 'am/rnam par shes pa yod dam/bu mos smras pa/'jam dpal de ni ma
333b4(mdo sde): mchis so//'jam dpal gyis smras pa/sring mo byang chub kyang mi sems shing rnam par shes pa mi sems so//sring mo de'i phyir rnam par shes pa minyam pa nyid kyis byang chub mnyam
333b5(mdo sde): pa nyid do//byang chub mnyam pa nyid kyis rnam par shes pa mnyam pa nyid de//sring mo de'i phyir ngas khyod la 'di skad du khyod nyid byang chub bo zhes smras so//sring mo gozhan yang
333b6(mdo sde): gzugs nang ngam/phyi rol lam/gnyi ga med par ram/gzugs 'di sngon po 'am/ser po 'am/dmar po 'am/dkar po 'am/le brgan nam/shel dang /
333b7(mdo sde): dngul gyi kha dog gam/yul na gnas pa'am/phyogs na gnas paM zhes bstan par nus sam/bu mos smras pa/'jam dpal de ni ma lags so//'jam dpal gyis
334a1(mdo sde): smras pa/sring mo byang chub kyang nang ngam/phyi rol lam/gnyis ka med par ram/byang chub de sngon po 'am/ser po 'am/dmar po 'am/dkar po 'am/
334a2(mdo sde): le brgan nam/shel dang dngul gyi kha dog gam/yul na gnas pa 'am/phyogs na gnas pa zhes bston par mi nus te/sring mo de'i phyir gzugs mnyam pa nyid kyis byang
334a3(mdo sde): chub mnyam pa nyid do//byang chub mnyam pa nyid kyis gzugs mnyam pa nyid de/sring mo de'i phyir ngas khyod la 'di skad du khyod nyid byang chub bo zhes smras so//sring mo de bzhin
334a4(mdo sde): du tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed rnams dang /rnam par shes pa ning ngam/phyi rol lam/gnyis ka med par ramo/rnam par shes pa 'di sngon po'am/ser
334a5(mdo sde): po'am/dmar po 'am/dkar po'am/laM brgan nam/shel dang dngul gyi kha dog gam/yul na gnas pa'am/phyogs na gnas pa zhes bstan par nus sam/bu
334a6(mdo sde): mos smras pa/'jam dpal de ni ma lags so//'jam dpal gyis smras pa/sring mo byang chub kyang nang ngam/phyi rol lom/gnyis ka med par ram/byang chub de
334a7(mdo sde): sngon po 'am/ser po'am/dmar po 'am/dkar po'am/le brgan nam/shel dang dngul gyi kha dog gam/yul na gnas pa 'am/phyogs na gnas pa zhes bstan
334b1(mdo sde): par mi nus te/sring mo de'i phyir rnam par shes pa mnyam pa nyid kyi byang chub mnyam pa nyid do//byang chub mnyam pa nyid kyis rnam par shes pa mnyam pa nyid de/sring mo de'i phyir
334b2(mdo sde): ngas khyod la 'di skad du khyod nyid byang chub bo zhes smras so//sring mo gzhan yang phung po lnga ni sgyu ma lta bu ste/yod pa ma yin pa/phyin ci log las skyes shing yod pa ma yin pa//
334b3(mdo sde): phyin ci log gis tha snyad btagaso pa'o//sring mo byang chub kyang sgyu ma lta bu ste/yod pa me yin pa phyin ci log gis tha snyad btags pa ste/sring mo de'i phyir sgyu ma mnyam pa nyid
334b4(mdo sde): kyis phung po mnyam pa nyid do//phung po mnyam pa nyid kyis sgyu mi mnyam pa nyid do//sgyu ma mnyam po nyid kyis byang chub mnyam pa nyid do//byang chub monyam pa nyid kyis sgyu ma
334b5(mdo sde): mnyam pa nyid de/sring mo de'i phyir dus khyod la 'di skad du khyod nyid byang chub pa zhes smos so//snying mo gzhan yang phung po lnga ni rmi lam lta bu ste/shin tu mngon par mi grub
334b6(mdo sde): pa'o//sring mo byang chub kyang rmi lom gyi rang bzhin yin pas shin tu mngon par ma grub pa ste/sring mo de'i phyir rmi lam mnyam pa nyid kyis phung po mnyam pa nyid do//phung po
334b7(mdo sde): mnyam pa nyid kyis rmi lam mnyam pa nyid do//rmi lam mnyam pa nyid kyis byang chub mnyam pa nyid do//byang chub mnyam pa nyid kyis rmi lam mnyam pa nyid de/sring mo de'i phyir
335a1(mdo sde): ngas khyod la 'di skad du khyod nyid byang chub bo zhes smras so//snyid mo gzhan yang phung po lnga ni smig rgyu lta bu ste/'khrul pa'i las kyis bskyed pa'o//snying mo byung
335a2(mdo sde): chub kyang smig rgyu'i rang bzhin te/las kyi rnam por smin pa med pa'o//sring mo de'i phyir smig rgyu mnyam pa nyid kyis phung po mnyam pa nyid do//phung po mnyam pa nyid kyis smig
335a3(mdo sde): rgyu mnyam pa nyid do//smig rgyu mnyam pa nyid kyis byang chub mnyam pa nyid do//byang chub mnyam pa nyid kyis smig rgyu mnyam pa nyid de/sring mo de'i phyir ngas khyod la 'di skad du khyod
335a4(mdo sde): nyid byang chub do zhes smras so//sring mo gzhan yang phung po lnga ni gzugs brnyan lto bu ste/'pho ba med pa'o//sring mo byang chub kyang gzugs brnyan gyi rang bzhin te/'pho ba
335a5(mdo sde): med pa'o//sring mo de'i phyir gzugs brnyan mnyam pa nyid kyis phung po mnyam pa nyid do//phung po mnyam pa nyid kyis gzugs brnyan mnyam pa nyid do//gzugs brnyan mnyam
335a6(mdo sde): pa nyid kyis byang chub mnyam pa nyid do//byang chub mnyam pa nyid kyis gzugs brnyan mnyam pa nyid de/sring mo de'i phyir ngas khyod la 'di skad du khyod nyid byang chub bo zhes smras
335a7(mdo sde): so//sring mo gzhan yang phung po lnga ni ming tsam ste/ming de'ang g.yo ba med pa'o//sring mo byang chub kyang ming tsam ste/maung de'ang g.yo ba med pa'o//sring mo de'i phyir g.yo
335b1(mdo sde): bamed pa mnyam pa nyid kyis phung po mnyam pa nyid do//phung po mnyam pa nyid kyis g.yo ba med pa mnyam pa nyid do//gso ba med pa mnyam pa nyid kyis byang chub mnyam pa nyid do//
335b2(mdo sde): byang chub mnyam pa nyid kyis g.yo ba med pa mnyam pa nyid de/sring mo de'i phyir ngas khyod la 'di skad du khyod nyid byang chub bo zhes smras so//sring mo gzhan yang phung po rnams la byung
335b3(mdo sde): po po med de/ma byas pa'i don ni byang chub bo//phung po rnams la ngo bo nyid med de/ngo bo nyid med pa'i don ni byang chub bo//phung po rnams la 'byung ba med de/me byung ba'i don
335b4(mdo sde): ni byang chub bo//phung po rnams la rtog pa nyid med de/mi rtag pa'i don ni byang chub bo//phung po rnams lnga bdo ba nyid med de/sdug bsngal ba'i don ni byang chub bo//phung po
335b5(mdo sde): rnams la sdug pa med de/mi sdug pa'i don ni byang chub bo//phung po rnams la bdag med de/bdag med pa'i don ni byang chub bo//sring mo gzhan yong phung po rnams la
335b6(mdo sde): mngon par grub pa med de/mngon par ma grub pa'i don ni byang chub bo//phung po rnams ni dben pa ste/dben pa'i don ni byang chub bo//phung po rnams la gzung ba med de/
335b7(mdo sde): gzung ba med pa'i don ni byang chub bo//phung po rnams lo gzhi med de/gzhi med pa'i don ni byang chub bo//phung po rnams la'i nga ba dang 'gro ba med de/'ong ba dang 'gro ba med
336a1(mdo sde): pa'i don ni byang chub bo//phung po rnams ni da ltar byung ba la mi gnas pa ste/da ltar byung ba la mi gnas pa'i don ni byang chub bo//sring mo gzhan yang phung
336a2(mdo sde): po rnams ni 'phags pa rnams kyis tha snyad yin pas byang chub kyang 'phags pa rnams kyi tha snyad do//phung po rnams ni tha snyad med pa'i rang bzhin can te/byang chub kyang tha snyad
336a3(mdo sde): med pa'o//phung po lnga'i rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pas thugs su chud pa'i chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin te/de ni byang chub ces bya'o//sring mo de ltar na
336a4(mdo sde): phung po lnga'i rang bzhin ni byang chub kyi rang bzhin no//byang chub kyi rang bzhin ni chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin te/sring mo phung po lnga'i rang bzhin gang yin pa dang /byang chub
336a5(mdo sde): kyi rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni sems can thams cad kyi rang bzhin yin te/sring mo de'i phyir ngas khyod la 'di skad du khyod nyid byang chub bo zhes smras so//sring mo gzhan yang
336a6(mdo sde): phung po rtogs pa gang yin pa de nyid byang chub yin te/phung po ma gtogs par rtogs po'ang med la/byang chub mo gtogs par yang rtogs pa med pas de ltar rtogs
336a7(mdo sde): pa gang yin pa de byang chub ces bya ste/sring mo de'i phyir ngas khyod la 'di skad du khyod nyid byang chub bo zhes smos so//sring mo rnam grangs 'dis khyod kyis 'di ltar rig par bya/
336b1(mdo sde): ste/ji ltar sems can thams cad byang chub tu gtogs pa ltar/de gtogs pa med par bstan pa ni byang chub ste/spring mo de'i phyir ngas khyod la 'di skad du khyod nyid byang chub bo
336b2(mdo sde): zhes smras so//sring mo gzhan yang khyod kyi lus 'di la sa'i khams dang /chu'i khams dang /me'i khams dang /rlung gi khams dang /khams bzhi po dag mngon par grub pa de la
336b3(mdo sde): sring mo sa'i khams ni bdag ma yin/sems can ma yin/srog ma yin/skyes bu ma yin/gang zag ma yin no//byang chub kyang bdag ma yin/sems can ma yin/
336b4(mdo sde): srog ma yin/skyes bu ma yin/gang zag ma yin no//de bzhin du chu'i khamos dang /me'i khams dang /rlung gi khams kyang bdag ma yin/sems can ma yin/srog
336b5(mdo sde): ma yin/skyes bu ma yin/gang zag ma yin no//byang chub kyang bdag ma yin/sems can ma yin/srog ma yin/skyes bu ma yin/gang zag ma yin no//shin
336b6(mdo sde): tu nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa'i phyir sna'i khams dang byang chung mnyam mo//shin tu med pa'i phyir chu'i khams dang byang chub mnyam mo//shin tu mi g.yo ba'i phyir me'i
336b7(mdo sde): khams dang byang chub monyam mo//shin tu bstan du med pa'i phyir rlung gi khams dang byang chub mo nyam mo//sring mo so'i khams gang yin pa'i khams de ni de bzhin gshegs
337a1(mdo sde): pas mkhyen te/mngon par rdzogs par thugs su chud do//sring mo chu'i khams gang yin pa'i khams de ni de bzhin gshegs pas mkhyen te/mngon par
337a2(mdo sde): rdzogs par thugs su chud do//sring mo me'i khams gang yin pa'i khams de ni de bzhin gshegs pas mkhyen te/mngon par rdzogs par thugs su chud do//sring mo rlung gi
337a3(mdo sde): khams gang yin pa'i khams de ni de bzhin gshegs pas mkhyen te/mngon par rdzogs par thugs su chud do//sring mo sa'i khams rtogs pa ni byang chub bo//sring mo de
337a4(mdo sde): bzhin du chu'i khams dang /me'i khams dang /rlung gi khams rtogs pa ni byang chub ste/sring mo de'i phyir ngas khyod la 'di skad du khyod nyid byang chub bo zhes smras so//sing mo
337a5(mdo sde): sa'i khams kyis chu'i khams yang dag par mi shes so//chu'i khams kyis me'i khams yang dag par mi shes so//me'i khams kyis rlung gi khams yang dag par mi shes
337a6(mdo sde): so//sring mo de ltar na khams kyi ming yongs su shes pa gang yin pa de ni byang chub ces bya ste/sring mo de'i phyir ngas khyod la 'di skad du khyod nyid byang chub bo zhes smras so//sring mo
337a7(mdo sde): gzhan yang gang khyod kyi lus 'di la mig mngon par grub pa dang /de bzhin du rna ba dang /sna dang /lci dang /lus dang /yid mngon par grub pa de la sring mo mig ni stong
337b1(mdo sde): pa ste/mig stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin ni byang chub bo//rna ba ni stong pa ste/rna ba stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin ni byang chub bo//sna ni stong pa ste/sna stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin ni byang chub
337b2(mdo sde): /l+le ni stong pa ste/lce stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin ni byang chub bo//lus ni stong pa ste/lus stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin ni byang chub bo//yid ni stong pa ste/yid stong pa nyid kyi
337b3(mdo sde): rang bzhin ni byang chub po//snying mo de'i phyir ngas khyod lnga 'di skad du khyod nyid byang chub bo zhes smras so//sring mo gzhan yang mig stong pa nyid gang yin pa de ni gzugs su 'dogs
337b4(mdo sde): par mi byed do//gzugs stong pa'i gzugs kyi ngo bo nyid ni byang chub bo//rna ba dang /sna dang /lce dang /lus dang /yid stong pa nyid gang yin pa de ni chos su 'dogs par
337b5(mdo sde): mi byed do/chos stong pa'i chos kyi ngo bo nyid ni byang chub ste/sring mo de'i phyir ngas khyod la 'di skad du khyod nyid byang chub bo zhes smras so//sring mo mig ni gzugs mi len te/byang
337b6(mdo sde): chud kyang gzugs mi len to//rna ba ni sgra mi len te/byang chub kyang sgra mau len+da to//sna nI dI mi li nau te/byang chub kyang dri mi len to//lce ni ro mi len twe/byang chub kyang
337b7(mdo sde): mi len to//lus ni reg bya mi len te/byang chub kyang rig bye mi len te//yid ni chos mi len te/byang chub kyang chos mi len to//sring mo de ci'i phyir zhe na/mig gzugs
338a1(mdo sde): dang bral ba ni byang chub bo//yid chos dang bral ba'i bar du'ang byang chub yin pa'i phyir ro//sring mo de ltar na mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams gang yin pa de
338a2(mdo sde): ni gzugs kyi khams dang mtsha mos sbyor ba med de/mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams dang gzugs kyi khams su bral ba ni byang chub bo//rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i khams
338a3(mdo sde): gang yin pa de ni sgra'i khams dang mtshamos sbyor ba med de/rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i khams dang sgra'i khams su bral ba ni byang chub bo//sna'i rnam par shes pa'i khams gang yin
338a4(mdo sde): pa de ni dri'i khams dang mtshams sbyor ba med de/sna'i rnam par shes pa'i khams dang dri'i khams su bral ba ni byang chub bo//lce'i rnam par shes pa'i khams gang yin pa de ni ro'i
338a5(mdo sde): khams dang mtshams sbyor ba med de/lha'i rnam par shes pa'i khams dang ro'i khams su bral ba ni byang chub bo//lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams gang yin pa de ni reg
338a6(mdo sde): bya'i khams dang mtshams sbyor ba med de/lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams dang reg bya'i khams su bral ba ni byang chub bo//yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams gang yin
338a7(mdo sde): pa de ni chos kyi khams dang mtshams sbyor ba med de/yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams dang chos kyi khams su bral ba ni byang chub ste/sring mo de'i phyir ngas khyod la 'di
338b1(mdo sde): skad du khyod nyid byang chub bo zhes smras so//sring mo de ltar na byang chub dang mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams de ni gnyis su med de gnyis su dbyer med do//byang chub dang gzugs kyi
338b2(mdo sde): khams de ni gonyis su med de gnyis su dbyer med do//byang chub dang mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams de ni gnyis su med de gnyis su dbyer med do//byang chub dang yid kyi khams kyi
338b3(mdo sde): bar de ni gnyis su med de gnyis su dbyar med do//byang chub dang chos kyi khams de ni gnyis su med de gnyis su dbyer med do//byang chub dang yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams de
338b4(mdo sde): ni gnyis su med de gnyis su dbyar mod do//sring mo de'i phyir ngas khyod la 'di skad du khyod nyid byang chub bo zhes smras so//sring mo gzhan yang mig rtogs pa ni byang chub bo//de bzhin
338b5(mdo sde): du rna ba dang /sna dang /lce dang /lus dang /yid rtogs pa ni byang chub bo//mig gi rang bzhin no stong pa ste/rang bzhin stong pa de ni byang chub bo//de bzhin du rna ba dang /sna
338b6(mdo sde): dang lce dang /lus dang /yid kyi rang bzhin ni stong pa ste/rang bzhin stong pa de ni byang chub bo//sring mo mig gi rang bzhin ni ma chags/mi sdang /ma rmongs pa ste/'dod
338b7(mdo sde): chags dang zhe sdang dang gti mug dang bral ba ni byang chub bo//rna ba dang /sna dang /lce dang /lus dang /yid kyi rang bzhin ni ma chags pa/mi sdang ba/ma rmongs pa ste/'dod
339a1(mdo sde): chags dang zhe sdang dang /gti mug dang bral ba ni byang chub bo//sring mo mig ni bdag po med pa/bdag gi med pa/yongs su 'dzin pa med pa ste/byang chub
339a2(mdo sde): kyang bdag po med pa/bdag gi med pa/yongs su 'dzin pa med pa'o//de bzhin du rna ba dang /sna dang /lce dang /lus dang /yid kyang bdag po med pa/bdag gi med
339a3(mdo sde): pa/yongs su 'dzin pa med pa ste/byang chub kyang bdag po med pa/bdag gi med pa/yongs su 'dzin pa med pa'o//sring mo mig ni skyes pa'i chos dang mtshungs par ldan
339a4(mdo sde): pa'ang ma yin/bud med kyi chos dang mtshungs par ldan pa'ang ma yin no//sring mo byang chub kyang skyes pa'i chos dang mtshungs par ldan pa'ang ma yin/bud med kyi chos
339a5(mdo sde): dang mtshungs par ldan pa'ang ma yin no//sring mo de bzhin du rna ba dang /sna dang /lce dang /lus dang /yid kyang skyes pa'i chos dang mtshungs par ldan pa'ang ma yin//
339a6(mdo sde): bud med kyi chos dang mtshungs par ldan pa'ang ma yin no//sring mo byang chub kyang skyes pa'i chos dang mtshungs par ldan pa'ang ma yin/bud med kyi chos dang mtshungs par
339a7(mdo sde): ldan pa'ang ma yin no//sring mo mig ni skyes pa'ang ma yin/bud mod kyang ma yin no//sring mo byang chub kyang skyes pa'ang ma yin/bud med kyang ma yin no//sring
339b1(mdo sde): mo yid kyi bar du'ang skyes pa'ang ma yin/bud med kyang ma yin no//sring mo byang chub kyang skyes pa'ang ma yin/bud med kyang ma yin no//sring mo de ltar mig gi de bzhin nyid ni
339b2(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pas thubs su chud de/de bzhin nyid rtogs pa ni byang chub bo//yid kyi de bzhin nyid kyi bar du'ang de bzhin gshegs pas thugs su chud de/de bzhin nyid
339b3(mdo sde): rtogs pa ni byang chub bo//sring mo dri'i phyir ngas khyod la 'di skad du khyod nyid byang chub bo zhes smras so//sring mo gzhan yang khyod kyi lus 'di ni bdag ma yin/sems can ma
339b4(mdo sde): yin/sgrog ma yin/skyes bu ma yin/gang zag ma yin/shod las smyos pa ma yin/shed bu ma yin/byed pa po ma yin/tshor ba po ma yin/shes pa po ma yin/
339b5(mdo sde): mthong ba po ma yin/nyan pa po ma yin/snom pa po ma yin/za ba po ma yin/reg pa po ma yin/rnam por shes pa po ma yin no//sring mo byang chub kyang bdag ma
339b6(mdo sde): yin sems can ma yin/srog ma yin/gso ba ma yin/gang zag ma yin/bdag gi ma yin/yongs su 'dzin pa ma yin/byas pa ma yin/tshor ba ma yin//
339b7(mdo sde): gzugs ma yin/sgra ma yin/dri ma yin/ro ma yin/reg ma yin/rnam par rig pa ma yin te/sring mo de lta bas na chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid ni byang chub
340a1(mdo sde): ces bya'o//sring mo gang yang khyod kyi lus ni g.yo ba med pa/byed pa med pa/rtag pa med pa ste/rtswa dang /shing dang /shing ljon pa dang /brtsig pa'i
340a2(mdo sde): tshogs rnams dang khyad par med cing tha dad du dbyer med do//sring mo gang yang nang gi sa'i khams dang phyi rol gyi sa'i khams ni gnyis su med cing gnyis su dbyer med de/'di
340a3(mdo sde): ltar mtshan nyid med par mtshan nyid gcig par de bzhin gshegs pas shes rab dang ye shes kyis mngon par rdzogs par thugs su chud de/sring mo de'i phyir ngas khyod la
340a4(mdo sde): 'di skad du khyod nyid byang chub bo zhes smras so//sring mo gzhan yang sems dang yid dang /rnam par shes pa'i rnam par rig pa gang gis sems pa dang /rnam par shes
340a5(mdo sde): pa'i sems dang /yid dang /rnam par shes pa'i rnam par rig pa de ni skra la gnas pa ma yini/spu la gnas pa ma yin/sha mdog la gnas pa ma yin/pags
340a6(mdo sde): pa la gnas pa ma yin/sha la gnas pa ma yin/khrag la gnas pa ma yin/rus pa la gnas pa ma yin/chub la gnas pa ma yin/rkang la gnas pa ma yin//
340a7(mdo sde): nang la gnas pa ma yin/phyi rol la gnas pa ma yin/gnyis ka med pa la gnas pa ma yin/mig la gnas pa ma yin/rna ba la gnas pa ma yin/sna la gnas
340b1(mdo sde): pa ma yin/lce la gnas pa ma yin/lus la gnas pa ma yin/yid la gnas pa ma yin te/gnas pa ma yin/mi gnas pa ma yin/rgyun chad pa ma yin/yul
340b2(mdo sde): na gnas pa ma yin/phyogs na gnas pa ma yin/gzugs med pa/bstan du med pa/rnam par rig pa med pa/bzung ba med pa/'dre ba med pa/gzhi med pa/dag
340b3(mdo sde): ba/gtsang ba/'od gsol ba ste/sems dang /yid kyi rnam par rig pa de ni kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa/rnam par byang ba med pa ste/de ni rang bzhin gyis rnam par
340b4(mdo sde): dag cing 'od gsal la lus med pa'i phyir/kun nas nyon mongs pa med cing rnam par byung ba med do//sring mo de ltar na phung po dang khams dang /skye mched kyi rang bzhin ni
340b5(mdo sde): byang chub bo//byang chub kyi rang bzhin yang phung pa dang khams dang /skye mched rnams so//sring mo khyod kyi lus 'di la phung po dang /khams dang /skye mched gang dag
340b6(mdo sde): mngon par grub pa de dag ni byang chub ste/byang chub gzhan ma yin no//de ci'i phyir zhe na/byang chub ni phung po dang /khams dang /skye mched rnams las gzhan pa ma yin
340b7(mdo sde): te/de dge nyid byang chub yin pas chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid du rtogs pas ni byang chub yin pa'i phyir ro//sring mo de'i phyir ngas khyod la 'di skad du khyod nyid byang chub bo
341a1(mdo sde): zhes smras so//'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas bstan pa 'di bshad pa na nam mkha'i dkyil na gnas pa'i lha'i bu lnga 'bum gyis bla na med pa yang dag par
341a2(mdo sde): rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do//gang dag smad 'tshang ma'i bu mo gser mchog 'od dpal gyi phyi bzhin 'brang ba'i skyes pa dang /bud med dang /khye'u dang /bu mo
341a3(mdo sde): rnams las srog chags nyis brgyas kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do//lha dang mi drug cu ni chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul med cing dri ma dang
341a4(mdo sde): bral ba rnam par dag go/smad 'tshong ma'i bu mo gser mchog 'od dpal yang tshim zhing mgu la yi rangs te rab tu dga' nas/dga' ba dang yid bde ba skyes te/yan lag
341a5(mdo sde): ldes phyag 'tshal nas/'jim dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i rkang pa gnyis la gtugs te/sangs rgyas dang /chos dang /dge 'dun la skyabs su song nas tshangs par
341a6(mdo sde): spyad pa dang bslab pa'i gzhi rnams yang dag par blangs te/lhag pa'i bsam pas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed nas 'di skad ces smras
341a7(mdo sde): so//'jam dpal bdag kyang khyod kyis rjes su bstan pa dang /sems can thams cad la snying brtse ba dang /snying rjes sangs rgyas kyi gdung mi bcad pa dang /chos
341b1(mdo sde): kyi gdung mi bcad pa dang /dge 'dun gyi gdung mi bcad pa'i slad du khyod kyis bstan pa bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub der sems bskyed par bgyi'o//de bzhin du
341b2(mdo sde): chos rtogs par bgyi ba'i slad du sems can thams cad la chos bstan par yang bgyi'o//nyes par bgyis pa'i las kyi sgrib po yongs su sbyang ba'i slad du nongs pa la nongs par bshags
341b3(mdo sde): par bgyi'o//gang na chos thams cad zhi zhing nye bar zhi bar ma rtogs nas/tshul bzhin ma lags pa yid la bgyid pa sngon du 'gro ba dang /phyin ci log gi dbang du mchis pa dang /
341b4(mdo sde): rang gi lus la mngon par zhan pas 'dod chags kyi sbyor ba dang ldan pa'i sems can rnams kyis ni chos rnams kyi rang bzhin nyid ma rtogs so//'jam dpal de lta lags mod
341b5(mdo sde): kyi 'on kyang gang dag 'dod chags kyi sbyor ba dang ldan pa'i sems can de dag kyang chos rnams kyi chos nyid 'di ci 'dra ba de nyid dang ldan no//byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni ldan pa'i
341b6(mdo sde): chos 'di la slob cing /bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do//de ci'i slad du zhe na/'jam dpal nyon mongs pa rnams ni ji ltar mchis pa ma
341b7(mdo sde): lags pa la/kun brtags pa las 'byung bar de ltar kun brtogs pa yongs su rtogs na 'gag par 'gyur bas gsog dang 'dra ba'i slad du'o//'jam dpal ji ltar khyod
342a1(mdo sde): kyis gsungs pa'i don bdag gis 'tshal ba ltar na nyon mongs pa rnams ni rang bzhin ma mchis shing byung ba ma mchis pas sprin gyi tshogs dang 'dra'o//nyon mongs
342a2(mdo sde): pa rnams ni skad cig la 'jig cing 'ju ste chu'i chu bur dang 'dra'o//nyon mongs pa rnams ni shin tu mngon par grub pa ma mchis pa ste/rlung dang 'dra'o//nyon mongs pa rnams ni
342a3(mdo sde): yul thams cad las yang dag par 'dres pa ste/nam mkha'i ri mo dang 'dra'o//nyon mongs pa rnams ni ring du mi gnas pas chu'i ri mo drang 'dra'o//nyon mongs pa rnams
342a4(mdo sde): ni tshul bzhin ma lags pa yid la bgyid pa'i 'jug pa las 'byung ba ste/gnod sbyin dang 'byung po 'dra'o//nyon mongs pa rnams ni me mchis pa la phyin ci log tu mthong ba
342a5(mdo sde): las byung ba ste/sprin mar dang 'dra'o//nyon mongs pa rnams ni kun brtags pa las byung ba ste/yang dag pa ma lags pa'o//nyon mongs pa rnams ni ngar 'dzin pas
342a6(mdo sde): lhag par chags pa dang 'brel ba'o//nyon mongs pa rnams ni bdag gir 'dzin pas dngos po yongs su 'dzin pa'o//nyon mongs pa rnams ni log par bskyed pas glo bur du
342a7(mdo sde): byung ba'o//nyon mongs pa rnams ni rnam par rtog pa las byung bas mtshan ma'i rjes su 'brang ba dang 'dra'o//nyon mongs pa rnams ni khams sna tshogs lo me dpyod pa'i tshul
342b1(mdo sde): gyis bskyed pa ste so sor mi rtog pa'o//nyon mongs pa rnams ni sems dang rjes su mthun pas bskyed pa ste/nges par mi sems pa'o//nyon mongs pa rnams ni bdag dang gzhan
342b2(mdo sde): la mngon par zhen pa las byung ba ste/yid ches par mi bgyi ba'o//nyon mongs pa rnams ni phung po dag len pa'o//nyon mongs pa rnams ni khams rnams la ril por 'dzin pa'o///
342b3(mdo sde): nyon mongs pa rnams ni skye mched rnams sogs pa'o//nyon mongs pa rnams ni ming dang gzugs la rnam par 'byed pa'o//nyon mongs pa rnams ni tshul bzhin ma lags pa yid la
342b4(mdo sde): bgyid pa dag mi rtogs pa'o//'jam dpal de lta lugs mod kyi 'on kyang nyon mongs pa rnams ni byang chub kyi phung po'i gzhi lags so//de ci'i slad du zhe na/byang chub ni g.yo
342b5(mdo sde): ba ma mchis pa'i slad du'o//nyon mongs pa rnams ni byang chub kyi sa bon te/nyon mongs pa rtogs pa nyid byang chub lags so//nyon mongs pa rnams ni byang chub rdo rje'i gzhi
342b6(mdo sde): lags so//de ci'i slad du zhe na/chos kyi dbyings dbyer mi mchis pa'i tshul gyis byang chub ni nyon mongs pa rnams kyis mi phyed pa'i slad du'o//'jam dpal nyon mongs pa rnams
342b7(mdo sde): mthong ba ni byang chub ste/byang chub ni yul thams cad kyi rjes su song ba'o//'jamo dpal ji ltar byang chub rnam par gnas pa ma mchis pa de ltar nyon mongs pa rnams kyang rnam
343a1(mdo sde): par gnas pa ma mchis pa ste/skyes nas 'jig cing 'dzubs mi gnas pa'o//'jam dpal nyon mongs pa rnams ni sems kyi rang bzhin lags so//de ci'i
343a2(mdo sde): slad du zhe na/'jam dpal sems 'di ni chags pa 'am/sdang ba 'am/rmongs pa zhes sems kyi rang bzhin bstan par mi nus te/'jam dpal ji ltar sems bstan par
343a3(mdo sde): mi nus pa de bzhin du nyon mongs pa rnams kyang yul na gnas pa'am/phyogs na gnas pa zhes nyon mongs pa'i rang bzhin bstan par mi nus pa'i slad du'o//'jam dpal byang
343a4(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ji lta ji ltar nyon mongs pa de dag rab tu rtogs pa de lta de ltar de 'dod chags la spyod pa'i sems can rnams yongs su smin par bgyi ba la
343a5(mdo sde): skyoskye bar mi 'gyur ro//zhe sdang la spyod pa rnams la ma lags/gti mug la spyod pa rnams la ma lags te/cha mnyam pa la spyod pa'i sems can rnams yongs su smin par
343a6(mdo sde): bgyi ba la skyo bar mi 'gyur ro//'jam dpal da ltar bdag gi 'dod chags ji lta ba de bzhin du 'dod chags la spyod pa thams cad kyi 'dod chags la blta bar bgyi'o//'jam
343a7(mdo sde): dpal da ltor bdag gi zhe sdang ji lta ba de bzhin du zhe sdang la spyod pa thams cad kyi zhe sdang la blta bar bgyi'o//'jam dpal da ltar bdag gi gti mug ji lta ba de bzhin du gti
343b1(mdo sde): mug la spyod pa thams cad kyi gti mug la blta bar bgyi'o//'jam dpal da ltar bdag gi nyon mongs pa thams cad ji lta ba de bzhin du nyon mongs pa thams cad la spyod pa'i sems can
343b2(mdo sde): thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa la blta bar bgyi'o//'jam dpal 'di lta ste dper na/mo ni rtswa dang shing thams cad kyis 'jigs pa ma mchis pa'o//'jam dpal de bzhin du
343b3(mdo sde): 'phags pa'i shes rab kyi me'ang nyon mongs pa'i rtsa dang shing thams cad kyis 'jigs pa ma mchis pa'o//'jam dpal 'di lta ste dper na/nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor ni mun pa mun
343b4(mdo sde): nag thams cad dang lhan cig mi gnas so//'jam dpal de bzhin du 'phags pa'i shes rab kyang nyon mongs pa thams cad dang lhan cig mi gnas so//'jam dpal 'di lta ste/
343b5(mdo sde): dper na/rlung dmar ni shing ljon pa dang ri thams cad la mi chags so//'jam dpal de bzhin du 'phags pa'i shes rab la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' yang nyon mongs pa'i
343b6(mdo sde): yul thams cad la mi chags so//'jam dpal 'di lta ste dper na/nam mkha'i khams ni sreg pa'i bskal pa thams cad kyis tshig por mi 'gyur ro//'jam dpal de bzhin
343b7(mdo sde): du 'phags pa'i shes rab la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' yang nyon mongs pa'i sreg pa'i bskal pa thams cad kyis tshig par mi 'gyur ro//'jam dpal 'di lta ste dper
344a1(mdo sde): na/nam mkha' ni rdul dang na bun dang /sprin thams cad dang lhan cig mi gnas so//'jam dpal de bzhin du 'phags pa'i shes rab la spyod pa'i byang chub
344a2(mdo sde): sems dpa' yang nyon mongs pa thams cad dang lhan cig mi gnas so//'jam dpal 'di lta ste dper na/nam mkha' ni sa dang lhan cig mi gnas so//'jam dpal de
344a3(mdo sde): bzhin du 'phags pa'i shes rab la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' yang nyon mongs pa thams cad dang lhan cig mi gnas so//'jam dpal 'di lta ste dper na/khab long
344a4(mdo sde): ni lcags dang lhan cig mi gnas so//'jom dpal de bzhin du 'phags pa'i shes rab la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' yang nyon mongs pa thams cad dang lhan cig mi gnas
344a5(mdo sde): so//'jam dpal 'di lta ste dper na/ri khor yug ni rlung thams cad kyis bskyod par mi nus so//'dzom dpal de bzhin du 'phags pa'i shes rab la spyod pa'i byang chub sems
344a6(mdo sde): dpa' yang nyon mongs pa thams cad kyis bskyod par mi nus so//'jam dpal 'di lta ste dper na/dud 'gro'i skye gnas su song ba bya ngang pa zhes bgyi ba ni 'o ma dad chab
344a7(mdo sde): bsres pa las 'o ma nyid ni 'tshal gyi chang ni mau lags so//'jam dpal de bzhin du 'phags pa'i shes rab la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' yang 'phags pa'i shes rab
344b1(mdo sde): dang nyon mongs pa'i 'dres pa dag las shes rab nyid ni len gyi nyon mongs pa ni ma lags so//'jam dpal 'di lta ste dper na/byang gi sgra mi snyan gyi gling na nye dur 'brel ba'i bud
344b2(mdo sde): med+ma rnams la shing gi yal ga 'dud par mi bgyid do//'jam dpal de bzhin du dbang po yongs su ma smin pa'i sems can rnams la byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa dang /'phags
344b3(mdo sde): pa'i shes rab dang ye shes 'dud par mi bgyid do//'jam dpal da ltar badrag ni nyon mongs pa rnams kyis 'jigs pa 'am/skrag pa ci'ang ma mchis so//dwa ci'i slad du zhe na/
344b4(mdo sde): 'jam dpal bdag gis chos thams cad kyis rang bzhin dben par rtogs pa'i slad du'o//'dzum dpal byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni 'jigs pa ma mchis pa'i go cha bgos
344b5(mdo sde): pa ste/'jam dpal 'di lta ste dper na/gang dgas 'jigs pa de ni dpa' bo zhes mi bgyi'o//'jom dpal de bzhin du gang nyon mongs pa rnams kyis 'jigs pa de'ang byang
344b6(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' zhes mi bgyi'o//'jam dpal 'di lta ste dper na/gang dgras bcom pa de ni dpa' bo zhes mi bgyi'o//'jam dpal de bzhin du gang nyon mongs pa rnams
344b7(mdo sde): kyis bcom pa de'ang byang chub sems dpa' zhes mi bgyi'o//'jam dpal 'di lte ste dper na/nor bu rin po che chu 'dang zhes bgyi ba chab kyi nang du stsal na gsher bar yang mi
345a1(mdo sde): 'gyur zhing chab kyi dri mas kyang mi gos la/chab kyi rnyog pa thams cad kyang rab tu drang bar bgyid do//'jam dpal de bzhin du 'phags pa'i shes rab la spyod pa'i
345a2(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' yang nyon mongs pa'i nang na gnas kyang nyon mongs pas gsher bar yang mi 'gyur zhing nyon mongs pa'i dri mas kyang mi gos la/nyon mongs pa'i rnyog pa
345a3(mdo sde): thams cad kyang rab tu zhi bar bgyid do//de nas smad 'tshong ma'i bu mo gser mchog 'od dpal gyis bstan pa 'di bshad nas yang 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad
345a4(mdo sde): ces smras so//'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' nyon mongs pa ma mchis pa lags/'jam dpal gyis smras pa/sring mo byang chub sems dpa' gang gis nyon
345a5(mdo sde): mongs pa skye ba'am 'gag par mthong na/byang chub sems dpa' de ni nyon mongs pa med pa zhes mi bya'o//sring mo 'di lta ste dper na/'bru mar gyi sgron ma la mun pa mun
345a6(mdo sde): nag snang na 'obru mar gyi sgron ma zhes mi bya'o//sring mo de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' gang gis nyon mongs pa skye ba 'am 'gag par mthong na/byang chub sems dpa'
345a7(mdo sde): de ni nyin mongs pa med pa zhes mi bya'o//sring mo nyon mongs pa med pa zhes bya ba ni su gang du kun nas nyon mongs pa'ang mi mthong /rnam par byang ba'ang mi mthong ste//
345b1(mdo sde): mthong ba dang /mi mthong ba dang /sems dang yid dang /rnam par rig pa dang bral ba ni nyon mongs pa med pa'o//sring mo gang dang gang du sems dang yid dang /rnam par rig
345b2(mdo sde): pa 'jug na/tha na mya ngan las 'das par sems pa'ang rung ste/de thams cad ni nyon mongs pa'o//de ci'i phyir zhe na/nyon mongs pa med pa la ni sems sam sems pa 'jug
345b3(mdo sde): pa med pa'i phyir te/gang gis dge ba 'am mi dge ba'i dmigs pa la sems 'jug pa de dag thams cad ni mngon par 'du byed pa'o//gang mngon par 'du byed pa de ni 'khor
345b4(mdo sde): ba'o//gang 'khor ba de ni 'du byed do//'du byed thams cad ni 'khor ba ste/sring mo de dag ni nyon mongs pa yin no//sring mo nyon mongs pa zhes bya ba de ni sbyor ba ste/mig
345b5(mdo sde): dang gzugs su sbyor ba ni nyon mongs pa'o//de bzhin du rna ba dang /sgra dang /sde dang /dI dang /lce dang /ro dang /lus dang /reg bya dang /yod dang /chos su sbyor ba
345b6(mdo sde): ni nyon mongs pa'o//tshul khrims la sbyor ba ni nyon mongs pa'o//ting nge 'dzin la sbyor ba ni nyon mongs pa'o//shes rab dang /rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba la
345b7(mdo sde): sbyor ba ni nyon mongs pa'o//rab tu dpon pa la sbyor bar sems pa ni nyon mongs pa'o//sring mo nyon mongs pa med pa zhes bya ba de ni rgyu ba med pa zhes bya ba'i tshig bla dgas so//
346a1(mdo sde): de ni spros pa med pa zhes bya ba'i tshig bla dgas so//de ni rtsol ba med pa zhes bya ba'i tshig bla dgas so//kun tu 'byung ba med pa zhes bya ba'i tshig bla dgas te
346a2(mdo sde): snying mo grangs dang grangs med pa dang bral ba ni nyon mongs pa med pa nyid do//sring mo gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' gang bdag la'ang nyon mongs po med la/gzhan dag
346a3(mdo sde): nyon mongs pa las rab tu thar pa la'ang shin tu brtson pa de ni nyon mongs pa med pa'o zhes de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs te/gzhan dag nyon mongs pa las rab tu
346a4(mdo sde): thar bar byed pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i brtson 'grus yang dgra phul lo//bu mos smras pa/'jam dpal byang chub sems dpa'i brtson 'grus yang dag phul gang lags//
346a5(mdo sde): 'jam dngol gyis smras pa/stong pa nyid la so sor rtogs pa'i rjes su 'jug cing lta ba la spyod pa'i sems can rnams la snying rje ba dang /mtshan ma med pa la so sor
346a6(mdo sde): rtogs pa'i rjes su 'jug cing mtshan ma la spyod pa'i sems can rnams la snying rje ba dang /smon pa med pa la so sor rtogs pa'i rjes su 'jug cing smon pa la spyod pa'i
346a7(mdo sde): sems can rnams la snying rje ba dang /mngon par 'du byed pa med pa la so sor rtogs pa'i rjes su 'jug cing mngon par 'du byed pa la spyod pa'i sems can rnams
346b1(mdo sde): la snying rje ba dang /skye ba med cing 'chi 'pho ba med pa la so sor rtogs pa'i rjes su 'jug cing rgyu ba dang shi bar 'du shes pa'i sems can rnams la snying rje ba dang /skye ba med pa la
346b2(mdo sde): sngo sor rtogs pa'i rjes su 'jug cing skye ba dang 'jigs par 'du shes pa'i sems can rnams la snying rje ba dang /nyan thos su nges pa la so sor rtogs pa'i rjes su 'jug cing nyan thos
346b3(mdo sde): kyi 'bras bu thob pa las ldog pa dang /rang sangs rgyas su nges pa la so sor rtogs pa'i rjes su 'jug cing rang sangs rgyas kyi 'bras bu thob pa las ldog pa dang /byang chub
346b4(mdo sde): sems dpa'i skyon med pa la 'jug pa so sor rtogs pa'i rjes su 'jug cing sems can thams cad la'ang snying rje ba ste/sring mo 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i brtson 'grus
346b5(mdo sde): yang dag phul lo//sring mo 'di lta ste/dper na/rgya mtsho chen por 'jug pa ni sla'i rin po che chen po dag thogs te ldog par ni dka'o//srong mi de bzhin du stong pa nyid la so sor
346b6(mdo sde): rtog pa ni sgra'i/thabs la mkhas pa dang bral bas ldog par ni dka'o//mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa dang /mngon par 'du byed pa med pa dang /skye ba med pa dang /
346b7(mdo sde): 'thung ba med pa dang /nyan thos kyi skyon med pa dang /rang sangs rgyas kyi skyon med pa la'ang so sor brtag pa ni sla'i/thabs la mkhas pa dang bral bas ldog par ni dka'o//
347a1(mdo sde): sring mo 'di lta ste dper na/g.yul ngo chen por 'jug pa ni sgra'i/ma rmas ma nyams par rgal ba ni dka'o//sring mo de bzhin du rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum
347a2(mdo sde): du'ang 'jug pa ni sgra'i/thabs la mkhas pa dang bral bas ldog par ni dka'o//bu mos smras pa/'jam dpal thabs zhes bgyi ba ji lta bu lags/'jam dpal gyis
347a3(mdo sde): smras pa/sring mo thabs zhes bya ba ni gang phyogs gnyis mi spong ba ste/'di ltar 'khor ba'i phyogs dang /mya ngan las 'das pa'i phyogs so//sring mo thabs zhes bya ba
347a4(mdo sde): ni gang sgo gnyis ston par byed pa ste/'khor ba'i sgro dang /mya ngan las 'das pa'i sgo dang /stong pa nyid kyi sgo dang /lta ba las rab tu thar pa'i sgo dang /mtshan ma
347a5(mdo sde): med pa'i sgo dang /mtshan ma las rnam par thar pa'i sgo dang /smon pa med pa'i sgo dang /bsams bzhin du skye ba'i sgo dang /mngon par 'du byed pa med pa'i sgo dang /
347a6(mdo sde): dge ba mngon par 'du bya ba'i sgo dang /skye ba med pa'i sgo dang /skye ba kun tu ston pa'i sgo dang /'byung ba med pa'i sgo dang /phung po dang /khams dang /skye mched
347a7(mdo sde): kyi sgo dang /skye ba med cing 'gag pa med pa'i sgo dang /skye ba dang 'byung ba'i sgo dang /dben pa'i sgo dang /sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i sgo dang /chos kyi
347b1(mdo sde): dbyings kyi sgo dang /chos thams cad so sor srung ba'i sgro dang /nyan thos kyi theg pa'i sgo dang /byang chub sems dpa'i lhag pa'i bsam pa'i sgo dang /rang byang chub kyi sgo
347b2(mdo sde): ngangong /sangs rgyas kyi chos mi brjed pa'i sgo ste/sring mo byang chub sems dpa' gang sgo gnyis nye bar ston kyang /sgo thams cad la'ang chags pa med pa de ni thabs la mkhas
347b3(mdo sde): pa zhes bya'o//de bzhin du 'dod chags kyi sgo dang /'dod chags dang bral ba'i sgo dang /zhe sdang gi sgo dang /zhe sdang dang bral ba'i sgo dang /grati mug gI sgo dang /gti mug
347b4(mdo sde): dang bral ba'i sgo dang /nyon mongs pa'i sgo dang /nyon mongs pa dang bral ba'i sgo dang /'gro ba thams cad kyi sgo dang /'gro ba med pa'i sgo ste sring mo 'di ni byang chub sems
347b5(mdo sde): dpa'i thabs la mkhas pa'o//byis pa so so'i skye bo thams cad kyi spyod pa'i sgo dang /slob pa dang /mi slob pa dang /nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas dang /byang chub
347b6(mdo sde): sems dpa'i spyod pa'i sgo gang yin pa de gnyis shes pa gang yin pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i thabs la mkhas pa zhes bya'o////bam po gnyis pa
347b7(mdo sde): ste za ma//yong de'i tshe na bcom ldan 'das bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri'i ngos kyi smon ljongs zhig na zhabs 'bring byed pa'i dge sbyong tsho dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang thabs cad cig tu ring du
348a1(mdo sde): 'chag pas 'chag cing bzhugs so//der bzhugs nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'jam dpal khyod kyis byang chub sems
348a2(mdo sde): dpa'i brtson 'grus yang dag phul dang thabs lnga mkhas pa ji skad bstan pa de ni de bzhin te/legs so legs so zhes bya ba byin pa dang /legs so zhes bya ba'i sgra des stong
348a3(mdo sde): gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di dbyangs kyis go bar gyur cing /legs so zhes bya ba'i sgra de nyid kyis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di
348a4(mdo sde): rnam pa dag tu rab tu g.yos par yang gyur nas lha dang /klu dang /gnod sbyin dang /dri bra dang /lha ma yin dang /nam mkha' lding dang /mi 'am ci dang /lto 'phe chen po
348a5(mdo sde): dang /mi dang mi ma yin pa rnams dang /brgya byin dang /tshangs pa dang /'jig rten skyong ba mang po dag legs so zhes bya ba'i sgra des bskul nas bcom ldan 'das ga la
348a6(mdo sde): ba der dong ste phyin nas/bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/phyogs gcig tu 'khrod do//phyogs gcig tu 'khod nas lha dang klu dang /gnod sbyin
348a7(mdo sde): dang dri za dang /lha ma yin dang nam mkha' lding dang /mi 'am tsi dang /lto 'phye chen po dang /mi dang mi ma yin po dang /brgya byin dang /tshangs pa dang /'jig rten
348b1(mdo sde): skyosbyo ba de drag gis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das legs so zhes bgyi ba'i sgra gang gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams
348b2(mdo sde): dbyangs kyis go bar mdzad pa de bcom ldan 'das kyis su la stsal/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/lha'i bu dag de ni 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la'o//lha'i
348b3(mdo sde): bu rnams kyis gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa de da ltar gang na mchis/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/lha'i bu dag 'jam dpal
348b4(mdo sde): gzhon nur gyur pa ni rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po'i shar phyogs kyi sgo na/smad 'tshang ma'i bu mo gser mchog 'od dpal zhes bya ba dang /lhan cig tu chas dang ldan pa'i
348b5(mdo sde): gtam zi re zhing 'dug gis lha'i bu dag gang dag chos nyan par 'dod pa dag kyang der dengs shig/de nas lha dang /klu dang /gnod sbyin dang /dri za dang /lha ma yin dang /nam
348b6(mdo sde): mkha' lding dang /mi 'am ci dang /lto 'phye chen po dang /mi dang mi ma yin pa dang /brgya byin dang /tshangs pa dang /'jig rten skyong ba de dag thams cad lhan cig tu
348b7(mdo sde): 'dus nase/'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa ga la ba der dong ste phyin pa dang /lus rags par sprul nas me tog gi char rab tu phab ste/me tog gi char des rgyal po'i
349a1(mdo sde): khab kyi kho ra khor yug tu me tog tshul par bkram par gyur to//de na lha rnams kyis kyang mi rnams mthong zhing mi rnams kyis kyang lha rnams kyang mthong ste/phan
349a2(mdo sde): tshun smra bar ni mi byed do//de ltar rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po nus srog chags brgya stong phrag mang po dag me tog de dag gis kyang bskul/lha'i lus rags pa de dag
349a3(mdo sde): gis kyang bskul nas/'jam dpol gzhon nur gyur pa go la ba der dong ngo //rgyal po mo skyes dbra'ang bud med kyi tshogs rnams kyis bskor te/dpung gi tshogs yan
349a4(mdo sde): lag bzhi pa dang lhan cig tu rgyal po'i 'byor pa chen po dang /rgyal po'i mthu chen pos 'jamo dpal gzhon nur gyur pa ga la ba der song nas/'khor de dang /rgyal po ma
349a5(mdo sde): skyes dag dang /rgyal po dang blon po'i bu rnams dang /tshong dpon dang khyim bdag gi bu rnams kyis smad 'ching ma'i bu mo gser mchog 'od dpal de 'dod chags kyis nyon
349a6(mdo sde): mongs pa'i kun nas ldang ba dang bral te/dbang po dang spyod lam rab tu zhi zhing dbang po mi g.yeng la ngo tsha shes pa dang /dpal gyis legs par brgyan par mthong ngo //
349a7(mdo sde): mthong nas kyang de la phyin cad su'ang 'dod pa'i rnam par rtog pa mi skye bar gyur to//de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas skye bo'i tshogs chen po de 'dus par rig
349b1(mdo sde): nas/smad 'tshong ma'i bu mo gsor mchog 'od dpal la 'di skad ces smras so//bu mo skye ba'i tshogs chen po thams cad kyis khyod mthong yang phyir zhing chags pa med na/khyod kyis
349b2(mdo sde): nyon mongs pa de dag gang du bzhag/bu mos smras pa/'jam dpal sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa rnams ni ye shos dang rnam par grol ba la gnas pa dang /chos kyi
349b3(mdo sde): dbyings la gnas pa ste/de dag kyang ma skyed pa dang /ma bkag pa dang /ma bsgyur bar de ltar bdag gis rtogs so//nyon mongs pa'i rang bzhin gang lags pa de'ang bdag
349b4(mdo sde): gis rtogs lags so//'jam dpal gyis smras pa/bu mo nyon mongs pa'i rang bzhin de gang yin/bu mos smras pa/'jam dpal rtog pa ma mchis shing rnam par rtog
349b5(mdo sde): pa ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin ni nyon mongs pa'i rang bzhin lags so//tshul bzhin ma lags pa ma skyes pa'i rang bzhin ni nyon mongs pa'i rang bzhin lags so//nyon mongs
349b6(mdo sde): pa rnams ni blo bur te/stong pa nyid rtogs pa dang lhan cig mi gnas so//mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa med pa shes pa dang lhan cig mi gnas so//rang bzhin gyis 'od
349b7(mdo sde): gsal ba dang lhan cig mi gnas so//'jam dpal 'di lta ste dper na/dug drag po'i sbrul gdug pas bltas pa tsam gyis skye bo 'gum par 'gyur ba las dar mi zhig
350a1(mdo sde): gis drug thams cad 'jil ba dang /drug thams cad rab tu zhi bar bgyid pa'i sman gnod sel zhes bgyi ba 'tshal te mchis nas/de nas sman de bstan
350a2(mdo sde): ma thag tu sbrul gdug pa'i dug de ma mchis par bgyis nas de la khye'u dang bu mo rnams rtse bas rtse zhing /khye'u dang bu mo de dag sbrul gdug pa de dang lhan cig tu rtse bar bgyid
350a3(mdo sde): de/phang par len cing glo la saM ral phreng du btags te/rgyan du bgyis kyang tshig par mi bgyid/zo bar mi bgyid/sdug bsngal du mi bgyid ngo do//'jam dpal
350a4(mdo sde): de bzhin du bdag kyang sngon chos 'dul ba ma thos pas tshul bzhin ma lags pa yid la bgyid pa phyin ci log la nye bar gnas pa'i nyon mongs pas yongs su bsregs pa
350a5(mdo sde): na 'dod chags kyis rang gi lus la chags shing rang gi gzugs la mngon par zhen te/gzugs dbu ba lta bur so sor rtogs par mi bgyid/lus sgyu ma'i chos
350a6(mdo sde): nyid du ma 'tshal/dga' ba'i rtsed mo rmi lam lta bur ma 'tshal/'dod pa'i dga' ba'i ro myang ba sbrang rtsi'i thigs pa lta bur ma 'tshal/srog gi dbang po zil pa'i
350a7(mdo sde): thigs pa lta bur ma 'tshal/'du byed thams cad mi rtag par ma 'tshal/lus mi sdug par ma 'tshal/'du byed thams cad shin tu sdug bsngal bar ma 'tshal
350b1(mdo sde): ni chos thams cad bdag ma mchis par so sor rtog par mi brjod do bdag kyang mun pa mun+da nag gis bsgrings shing /gzhan la'ang mun par bgyid/bdag kyang bcings
350b2(mdo sde): shing gzhan la'ang 'ching bar bgyid pa las/'jam dpal glang gi tshe bdag gis khyod las chos dang ldan pa'i bka' mchid thos te/thos nas kyang mos shing mos nas kyang rnam
350b3(mdo sde): par grol te de'i slad du bdag da ltar dang slan chad chags pa'i mig gis su la'ang lta bor mi bgyid do//de ci'i slad du zhe na/'jam dpal snang ba ni mun pa dang lhan cig mi
350b4(mdo sde): gnas so//'ja mi dang la de bzhin du 'dod chags dang bral ba ni su'ang nyon mongs pa rnams la chags pa ma mchis pa'i slad du'o//de nis yang 'jam dpal gnon nu
350b5(mdo sde): gyur pA lA smad 'tshong ma'i bu mo gser mchog 'od dpal gyis 'di skad ces smras so//kye ma 'jam dpal lha'i 'khor dang /mi'i 'khor chen po 'di 'dus kyis/gang gis
350b6(mdo sde): lha dang mi 'di dag gis nyon mongs pa'i rang bzhin de dag rtogs nas sems can rnams la snying rje bas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par 'gyur
350b7(mdo sde): ba de lta bu'i chos kyi bka' mchid bgyi bar khyod slebs par mdzod cig/'jam dpal gyis smras pa/sring mo nyon mongs pa'i rang bzhin la ni mos par de/'o//
351a1(mdo sde): ci'i phyir zhe na/sring mo nyon mongs pa'i rang bzhin ni byang chub yin pa'i phyir ro//sring mo 'di lta ste dper na/me ma sbar ba ni sreg pa'i bdag nyid ma
351a2(mdo sde): yin no//sring mo de bzhin du nyon mongs pa'ang yongs su ma brtags na 'khor ba'i bdag nyid ma yin no//sring mo 'di lta ste dper na/me sbar ba ni sreg pa'i bdag nyid yin
351a3(mdo sde): no//sring mo de bzhin du nyon mongs pa'ang yongs su brtags na 'khor ba'i bdag nyid yin no//sring mo 'di lta ste dper nA/me ni rgyu yod na 'bar ro//sring mo de bzhin du nyon
351a4(mdo sde): mongs pa rnams kyang lta ba'i kun nas ldang ba'i rgyu yod na khams gsum du 'bar ro//sring mo 'di lta ste dper na/me ni rgyu med na mi 'bar ro//sring mo de bzhin du nyon mongs
351a5(mdo sde): pa rnams kyang lta ba'i kun nas ldang ba'i rgyu med ni khams gsum du mi 'bar ro//sring mo 'di lta ste dper na/lo stong du 'bar ba'i ma la ni skye ba dang 'bri ba med do//srid
351a6(mdo sde): mo de bzhin du bskal pa brgya stong du rgyu ba'i nyon mongs pa la'ang skye ba dang 'bri ba med do//sring mo 'di lta ste dper na/me shi ba la ni me zhes mi gdags so//sring mo de
351a7(mdo sde): bzhin du nyon mongs pa zhi ba la'ang nyon mongs pa zhes mi gdags so//sring mo 'di lta ste dper na/nam mkha' gang la me 'bar yang nam mkha' ni me des tshig par mi nus
351b1(mdo sde): so//sring mo de bzhin du gang rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba la glo bur gyi nyon mongs pa byung yang rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba de ni glo bur gyi nyon mongs pa des kun nas nyon mongs
351b2(mdo sde): par byed mi nus so//sring mo 'di ltar yang gzugs kyi lus la ji ltar blta bar bya/bu mos smras pa/'jam dpal dper na/mtsho bran gyi chab kyi nang gi chu zla bzhin
351b3(mdo sde): du'o//'jam dpal gyis smras pa/bu mo phung po rnams ji ltar blta bar bya/bu mos smras pa/'jam dpal dper na/de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa bzhin du'o//'jam
351b4(mdo sde): dpal gyis smras pa/bu mo khams rnams ji ltar blta bar bya/bu mos smras pa/'jam dpal dper na/khams gsum bskal pa'i mes bsregs par gyur pa de bzhin
351b5(mdo sde): du'o//'jam dpal gyis smras pa/bu mo skye mched rnams ji ltar blta bar bya/bu mos smras pa/'jam dpal dper na/mngon par 'du bye ba'i las mngon par
351b6(mdo sde): 'dus ma bgyis pa bzhin du'o//'jam dpal gyis smras pa/bu mo 'khor 'di ji ltar blta bar bya/bu mos smras pa/'jam dpal dper na/'khor 'di ni steng
351b7(mdo sde): gi nam mkha'i mtshams bzhin du'o//'jam dpal gyis smras pa/bu mo khyod ji ltar blta bar bya/bu mos smras pa/'jam dpal dper na/bdag gi pha dang me gnyis
352a1(mdo sde): kyi gnyis phrad pa ma mchis pa bzhin du'o//'jam dpal gyis smras pa/bu mo nga ji ltar blta bar bya/bu mos smras pa/'jam dpal dper na/
352a2(mdo sde): long ba gzugs la blta ba bzhin du'o//'jam dpal gyis smras pa/bu mo khyod kyis chos 'di dag thos sam/bu mos smras pa/'jam dpal dper na/sgyu ma
352a3(mdo sde): sprul pa'i rna ba'i rnam par rig pa lta bus thos lags so//'jim dpal gyis smras pa/bu mo khyod bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'dod dam/bu mos
352a4(mdo sde): smras pa/'jam dpal bdag nyid byang chub lags te/yang 'dod par mi bgyid do//'jam dpal gyis smras pa/bu mo khyod kyis sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa spyad
352a5(mdo sde): dam/bu mos smras pa/'jam dpal bdag gis nyon mongs pa thams cad gtan du yongs su btang bas spyad legs so//'ojam dpal gyis smras pa/bu mo khyod
352a6(mdo sde): kyis tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byas sam/bu mos smras pa/'jam dpal nom mkha' yongs su rdzogs pas yongs su rdzogs par bgyis
352a7(mdo sde): lags so//'jam dpal gyis smras pa/bu mo khyod kyis bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa bsgoms sam/bu mos smras pa/'jam dpal sems can thams cad
352b1(mdo sde): skye ba ma mchis pa dang /'byung ba ma mchis pas bsgoms lags so//'jam dpal gyis smras pa/bu mo khyod kyis brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa brtsams sam/dru mas
352b2(mdo sde): smos pa/'jam dpal chos thams cad thob par bgyi ba ma mchis pa'i tshul gyis brtsams lags so//'jam dpal gyis smras pa/bu mo khyod kyis bsam gtan gyi pha rol
352b3(mdo sde): tu phyin pa la gnas sam/bu mos smras pa/'jam dpal chos kyi dbyings gnas pa ma mchis pa'i tshul gyis bdag gnas legs so//'jam dpal gyis smras pa/bu mo
352b4(mdo sde): khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byas sam/bu mos smras pa/'jam dpal lhag tshad ma mchis par yongs su rdzogs par bgyis legs so//
352b5(mdo sde): 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/bu mo khyod kyis byams pa bsgoms sam/bu mos smras pa/'jam dpal sems can thams cad mi srid pa'i tshul gyis bsgoms lags
352b6(mdo sde): so//'jam dpal gyis spras pa/bu mo byang chub sems dpas snying rje chen po gang nas btsal bar bya bu mos smras pa/'jam dpal byang chub sems dpas snying rje chen
352b7(mdo sde): po ni sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs po rnams las btsal bar bgyi'o//de ci'i slad du zhe na/gal te sems can rnams kyi nyon mongs pa ma mchis par gyur na/
353a1(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' yang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems skye bar mi 'gyur ba'i slad du'o//'jam dpal gyis smras pa/
353a2(mdo sde): bu mo byang chub sems dpas dga' ba ga las btsal bar bya bu mos smras pa/lhag pa'i bsam pa dang ljon pa'i byang chub kyi sems las so//'jam dpal gyis
353a3(mdo sde): smras po bu mo byang chub sems drapa'i btang snyoms ci zhig byed bu mos smras pa/'jam dpal byang chub sems dpa'i btang snyoms ni sems can thams cad la mi
353a4(mdo sde): slu ba yongs su rdzogs par bgyid pa dang /chos thams cad la 'grel ba ma mchis par nye bor mchi bar bgyid pa'o//'jam dpal gyis smras pa/bu mo 'gal
353a5(mdo sde): ba zhes bya ba ji lta bu yin/bu mos smras pa/gang dag ma mchis pa'i nyon mongs pa rnams spong ba'i slad du byang chub la rab tu zhugs pa dag go/'jam dpal
353a6(mdo sde): gyis smos pa/de dag gang dang 'gal/bu mos smras pa/phas kyis rgol ba thams cad dang ngo //'dzom dpal gyis smras pa/bu mo phas kyis rgol ba gang
353a7(mdo sde): ngag yin/bu mos smras pa/gang dag bzod pa'i rlom sems kyis gzhan la rgol ba dag lags so//'jam dpal gyis smras pa/bu mo bzod pa zhes bya ba
353b1(mdo sde): galas 'ong /bu mos smras pa/'jam dpal sems can thams cad kyis mtho btsams pa las mchi'o//de ci'i slad du zhe na/mtho btsams pa ma mchis na bzod pa ci'ang
353b2(mdo sde): ma mchis pa'i slad du ste/'jam dpal gang la sems can thams cad kyis mtho btsams pa na/'khrug pa ma mchis shing gnod pa mi bgyid pa de bzod pa bsgoms pa
353b3(mdo sde): lags so//'jam dpal gyis smras pa/bu mo khong khro ba zhes bya ba ji lta bu yin/bu mos smras pa/'jam dpal gang gis bskal pa brgyar bsags pa'i dge ba'i rtsa
353b4(mdo sde): ba rnams la gnod par bgyid pa 'di ni khong khro ba zhes bgyi'o//'jam dpal gyis smras pa/bu mo khong khro ba med pa zhes bya ba ji lta bu yin/bu mos smras pa/'jam dpal
353b5(mdo sde): gang gis sems la zhe 'gras pa ma mchis shing yul thams cad la gnod pa mi bgyid pa ste/de ni bzod pa legs par rig por bgyi'o//'jam dpal gyis smras pa/bu mo
353b6(mdo sde): ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' g.yul las rnam par rgyal ba yin/bu mos smras pa/'jam dpal gang chos thams cad la rnam par 'byed kyang mi dmigs pa lags so//
353b7(mdo sde): 'jam dpol gyis smras pa/bu mo ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' bdud phyir rgol ba bcom pa yin/bu mos smras pa/gang bdud thams cad 'dul bar bgyid kyang nyon
354a1(mdo sde): mongs pa ma mchis pa ste/de ci'i slad du zhe na/'jam dpal byang chub sems dpa' ni phung po rnams ston kyang phung po'i nyon mongs pa rnams dang lhan
354a2(mdo sde): cig mi gnas pa dang /'jam dpal byang chub sems dpa' ni nyon mongs pa rnams ston kyang rang bzhin chos nyid kyis chags pa ma mchis pa dang /'jam dpal byeng
354a3(mdo sde): chung sems dpa' sems can yongs su smin par bgyi ba'i slad du/rga ba dang 'chi ba ston kyang chos thams cad la 'chi 'pho ba dang 'gro ba ma mchis par rab tu rtogs pa
354a4(mdo sde): dang /'jam dpal byang chub sems dpa' ni lha'i bu dag ston kyang phrag dog dang rlom sems thams cad dang bral ba'i slad du'o//'jam dpal gyis smras pa/bu mo
354a5(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa'o ji ltar sems can yongs su smin par byed/bu mos smras pa/'jam dpal byang chub sems dpas shes rab dang thabs yongs su sgom pas
354a6(mdo sde): sems can yongs su smin par bgyid do//'jam dpal gyis smras pa/bu mo byang chub sems dpos ji ltar sems can thams cad kyi drung du gnas par bya/bu mos
354a7(mdo sde): smras pa/'jam dpal rang gi sems dang shes pa yongs su sgom pas byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad kyi drung du gnas par bgyi'o//'jamo dpal
354b1(mdo sde): gyis smras pa/bu mo 'khor 'di ni khyod la chos nyan par 'dod do//bu mos smras pa/'jam dpal gang du bdag dang gzhan gyi 'du shes 'jug pa de ni nyan par 'tshal ba ma lags
354b2(mdo sde): la/grong la rna ba'i rnam par rig pas rnam par shes pa 'jug pa'ang nyan par 'tshal ba ma lags so//'jam dpal gyis smras pa/bu mo chos nyan par 'dod pa zhes bya ba ji
354b3(mdo sde): lta bu yin/bu mos smras pa/'jam dpal gang gi tshe rang gi lus la rmi lam gyi mi lta bur mos pa dang /chos ston pa la sgyu ma'i mi lta bur mos pa dang /bstan pa'i chos de
354b4(mdo sde): la'ang brag ca'i sgra skad lta bur mos shing mos pa dang /rnam par grol ba la'ang gnyis su mi bgyid pa de tsam gyis na chos nyin par 'tshal ba lags so//'jam dpal gyis
354b5(mdo sde): smras pa/bu mo chos ji ltar mnyan par bya/bu mos smras pa/chos la rton pa la nan tan bgyid pas chos mnyan par bgyi'o//de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i
354b6(mdo sde): byin gyis rlabs dang /rang gi dge ba'i rtsa ba bsags pa'i shes rab kyis smad 'tshong ma'i bu mo gser mchog 'od dpal gyis de lta de ltar chos bstan pa na/'khor de las
354b7(mdo sde): srog chags khri nyis stong gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par gyur to//byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa po sngon dge ba'i rtsa ba bsags
355a1(mdo sde): ba'i lha dang mi lnga brgyas ni mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur to//srog chags sum khri nyis stong ni chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul med cing dri ma dang bral
355a2(mdo sde): ba rnam par dag go/bu mo de'ang chos nyan pa'i dga' ba dang /mchog tu dga' bas chos rnams la rjes su mthun pa'i bzod pa thob par gyur to//des bzod pa thob nas 'dzem
355a3(mdo sde): dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i rkang pa la gtugs te 'jam dpal thugs brtse ba'i slad du bdag rab tu dbyung du gsol/tshul bzhin ma lags par bskyed pa 'phags pa ma lags
355a4(mdo sde): pa/'phags pa'i chos las nyams par bgyid pa'i lus 'di las thar bar mdzad du gsol zhes rab tu 'byung bar gsol ba btab bo 'jom dpal gyis smras pa/sring
355a5(mdo sde): mo 'di lta ste mgo'i skra 'dreg pa de ni byang chub sems dpa'i rab tu 'byung ba ma yin no//de ci'i phyir zhe na/bu mo gang sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa bcad pa'i
355a6(mdo sde): phyir brtson pa de ni byang chub sems dpa'i rab tu 'byung ba yin pa'i phyir ro//bu mo gang gros ngur smrig 'chang ba de ni byang chub sems dpa'i rab tu 'byung ba ma yin gyi//
355a7(mdo sde): bu mo gang bdag nyid kyang bslab pa dang /tshul khrims yang dag par blangs la/tshul khrims 'chil pa'i sems can rnams kyang tshul khrims kyi sdom pa dang /brtul
355b1(mdo sde): zhugs la yang dag par sbyor bar byed pa de ni byang chub sems dpa'i rab tu 'byung ba yin no//bu mo gang bdag nyid dben par gnas pa de ni byang chub sems dpa'i rab tu 'byung ba ma
355b2(mdo sde): yin gyi/bu mo grang 'gro ba lnga'i 'khor ba ni rnam par rgyug pa'i sems can rnams dben pa shes pa la 'god par byed pa de ni byang chub sems dpa'i rab tu 'byung ba yin no//kha
355b3(mdo sde): dog dang gzugs kyi rtags dang spyod lam gyi dbyibs ni byang chub sems dpa'i rab tu 'byung ba ma yin gyi/sems can gzhan dang gang zag gzhan dag la byams pa dang snying rje'i
355b4(mdo sde): sems bskyed pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i rab tu 'byung ba yin no//bdag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i rab tu 'byung ba ma yin gyi/sems can gzhan
355b5(mdo sde): byi dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i rab tu 'byung ba yin no//bdag yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'i lhag pa'i bsam pa la gus pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i
355b6(mdo sde): rab tu 'byung ba ma yin gyi/sems can gzhan yongs su mya ngan las zla ba'i lhag pa'i bsam par gus pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i rab tu 'byung ba yin no//bdag gi nyon
355b7(mdo sde): mongs pa zhi bar byed pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i rab tu 'byung ba ma yin gyi/sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa zhi bar byed pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i rab tu 'byung ba yin
356a1(mdo sde): no//bdag gi sems rjes su srung ba ni byang chub sems dpa'i rab tu 'byung ba ma yin gyi/sems can thams cad kyi sems rjes su srung ba ni byang chub sems
356a2(mdo sde): dpa'i rab tu 'byung ba yin no//bdag thar bar bya ba la brtson pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i rab tu 'byung ba ma yin gyi/sems can thams cad thar bar bya ba lo brtson pa ni
356a3(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa'i rab tu 'byung ba yin no//bu mo 'khor bas sko ba ni byang chub sems dpa'i rab tu 'byung ba ma yin gyi/sems can thams cad 'khor ba las sgrol bar
356a4(mdo sde): bya ba la dga' ba ni byang chub sems dpa'i rab tu 'byung ba yin no//blo mo mya ngan las 'da' ba la dga' ba ni byang chub sems dpa'i rab tu 'byung ba ma yin gyi/spangs rgyas kyi
356a5(mdo sde): chos thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i rab tu 'byung ba yin no//bu mo rab tu 'byung ba zhes bya ba de ni sems can gzhan dag la snying rje che ba
356a6(mdo sde): zhes bya ba'i tshig bla dgas so//bu mo rab tu 'byung ba zhes bya ba de ni gzhan gyi 'khrul pa la skyon du mi lta ba zhes bya ba'i tshig blo dgas so//bu mo rab tu 'byung ba zhes bya ba de
356a7(mdo sde): ni gzhan gyi rnyed pa la phrag dog med pa zhes bya ba'i tshig bla dgas so//bu mo rab tu 'byung ba zhes bya ba de ni bdag dang gzhan la gdung ba med pa zhes bya ba'i tshig bla dogs
356b1(mdo sde): so//bu mo rab tu 'byung ba zhes bya ba de ni gzhan la mi skrod pa zhes bya ba'i tshig bla dgas so//bu mo rab tu 'byung ba zhes bya ba de ni gzhan la bstan pa zhes bya ba'i tshig bla dgas so//
356b2(mdo sde): bu mo rab tu 'byung ba zhes bya ba de ni gzhan gyi ltung ba mi gleng ba zhes bya ba'i tshig bla dgas so//bu mo rab tu 'byung ba zhes bya ba de ni nyes pa thams cad las 'byin pa zhes bya ba'i tshig
356b3(mdo sde): bla dgas so//bu mo byang chub sems dpa'i rab tu 'byung ba ni gzhan la rag las pa yin te/byang chub sems dpas gzhan la rag ma las par bya'o//bu mos smos pa/
356b4(mdo sde): 'jam dpal ji ltar ni byang chub sems dpa'i rab tu 'byung ba gzhan la rag las pa lags/'jam dpal gyis smras pa/bu mo rab tu 'byung ba tshul khrims la rag ltos pa yin
356b5(mdo sde): te/tshul khrims 'tshal pa la ni rab tu 'byung ba ci'ang med do//bu mo rab tu 'byung ba ni ting nge 'dzin la rag las pa yin te/brjed nges pa la ni rab tu 'byung ba ci'ang med
356b6(mdo sde): do//bu mo rab tu 'byung ba ni shes rab la rAg las pa yin te/shes rab 'chal pa la ni rab tu 'byung ba ci'ang med do//bu mo rab tu 'byung ba ni rnam par grol ba la rag las
356b7(mdo sde): pa yin te/sems rnam par ma grol ba la ni rab tu 'byung ba ci'ang med do//bu mo rab tu 'byung ba ni rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba la rag las pa yin te//rnam par
357a1(mdo sde): grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba med pa la ni rab tu 'byung ba ci'ang med do//bu mos smras pa/'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa'i rab tu 'byung ba
357a2(mdo sde): gzhan la rag las pa ma mchis pa lags/'jam dpal gyis smras pa/bu mo byang chub sems dpa' ni gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog pas na gzhan la rag las pa med pa ste/rang
357a3(mdo sde): gi kun shes pa'i ye shes kyis 'dis gang ci shes pa de bdag gis kyang shes la/'di gang ci smra ba de bdag kyang smra'o zhes gzhan dag gis ngor mi lta bas na/gzhan la
357a4(mdo sde): rag las pa med pa yin no//'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas rab tu 'byung ba'i le'u'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pa na/legs par bshad pa'i phyir byang chub
357a5(mdo sde): sems dpa' lnga brgyas rang rang gi gos dang rgyan thams cad lus las phud de/'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phul nas 'di skad ces smras so//'jom dpal
357a6(mdo sde): khyod kyis byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi rab tu 'byung ba legs par bshad de/bdag cag rnams kyis kyang rab tu 'byung ba 'di bsgrub par bgyi'o//de nas 'jam dpal
357a7(mdo sde): gozhon nur gyur pas smad 'tshong ma'i bu mo gser mchog 'od dad la la 'di skad ces smras so//bu mo khyod rta'i shing rta 'di la zhon laM/tshong dpon gyi bu 'jigs byin la
357b1(mdo sde): snying brtse ba'i phyir yongs su smin par gyis shig dang /de nyid kyis khyod rab tu 'byung ba dang /bsnyen par rdzogs par 'gyur ro//de nas skye bo phal po che de dag 'di snyam du
357b2(mdo sde): sems te/'dod chags drang bral ba dang /'dod chags dang ma bral ba gnyis lhan cig gnas su ji ltar rung snyam mo//de nas bu mo dris skye bo phal po che de dag gi sems
357b3(mdo sde): kyi yongs su rtog pa sems kyis shes nas/skye bo phal po che de dag la 'di skad ces smras so//grogs po dag 'dod chags dang bral ba'i byang chub sems dpa' ni 'dod chags
357b4(mdo sde): dang bcas po'i sems can rnams dang lhan cig gnas kyang kha na ma tho ba med la/'dod chags dang bcas pa'i sems can rnams kyang 'dul bar byed do//grogs po dag zhe
357b5(mdo sde): sdang dang bral ba'i byang chub sems dpa' ni zhe sdang dang bcas pa'i sems can rnams dang lhan cig gnas kyang kha na ma tho ba med la zhe sdang dang bcas pa'i sems can rnams kyang 'dul
357b6(mdo sde): bir byed de//grogs po dag gti mug dang bral ba'i byang chub sems dpa' ni gti mug dang bcas pa'i sems can rnams dang lhan cig gnas kyang kha na ma tho ba med la gti mug
357b7(mdo sde): dang bcas pa'i sems can rnams kyang 'dul bar byed do//grogs po dag nyon mongs pa dang bral ba'i byang chub sems dpa' ni nyon mongs pa dang bcas pa'i sems can rnams
358a1(mdo sde): dang lhan cig gnas kyang kha na ma tho ba med la nyon mongs pa dang bcas pa'i sems can rnams kyang 'dul bar byed do//grogs po dag 'di lta ste dper na/ma
358a2(mdo sde): ni bu dang lhan cig gnas kyang chags pa med do//grogs po dag de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang sems can thams cad dang lhan cig gnas kyang chags pa med do//
358a3(mdo sde): grogs po dag 'di lta ste dper na/bcings pa las bkrol ba'i mi ni 'dod chags kyi kun tu spyad pa la mi spyod do//grogs po dag de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang khams
358a4(mdo sde): gsum pa dag 'ching ba dang 'ob sdu lta bur 'du shes pas chags pa med do//de nas slad 'tshong ma'i bu mo gse ru mchog 'od dpal chos kyi 'bab stegs su ni zhugs/gting
358a5(mdo sde): ni rnyed/thang la ni phyin/ma rig pa'i mun pa dang ni bral te/srid pa'i skyon gyi nyon mongs pa 'jigs par lta ba ni legs par mthong nas/'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i
358a6(mdo sde): rkang pa la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/lan gsum bskor ba byas nas shing rta la zhon gar tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so//rang bzhin rnam dag chags pas ma chags
358a7(mdo sde): shing //rtag tu byams sems snang bas sdang ba med//shes rab snang shar gti mug rmongs bral ba//nyon mongs med par shing rta bzhon par bya//gang gis sngon chad
358b1(mdo sde): bdag ni rgyal gyur cing //nor chags tshong dpon bu dang lhan cig tu//shing rtar zhugs nas skyed mos tshal song ba//'dod pa'i rnam rtog de dag gang du song //ji ltar sprin tshogs
358b2(mdo sde): stug pos sa khebs na//nyi ma'i 'od zer lham me lhan nor min//'on kyang 'od zer de dag gar mi 'gro//sprin gyis bsgribs pas snang ba med du zad//de bzhin nyon mongs bsgribs
358b3(mdo sde): pas byis pa kun//shes rab snang la blo skye med pa yang //shes rab yul gang na yang gnas pa med//nyon mongs yongs su shes pas shes rab snang //nyon mongs gang nas
358b4(mdo sde): 'ong ba'ang ma yin zhing //yul gyi phyogs dang char yang ma yin te//tshul bzhin ma yin pa las nyon mongs 'byung //tshul bzhin gyis ni de dge 'byung mi 'gyur//bor ba
358b5(mdo sde): med cing blangs pa'ang yod ma yin//bskyed pa med cing bkag pa'ang yod ma yin//gzhan la ma byin phrogs pa'ang ma yin te//chos mnyam nyid kyis bdag kyang rnam par
358b6(mdo sde): dag/'bru mar sgron ma mun par byung ba na//mun pa phyogs su 'dong ba med pa ltar//shes rab kyis ni mun pa med gyur na//nyon mongs zad gyur med cing 'byung ba'ang
358b7(mdo sde): med//ji ltar sman pas nad pa gso bya na//de yi khams ni 'jig par mi byed kyang //de yi glo bur nad ni zhi bar 'gyur//nad rnams gzhan yang 'byung ba med pa ltar//de
359a1(mdo sde): bzhin sman pa'i dam pa 'jam dbyangs kyis//rigs pa'i tshul mkhyen sbyor ba sna tshogs kyis//sems can nyon mongs nye bar zhi mdzad kyang //chos rnams
359a2(mdo sde): rnam par 'jig par mdzad pa med//phung po 'di dang khams rnams 'di dag dang //skye mched 'di rnams gtan du 'gyur ba med//gang dag sngon chad nyes ldan dug bcas pa//
359a3(mdo sde): de dag da ni dug med 'gyur ba med//de nas smad 'tsheng ma'i bu mo gser mchog 'od dpal gyis tshigs su bcad pa de dag smras nas/yang 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i
359a4(mdo sde): rkang pa la mgo bos phyag byas te/yang 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la bskor ba byas nas/tshong dpon gyi bu 'jigs byin dang /lhan cig tu shing rta la zhon te/de lta
359a5(mdo sde): bu'i 'byor pa nyid kyis skyod mos tshal gyi sar song ngo //'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas kyang thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de la chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis yang dag
359a6(mdo sde): par bston/yang dgo par 'dzin du bcug/yang dag par gzeng bstod/yang dag par rab tu dga' bar byas so//yang dag par bstan/yang dag par 'dzin du
359a7(mdo sde): bcug/yang dag par gzeng bstod/yang dag par rab tu dga' bar byas nas de dag la 'di skad ces smras so//grogs po dag gang dag chos nyan par dga' ba rnams
359b1(mdo sde): da'ang phyi dro'i dus kyi tshe de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan sngar dengs shig/de skad ces smras nas/sa phyogs de nas langs te/rang rang gi gnas ga la ba de logs su song ngo //de nas
359b2(mdo sde): smad 'tshong ma'i bu mo gser mchog 'od dpal dong /tshong dpon gyi bu 'jigs byin gnyis lhan cig tu skyed mos tshal du phyin pa dang /der me tog 'chal par bkram ste bdug pas
359b3(mdo sde): bdugs/bla bre bres nas gdugs dang /rgyal mtshan dang /ba dan sna tshogs kyis legs par brtson te/bza' btung 'byor pa dag kyang bshams nas/dga' ba'i rtsed
359b4(mdo sde): mo dang rjes su mthun pa'i sil snyan dang /phog rdob par glu dbyangs len par byed cing skyed mos tshul na gnas par gyur to//de dag gis zos shing 'thungs nas rab tu myos
359b5(mdo sde): par gyur pa dang /smad 'tshong ma'i bu mo gser mchog 'od dpal tshong dpon gyi bu 'jigs byin gyi phang par sngas bcas te nyal lo//de nas bu mo des mngon par shes po'i
359b6(mdo sde): stobs kyis rang gi lus rnyis par bstan nas/des 'chi ba'i 'du shes bskyed de/de'i lus thams cad mi sdug par gyur nas ro myags pa 'dra bar snang zhing de'i rna ba'i bu klu
359b7(mdo sde): gnyis dang /mig gi dbang po dang /sna'i nang nas mi gtsang ba dri mi zhimo pa dag 'byung zhing byung nas kyang lus thams cad la khyab par gyur to//de'i kha'i nang nas kyang dri
360a1(mdo sde): mnam po dag byung ste/dri mnam po de dag gis skyed mos tshal de thams cad kyang khyab par gyur to//spu'i khung bu thams cad nas kyang khrag dang rnag mnam po
360a2(mdo sde): dag 'dzag go//lto ba dang lte ba'i dbus rdol ba nas kyang mtshar pa dang rgyu ma thams cad byung ngo //rku ba dang 'doms nas kyang bshang gci dag 'byung zhing 'dzag do//de'i spyi bo
360a3(mdo sde): nas kyang klad pa 'dzag go//rkang lag gi sor mo rnams la'ang sbrang ma sngon po dag rgyu bar gyur to//de nas tshong dpon gyi bu 'jigs byin gyis bu mo de'i lus la de lta bu'i gnas
360a4(mdo sde): skabs su gyur pa dag mthong ngo //mthong nas kyang 'jigs sgeg ste yi chad cing skyabs med rten med dpung gnyen med par gyur nas skyabs 'tshal zhing 'jigs pa chen
360a5(mdo sde): pos skrag par gyur nas 'dar zhing cho nges 'debs par gyur to//de 'jigs pa chen po skyes pa'i rgyu ni gnyis te/so so'i skye bo nyid yin pa dang /'jigs pa'i skyon de
360a6(mdo sde): dag mthong ba'o//bdag re zhig na bu mo 'dri'i le lan gyis rgyal po ma skyes dwagras bsad par 'ong ngo snyam nas/des bu mo de phong pa nas dor ba dang 'bros par brtsams
360a7(mdo sde): na'ang ma nus so//de'i 'khor thams cad kyis kyang 'jigs su rung ba'o 'jigs pa chen po de mthong nas bros par gyur to//de nas de gcig pu grogs med par de na
360b1(mdo sde): shin tu 'jigs shing skrag nas/bdag 'jigs skrag pa chen po 'di las yongs su thar bar byed pa lta 'am/klu 'am/gnod sbyin nam/dri za 'am/lha ma yin nam/nam
360b2(mdo sde): mkha' lding ngam/mi 'am tsI 'am/lto 'phye chen po'am/mi 'am/mi ma yin pa 'am/dge slong ngam/bram za su yod snyam sems shing 'dug go//tshong dpon gyi bu de'ang
360b3(mdo sde): dge ba'i rtse ba yongs su ma smin pas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas bu mo de la chos bshad pa dag kyang ma thos mi shes so//de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i byin
360b4(mdo sde): gyis rlabs kyis skyed mos tshal de'i shing ljon pa thams cadang+ga las tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag byung ngo //'jig rten thams cad yang dag min//ji ltar sgyu ma mthong ba bzhin//
360b5(mdo sde): khye'us ji ltar mthong gyur pa//chos rnams rang bzhin de yin no//shwa dang khrag gis bskus pa ni//byis pa rnams kyis 'khrul pa ste//yang dag mini der rnam brtags
360b6(mdo sde): nus//mi mA khas byis pa chags par byed//ji ltar mi mkhas mi zhig ni//dring gla rtsi'i bum pA la//phyi rol ri mo bris pa zhig/mgo la khyer te song ba las//'gro ba de
360b7(mdo sde): yi de yang ni//de las lhung ste cha go gyur nas//dri nga gla rtsi mthong gyur te//chags pa med cing 'bros po ltar//de bzhin byis pa mi mkhas pa//bud med rnams la yid
361a1(mdo sde): zhen cing //khwa dog gzugs dang dbyibs rnams la//brtags nas de la chags par byed//lus kyi rang bzhin gang yin pa//de la khye'u khyod rab
361a2(mdo sde): rtogs shig/dur khrod rul pa'i dri la ni//mkhas po su zhig chags par 'gyur//yang dag min la 'jigs med kyis//khyod ni 'jigs par ma byed paro//gang la
361a3(mdo sde): khyod sngan brgyal gyur pa'i//chos rnams kyi ni rang bzhin ltos//chos kyi dam pa ston mdzad cing //'jigs gyur 'jigs po sel mdzad pa//shAkya seng ge zhes bya
361a4(mdo sde): bro'i//ston pa yang dag byung ba yod//'dod pa mi rtag mi brtan pa//glog 'od snang ba ji bzhin te//snang yang yang dag ma yin pas//mkhas pa de la chags pa
361a5(mdo sde): med/ji ltar chu ni 'khrugs pa las//dbu ba rdos pa byung ba yang //rgyu yi sbyor las skyes pa lta//de la byed pa po yang med//de bzhin ming dang gzugs rnams
361a6(mdo sde): kyang //las kyi sbyor las skyes pa ste//rgyu las byung ba yin pas na//byed pa po ni gang yod med//kha drog bzong po gar song zhing //gang gis khyod 'dir skrag pa yi//
361a7(mdo sde): mi gtsang ba yang ga las 'ongs//khye'u khyod de la mngon sum gyis//chos rnams yul ni mi gnas shing //de dag phyogs nas 'ongs pa med//'ong ba med cing
361b1(mdo sde): 'gro med kyang //de dag rang bzhin ston par byed//'di la byed pa po med cing //tshor ba po yang 'dri la med//byed med tshor ba po med pa'i//chos rnams sgyu 'dra dngos po
