361b2(mdo sde): med//rang gi lus la rtogs shig dang //de yang 'dri dang 'odra bas na//khye'u khyod gzhan gyi lus kyis ni//'dir yang skrag par ma byed cig/ji ltar rmi lami rmis pa na/
361b3(mdo sde): rtsed mo byed cing dga' ba ltar//de bzhin dga' ba'i rtsed mo kun//rmi lam rtsed mo byas dang 'dra//shAkya seng ge'i spyan sngar ni//khye'u khyod 'gro bar gyis shig dang
361b4(mdo sde): des ni khyo'u khyod 'jigs dang skrag/rtswa dang bcas te 'byin par 'gyur//pha ma khyod kyi skyabs ma yin//mdza' ba shes rtse lag rnams kyang min//de dag gis ni khyod
361b5(mdo sde): bor nas//ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du 'gro//'jigs gyur 'jigs pa sel mdzad cing //skyabs med skyob pa'i sangs rgyas dang //chos dang tshogs mchog dge 'dun
361b6(mdo sde): la//der ni skyabs su 'gro bar gyis//lce dang dri za mi rnams las//gang dag de la skyabs song ba//'jigs pa kun las thar bar 'gyur//bde ba rnyed par dka'
361b7(mdo sde): ba med//de nas tshong dpon gyi khye'u des tshigs su bcad pa de dag thos nas dga' mgu zhing yi rangs te 'jigs skrag pa dang bral nas dga' ba dang mchog tu dga' ba skyes
362a1(mdo sde): te/shi ba'i ro myags pa de bor nas nags khrod de nas byung ngo //de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshong dpon gyi bu de gdul ba'i dbang gi phyir sku las 'od rab tu
362a2(mdo sde): phyung ste/'od des yul ma ga d+ho thams cad snang bas khyab par gyur to//khye'u des de bzhin gshegs pa dag bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyi ma'i dkyil
362a3(mdo sde): 'khor 'char ba dang 'dra ba gzi brjid dang dpal gyis 'bar ba/mdzes pa dga' bar bya ba/dbang po zhi ba/thugs zhi ba/dul ba mchog mtshungs pa med pa dam pa'i
362a4(mdo sde): mchog brnyes pa gser gyi mchod sdong ltar mngon du 'bar ba/glang po che ltar dbang po thul cing bsrungs pa/mtsho ltar dang zhing gsal la rnyog pa med pa/skyes bu chen
362a5(mdo sde): po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis brgyan pa/nyan thos kyi tshogs kyis yongs su bskor nas chos ston cing bzhugs par rgyang ring po nas mthong ngo //de'i lam bkra ba
362a6(mdo sde): blta na sdug pa/rin po che'i lan kan bres pa/me tog bkram pa zhig kyang byung bar gyur to//lha'i dbang po brgya byin yang khye'u de'i mdun du 'greng nas khye'u de la 'di
362a7(mdo sde): skad ces smras so//khye'u khyod kyis de bzhi ni gshegs pa mthong nas sems rab tu dang bar gyur pa ni/rnyed pa legs par rnyed pa yin no//de bzhin gshegs
362b1(mdo sde): pa'ang khyod nyid la dgongs kyis/khye'u khyod lam 'dir zhugs la de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan sngar song zhig/de nas khye'u de lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang lhan cig tu bcom
362b2(mdo sde): ldan 'odas ga la ba der song ngo //de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis khye'u de la/khye'u khyod kyis me tog 'di dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa lnga mngon par gtor zhig ces
362b3(mdo sde): me tog man+ta ra ba thu ba gang byin no//de nas khye'u des me tog de dgra bcom ldan 'das la mngon par gtor to//gtor nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyug
362b4(mdo sde): btsal te/lan gsum bskor ba byas nas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug ste/bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//bdag bcom ldan 'das dang /chos
362b5(mdo sde): dang /dge slong gi dge 'dun la skyabs su mchi'o//bdag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba 'di'ang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo bar bgyi'o//bcom
362b6(mdo sde): ldan 'das bdag gis yul gyi bzang mo rgyal pos thugs su chud pa gser mchog 'od dpal zhes bgyi ba zhig dga' bar rtse bo'i slad du skyed mos tshal du khrid pa las/bcom ldan
362b7(mdo sde): 'das de mdog yal zhing lus myags te nye du'i tshogs thams cad kyis kyang spangs nas bdag kyang 'jigs pa chen po skyes na/bcom ldan 'das 'di'i lo len gyis bdag rgyal
363a1(mdo sde): bos bkum du mi mchi lags sam/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/khye'u mdogs shig/sangs rgyas la skyabs su song ba rnams la 'dzugs/
363a2(mdo sde): paphyis mi 'byung bas/ngas khyod mi 'jigs pas 'gron du gnyer gyis 'jigs pa ma sbyad cig/khye'u de lta mod kyi gzhi gang las 'jigs pa dang skrag par gyur pa'i gzhi de
363a3(mdo sde): yongs su spongs shig/gsol pa bcom ldan 'das 'jigs skrag par 'gyur ba'i gzhi gang lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/khye'u 'dod chags dang
363a4(mdo sde): zhe sdang dang /gti mug ni 'jigs pa dang skrag par 'gyur ba'i gzhi'o//nga'o snyam pa'i nga rgyal ni gzhi'o//lta ba'i kun nas ldang ba ni gzhi'o//sred pas lhag par
363a5(mdo sde): chags pa ni gzhi'o//ngar 'dzin pa dang nga yir 'dzin pa ni gzhi'o//dngos po la mngon par zhen pa ni gzhi'o//yongs su 'dzin pa dang rtsod pa ni gzhi'o//'jig tshogs
363a6(mdo sde): la lta ba'i 'ching ba ni gzhi'o//mi rtag pa la rtag par 'du shes pa ni gzhi'o//sdug bsngal ba la bde bar 'du shes pa ni gzhi'o//mi sdug pa la sdug par 'du
363a7(mdo sde): shes pa ni bzhi'o//bdag med pa la bdag tu 'du shes pa ni gzhi'o//phung po rnams la yongs su 'dzin pa'i 'du shes ni gzhi'o//khams la so sor mi rtog pa
363b1(mdo sde): ni gzhi'o//skye mched rnams yongs su mi shes pa ni gzhi'o//lus la skyon du mi lta ba ni gzhi'o//srog la mngon par dga' ba ni gzhi ste/khye'u gzhi de dag las 'jigs
363b2(mdo sde): pa dang skrag pa'i byung bas de dag spang bar bya'o//khye'u khyod kyis bu mo de'i lus rnam par zhig pa mthong ngam/gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das bdag gis mthong lags so///
363b3(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/khye'u 'dus byos thams cad ni de ltar mi rtag pa/sdug bsngal ba/bdag med pa rnam par 'gyur ba'i chos can/mi brtan pa/
363b4(mdo sde): ther zug ma yin pa/byis pa 'drid pa/log pa las byung ba/g.yo ba med pa/rnam par bsgrubs pa ste/med pa las snang bas sgyu ma lta bu'o//ro myang ba chung bas
363b5(mdo sde): rmi lam lta bu'o//'khrul par snang bas smig rgyu lta bu'o//gzod ma nas ma skyes pas mig yor lta bu'o//las kyi rnam par smin pas chud mi za ba'i tshul gyis gzugs
363b6(mdo sde): brnyan lta bu'o//'phro ba med pa'i tshul gyis chu zla lta bu'o//sgra med pa las spror go bar byed pas brag ca lta bu'o//mngon par 'du byed pa med pa'i sgo yin pas grib
363b7(mdo sde): ma'o gzugs lta bu'o//rang bzhin gyis ya ma~M bairla yin pas chang ba stong pa lta bu'o//bzung du med pa'i rlung dang mtshungs pa'o//brdzun pa'o//gzhi med pa'o//
364a1(mdo sde): gsog go//'grib pa med pa'o//rdzogs pa med pa'o//khye'u de ltar na chos thams cad bdag po med pa ste/de la khyod mngon par zhen par mi bya'o//bya
364a2(mdo sde): de ji snyam du sems/khyod kyi 'dod pa dang ldan pa'i rtog pa dang dpyod pa gang yin pa de dag ji ltar mthong /khye'us gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das byis pa so so'i skye
364a3(mdo sde): rnams kyi 'dod chags ni kha dog dang dbyibs bzang po las yongs su brtags pas skye lags so//de ni 'phags pa'i chos 'dul bas mi gtsang ba lo sogs par so sor
364a4(mdo sde): brtags pas mi 'byung ste/bcom ldan 'das de las mi rtog na 'dod chags kyi kun 'byung ba kun tu 'byung bar mi 'gyur lags so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
364a5(mdo sde): stsal pa/khye'u legs so legs so//'di lta ste/mi rtog cing rnam par mi rtog pa 'di ni 'dod chags kyi rang bzhin yin no//khye'u khyod kyis bdag tu lta ba med
364a6(mdo sde): pa dang /gzhan du lta bar sgro 'dogs pa med par tshos la tshul bzhin du sems par brtson par bya'o//khye'us gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub
364a7(mdo sde): sems dpa' chos la tshul bzhin du sems par brtson pa lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/khye'u byang chub sems dpa' ni 'dod chags kyi rang
364b1(mdo sde): bzhin gyis byang chub yongs su 'chol lo//khye'u de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' ni zhe sdang gi rang bzhin dang /gti mug gi rang bzhin dang /nyon mongs pa thams
364b2(mdo sde): cad kyi rang bzhin gyis byang chub yongs su 'tshal lo//khye'u ji ltar 'dod chags dang zhe sdang dang gti mug dngos po med pa de ltar chos thams cad la byang chub sems dpa'i
364b3(mdo sde): shes pa 'jug go/khyo'u 'dod chags dang zhe sdang dang gti mug rnams ni rtsa ba med pa/gnas mod pa/gzhi med pa/byed pa po med pa/tshor ba po med pa/nang dang
364b4(mdo sde): phyi rol dben pa/stong po/bdag dang /sems can dang /srog dang /gso ba dang /skyes bu dang /gang zag dang bral ba mtshan ma med pa ste/mtshan mar rtog pa
364b5(mdo sde): dong bral ba/smon pa med pa/mngon par dga' ba med pa/dga' ba dang /sred pa dang bral ba/mngon par 'du byed pa med pa/rang bzhin med pa'o//khye'u
364b6(mdo sde): 'dod chags dang zhe sdang dang gti mug ji lta ba de bzhin du chos thams cad la byang chub sems dpa'i shes pa 'jug go/khye'u gzhan yang tshul bzhin la brtson pa'i byang chub
364b7(mdo sde): sems dpa'i sems bskyed pa thams cad ni byang chub yin no//de ci'i phyir zhe na/sems rtogs pa gang yin pa de ni bstan du med pa dang /smon pa med po dang /
365a1(mdo sde): rnam par rig pa med pa dang /sgyu ma'i rang bzhin lta bu dang /nang ma yin pa dang /phyi rol ma yin pa dang /gzhan dang ldan pa ma yin pas
365a2(mdo sde): gzugs med pa ste/khye'u de nyid byang chub sems dpa'i byang chub yin to//khye'u byang chub sems dpas rang gi sems rtogs pa ma gtogs par khong du chud par bya ba
365a3(mdo sde): gzhan ci'ang med do//rang gi sems rtogs pa grang yin pa de nyid sems can thams cad kyi sems rtogs pa yin no//rang gi sems dben pas sems can
365a4(mdo sde): thams cad kyi sems dben no//rang gi sems kyi rang bzhin gyis sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi rang bzhin no//rang gi sems rnam par dag pas sems
365a5(mdo sde): can thams cad kyi sems rnam par dag go/rang gi sems 'dod chags dang bral bas sems can thams cad kyi sems 'dod chags dang bral lo//rang gi sems
365a6(mdo sde): la zhe sdang med pas sems can thams cad kyi sems la zhe sdang med do//rang gi sems la gti mug med pas sems can thams cad kyi sems la gti mug med
365a7(mdo sde): do|/rang gi sems la nyon mongs pa med pas sems can thams cad kyi sems la nyon mongs pa med do//de ltar rtogs pa gang yin pa de thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes
365b1(mdo sde): rtags pa yin no//khye'u de ltar tshul bzhin la brtson pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni sems can thams cad kyi sems la rang bzhin gyis kun+da nas nyon mongs pa med par rab tu
365b2(mdo sde): shes so//gang glo bur gyi nyon mongs pas nye bar nyon mongs kyang sems kyi rgyud la ni nyon mongs par 'gyur ba'ang med la/chos kyi rigs pa'i lhag mthong gis de dag de
365b3(mdo sde): la yongs su gdung ba'ang med de/des byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis glo bur gyi nyon mongs pa rnams mthong bas na kun nas nyon mongs par mi 'gyur ro//bstan pa
365b4(mdo sde): 'di bshad pa na tshang dpon gyi bu 'jigs byin chos rnams la rjes su mthun pa'i bzod pa skyes par gyur to//de nas smad 'tshang ma'i bu mo gser mchog 'od dpal gyis/
365b5(mdo sde): tshong dpon gyi bu de dul bar rig nas lha'i bu mo lnga brgya tsam gyis yongs su bskor te/si lo snyan dang /pheg rdob pa dang /glu dbyangs len pa dag byed cing /bcom ldan
365b6(mdo sde): 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas/bcom ldan
365b7(mdo sde): 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug go//de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas tshong dpon gyi bu 'jigs byin la 'di skad ces smras so//khye'u khyod kyis sring mo 'di shes sam
366a1(mdo sde): smras pa/'jam dpal 'tshal lags so//'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ji lta bur shes/de nas khye'u des 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la tshigs su bcad
366a2(mdo sde): de smras pa/gzugs ni dbu ba rdos pa 'dra//tshor ba chu yi chu bung bzhin//'du shes smig rgyu lta bu ste//'du byed rnams ni chu shing bzhin//rnam shes sgyu ma lta bu ste//
366a3(mdo sde): yongs su rtogs pas kun tu bskyed//byis pas yang dag mini rtags pa//de ltar bdag gis yongs su 'tshol//'di lus mi g.yo bems po ste//rtswa drang brtsig pa
366a4(mdo sde): lta bu lags//rnam shes bston du ma mchis te//de ltar bdag gis yongs su 'tshal//'di la sems can bdag ma mchis//srog dang gang zag ma mchis te//lus
366a5(mdo sde): 'di bsngags pa tsam lags par//de ltar bdag gis yongs su 'tshal//'di la 'dod chags sdang ma mchis//gti mug 'byung ba'ang ma mchis te//nyon mongs
366a6(mdo sde): ma mchis bdag ma mchis//de ltar bdag gis yongs su 'tshal//tshul bzhin ma lags bskrad pa 'di//byis pa rnams kyi 'khrul pa ste//mkhas pa de la mi
366a7(mdo sde): chags par//de ltar bdag gis yongs su 'tshal//dper na 'di ni nags khrod na//shi ba'i ri ni mnam pa bzhin//gzugs 'di rang bzhin de 'dra bar//de ltar
366b1(mdo sde): badrag gis yongs su 'tshal//'di ni sngon mthar ma skyes te//phyi mthar 'chi 'phor 'gyur ma mchis//da ltar byung ba ma mchis par//de ltar bdag gis yongs su 'tshal//
366b2(mdo sde): 'di yis bdag ni rgyal ba las//mi gtsang ba yis bkrol bas na//'jam dbyangs rnam pa ji ltas kyang //'di la lan glan rngo mi thog/mi 'gum 'chi 'pho ma mchis kyang //
366b3(mdo sde): sems can yongs smin bgyi slad du//bdag ni 'chi bar ston bgyid pas//su zhig byang chub 'chol mi bgyid//ji ltar bdag gis chags sdang dang //nyon mongs thams
366b4(mdo sde): cad tshul bzhin min//sems can kun gyi mtshan de 'dra//'di ni chos rnams chos nyid lags//de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das 'dzum pa mdzad //'di ni sangs rgyas
366b5(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi chos nyid de/gang gi tshe 'dzum pa mdzad pa de'i tshe/bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal gyi sgo nas 'od zer kha dog sna tshogs/kha dog du ma 'di lta ste/sngon
366b6(mdo sde): po dang /ser po dang /dkar po dang /btsod ka dang /shel dang /dngul gyi kha dog lta bu dag byung ste/de dag byung nas tshangs pa'i 'jig rten gyi bar du song ste/'jig rten
366b7(mdo sde): gyi khams mtha' yas mu med pa dag snang bas khyab par byas nas/slar log ste/bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu'i gtsug tu nub bo//de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bcom ldan
367a1(mdo sde): 'das 'dzum pa mdzad pa mthong nas stan las langs te/bla gros phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/bcom ldan
367a2(mdo sde): 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//de bzhin gshegs po dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
367a3(mdo sde): rgyas rnams ni rgyu dang rkyen ma mchis por 'dzum pa mi mdzad na/bcom ldan 'das 'dzum pa mdzad pa'i rgyu ni gang lags/rkyen ni gang lags/de nas de'i tshe tshigs su bcad
367a4(mdo sde): pa 'di dag kyang gsol to//rnam 'dren 'jig rten mkhyen la ya mtshan mi mnga' bas//ston pa rgyu ma mchis par 'dzum pa mi mdzad na//'di ltar khyod ni 'dzum pa mdzad
367a5(mdo sde): par gyur pa yi//khyod kyi 'dzum pa'i rgyu ni badrag cag shin tu 'tshal//rgyal ba'i zhal 'dzum mdzad par gyur pa mthong nas ni//lhar bcas 'gro ba 'di dag the tshom skyes
367a6(mdo sde): par gyur//the tshom gyur pa rnams kyi som nyi bsal du gsol//mi dbang 'dzum pa mdzad pa'i rgyu ni bstan du gsol//gang gis de ring chos rnams la ni yid bzhag gom///
367a7(mdo sde): chos nyid du ni rgyal ba la las mthong gyur tam//sangs rgyas bsngags pa'i mchod pa gang gis ding bgyis sam//bdag cag de dag nyan par 'tshal lo mi yi gtso//
367b1(mdo sde): gang gang de ring bdud rnams bzhon dang bcas bcom mam//gang gis ston pa'i thugs ni dri ring dgyes bgyis sam//gang gis de ring 'dus byas rnams kyi gting rtogs snyam//
367b2(mdo sde): de dag nyan par 'tshal gyis the tshom bsal du gsol//'dren pa 'dzum pa mdzad pa'i rgyu ni mnyan slad du//'gro ba thams cad thal mo sbyar po bgyis te sdod//rkang gnyis
367b3(mdo sde): rnams kyi gtso bo thugs rje bskyed mdzod la//the tshom gyur pa rnams kyi yid gnyis bsal du gsol//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/kun dga' bo khyod kyis smad 'tshong
367b4(mdo sde): ma'i bu mo gser mchog 'od dong la zhes bya ba 'di mthong ngam/gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das mthong lags so//bde bar gshegs pa mthong lags so//bcom ldan
367b5(mdo sde): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/kun dga' bo smad 'tshong ma'i bu mo gser mchog 'od dpal 'di ni sngon 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
367b6(mdo sde): byang chub yang dag par 'dzin du bcug ste/'dis de las thos nas chos rnams la rjes su mthun pa'i bzod pa thob par gyur to//kun dga' bo khyod kyis tshong dpon gyi bu 'jigs
367b7(mdo sde): byin zhes bya ba 'di mthong ngam/gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das mthong lags so//bde bar gshegs pa mthong lags so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/kun dga'
368a1(mdo sde): bo 'di ni ngas sngon bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yang dag par 'dzin du bcug ste/'dis kyang nga las chos thos nas chos rnams la rjes su
368a2(mdo sde): mthun pa'i bzod pa thob par gyur to//kun dga' bo smad 'tshong ma'i bu mo gser mchog 'od dpal 'di ni bskal pa 'bum phrag dgu bcu rtsa gnyis 'das pa'i 'og tu bskal
368a3(mdo sde): pa rin chen 'byung ba zhes bya ba la/'jig rten gyi khams rin chen can zhes bya bar mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ste/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
368a4(mdo sde): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen 'od ces bya bar 'gyur ro//kun dga' bo 'jog rten gyi khams de'i sems can rnams kyi longs spyod dang /nye bar spyod pa ni sum cu rtsa
368a5(mdo sde): gsum gyi lha rnams ci 'dra ba da 'dra bar 'gyur ro//de na byang chub sems dpa' rin po tsha dag ma gtogs par rin po che gzhan 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro//de bzhin gshegs
368a6(mdo sde): pa de'i tshe'i tshad ni dpag tu med par 'gyur ro//de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa dang chud dpon gyi bu 'jigs byin 'di'ang
368a7(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' yon tan rin chen 'od ces bya bar gyur te/de bzhin gshegs po de'i chos kyi mdzod 'dzin par byed do//gang gi tshe de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen
368b1(mdo sde): 'od yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ba de'i tshe/byang chub sems dpa' yon tan rin chen 'od de la/byang chub sems dpa' yon tan rin chen 'od 'di ni de'i 'og
368b2(mdo sde): tu bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ste/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen 'od 'phro
368b3(mdo sde): zhes bya bar 'gyur ro//de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing bkod pa'ang nga'i ci 'dra ba de 'dra bar 'gyur ro zhes lung ston par 'gyur ro//smad 'tshong ma'i bu mo gser mchog 'od dpal dang /
368b4(mdo sde): tshong dpon gyi bu 'jigs byin gnyis lung bstan ma thag tu de'i mod la stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rnam pa drug tu g.yos shing 'jig rten du snang ba
368b5(mdo sde): chen pos khyab par gyur to//lung bstan pa bshad pa 'di bstan pa na srog chags brgya stong gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par gyur
368b6(mdo sde): to//de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam glengs 'di'i ming ci lags 'di ji ltar gzung bar
368b7(mdo sde): bgyi/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/kun dga' bo de'i phyir khyod kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bkod pa chen po'i sgo'i le'u zhes bya bar gzung zhig/'jam dpal
369a1(mdo sde): rnam par rol pa zhes bya bar yang gzung zhig/smad 'tshang ma'i bu mo gser mchog 'od dpal btul ba zhes bya bar yang gzung zhig/bcom ldan 'das
369a2(mdo sde): kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang /smad 'tshong ma'i bu mo gser mchog 'od dpal dang /tshang dpon gyi bu 'jigs byin dang /'jam dpal
369a3(mdo sde): gzhon nur gyur pa dang /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag dang /thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dang /lha dang mi dang /lho ma yin dang /dri zar
369a4(mdo sde): bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do//'phags pa 'jam dpal rnam par rol pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i
369a5(mdo sde): mdo rdzogs so///rgya gar gyi mkhan po su ren+d+ra bo d+hi dang /zhu chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba ban+de ye shes sdes zhus te gtan la phab pa//rgya gar skad du/ar+ya many+dzu shrI
369a6(mdo sde): bi kurbA Na pa ri brta nA ma ma hA yA na su tra/bod skad du/'phags pa 'jam dpal rnam par 'phrul pa'i le'u zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/sangs rgyas dang bying
369a7(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo//'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon
369b1(mdo sde): med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na dge slong stong nyis brgya lnga bcu'i dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang thabs nacig tu bzhugs te/byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun chen po dang /'dod
369b2(mdo sde): pa na spyod pa dang /gzugs na spyod pa dang /gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha'i bu du ma dag dang yang thabs cig go/de na bcom ldan 'das 'khor brgya stong du mas yongs su bskor
369b3(mdo sde): cing mdun gyis bltas nas chos ston to//de'i tshe lha'i bu 'od mang po zhes bya ba 'khor de nyid du 'dus par gyur te 'dug go/'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'ang 'khor de nyid du 'dus
369b4(mdo sde): par gyur te 'dug go/de nas lha'i bu 'od mang pos 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so//'jam dpal byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bla na med pa yang dag
369b5(mdo sde): par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la bdud par chad byed na/'jam dpal byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bdud kyi las gang yin/de skad ces smras pa dang /'jam dpal gzhon
369b6(mdo sde): nur gyur pas lha'i bu 'od mang po la 'di skad ces smras so//lha'i blo ji tsam du las rnams 'byung ba de tsam du bdud kyi las so//ji tsam du smon pa dang /ji tsam du log par
369b7(mdo sde): 'dzin pa dang /ji tsam du mchog tu 'dzin pa de tsam du bdud kyi las so//ji tsam du 'dod pa dang /ji tsam du 'du shes pa dang /ji tsam du rlom sems pa dang /ji tsam du
370a1(mdo sde): yongs su rtog pa de tsam du bdud kyi las so//lha'i bu gzhan yang byang chub kyi sems la mngon par zhen pa'ang bdud kyi las so//sbyin pa'i sems la mngon
370a2(mdo sde): par zhen pa'ang bdud kyi lus so//tshul khrims dang /bzod pa dang /brtson 'grus dang /bsam gtan dang /shes rab kyi sems la mngon par zhen pa'ang bdud
370a3(mdo sde): las so//sbyin po rlom sems su byed pa dang /tshul khrims mchog tu 'dzin pa dang /bzod pa 'dzin pa dang /brtson 'grus len pa dang /bsam gtan la mtshan
370a4(mdo sde): ma dang /shes rab rgyu ba'ang bdud kyi las so//dgon pa la dga' zhing mos pa'i sems dang /btang snyoms su lhung ba'ang bdud kyi las so//'dod pa nyung ba dang /
370a5(mdo sde): chog shes pa dang /sbyangs pa'i yon tan dang /yo byad bsnyungs pa rlom sems su byed pa'ang bdud kyi las so//bdag ni stong pa nyid la gnas pa/bdag ni mtshan
370a6(mdo sde): ma med pa la gnas pa/bdag ni smon pa med pa la gnas pa/bdag ni spros pa med pa la gnas pa/bdag ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i bka' bsgrub cing gnas
370a7(mdo sde): pa'o snyam du rlom sems su byed cing rnam par rtog pa'ang bdud kyi las so//lha'i bu rtog pa dang /rnam par rtog pa dang /yongs su rtog pa dang /mthong ba dang /thos
370b1(mdo sde): pA dang /bye brag phyed pa dang /rnam par shes pa'i gnas ji tsam pa de tsam du bdud kyi las so//lha'i bus smras pa/'jam dpal bdud kyi las ga las 'byung /'jam dpal
370b2(mdo sde): gyis smras pa/lha'i bu bdud kyi las ni brtson pa las 'byung ngo //de ci'i phyir zhe na/lha'i bu brdzun pa la bdud kyi glags tshol gyi/mi brtson pa lnga bdud kyis ci zhig bya bar
370b3(mdo sde): 'gyur te/de nyid bdud kyi las yin no//lha'i bus smras pa/'jam dpal byang chub sems dpa' ji ltar na brtson pa yin/ji ltar na mi brtson pa yin/'jam dpal gyis
370b4(mdo sde): smras pa/lha'i bu ji tsam du gnyis la sbyor ba de tsam du brtson pa ma yin no//de ci'i phyir zhe na/'jig rten gnas pa ni gnyis la sbyor ba dang ldan pa'o//lha'i bu brtson pa zhes
370b5(mdo sde): bya ba 'di ni sbyor ba yang dag pa'i tshig bla dogs so//sbyor ba yang dag pa zhes bya ba 'di ni sbyor ba med pa'i tshig bla dgas so//sbyor ba med pa zhes bya ba 'di ni spros pa med pa'i tshig
370b6(mdo sde): blo dag na so//spros pa med pa zhes bya ba 'di ni sbyor ba yang dag pa'i tshig bla dgas so//lha'i bu gang na mig la mi sbyor ba dang /gzugs la mi sbyor ba 'di ni byang chub sems
370b7(mdo sde): dnga'i sbyor ba yang dag pa zhes bya'o//gang na rna ba la mi sbyor ba dang /sbrul mi sbyor ba dang /snal mi sbyor ba dang /dri la mi sbyor ba dang /lce la mi sbyor ba dang /rol mi
371a1(mdo sde): sbyor ba dang /lus la mi sbyor ba dang /reg bya la mi sbyor ba dang /yid la mi sbyor ba dang /chos la mi sbyor ba 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i sbyor ba yang
371a2(mdo sde): dag pa zhes bya'o//lha'i bu gzhan yang nyon mongs pa thams cad lo'ang mi sbyor la/sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa spong ba'i phyir yang brtson pa 'di ni byang chub sems
371a3(mdo sde): dpa'i sbyor ba yang dag pa zhes bya'o//lha'i bu gzhan yang khams gsum pa thams cad la'ang mi sbyor la/khams gsum du gtogasau pa'i sems can rnams kyang 'byung
371a4(mdo sde): bar sbyor ba 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i sbyor ba yang dag pa zhes bya'o//gzhan yang sbyin pa la rlo mo sems med par yang sbyor la/sems can ser sna can sdud par yang
371a5(mdo sde): sbyor po dang /tshul khrims la rlom sems med par yang sbyor la/sems can tshul khrims 'chal pa spyad par sbyor ba dang /bzod pa la rlom sems med par yang sbyong
371a6(mdo sde): lo/sems can gnod sems can sdud par yang sbyor ba dang /brtson 'grus la rlom sems med par yang sbyor la/sems can le lo can sdud par yang sbyor ba dang /bsam
371a7(mdo sde): gtan la rlom sems med par yang sbyor la/sems can sems rnam par g.yengs pa sdud par yang sbyor ba dang /shes rab la rlom sems med por yang sbyor la/
371b1(mdo sde): sems can shes rab 'chal pa can sdud par yang sbyor ba 'di'ang byang chub sems dpa'i sbyor ba yang dag pa zhes bya'o//gzhan yang stong pa nyid la rlom sems med par yang sbyor
371b2(mdo sde): la/lta bar song ba thams cad dang yang bral zhing bolta bar song po las rnam par grol ba 'ong ma yin pa ni stong po nyid la sbyor ba ste/stong pa nyid gang gis stong pa nyid stong pa'i
371b3(mdo sde): stong pa nyid des lta bar gyur pa rnams stong pa dang /stong pa nyid gang gis lta bar gyur pa rnams stong pa'i stong pa nyid nges chos thams cad stong par 'di shes shing shes pa la
371b4(mdo sde): lhag pa'i nga rgyal yang med pa gang yin pa 'di'ang byang chub sems dpa'i sbyor ba yang dag pa'o//lha'i bu gzhan yang mtshan ma med pa la rlom sems med par yang sbyor la/
371b5(mdo sde): rnam par rtog pa thams cad dang bral zhing rnam par rtog pa las gol ba'ong ma yin pa ni mtshan ma med pa la sbyor ba ste/rnam par rtog pa gang gis mtshan ma med pa la rnam
371b6(mdo sde): par rtog pa'i rnam par rtog pa de'ang mtshan ma med pa dang mnyam zhing rnam par rtog pa de dang mtshan ma med pa'ang mtshan ma med par rnam par rtog pas mnyam par shes te/'di
371b7(mdo sde): shes shing shes pa la lhag pa'i nga rgyal yang med pa gang yin pa 'di'ang byang chub sems dpa'i sbyor ba yang dag pa'o//gzhan yang smon pa med pa la rlom sems med par
372a1(mdo sde): sa rgyu /bsanas na du sgyu gas su dzin pa sa /smon ma ngas snyoms myo gso ma chung /smyan
372a2(mdo sde): 'dudus kyang ldan lam gyis rgyu 'ang med la/sgyo ni gnyis hU~M nga yul ba di lta ste/nga 'dzin du dang / y-i ng+ge pa'i ltu
372a3(mdo sde): rgyur cing /skye skyel 'dri'i bo dang skye ba dang yang brasgo ba yin te/'di shes shing shes pa la lhag de'i nga rgyal yid med pa glad yin pa sems pa
372a4(mdo sde): spri ba yang dag ni'o//m+bu'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sbyong ba yang dag pa yang dag rdul ni gang shes rjeb kyi shes pasmra dzin po 'di med gzums
372a5(mdo sde): kyi shes pas dag pa'i rgyas thams cad sdud par yang sbyor ba dang /shes rab kyi shes pas bdag med pa dang /sems can med pa dang /srog med pa dang /
372a6(mdo sde): med pa dang /gang zug ma par yang spya mi/thabs kyi shes pas sems can thams cad yongs su smin par byung par yang sbyor ba dang /shes rab kyi zhes pa mtshas
372a7(mdo sde): ma ca byang ba med pa dang /dang med par yang stsa la/sa kyi shes pas ches sems pa de yongs su dzin par 'di myong ba nga /sa
372b1(mdo sde): sangs rgyas thams cad dang chos kyi dbyings dbyer med par yang sbyor la/thabs kyi shes pas sangs rgyas thams cad la bla mar bya ba dang /gus par bya ba dang /mchod pa dang /
372b2(mdo sde): rim gro byed par yang sbyor ba dang /shes rab kyi shes pas spangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad nam mkha'o zhing du'ang sbyor la/thabs kyi shes pas sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan
372b3(mdo sde): bkod pa yongs su sbyong ba'i rgyan la sbyor ba dang /shes rab kyi shes pas 'phags pa thams cad 'dus ma byas kyis rab tu phye bar yang sbyor la/thabs kyi shes pas 'phags
372b4(mdo sde): pa thams cad la bla mo dang /gus po dang /rim gro byed par yang sbyor ba dang /shes rab kyi shes pas sangs rgyas kyi sku zag pa med par so sor rtog par yang sbyor la/thabs
372b5(mdo sde): kyi shes pas mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po dang /rgyan la'ang sbyor ba dang /shes rab kyi shes pas 'du byed thams cad mi skyes pa dang /ma byung bar so sor rtog par yang
372b6(mdo sde): sbyor la/thabs kyi shas pos bsams bzhin du srid par skyo ba yongs su 'dzin par yang sbyor ba dang /shes rab kyi shes pas stong pa nyid dang /mtshan mo med pa dang /
372b7(mdo sde): smon pa med par yang sbyor la/thabs kyi shes pas lta ba dong rnam par rtog pa dang /smon lam spang ba ston par yang sbyor ba dang /shes rab kyi shes pas mngon par shes
373a1(mdo sde): pa skye ba med par yang sbyor la/thabs kyi shes pas mngon par shes pa thams cad kyis rnam par 'phrul par yang sbyor ba dang /shes rab kyi shes pas
373a2(mdo sde): phung po dang /khamaso dang /skye mche ma skyes pa dang mi sogs par yang sbyor la/thabs kyi shes pas phung po dang /khams dang /skye mched yongs su 'dor bar yang
373a3(mdo sde): sbyor ba dang shes rab kyi shes pas srid pa mya ngon las 'das pa'i rang bzhin du rtog par byed par yang sbyor la/thabs kyi shes pas 'khor ba na sems can yongs su smin
373a4(mdo sde): por byed par yang sbyor ba dang /shes rab kyi shes pas shes rab kyi mig la'ang sbyor la/thabs kyi shes pas lha'i mig mngon par bsgrub pa la'ang sbyor ba dang /shes rab
373a5(mdo sde): kyi shos pas chos brjod du med par khong du chud par yang sbyor la/thabs kyi shes pas yi ge dang nges pa'i tshig gis chos ston par yang sbyor ba dang /shes rab kyi shes
373a6(mdo sde): pas don dang chos so so yang dag par rig pa la yang sbyor lo/thabs kyi shes pas nges pa'i tshig dang spobs pa so so yang dag par rig pa la'ang sbyor ba dang /shes rab
373a7(mdo sde): kyi shes pas sems can gyi dbang po mchog dang /mchog ma yin pa thams cad shes pa la'ang sbyor la/thabs kyi shes pas so so ci rigs par chos ston par
373b1(mdo sde): yang sbyor ba dang /shes rab kyi shes pas sems can gyi spyod pa brgyad khri bani stong khong du chud par byed par yang sbyor la/thabs kyi shes pas chos kyi phung po brgyad khri bzhi stong //
373b2(mdo sde): yang dag par ston par yang sbyor ba 'di ni lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sbyor ba yang dag pa yang dag phul lo//'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas sbyor ba yang dgra
373b3(mdo sde): pa 'di bstan pa na/'khor de las lha'i bu brgyad stong ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems skyes so//byang chub sems dpa' lnga stong ni mi skye ba'i
373b4(mdo sde): chos la bzod pa skyes so//bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la/'jam dpal khyod kyis byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sbyor ba yang dog pa
373b5(mdo sde): 'di legs par bshod pa legs so zhes legs so zhes bya ba byin no//de nas lha'i bu 'od mang pos 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so//'jam dpal
373b6(mdo sde): khyod la de bzhin gshegs pas gang gi phyir legs so zhes bya ba byin pas ci khyod dga' bar 'gyur ram/'jam dpal gyis smras pa/lha'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems/grang
373b7(mdo sde): sprul pas sprul pa la legs so zhes bya ba byin na sprul pa de lo tsi dga' ba 'gyur ba lta yod dam/lha'i bus smras pa/'jam dpal sprul pa la rjes su chags pa'ang med//
374a1(mdo sde): khong khro ba'ang med na de la dga' bar 'gyur ba ci zhig yod/'jam dpal gyis smras pa/lha'i bu de bzhin du chos thams cad kyang sprul pa'i dbu nyid
374a2(mdo sde): mtshan nyid de/de bzhin gshegs pa'ang de'i mtshan nyid la 'jam dpal yang de'i mtshan nyid yin na/de la legs so zhes bya bas kho bo dga' bar 'gyur du ci zhig yod//
374a3(mdo sde): lha'i bu 'di lta ste dper na/brag ca ni sku snyan pa dang /mi snyan pa rnams la rjes su chags par yang mi 'gyur/khong khro bar yang mi 'gyur ro//lha'i bu de bzhin du chos
374a4(mdo sde): thams cad ni brag ca'i ngo bo nyid kyi rang bzhin te/de bzhin gshegs pa'ang de'i rang bzhin 'jam dpal yang de'i rang bzhin yin na/de la legs so zhes bya bas kho
374a5(mdo sde): dga' bar 'gyur du ci yod/lha'i bus smras pa/'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pas su la legs so zhes bya ba gnang /'jam dpal gyis smras pa/lha'i bu
374a6(mdo sde): rnam par shes pa mi gnas par ston pa dang /bstan pa thams cad la su'i blo thogs par mi 'gyur ba dang /su sems can thams cad la sems can du 'du shes mi
374a7(mdo sde): 'jug pa dang /su chos thams cad la chos su 'du shes mi 'jug pa dang /su bsam pa mya ngan las 'das pa la'ang gnas la/sbyor ba 'khor ba'i 'ang gnas
374b1(mdo sde): pa dang /su bdud kyi las khong du chud nas bdud kyi las kyang sangs rgyas kyi phrin las su shes shing /sangs rgyas kyi phrin las la mngon par zhen na/sangs rgyas kyi phrin las
374b2(mdo sde): kyang bdud kyi las su shes pa de lta bu'i chos dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' la/lha'i bu de bzhin gshegs pas legs so zhes bya ba gnang ngo //lho'i bus smras pa/
374b3(mdo sde): 'jam dpal ci de lta bu'i chos dang ldan pas de bzhin gshegs pas khyod la legs so zhes bya ba gnang ngam/'jam dpal gyis smras pa/lha'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems//gang
374b4(mdo sde): mnyam pa nyid de la mi mnyam pa gang yang yod dam/lha'i bus smras po/'jam dpal mnyam pa nyid la mi mnyam pa gang yang med do//'jam dpal gyis smras pa/lha'i bu
374b5(mdo sde): mnyam pa nyid gang dang mnyam pa de dang mtshams med pa mnyam mo//mtshams med pa gang dang mnyam pa de dang kho bo mnyam mo//mnyam pa nyid gang dang mnyam pa de dang
374b6(mdo sde): lta bar gyur pa rnams mnyam mo//lta bar gyur pa rnams gang dang mnyam pa de dang kho bo mnyam mo//mnyam pa nyid gang dang mnyam pa de dang phyin ci log rnams mnyam mo//phyin
374b7(mdo sde): ci log rnams gang dang mnyam pa de dang kho bo mnyam mo//mnyam pa nyid gang dang mnyam pa de dang dmigs pa mnyam mo//dmigs pa gang dang mnyam pa de dang kho bo mnyam
375a1(mdo sde): mo mnyam pa nyid gang dang mnyam pa de dang 'khor ba'i mtha' mnyam mo//'khor ba'i mtha' gang dang mnyam pa de dang mya ngan las 'das pa'i mtha' mnyam mo///
375a2(mdo sde): mya ngan las 'das pa'i mtha' gang dang mnyam pa de dang bdag gi mtha' mnyam mo//bdag gi mtha' gang dang mnyam pa de dang yang dag pa'i mtha' mnyam mo//yang dag pa'i
375a3(mdo sde): mtha' gang dang mnyam pa de dang ma rig pa dang /srid pa dang /sred pa'i mtha' mnyam mo//ma rig pa dang /srid pa dang /sred pa'i mtha' gang dang mnyam pa de dang
375a4(mdo sde): rig pa dang /rnam par grol ba'i mtha' mnyam mo//rig pa dang /rnam par grol ba'i mtha' gang dang mnyam pa de dang 'dod chags dang /zhe sdang dang gti mug gi mtha'
375a5(mdo sde): mnyam mo//'dod chags dang /zhe sdang dang /gti mug gi mtha' gang dang mnyam pa de dang stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa med pa'i mtha' mnyam mo///
375a6(mdo sde): stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa'i mtha' gang dang mnyam pa de dang 'dus byas kyi mtha' mnyam mo//'dus byas kyi mtha' gang dang mnyam pa
375a7(mdo sde): de dang /'dus ma byas kyi mtha' mnyam mo//'dus ma byas kyi mtha' gang dang mnyam pa de dang 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa mnyam ste/lho'i bu mnyam pa nyid des chos
375b1(mdo sde): thams cad mnyam mo//de la su 'chad pa dang /gang bshad pa dang /gang la bshad pa dang /su la legs so zhes bya ba sbyin pa'i chos de dag thams cad nam mkha' dang
375b2(mdo sde): mnyam pa nyid kyis mnyam ste/nam mkha' yang 'dus ma byas yin pas nam mkha' ni mnyam pa'ang med/mi mnyam pa'ong mod de/su rjes su mi 'gro ba'i tshul gyis mnyam
375b3(mdo sde): pa nyid 'di dag gi rjes su song ba de la de bzhin gshegs pas legs so zhes bya ba gnang ngo //lha'i bus smras pa/'jam dpal khyod legs so zhes bya ba dang legs so/
375b4(mdo sde): zhes bya ba ma yin pa las brtsams te chos bstan pa la spobs par gyis shig/'jam dpal gyis smras pa/lha'i bu lhag pa'i bosam pas byang chub kyi phyir 'jug pa ni
375b5(mdo sde): legs pa'o//g.yo dang sgyus nye bar spyod pa ni legs pa ma yin pa'o//snying rje chen pos sems can thams cad mi gtong ba ni legs pa'o//sems can rnams la
375b6(mdo sde): rnam par 'tshe ba ni legs pa ma yin pa'o//sems can thams cad la zhe 'gras pa med pa'i sems ni legs pa'o//gnod sems kyi bsam pa ni legs pa ma
375b7(mdo sde): yin pa'o//nyes byung ba mi 'chab cing 'chags te rnam par 'byed la kun nas bskor ba med par gnas pa ni legs pa'o//nyes pa byung ba 'chab pa ni legs pa ma
376a1(mdo sde): yin pa'o//bdag gi 'khrul pa la so sor rtog pa ni legs pa'o//gzhan gyi 'khrul pa'i skyon 'tshol ba ni legs pa ma yin pa'o//byas pa gzo ba
376a2(mdo sde): dang /byas pa shes pa dang /byas pa chud ma gzon pa dang /byas pa la lan du phan 'dogs pa ni legs pa'o//byas pa mi gzo ba dang /byas pa mi shes pa dang /byas
376a3(mdo sde): pa chung gzon pa dang /byas pa lo lan du phan mi 'dogs pa ni legs pa ma yin pa'o//thos pa yang dag par sgrub pa ni legs pa'o//thos pa log par bsgrub pa ni legs
376a4(mdo sde): pa ma yin pa'o//bslab pa yang dag par blangs nas ma nyams pa ni legs pa'o//bslab pa yang dag par blangs pa las 'da' ba ni legs pa ma yin pa'o//dben pa
376a5(mdo sde): la sems gzhol zhing dben pa la dga' ba ni legs pa'o//'du 'ji la dga' ba ni legs pa ma yin pa'o//dgon pa la gnas par lus dang srog 'dor ba ni legs
376a6(mdo sde): pa'o//lus drang srog la lta ba ni legs pa ma yin pa'o//'phags pa'i rigs la yang dag par dga' ba dang rung ba rnams la tshod rig pa ni legs pa'o//chog mi shes shing
376a7(mdo sde): 'dod pa che la sdig pa 'dod pa ni legs pa ma yin pa'o//nyam chung ba rnams la bzod cing dang du len pa ni legs pa'o//sems can rnams la sma 'bebs pa ni legs pa ma
376b1(mdo sde): yin pa'o//'tsho ba dag pa ni legs pa'o//snyom las can ni legs pa ma yin pa'o//skyabs su song ba rnams mi gtong ba ni legs pa'o//skyabs su song ba rnams la
376b2(mdo sde): 'khu ba ni legs pa ma yin pa'o//dam bcas pa las mi nyams pa'i tshig bden pa dang /ji skad smras pa de bzhin byed pa ni legs pa'o//'jig rten thams cad la bslu ba ni
376b3(mdo sde): legs pa ma yin pa'o//dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa ni legs pa'o//dam pa'i chos yongs su spong ba ni logs pa ma yin pa'o//thos pa la ser sna med cing chos
376b4(mdo sde): la slob dpon gyis dpe mkhyud med de zang zing med par chos ston pa ni legs pa'o//chos la ser sna byed cing chos la slob dpon gyi dpe mkhyud byed de zang zing dang 'brel ba'i
376b5(mdo sde): sems kyis chos ston pa ni legs pa ma yin pa'o//sems can yongs su smin par byed pa'i thabs dang ldan pa'i bsdu ba ni legs pa'o//sems can la mi lta zhing thabs
376b6(mdo sde): dang mi ldan par bsdu ba'i dngos po ston pa ni legs pa ma yin pa'o//pha rol tu phyin po drug 'tshol ba ni legs pa'o//pha rol tu phyin pa drug gi mi mthun pa'i phyogs ni
376b7(mdo sde): legs pa ma yin pa'o//shes pas byas pa'i las rnams ni legs pa'o//nga rgyal gyis byas pa'i las rnams ni legs pa ma yin pa'o//'dza' ba brtan pa ni legs
377a1(mdo sde): pa'o//ngan pa dang bshes pa ni legs pa ma yin pa'o//dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la bsten pa ni legs pa'o//mi dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam du zhugs
377a2(mdo sde): pa ni legs pa ma yin pa'o//sdig pa'i las thams cad mi spyod pa ni legs pa'o//sdig pa'i lus thams cad la zhugs pa ni legs pa ma yin pa'o//lha'i bu
377a3(mdo sde): dmigs pa can gyi rab tu 'byung ba ni legs pa ma yin pa'o//stong pa nyid smra ba'i mngon par 'byung ba ni legs pa'o//'jig rten rgyang phan pa'i gtam smra ba'i seng ge'i khri
377a4(mdo sde): ni lags pa ma yin pa'o//byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod rab tu thob pa'i dam pa'i chos kyi gtam smra ba'i seng ge'i khri ni legs pa'o//tshul khrims 'tshal pas dad pas
377a5(mdo sde): byin pa spyad pa ni legs pa ma yin pa'o//tshul khrims dang ldan pa'i thob pa dang /bkur sti dang tshigs su bcad pa thams cad ni legs pa'o//lhag pa'i nga rgyal can
377a6(mdo sde): gyi byang chub ni legs pa ma yin pa'o//lhag pa'i nga rgyal med par shes pa'i brda sprod pa ni legs pa'o//byang chub sems dpa' rnams la gnod par sems pa ni
377a7(mdo sde): legos pa ma yin pa'o//byang chub sems dpa' rnams la ston pa tsam du phangs par 'dzin pa ni legs pa'o//byang chub sems dpa'i ming gis rnyed pas 'tsho ba ni
377b1(mdo sde): legs pa ma yin pa'o//byang chub sems dpa' chos smra ba yang dag par sgrub pa la gnas pa'i rnyed pa ni legs pa'o//lha'i bu de ltar na ji tsam du de bzhin gshegs pa'i bka'
377b2(mdo sde): dang 'gal ba de tsam du thams nad legs pa ma yin pa'o//ji tsam du de bzhin gshegs pa'i bka' dang mthun pa de tsam du thams cad legs pa'o//lha'i bus smras pa
377b3(mdo sde): 'jam dpal khyod ci legs so zhes bya ba'i chos la brtson nas/'on te legs pa ma yin zhes bya ba'i chos la brtson 'dzum dpal gyis smras pa/lha'i bu kho bo ni legs sa
377b4(mdo sde): zhes bya ba'i chos la brtson pa'ang mo yin/legs pa ma yin pa zhes bya ba'i chos la brtson po'ang ma yin no//de ci'i phyir zhe na/lha'i bu kho bo ni chos thams cad la brtson
377b5(mdo sde): pa ma yin no//lha'i bus smras pa/'jam dpal khyod ci dge ba'i tshwa so la mi brtson nam/'jam dpal gyis smras pa/lha'i bu kho bo ni dge ba'i chos la brtson pa'ang
377b6(mdo sde): ma yin/mi dge ba'i chos la brtson pa'ang ma yin no//de ci'i phyir zhe na/lha'i bu dge ba zhes bya ba 'di'ang 'dus byas so//mi dge ba zhes bya ba 'di'ang 'dus byas
377b7(mdo sde): so//mi g.yo ba zhes bya ba 'di'ang 'dus byas so//lha'i bus smras pa/'jam dpal khyod ci 'dus ma byas pa'om/'jam dpal gyis smras pa/lha'i bu gol
378a1(mdo sde): te 'dus byas kyi skrag pa lta na ni kho bo 'dus ma byas su 'gyur ro//lha'i bus smras pa/'jam dpal khyod ci 'dus byas kyis mi skrag gam/'jam dpal
378a2(mdo sde): gyis smras pa/lha'i bu gol te yang dag par 'dus byas kyis yongs su grub pa zhig mthong na ni kho bo 'dus byas kyis skrag par 'gyur ro//lha'i bus smras pa/'jam dpal
378a3(mdo sde): ji khyod kyis yang dag par 'dus byas kyis yongs su grub pa ma mthong ngam/'jam dpal gyis smras pa/lha'i bu kho bos ni yang dag par 'dus byas kyis yongs su grub pa
378a4(mdo sde): ma mthong ste/'dus ma byas kyi'ang ma yin no//lha'i bus smras pa/'jam dpal khyod ci 'dus byas su gtogs sam/'on te 'dus ma byas su gtogs/'jam
378a5(mdo sde): dpal gyis smras pa/lho'i bu kho bo ni 'dus byas su gtogs pa'ang ma yin/'dus ma byas su gau togs pa'ang ma yin no//de ci'i phyir zhe na/gal te 'dus byas
378a6(mdo sde): su gtogs par gyur na ni byis pa so so'i skye bo thams cad dang 'dra bar 'gyur ro//gal te 'dus ma byas su gtogs par gyur na ni nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams
378a7(mdo sde): cad dang 'dra bar 'gyur ro//lha'i bus smos pa/'jam dpal gal te khyod 'dus byas su gtogs pa'ang ma yin/'dus ma byas su gtogs pa'ang ma yin na
378b1(mdo sde): khyod ji ltar shes par bya/'jam dpal gyis smras pa/lha'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems/glang de bzhin gshegs pas sprul pa 'dus byas su gtogs sam/'on te 'dus ma
378b2(mdo sde): byos su gtogs/lha'i bus smras pa/'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pas sprul pa ni 'dus byas su gtogs pa'ang ma yin/'dus ma byas su gtogs pa'ang ma yin no///
378b3(mdo sde): 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/lha'i bu de bzhin gshegs pas sprul pa'i chos kyi de bzhin nyid ci 'dra ba de 'dra ba kho bo shes par gyis shig/lha'i bu de ji snyam du sems/de bzhin
378b4(mdo sde): gshegs pa'i rnam par shes pa gang la gnas/gzugs la gnas sam/smras pa ma yin no//smras pa/de ci tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed rnams la
378b5(mdo sde): gnas sam/smras pa/ma yin no//smras pa/de ci 'dus byas la gnas sam/smras pa/ma yin no//smras pa/de ci 'dus ma byas la gnas sam/smras pa/
378b6(mdo sde): ma yin no//smras pa/de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par shes pa gang la gnas/smras pa/'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par shes pa ni gang la'ang mi
378b7(mdo sde): gnas so//'jam dpal gyis smras pa/lha'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par shes pa gang la gnas pa de la kho bo gnas par shes par bya'o//lha'i bus smras pa/
379a1(mdo sde): 'jam dpal khyod ni de bzhin gshegs pa yin nam/'jam dpal gyis smras pa/lha'i bu de bzhin nyid kyi 'ong ba med pa dang 'gro ba med pa gang yin pa de
379a2(mdo sde): nyid kho bo'i 'gro ba de nyid de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'gro ba ste/des na kho bo de bzhin gshegs pa'o//de bzhin nyid ji lta bar kho bo'ang de ltar 'ong bas des na kho bo de bzhin
379a3(mdo sde): gshegs pa'o//de bzhin nyid ji lta bar kho bo'ang de ltar gnas te/des na kho bo dri bzhin gshegs pa'o//lha'i bu 'jam dpal zhes bya ba 'di ni de bzhin nyid ci 'dra
379a4(mdo sde): ba de 'dra ste/des na kho bo de bzhin gshegs pa'o//de bzhin nyid sems med cing zhi ba'i phyir 'jam dpal yang sems med cing zhi ba ste/des na kho bo de bzhin
379a5(mdo sde): gshegs pa'o//lha'i bus smras pa/'jam dpal de bzhin nyid gang du btsal bar bya/'jam dpal gyis smras pa/lha'i bu de bzhin nyid ni lta bar song ba drug cu
379a6(mdo sde): rtsa gnyis rnams su btsal bar bya'o//lha'i bus smras pa/lta bar song ba drug cu rtsa gnyis po rnams gang du btsal bar bya/'jam dpal gyis smras pa/lha'i bu lta
379a7(mdo sde): ngar song ba drug cu rtsa gnyis po dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa mi 'khrugs pa'i chos can gyi rnam par grol ba las btsal bar bya'o//lha'i bus smras pa/'jam dpal
379b1(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par grol ba gang du btsal bar bya/'jam dpal gyis smras pa/lha'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par grol ba ni sems can thams cad kyi sems
379b2(mdo sde): kyi spyod pa dang /bsam pa rnams su btsal bar bya'o//lha'i bus smras pa/'jam dpal sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi spyod pa dang /bsam pa gang du btsal bar
379b3(mdo sde): bya/'jam dpal gyis smras pa/lha'i bu sangs rgyas kyi spyod yul du'o//lha'i bus smras pa/'jam dpal sangs rgyas kyi spyod yul gang du btsal bar bya/'jam dpal
379b4(mdo sde): gyis smras pa/lha'i bu sems can gyi dbang po mchog dang /mchog ma yin pa thams cad shes pa las btsal bar bya'o//lha'i bus smras pa/'jamo dpal khyod ji ltar
379b5(mdo sde): 'drir shes pa nyung bar 'gyur ba de lta bur ston tam/'jam dpal gyis smras pa/lha'i bu sangs rgyas kyi ye shes ni sus kyang kun shes pa'am/rnam par shes pararo mi nus so///
379b6(mdo sde): de ci'i phyir zhe na/lha'i bu sangs rgyas kyi ye shes ni chags pa med pa/rnam par rtog pa med pa/brjod du med pa bsnyung du med pa/sbyor ba med pa/tshig med pa/sems
379b7(mdo sde): dang yid dang rnam par shes pa dang bral ba ste/de sus kyang kun shes par ram rnam par shes par mi nus pa'i phyir ro//lha'i bus spros pa/'jam dpal gal te sangs
380a1(mdo sde): rgyas kyi ye shes kun shes par bya ba ma yin na nyan thos 'di dag gis kun shes par ga la 'gyur/byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyang phyir mi ldog pa lnga
380a2(mdo sde): gnas par ga la 'gyur/'jam dpal gyis smras pa/lha'i bu gang yi ge rnams kyi ye shes de bstan pa 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi thabs tI ye shes de ni yi
380a3(mdo sde): ge med pa'o//lha'i bu 'di lta ste dper na/me gtsubs pa las ma mi 'byung gi gtsub shing gtsubs pa las me 'byung ba de bzhin du/lha'i bu de bzhin gshegs pas
380a4(mdo sde): gal te thog ma kho nar sangs rgyas kyi ye shes rgya cher yang dag par rab tu bstan na/sems can gang gis kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes de kun shes par mi
380a5(mdo sde): 'gyur bas/de bzhin gshegs pas gtsubs shing gi gtam gyis ye shes de bstan te/ye shes de ni yi ge med pa'o//lha'i bus smras pa/'jam dpal
380a6(mdo sde): gtsubs shing gi gtam gang /'dzum dpal gyis smras pa/lha'i bu gang ci'ang rung ste/sdom pa dang yo byad bsnyungs pa'i gtam dang /pha rol tu phyin pa la
380a7(mdo sde): sbyor ba'i gtam dang /byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos la 'jug pa'i gtam 'di ni gtsubs shing gi gtam zhes bya'o//lha'i bus smras pa/'jam dpalo gtsubs
380b1(mdo sde): shing gi gtam ma yin pa'i gtam gang /'jam dpal gyis smras pa/lha'i bu gtam gang skye ba dang /'jig pa dang /gnas pa'i gtam ma yin pa dang /'dren pa dang //
380b2(mdo sde): sel ba'i gtam ma yin pa dang /gtam gang kun nas nyon mongs pa yongs su brjod pa'i gtamo ma yin pa dang /rnam par byang ba'i phan yon gyi gtam ma yin pa dang /gtam
380b3(mdo sde): gang 'khor ba la yid 'byung bar bya ba'i gtam ma yin pa dang /mya ngan las 'dres pa la mngon par dga' bar bya ba ma yin po'i gtam dang /gtam gang yongs su shes par
380b4(mdo sde): bya ba'i phyir ma yin/spang bar bya ba'i phyir ma yin/bsgom par bya ba'i phyir ma yin/mngon sum du bye ba'i phyir ma yin pa dang /gtam gang thob par bya ba'i phyir
380b5(mdo sde): ma yin/mngon par rtogs par bya ba'i phyir ma yin pa 'di ni lha'i bu dog snying po yod pa'i gtam mo//lha'i bus smras pa/'jam dpal gtam 'di lta bu rjod pa'i tshe//
380b6(mdo sde): mig gis mi brtsol bar bya ba'i phyir bdud sdig can 'dir mi 'ong ba ni ngo mtshar to//tshig de smras nas ring por ma lon par de'i mod la bdud sdig can steng gi bar snang la sprin
380b7(mdo sde): chen po 'khrugs par mngon par sprul nas sgre chen po'i nga ro phyung ba dang /des thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dang ngas skrag nas sgra skad kyi nga ro 'di lta bu su zhig gi snyam
381a1(mdo sde): mo//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la bka' stsal paM/'jam dpal khyod kyis bdud sdig can gyi 'gyur ba mthong ngam/'jam
381a2(mdo sde): dpal gyis gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das mthong lags so//bde bar gshegs pa mthong lags so//de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas de'i tshe bdud sdig can
381a3(mdo sde): bcing ba dam pos bcings te/sa'i steng du ldang ba de lta bu'i bsam pa bsams pa dang /bdag ni bcing ba dam pos bcings so//bdag ni bcing ba drame pos
381a4(mdo sde): bcings so zhes sgra 'byin to//'jam dpal gyis smras pa/sdig can bcing ba 'dri bas ches dam pa'i 'ching ba gzhan yod de/des khyod rtag tu bcings kyang
381a5(mdo sde): khyod kyis khrong du ma chud do//de'ang gang zhe na 'di lta ste/nga'o snyam pa'i nga rgyal gyi 'ching ba dang /phyin ci log gi 'ching ba dang /sred pa dang lta ba'i 'ching ba ste/
381a6(mdo sde): sdig can 'di ni 'ching ba 'di bas ches dam pa'i 'chang ba dam po gzhan yin te/des khyod rtag tu btsongs kyang khong du ma chud do//bdud kyis smras pa/'jam dpal
381a7(mdo sde): thing zhig dang bdag gi gnas su 'gro'o//yang bdud kyi las mi bya'o//'jam dpal gyis smras pa/sdig can sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa khyod kyis bya dgos na khyod
381b1(mdo sde): ci'i phyir btang /bdud kyis smras pa/'jam dpal bdag ni sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams la bar chad bya ba'i phyir zhugs pa yin na bdag gis sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa ji ltar bya/
381b2(mdo sde): 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/sdig can gang sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa bdud byed du gzhug pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis thabs dang shes rab kyi shes pa rnam par sprul
381b3(mdo sde): pa'o//gang sangs rgyas kyis sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa mdzad pa 'di ni ngo mtsha ma yin te/gang bdud sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa byed pa 'di rab tu ngo mtshar to//de nas 'jam dpal
381b4(mdo sde): gzhon nur gyur pas de'i tshe gang sdig can sangs rgyas kyi gzugs dang ldan pa dang /sangs rgyas kyi seng ge'i khri la 'dug po dang /sangs rgyas kyi spobs pa dang ldan par 'gyur
381b5(mdo sde): ba'i byin gyi rlabs de lta bu'i byin gyis brlabs so//de nas bdud sdig cen gyis tshe dang ldan pa dag ci dang ci 'dod pa kho bo la dris shig dang kho bos dris pa lung bsten pas khyed
381b6(mdo sde): kyi sems rangs par bya'o zhes tshig de skad smras so//de nas gnas brtan 'od srungs chen pos bdud sdig can la 'di skad ces smras so//sdig can dge slong rnal 'byor spyod pa'i
381b7(mdo sde): 'ching ba gang yin/bdud kyis smras pa/btsun pa 'od srungs chen po bsam gtan gyi ro mang bar byed pa ni dge slong rnal 'byol spyod pa'i 'tshong ba'o//zhi gnas de la tshogs
382a1(mdo sde): pa dang /'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched la snyoms par 'jug pa dang /stong pa nyid la snying por 'du shes pa dang /lta bar song ba rnams bsal
382a2(mdo sde): bar 'du shes pa dang /mtshan ma med pa la snying por 'du shes pa dang /mtshan ma rnams la bsal bar 'du shes pa dang /smon pa med pa la snying por 'du shes pa dang /
382a3(mdo sde): smon lam la bsal bar 'du shes pa dang /mya ngan las 'das pa la snying por 'du shes pa dang /'khor ba la bsal bar 'du shes pa 'di dag ni btsun pa 'od srungs chen
382a4(mdo sde): po dge slong rnal 'byol spyod pa'i 'ching ba'o//de ci'i phyir zhe na/btsun pa 'od srungs chen po lta bar song ba bsal nas stong pa nyid bsgom par bya ba ma yin gyi/lta bar
382a5(mdo sde): song ba nyid stong pa nyid do//mtshan ma bsal nas mtshon mu med pa bsgom par bya ba ma yin gyi/mtshan ma'i ngo bo nyid mtshan ma med pa'o//smon lam bsal nas
382a6(mdo sde): smon pa med par bsgom par bya ba ma yin gyi/smon lam gyi ngo bo nyid smon pa med pa'o//'khor ba bsal nas mya ngan las 'das pa bsgom par bya ba ma yin gyi/'khor
382a7(mdo sde): bar dmigs pa nyid mya ngan los 'das pa'o//btsun pa 'od srungs chen po mya ngan las 'das pa zhes bya ba ni 'du shes pa dang /rlom sems dang /mtshan ma la
382b1(mdo sde): dmigs pa thams cad la mi spyod pa ste/mya ngan las 'das pa ni skye ba dang /'jig pa dang /zad pa las ma yin gyi/rang bzhin gyis skye ba med pa nyid mya ngan las 'das pa'o///
382b2(mdo sde): bstan pa 'di bshad pa na dge slong lnga brgya nye bar len pa med par thog pa rnams las sems rnam par grol lo//de nas gnas brtan rab 'byor gyis dge slong de dag la 'di skad
382b3(mdo sde): ces smras so//tshe dang ldan pa dag sus btul/dge slong de dag gis smras pa/gang thob pa'ang med pa/mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'ang med pas so//rab
382b4(mdo sde): 'byor gyis smras pa/btul ba de ji lta bu/smras pa/ji ltar gnas pa nyid kyi phyir cung zad kyang khrid pa'ang med/mi khrid pa'ang med de/ji ltar gnas pa bzhin du
382b5(mdo sde): shes pa dang /bskyed pa'ang med/bkag pa'ang med de/mnyam pa nyid du shes pa de ltar bdag cag btul to//dge slong de dag gis bstan pa 'di bshad pa na lha'i bu stong
382b6(mdo sde): nyis brgya chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul med cing dri ma dang bral ba rnam par dag go//gnas brtan rab 'byor gyis gzhan yang bdud sdig can la 'di skad ces smras so//sdig
382b7(mdo sde): can ji ltar na dge slong sbyin gnas yin/bdud kyis smras pa/btsun pa rab 'byor nam dge slong len pa'ong med/nod pa'ang med la dad cing dang ba thams cad las kyang
383a1(mdo sde): yongs su spyod pa na'o//btsun pa rab 'byor gang dge slong gang la byin pa de la sgyu ma'i blo dang /gang len pa de la mig yor gyi blo dang /nye bar len par
383a2(mdo sde): sems dang /nye bar len pa med pa'i sems kyis kyang yongs su mi spyod pa'i dge slong de lta bu ni sbyin pa'i gnas yin no//shA ra dwa ti'i bus smras pa/sdig can bcom
383a3(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyis ting nge 'dzin 'khrugs pa med par gsungs pa grang yin/bdud kyis smras pa/byang chub sems dpa' ting nge 'dzin gang la brten nas shin tu zad pa'i
383a4(mdo sde): phyir zad pa'ang zad par mi byed/rang bzhin gyis ma skyes pa'i phyir ma skyes pa'ang mi skyed/myong ba med pa'ang myong bar mi byed de/chos thams cad kyang rang bzhin gyis
383a5(mdo sde): snyoms par zhugs par shos la/shes nas kyang tshor ba thams cad 'grog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa la snyoms par 'jug cing mnyam par yang mthong la cung zad kyang
383a6(mdo sde): mthong ba'ang med/mi mthong ba'ang myed pa 'di ni bcom ldan 'das kyis ting nge 'dzin 'khrugs pa med par gsungs pa'o//mod+gal gyi bus smras pa/sdig can ji ltar na
383a7(mdo sde): dge slong sems thams cad la dbang thob pa yin/bdud kyis smras pa/btsun pa maud+gal gyi bu chen po nam dge slong chos thams cad la sems rnam par grol ba'i
383b1(mdo sde): mtshan nyid du shes la/rnam par grol ba'i mtshan nyid la mngon par zhen pa'ang med cing sems gzod ma nas rnam par grol ba'i sems la/'ching bar yang mi byed/grol
383b2(mdo sde): bar yang mi byed/sems gzugs med pas chos thams cad gzugs med par shes/sems gnas pa med pas chos thams cad gnas pa med par mthong /sems
383b3(mdo sde): 'dzin pa med pas chos thams cad 'dzin pa med par shes kyang sems kyis sems shes pa'ang med la/sems kyis ngo bo nyid kyi rang bzhin gyis chos thams cad kyi chos kyi/
383b4(mdo sde): dbyings kyi ngo bo nyid kyi rang bzhin yang shes shing /chos kyi dbyings kyi ngo bo nyid kyi rang bzhin gyis gzhan gyi dring la mi 'jog par dbang thob pa ni mos pa'i rdzu 'phrul dang ldan pa
383b5(mdo sde): yin te/btsun pa maut+pal gyi bu chen po dge slong de lta bu ni sems thams cad la dbang thob pa yin no//gang pos smras pa/sdig can ji ltar na dge slong yongs su dag par
383b6(mdo sde): chos ston pa yin/bdud kyis smras pa/btsun pa gang po nam dge slong gis gzhan las chos thams cad shes kyang gzhan dang gzhan ma yin pa'i sems la mngon
383b7(mdo sde): par zhen pa'ang med/chos thams cad kyang sgro btags par ston/yi ge dang /skad dang /dbyangs dang /tshig gi lam thams cad kyang brag ca lta bur shes/chos nyan
384a1(mdo sde): pa thams cad kyang sgyu ma'i skyes bu ltar mthong /gang gi lus kyi rnam par rig byed kyang chu zla dang 'dra bar mthong /nyan mongs pa thams cad kyang yongs su dzag/
384a2(mdo sde): pa las byung bar shes/chos 'ga' zhig gzung ba'i phyir ram/dor ba'i phyir ram/shin tu bzla ba'i phyir ram/thob par bya ba'i phyir yang chos mi ston/so so yang
384a3(mdo sde): dag par rig pa bzhi po rnams la'ang dbang thob cing legs so zhes bya ba la'ang ra ba med la/zang zing med par chos ston cing rang gi sems rang bzhin gyis yongs su dag
384a4(mdo sde): pas sems can thams cad kyi sems rang bzhin gyis yongs su dag par shes te/sems rang bzhin gyis yongs su dag par shes nas phung po'i bdud la dben par
384a5(mdo sde): mthong ba dang /nyon mongs pa'i bdud la bcos mar 'du shes pa dang /'chi bdag gi bdud la ma skyes pa dang mi skye bar gnas pa dang /lha'i bu'i bdud la g.yo ba
384a6(mdo sde): drang rlom sems thams cad dang bral bar gyur pa yin te/dge slong de lta bu ni yongs su dag par chos ston pa yin no//nye bar 'khor gyis smras pa/sdig can
384a7(mdo sde): ji ltar na dge slong 'dul ba 'dzin pa yin/bdud kyis smras pa/btsun pa nye bar 'khor dge slong gis nim chos thams cad shin tu dul bar shes te/nyes pa rnams
384b1(mdo sde): kyi thog ma'i sngon gyi mtha' yang dben pa'i mthar shes la/nyes byung ba rnams kyi 'gyod pa'ang sel cing dam por mi byed de/de dag gang gis mtshams med pa rnams kyang rnam
384b2(mdo sde): par gnon na/cho ga dang tshul khrims la log par zhugs pa phran tshegs lta smos kyang ci dgos pa de lta bu'i chos kyi tshul gyi rnam pa'ang nye bar sgrub/nyon mongs pa 'dul ba la'ang
384b3(mdo sde): mangs/blo bur gyi nyon mongs pa rnams la'ang kun nas nyon mongs par gyur pa ma yin pa dang /'byung bar 'du shes/nyon mongs pa nang du'ang mi ston/phyi rol du'ang ma
384b4(mdo sde): yin/gnyis ka med par yang ma yin te/nyon mongs pa khong du chud pa nyid nyon mongs pa med par shes shing nyon mongs pa'ang mi sel/nyon mongs pa med pa'ang mi sgrub/
384b5(mdo sde): nyon mongs pa thams cad kyang sprin 'dra bar shes te/ye shes dang lhag mthong gi rlung gis gtor nas phyogs dang yul du 'gro ba'ang med gnas pa'ang med pa dang /nyon
384b6(mdo sde): mongs pa rnams ni chu zla dang 'dra ste/yongs su rtog pa'i gzugs brnyan gyis bzhin nye bar ston pa dang /nyon mongs pa rnams ni mun pa'i spyod yul te/shes rab
384b7(mdo sde): kyi sgron mas mi snang ba snang bar byed pa dang /nyon mongs pa rnams ni chom rkun dang /mkha' 'bro ma dang /gnod sbyin dang /srin po dang 'dra ste/tshul bzhin yid
385a1(mdo sde): la byed pas brtags na gnas pa ma yin pa dang /nyon mongs pa rnams ni glags tshol ba ste/tshul bzhin ma yin pa yid la byed pas 'phel ba dang /stong
385a2(mdo sde): pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa'i shes pas yid la 'jug par mi byed pas sus nyon mongs pa rnams 'di 'dra bar shes te/sems can nyon mongs
385a3(mdo sde): pas kun nas nyon mongs par gyur pa rnams la snying rje zhing bdag med pa dang /sems can med pa mngon sum du gyur pa na 'dul ba 'dzin pa yang dag pa zhes bya'o//de
385a4(mdo sde): ltar nyan thos chen po de dag thams cad kyis rang rang gi 'dod pa bdud sdig can de la kun dris nas bdud sdig can gyis kyang de dag thams cad kyi don gtan la babo par bstan
385a5(mdo sde): pas sems rangs par gyur to//de nas lha'i bu mtshams bzangs 'khor de nyid du 'dus par gyur te 'dug pa des/bdud sdig can la 'di skad ces smras so//sdig
385a6(mdo sde): can 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bdud kyi las bshad zin gyis khyod kyang spobs par gyis shig/sdig can byang chub sems
385a7(mdo sde): dpa' rnams kyi bdud kyi las gang /de skad ces smras pa dang /sdig can gyis lha'i bu mtshams bzangs la 'di skad ces smras so//lha'i bu nyi shu po 'di dag ni byang
385b1(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bdud kyi las yang dag phul yin no//nyi shu gang zhe na/'di lta ste/rnal 'byor spyod pa rnam par grol ba 'dod cing 'khor bas skrag pa rnams la
385b2(mdo sde): bsnyen pa dang /bsten pa dang /bsnyen bkur byed pa ni bdud kyi las so//stong pa nyid la so sor rtog cing sems can yal bar 'dor ba'ang bdud kyi las so//'dus
385b3(mdo sde): ma byas la so sor rtog cing 'dus byas kyi dge ba'i rtsa bas yongs su skyo ba'ang bdud kyi las so//bsam gtan skyed cing bsam gtan las rnam par ldog pa 'tshol ba'ang
385b4(mdo sde): bdud kyi las so//chos ston kyang chos nyan pa rnams la snying rje chen po mi skyed pa'ang bdud kyi las so//yon tan dang ldan pa dang sbyin gnas 'tshol zhing tshul khrims 'chal
385b5(mdo sde): pa rnams la khro ba'ang bdud kyi las so//nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas kyi gtam ston cing theg pa chen po'i gtam 'chab pa'ang bdud kyi las so//zab mo'i gtam
385b6(mdo sde): 'chab cing gtam sna tshogs ston pa'ang bdud kyi las so//byang chub sems dpa'i lam shes kyang pha rol tu phyin pa'i lam yongs su mi 'tshol ba'ang bdud kyi las so//
385b7(mdo sde): rab tu brtson pa'i bsdigs pa brjod kyang sems can mi brtson pa rnams mngon par mi sbyor ba'ang bdud kyi las so//dge ba'i rtsa ba sogs kyang byang chub kyi sems mngon du
386a1(mdo sde): mi byed pa'ang bdud kyi las so//lcug mthong gi rnal 'byor dang ldan par gnas kyang sems can rnams lhag mthong yang dag par 'dzin du mi 'jug pa'ang bdud
386a2(mdo sde): kyi las so//nyon mongs pa ma lus par zad par 'tshal zhing 'khor ba'i rgyun gyi nyin mongs pa rnams la smon pa'ang bdud kyi las so//shes rab kyis rnam par du byed cing skying
386a3(mdo sde): rje chen po la dmigs pa mi 'dzin pa'ang bdud kyi las so//thabs dang mi ldan par dge ba spyod pa thams cad kyang bdud kyi las so//byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod mi 'chol
386a4(mdo sde): gyi 'jig rten rgyang pan pa'i gsang tshig 'dzin pa'ang bdud kyi las so//mang du thos kyang gzhon gyis shes kyis dogs te chos la slob dpon gyi dpe mkhyud byed pa'ing bdud kyi
386a5(mdo sde): las so//'jig rten pa'i dgos pa'i zhal ta byed cing mang du thos pa mi tshol ba'ang bdud kyi las so//byang chub sems dpa' chos smra ba theg pa chen po la yang dag par
386a6(mdo sde): zhugs pa skal ba mnyam pa rnams la mi bsten/mi bsnyen/bsnyen bkur mi byed/nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la yang dag par zhugs pa skal ba mi
386a7(mdo sde): mnyam par dga' ba'ang bdud kyi las so//gang gi tshe brgya byin nam/tshangs pa'am/'jig rten skyong ba 'am/rgyal po'am/tshong dpon nam/khyim bdag gi
386b1(mdo sde): longs spyod dang /nor dang /rin po che dang /dbang phyug gi che ba nyid du gyur pa de'i tshe chos kyi che ba nyid dang ldan pa rnams la mi bsten/mi bsnyen/bsnyen bkur mi byed
386b2(mdo sde): pa 'di dag ni lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bdud kyi las yang dag phul nyi shu'o//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bdud sdig can la sdig can khyod kyis byang chubo
386b3(mdo sde): sems dpa' rnams kyi bdud kyi las 'di dag legs par bshad pa ni legs sa legs so zhes bya ba byin no//byang chub sems dpa'i gang dag bdud kyi las 'di rnams thos
386b4(mdo sde): shing thos nas kyang rnam par spong ba de dag byang chub yongs su smin par byed pa'i chos nyi shu thob por 'gyur ro//nyi shu gang zhe na/'di lta ste/byams pa chen po dang /snying
386b5(mdo sde): rje chen po dang /'khor ba na yongs su mi skyo ba dang /dge ba'i bshos gnyen gyis yongs su zin pa dang /sangs rgyas 'byung ba mnyes par byed pa dang /pha rol tu phyin
386b6(mdo sde): sde rnams nyan pa dang /byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor dang skal ba mnyam pa dang /gzungs rab tu thob pa dang /spobs pa phun sum tshogs pa dang /mngon par
386b7(mdo sde): shes pa shes pa dang /chos ma thos pa nyan pa dang /tshe rabs tshe rabs su byang chub kyi sems mngon du 'gyur ba dang /rtag tu rgyun ma chad par rab tu 'byung ba rnyed pa
387a1(mdo sde): dang /dral ba phun sum tshogs pa dang /ji ltar thos pa'i chos rnams sgrub pa dang /thabs dang shes rab kyis shes pas sems can sdud cing yongs
387a2(mdo sde): su 'dzin pa dang /dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa dang /g.yo med cing sgyu med pa dang /phangs pa'i dngos po thams cad yongs su gtong ba dang /sems can thams
387a3(mdo sde): cad la khong khro ba med pa ste/byang chub yongs su smin par byed pa'i chos nyi shu po 'di dag thob par 'gyur ro//de nas lha'i bu mtshams bzang gis bdud sdig can la 'di
387a4(mdo sde): skad ces smras so//sdig can khyod la bcom ldan 'das kyiso legs so zhes bya ba gnang ba ni sdig can khyod kyis rnyed pa legs par rnyed do//bdud kyis smras pa/lha'i
387a5(mdo sde): bu 'di la kho bos rnyed pa ci zhig logs par rnyed/de ci'i phyir zhe na/lha'i bu 'di lta ste dper ni/mo gang 'byung po babs pa de ni me de'i 'gyur ba ma yin gyi/de ni 'byung po
387a6(mdo sde): de'i 'gyur bar blta'o//lha'i bu de bzhin du kho bo'ang 'jam dpal gyis byin gyis brlabs nas ston gyi/'di kho bo'i skyes bu'i rtsal du ni mi blta'o//lha'i bus smras pa/
387a7(mdo sde): sdig can khyod sangs rgyas kyi gzugs kyi mtshan dang ldan zhing sangs rgyas kyi seng ge'i khri la 'dug ste/sangs rgyas kyi spobs pa dang ldan zhing chos ston pas dga' bar
387b1(mdo sde): ma gyur tam/bdud kyis smras pa/khyod kyis ni kho bo brgyan par mthong ba lta na kho bos ni bcing ba dam pos bdag bcings par shes so//lha'i bus smras pa/sdig can 'jam
387b2(mdo sde): dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la bzod par gsol cig dang de nas gtong bar 'gyur ro//de nas 'jam dpal gyis byin gyi rlabs kyis bdud kyis lha'i bu mtshams bzang la 'di skad
387b3(mdo sde): ces smras so//lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa rnams la bzod pa gsol mi dgos so//de ci'i phyir zhe na//
387b4(mdo sde): de dag la 'khrugs mid khro ba med pa'i phyir ro//gang dag 'khrug cing khro ba de dag la ni bzod pa gsol dgos so//lha'i bus smras pa/sdig can byang chub sems dada'
387b5(mdo sde): rnams kyi bzod pa ci 'dra/bdud kyis smras pa/lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bzod pa ni rnam pa bcu gnyis te/rnam pa bcu gnyis gang zhe na 'di lta ste/
387b6(mdo sde): bcos ma ma yin pas bsam pa'i bzod pa dang /khong khro ba med pa'i sems kyis lhag pa'i bsam pa'i bzod pa dang /sems can thams cad la mi slu bas g.yo med pa'i
387b7(mdo sde): bzod pa dang /dbul zhing phongs pa yongs su skyob pas snying brtse zhing snying rje ba'i bzod pa dang /ldog pa med pas ji skad smra ba de bzhin du byed pa'i bzod pa dang /lta bar
388a1(mdo sde): song ba dang bral bas stong pa nyid kyi bzod pa dang /chos nyid la rton pas chos nges par sems pa'i bzod pa dang /bdag med pas zab mo'i bzod
388a2(mdo sde): pa dang /'phags pa'i skye bo'i rjes su 'jug pas mthun pa'i bzod pa dang /rton cing 'brel bar 'byung ba dang mthun pas yang dag pa'i bzod pa dang /sems can thams
388a3(mdo sde): cad rjes su srung bas ngo byed pa'ang med la mi mthun pa'ang med pa'i bzod pa dang /mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa rab tu thob pa'i phyir skye ba med cing 'byung ba med pa'i bzod pa ste//
388a4(mdo sde): lha'i bu 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bzod pa rnam pa bcu gnyis so//lho'i bus smras pa/sdig can khyod gal te bkrol na dga' bar 'gyur ram/bdud kyis
388a5(mdo sde): smras pa/lha'i bu kho bo dga' ste mchog tu dga'o//de nas lha'i bu mtshams bzang gis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so//'jam dpal bdud
388a6(mdo sde): sdig can thong zhig dang rang gi gnas su 'go'o//de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas bdud sdig can la 'di skad ces smras so//sdig can khyod su zhig gis bcings/
388a7(mdo sde): gang las dgrol/bdud kyis smras pa/'jam dpal/bdag ni sus bcings mi shes so//'jam dpal gyis smras pa/sdig can khyod ji ltar bcings pa med pa la
388b1(mdo sde): bcings par 'du shes pa de bzhin du byis pa so so'i skye bo thams cad kyang /mi rtag pa la rtag par 'du shes/sdug bsngal ba la bde bar 'du shes/bdag med pa la
388b2(mdo sde): bdag tu 'du shes/mi sdug pa la sdug par 'du shes/gzugs med pa la gzugs su 'du shes/tshor ba med pa dang /'du shes med pa dang /'du byed rnams
388b3(mdo sde): med pa dang /rnam par shes pa med pa la/tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed rnams dang /rnam par shes par 'du shes so//sdig can khyod dgrol na
388b4(mdo sde): gang nas dgrol/bdud kyis smras pa/bdag ni gang las kyang mi dgrol lo//smras pa/sdig can de bzhin du gang dag rnam par dgrol ba'ang /yang dag pa ma yin
388b5(mdo sde): pa'i 'du shos yongs su shes pa ma gtogs par gang las kyang rnam par grol bar 'gyur ba med de/de dag yongs su shes pas rnam par grol ba zhes bya'o//de nas
388b6(mdo sde): 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas byin gyi rlabs de bsdus pa dang sdig can de'ang rang gi gzugs dang ldan par bdag gis shes so//de nas gnas brtan 'od srungs
388b7(mdo sde): chen pos bdud sdig can la 'di skad ces smras so//sdig can khyod kyis sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa byas pa legs so//legs so//bdud kyis smras pa/btsun pa
389a1(mdo sde): 'od srungs chen po 'di ni kho bo'i yul ma yin gyi/'di ni 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i yul du blta'o//de nas lha'i bu mtshams bzang gis 'jam
389a2(mdo sde): dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so//'jam dpal sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa gang du btsal bar bya/'jam dpal gyis smras pa/lha'i bu sangs rgyas kyi
389a3(mdo sde): mdzad pa ni sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa rnams su btsal bar bya'o//de ci'i phyir zhe na/gal to sems can rnams nyon mongs pas gzir ba med na sangs
389a4(mdo sde): rgyas kyis kyang mdzad par mi 'gyur ba'i phyir ro//lha'i bu 'di lta ste dper na/gal to sems can rnams na bar ma gyur na/sman pas kyang bya bar mi 'gyur ba de bzhin
389a5(mdo sde): du/lha'i bu gal te sems can rnams nyon mongs pas gzir bar mi gyur na/sangs rgyas kyis kyang mdzad par mi 'gyur ro//lha'i bus smras pa/'jam dpal gang
389a6(mdo sde): byung na sangs rgyas 'byung /'jam dpal gyis smras pa/lha'i bu skye ba dang /rga ba dang /na ba dang /'chi ba byung na sangs rgyas 'byung ngo //de ci'i phyir zhe na/
389a7(mdo sde): chos de dag spang ba'i don du sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams 'byung ba'i phyir ro//lha'i bus smras pa/'jam dpal gang de bzhin gshegs paso byang chub
389b1(mdo sde): brnyes nas chos bskyed pa de grang /chos bklag pa gang /'jam dpal gyis smras pa/lha'i bu de bzhin gshegs pas byang chub brnyes nas chos gang yang bskyed pa'ang med/bkag
389b2(mdo sde): nga'ang med do//dri ci'i phyir zhe na/lha'i bu chos thams cad ni skye ba ma yin/'gag pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro//lha'i bu sangs rgyas 'byung ba sangs rgyas 'byung ba zhes
389b3(mdo sde): bya ba 'di ni rang bzhin gyi ngo bo nyid kyis skye ba med pa'i tshig bla dgas so//lha'i bus smras pa/'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' bsam pa phun sum tshogs pa yin//
389b4(mdo sde): 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/gang dmigs pa'i lta bas chos gang la'ang kun tu mi spyod pa'o//lha'i bus smras pa/ji ltar na lhag pa'i bsam pa phun sum tshogs pa yin//
389b5(mdo sde): 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/gang nang dang phyi'i chos rnams la chags pa med pa'o//lha'i bus smras pa/ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sbyin pa phun sum tshogs pa
389b6(mdo sde): yin/'jam dpal gyis smras pa/gong nyon mongs pa thams cad kyang 'dor la sems can thams cad kyang yongs su mi gtong ba'o//lha'i bus smras pa/ji ltar na
389b7(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' tshul khrims phun sum tshogs pa yin/'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ji ltar ston pas bstan pa bzhin du sgrub cing sems can thams cad kyang tshul
390a1(mdo sde): khrims la 'god la/lhag pa'i bsam pas byang chub kyi sems kyang mi 'dor ba'o//lha'i bus smras pa/ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' bzod pa
390a2(mdo sde): phun sum tshogs pa yin/'jam dpal gyis smras pa/gang chos thams cad shin tu zad pa'i mtshan nyid du shes nas sems can thams cad kyi gnod sems dang /
390a3(mdo sde): khro ba dang /tha ba spang ba'i phyir thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi cho ga mi 'dor ba'o//lha'i bus smras pa/ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' brtson 'grus phun sum tshogs
390a4(mdo sde): pa yin/'jam dpal gyis smras pa/nam byang chub sems dpa' chos gang gi phyir brtson 'grus brtsom pa'i chos de ni 'di lta ste/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
390a5(mdo sde): byang chub ste/de nyid shin tu yang dag par rjes su mi mthong la/sems can thams cad kyi le lo spang ba'i phyir brtson 'grus gces pa'ang mi 'dor ba na'o//lha'i bus
390a6(mdo sde): smras pa/ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' bsam gtan phun sum tshogs pa yin/'jam dpal gyis smras pa/nam chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis snyoms par
390a7(mdo sde): zhugs par shes kyang sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa 'dul ba'i phyir yang bsam gtan byed pa na'o//lha'i bus smras pa/ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa'
390b1(mdo sde): shes rab phun sum tshogs pa yin/'jam dpal gyis smras pa na ma rgyu ba med pa thob par gyur te/smyos pa thams cad dang bral zhing sems can thams cad kyi lta ba spong ba'i phyir
390b2(mdo sde): shes rab kyi rnam par dpyod pa na ste/de ltar na byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab blan sgyum tshugs pa yin no//lha'i bus smras pa/ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' byams
390b3(mdo sde): pa la gnas pa yin 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/nam chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis yongs su mya ngan las 'das par mthong ba na'o//lha'i bus smras pa/ji ltar na
390b4(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' snying rje la gnas pa yin/'jam dpal gyis smras pa/nam chos thams cod la las kyi rnam par smin pa med par shes pa na'o//lha'i bus smras pa/
390b5(mdo sde): ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' dga' ba la gnas pa yin/'jam dpal gyis smras pa/nam chos thams cad la dga' ba'ang mi skyed la/mi dga' ba'ang ma yin pa
390b6(mdo sde): na'o//lha'i bus smras pa/ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' btang snyoms la gnas pa yin/'jam dpal gyis smras pa/nas chos thams cad la gnyis dang bral bar
390b7(mdo sde): gyur pa na'o//lha'i dus smras pa/ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' la byang chub sems dpa' yang dag pa zhes bya/'jam dpal gyis smras pa/nam chos thams cad
391a1(mdo sde): sgyu ma lta bur byung ba med par shes pa na'o//lha'i bus smras pa/ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yin/'jam dpal gyis smras
391a2(mdo sde): pa/nam byang chub sems dpas chos thams cad bdag med par mthong ba na'o//lha'i bus smras pa/ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems can gyi mchog yin/'jam
391a3(mdo sde): dpal gyi sngo smras pa/nam chos thams cad gzung ba med pa dang /gzhi med par shes pa na'o//lha'i bus smos pa/ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' go cha chen po
391a4(mdo sde): bgos pa yin/'jam dpal gyis smras pa/nam byang chub sems dpas chos thams cad nam mkha' dang mnyam par thos na mi dngangs mi skrag skrag par mi 'gyur zhing
391a5(mdo sde): go cha chen po mi 'dor ba na'o//lha'i dus smras pa/ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' nges pa yin/'jam dpal gyis smras pa/nam snying rje chen pos sems can
391a6(mdo sde): thams cad ring du bsrings pa'ang ma yin la sred pa'i bag la nyalo gyis nye bar bsnyen pa'ang ma yin pa na'o//lha'i bus smras pa/ji ltar nu byang chub sems dpa' 'grogs
391a7(mdo sde): na bde ba yin/'jam dpal gyis smras pa/nam bdag dang gzhan mi dmigs pas lus dang /ngag dang yid kyis gzhan la gnod pa mi byed pa na'o//lha'i bus skyes
391b1(mdo sde): pa/ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' bka' blo bde ba yin/'jam dpal gyis smras pa/nas ji ltar thos pa'i chos rnams sgrub cing tshig ji skad smras pa de bzhin byed pa na'o//lha'i
391b2(mdo sde): bus smras pa/ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' mthun par 'dzin pa yin/'jam dpal gyis smras pa/nam rang gi sems dang mthun pa'i phyir sems can thams cad kyis
391b3(mdo sde): bsgo ba las mi 'gyur zhing /sems can thams cad dang mthun par gnas pa na'o//lha'i bus smras pa/ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' ngo tsha shes shing khrel yod pa
391b4(mdo sde): phun sum tshogs pa yin/'jam dpal gyis smras pa/nam sems can thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir nang yang nye bar zhi la phyi rol tu rgyu ba la'ang rgyu ba na'o//
391b5(mdo sde): lha'i bus smras pa/ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' dad pa dang ldan pa yin/'jam dpal gyis smras pa/nam chags pa thams cad lo'ang spyod la/chags pa thams cad
391b6(mdo sde): la zhan pa'ang med pa na'o//lho'i bus smras pa/ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' mdza' ba bsten pa yin/'jam dpal gyis smras pa/nam sangs rgyas kyi rigs
391b7(mdo sde): mi gcod pa na'o//lha'i bus smras pa/ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' byas pa gzo ba yin/'jam dpal gyis smras pa/nam ji ltar byas pa'i dge ba'i rtsa
392a1(mdo sde): ba chud mi gzon pa na'o//lha'i bus smras pa/ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' byas pa shes pa yin/'jam dpal gyis smras pa/nam theg pa
392a2(mdo sde): gzhan la 'dod pa mi byed pa na'o//lha'i bus smras pa/ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' 'dod pa nyung po yin/'jam dpal gyis smras pa/nam rang gi nyon mongs pa
392a3(mdo sde): rnams kyang mi 'dod lo sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa rnams spang bar yang 'dod pa na'o//lha'i bus smras pa/ji ltar ni byang chub sems dpa' chog shes pa
392a4(mdo sde): yin/'jam dpal gyis smras pa/nam 'phags pa'i shes rab kyi shes pas chos gang yang mi len pa na'o//lha'i bus smras pa/ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa'
392a5(mdo sde): ngoms pa yin/'jam dpal gyis smras pa/nam 'jig rten las 'das pa'i shes rab la'ang gnas la/'jig rten pa'i rgyu bas kyang sems can rnams yongs
392a6(mdo sde): su smin par byed pa na'o//lha'i bus smras pa/ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' rab tu dben pa yin/'jam dpal gyis smras pa/nam nyon mongs pa thams cad
392a7(mdo sde): kyis kyang kun nas nyon mongs par mi 'gyur la sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa spong ba'i phyir brtson par yang snang ba na'o//lha'i bus smras pa/ji ltar na
392b1(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' rang dgar rang dbang can yin/'jam dpal gyis smras pa/nam zag pa med pa'i lus kyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du snang ste/ye shes
392b2(mdo sde): kyi dbang byed kyi nyon mongs pas dbang byed pa ma yin pa na'o//lha'i bus smras pa/ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' mang du thos pa yin/'jam dpal gyis smras pa/
392b3(mdo sde): nam bdag nyid kyang ma thos pa'i chos nyan cing gzhan la'ang ma thos pa'i chos thos par byed pa na'o//lha'i bus smras pa/ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' tshul bzhin
392b4(mdo sde): lnga brtson pa yin/'jam dpal gyis smras pa/nam dmigs pa thams cad los 'byung ba rab tu shes kyang chos thams cad 'phro bar yang mi byed/mI 'phro bar yang
392b5(mdo sde): mi byed pa na'o//lha'i bus smras pa/ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sgrub pa snying por byed pa yin/'jam dpal gyis smras pa/nam gzhan dang 'brel ba'i rnam par rig
392b6(mdo sde): pa mi skyed cing sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi spyod pa dben par yang rtog la/rong gi sems kyi spyod pa la'ang mi lta zhing /bdag dang gzhan du 'du shes pas sgrub pa
392b7(mdo sde): snying por byed pa ma yin pa na'o//lha'i bus smras pa/'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' gzungs dang spobs pa phun sum tshogs pa yin/'jam dpal gyis
393a1(mdo sde): smras pa/lha'i bu nam byang chub sems dpa' thos pa thams cad kyang 'dzin la sems can thams cad kyi dbang po rnams la'ang mtshungs par rab tu 'byung
393a2(mdo sde): cing /sgra skad brag ca dang mtshungs par yang shes nas mngon par zhen pa med pa na ste/de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' gzungs dang spobs pa phun sum tshogs pa yin
393a3(mdo sde): no||de nas lha'i bu 'od mang pos 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so//'jam dpal khyod kyis bshad pa'i don 'di sus kun shes par 'gyur/'jam
393a4(mdo sde): dpal gyis smras pa/lha'i bu gang dag dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su zin par gyur pa/sngon gyi sbyor ba phun sum tshogs pa/dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa/dmigs pa
393a5(mdo sde): med par spyod pa de dag gis kho bos bshad pa'i don 'di kun shes par 'gyur ro//lho'i dus smras pa/de dag ci la mos par 'gyur/bsam pa ni gang /'jam dpal
393a6(mdo sde): gyis smras pa/de dag zab mo la mos par 'gyur te/lhag pa'i nga rgyal med pa ni bsam pa'o//lha'i bus smras pa/'jam dpal ji ltar na dge slong lhag pa'i nga rgyal
393a7(mdo sde): med pa yin/'jam dpal gyis smras pa/lha'i bu nam dge slong 'jig tshogs la lta ba ngo bo nyid kyis bgrod pa gcig pu'i lam du sgom ste/gnyis su med pas 'jig
393b1(mdo sde): tshochogasal lta ba'i ngo bo nyid gang yin pa de bgrod pa gcig pu'i lam gyi ngo bo nyid du mnyam par shes shing ma rig pa dang srid pa dang sred pa las 'byung ba'ang 'tshal la/ma rig pa
393b2(mdo sde): dang srid pa dang sred pa las 'byung ba la so sor rtog pa ni/ma rig pa dang srid pa dang sred pa'i ngo bo nyid kyang rig pa dang rnam par grol bar shes pa na ste/de ltar na dge slong lhag pa'i
393b3(mdo sde): nga rgyal med pa yin no//lha'i bu gzhan yang nAm dge slong 'dod chags kyi mtha' la 'dod chags dang bral ba'i mthar shes shing /'dod chags dang bral ba'i mtha'i rang bzhin
393b4(mdo sde): yang 'dod chags su shes pa dang /zhe sdang gi mtha' la zhe sdang dang bral ba'i mthar shes shing /zhe sdang dang bral ba'i mtha'i rang bzhin yang zhe sdang du shes pa dang /gti mug
393b5(mdo sde): gri mtha' la gti mug dang bral ba'i mthar shes shing /gti mug dang bral ba'i mtha'i rang bzhin yang gti mug tu shes pa na ste/de ltar na dge slong lhag pa'i nga rgyal med pa
