393b6(mdo sde): yin no//lha'i bu gzhan yang rnam dge slong sdug bsngal yongs su shes par mi byed/kun 'byung ba spong bar mi byed/'gog pa mngon sum du mi byed/lam sgom par
393b7(mdo sde): yang mi byed la/sdug bsngal mi skye ba shes nges 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi rjes su rtog sa te/sdug bsngal mi skye ba shes pa gang yin pa de la kun 'byung ba gang yang med//
394a1(mdo sde): sdug bsngal mi skye ba shes pa gang yin pa de la 'gog pa gang yang med/sdug bsngal mi skye ba shes pa gang yin pa de la lam gang yang med pa de ltar dge
394a2(mdo sde): slong tshul bzhin la brtson pa ni chos gang yang skyed par mi byed/'gag par mi byed/gnas par mi byed do//gangang+gA la skye ba med pa dang /'gags pa med pa dang /granas
394a3(mdo sde): pa med pa de 'dus ma byas pa'o//'dus mo byas kyi rango bzhin yang 'phags po rnams kyi bden pa sgom pa ste/lha'i bu do ltar na dge slong lhag pa'i nga rgyal med pa yin no///
394a4(mdo sde): de nas bdud sdig can sdug bsngal zhing yid mi bde ste/gdong mchi mas gang zhing mchi mas brnangs bzhin du tshig 'di skad ces smras so//gang na chos kyi rnam grangs
394a5(mdo sde): 'di spyod pa de ni bdud rnams kyi skabs med do//gang dag chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'dzin par 'gyur ba de dag gi bdud kyi las thams cad bkag par 'gyur ro zhes de skad smras
394a6(mdo sde): nas bdud sdig can sdug bsngal zhing yid mi bde ste/yid la bcags bzhin de nyid du mi snang bar gyur to//de nas lha'i bu 'od mang pos 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur
394a7(mdo sde): pa la 'di skad ces smras so//'jam dpal khyod kyi bshad pa'i don ji ltar bdag gis shes pa ltar na/gang dag lhag pa'i nga rgyal med pa'i tshul zab mo 'di thos nas
394b1(mdo sde): stospyospa ba'i dge slong de dag gi rab tu byung ba med do//bsnyen par rdzogs pa med do//lhag pa'i nga rgyal med pa'i tshul mchog tu zab pa 'dis skrag par 'gyur ba'i khyim de dag gi stan
394b2(mdo sde): pa de bzhin gshegs pa ma yin no//dge slong ngam/dge slong ma'am/dge bsnyen nam/dge bsnyen ma gang dag lhag pa'i nga rgyal med pa'i tshul mchog tu zab pa 'di thos
394b3(mdo sde): nas mi skrag myi dngangal dngang bar mi 'gyur zhing mos par 'gyur ba de dag rnam par grol ba nyid du rig par bya'o//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i bu 'od mang po la 'di skad ces
394b4(mdo sde): bka' stsal to//lha'i bu de de bzhin no//ji skad smras pa bzhin te/dge slong ngam/dge slong ma 'am/dge bsnyen nam/dge bsnyen ma gang dag lhag pa'i nga rgyal
394b5(mdo sde): med pa'i tshul mchog tu zab pa 'di thos nas mi skrag mi dengangal dngang bar mi 'gyur zhing mos par 'gyur ba de dag rnam par grol ba nyid du rig par bya'o//de ci'i phyir zhe na/
394b6(mdo sde): bzod pa 'dis byang chub sems dpa' rnams bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung ston pa dang /bzod pa 'dis nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas thams
394b7(mdo sde): cad nges par 'byung ba'i phyir ro//lha'i bu 'od mang pos gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i ming ci lags/'di ji ltar gzung bar 'gyi/bcom
395a1(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/lha'i bu de'i phyir khyod kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'jam dpal rnam par 'phrul pa'i le'u zhes bya bar gzung zhig/bdud
395a2(mdo sde): 'dul ba'i le'u zhes bya bar yang gzung zhi /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang /lha'i bu 'od mang po dang
395a3(mdo sde): thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dang /lha dang /mi dang /lha ma yin dang /dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon
395a4(mdo sde): par bstod do////'phags pa 'jam dpal rnam par 'phrul pa'i le'u zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/rdzogs so////rgya gar gyi
395a5(mdo sde): mkhan po shI len+d+ra bo d+hi dang dzI na mi tra dang /zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba ban+de ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te/skad gsar bcad kyis bcos nas gtan la phab pa//rgya gror skad
395a6(mdo sde): du/Ar+ya sarba taM thA ga tA d+hiSh+ThA Na satwA ba lo ka na bud+d+ha k+She tra ni rdi sha na b+hU ha nA ma ma hA yA ni sU tra/bod skad du/'phags pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin gyis
395a7(mdo sde): brlabs sems can la gzigs shing sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi bkod pa kun tu ston pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la
395b1(mdo sde): phyag 'tshal lo//'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/bcom ldan 'das ri gru 'dzin na 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi gnas lha'i nor bu rin po che dpal gyi
395b2(mdo sde): snying po dang /me tog rgyas pa dang /lha'i seng ge'i khri bkod pa na/dge slong lnga brgya tsam gyi dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po thams cad kyang dgra bcom pa/zag pa zad pa/sems
395b3(mdo sde): thams cad kyi dbang gi dam pa'i pha rol tu son pa sha stag dang /byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyang snying rje chen po'i shes pa la gnas pa thams cad kyang skye ba gcig gis
395b4(mdo sde): thogs pa dang /skye ba gnyis dang /skye ba gsum dang /skye ba bcu dang /skye ba nyi shu dang /skye ba sum cu dang /skye ba brgya'i bar dag gis thogs pa/thams cad kyang
395b5(mdo sde): sa brgyad pa dang /sa bcu pa la gnas po sha stag ste/'phogs pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dong /'jam dpalo dang /dri med tog dang /nor dpal dang /glog gi
395b6(mdo sde): tog dang /dri med 'od dang /tsan+dan dang /bdud rtsi'i tog la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bdun brgya dang /dge bsnyen dang /dge bsnyen ma
395b7(mdo sde): thams cad kyang lung bstan pa dang ldan pa/ting nge 'dzin thob pa/'jig rten gyi khams tha dad pa nas 'dus pa lnga stong dang /lha dang /klu dang /gnod sbyin dang /dri za
396a1(mdo sde): tham datam thamacamacam mamasas ma thams ma tham/ a nathatha tha a na thaH Shas mamatham mamamam tham tham ma' thamamamam yamasam mam ya' mamaHma macam thamags 'am/atha mtsham mkhatham
396a2(mdo sde): thams cad kyang sngon gyi sangs rgyas la bsnyen bkur byas pa/de bzhin gshegs pa'i cho 'phrul mthong ba brgya stong dang /gnod sbyin mo chen mo thams cad
396a3(mdo sde): kyang byang chub sems dpa'i ye shes thob pa lung bstan pa thob pa/phyir mi ldog pa dpe med ma dang /dri med 'od dang /'od can ma dang /'jigs byed ma dang /dpal ldan
396a4(mdo sde): ma dang /'phrog ma dang /dung can ma la sogs pa gnod sbyin mo chen mo brgyad cu dang /brgya byin dang /tshangs pa dang /rnam thos kyi bu dang /yul 'khor srung dang /
396a5(mdo sde): 'phags skyes po dang /mig mi bzung dang /nor bu bzang po'i bu dang /gang ba bzang po la sogs pa 'jig rten skyong ba thams cad kyi bar dag dang thabs cig tu bzhugs so///
396a6(mdo sde): de nas de dog thams cad kyis de bzhin gshegs pa seng ge'i khri la bzhugs par rig nas rang rang gi dge ba'i rtsa bo dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa la lha'i rgyan dang /na bza'
396a7(mdo sde): dang /me tog dang /me tog phreng dang /spos dang /byug pa dang /rol mo'i sgra rnams kyis mchod par byas/ri mor byas so//kha cig gis lan 'bum phrag du mar
396a8(mdo sde): bskor ba byas te bstod do//de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das sems can thams cad la dmigs pa snying rje chen po'i shes pa la gnas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms
396b1(mdo sde): par zhugs so//ting nge 'dzin de'i mthus stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di 'od kyis snang bar gyur cing /gzugs thams cad snang bas khyab par gyur nas/
396b2(mdo sde): sems can dmus long gang yin pa de dag gis ni mig gis gzugs mthong bar gyur to//'on pa rnams kyis ni rna bas sgra dag thos par gyur to//nad kyis btab pa rnams
396b3(mdo sde): ni nad dag dang bral bar gyur to//gos med pa rnams ni gos dag thob par gyur to//smyon pa rnams ni dran pa thob par gyur to//lus nyams pa dang dbang po ma tshang ba rnams
396b4(mdo sde): ni lus dang dbang po yongs su rdzogs par gyur to//dbul po rnams kyis ni nor dag thob par gyur to//sems can gang dag nor dang /yo byad dang /longs spyod med pa
396b5(mdo sde): de dag nor dang /yo byad dang /longs spyod dag dang ldan par gyur to//sems can thams cad kyang bde ba thams cad dang ldan zhing bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par
396b6(mdo sde): gyur to//stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can gang yin pa de dag thams cad la'ang bskul nas thams cad chos mnyan pa'i phyir/bcom ldan
396b7(mdo sde): 'das ga la ba der lhags te/sems can gang dag lha rnams kyi nang du skyes pa de dag thams cad kyis ni lha'i bde ba yongs su spangs nas sangs rgyas rjes su dran par byas
397a1(mdo sde): te chos mnyan pa'i phyir/bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der lhags so//sems can gang dag mi rnams kyi nang du skyes pa de dag gis kyang mi'i bde ba yongs
397a2(mdo sde): su spangs nas chos mnyan pa'i phyir/bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der lhags so//sems can gang dag klu dang /gnod sbyin dang /srin po dang /yi dgas dang /sha
397a3(mdo sde): za rnams kyi nang nas skyes pa de dag gis kyang sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa so sor thob nas sems can thams cad la byams par gnas pa dang /lus dang sems bde bar gyur
397a4(mdo sde): nas chos mnyan pa'i phyir/bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der lhags so//sems can gang dag gshin rje'i 'jig rten rnams su mun pa mun nag gi nang du skyes pa de dag kyang
397a5(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi mthus yud tsam zhig dran pa so sor thob nas gcig gis gcig kun tu shes par gyur te/de dag mun pa chen po de nas yongs su thar par gyur to//sems
397a6(mdo sde): can thams cad gcig la gcig byams par gnas shing nye ba'i nyon mongs pa rnams dang bral bar gyur to//de nas de'i tshe sa chen po 'di rnam pa drug tu rab tu g.yos te mtho
397a7(mdo sde): ba dma' bar gyur to//de nas 'khor 'dus pa der 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa 'dus te 'dug par gyur nas/des byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
397b1(mdo sde): nyam ngatan thathacamamam thamams a na thams mamatha.a mthan tha.a na thaH Shas nam tham tha mam tam man tham tha thamamacam tham a mgam bcan a a amathas mtham thamasas bama' ma tha mtham mtha tham
397b2(mdo sde): 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la 'di skad ces smras so//rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa'i 'dus pa chen po kun tu snang zhing 'dus pa chen po'i snga ltas kyang kun tu
397b3(mdo sde): snang la/rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag mang po drag lung ston pa'ang kun tu snang zhing chos kyi 'phel ba'i gtam chen po'i snga ltas kyang kun tu snang ba
397b4(mdo sde): las na rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma dag gi ra ba thams cad yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur zhing ye shes chen po'ang 'thob par 'gyur gyis/rigs
397b5(mdo sde): kyi bu de'i phyir khyad kyis sems can thamaso cad lnga snying rje skyed la/phan pa dang /bde ba dang /bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la dgod par bya ba'i bar gyi
397b6(mdo sde): phyir/de bzhin gshegs pa la yongs su zhus shig/rigs kyi bu phyi ma'i dus phyi ma'i tshe na sems can sdig pa byed pa/dbul ba/nyom chung ba/lus mdog ngan pa/
397b7(mdo sde): rgo ba dang na bas yongs su gzir ba/longs spyod chung ba lus yongs su ma bsgoms pa/tshe thung ba/blo chung ba/'dod chags dang /zhe sdang dang /gti mug gis yongs
397b8(mdo sde): su gzir ba dag 'byung ba yod de/rigs kyi bu de dag gi don du chos bstan par bya ba'i phyir/de bzhin gshegs pa la gsol ba thob cige dang /rigs kyi bu de'i phyir
398a1(mdo sde): khyod kyis yun ring por sems can rnams kyi don dang /phan pa dang /bde ba dang /nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar bya ba dang /sdig pa thams cad bzlog
398a2(mdo sde): par bya ba dang /sdig pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar bya ba dang /re ba thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bya ba dang /bla na med pa'i yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba dag byas
398a3(mdo sde): par 'gyur ro//de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis phyogs bcur rnam par bltas te/de bzhin gshegs
398a4(mdo sde): pa bye ba phrag gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag yid la byas nas/bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/lan gsum bskor ba byas nas yan lag
398a5(mdo sde): lngas phyag 'tshal te/bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das slad ma'i dus slad ma'i tshe na sems can rga ba dang /na ba dang /'chi ba
398a6(mdo sde): dang /mya ngan gyis non par gyur pa/dus ma lags par 'gum pas yongs su gzir ba/nyam chung ba/mdog ngan pa/tshe thung ba/longs spyod chung ba/lus
398a7(mdo sde): yongs su ma bsgoms pa dag 'byung ba mchis te/de dag ni ser sna dang /'chal pa'i tshul khrims kyi sems kyis gcig la gcig 'gum par 'gyur la/gcig
398b1(mdo sde): gris gcig gi nor dang /longs spyod dang /dbang phyug dag 'phrog par 'gyur zhing /gad myo dang /'jo sgeg dang /bro gar dang /rtsed mo dag gis mngon par rtse ba dang /

398b3(mdo sde): dge ba rnam pa sna tshogs dag gis gtses nas sems can dmyal ba dang /dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang /gshin rje'i 'jig rten dag tu'ang skye bar 'gyur lags pas/bcom

398b7(mdo sde): pa ci'ang mi mnga' bas chos kyi 'phel ba'i gtamanyan par 'tshal ba dang /sngon gyi sangs rgyas la bsnyen bkur bgyis pa dang /shes rab dang ldan pa'i rang bzhin con gyi
399a1(mdo sde): tham yamamamatshamamamamasas mthams ma mam/a mtham thas na thatha khas ma thamamamamamamamathams thamamams yam mas tshamaca ya.a am sa bas tham kas ya' ya tha mtham ma' sa

399a4(mdo sde): bshad du gsol//bde bar gshegs pa bshad du gsol/de nas thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor ji ltar lhags pa de dag gis kyang yan lag lngas phyag byas te

399a7(mdo sde): kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa thams
399a8(mdo sde): cad kyis byin gyis brlabs sems can la gzigs shing sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi bkod pa kun tu ston pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod de/ngas sngon dang po sems bskyed
399b1(mdo sde): pa nas bzung ste/de bzhin gshegs pa me tog snang ba kun tu ston pa zhes bya ba'i spyan sngar de thos so//rigs kyi bu ting nge 'dzin de'i ming thos ma thag tu sems can bya ba
399b2(mdo sde): phrag dgu bcus de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes thob par gyur nas/thams cad kyang de bzhin gshegs pas sangs rgyas kyi zhing tha dad pa dag tu lung bstan te/ngas kyang lung
399b3(mdo sde): bstan pa thob bo//rigs kyi bu ngas de bzhin gshegs pa'i lha'i mkhyen pas sngon de bzhin gshegs pa sum khris sems can thams cad kyi don du chos kyi rnam grangs 'di

399b6(mdo sde): dag gis kyang thos nas ri mo dang mchod pa dag byas te/de'i 'og tu sems can bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma dag gis lung bstan pa thob cing byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge
399b7(mdo sde): 'dzin dag thob par gyur nas/'dod pa thams cad du 'gro ba dang /re ba thams cad grub pa dang /nad rnams dang bral bar yang gyur la/dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams yongs
400a1(mdo sde): su smin pa dang /sgrib pa thams cad spangs pa dang /gzugs bzang zhing mdzes pa blta na sdug pa dang /nor dang /'bru dang /mdzod dang /bang ba
400a2(mdo sde): rnams 'byor pa dang /rgyal po dang /rgyal bu dang /blon po rnams kyis mngon par bstod par 'os pa dang /sems can thams cad kyis phyag bya bar 'os pa dang /

400a5(mdo sde): sdug pa'i sdug bsngal med par gyur pa de dran te/rigs kyi bu de ltar na rigs kyi bu 'am/rigs kyi bu mo dag chos smra ba de la mchog tu gus pa'i sems bskyed

400a7(mdo sde): dang /ba dan dag gis legs par brgyan naso sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo zhes brjod cing phyag 'tshal bar byed pa dang /legs so zhes bya ba sbyin par byed pa
400b1(mdo sde): dang /'dzin pa dang /'chang ba dang /klog pa dang /yi ger 'drir 'jug pa de dag ni yon tan mang po dang ldan par 'gyur ro//de dag ni tshe 'di nyid la'ang yon tan mang po
400b2(mdo sde): dang ldan par 'gyur te/gzugs bzang zhing mdzes la blta na sdug pa dang /nad rnams dang bral ba dang /tshe ring ba dang /blo brtan pa dang /dran pa dang ldan pa dang /brtan
400b3(mdo sde): pa dang ldan pa dang /rgyal po thams cad dang /rgyal po'i btsun mo thams cad dang /rgyal bu thams cad dang /blon po thams cad dang /dgra thams cad dang /sems
400b4(mdo sde): can gyis mngon par bstod par 'os pa dang /phyag bya bar 'os pa dang /bsnyen bkur bya bar 'os par 'gyur ro//nor drang yo byad mang por yang 'gyur ro//de dag gi
400b5(mdo sde): kha nas tsan+dan gyi dri'i ngad 'byung bar yang 'gyur ro//mig ut+pa la sngon po'i 'dab ma 'dra bar yang 'gyur ro//de dag gis nyin mtshon du sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems
400b6(mdo sde): dpa' dag mthong bar yang 'gyur ro//mtshams med pa la sogs pa'i sgrib pa thams cad zad par yang 'gyur ro//de dag la lha rnams srung bar yong 'gyur ro//de dag
400b7(mdo sde): 'chi ba'i dus na sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' dag mthong bar yang 'gyur ro//phrag dog med pa dang /sems rnam par g.yengs pa med par 'chi ba'i dus byed
401a1(mdo sde): par yang 'gyur ro//shrI 'phos nas kyang 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du skye ba'i bar du 'gyur ro//rigs kyi bu gang dag chos kyi rnam grangs 'di
401a2(mdo sde): 'dzin pa dang /bsnyen bkur byas te yi ger 'dri ba dang /yi ger 'drir 'jug pa dang /klog pa dang /mchod par byed pa dang /'chang ba dang /ming tsam thos par
401a3(mdo sde): 'gyur ba de dag ni ngas mngon sum du lung bstan pas lung bstan pa yin te/de dag gis nga mthong zhing bsnyen bkur byas/ri mor byas/mchod pa byas pa'ang yin pas/
401a4(mdo sde): de dag gis ni sangs rgyas kyi byang chub la the tshom bskyed par mi bya'o//gang dag rna lam du gag par gyur pa de dag kyang byang chub sems dpa' yin par yid la byas la bsnyen
401a5(mdo sde): bkur bya'o//de'i sngon gyi las kyi rnam par smin pos gzugaso mi mdzes pa dang /longs spyod med pa dang /blo med pa dang /sred pa tsha ba dang /sdug pa dang bral
401a6(mdo sde): dang /rgyal srid 'khrugs par gyur pa gang yin pa de dag dang /klad pa na pa gang yin pa dang /zan chad pa gang yin pa dang /glos ngan par gyur pa gang yin pa dang /
401a7(mdo sde): lus dang sems la gnod pa gang yin pa dang /reg na mi bde ba'i mal bcas pa gang yin pa dang /spyo ba gang yin pa'i las kyi sgrib pa de dag thams cad kyang ting
401b1(mdo sde): 'dzin 'di thos pa'i mthus yongs su zad par 'gyur ro//des kyang 'di ltar sems bskyed par bya ste/bdag gis sngon 'khor ba na 'khor ba'i tshe sems can rnams la sdig pa
401b2(mdo sde): mi dge ba rnam pa sna tshogs bsags pa de dag so sor bshags par bya'o//bsal bar bya'o//mi bcab par bya'o//sangs rgyas dang chos dang /dge 'dun la dad pa
401b3(mdo sde): mi phyed pa dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed par bya ste/rigs kyi bu 'amo rigs kyi bu mo de'i longs spyod kyi 'bras bu med par 'gyur ba'i las kyi sgrib pa dang /sangs rgyas dang /
401b4(mdo sde): chos dang /dge 'dun drang /nyon thos dang /rang sangs rgyas dag dang /pha ma dag la sdig pa'i las byas shing bsogs par gyur pa gang yin pa de dag thams cad
401b5(mdo sde): yongs su zad par 'gyur zhing dbang phyug chen po dag kyang yang dag par 'grub par 'gyur ro//rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i sems can dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal myong
401b6(mdo sde): bar 'gyur ba'i las kyi sgrib pa dang /sdug pa dang bral bar 'gyur ba dang /dmus long du 'gyur ba dang /bud med kyi dngos por 'gyur ba dang /mtshon gnyis par

402a1(mdo sde): thams cad kyang yongs su zad par 'gyur te/rigs kyi bu de ltar na ting nge 'dzin 'di ni yon tan thams cad kyi 'byung gnas yin no//rigs kyi
402a2(mdo sde): bu chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yun ring du gnas par byed pa dang /rigs kyi bu dang /rigs kyi bu mo de dag la srung ba dang /skyob pa dang /sbed par byed pa dang de dag thams
402a3(mdo sde): cad kyi yon tan dang /ri ba thams cad yongs su rdzogs par longs spyod pa dang /dbang phyug drang /badra ba chen por byed pa dang /bsam po dang 'dod pa thams
402a4(mdo sde): cad yang dag par 'grub par byed pa dang /las thams cad zad par byed pa dang /dus ma yin par 'chi ba dang /rmi lam ngan pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed
402a5(mdo sde): pa dang /g.yul thams cod las rgyal bar byed pa dang /tshe dang /mdog dang /stobs dang /brtson 'grus dang /mthu che bar byed pa dang /gnod sbyin dang /

402a7(mdo sde): bar dag thob par byed pa'i gzungs kyi gsang sngags gzhi dog yod de de dag mnyan cing bzung ste bsnyen bkur byed pa dang /klog pa dang /yi ger 'dri ba dang /yi ger

402b4(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/na maHsarba ta thA ga tA nAM/tad+ya thA/bud+d+he/su prar+N+NaM/bud+d+ha ma te/lo kaM bi lo ka li a tIkrAn+te/satwa a ba lo ke no/sarba ta thA ga ta

402b6(mdo sde): sarba yaM b+hU ta thA ga ta a d+hi sh+tsi te ne swA hA/kye rigs kyi bu dag gzungs kyi gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa sum khris gsungs shing byin gyis brlabs pa yin
402b7(mdo sde): no//ngas kyang de ltar sems can thams cad kyi don dang /phan pa dang /bde ba dang /srung ba dang /skyob pa dang /sra ba dang /nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar bya ba dang /
403a1(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi zhing du skye bar bya ba'i phyir bshad de/grags pa dag gang la la zhig 'di snyam du bdag ji ltar na de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa'i yon
403a2(mdo sde): tan+da de dag thams cad 'thob par 'gyur snyam du soms po des nang par sngar langs te sems can thams cad la snying brtse ba'i sems dang /snying rje'i sems dang /byams
403a3(mdo sde): nga'i sems dang /phrag dog dang /nga rgyal dang /'chab pa dang /khro ba yongs su spangs pa'i sems dang /rtse gcig pa'i sems kyis sangs rgyas dang byang chub
403a4(mdo sde): sems dpa' rnams la mchod pa shin tu rgya cher byas la phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la phyag byas te/gang 'dod pa yid la byas nas me tog la bzlas
403a5(mdo sde): brjod lan brgya rtsa brgyad bya zhing de bzhin gshegs po la re ro nas dbul bar bya'o//des na de'i re ba thams cad yang dag par 'grub par 'gyur ro//rmi lam na de bzhin

403b3(mdo sde): rnam par grol zhing bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par gyur to//de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rjes phyogs bcur rnam par bltas
403b4(mdo sde): te/bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dam 'cha' ba mi 'jigs pa'i gzi brjid ces bgyi ba'i gzungs

403b6(mdo sde): lags so//bcom ldan 'das dang slan chad bdag gis mngon par 'tshal te/gang gi rna lom du gzungs de grag par gyur tam/glo bar chud par gyur pa de'i lus nyam pa

403b8(mdo sde): 'jigs pa'am/mtshon gyis 'jigs pa 'am/dug gis 'jigs pa 'am/dug sbyar mas 'jigs pa 'am/mkha' 'gro ma dang /'byung po'i 'jigs pa'am/
404a1(mdo sde): gnod sbyin nam/dgra rnams sam/mi dang mi ma lags pa dag gis mtho 'tsham pa'am/rnam par gtse ba 'am/gnod pa bgyid par 'gyur
404a2(mdo sde): ba de ni gnas ma mchis lags so//de'i slad du bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la rjes su gnang ba stsol cig/bdag gis chos smra ba dang /chos nyan pa de dag gi don du nyan
404a3(mdo sde): pa rnams dang /ri mor bgyid pa rnams dang /mchod par bgyid pa rnams dang /'dzin par bgyid pa rnams kyi re ba thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bgyid pa/byang

404a5(mdo sde): badz+ra ba la/badz+ra ti dza/hUM hU~M/badz+ra pA NI/ta thA ga ta Ad+d+haM ba la ya/smad pra ti d+h+waM/sarba bi d+ha ne sarba pa pA ni nA shaM yaM/de hi mai/yau thai ba si tam pa ra ma/yin
404a6(mdo sde): ya me ba a b+hi pA yan tsa mi tan ta me ba sa mr-i d+hA tu/he he/tu ru tu ru/A gats+tsha A gr-its+tsha ma bi lam ba da ri sha yang /badz+ra kA yaM/da ri sha ya badz+ra kA yaM/bud+d+ha a d+hi sh+tsa

404b1(mdo sde): ma yin pa'i bar dag kyang ngo mtshar du gyur nas sems can chen po rab tu grub par byed pa'i gzungs kyi gsung sngags gzhi 'di dag bshad pa ni legs so legs so zhes legs
404b2(mdo sde): sngo zhes bya ba byin no//de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rjes 'di skad ces gsol to//btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gang la la

404b6(mdo sde): bgyid pa bgyis la/gtsang mas bdug spos kyis bdug cing gdugs mtshan gcig tu spang ba bgyis la/de nas tshes brgyad nas tshes bco lnga'i bar du de bzhin gau shegs
404b7(mdo sde): pa'i sku gzugs bzhugs pa'i gnas gtsang mar tsan+dan dkar po'i dkyil 'khor bgyis laM/bum pa gang ba bzhi'ang bzhag par bgyi/phyogs bzhir yang ro dang

405b1(mdo sde): rten gyis 'dra' bar bya ba ma yin te/'di la som nyi med pa drang /yid gnyis med pa dang /the tshom med par bya'o//de nas bcom ldan 'das la 'jam dpal gzhon nur

406a1(mdo sde): pa'i las byed pa/sdig pa spyod par byed pa/shes nas sdig pa'i lta bar gyur pa'i sems can de dag la chos ston par byed cing /sdig pa thams cad

406b1(mdo sde): baspyod pa ji tsam zhig tu 'gyur lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rigs kyi bu ngas dang po sems bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /

406b4(mdo sde): bran dang /bran mo dag yongs su btang bar gyur pa gang yin pa bsod nams mngon par 'du bya ba dang /dge ba'i rtsa ba mngon par 'du bya ba snga ma 'di ni/chos kyi rnam grangs

407a7(mdo sde): ba la bde bar 'du shes pa dang /mtshon cha dang /spyo ba dang /bsdigs pa dang /rdeg pa la mngon par dga' ba dang /shes par mi 'gyur ba dang /yid la byed par
407b1(mdo sde): mi 'gyur ba de dag ni sdig pa'i las kyi gzhi de dang /mi shes pa des mi dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su zin cing rga ba dang /na ba dang /mya ngan dang /'chi bas yongs su zin pas
407b2(mdo sde): 'chi ba'i tshe na yongs su gdung bar 'gyur te dmigs pa na so so nas dur khrod dang 'dra ba kho nar mthong zhing /dge ba'i sems bskyed par yang mi 'gyur la/dad pa mi byed pa thob par
407b3(mdo sde): yang mi 'gyur te/de dag de nas shi 'phros nas kyang sdug bsngal dag nyams su myong bar 'gyur bas na lung bstan pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba med pa dang /de bzhin gshegs pa ma mthong
407b4(mdo sde): ba dang /lung bstan pa ma thob pa dag gis ni chos kyi rnam grangs 'di mnyan pa dang /ri mor bya ba dang /mchod par bya ba dang /gzung ba dang /yi ger bri ba dang /yi ger

414b3(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das gang la lnga yon tan 'tshal ba dang /nor dang 'bru 'tshal ba dang /sems can thams cad dbang du bgyid par 'tshal ba dang /nor gyi dbang phyug chen po
414b4(mdo sde): dang /rgyal srid dang /rig sngags 'chang chen po nyid dang /bdag kyang mngon sum du mthong bar 'tshal ba des tshes brgyad kyi gdugs la ras dkar po sar pa khwa tshar ma
414b5(mdo sde): bskum pa skra bsal bra la ri mo mkhan gtsang ma bsnyen te gnas pa/'phags pa yan lag brgyud pa la gnas pas/tshon rtsi sbyin dang ma 'bags pa snod sar pa'i nang du stsal
414b6(mdo sde): bas dbus su de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs chos ston pa'i tshul du bzhugs pa bri bar bgyi'o//g.yas phyogs su 'phags pa rdo rje khro bo ral pa dkar po 'tshal ba/rgyan
414b7(mdo sde): thams cad dang /me tog phreng ba dang /zla gam dang /se mo dos brgyan pa rdo rje gsor zhing mchis pa bri bar bgyi'o//g.yon phyogs su ni gnod sbyin mo chen mo dpe med
415a1(mdo sde): ma 'dam bu mdu' rgyu'i mdog ltar dAkAr sham+b+ha du mchis la/rad ba dkar po 'tshal ba/rgyun thams cad kyis brgyan pa/sug pa na pad+ma thogs shing
415a2(mdo sde): yang dag par dbugs 'byin pa'i tshul du mchis pa bri bar bgyi'o//de nas rig sngags 'chang gtsang ma bsnyen te gnas pa'i 'phags pa yan lag brgyad pa la gnas pa/
415a3(mdo sde): rad pa dkar po 'tshal ba/grogs dang ldan pa/nas chan 'o ma dang sbyar ba 'tshal bas sngar bsnyen pa bgyi la/tshes brgyad kyi gdugs la de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku
415a4(mdo sde): gdung dang bcas pa'i gnas gtsang mar dang por kho nar de bzhin gshegs pa dang /lag na rdo rje la me tog dang /bdug spos dang /spos dag gsol bar bgyi zhing /
415a5(mdo sde): phyogs bzhir yang 'o thug dang /zho dang /'bras chan dang /ro sna tshogs dang ldan pa dang /chen sna tshogs kyi gtor ma dag gtor la/me tog dang /bdug spos
415a6(mdo sde): drang /spros dang /mararA me sna tshogs dag gis mchod pa bgyis nas dus gsum du sna ma'i me tog brgya rtsa brgyad phyag gsum la bzlas brjod brgya rtsa brgyad phrag gsum bgyi
415a7(mdo sde): zhing /re re nas gnod sbyin mi chen mo dpe med ma'i gzugs de la bstan par bgyi'o//de nas zla ba nya'o tshes bco lnga'i gdugs la'ang cho ga 'di nyid dang /gzhan yang
415b1(mdo sde): tham Na thathacamanamanyaman sa.a mthamasam thatha/a mthan tha sa na thaHShas rba mtham mthatha tam tsan mtha thamamathan tam yamakam tshan/tsa/ya.a amamamam tham gas/mtha mtham mthamam
415b2(mdo sde): ci 'byor pa dag dang bdug spos dang /ga pur dang /pog dkar po dang /tsan+dan dang /shing mu sa dag kyang dbul/'bru mar dri bda' ba'i zhugs mar kha gnyis kyang dbul
415b3(mdo sde): bar bgyi'o//de nas bdag der rang gi gzugs kyis gnas par bgyi zhing dam pa ci 'tshal ba'ang stsal bar bgyi ste/ting nge 'dzin thob pa dang /nam mkha' la mchis pa
415b4(mdo sde): dang /lus mi snang bar bgyi ba dang /rgyal srid dang /stobs kyi 'khor los sgyur ba nyid dang /rig sngags 'chang nyid dang /de lta 'tshal ba dang /nor sgyur 'tshal ba dang /
415b5(mdo sde): pha rol gyi sems 'tshal ba dang /tshe ring ba dang /dam pa ci 'tshal ba'ang stsol bar bgyi lags so//des kyang sems can thams cad la byams pa'i sems dang /
415b6(mdo sde): rgyal dang /khro ba dang /phrag dog dang /ser sna yongs su sbyangs pa'i sems su bgyi'o//mchod rten dang /chos dang /dge 'dun gyi nor 'phrog pa yongs su spang ba
415b7(mdo sde): dang /de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la dang ba mi phyed par bgyi'o//bcom ldan 'das gal te mtshams ma mchis pa bgyid pa zhig gis kyang ldan gsum bsgrubs te bdag
415b8(mdo sde): gis ma stsal bar gyur na bcom ldan 'das bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar ma gyur cig/gal te sangs rgyas la
416a1(mdo sde): ma dad ngar gyur pa dang /yid gnyis su gyur pa gang lags pa dang /sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos bgyis nas 'gyod par mi bgyid pa dang /nyon mongs pa
416a2(mdo sde): dang /nye ba'i nyon mongs pa'i sems dang ldan pa gang lags pa de dag la'ang bdag mthong ba spel bar bgyi zhing thob par yang bgyi lags so//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis
416a3(mdo sde): gnod sbyin mo chen mo dpe med ma la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/sring mo legs so legs so//sring mo khyod kyis sems can thams cad kyi don du sdig pa kun tu spyod pa'i
416a4(mdo sde): sems can rnams la gsang sngags gzhi 'di lta bu 'di dag smras shing dam bca' ba'ang byas pa ni yang khyod logs so//khyod snying rje chen po 'di lta bu 'dis sems can thams
416a5(mdo sde): cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la rab tu 'god nus par 'gyur gyis khyod kyis de bzhin du gyis shig/de nas lha mo chen mo dung can mas bcom ldan
416a6(mdo sde): 'das la me tog sna tshogs dang /spos sna tshogs ngag gis mchod pa byas te bskor ba byas nas/bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la gtugs te/bcom ldan 'das
416a7(mdo sde): la 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das bdag gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyis brlabs kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa yun ring du gnas par
416b1(mdo sde): bgyi ba dang /chos smra ba de dag kyang bsrung ba'i slad du dam bca' bar bgyi zhing ra ba thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bgyid pa'i gsung sngags gzhi rnams sprul par bgyi lags kyis//
416b2(mdo sde): de'i slad du bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la rjes su gnang bar mdzad du gsol//na maHsarba ta thA ga ta n+da/tad+ya thA oM shaM khi nI dI bi/A gan+d+ha A gan+d+he tISh+Tha d+hI ne/dAn dza ye/bri
416b3(mdo sde): bri/bri ta ka ri/d+hI d+h+we/d+hI ta ka ri/nA nA ba bi bi d+ha/ba sha bsta d+ha d+ha ri ni yu yu/a yuSh+mA la ni/ta thA ga ta nAM/sma ra bo d+ha tsit+taM/ma bi laM ma be/de he maM ba ra ne/shi khaM
416b4(mdo sde): ni swA hA/bcom ldan 'das gsang sngags gzhi 'di dag lus la gnas par bgyis na/de'i snyan pa 'phel bar 'gyur zhing /gzi brjid 'phel ba dang /longs spyod 'phel ba
416b5(mdo sde): dang /dbang phyug 'phel ba dang /tshe ring ba dang /dgra rnams dbang du bgyi ba'ang 'phel bar 'gyur lags so//sa phyogs gtsang ma 'am lha'i gnas su ci 'byor pa'i gtor
416b6(mdo sde): ma phyogs bzhir stsal la/de bzhin gshegs pa la bdug spos dang /pog dkar po dag gis mchod pa rgya cher bgyi zhing zhugs mar dag kyang phul la/dgung nyi shu rtsa gcig
416b7(mdo sde): tu byongs pa la gnas pa dang /nges par gnas shing bzlas brjod lan brgya rtsa brgyad bgyis na/dam pa'i chos spong ba ma gtogs pa rnams kyi bsam pa thams cad yongs
417a1(mdo sde): su rdzogs par bgyi lags so//de nas bcom ldan 'das dang ji ltar lhags pa'i 'khor de dag gis lha mo chen mo dung can ma la legs so zhes bya ba byin to//
417a2(mdo sde): sring mo legs so legs so//yon tan mang po dang ldan pa'i dam bca' ba 'di ni legs par smras so//sring mo khyod kyis ma 'ongs pa'i dus na de bzhin du gyis shog/de nas
417a3(mdo sde): lha mo chen mo 'jigs byed mas bcom ldan 'das la gser gyi me tog dag gis mchod pa byas nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la gtugs te/bcom ldan 'das la 'di
417a4(mdo sde): skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das bdag gis kyang chos smra ba de dag dang /chos nyan pa de dag dang /yi ger 'dri ba de dag dang /'dzin pa dang /klog pa dang /mchod
417a5(mdo sde): pababagyid pa de dag gi don du re ba thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bgyid pa/dbyig dang /nor bu dang /mu tig dang /longs spyod dang /dbang phyug dang /rgyal srid dang /
417a6(mdo sde): tshe ring bar bgyid pa/dgra thams cad dbang du bgyid pa'i gsang sngags gzhi rnams stsal bar bgyi ste/rgyal po 'am/rgyal po'i btsun mo 'am/dge slong ngam/dge slong
417a7(mdo sde): ma'am/dge bsnyen nam/dge bsnyen ma gang la la zhig 'dzin tem/klog gam/bsnyen bkur bgyid dam/yi ger 'dri 'am/yi ger 'drir stsol tam/mchog
417b1(mdo sde): tugus pas ji skad gsungs pa'i sgrub pa la sgrub par bgyid na/bcom ldan 'das bdag gis de bsrung bar bya/yongs su bskyang bar bgyi zhing dam pa ci 'tshal ba'ang stsal bar
417b2(mdo sde): bgyi ste/longs spyod dang /dbang phyug dag gis mi brel bar bgyi/'thab mo dang /'gyed pa dang /khrag khrug dang /'khrug slong dag las rgyal bar bgyi/tshe phun
417b3(mdo sde): sum tshogs pa nye bar bsgrub par bgyi/de'i yul dang grong khyer dag kyang yongs su bskyang bar bgyi legs kyis/de'i slad du bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la rjes su gnang
417b4(mdo sde): bar mdzad du gsol/ni maHsarba ta thA ga ta nAM/tad+ya thA au shaM khi ni de bi/A gats+tsha AM gats+tsha/tiSh+Tha d+hi nAM/dA na dza ye/bI bI/bri ta ka ri/d+hI d+hI/d+hI ta ka ri/nA nA ba bi'i
417b5(mdo sde): d+ha/ba sha bsta d+hA d+ha ri ni/yu yu a yuSh+ka li le/ta thA ga ta nAM/sma ra bo d+hi tsit+ta/ma bi lam ba/di he me ba ra na/shi khi ni swA hA//bcom ldan 'das bdag gris sems
417b6(mdo sde): can thams cad kyi don du de bzhin gshegs pas byin gyis brlabs shing de bzhin gshegs pas rjes su gnang ba'i gsang sngags gzhi 'di dag smras lags te/de bzhin gshegs
417b7(mdo sde): pa'i spyan sngar me tog dang /bdug spos dang /spos dang /mar me dag gis mchod pa bgyis la/phyogs bzhir yang 'o thug dang /ro sna tshogs dang ldan pa'i gtor ma dag
418a1(mdo sde): sprul te/ci dang ci 'tshal ba yid la bgyis shing bzlas brjod lan brgya rtsa brgyad kyis mchod pa bgyis na/re ba de dang de dag thams cad yongs su rdzogs
418a2(mdo sde): par bgyis lags so//gang la la bdag rang gis gzugs mthong bar 'tshal ba des chos brgyad kyi gdugs la ras dkar po sar pa kha tshar ma bkum pa sgra ma mchis pa la
418a3(mdo sde): ri mo mkhan gtsang ma 'phags pa'i yan lag brgyad yongs su bzung ba'i tshon rtsi sbyin dang ma 'bags pa snod sar pa'i nang du stsal bas/dbus su de bzhin gshegs pa'i
418a4(mdo sde): sku gzugs chos ston pa'i tshul du bzhugs pa bri bar bgyi'o//g.yas phyogs su 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug chos kyi 'bel ba'i gtam ston pa bri bar bgyi'o//
418a5(mdo sde): g.yon phyogs su ni lha mo chen mo 'jigs byed ma 'dam bu mda' rgyu'i mdog ltar dkar sham du mchis la/radwa pa dkar po 'tshal ba/rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ril
418a6(mdo sde): ba dang /bgrang phreng thogs shing yang dag par dbugs 'byin pa'i tshul du mchis pa bri bar bgyi'o//de nas rig sngags 'chang gtsang mas sngar bsnyen pa bgyi la ches brgyad
418a7(mdo sde): nas ches bco lnga'i bar du mchod rten sku gdung dang bcas pa'i gnas su me tog dang /bdug spos dang /spos dang /me tog phreng dag gis mchod pa bgyi zhing /phyogs
418b1(mdo sde): ma mamamamatshamacam thamamasas mthams ma tham/sa macan thas nathatha thas mamanyam mamamamamama' mam nyam yamags mnaca a mamam mas ya a thamamamasas
418b2(mdo sde): bzhir yang 'o thug dang /zho dang /'bras chan gyi gtor ma dag gtor la/me tog dang /bdug spos dang /mar me sna tshogs dag gis mchod pa rgya cher bgyi zhing lha bshos
418b3(mdo sde): dkar po dag kyang phul la/gtor ma ro sna tshogs dang ldan pa dang /gzhan yang ci 'byor pa dag stsal nas sems can thams cad la byams pa'i sems dang /snying rje'i sems
418b4(mdo sde): kyis sna ma'i me tog brgya rtsa brgyad la bzlas brjod lan brgya rtsa brgyad bgyi zhing re re nas lha mo chen mo 'jigs byed ma'i gzugs de la 'phang bar bgyi'o//de nas bdag der rang gi
418b5(mdo sde): gzugs kyis gnas par bgyi/dam pa ci 'tshal ba 'ong stsal bar bgyi ste/rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug dong /nam mkha' la mchi ba dang /gter lta 'tshal ba dang /nor sgyur

418b7(mdo sde): tu gzhom pa dang /sems can thams cad la byams pa skye ba dang /gzhan yang ci 'tshal ba'i las dag kyang bgyi lags so//bcom ldan 'das gral te dam pa'i chos
418b8(mdo sde): spong ba dang /sangs rgyas dang /chos dang /dge 'dun dog la the tshom du gyur pa gang lags pa ma gtogs par mtshams ma mchis pa lnga bgyid pa zhig lags na'ang bdag

419a2(mdo sde): rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar ma gyur cig/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/sring mo legs so legs so//sring mo khyod sems can thams cad kyi drin dang /phan

419a4(mdo sde): bcas pa 'di dran par gyis shig/de nas de'i tshe sa chen po 'di rab tu g.yos shing lha'i me tog gi char dag kyang mngon par rab tu bab pa dang /thams cad dang ldan pa'i
419a5(mdo sde): 'khor de dag gis kyang legs so zhes bya ba byin te/sing mo legs so legs so//khyod kyis sems can thams cad kyi re ba thams cad yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur
419a6(mdo sde): ba'i dam bca' ba 'di ni legs par smos so//de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis
419a7(mdo sde): 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das ci rigs kyi bu 'am/rigs kyi bu mo de chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yi ger 'dri ba dang /yi ger 'drir stsol ba dang /klog pa
419b1(mdo sde): dang /mchod pa dang /yang dag par ston pa dang /'don pa dang /mchid ton du bgyid pa des bsod nams 'thob par 'gyur lags sam/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal
419b2(mdo sde): pa/'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug de'i phyir de khyod nyid la dri yis khyod kyis ji ltar bzod pa de bzhin du lan thob cig/spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis gsol pa/bcom
419b3(mdo sde): ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa la ni ma gzigs pa'am/ma gsan pa'am/ma dgongs pa dang /rnam par mi mkhyen pa mi mnga' bas bcom ldan 'das nyid kyis bka' stsal

419b5(mdo sde): dag par ston pa dang /'dren pa dang /kha ton du byed pa las bsod nams 'thob par 'gyur ba gang yin pa de ni dpes brjod par yang mi nus so//de ci'i phyir zhe na/
419b6(mdo sde): gos dang /rgyan dang /dbyig dang /gser dang /nor bu dang /mu tig dag gis sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du yongs su rdzogs par byas te rtser
419b7(mdo sde): bcug kyang sems can de dag skye ba dang /rga ba dang /na ba dang /'chi ba dang /mya ngan dang /smre sngags 'don pa dang /sdug bsngal ba dang /yid mi bde ba dong /'khrug
420a1(mdo sde): tham mamamatshamamamanyam sas na thams ma tham/a mtham thas nathakhas mthamamamam mamams yam ma ya.ams makas bal ya tha mtham ma'
420a2(mdo sde): pa dag las yongs su mthar bar mi 'gyur ba nyid yin zhing /lo 'brum du 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga po dag gis rtser bcug kyang sems can de dag sems can
420a3(mdo sde): dmyal ba dang /dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang /gshin rje'i 'jig rten dang /yi dgas kyi yul dag las yongs su thar bar mi 'gyur ba nyid de/sems can rnams kyi phyir
420a4(mdo sde): chos kyi rnam grangs 'di nyan cid mchod pa byed pa dang /yang dag par bstan te/de'i don kyang mnyan cing nan tan gyis sgrub par byed pa ni skye ba dang /rga ba dang /na blo dang /
420a5(mdo sde): 'chi ba dang /mya ngan dang /smre sngags 'don pa dang /sdug bsngal ba dang /yid mi bde ba dang /'khrug pa dag dang /se mos can domyal ba dang /dud 'gro'i skye
420a6(mdo sde): gnas dang /go shin rje'i 'jig rten thams cad las yongs su thar ba kho nar 'gyur bas de'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pas 'di'i bsod nams kyi tshad kyi dpe mi mdzad do//
420a7(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu gang gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di dang /chos smra ba dang /'dzin pa dang /klog pa dang /yi ger 'dri ba dang /mchod pa byed pa dang /gang gi phyir dbyig
420a8(mdo sde): yungs 'bru tsam yongs su gtong bar byed dam/me tog gcig gam/'bras bu gcig gam/ba dan nam/rol mo'i sgra 'am/spos sam/goso sam/rgyan
420b1(mdo sde): gcig tsam zhig yongs su gtong bar byed dam/yi ger 'dri ba 'am/yi ger 'drir 'jug gam/'chang ngam/klog gam/mchod pa byed dam/yang dag par ston tam/bsnyen
420b2(mdo sde): bkur byed dam/gzhan dag la'ang rgya cher yang dag par rab tu ston par byed pa gang yin pa dang /gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa 'khor dang bcas pa mngon sum du bzhugs
420b3(mdo sde): ba la lo 'bum du me tog dang /bdug spos dang /spos dang /me tog phreng dang /byug pa dang /gdugs dang /rgyal mtshan dang /ba dan dag gis mchod pas mchod
420b4(mdo sde): par byed/brjed par byed cing /bde ba'i yo byad thams cad kyis bsnyen bkur byed pa dang /gtsug lag khang dang /'chag sa dang /skyed mos tshal dag byed du bcug
420b5(mdo sde): gam/de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyir rin po che sna bdun gyi mchod rten 'phang du dpag tshad phyed pa brgya 'am stong byed du bcug ste/de dag la lo 'bum du mchod po dag gis
420b6(mdo sde): mchod par byed pa bas/gang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yi ger 'dri ba dang /yi ger 'drir 'jug pa dang /'chang ba dang /klog pa dang /'don pa dang /mchod pa byed
420b7(mdo sde): pa dang /yang dag par ston pa de ni de bas ches bsod nams mngon par 'du bya ba ches mang du skye bar 'gyur gyi/de bzhin gshegs pa la mngon sum du mchod pa byed po de ni
421a1(mdo sde): de lta ma yin la/sems can thams cad la sbyin pa byin zhing 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga po dag gis rtser bcug pa'ang de lta ma yin no//de lta bas na rigs
421a2(mdo sde): kyi bu dang /rigs kyi bu mo dang /rgyal po dang /rgyal bu dang /blon po chen po dang /blon po de dag gis rtag par rgyun du chos kyi rnam grangs 'dri mchod par bya'o//gang chos
421a3(mdo sde): kyi rnam grangs 'di sgrogs par byed pa dang /brjod par byed pa dang /don kyang nye bar sgrub par byed pa'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen de dag la'ang de bzhin gshegs pa nyid du 'dra
421a4(mdo sde): shes bskyed par bya zhing /de dag gis bsnyen bkur byos te chos kyi rnam grangs 'di mnyan par bya/gzung bar bya/bcang bar bya/bklag par bya/yid la bya zhing
421a5(mdo sde): 'di ltar sems bskyed par bya ste/bdag cag don med pa la don du 'du shes pa dang /mi rtog pa la rtag par 'du shes pa dang /sdug bsngal ba la bde bar 'du
421a6(mdo sde): shAs shing /lam ma yin par zhugs pa la lam nye bar ston pa gang yin pa dang /bdag cag sems can dmyal ba dang /dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang /gshin
421a7(mdo sde): rje'i 'jig rten las yongs su thar bar bya ba'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa'i mdzad pa gang yin pa de ni bdag cag gos rnyed pa legs par rnyed do snyam du sems bskyed
421b1(mdo sde): par yang bya'o//spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni sems can thams cad la de bzhin gshegs pa'i mdzad pa mdzad
421b2(mdo sde): pa chen pos yang dag por bshad lags so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rigs kyi bu chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni phyi ma'i dus phyi ma'i tshe na lho phyogs kyi rgyud na spyod
421b3(mdo sde): par 'gyur te/der yang dge slong dang /dge slong ma dang /dge bsnyen dang /drage bsnyen ma dang /rgyal po dang /rgyal bu dang /blon po chen po dang /blon po snod du gyur pa
421b4(mdo sde): mchod pa byed pa/'dzin par byed pa/klog par byed pa dag 'byung bar 'gyur zhing /dad par 'gyur/yid ches par 'gyur ro//gal te byang dang /shir dang /nub
421b5(mdo sde): phyogs kyi rgyud dag na spyod par 'gyur na'ang de na gang dag nyan par mi byed pa dang /dad par mi byed pa dang /yid ches par mi byed pa dang /mchod par mi byed pa dang /brtson
421b6(mdo sde): 'o'abrus zhan pa dang /brjed ngas pa dang /bu smad dang /bran mo dang /longs spyod dang /dbang phyug dang /bzhad gad dang /'jo sgeg dang /bro dang /gar dang /glu sna
421b7(mdo sde): tshogs kyis rnam par g.yengs shing /phrag dog dang /ser sna'i dran pas nyan par mi byed pa'i sems can de dag ni bdud kyi las la mngon par brtson pa yin te/de dag ni
422a1(mdo sde): skye ba dang /rga ba dang /na ba dang /'chi ba dang /mya ngan dang /smre sngags 'dron pa dang /sdug bsngal ba dang /yid mi bde ba dang /'khrug pa dag dang //
422a2(mdo sde): sems can dmyal ba dang /dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang /gshin rje'i 'jig rten dang /yo dgas kyi yul rnams las yongs su mi thar pa kho nar 'gyur ro//de lta bas na rigs
422a3(mdo sde): kyi bu dang /rigs kyi bu mo bdag nyid ngan song thams cad las yongs su thar bar 'dod pa de dag gis bsnyen bkur byas te chos kyi rnam grangs 'di mchod par bya zhing /gzhan dag
422a4(mdo sde): la yang dag par bstan par bya yid la'ang gzung bar bya'o//khrag khrug dang /'khrug klong dang /rmi lam ngan po dang /ltas ngan pa dag dang /duso ma yin par 'chi ba
422a5(mdo sde): dang /gnag nad dang /phyugs nad dang /mi nad dag dang /nad dang /'jigs pa dang /gnod pa sna tshogs dag la'ang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di mchod pa byas te bklag
422a6(mdo sde): par bya'o//rgyal mtshan gtsugs la me tog dang /bdug spos dang /spos dang /rol mo'i sgra sna tshogs dag gis mchod cing phyogs bzhir gtor ma gtor la me tog
422a7(mdo sde): dang /bdug spos dang /spos dag gis phyag byas te 'jug par byas na/der yams kyi nad dang /gnod pa dang /'go ba'i nad thams cad kyang rab tu zhi bar 'gyur
422b1(mdo sde): ro//de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to//sngon gyi srid par 'dren pas gang gsungs shing //sems can thams cad rjes su gzung ba'i
422b2(mdo sde): phyir//da ltar ngas kyang khyed la bshad pa yi//ting 'dzin 'di ni gzung zhig kun dga' bo//sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun dkon mchog la//gang gis khams gsum sbyin
422b3(mdo sde): por byin pa bas//mdo sde 'di la mchod pa byas na ni//sbyin pa sku de yi dper yang mi phod do//gang gis sangs rgyas la ni dang byas te//chud med gtsug lag khang dag
422b4(mdo sde): brtsigs pa dras//gang zhig mdo 'dri 'dzin po gang yin pa//de ni de bas bsod nams mang por 'gyur//gang zhig me tog gcig tsam 'thor byed cing //gros dang phreng ba
422b5(mdo sde): byug pa de bzhin te//ting 'dzin 'dri la bsnyen bkur byed gyur na//bsod nams tshogs char snga ma de mi 'gyur//gang gis mdo sde 'di lo mchod pa'i phyir//kAR+sha pA Ni'i
422b6(mdo sde): sbyin pa sbyin byed cing //byang chub phyir ni byams pa'i sems bskyed na//de ni de bas bsod nams mang po 'thob//byang chub sems dpa' gang gis sems can la//ting
422b7(mdo sde): 'dzin 'ad bshad lung pog de bzhin du//bla med byang chub phyir ni bkod gyur na//de yi bsod nams dper yang mi bzod 'gyur//de ltas phan yon 'di dag thos nas kyang //
423a1(mdo sde): sems can kun la de bzhin byams byas te//mdo 'di gzung zhing yi ger bri bar bya//bklag par bya zhing de bzhin bshad par bya//rga dang de bzhin
423a2(mdo sde): na 'chi sa gnod gyur cing //sdug bsngal rab drag brgya yis yongs gdungs la//sems dmyal yi dgas rnams su skye ba na//phyi ma'i dus no 'gyod par gyur ta re//
423a3(mdo sde): 'chi ba'i dus na yid skrag 'jigs gyur la//yang dang yang du sngam pa 'don byed cing //bdag gi dpung gnyen skyabs su 'gyur ba zhes//byis pa'i blo can phan tshun
423a4(mdo sde): rtog ga re//gang phyir de bzhin gshegs pa ma mchod cing //sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun nor 'phrogs pa//mi zad gshin rje'i 'jig rten khrid 'gyur zhing //
423a5(mdo sde): phyin chad rtag tu skyabs 'gyur 'ga' yang med//bu smad yod min nye du rtsa lag med//yul 'khor yod min gzhad gad 'jo sgeg med//nor dang 'bru dang de
423a6(mdo sde): bzhin gos dang rgyan//kun spangs sdug bsngal yang drang yang mi zad//ting 'dzin 'di la dad par ma byas pas//de 'dra'i sdug bsngal mi zad myong 'gyur bas//
423a7(mdo sde): sdug bsngal 'di dang phan yon de thos na//byis pa'i blo yang su zhig dad mi skyed//de phyir rtag tu dge slong pha ma dang //dge bsnyen rnams dong rgyal pos khor
423b1(mdo sde): zug dang //mdo sde 'di ni rtag tu gzung bya zhing //'dzin pa la yang rtag tu bsnyen bkur bya//de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos 'di skad ces
423b2(mdo sde): gsol to//bcom ldan 'das bdag gos chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bzung lags te/ston pa'i 'du shes kyis bcang bar bgyi zhing sems can thams cad la yang dag
423b3(mdo sde): bar bstan par bgyi lags so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/kun dga' bo gal te khyod kyis ngas chos gang bstan pa mnyan te kun bzung ba de dag thams
423b4(mdo sde): cad 'chang bar mi byed/klog par mi byed/rgyas par mi byed kyang /des ni khyod kyis nga la nyes pa byas par mi 'gyur zhing gus par ma mnyan par yang mi 'gyur la/nyan
423b5(mdo sde): thos nyid ma yin por yang mi 'gyur gyi/chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'chang bar mi byed/klog par mi byed/mchod par mi byed/yang dag par ston par mi byed/yid
423b6(mdo sde): la mi byed na ni des na khyod kyis nga la nyes pa byas par 'gyur zhing gus par ma mnyan par yang 'gyur lo/nyan thos nyid yin par yang mi 'gyur ro//kun dga' bo
423b7(mdo sde): de lta bos na khyod kyis phu dud byas te chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bcang bar bya'o//'di ni phyi ma'i dus phyi ma'i tshe na sems can thams cad la de bzhin gshegs pa'i tha
424a1(mdo sde): na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i mdzad pa byed par 'gyur ro//bcom ldan 'das kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di
424a2(mdo sde): bshad pa na srog chags drug khri len pa med par zag po rnams las sems rnam par grol lo//byang chub sems dpa' bdun brgyas ni ting nge 'dzin thob par gyur to//lnga
424a3(mdo sde): brgyas ni sangs rgyas kyi zhing tha dad par skye bar lung bstan pa thob par gyur to//srog chags dgu khri ni nyon mongs pa thams cad las rnam par grol te mi khom pa dang /
424a4(mdo sde): ngan song dang /ngan 'gro thams cad spongs so//de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug
424a5(mdo sde): gis yang 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni slod ma'i dus slad ma'i tshe na/rigs kyi bu dang /rigs kyi bu mo nyan par bgyid
424a6(mdo sde): pa dang /'dzin par bgyid pa dang /ri mor bgyid pa dang /mchod par bgyid pa de dag dang /yi ger 'bri bar bgyid pa de dag la dri bzhin gshegs pa'i
424a7(mdo sde): mdzad pa bgyid par 'gyur te/de dag kyang ji lta bu 'tshal ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing tha dad pa dag tu lung bstan pa lags so//slad ma'i dus slad ma'i tshe na sems
424b1(mdo sde): tham ya ma tham camamamamasas na thams ma tham/a mthan tha.a nathatha thas mthamamamacas ma ma thams mamasas yam kas mam ya a am pas mas mags ba ya ma mtham mtha thas
424b2(mdo sde): can gang bzhad gad dang /'jo sgeg dang /gar dang /bro dang /glu dang /rol mo'i sgra dag la sna tshogs su g.yeng ba/'dod chags dang /zhe sdang dang /gti mug
424b3(mdo sde): gyi mun pa rje ba/rtsed ma la dga' bar 'du shes pa/mI d+h+r-ig pa la rtog par 'du shes pa/drAg dog dang /ser sngas yongs su zin cing /mchod par me byed
424b4(mdo sde): mor mi bgyid/drad par mi bgyid/glo ba ches par mi bgyid/'chang bar mi bgyid/klog par mi bgyid/nyan par mi bgyid/nan tan gyis sgrub par mi bgyid
424b5(mdo sde): pa de dag ni dal ba 'di yid byung bar bgyis shing /sngon gyi las kyi 'bras bu de yongs su bas par bgyis nas sdug bsngal ba yid mi bde ba sna tshogs dang /sems can
424b6(mdo sde): dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal dag nyams su myong bar 'gyur zhing /de'ang bskal pa bye ba brgya phrag du mar sdug bsngal nyams su myong nas/yang slar sems can dmyal ba
424b7(mdo sde): dang /dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang /go shin rje'i 'jig rten rnams su skye bar 'gyur lags te/mi dge ba'i po shes gnyen gyi dbang gis yun ring por rjes su 'gyed
424b8(mdo sde): par 'gyur legs so//de lta lags pas ni lus dang /ngag dang /yid legs par bsdam par bgyi zhing /sangs rgyas dang /chos dang /dge 'dun dag
425a1(mdo sde): la'ang dad pa mi phyed par bgyi/sems can thams cad la'ang byams pa'i sems dang /phrag dog dang /ser sna dang /'chal pa'i tshul
425a2(mdo sde): khrims yongs su spangs pa'i sems dang /khro ba yongs su spangs pa'i sems su bgyi lags so//de nas ji ltar lhags pa'i 'khor de dag gis rang rang gi bsod
425a3(mdo sde): nams mngon par 'du bya ba dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa la lha'i me tog dang /bdug spos dang /spos dang /me tog phreng dang /byug pa dang /na bza' dang /
425a4(mdo sde): rgyan dag dang /a lo la zhes ca co dang ga zha'i sgra dag dang /lha'i sil snyan dang /pheg rdob pa dang /glu dbyangs dag gi mchod pa byas nas legs so zhes
425a5(mdo sde): bya ba gsol te/bcom ldan 'das legs so legs so//sems can thams cad kyi don dang /de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa yun ring du gnas par bgyi
425a6(mdo sde): bo'i slad du chos kyi rnam grangs chen po 'di shin tu legs par bka' stsal lags so//de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol
425a7(mdo sde): to//bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i ming ci lags/'di ji ltar gzung bar bgyi/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/kun dga' bo de'i
425b1(mdo sde): phyir khyod kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis rjes su gnang ba dang /byang chub sems dpa'i sa gnon pa zhes bya bar yang gzung zhig/rdzu
425b2(mdo sde): 'phrul gyi rnam par 'phrul pa 'dus pa chen po zhes bya bar yang gzung zhig/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs sems tson la gzigs shing sangs
425b3(mdo sde): rgyas kyi zhing gi bkod pa kun tu ston pa zhes bya bar yang gzung zhig/bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nos/'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug
425b4(mdo sde): dang /'jam dpal dang /lag na rdo rje la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag thams cad dang /nyan thos chen po de dag thams cad dang /brgya
425b5(mdo sde): byin dang /tshangs pa dang /'jig rten skyong ba de dog thams cad dang /rgyal po chen po bzhi dang /gnod sbyin chen mo dpe med ma dang /dri med 'od dang /
425b6(mdo sde): 'od can ma dang /'jigs byed ma dang /dpal ldan ma dang /dung can mo dang /'phrog ma la sogs pa de dag dang /lha dang /klu dang gnod sbyin dang /dri
425b7(mdo sde): za dang /lha ma yin dang /nom mkha' lding dang /mi 'am ci dang /lto 'phye chen po de dag thams cad dang /thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor ji ltar lhags
426a1(mdo sde): pa de dag dang /dge slong dang /dge slong ma dang /dge bsnyen dang /dge bsnyen ma'i 'khor rnams yI rangs te/bcom ldan 'das kyis
426a2(mdo sde): gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do//'phags pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs sems can la gzigs shing sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi bkod
426a3(mdo sde): da kun tu ston pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so///rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang /su ren+d+ra bo d+hi dang /zhu chen gyi lo tsa ba ban+de ye
426a4(mdo sde): shes sdes zhus te gtan la phab pa/ban+di klu'i rgyal mtshan gyis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa//zhus dag/mang+ga'o//
